It took me an hour to put this together and a half hour longer to mount the bracket to the wall. I did it all by myself. My 47" LCD is being held up without a problem. I'm planning on putting a 55" TV up with this mount next week. For the money ($28) This mount can simply not be beat.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: James Guiseppe
Reviews.Content: Works great has everything needed included, easy to install and has clear instructions and easily mounts TV and price to value ratio was very good

Reviews.Title: good slim mount
Reviews.Author: Glenn P. Miano
Reviews.Content: This mount was sturdy and stayed closer to the wall than the previous tilt mount I installed.  I would recomend.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great product. Easy install.
Reviews.Author: S. Taira
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping.  Mounted easily with crescent wrench and drill on a partitioned wall, which is in patio area.  Mount brackets on TV make it easy to mount/dismount TV when weather is poor.

Reviews.Title: my third purchase of this mount
Reviews.Author: Sharee Rivera "sharita"
Reviews.Content: this is a great product and for the price you cant ask for more.  my first  one i got 6 years ago and still holding strong.  bought a second for my friend and installed it for him.  now this is the third and again, ease of use and a great buy.  no need to spend more money when this is perfect.  it tilts and is very secure.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: mbcwick
Reviews.Content: i am not the greatest of handymen. So mounting my 40" HDTV in our room was a bit nerve-racking. I bought this because of the other excellent reviews. I was pleasantly suprised at the ease of the whole process. find the studs, drill, secure mount, hang TV. done. It was that easy. The instructions were clear. gave you every single piece of hardware (sans the drill) to be able to do this properly. Came with it's own mini-level and HDMI cord. If i need to hang another TV, i will definitely purchase this mount again, can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Pedro J. Otaduy "loretoki"
Reviews.Content: Very complete and good assortment of components and assembly aids.Good price, Nice gesture to include the HDMO cable and levels.Thanks1

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: It is a simple design, but it works great.  I don't even lock down my TV to the wall brackets anymore... The fact that it comes with the level and all the sturdy hardware makes this a pretty good deal in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great Product. Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Tim Prather
Reviews.Content: This mount is amazing. The price is great and the mount itself is even better. It is very easy to put together and has all the nuts/bolts and screws you need for assembly.The buyers who left bad reviews must not have followed the directions. Do not waste money or time with any other mount.

Reviews.Title: Good device
Reviews.Author: Michelle V Leonard
Reviews.Content: The bracket is strong and dependable. My TV is large and I was worried about to bracket being strong enou, but I've had no problems and am confident it will hold.

Reviews.Title: Great product Great Price!
Reviews.Author: David P. Simpson
Reviews.Content: Simple instructions. Easy to install. Great price! Met all of my expectations. Why would anyone pay more? Worked great with my 50 inch Vizio.

Reviews.Title: work fine
Reviews.Author: suxiaoxiao
Reviews.Content: it hangs things sturdily. however, the final step to tight the back screws is a mission impossible for a large TV (60") as the screw is in the middle of the mount on the back, the TV is 2" away from wall, your hand will not touch it, the screw driver needs to be 20" long and you have to be able to see it and tighten it.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Lui
Reviews.Content: Works Great. Ive had it for 7 months and i havent had any problems with it. Deft worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great product, very sturdy!
Reviews.Author: Jesus D. Martinez
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical but this product rocks. its cheap and very sturdy-- i am very content and will buy again. I mounted a 51'' Samsung. FYI, if you mount a tv this size there is not much room to tilt.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install!
Reviews.Author: Phil K
Reviews.Content: Easy installation! Just make sure to follow the instructions and take your time. It will save time and aggravation by laying our all the pieces.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: only bad thing is you cant turn it side to side but definitely worth the money jjjjj jjjj jjjj jj

Reviews.Title: A little flimsy for a heavier flat screen
Reviews.Author: D. Boles "Jadar"
Reviews.Content: Overall this a good mount. Easily assembled with numerous size hardware for different attachments to TV.  If you have a wider attachment point (700mm was mine) it puts the vertical hangers out to the end of wall brace . The brace will have a minor flex with a heavier flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Great design, inexpensive, easy to install. My TV is still up on the wall!NOTE: I did have to special order 4 screws that fit the back of my TV because for some reason this kit included 5+ different types but mine wasn't one of them.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Daddy of 3
Reviews.Content: The mount works great! I have a 55 inch plasma that weighs around 90 lbs and it's holding up great for over a month now! Well worth paying for this mount and saving over 50% on other "name" brand mounts! The only thing that I would think about getting a mount that sticks a bit more out. This mount is really low profile. But that's just my personal preference.

Reviews.Title: This is a good mount for the price but it does not work with all flat screen TV's that fit with in the described range.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I had to do a bit of customizing for it to work with my new Samsung 55" tv model 6500. In my case the bolts were too long but I just enlarged the holes in the supplied rubber bushings. this allowed me to use 2 for every one bolt and it fit correctly and bolted up to the wall with ease. You will also need a very long skinny Phillips screwdriver to deal with the lower mount screws.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dr.P
Reviews.Content: Worked great for my large television, bolts into the wall studs easily, included level makes it easier to install.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great mount
Reviews.Author: Alice Cochran
Reviews.Content: I originally bought two of these mounts, both for 32 in Vizio LCD TVs.Granted, your mileage may vary, but here is my experience:One was mounted on a wall in the studs shared with our garage. This has held up for a year now with no issues. The mount is very flush with the wall, so you might need tiny hands to connect your devices to the back of the TV, but it looks fantastic hanging up there.The other one is mounted on an interior wall (about 2 inches thick). The wall is wood paneling and although I attempted to hit studs, they are few and far between, but this mount has held up great. I used some extra nuts i had in the garage to prevent the screws from coming out the other side of the wall (the screws are very long, a good thing).Now, the first TV is down and I have mounted a 60in Vizio LED LCD and I could not be more pleased. Once again, the TV sits very flush with the wall, but thanks to the thinness of the TV, it looks like it is a part of the wall and belongs there like a framed photo or painting.I have not used any other mounts, but I must recommend these for their very low price but very high quality. Don't get gouged in the store paying 5 times what this costs.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: C. Turner
Reviews.Content: I'm always skeptical when a product is so much cheaper than its competitors.  But if you are drilling something into wall studs, all you need are strong enough materials to support the weight.  This frame is metal and it is supported by large diameter screws that you drive with a ratchet.  You are also going to need a drill and drill bits for pilot holes.  A lot of people here complain about the instructions.  But these instructions were of no less quality than anything else I have purchased that I had to assemble.  I made it 2/3 of the way through following the pictures without realizing there were also written instructions on the side.  The parts all come in labeled bags, but themselves are not labeled, so you just have to make sure that you do not open all of the bags at first.  I had no problem finding the right screws.  This is now supporting my 60-inch TV.

Reviews.Title: great item!
Reviews.Author: london&lexington
Reviews.Content: i searched for quite a while for a wall mount for our 42 in vizio tv, and to be honest I really had no idea what to go with.  the price is definitely the first thing that caught my eye on this product.  I read all the details and cross researched to make sure my tv holes in the back would fit the mount and it did so I ordered it (this one is pretty universal on settings i think, it goes from like 100 to 600 or something which represents the distances between the mount holes on your tv rear - i just learned that!) anyway, it came in, and I put it together quickly and easily with the help of my 10 month old daughter who is less of a help than she thinks :)  my husband mounted it to the wall within a few minutes.  it is perfect with the prepac altus wall mount entertainment console we put underneath.  this is a great product, and I would purchase this brand again!

Reviews.Title: Great product and priced right
Reviews.Author: Susan Samuelson
Reviews.Content: The wall mount is great it worked perfectly and was just what we wanted. the cost was well below what the same product was priced at at all the retailers we checked out.

Reviews.Title: Can't ask for more...
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Guere
Reviews.Content: Price was right, installation was as easy as any mount I've used, and came with a free HDMI cable.  5 stars!

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: haden mullinax
Reviews.Content: Good value. Easy to assemble and  Install. Works with other TVs as well.  Good product Amazon I would buy another one if I ever need one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value
Reviews.Author: frederick
Reviews.Content: This is a great price for this mount. It is simple to install and even easier to attach the TV. I would buy another one of these if I ever need one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to fit , and great value
Reviews.Author: Ian Cruickshank
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews of this Mount, I thoroughly agree that it is a great mount , especially for the price. It fits together easily, and has lots of different fitting options, with all the hardware needed for all these different applications. It also comes with a 10' HDMI cable, which you will definitely need if mounting a TV on the wall. All in all , a great product at the right price.

Reviews.Title: Throw away the torpedo level
Reviews.Author: RalphTheExpert
Reviews.Content: This is a remarkably well made mount for the price.Cons:The torpedo level is worthless; it showed level even though it was 15 degrees off in either direction, buy a decent one.  The instructions could be a bit clearer.  You will need some skills to mount a tv safely.The instructions assume you have wood studs.  I found out the hard way that I have metal studs.Pros:It does its job well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Higginbotham
Reviews.Content: Very simple to follow instructions and VERY sturdy construction. The only bad thing is the screw set that I had to use matched with the "lock washers", once tightened slid right through the holes. Luckily I had something that worked...other than that GREAT product.

Reviews.Title: can't compare or even come close to this product in local retail stores high quality/value
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: excellent purchase, east to install. highly recommend to others. excellent value ,quality - will not compare to the local retail stores.

Reviews.Title: TV Wall Mount worked great
Reviews.Author: CB in Missouri
Reviews.Content: This TV wall mount is exactly what we needed.  My husband was able to put it together and put the TV on the wall in under half an hour.  The price was great compared to other places that we looked.  We highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Great price and great product!! You get really good quality for a great price you can not ask for much more.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: ds
Reviews.Content: Just put this togather and was easy and looks great. Saw some reviews that complained about it being in multble parts but I didn't have any problems putting it togather and it is solid. I only put a 32" TV on it so TV was pretty light. Oh well looks great.

Reviews.Title: It did the job, and worth the price.
Reviews.Author: KhmerMike
Reviews.Content: I mounted a VIZIO E500i-A1 50-inch 1080P 120Hz LED Smart HDTV with this mounting kit. It worked perfectly.The HDTV did not come with mounting screws for wall mounting (only came with M4 screws for the stand. Wall mount screws are M6-18mm screw holes.)This mount kit came with M4, M5, and M6 screws and luckily the M6-20mm screws worked perfectly. The instructions were clear, and simple to follow. The extra HDMI cable is a nice little plus.If you've never done something like this before and you plan to do it yourself, just remember to take your time and triple check everything. Measurements are key in having the perfect setup.

Reviews.Title: Dont bother!!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Product was confusing as HELL!!!!! Did not come with any instructions or paperwork or anything. opened the box with the brackets and screws thrown around and had to figure it out. Once i got the TV up it looks fantastic. It says the TV tilts 15 degrees and i gotta say... i don't think so. There is about 3 centimeters worth of space between the wall and TV, EXTREMELY hard to plug things in. I have to have a buddy help me take the TV off the mount every time i have to plug something new in. I have a 60" LCD Panasonic and it fit fine. Once you figure out where everything is supposed to go and find your studs it was a cinch to install. The one suggestion i do have if you get this is make sure you take your time. Measure everything twice and be careful. They send you wayyy more pieces than you need and cant figure out what to do with half of them.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Tim Henrich
Reviews.Content: I was a bit nervous mounting my new 70" Sharp LED TV on the wall with this, given that the specs say up to 65", but I have to say I'm completely satisfied with it. The only downside is that there wasn't enough room to fit my hand behind the TV after it was mounted to screw in the safety screws. Other than that, Cheetah is definitely my go-to for low priced wall mounts.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Perry
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount for my 50 inch Panasonic plasma TV.  I wondered how they could put a quality product together for the price they were asking.  I was amazed!  Both high quality and easy to install.  Also, the included HDMI cable was of very high quality.  I'm thinking that the value of the cable alone was worth at least half of what I paid for the whole system.  Very good system, high quality, great price, and it met my installation requirements.  Couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mount for my New TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew Page
Reviews.Content: This was definitely a purchase that was very easy to set up and put together. Many other review say it look cheap, but I can tell you that each piece is solid. It was easy to put together and with the included level, I was able to put it up in about 20 minutes. The included 10 foot HDMI cable was just the right length to feed through my wall to hide those pesky wires.

Reviews.Title: A great budget mount
Reviews.Author: Mario A
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mount because similar mounts at Best Buy, Walmart, etc were almost 3-4 times the cost of this one. I read the reviews and decided it was a decent mount for my 50" Insignia 120hz LCD.  I am a Amazon Prime member so i ordered it next day for the $3.99 extra.  It arrived promptly the next day. I would give this 5 stars except the instructions and assembly were a little more difficult than i felt they needed to be.Mount works great, probably the best budget mount out there.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin "benjies"
Reviews.Content: Have had this installed for almost 3 years now on my 42" TV.  Easy to install.  Does what it's supposed to do...for SIGNIFICANTLY less than the mounts at the big box stores.  You won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.....
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap mount both in price and quality.  Once you open the box you realize it manufactured to be the most cost effective tilt mount to manufacture and not the best tilt mount.  I actually bought two of these and have used older Cheetah mounts that I feel were better quality.The product:I blame myself for not reading the negative reviews because most of them are spot on.  My main complaint is the product is composed of multiple parts that need to be put together to form the mounting frame for the wall.  You can clearly see this in the pictures on Amazon which I didn't pay attention to.  This assembly provides variances that I didn't want to deal with and ensures that you cannot center your TV on a stud.  Even the level that is included cannot be used for an accurate installation.  The HDMI cable and level are just included to make sure feel like you got a good deal.The install:I used this product to mount a 60" Panasonic Plasma over my fireplace.  I ordered this mount because it was cheap and had 1,000+ decent reviews.  I didn't notice that you cannot center this mount on a stud.  The only available studs over my fireplace were directly in the center of this mount.  That was an issue because this mount is assembled with 8 separate pieces with a metal plate right where I needed a hole for a lag screw.  I ended up drilling holes where I needed them which is probably not recommend.  Either way....after some modifications, I was able to use this mount but it is terrible quality.  I used 4 additional HILT drywall anchors in addition to two lag screws.  This is overkill but better safe than sorry.The recommendation:Pay a little more and get a quality tilt mount for $50-$75 and ensure it has a one piece frame that mounts to the wall.

Reviews.Title: it works fine its a great value
Reviews.Author: djohn
Reviews.Content: I like it fine and am glad I got it. I would recommend it to others as well. It's great

Reviews.Title: Light weight, works okay.
Reviews.Author: D. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Reasonably good thin mount. The primary horizontal mounting pieces are in two segments and are lighter weight metal than competitive mounts. Still, it works well. A bit large for a 32" tv. A bit light for larger than 42".

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Aerofool625
Reviews.Content: Is very secure on the wall! Has plenty of locations for any size wall stud pattern. The wall I installed the TV on was above a gas fireplace and there were no studs at all. I resorted to drywall screws (using the plastic inserts) and the included butterfly-style bolts. It is very securely on the wall and the butterfly-bolts are capable of handling plenty of weight just on their own. I did add more drywall screws of my own just as a precaution (there are some included in the package). No problems, easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Lacking one critical feature.
Reviews.Author: Pescador
Reviews.Content: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do, hang your big TV on the wall. The directions were good, changed out the included lag screws for better quality from Home Depot though. The one feature that would have been nice would be the ability to adjust the TV level once it is on the wall. This was on another mount we got and allows you to make small adjustments to level the TV itself. The brackets on the back allow for a slight bit by sliding them up or down, but you have to keep taking the TV on and off the wall to do this and there isn't a lot of room to move them in the first place. The bracket was as level as I could get it (not Norm Abrams here), but the TV was angled no matter what I did. Solved it by placing a small shim under the hook on the bracket to move one end up a bit, but the ability to do this from the unit itself would be a large improvement.

Reviews.Title: Questionable Specs?
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Glynn"
Reviews.Content: This kit claims that it will handle large screen TV's up to 65" class and will support up to 165 lbs.  These specs may be correct but because gauge of metal in the kit is so lightweight I was afraid to trust it to even support my 60" class tv weighing 73 lbs.--especially if the TV is tilted out from the wall which was the main reason that I bought this particular kit in the first place.  Just did not want to take the chance.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the price fool you
Reviews.Author: Blaine Sanders
Reviews.Content: Recently bought this mount for a 32" LCD. For the price, I didn't expect much, but I was only mounting a small TV and wasn't too concerned with the quality of the mount. After assembling and installing the mount, I was very impressed with the quality and strength of the design. The included HDMI cable appears to be of high quality, with a heavy braided sheathing and gold-plated plugs. If your tv's HDMI plugs come straight out the back, or have to make sharp bends to stay hidden, this cable may not meet your flexibility requirements, as it is pretty rigid. However, there are 90 degree adapters available here on amazon that are very inexpensive. The included level is nothing to brag about, but it does the job and is good enough to go in the tool box when you're done.The only thing that disappointed me about this mount is that it's about 32" wide, which, when used to mount a 32" TV, is quite visible except when viewing the TV straight on. But now that I have seen and used this mount, I am seriously considering ordering a second one to mount my 48" flat screen. I know it's capable, and for the price, it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: It works, and its cheap.
Reviews.Author: Kim Goff
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount to mount a 60 inch Samsung Plasma (66 lbs) to a stone fireplace wall.  It works, but the fact that it is 8 pieces (6 for main bracket) leaves me feeling a little uneasy.  It does flex a lot, which was also a concern.  I ended up putting  4 lags in the top, and 2 lags in the bottom because of the flexing of the thin metal.  It is now not going any where. It also has no way to adjust its level once up on the wall.  So make sure you get it right the first time.  The level it comes with is a joke, I ended up using a 4 foot level to make sure it was level.The HDMI cable it comes with is pretty nice.Bill

Reviews.Title: wall mounting tv
Reviews.Author: alexa "webbie"
Reviews.Content: not sure I"ll keep this very long. it was difficult to install. the guys doing the work really hated it. my first, so I just don't know. but, once they got the tv on it, they were afraid to try to move it or adjust it. I"m in the hunt for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Crazy good mount -- especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jessica T
Reviews.Content: We needed a new tv mount when we moved into a new home and we were on a bit of a budget so my boyfriend (who hates to do home projects) thought he'd be off the hook on this one but no way...I started looking for a reasonably priced wall mount and found this one.I was a little worried that it would be cheaply made to go along with the really cheap price but I figured I could always return it if it was junk -- I was pleasantly surprised!The mount is made of sturdy metal and came with everything you could imagine needing -- even a little level!  The instructions could have been a bit clearer but we figured it out.  It took us a little over a half hour to get installed and the tv back up and running.  I'm sure more capable DIY-ers would've moved this along faster.Turns out, this is a great mount that is well made and easy to install.  It shipped super fast and was just as described by the seller.  We are very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Why would you spend more?
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This mount works perfectly for my 32" Vizio TV.Pro's:*Price!!!*HDMI cable included*2 Levels include (one standard one that can be added to your toolbox if you don't already have one, and one that clips on the mount as you are hanging it so you can use both hands for positioning, of course, double check with the other one before tightening everything)*Intended to be an all in one solution, lots of extra parts that could be used in various (and even some very rare) setups.Con's:*Instructions aren't the best, might take a few reads to understand.*If you use the tilt (and why wouldn't you?) it is impossible to get behind the TV to secure the safety pins. I'm not sure if this is by design, since with the tilt it is much less likely to fall off the wall, or if this is an unfortunate side effect of tilting. I might be worried if I lived in California or some place with earthquakes. But I can't see what could make this fall off my wall. Even a bump wouldn't do it.Great product. Couldn't ask for anything more and at less than a half or a third of what you would pay for a comparable model. Free 2 day shipping from Amazon too!

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Michael Green
Reviews.Content: For the money you can not beat this mount. It included everything necessary for my particular application. Instructions are a bit cryptic, but easy enough to figure out. This mount is extremely flat, so give some thought to your cable management before you hang the TV. There is not a lot of room to do it with the TV mounted.

Reviews.Title: Decent mount works well
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: This mount came with all I needed to make it work except the included level is really just for show. The HDMI cable is Excellent and every bit as good as the best cables I have purchased. It was alittle difficult to get it mounted exactly level, but very doable. Cost was exceptional. I use it to hold a 47" TV above my fireplace and I have seen no issues since mounting. If you want a decent no nonsense TV mount this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Cheap construction...
Reviews.Author: unapologeticdan
Reviews.Content: Pay for cheap and get cheap. The metal construction is not the best and using it for a mobile church application, after about 6 months, the stress of mounting a TV every week has caused structural failure and stress cracks. I can see a permanent installation this product being okay and just "okay," but I still wouldn't hang MY TV from it. There are far better, more durable mounts out there.

Reviews.Title: Does the job and well, for the money, painful install
Reviews.Author: Jen C
Reviews.Content: Thankfully, we had professional handymen to install this for us but it was NOT easy.  There are wierd screws at the bottom that you need to do with a screwdriver with an extension to get it completely installed.  You do need at least 2 people and a lever and it doesn't tilt or come out like more expensive models, but that said, for the price, it does hold our 60" TV well.  If you have the time to install and don't want to spend a fortune on a wall mount, then this one is a good pick.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: N8
Reviews.Content: Perhaps my expectations were high based on some prior purchases. My dissatisfaction stems from the fact that the bracket that attaches to the wall is not one complete piece. It is in fact 4 pieces that has to be assembled. The previous bracket I purchased was one piece. Therefore there was less assembly. Also make sure you read the sparse instructions. There are different size screws for the top and bottom bracket. Why not just one size screw? Does the top need stronger screws? this did not make any sense to me. Also why print the instructions in such tiny print?All in all I got it mounted and it works..

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Liz B
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my tv and just love it. I had to have help to install it because I just couldn't do it on my own but it's holding strong. Compared to the fact that I would've paid a hefty price tag for something similar at a store with none of the extras IT'S AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and quality
Reviews.Author: John Christensen "John C"
Reviews.Content: This mount does everything I needed it to do at an excellent price.  I is well finished and mounted to TV with no issues.  Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: extremely easy to put together and mount
Reviews.Author: A. Mango
Reviews.Content: first time hanging a tv and it took me 45 minutes start to finish,, great directions  every part is labled,, really happy with it,, fits a 37 inch vizio easily...

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: timiaking
Reviews.Content: Received the mount, had my TV mounted over the mantle, and it looks great. The price was great as well. Will definitely recommend this mount to others.

Reviews.Title: Good mount for the price.
Reviews.Author: Christopher W Jennings
Reviews.Content: Hard to lock down the final two bolts to prevent it from falling off of the bracket on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Getting there is not half the fun
Reviews.Author: Mlo "FTEnNC"
Reviews.Content: It does the job, the price is great..however the screws are too small and the holes did not line up.  Extreme trouble putting it together was not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Adequate for the job.
Reviews.Author: Vincent Latona
Reviews.Content: It does an adequate job. The assembly instructions are a bit off, but easily enough to figure out. This does hold the heavy big screen but it's not really built very sturdy. The last wall mount I had for a TV this size was about twice the weight and the material was about twice as thick. But....this does do the job and it's certainly priced right. It does include some items which I didn't use such as a bubble level. The problem with the level is that it's about 3" long and not very accurate due to it's length. I used a standard level and it worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for :(-
Reviews.Author: Ravi S Makam
Reviews.Content: This mount is okay. I had trouble aligning the top two rods, the bottom rods aligned fine, so there is a quality issue for sure.I used this to mount my 42 inch. also once mounted there are two screws that needs to be screwed in the bottom, which seems to be very difficult as there is not enough room to get to it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Simple Setup
Reviews.Author: Geoff McDonald
Reviews.Content: There is no reason to pay more than this for a TV wall mount. It is easy to set up and easy to install, just drill the holes for the wall mount, screw the brackets onto the TV, lift and hang. The one thing that I would recommend is having someone help you when you are plugging in cables to your TV, depending on the TV. I own a Panasonic Viera TC-P50U50 50" TV and the location of the HDMI plugs came really close to the wall when installed, so the TV needed to be lifted away from the wall a bit to plug them in. Otherwise I have had no issue with this mount.Some reviews tell you that the installation instructions could be easier to follow, which is true, but honestly the installation of the TV bracket is pretty simple. Make sure that you read your TV manual to figure out which screws you need for the TV brackets.Pros:CheapFunctionalEasy to installCons:Instructions are hard to read

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE installation!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As far as holding up a TV on the wall, I guess you could say it's great...getting the TV up there and stable is another story.  The safety screws that need to be tightened are so far up a normal screw driver cannot reach.  Not to mention the space between the TV and the wall was less than an inch.  Not a whole lot of room to work.  We had to Frankenstein a screwdriver together to screw in these screws.  It was ridiculous.  The shaft of the screwdriver had to be almost a foot long!  I guess we got it screwed in, quite frankly there's no way to really know because you sure as heck can't see back there.Hopefully we'll never have to take our TV down.  If we do, we'll probably just have to rip the dang thing off the wall.

Reviews.Title: Low Profile, Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Madrigal A Stansell
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I bought this wall mount; it's incredibly low-profile and was so easy to install. I just bought my husband a 55" Samsung TV and got this to go along with it. I think he was more thrilled with the wall mount than with the TV!

Reviews.Title: Helpful multipack, decent product
Reviews.Author: Karisa L Crest
Reviews.Content: I wont lie, im penny pincher. This high quality HDMI cable is awesome! and it came "free" with purchase... but level is your standard peice of plastic and a waste since now i own 4 levels from multi packs like this.as for the cheetah mount, It was easy to install but you need to be aware that to drill into wood studs, you'll need some good power tools. I had a hard time attaching it to my tv because of its odd back angle and 2 different back screw sizes but cheetah mount came to the rescue with multiple size screws and additional spacers of 2 sizes. If this was just some standard peice of crap for all tv's i would have returned it.My only disgruntle is that angleing the tv is tough. It was a lot of push and shove to get it right and the instructions say to adjust before you mount it. but then it was IMPOSSIBLE to secure a bolt to the bottom because the angle blocked any space to screw it in.All in all, im glad it fits, glad it supports all of my weight for my 32" LCD and glad that it wont be falling off the wall anytime soon. yay floating tv's!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tim Gonzales
Reviews.Content: Been using this TV mount for 2+ years and used it in two different apartments.  Solid construction and feel.  Not concerned at all that my TV might fall.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Grimone
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd review I've written on this product, do you want me to lower your expectations? Its still better than Costco!

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: dayna heiner
Reviews.Content: i like it the directions not so much i will buy another one for my son it's well worth the money and then some

Reviews.Title: exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Anthony Slatton
Reviews.Content: Quick to ship and items are exactly as advertised. I recommend this product to any one looking for a tv mount

Reviews.Title: Worked great and had my 55" TV mounted in about an hour.
Reviews.Author: J. God "The King of DILIGAF"
Reviews.Content: No problems at all and it worked perfectly.  Was pretty easy to get installed and mounted even without the proper equipment on my end.  Very sturdy I tugged on it quite a bit before I trusted my new TV on it, but it was solid and has been since I received it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Richard Gilbert
Reviews.Content: Using a 55 inch led and had to put a 1 inch this plank behind it so tv would tilt down. other than that it works good.

Reviews.Title: Pleasently surprised, dont think it wont hold your TV because it will
Reviews.Author: Matt K
Reviews.Content: So at first I would like to say that when I felt the weight of the box this product came in I was more than skeptical that it would hold my brand new 55 inch Plasma TV which weighed in at a not so light 80 lbs. but having read all of the reviews that said otherwise I started the install.  The installation went without a hitch, I found the studs with my stud finder and the wall mount bracket went up without a problem.  The second part of the installation was to attach the "hooks" as I call them to the back of the TV which also went without a problem.  Now comes the part that I was skeptical about, the actual mounting of the TV on the bracket.  Looking back on it I would have liked to of had someone else on the other side of the TV to help me get it on the bracket itself as doing it by myself was kind of akward because of the width of the TV.  Upon placing the hooks on the back of the TV on the rails of the bracket I held my breath and stepped back as now the bracket was supporting the full 80lbs and to my surprise it held solid and still does to this day.  To wrap up this review I would say believe the hype, this bracket will hold your TV without issue and you can install it without worrying.

Reviews.Title: Very economical, durable, easy install- two caveats
Reviews.Author: JOHN MAYHAN
Reviews.Content: Came in 4 parts plus accessories: HDMI cable and a two mini levelers. The HDMI cable alone is worth $20 (BestBuy price). The mount came in 4 parts- two piece mounting frame and two mount arms. The smaller leveler came packaged with the hardware pack, and is not mentioned in the instructions. Use its clip side to attach to the top of the frame when mounting it. Here are my installation notes: 1) it so happened that where I wanted to mount the TV there was a stud in the middle, and the assembled frame holes could not reach the other studs, each 16" from the center stud. The frame is about 32" length overall. Generally one would just offset the frame to the left or right, but with a rather large monitor, I feared an off-center appearance in the end. The solution was to mount a 34" long piece of 1" x 12" pine board and use (4) 3" lag bolts with 1/4 washers to mount the board to the studs that were to the left and right of the center stud. Afterward mount the frame using (4) #12 1" sheet metal pan-head Phillips screws with matching washers. There was enough space just below this mount to conceal a new AC outlet and an access plate for the A/V wires. 2) the mounting arms have a hardware accessory pack that is insufficient. Along with screw (a,b,c,d,or e) and star washers (f), add regular machine washers between star washers and the mount arms. Without these extra washers, the smaller screws may slip through the mount arms and cause your monitor to fall. Other than these caveats, this is really nice product.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah APTMM2B Mount
Reviews.Author: acanal
Reviews.Content: Excellent buy, but I had to make adjustments for my new Samsung UN32ES6500 32-Inch TV. The hook mounting brackets which attach to the TV were too long, protruding a few inches above the top of the TV because of the design in back of the TV (would have been unsightly) However I cut off a few inches on the top of each metal bracket (most of the top slot- there are 2 slots on top of each) and they fitted perfectly.  I removed the extension clamps on the wall brackets for a better fit (these were also too long for my 32" TV and I did not need the extension supplied) however before mounting to wall, I added a 2 ½ inch square thick wood under each bracket to give the TV the recommended 4 inch air space between wall and TV-also so that the cables would fit properly and easily. Before bolting wall mount to wall, I purchased  5" lag screws (the 2 inch ones supplied were not long enough for my needs) to go through the 2 ½ inch wood and the 5/8ths sheet rock which left about 2 inches into the wood studs . I used the proper drill bits to drill the holes in each piece of wood I added so the lag screw would pass through easily and used smaller bits than the lag screws to drill through the wall and studs so the lag screw would go in easily and not split the wood studs. The I just "hooked" my TV to the wall mount and tightened the safety screws on the bottom of the bracket so the TV could not somehow slipped off and fall. Excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount for the money
Reviews.Author: John Lauro
Reviews.Content: The mount does the job. Make sure you check the clearance of the power cord behind the tv before you drill holes.I needed to purchase a flat extension cord. Works well with my Panasonic Viera 50" plasma.

Reviews.Title: Don't count on "included parts"
Reviews.Author: Jeremy J Rollison
Reviews.Content: My 32" Phillips looks great on my wall, and it only took me 3 hours and 2 trips to the hardware store to get it up there!  Simply put, the device comes with included bolts to secure it to the back of your television, which is nice and was expected (as it was listed in the product description).  However, the heads of the M4 bolts (which fit my TV) are SMALLER than the holes on the brackets.  My first solution was to go find some washers that would cover the holes in the brackets.  Head home and find out that once I added the washers, the M4 bolts are not long enough to reach the threads.  On my second trip to the hardware store I bought longer M4 bolts.  Long story short, the thing is mounted and looks great.  But what a silly and aggravating design flaw!  Hopefully the company will either make the holes in the brackets smaller or find M4 bolts with larger heads!

Reviews.Title: Cheap and effective.
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: I've had it for nearly 3 years... it's still holding my 42 inch tv, and i'm about to put a 60 inch on it.So far so good, i've had ZERO problems, it was simple to install, if you're willing to drill into the wall, and comes pre packaged with everything basically perfectly.I will update within a few months if anything bad happens with my 60 inch plasma tv.

Reviews.Title: Relatively easy to assemble with the right tools
Reviews.Author: Michelle Coleman
Reviews.Content: We bought this to mount a new 60" LED TV to the wall.  It seems to work well and the TV seems secure.  The directions are a little bit confusing, and I have the following tips:1) The mounting bracket you screw to the wall does not need to be centered, it just needs to be relatively in the right location and screwed into the studs.  The plastic screw anchors that come with it are for concrete wall applications, they are not drywall anchors.  You need to secure this to the wall studs.2) You need a LONG Phillips head screw driver in order to secure the final attachment of the clips that anchor the TV to the mounting track.  The TV will stay up without the bottom being secure, but in order to prevent the TV from falling if it is bumped, you are supposed to secure these screws.  A standard size screw driver will not reach.  Make sure these bottom screws are backed out most of the way before mounting the TV, or the TV will not sit flat against the back of the wall making it difficult to adjust the tilt.3) Have patience with adjusting the tilt.  The tilt is designed to be set once and locked permanently in place via screws only accessible when the TV is not mounted on the wall.  We had to take the TV on and off the wall several times before we had the right angle adjustment.  The left and right mounts of the TV also adjust separately and you had to eye-ball them to ensure they were both at the same angle.Overall, for the price, this mount is great, just make sure you pay attention to the installation instructions reading all the way through, and know that this is NOT the mount for you if you want to adjust the angle of the TV after initial installation.

Reviews.Title: An economy mount that holds up very well
Reviews.Author: James Beswick "Thanks for your time"
Reviews.Content: While the instructions are somewhat lacking, it only takes a few minutes to see that this is essentially two horizontal bars on the wall and two vertical bars on the TV which hook into each other. There's a big collection of screws, washers and other pieces to cover the wide variety of TV fittings, most of which you won't use in the installation.Two things I noticed - it pays to plug in all the cables into the TV prior to placing on the wall. Since many TVs have all their connections on the back, they're impossible to reach once the unit is on the wall. Second, don't forget to tighten the vertical screws under the hooks that secure the TV from being accidentally moved upwards once installed. These are very hard to tighten if you opt for the maximum 15 degree tilt.Overall, this initially seems like a less substantial unit than the $150 ones you see at warehouse stores but its actually very sturdy and well designed. Certainly for the price it's a great bargain and I've not had any issues after installation.

Reviews.Title: Five stars
Reviews.Author: Bayview
Reviews.Content: 1500 plus reviews, so I'm not sure if this will ever get read, but this stand worked as well as you could ask on my 60" plasma. They must have re-written the instructions too because they were perfectly clear to me. The only negative is the level that is supplied is not accurate but I didn't buy this for the level so I won't deduct anything for that.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant Surprise
Reviews.Author: Angelique V.
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few months back to use with my 81 lbs 60" Sharp Aquos LCD TV. I bought it because it was inexpensive (I wasn't about to fork over more than $100 for a wall mount at Walmart) and had great ratings. I was also familiar with the brand since I had purchased a Cheetah wall mount for a 46" Sceptre LCD TV that I have in my bedroom back in 2009. That one I bought for $20 and the quality of the steel was superb. I figured I'd be getting more of the same with this wall mount. Well, when it arrived I was surprised at how flimsy it looked and felt. Not at all like the heavy duty steel of the previous Cheetah mount I had purchased. But I read reviews of people that had used this mount for the same size LCD TV so I figured I'd take a [BIG] chance and go for it. After all, I could always return it if I decided I wasn't convinced it would be able to hold the weight of my television. So I decided to go ahead and mount the TV with this unit. Installation was a breeze. I used the 6" level it came with. The small level that comes attached to the center of the mount itself had broken off, probably during transit - no biggie. Anyway, I installed this back in the first week of February. Today is the 30th of May and my 81 pound LCD TV is still holding up fine on the wall. The free HDMI cable came in very handy too. So for $28 I got an efficient wall mount, a level, and a good quality HDMI cable. Can't beat that! I've included a couple pictures of my setup as reference.

Reviews.Title: Great quality and value but tilt leaves lots to be desired
Reviews.Author: Jeremy N. Carter "jncarter5"
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount and with the included hdmi cable it is an outstanding value.I had issues with the tilt on my 60" plasma that weighs a measly 45 pounds. It just would not hold the angle. I ended up drilling holes and placing an additional screw in it to hold the angle. Not a big deal though. In fact knowing this I just ordered a second for the new 46" tv going in the master bedroom.Update:I have since received and mounted the second tv. They must have realized that there were issues with holding the angle, as the mechanism had been changed. It now seems to hold the angle much better.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Alleyoop52
Reviews.Content: I recently used this mount to hang my 32 inch TV on the wall.  The mount did not line up with the holes in the back of the tv and I had to modify the braces.  If you are able to modify the braces to fit your tv, then this is the way to go, but if not, I would get something else.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: jmb236
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount was pretty inexpensive compared to other items I had seen in stores, and based on the reviews on amazon, I thought it would be worth a try. Once the tv mount arrived, and I had it installed on the wall in about 20 minutes. The only tricky part is finding the studs in the wall. I took the time to pre mark the wall with a stud finder while I was waiting for the package to arrive, so this also helped save a few minutes time.When my new TV was delivered, I put the brackets on the back of the tv and had it installed in less than 10 minutes. The only time I had to even glance at the instructions was to find out what diameter hole I needed to drill in the wall for the main mounting bracket.Overall, for the price, this Cheetah mount was worth every penny and I am very happy with the product.side note: the TV I have mounted on this bracket is a 43" samsung plasma

Reviews.Title: missing parts
Reviews.Author: handyguy
Reviews.Content: Recieved the packaging from them (which was about 25 times too large) and opened it up. I had purchased this for a family member to mount their TV on for Christmas. I opened up the box and found that the mount was there - decent for the price, but no HDMI cable! Bummer, then I had to go purchase a new cable to get the job done.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the price.
Reviews.Author: bluedan1970
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent value for the price.  I used it to mount my 55" Sony 3D LED LCD Tv.  The kit comes with several different screws to fit multiple tv models.  Very sturdy.  Comparable to several mounts you would get at the local electronics store at a third of the cost.  The instructions are very generic, so it does take some basic mechanical skills to install.  Do not rely on the bubble level that is attached to the top rail.  Mine actually came off in the box.  Not a big concern for the price.  Just make sure you have a reliable level before getting started.

Reviews.Title: Good mount for price point
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Just as many people have mentioned, this product is exactly what you need.. you just might not get all the pieces you need. My package was missing 4 lag bolts and the corresponding washers that were needed for mounting to wooden studs. Now, I have come to prefer using hilti toggles to mount items to the dry wall/ply wood that lines my rooms, so this wasn't a huge issue for me. Once I got the bracket mounted to the wall (the hardest part), it was all gravy. I would like to note the fact that, depending on the layout of the inputs for your tv, you may have a difficult time plugging things into the tv once it is mounted. I would suggest plugging everything in, and then hoisting the tv onto the bracket.Also, the "safety" bolts on the bottom of the tv are REALLY hard to access. Basically, they are two long screws that will prevent your tv from accidentally being lifted off the bracket... Kind of pointless unless you're constantly fidgeting with the tv for some odd reason, but I guess you can never be too safe with your tv, right? It was a good thought, but a bit poorly executed.All in all, solid mount. I made sure to pull on the bracket to make sure it would support the tv before mounting, and it didn't budge at all. Also, I didn't receive the leveler and hdmi cable that are pictured in the product image...

Reviews.Title: Above average, especially considering the price
Reviews.Author: Kelub
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving the mount, I at first thought a mistake had been made. The box was too light to be a wall mount! Surely there was something missing. After unboxing, however, I understood why the mount was so light. The manufacturer did a really good job at eliminating unnecessary bulk and material from the product without significantly reducing its effectiveness.The wall plate comes in four parts - two horizontal bars and two vertical strips that connect them. The top horizontal bar comes with a built-in level AND the package includes a level with a handy magnetic strip. There was no way I could mount this thing crooked now! (To be fair, if there was a way, I'd probably find it.) Placing the plate flat against the wall was a bit of a challenge, I suppose due to the fact that it's four separate pieces instead of one solid piece. It's flexible enough, though, to be a non-issue once it's actually mounted to the wall.For my particular installation I was mounting into two studs. The instructions listed that included were 2x 8mm bolts and 2x 6mm bolts - that the 6mm were to be used on the bottom and the 8mm for the top. I couldn't tell the difference between the bolts. They all looked to be the same size. Also, the instructions said to use a 1/8" drill bit to create a starter for the 6mm, and a 3/16" for the 8mm. I found both of those to be too small; on a couple of the bolts, the cordless drill/screwdriver binded up and couldn't get the bolt all the way into the wood (it's an 18v Milwaukee that usually blows through any task I put it to, so the fact that at full torque it was unable to fully secure the bolt was odd.) I ended up going 1-2 sizes larger (I can't remember now what it was exactly, maybe 9/64".) The bolt still fit snug into the hole afterwards, and I had no concerns about the plate's ability to withstand the weight.The brackets installed on the back of the TV just fine, although I had to use the spacers because the screws were a bit too long and tightening the brackets down was impossible without them. (Despite the fact that the instructions say "these are seldom used," this is not the first time I've had to use the spacers due to this problem.)Once the TV was mounted onto the plate, I realized just how flush this mount really gets to the wall. Working behind the TV was quite difficult; my hand/arm barely fit, and with some discomfort. I would recommend having as much plugged in as you can prior to placing the TV onto the wall. I have a similar (but more expensive) mount in the another room of the house, and while it sits a little ways further from the wall, it's easier to tilt and get hands behind if/when necessary.Speaking of tilt, the tilt mechanism was awkward to me. The brackets are loose out of the box, and placing the TV causes the weight of it to tilt slightly forward; however the degree of tilt seemed so minor that it was hard to tell if it really was tilting. I used a level to confirm that there was a moderate tilt, but again comparing to a more expensive mount, it's not as apparent. I attributed it to the fact that it was already so close to the wall.As a side note, I thought it was odd that the mount came with an HDMI cable, but the cable is of good quality and quite long. I was actually going to need another HDMI cable anyway, and so the inclusion of one was very welcome (especially considering that a cable of this quality and length is typically about the same price as the entire mount it came with.)All in all, I recommend this mount for basic TV mounting. If you want excessive tilt (i.e. mounting over a mantle) or need to angle the TV left or right, then it won't work for you. But I think the mount's best pro is also its biggest con. It mounts so flush to the wall that it's difficult to work behind, but at the same time it looks really great - almost as though the TV was mounted directly to the wall. The tilt is enough for mounting 60-66" from the floor, then comfortably viewing from a sitting position.SUMMARY - RecommendedPros:- Lightweight, makes price reasonable and installation easy- Includes a magnetic level AND a built-in level on the wall plate- Extremely flush to the wall, looks very clean- Included HDMI cable is long, great for running inside a wallCons:- Instructions were a bit unclear- So flush to the wall, it's difficult to work behind- Tilt is minimal and awkward to manage

Reviews.Title: Great product, terrific value!
Reviews.Author: GeoStork
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews but thought I would contribute regarding this product due to some of the conflicting reviews present here.  First, I could not be more satisfied with this product.  Mount hardware is sturdy, not flimsy as mentioned in other reviews.  That said, this is the first wall mount I've purchased so I don't have any idea what the difference would be if I would have spent 2X - 3X more on a mount.  ALL necessary mounting hardware is included so you won't be without an option for your situation.  I would buy this product again without question.Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Strong mount - easy to follow instructions
Reviews.Author: Stephen G.
Reviews.Content: Strong, easy to mount on wall using instructionsYou will need a stud finderThe only things we didn't prepare for was making sure the cables fit behind the TV up against the wall... we lucked out, but just barely.

Reviews.Title: Tremendous Value
Reviews.Author: M "M"
Reviews.Content: The hardest part of installing this TV brace was finding the studs behind the drywall.  For me, the instructions were well put together and the our TV was mounted in less than 1/2 hour.  For a Sony XBR 46" LCD, the mounting braces were perfect.The overall design is very stable and I would not hesitate to buy another.  Very good value!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Serena
Reviews.Content: this walmout was 100 dollars cheaper on here. i couldn't believe my eyes. i looked all over town 4 or 5 different stores and all of them wanted 100 bucks more. this mount was the top rated, most reviewed item i couldn't believe it was so cheap. couldn't wait to get it in the mail. it works so well and is so sturdy. i think its here to stay. thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Danb
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and contains everything you need to for any installation type, including a level, except a drill. We actually installed it without a drill.

Reviews.Title: ...solid mount...
Reviews.Author: leslie campbell-driesner
Reviews.Content: ...mounted easily with a 32" Sony...I don't like the texture of the metal but it went up easy and I have no fear of it failing...the bottom bolts on the TV part of the setup need larger washers...they almost slip through the oval slits...I used some washers I had in my garage instead of the teeny ones included...

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: JayV
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these mounts and was very pleased with the easy installation and inexpensive price.Not only do you get a good mount but they throw in 6ft. of quality hdmi cable. Can't find a better dealanywhere.

Reviews.Title: Ladder
Reviews.Author: DKCafe "DKC"
Reviews.Content: This Cheetah Mount holds like a firm ladder. It makes for easy 'climb'. And the bonus Level is a nice plus.By the way, the price is surely right. A real good buy.

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This mount does the same thing as some that cost a lot more. Installation was easy, the hardest part is deciding how high you want your tv. One note that I will make is DO NOT trust either level that came with it. The one that's built into the unit was off, and the magnetic one that came with it was off too. Just use your own level, it will save you a lot of time and hassle. Quality is durable, however, I'm not sure I would hang an older 55" plasma from it. But any newer LCD/LED/Plasma TV will hang with ease. With easy installation,tilting,good quality and a low price, you can't go wrong with this Cheetah mount.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan K
Reviews.Content: This wall mount is a great product for a great deal. Much to my surprise it also came with a HDMI cable. Installation was a breeze. All in all I'm very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Practical for the price. Although minor flaws
Reviews.Author: sloshkong
Reviews.Content: Once you find a stud, your gold with the base mount. My only complaint is that the bolts that came with weren't the right length when it came to mounting the TV on the tilt bars. The bolts were to long allowing to much play in between the TV and the tilt bars. They also give you spacers, but the spacers are too big for the bolts that fitted in my 32' Insignia HDTV. It required me to do a little modifications but all in all its worth it for the price. I will give it 4 stars subtract one star for the bolt lengths.

Reviews.Title: Great Product BUT Do Not Use the Lag Bolts!
Reviews.Author: Rcktsled
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product and an incredible bargain BUT if you are going to mount it to wall studs do not use the provided lag bolts. I drilled the proper size pilot hole but the head of the first lag bolt I used twisted off the shank before it was tight. Not good! Run down to Lowe's or Home Depot and get some (hopefully) American made hardware instead. Otherwise, fine product, easy to figure out in spite of weak instructions, and a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what you need.
Reviews.Author: T Cunningham "T Cunningham"
Reviews.Content: If you have a tv that you want mounted onto the wall, this mount is by far easy to install, and worth every penny.  The level on the unit itself was broken, but they company included a seperate on in the box, so installation was a breeze.  But then again, I am a Jane of all trades.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Monica Clayton
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 55 in Plasma and my 42 in Plasma.  It worked great for both.  I would say this is definitely a great value, can't beat the price.  The only thing was that the directions wanted you to attach to 2 studs and the holes do not line up to make this possible.  So in both cases, I had to use only 1 stud.  It seems to be fine and is really sturdy.  Pretty easy to install and straight forward.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: CJ King
Reviews.Content: The only negative that i can find so far: for my installation I only had a stud in the middle of the wall where I wanted the TV mounted. The little level on the top crossmember came off during shipment so I drilled a hole there and used the lag bolts top and bottom. Then I had additional toggle bolts and put two on either side, upper and lower. It is quite secure, looks good and the price and shipping you can't beat.

Reviews.Title: Simply works
Reviews.Author: Eric Schoutens
Reviews.Content: I needed a quick and inexpensive mount for a 42" LG flat panel.  This was easy to assemble and install.  The adjustment mechanism is mediocre and I would recommend this to those that plan to "set it and forget it" for the tilt angle.  I knocked off a star due to the included level being broken, not that I would have trusted it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, instructions could be better
Reviews.Author: D. Gerrity
Reviews.Content: Overall this product is an excellent value. The included hardware is versatile, with all the mounting hardware you need for a sheet rock wall, whether you have studs to mount to or not.PROS:1. Good value. This is a very functional mount at a very reasonable price.2. 25-degree tilt. This is a nice feature when your TV is mounted high on the wall. It allows you to angle the TV down towards the viewers.3. Lots of mounting hardware is included. There should be sufficient hardware to mount most TVs on most walls.CONS:1. The instructions are written assuming you have studs to mount to. If your desired location is between studs, the instructions leave you hanging, so to speak. They are also incomplete regarding the assembly and spacing of the top and bottom brackets. Finally, they give measurements for drill bit sizes in metric, although there is one reference to SAE.2. CONNECT YOUR CABLES FIRST, before mounting your TV. The vertical brackets are not very deep. The result is that, once your TV is hung on the mount, there is little room reach behind and get cables connected.3. The TV mounting screws were too long for my Sony TV. They would not screw all the way in. Although the kit included spacers, they were for the largest screws -- not for the screws I needed for the Sony. I ended up sawing the bushings in half using a band saw. This isn't Cheetah's fault, but rather an example of the lack of true standardization among TV manufacturers.If you are even somewhat mechanically inclined the instructions aren't much of a hindrance. The product itself seems well made and again, a great value.

Reviews.Title: good mount but smelly......
Reviews.Author: M. D. Cagna
Reviews.Content: This mount works as expected and is simple to assemble and mount to the wall.One thing I noticed, the stanch that came out once I opened the box. This is not the first time I smell a nasty chemical/rotten smell when unpacking a product from China. Hopefully it is nothing harmful.

Reviews.Title: Good Alternative to Expensive Mounts
Reviews.Author: dec7td
Reviews.Content: This mount isn't fancy but it gets the job done.  The brackets that attach to the TV are very sturdy.  The mount for the wall feels weak at first but once you run the lug nuts into some studs, it's not going anywhere.  Once it's up though, it's very hard to adjust; not that I really need to.  The instructions are a bit strange from what I remember but it doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure out how it works.  This bracket is one of many reasons I shop on Amazon, to stop from getting ripped off by brick-and-mortar stores

Reviews.Title: Right for the job
Reviews.Author: bballer "E"
Reviews.Content: this mount does it's job. Easy to put together lightweight and sturdy. I have a 55" led TV and it holds it up with problem. comes with lots of screws and anchors depending on your situation with or without finding the studs in your wall.Hard to screw in the bottom screws to the mount once you put the TV up though.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: C. Tanner
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this mount is its price.  Most mounts at the store are $59 - $79.  For $19 this mount works perfectly for my 37 inch Vizio flatscreen TV.

Reviews.Title: best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: amazonholic
Reviews.Content: Pros:solid steel constructionone of the least expensive mounts availableEasy mounting processincluded leveler actually workshas all necessary screwsCons:not the slimmest mount (but still looks good mounted)extremely difficult to change tilt angle once mountedthe last step to secure the tv can be somewhat challenging if you don't have a really long screwdriver.conclusion:awesome value and works well.  would bu again

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin Shaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this product after seeing how expensive items at best buy were.  For $20 this thing is well worth the money.  It comes with a level built into the mount.  It seem's very sturdy and holds my 42' LCD with no problems.  The instuctions were also easy to follow.  The only downside is I felt it was hard to get the "tilt" to be even.  Im not sure if the construction is different than other wall mounts, but you had to manually adjust each of the 4 hooks.  We encountered difficulty making sure they were all at the right angle.  Took about 5 exta minutes with a ruler..so this was not a big issue.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: TommiWan
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this mount for my 47 inch LCD.  For the most part I am very happy.  It wasn't too difficult to install.  I did have to go to the hardware store for some longer screws, but I suppose they can't include the parts for every tv on the market.  Additionally one of the tighteners which holds the tilt angle in place arrived with the threading stripped so I was only able to tighten down the tilt angle on one side.  Still it is holding my tv in place, and gets the job done much cheaper than most other mounts.  The last thing I would mention is that there are two screws which hold the tv on to the wall mount.  Those can be difficult to get to if you wish to unscrew them and take the tv down off the wall, or adjust it further.Overall, I'm happy with the mounts, and I would buy it again.  The problems that I had with the mount do not really affect the day to day operation of it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I got the bracket and wall mounted by 42'LCD immediately. I have never wall mounted a tv before, but it was pretty easy just following the directions as long as you have your own tools. It's been over a month and the bracket holds fine.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Akash Vadhavana
Reviews.Content: When I saw this on amazon, I was little skeptical because of the price. Because everywhere I saw any wall mounts like Best Buy or any brick and mortar stores, all the wall mounts were around 80 to 100 dollars. So, when I saw the price this low, I thought that the quality would be ok. But, it has been great. Thank you for saving me a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: very well pleased
Reviews.Author: BAMAZAPP
Reviews.Content: wow is all i can say.i ordered it one day and it was on my doorstep the NEXT day.it was easy to put together and the function of it was great also but most of all the price,wal-mart was the next cheapest but by $80.00 so you can see why i choose this one,plus all of the reviews helped also.so yes i AM VERY WELL PLEASED.

Reviews.Title: Easy easy easy!! Great product at an even better price!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hughes
Reviews.Content: What a bargain compared to the overpriced mounts at Best Buy or Walmart. The quality of the Cheetah mounts is just the same, but at a fraction of the price. The mount arrived in 3-4 days and was a breeze to install. Instructions are straight forward. For a change, we followed the instructions, found all the parts in the package as specified, and did not need to fill in the blanks during installation (unlike IKEA which leaves several steps in the middle to your imagination). This has been holding up well and looks solid. This mount does not swivel sideways, but we deliberately bought this because it doesn't. Very happy with this item and its value. Don't waste your money at local stores, buy this!!

Reviews.Title: Second great product from Cheetah!!
Reviews.Author: J. shopper
Reviews.Content: Why anyone would pay over $100 in a store for a mount is beyond me. I guess people believe that you have to pay for reliability. But nothing could be further from the truth.This is the second Cheetah mount that I have installed. The first was for a lighter Vizio 32 inch LCD. No problems with that mount so I decided to try Cheetah again for an 81 lbs. 42 inch Samsung plasma.I wasn't sure about the design of this model considering you have to assemble it. The first mount, like most, was made like a flat plate that could distribute the weight of a TV to all four bolts screwed into the wall studs. Although it looks like this model could not do the same, when assembled, the vertical bars are more than capable of spreading the weight to the bottom horizontal bar. Also, the unit is considerably sturdy after assembly.I noticed that there were complaints about missing pieces and the built-in bubble level. I purchased my own lag screws to bolt it onto the wall and I would never trust a built-in level (since the one that was built-in came cracked open, I didn't have to worry about it anyway).A major advantage to the design of this mount is the open back. I was able to install an outlet box between the top and bottom bars. All of my connections (power, two cable lines, and two telephone lines) come in directly behind the TV. With the addition of a cable management track, this looks like an almost professional install. I have not seen mounts that give you the ability to install an outlet box in this fashion.The looks can be very deceiving with this mount. Rest assured, this mount is more than capable.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Dennis T "Dennis"
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive mount suitable for light applications only. I recommend that you not trust the built in bubble level but provide a quality level of your own.  This bubble also prevents movement of the TV once mounted.  Everything is a light weight steel stamping with a black powder coat finish.  The boat level shown as part of this kit is NOT included.Assemble the 4 backing plate components into a single unit and mount using your own level.  Lag bolts are provided that will work with 2x4 wood or metal studs, pre-drill your holes.Mount the 2 hooking mechanisms to the back of the television. It is critical that you make sure that these are mounted in the same location - top or bottom of the screw hole.  The holes are bigger than the screws and will result in the television not being level otherwise.Hang, adjust the tilt where you want it to be and tighten the locking screws.  If you tighten the locking screws first you will not be able to get the tilt angle desired.Pros:  Inexpensive and does the job - Priced rightCons:  Lightweight - If you have bought other units such as the Sanus you will know the difference.  Oversized holes allow for alot of wiggle room and may require several adjustments to make right.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: G. Gonzalez "El bone"
Reviews.Content: Item was a very good item for the price. All parts were their and it was very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Solid Mount at an excellent price
Reviews.Author: Abussoos "SLS"
Reviews.Content: Sturdy mount with heavy metal construction. Nothing fancy, but I mounted my 42" Plasma with relative ease and it seems holding up fine. I am not sure the 2 levels provided are useful, but I used my own anyway...Would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product backed by a GREAT Company
Reviews.Author: Bernard Quisumbing
Reviews.Content: My Television is up in a tight over the fireplace cove, and it looks awesome! The item arrived promptly, and before estimated arrival time, which is always a good thing.For anyone wanting to put up an LCD TV (mine's a 32") but wants a product that IS NOT going to be too expensive, then this mount definitely offers you all the value for just a little bit of your money.I am confident that the Cheetah Mounts' structural integrity will keep my TV safe and secure...Thank You to Cheetah Mounts, their customer service ranks at the top, and if you ever have any concerns or questions regarding their products, they are SOOOOO QUICK to help!BUY ONE... don't waste your money on the overpriced mounts that do the same exact thing the cheetah mount does!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount for LN40A550
Reviews.Author: Stephen Sproull
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wall mount for my LN40A550.  Unfortunately, the hardware was not in the box so I had to wait through the weekend got the hardware the middle of the following week.  The hardware fit my TV well and once I drilled some holes in the wall studs, I hung the mount and set the TV on it.  Other than that slight setback, I am very pleased with the build quality of the mount.  It can handle my 50lb TV easily.  I would definitely recommend to someone else.  It sure beats spending $150-200 on a mount.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery and easy set up.
Reviews.Author: Trent C. Tomlinson "Fiuker[23]"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item and received it within a matter of days. The secondary bubble level I received was not magnetic and the leveler that was supposed to be built into the mount had fallen off. Other than this the item was more than adequate for my needs. They also included an array of attachment screws for different types of televisions. Using a drill and socket wrench I was able to hang the wall mount in under 10 minutes. I do suggest using your own leveler since the ones included are not accurate. Over all when looking at the price of other wall mounts on the market, this is an extremely good deal and a trustworthy product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount for a great price!
Reviews.Author: gburgalum01
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this mount?  The frame for the wall is easy to assemble, and the whole mount itself has some sort of powder coating on it rather than just a thin layer of paint for added durability.  The mount was easy to install on the wall once the studs are located.  Buy yourself a good stud finder - if one exists - before attempting installation.As other reviewers have noted, the level included with this product is unreliable at best.  Do not use the provided level to ensure that the mount is aligned correctly on the wall.  Had this mount been installed on my wall using the included level, the TV would have been aligned extremely crooked!This mount is eighty dollars cheaper than other mounts you find at retail stores.  Don't pass this one up!

Reviews.Title: WELL WORTH THE PRICE!!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Meier "JNIZZLE"
Reviews.Content: I used this mount for my tv in our game room.  It is a 42" Samsung plasma that i purchased 2 1/2 yrs ago.  I was a little worried with the reviews that i had read about the quality and if all the parts would come.  Well it arrived a day earlier then predicted with all the parts, including a free crappy level, lol, seriously dont use the level it's way off as it the one on the mount itself.  I used a 6 dollar level from lowes and it worked fine.  The actual package came with extra screws in case your tv doesnt have any to secure the tv to the mount.  The hardest part about the whole process was finding the studs to mount it on, once they were located the mount went up in about 30 minutes.  My wife and I were the only people involved in the whole process and this product is well worth the money.  Best Buy was the cheapest we had found for tv mounting and with a $150.00 mount which is the same quality as the cheetah, $150.00 to mount it and $50.00 to hide the wires, we saved about $320.00 total so do the math, its worth it!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount!
Reviews.Author: B. Acosta
Reviews.Content: Great mount.  Included harware package is more than enough to make any TV work.  The supplied spacers though were a little to large for my TV, but no problem because my TV came with it's own spacers.Why pay more?  You get a qualtiy product at a great price. Mine was $36 with shipping. Which is way less than what you would expect to pay in a box store.  After I installed a new electrical outlet I had the TV mounted in about a half an hour.We ordered a second one for our bedroom after we saw how well this one performed.  I would recomend it to anyone for sure.  Don't trust the built in level though, because it will be off.

Reviews.Title: If you want to avoid a headache, stay away.
Reviews.Author: Wendy777
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst mount I could have ordered. I should have packed it all back up when it arrived missing a screw from the wall plate side bracket. I have no problem following directions and completing home improvement projects. Simply looking at the pictures on the item on Amazon's website contradicts installation. The screws on the arm brackets are shown to have heads facing out on the directions and most of the pictures on the Amazon site, YET on the main picture they are pointing in? No matter how much you loosen the screw the tilt would not move correctly. The only way I could insert the locking pin was to put it back flat, which defeats the purpose of buying a TILTING WALL MOUNT. Plus there is NO WAY to tighten the locking screws to hold it to the wall plate once it's mounted. I don't think my 3 year old's hand could fit back there.

Reviews.Title: So Bad.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
