Reviews.Content: This is, my worst purchase ever. Even worse than the time I bought my blind uncle a pair of glasses. Or the time I insured my hair, just to realize it didn't cover fire damage. The point is, three hours later this is installed. With the use of 4 washers of my own, because their "star" washers were as flimsy as a soda can, and the wrong size. The bolts, too short to include the spacers. I am using it on a 32" television, and wouldn't recommend it for mounting a toaster oven. Do not buy this for anything bigger than your kitchen utensils.

Reviews.Title: It works, but you have to work at it!
Reviews.Author: Chris Fouts "Chris F"
Reviews.Content: I remodeled my old house, I fix my cars, and I tune my bicycles - yes I AM mechanically inclined!This product was a bitch to level because it came in 8 parts that needed to be assembled to make the rectangular frame. Once assembled, the parts that make up the long sides (top and bottom) were NOT perfectly aligned with each other so instead of forming a perfect rectangle, they formed a bow-tie. Hence, the level that came with it was useless to level it because if you level the left half, then the right half will not be level, and vias-versa. So I used a longer level that spanned the three pieces (3 for top and 3 for bottom) to level it. When I was satisfied it was level, I permanently affixed it onto the wall, and rechecked the level - perfect.Now I hang the TV on it, but the TV was NOT level because the actual location where the TV hangers hanged on the frame were NOT level, again because the frame came it parts which were NOT level with each other when assembled.Spend $$ and get a one-piece mount. I do NOT recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy design. Backplate comes in two pieces
Reviews.Author: Vigor
Reviews.Content: This backplate for this mount comes in two pieces, which is sketchy to begin with. Every step of the way I was weary about how this would hold my tv, until I got to the step where I had to screw the hook parts into the back of my tv and the screws didn't fit. Bummer and a big waste of time. This is cheap in price and cheap in quality.

Reviews.Title: very cheap design. garbage
Reviews.Author: DEN
Reviews.Content: no space from wall to tv.bottom to adjustment screws dont even reach waste of money do not buy....waste of money

Reviews.Title: Perfectly satisfied with product
Reviews.Author: Tom T
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for a 51" plasma tv, and I'm perfectly satisfied with the product, especially considering it does the job and costs only 1/2 of what other retailers charge for essentially the same design. Plus, a good quality HDMI cable is included, along with an assortment of screws, bolts & washers for just about any situation. Both a small and a large level are included. Although some buyers report different experiences, the levels in my kit differed by only a fraction of a degree from my 4-foot-long pro level, so I didn't even bother using my 4-footer for this job.The instructions for assembly are both written and drawn, and both could use some work. Personally, I think the written instructions could be done away with, and just good, large, easy to understand drawings would be perfect for DIY rookies. As other reviewers have mentioned, the written instructions could be better and the drawings are so tiny, they're not much help.There are only 8 main parts to this bracket: the two biggest pieces are the two arms that attach to the tv as well as mount on the wall bracket. The remaining 6 pieces are what you screw together to form the bracket that is attached to the wall.I ended up tossing the instructions. I just started by attaching the two arms to the tv, then took the remaining 6 pieces, laid them on the floor, and it was obvious how they fit together to form the wall bracket.All the screws needed for assembly and attaching the arms to the tv and attaching the bracket to the wall are included. The various screws, washers, etc. provided are different diameters, so if fits, it's correct.For mounting the bracket on the wall, I first measured to get the correct height, drilled one hole in a wall stud, and attached the wall bracket with just that one screw holding it in place. Then, I checked to make sure all was level, and that the holes in the bracket lined up with the center of the next stud. They did, so I then drilled the second hole. And so on. Anyway, this technique is based on past experience with other projects. Don't drill all the holes in the wall at the same time, because if one or two are off due to a wrong measurement, you've got a problem that can only be solved by drilling more holes.Depending on where the connections are on your tv for the various cables and the power cord, you might need to get them all hooked up before mounting your tv on the wall. If all your connections are on the side or bottom of the tv, then no problem. If they're in the back, especially in the back towards the bottom, it's real tight back there with this bracket after your tv is hanging on the wall, making inserting any plug almost impossible.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount sux
Reviews.Author: James M. Venus
Reviews.Content: The mount was super cheap and of no use to me.  I don't know how it got so many good reviews.  Lots of dishonest folks out there I guess.  I sent it back and am going with a LEVEL MOUNT brand.  Oh yeah I didn't get the braded HDMI cable either.  It would have been a POS too.  I am an engineer and what I'm telling you is correct.  Don't buy this brand.  I'm not kidding it was in a box the size of 2 keyboards end to end and was very light.  There was nothing to this thing.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Control and Below Average Masonry Hardware
Reviews.Author: Steve Wooden
Reviews.Content: Overall it seemed like all required hardware was included, including all mounting hardware/screws/washers.  The included HDMI cable and level were a nice touch.Tried calling Cheetah for assistance - website says M-F 9-5 PT, phone system says M-F 9-5 ET, so I was slightly annoyed at the discrepancy because I ended up calling after they closed.Two major issues made me decide to return this mount.  One, since the backplate that mounts to the wall comes in four pieces (two vertical brackets with screws to attach to the two horizontal pieces), you have to "assemble" the the backplate using screws that are on each vertical bracket.  Poor quality control had the pre-dilled holes on the horizontal pieces too large on the unit I received, so I could not attach the vertical brackets using the provided screws.  Two, since I was mounting on a stone fireplace (and the stone is not 100% even so the mount cannot sit 100% flush against the stone), I was not impressed with the quality of the masonry fasteners - plastic anchors with screws that seemed too short.Ended up returning and buying a different mount (Interion I92-40937) for $20 more, which was noticeably heavier overall, included a single piece backplate, and had more substantial masonry attachment hardware which included a metal 1/2" masonry anchor and 2.5" long bolts that had to be tightened using a socket wrench.Amazon prime shipping and returns process was excellent as usual.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't quite do it...
Reviews.Author: D Martin
Reviews.Content: Very simple and bare bones design, functional to a point....tried but could not get the tilt angle to hold on a new 46 inch plasma. Returning it today.

Reviews.Title: Setup perfectly while drunk, w/out correct tools
Reviews.Author: William B. Cole "Will"
Reviews.Content: I mounted my 42" Element TV on this thing and I'm 100% satisfied.What you need:* Drill* Small wrench / pliersWhat you probably would find useful:* Stud Finder (I like this oneWhat you should never start any project without:* BeerThe instructions were super clear; I don't know what everyone was complaining about. I pre-drilled my holes with small screws and then used a small wrench turn the screws which hold the mount on the wall. The whole thing took me about 30 minutes, start to finish, because I was drinking and watching a TV show.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money if you've got just a little patience (No G'nR)
Reviews.Author: jeremywise1313
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount after reading a lot of the reviews, and the majority of whats been said is pretty much the truth; The mount itself was very inexpensive for me, I believe less than $28 shipped. At that price, its hard to say no, not even considering amazon's painless return policy had it been a piece of crap.As most have pointed out, the instructions are mediocre, at best. Luckily, it wasnt too difficult to go through with after some guidance via other reviews. Pretty simple and straightforward; construct the mounting plate, put it on the wall. attach the arms to your tv, and have at it.If you plan to use the full tilt however, as I did, tightening the screws at the bottom (which basically secure the mount even further for the event of an earthquake and such) is about impossible. The best result I had was to tighten the bottom screws FIRST, loosen the tilt bars, and then slowly loosen the bottom screws a little at a time. As you do, the tv will naturally tilt down, but because you pre-tightened the bottom screws, they will still "bite in" as you loosen them. Using this method I was able to finally get the tilt I wanted with having the bottom screws safely tightened. Doing it any other way (such as tilting, then attempting to tighten the bottom screws) proved to be impossible.I had a TON of loose extra material after I was finished, which was terrifying at first, but it happens to everybody. They just happen to pack material for any given scenario, which is nice.Bottom line, if you can deal with lackluster instructions (you know you can), this affordable, sturdy mount is a steal. Plus, it's guaranteed to not sleep with your wife. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: Makes my LED look great
Reviews.Author: phamxp426
Reviews.Content: I purchased this mount with the intention of hanging up my Sony KDL-HX800. The package was very clean and easy to open and installing it was a breeze. One warning I do have is that if you have any inputs in the back of the tv, then you should plug them in before mounting the tv to the wall since the mount sits very close to the tv. One tip I do have to install cables after mounting the tv is use a mirror and placing it on the wall behind the tv. This will reflect what you are doing on the back of the tv and will save you much time and hassle.

Reviews.Title: Works great, terrible directions
Reviews.Author: Timothy Qualheim
Reviews.Content: It works great now that it's together. Was amazingly hard to figure it out from the directions though. Tells you to drill four holes into studs, doesn't say how far apart or how deep. The picture then shows you drilling through the metal to put it up. Which is terrible idea. It works now that it's up... but it took all day.

Reviews.Title: Maybe cheap, but this is a solid mount
Reviews.Author: Tony A
Reviews.Content: Don't let the price fool you, this is a solid mount.  I used this to support a Samsung 46 inch LCD (LN46C670---nice TV).  Not a problem.  Installation was easy.  Make sure you have a stud finder to make life easier.  The mount requires the side rails to be secured to the vertical rails before attaching it to the wall.  Not an issue, the directions shows this easily.  Next, attach the vertical rails to the TV. The rails has a hook which attach to the wall mount.  Measure the hook to the top of the TV, so you can determine how high on the wall to place the wall mount.  The vertical rails can slide up and down the TV a few inches so you can re-adjust if the height is not right.  Next, one needs  to decide how to attach it to the wall.  I have drywall with studs 16" on center.  Use a stud finder and mark the center of the studs.  Attach to the wall using the oval slots on the horizontal rails.  The instructions state using the 4 holes but that is for a concrete wall.  No problem, align the mount, use the supplied level and mark where you want to pre-drill the holes as stated in the instructions.  Screw it to the wall and then you are ready to mount the TV. There are two locking screws on the bottom to keep it from jumping the track. Very solid!  There is about a 2 inch gap from TV to wall to move and hide cables behind.  Looks great!  There is a tilt feature, but we have it flat against the wall.

Reviews.Title: Good value, but not level
Reviews.Author: Nick Lozano
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for. The mount is sturdy and priced economically, but after diligent measuring, drilling and using a level.. the finished product (flatpanel tv on the wall) is not quite level. It is disappointing, but if you want perfection, you may need to spend more. It's not off by much, but I pride myself on being a perfectionist, but the installation is a few degrees crooked. Not my fault, it was the quality of construction of the wall mount.

Reviews.Title: As expected and more!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount worked perfectly.  It was easy to install.  Best of all, there is a built-in level on the top bar to make sure you install the mount perfectly straight and level!  Will recommend to all of my friends.

Reviews.Title: sweet savings
Reviews.Author: Hokiebird
Reviews.Content: Saved a lot of money over other wall mount models.  I hung a 47 inch tv and then bought another mount for a 32 inch tv.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: D. Oladosu
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time s promised. Installation was a breeze and hold my 52' Sony TV really well. No issues, will recommend

Reviews.Title: Cheeta Mount
Reviews.Author: C. Vang
Reviews.Content: For the price it doesn't get any better. Construction quality is not comparable to the best mounts available (hence the price). However for the amount you pay, it is an excellent product. I used it to mount a 46in samsung (LN46A650) and everything works wonderfully. The mout kit also comes with the most common hardware which is nice. The only issue I had was that the four mounting bolts for the TV was a little long.  This was easily solved by purchasing 12 washers from my local hardware store for .97 cents.  Overall great product that gets the job done without denting your pocket book. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great mount.  No need to pay more.
Reviews.Author: PDW
Reviews.Content: Excellent mount for the price.  I can't see any benefit in paying 4 times this price (or more) for a wall mount.  The mount is very sturdy and holds my TV securely.  Contrary to another review, the instructions were easy to follow.  It also comes with an assortment of standard sized screws, including the right size for my 32" Samsung. One note of caution - DO NOT DEPEND ON THE BUILT-IN LEVEL!  I used the built-in level and mounted the TV only to find the right side was noticeably higher than the left.  I double checked it with a level from my toolbox and sure enough, the built-in level was significantly off.

Reviews.Title: Yes, I Would Buy Another
Reviews.Author: SilverDollar
Reviews.Content: Pros:1) Very good price compared to other mounts I found2) Sturdy mount with a quality finish3) Relatively easy to assemble and attach to sheetrock wall4) Lots of mounting hardware provided including screws and spacers for TV attachment to mount5) Includes both a small 6" level and a tiny bubble level built into the top member of the mountCons:(This is the first mount I have purchased and at times I am a nit-picking perfectionist -- take these comments in that context)1) I sent two different email questions to the company - only one was answered and it was not on target to my question.  A follow-up email has not been answered. All my emails were courteous.2) Of the four mounting holes on each of the top and bottom members, no two holes were spaced at either 16" or 24" which is what would be needed to nicely match standard wall stud spacing in the US. I ended up using the larger slots in the frame rather than drilling more holes.3) The top member of the mount was slightly warped.  Not enough to return it, but enough to mildly complicate the leveling process4) The built-in bubble level is a nice idea, but it didn't match the reading of the included 6" level nor the carpenter's level I finally used.  Perhaps the slight warp mentioned before was the cause of the mismatch.Bottom Line: I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value...but one little problem...
Reviews.Author: knuckols
Reviews.Content: This product is a great value - especially since it comes with an HDMI cable!  Everything about it is great except for one thing...  We have a 50" Samsung LED TV and the cable to power it fits into the back of it exactly where the bottom bar on the mount is.  There is a part on the bottom bar that juts out and that's exactly where the plug goes, which also sticks out about an inch from the back of the TV.  It cannot be hung like that.  And the holes on the mount we had to screw into meant we had no leeway to adjust it up or down.  Luckily, my husband had the right tools and was able to cut out a section of the mount (just the part that sticks out - so the mount is still in tact) to fit the plug.  I can imagine if you did not have the right tool/weren't especially handy, this could really be a problem.  Maybe this is only an issue on a 50" Samsung, but something to be aware of....

Reviews.Title: Great TV Stand
Reviews.Author: HoosierBDS
Reviews.Content: This stand is definitely worth the price (so cheap!) I was able to install the stand in about 10 minutes, and it is really not too complicated after a little bit of reading. I have a 32" Vizio, and it looks so much better on my wall than on my TV stand. This mount really does feel solid, the TV is as secure as can be, and it hides nicely behind the screen. It was easy to plug in my HDMI cord after installation, and I really enjoy watching TV more than before with my new mount.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount Flush/Tilt TV Bracket followup review
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Bohn "Mike B."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bracket to mount a Samsung 60" TV over a brick fireplace.  The bracket was relatively easy to mount to the wall and the bracket hangers mounted easily to the back of the TV with the included hardware.  The problem I had was with the hanger  brackets.  After hanging the TV in  the top bracket channel,  I thought the worst was over, but not so.  At the bottom of each of the hanger brackets there is a set screw that must be tightened locking the bottom of the hanger bracket to the bottom channel of the wall bracket (this stablizes the TV on the bracket to allow it to tilt without the bottom of the TV swinging away from the wall).  After the TV is mounted to the wall there is absolutely no way to get a philips head screw driver behind the TV to tighten these set screws.  Because of the close clearance behind the TV (1.3 inches) there is no way to access these screws.  The TV probably will not come crashing down, but I did not tighten those set screws and care must be taken when using the tilt feature.  Also be sure to make cable attachments to the back of the TV before hanging on the wall-there's no clearance to make connections if you don't.  This bracket may work better on smaller TV's...A few days after this review I received a call from Cheetah Mounts.  They seemed concerned about the difficulty I had as stated above with their product and assured me that their design team is in the process of reviewing and redesigning the above mentioned set screw configuration on the bracket.  I would give Cheetah Mounts a 5 star rating for customer service but am upgrading from the 3 stars to four stars for the overall rating.

Reviews.Title: A faulty design
Reviews.Author: Dr. Rob
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of reviews here, so I'll be brief. This is a good width mounting plate at 17.5" for smaller TV's as it doesn't extend past the right/left edge of the mounted TV. I'll grant them that.However, think about this. Unless your studs are EXACTLY where you need them, this will NOT span two studs. Because the stud in MY wall is exactly in the center of where the TV mounts, there is not 16" on either side to screw into another stud on the right of left (the mount, once on that stud, had 7" extending right and left, or 9" short of the next stud to either side). With a TV that weighs about 40 lbs, two screws into one stud is more than sufficient, however. But keeping it straight since there are only two screws, well, that took a bit of ingenuity that I won't go into here. But it was tough, I'll let you know.The big catch? The tilt adjustment doesn't suit anybody. You simply can NOT access those two tiny screws that secure the tilt aspect unless you have pencil thin arms, or a 3 FOOT (yes, 3 FOOT) long screwdriver. My suggestion? Adjust the tilt BEFORE mounting, because once it's on the wall, you'll never touch those adjusting screws again. You'll SEE them teasing you, saying "Come on, just TRY to adjust me you little bugger!!!", but you won't actually be able to ACCESS them without massive wall damage.Finally, when it slides down over the top bracket, to use screws to secure the bottom of the mount to prevent unwanted lift off is cumbersome. Good luck tightening them without leaving massive scratches on the wall beneath the TV (I'll be painting my wall tomorrow). It's so close to the wall, you simply cannot tighten them without the screwdriver handle marring the wall. They ought to use spring loaded releases to secure to the lower rail like the big boy brands do.So, if you're on a REALLY tight budget, this is a fairly good deal. But if you 1) want to adjust the tilt once it's mounted; 2) remove and reinstall; 3) or secure it to the wall without scratching the paint; I'd suggest you look at a different brand.I've installed about 100 sets (I am a home renovator), and this mount, by far, is the least user friendly. It gets the job done, but you certainly pay the price in time/effort/wall damage. Take heed, because this is NOT a sampling defect. This is merely how it's designed, and you cannot get around design flaws.I gave it two stars because it has the narrowest wall plate at 17.5" out there, and was the only one I could find that was narrow enough not to extend past the edges of my 28" plasma TV (it's an older model from when they first came out, as you can tell by the small size).Good luck!CoachRobMD

Reviews.Title: Okay if you have a smaller TV
Reviews.Author: D. Skye
Reviews.Content: I don't recommend this mount if your TV is 65inch or larger (I've used it with a 65 and 70 inch Vizio). It worked okay when I used it to to hang my old 42inch plasma for testing (it was able to fully tilt).It's just okay if used without the tilt, but in order to use the full tilt capacity with my 70inch TV I had to bolt risers made from 2x4 lumber to get the TV far enough away from the wall. Without the risers the bottom edge of the TV contacted the wall which prevented it from titling completely.  Another downside is that there isn't any means to adjust the set for level after hanging it on the mount (and making sure the mount is level doesn't mean that the TV will be level when hung on it). It's impossible to use the locking screws to secure the TV to the mount if the mount is tilted to full capacity, which is a design flaw. If I had to do it again, I'd buy an articulating tilting mount that allowed for leveling. I'm going to have to make some kind of shim to level my TV. Another ding on this Cheetah mount was that a nut and bolt had come undone and were rattling around inside the packaging. The upsides to this mount are its' low price and the included HDMI cable (which works perfectly).

Reviews.Title: I Own Two!
Reviews.Author: R. Reed
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these TV wall mounts for a 55" TV some time ago and liked it enough that I had to order another one.  The price is simply amazing on Amazon compaired to what other retailers sell similar products for.The box arrived quickly and well packaged.  Inside of the box is the mount, brackets, mounting hardware and instructions.  It also includes a fairly useless plastic level and tons of different options when it comes to mounting hardware (screws, lags, etc).  Everything you need to mount your TV is included.  I will also point out the first one I ordered did not include an HDMI cable (at the time it wasn't part of the deal) but the second one did.  Unfortunately the HDMI cable that was included with the second mount was useless too.  I tried it with several different tv's and components but it would not transmit a signal.  I am not knocking the product though because I did not buy the mount for the HDMI cable as I have several spares that I like laying around the house.The installation is fairly simple so if you are slightly handy it shouldn't be a problem to mount the TV on your own, unless it's a huge TV and then you will probably need help lifting up the TV :)  I recommend reading the instructions first and planning out the process.  I would also recommend a good cordless drill, a 3' bubble level and a good magnetic stud finder.As I said at the beginning I have used this mount for two TV's.  One is a 55" LG and the other is a 32" Insignia.  Both look great now that they are hung on the wall.  The only thing I should mention is that with some smaller 32" TV's you may see the mount peeking out from the side.  I personally did not have this issue as everything is properly hidden behind the TV (it is pretty close though).I will also mention that due to the odd stud spacing in my bedroom wall I had to drill two holes in the mounting plate in order to mount it.  Drilling through the metal was fairly easy and everything works like a charm.  It took about 30 minutes to install the 55" TV in the living room and probably about an hour for the bedroom as I had a hard time figuring out the stud spacing.For the price you simply cannot beat this mount, I would highly recommend it.Thanks for reading!

Reviews.Title: Stunned and Amazed
Reviews.Author: Time Traveler
Reviews.Content: Like a 1000 others who commented, I was very skeptical because of the price. The average "low end" price for large screen Tv wall mounts seemed to be about $139 and upwards to just under $300. Product arrived complete in an unopened package and had EVERYTHING you need. It included multiple size screws for whatever brand TV you have perfectly adjustable bracket, it even came with an HDMI cable and a small magnetic level in case you don't have one! We hung an older 46" LCD which isn't light by today's standards and I have absolutely no concern that it is solid. I am buying a second one for my daughter's TV as soon as I finish this review.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: prc1966
Reviews.Content: Read previous reviews before purchasing and was reluctant to order but our son is very good at installing things and general carpentry. The price was another concern, typically you get what you pay for. I made the right decision by ordering this mount. Our son had it installed in 30 minutes, all parts were included. The built in level is a plus. Fit our tv perfectly. I would recommend to anyone. Great bang for the buck!

Reviews.Title: Good mount but deceptive title - no bolts for samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: the guru "I live on amazon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount because I own a slim Samsung 46" LED TV. I want to say its 1.3" or 1.7" thick. The title clearly says LED on it, yet when you receive the packaging the manual nor the box say LED. They only reference LCD and Plasma displays. The kit does come with several different bolt sizes depending on the type/brand of TV you are mounting. The bolts I am referring to attached the rear of the TV to two brackets which attaches to the mount fixed on the wall. The M6 bolts were wide enough to fit the threads in the rear of my screen only problem was they are the wrong depth at 24-25mm. When fully tightened there was about 1" of wiggle room where the mount would sag against the wall. The bolts needed for an LED screen should in all actuality be around 12mm depth. So I had to get creative and double up on the supplied plastic washes, which meant drilling out four of them to reduce 1/2" of wobble (GAP) between the TV and the two vertical brackets.This minor issue can cause a lot of customer confusion and will create a lot of returns for the vendor. Cheetah should really think about modifying their title because a Samsung LED is a popular television, clearly they do not supply the correct bolts for slim TV's. Most people are not going to want to either visit the parts store and find the right length bolts or fabricate parts as I had to.All In all the Cheetah mount paired with a Powerbridge SLIM kit for LED TV's makes a great combination and creates the illusion of a professional install. For an LCD or Plasma TV I am sure the fitment would be better.

Reviews.Title: Bullit Proof
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I love my New Home Theater systemIn fact, I love it so much I tend to watch it a bit too much.THe wife and I got into a heated debate about my new television use. One thing led to another, and she tried to rip the 50" Samsung clean off the wall.Thanks to this mount the TV is still on the wall, and working well.Mount  > Angry Wife

Reviews.Title: Good mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon RJC
Reviews.Content: It's a good mount for the money. Has the basic hardware you need to mount your TVs onto the wall and the wall to the mount. The directions are clear and concise. The bonus HDMI cable is a nice touch especially since finding those cables cheap can be tricky since you can get them online cheap and pay for shipping or go to Best Buy or HH Gregg and pay more money and taxes.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: Funny that I would trust a 30 dollar T.V. mount to hold up a 3000 dollar T.V.  I would buy it again in a heartbeat. Works well and comes with a ton of hardware. Easy mounting, and hold a lot of weight(100plus pounds). I have read the bad reviews and was fully expecting a poor product. I was very impressed on the ease of installation. Works great!

Reviews.Title: REVIERW
Reviews.Author: JACKIE
Reviews.Content: I LOVED THE PRICE OF THIS IT WAS WAY CHEAPER THAN THE ONE THAT THE GUY AT BEST BUY WAS TRING TO SELL ME AND IT WORKS JUST AS GOOD. IT WORKED JUST FINE FOR MY 46" PANASONIC, THE REASON IM ONLY GIVING IT A 4 OUT OF 5 STARS IS BECAUSE IT SAID A HDMI CORD WAS INCLUDED BUT MINE DIDNT COME WITH ONE.

Reviews.Title: Great mount....but
Reviews.Author: Dbosco
Reviews.Content: As usual great shipping time. The mount itself is very well thought out and a great value.....HOWEVER, like many other reviewers I received no cable or level, remove that stuff from your ad and you'll get great reviews.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mount, Lack of Free Items
Reviews.Author: BobbyT
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these mounts for above my fireplace.  The televisions being mounted were a 55" Samsung 8000 series and a 46" Samsung 8000 series.  Below are my pro's and con's:Pro's:The mounts are built very well and easily hold my televisions.Putting together the mount is very simple if following the directions.Screws and spacers are included to attach to your tv.Hanging the tv to the mount is as easy as lift, set, and forget.Con's:Bubble level and 10' HDMI cable were not included with either of my mounts.The mount came with four 8mm lag bolts when it was supposed to be 2 8mm and 2 6mm. (It still works)Amazon Pro's:I am not sure who was at fault, either Cheetah or Amazon, but I was missing the free 10' cable and bubble mount as stated above in my con's.  After speaking with an Amazon representative, I was informed that Amazon could not replace the missing items as they were not the seller (it was a seller going through Amazon).  The representative then informed me that I could return the mounts (that I had already put together and installed) for a full refund.  I explained that I didn't want to go through the hassle of unmounting the tv's and taking apart the mount.  The representative then provided an alternative of refunding 20% of my order total.  I have to give 5 stars for Amazon for always going the extra step to make the customer happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Srini
Reviews.Content: The Price is very reasonable , Easy to Set up. Very durable , The tilt gives it an extra edge.My 60 inch TV looks great on it .

Reviews.Title: simple light but works fine
Reviews.Author: jason_a_32
Reviews.Content: The item is surprisingly small in size and light (about 10 Ibs) considering I'm using it to wall mount a 46 inch Sony HD flat screen TV. The tv is about 40 Ibs easy, but so far after three weeks of installation, it had no issues what so ever.  The installation is fairly simple, about 45 minutes with a help of another person.  Most of the installation time were spent screwing the 2 locking pins(screws) that keeps the mount from unhooking on the rail.  You may need to reach under the TV and use a long screw driver while someone holds the flashlight over your head to see the locking pins. Otherwise this product is a better option than those heavier and larger mounts sold elsewhere.  And since its a smaller mount, the TV can rest closer to the wall which gives it a cleaner look because the TV feels more like part of the wall.  I had a larger mount in the past that was more expensive and heavier so it adds more stress to the wall (and my wallet).  I'm totally happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Better Than the Last Mount I Got!
Reviews.Author: C. TYLER "CrAcKSTim"
Reviews.Content: OVERVIEW:  This will be my second TV wall mount, the first being a swivel design.  It took me about 1.5 hours to install and mount my TV without power tools.  I installed a 46" LED Samsung TV (really skinny and hard to get back there now).PARTS:  All the parts that I needed came with this system.  It was awesome that they gave me the extra screws as my TV (Samsung) did not have the screws for its wall mounting system.  The level device was decent and the HDMI was a great addition.  It is 3D ready in case you need to know, and I think it's about 9' long which comes in handy.MANUAL:  The instruction manual was good.  It covered most of the information that I needed, although more detailed pictures or a better description would have been nice.  I had to take off one of the brackets because I didn't study the picture carefully, which could have been resolved through better manual design.INSTALLATION:  Installation was pretty simple.  It would be nice to have some power tools when installing the wall mount screws, as they are long!  Their stud finder guide was really helpful as I did not have a stud finder.  The only issue I had was installing all the cords after it was setup, be sure to do as many of the connections prior to bringing your TV up there as you can.CONCLUSION:  I use the mount at the 15 degree tilt and it works great!  I have not tried to adjust the tilt after it has been mounted.  The construction of the steel and the welds seem sturdy and strong and I have no fear with my TV being mounted to it on the wall.Hope this has helped you!

Reviews.Title: A tv mount. Nothing more, nothing less.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Comes in a box. Includes everything you need, except for basic tools. Hung my 55" Samsung 6 Series without even the slightest problem. Good, inexpensive mount.

Reviews.Title: Good Wallmount!
Reviews.Author: LRic "Lric"
Reviews.Content: Great mount it had loads of extra pieces which you will not need if you're using your house's wall studs as you should. It can hold up tp 165 pounds meaning it can hold up a TV of up to 165/4= 41.25 pounds in weight. My TV was a 42" and 32.5 pounds and I'm using a tilt of 15°, which does put added pressure on the top part of the mount, all will be fine. You are always best of using your wooden studs in wall with the included 3/16" bolt screw. The leverage this gave the tv was more then I dreamed of, specially having used a couple of other mounts before. Now if you want added support use a slightly smaller wood drill bit and drill your 2" hole, this allows the bolt screw to latch onto even more wood and is better then the one they recommend(3/16" drill bit). I used a size 5/32" bit. All that aside this took me roughly an hour to construct purely because I was single handed and lacking some of the tools to put this together(My Philip screwdriver seemed to object my use and hid from me, for over 15 minutes).  Now I had read some negative reviews and know they are mostly of human construct. The cheetah mount brought more then enough items for use in case of extraordinary measures. It brings 3 different standard sized TV back screws for the TV and enough locks. All the pieces where simple to assemble and I did not need to look at the manual. I have never mounted a wall mount on my own need I mention. This Mount seemed more then adequate and the best part was the leveling, it was quite easy to do and was made even easier by cheetah's inclusion of one.THIS IS A NOTE FOR THOSE WORRIED ABOUT EXTRA UNMARKED PIECES:"Keep it simple stupid" comes to mind, this is a simple project and all those extra pieces if you don't know what they do, don't worry. They are only for extraordinary circumstances.The only Con i noticed was the manual on this was sub par. The pictures where far and hard to make out as well as the instructions where generic and not very helpful. I simply ended up looking at the picture on the box and going from there. How hard can it really be? its a frame attached to your wall with another frame hooking onto it at 15°? This mean human ingenuity is most certainly welcomed but not required at all. If you're having a hard time stop being stubborn and ask someone else, if you cant figure it out. Don't have anyone else? Use youtube!On the Amazon forums you can find quick guidelines on how to spot knockoffs. Usually the number one sign is a generic white box for a non generic item. others would be sub-par quality and bad or no customer service. However that is why Amazon allows you to report this and even gives you a refund on most purchases.

Reviews.Title: Great item! Little challenge for the installation!
Reviews.Author: M. Leblanc
Reviews.Content: The product is very good. Really great value. Allows horizontal positioning play as well as downward tilting.Of course for a small cost come some weak area. Documentation is not good nor the pictures or diagrams. But, the assembly is fairly simple to figure it out when you are slightly handy.Here what I did:- I assembled the rectangle mount first.- Second, locate the stud in the wall and marked them on the wall with a pencil- Used the rectangle mount to mark the drilling holes where the stud are.- Drill the whole, than screw the frame on the wall- Screwed the TV vertical supporting arms to the back of the TV- Hooked the TV on the wall mount.- Screwed the bottom screws that retain the TV mounting arms. To screw those you would enjoy a long Philips driver otherwise you will complain about this product!!! That is where it would looses a star for me but for the money I cannot do that.

Reviews.Title: Simple mount that just flat out works.
Reviews.Author: Tung Yang Chang
Reviews.Content: The instruction could be alittle better.  If it was your first time using this mount, it would take you awhile.  I didn't bother installing the two small side bars.  They just got in the way if you ever needed to mess with the connections on the back of the TV.  There wasn't much rooms there after it was mounted.  The included HDMI cable failed recently after about 4 months of use.

Reviews.Title: needed to buy another bolt
Reviews.Author: Alvin
Reviews.Content: For the price, the quality of the mount is decent.  I've had it up for 2 weeks and it seems pretty sturdy and I appreciate how easy it is to adjust the tilt.  However, one of the M8 bolts was slightly warped at the end and I was not able to screw it in.  I called Cheetah customer service and even though I provided my Amazon order number, they were not able to find my order.  The customer service rep did not want to send me a new bolt but after a little back and forth agreed to do so after I gave him my address.  I eventually ended up getting a replacement bolt at Home Depot after looking on the internet for the correct thread pitch.BTW, even though the Cheetah customer service representative said that he sent the replacement bolt, I never received it

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Bree Long
Reviews.Content: I was having a difficult time finding a wall mount for my new flat screen and then I came across this one at a store for $180.  That seemed a bit high so I thought I would try my luck on Amazon.  Not only did I save a ton of money it came with in two days so I was able to use my tv without having to wait forever.  I love it and haven't had any trouble at all.  It's easy to use/set up.  I also like the fact that you can rotate the angle at which you see the tv.  Because my bed is lower than where I chose to mount my tv the ability to tilt the tv down slightly makes it level with my eyes when I'm laying down.  Definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Made first time install a breeze
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: This mount made my first wall mount such an easy experience. The instructions do suck, but anyone with ANY mechanical skills can easily figure it out without them. Securely holds my 40" LCD with no worries, tilt is simple to use and adjust. The included level helped make installation a breeze. All I used was a Stud Finder, Phillips Screw Driver, a drill with 3/16" bit, and a ratchet with 13mm socket and extension. Would recommend again in an instant due to price (half that of bestbuy and walmart) and ease of install. The good price left budget to get tools, cable management and a wall mount stand for acessories.Only con was that the level attached to the top mounting bracket came busted, but the other level was fully functional so it wasn't even needed. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Great value and river view
Reviews.Author: Mike L
Reviews.Content: This mount was cheaper than others on the Internet and much cheaper than from retail stores. Got the mount quickly. It is a quality mount; very sturdy. It has a built in level. Also, has several different sizes of mounting bolts included. This should guarentee that one will fit the back of your TV. I am very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Fred H. Mann "old goat"
Reviews.Content: I was surprised to find a product built so well and the price within me budget. It lived up to the reviews I read. Very easy to install, with well written instructions. It took me less then 45 minutes to install and 15 minutes to hang my TV.

Reviews.Title: EASY AND SIMPLE!
Reviews.Author: W. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Received package on time from Cheetah Mounts. This mount is a thing of beauty and very well constructed. This is my first time ever assembling a wall mount and I had no problem setting this up on the wall in little amount of time. Great price and value from Cheetah Mounts as I recommend it to anyone that's looking for a wall mount!

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Firsttimemommy
Reviews.Content: For the price, this mount is great.  It really does its job.  Why pay for the expensive ones when this one does the exact same thing and is the same quality.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation/Functional
Reviews.Author: Jason Sackoor
Reviews.Content: I'm not what anyone would consider a handyman.  When I told relatives that I was going to mount my 40" television to my basement wall, I was told, "Maybe you should try to hang a picture first."I did have to borrow some tools to install this mount.  You'll need a drill/screwgun, and a screwgun tip capable of driving 1/2" hex bolts.  You may want to obtain a better quality level to make sure everything is square.That said, once I got the right tools, I was able to put this mount up in about 45 minutes.  My television is still hanging, and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: EASY
Reviews.Author: Dawn "BeesNees"
Reviews.Content: Best 26+shipping i've spent in awhile. Super easy to assemble and install. Didn't take long at all. And even if i would've recieved the mount with out 1 single screw then i would've gone down to the hardware store and spent 2 bucks instead of calling customer service and waiting a month like other reviews i've read. Still would've saved me 40 bucks for another comparable "cheap" mount. The most important thing of all.......it's sturdy and it works. Go figure, you actually don't need to spend over 200 bucks for a mount.

Reviews.Title: Money Saving Mount
Reviews.Author: silverbandit
Reviews.Content: If you are in the need for a simple large screen television mount, then save your time and MONEY and buy the CHEETAH MOUNTS APTMM2B.  I attached it to my 55" Vizio television and had this assembled and mounted within 40 minutes.It is of good construction, not the best and far from the worst. With the included levels, mounting is almost foolproof. I'm glad I didn't spring for the more expensive mounts and professional installation from a local electronics store. What I did do is order a second mount since I was satisfied with my original purchase.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend
Reviews.Author: Geoff Mcelwee
Reviews.Content: Aside from the initial fear that I must've done something wrong, and that my TV would fall off of my wall and break something or someone, this was a great purchase.It comes with everything you need for mounting the TV and and HDMI cable.  Obviously you'll want a stud finder if you don't know how to locate them, and you'll need a drill, etc.If I hadn't doubted myself on my stud finding decisions this would've been up in under 30 minutes.  The mount is sturdy, and our 47" flat screen is perfectly placed on our wall.The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is because of how close the TV is to the wall.  It's difficult to hook more into the TV when we need to, but I could've also read further into reviews or dimensions to know that prior to the purchase.Overall, I would buy this product again if we got another TV that needed to be on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Malcolm davis
Reviews.Content: Works great, had no problems. For good for the money and is just as good as the top brands. Very Impressed

Reviews.Title: No sweat
Reviews.Author: Patrick Murphy
Reviews.Content: Took a couple of minutes to put together, Torpedo level was a nice little bonus. Easy as 1, 2, 3

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and does the job
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Postel "hogtrainz"
Reviews.Content: Cannot beat the price - easy to install and worked on all my TV'sTemplate made installation a breeze.  Compared to what is sold in box stores thisTV mount is a real bargain!!!

Reviews.Title: Really good tv mount!
Reviews.Author: Adam Neft
Reviews.Content: So let me start with this: Any time you buy something in this price range there's always a "hold your breath" factor...as in, hold your breath and see if I just blew $20-$30...hold your breath to see if it works or falls apart, hold your breath to see if I can even assemble and put it together.Let me tell you, this tv mount is legitimate. On a scale of 1-10, I'd give myself a 5-6 for handiness. I'm not a complete dope who calls a professional, but certainly not someone who can handle complex tasks. It took my wife and I about 30 minutes, give or take, to get the item mounted to the wall, the hooks attached to the tv and everything set up. Then we sat back and watched tv - and love it!Great tv mount, looks awesome, easy to assemble...comes with a nice HD cable if you don't have one or need one that may be a bit longer. Overall very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: Perfect wall mount.  A friend recommended it to me and he has 7 of them in his house.  Getting several more to finish mounting our TV's in the new house.

Reviews.Title: Decent product
Reviews.Author: Jerry Hall
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and was what I expected for the price.  Good value and I will order more of them in the future.

Reviews.Title: They used to be one piece and now require assembly
Reviews.Author: INeedToStopSpending
Reviews.Content: I wish they still sold the one piece model instead of the some assembly required model still. Having to put it together is a nuisance and often comes missing pieces (screws or bolts).

Reviews.Title: Just buy it works great
Reviews.Author: Coleman Deitz
Reviews.Content: Dont let price fool you works fine install was simple and it come with all you need to install it I would get another one if I needed it

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck!!
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Parsons "ROCKY"
Reviews.Content: Love this mount!! Super easy to set up and had it up within 30 minutes. Easy choice for the price but the screws that actually go into the wall are okay but I recommend getting your own screws. The cloth and the HDMI cord was a bonus to this already awesome deal. The only negative thing is that you really can't get to the safety screws.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic customer service, items included, and easy to mount - thanks Cheetah!
Reviews.Author: Belgerad
Reviews.Content: I have to admit, I was very pleasantly surprised by the level of service Cheetah provides for their mounts.  After my purchase, I received a follow-up email a few days later with regards to the mount, if it's working as expected and if there was anything they could do for me.  It's hard to see this kind of service these days.  I had a very small issue with my smaller mount (arm) that I purchased for a smaller TV...the HW kit comes with a plethora of screw options but did not quite have a screw long enough for my Samsung TV for my arm.  In parallel I happened to purchase a larger mount also from Cheetah for another TV.  I used the screws and spacers from that kit so contacted Cheetah stating I'd be happy to return the other items if they'd consider replacing those 4 screws and spacers.  They immediately got back to me the same day and sent out an entire new screw kit for my larger mount.  This was totally unexpected and a sign of awesome customer service. It was simple to mount, level, and the inclusion of the HDMI cable, level and other thoughtful features make this a purchase with high value for the price and the service.  I'd highly recommend Cheetah mounts based on their service alone plus you simply can't beat the price!  :-)

Reviews.Title: End all tv mount
Reviews.Author: mike polk
Reviews.Content: Mounting a 42" Samsung LED.I am very pleased with this wall mount. Simple to assemble and mount. the included level was nice and also has a smaller level that attaches to the frame, hdmi cable came in handy for me also. I like the flexibility of the mounting holes, gives a lot of wiggle room in case you need it. Sits very snug to the wall and with a slim tv it looks great.Only real complaint is how the rails are loose that attach to the tv. They include thick plastic washers in case you need to pad some space, but the screws were too long for my tv and still some room behind the brackets, that while the spacers helped, it didn't fully pad it and are a bit wobble. This does not seem to affect the security of it as the screws are in far as possible, but annoys me that they are completely flush and secure.Otherwise love it and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not solid enough for our tv that is a 55 inch vizio older model!
Reviews.Author: nicole sirbaugh
Reviews.Content: No way this would hold a 100 pd tv metal was thin and we didnt want tv to fall so we didnt even use it!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: RUBY
Reviews.Content: I opened the package and saw a tiny box. I used it to hang my 60 inch tv. The stand needed to be put together. So many pieces. It looks flimsy but does the job. It holds my tv fine.  If I had to buy another I would buy one with less mess.

Reviews.Title: Great Company
Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: I ordered a wall mount from Cheetah Mounts and it just did not work with what we had originally had in mind. It was no fault of the company, so I emailed them asking about returning the mount. They promptly emailed me back that night and called me the following day. Offering me a solution, a different wall mount ( more expensive then the one I had purchased.) They over nighted it and we received it the following day. Excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: Kurt F. Stahl "from the Stable"
Reviews.Content: Great deal and easy to set up. The level and cable come in handy as well. Can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: So good I bought another one
Reviews.Author: JustBruins
Reviews.Content: Good price, sturdy construction, easy to install, and includes a level, hdmi cable, and a mini-light.No doubt I will buy a third soon!

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: JoAnn R.
Reviews.Content: I was wary of buying this because of the close clearance to the wall, but that was exactly what I wanted for my Vizio 60 inch flat screen. I was concerned about the mounting, but it was super easy. I needed two strong men to lift the TV onto the bracket but there was more than enough clearance to do it.I don't think this would work if the connections on your TV were not recessed and accessible from the side as mine are. It does sit very close to the wall, but you can tip it out a few inches if you do need to access the back of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Works Great and it wasn't too hard to set up
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I've had it up on the wall for over a year now I think, and the TV is still up there too.

Reviews.Title: Great mount at a great price
Reviews.Author: Steve Kerwin
Reviews.Content: A mount has basically one job - hold the TV on the wall and maybe tilt a bit to adjust for the right viewing angle. This does that job and costs a fraction of what other mounts cost.  Setup is fairly straightforward - it even includes a magnetic level to help.  I've seen other reviews saying its tricky, but I don't think its any worse than other mounts.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Excessive
Reviews.Content: I was a bit to small I was fooled by the dimensions.I am not sure I wsould recommend it for that TV size.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount
Reviews.Author: Scott Manley
Reviews.Content: Would have gotten 5 stars but the bolts included are not the strongest. However beyond the wood screws this is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased a flatscreen from a local retailer, and they wanted over $70 for a mount that was almost exactly like this!  This was fast and easy to install, came with the cables I needed, a level used to install and a flashlight to boot!  I would and will, purchase from this company again!  Its everything that they claimed and more :-)

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 30" and my 55"
Reviews.Author: Andres Lopez
Reviews.Content: The items is great.... perfect sizing, easy to install. Even comes with the leveler.I had my 30 on and loved it.... however, upgraded to a 55" and it handles it just right. I think it can actually handles bigger TVsMake sure you have the proper nails to fix to the wall.

Reviews.Title: This is great!
Reviews.Author: Jan Wattles "Bookie"
Reviews.Content: We have a 45 " flat screen tv, and this bracket works just great. We have purchased three now, and all is good

Reviews.Title: Good mount, inaccurate instructions
Reviews.Author: PENdragon
Reviews.Content: This is a okay TV mount however unless your a relatively handy person with a good selection of tools and some street smarts you may want to have someone capable put it up. I took off two stars because the instructions are out of date with respect to the tools required, the parts included in the kit, and the labeling on the parts - and it's all in metric. Once you finally get it figured out and locate the actual tools required assembly and mounting it's fairly smooth. Oh, and you will likely need to have a really loooooooooong shaft phillips head screwdriver to be able to reach the tilt adjustment screws - that's probably a trip to your favorite hardware store and an extra expense.

Reviews.Title: Cheap! Bad instructions...
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: It does its job, but most likely you will need to connect all the cables to your TV first or else once you put it on, there will be no room for you to connect your cables...

Reviews.Title: great price compared with others
Reviews.Author: Ramiro silos
Reviews.Content: works good. holding up a Vizio 65" HDTV, i payed over $100 for my other 65" tv wall mount , cant beat the price, comes with HDMI cable,and other things.... i recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Ortega
Reviews.Content: Ben looking all around for an affordable TV wall mount had lots of good reviews purchased it came with a ton of extra parts the level and longer HDMI cable came in handy great mount even better price!

Reviews.Title: Used Wall mount with dry wall in the screws
Reviews.Author: Skeerd
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product but....The TV wall mount that I ordered was not what was shipped to me.  In the box was the wall mount, misc loose screws in the bottom of the box, screws in a freezer bag and a level.... Ok what am I going to do with this ?????? Ummmm nothing.  More than half of the assembly was missing AND the wall mount bracket and wall screws were USED !

Reviews.Title: The best wall mount
Reviews.Author: Shooter
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best wall mount that your money can buy. Anyone telling you differently is simply wrong. These are the ONLY mounts I buy just because I'm so impressed with them. The first one I bought didn't even come with all of the fancy stuff that the newer ones come with. I love this mount and I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Dont Buy
Reviews.Author: Jose S.
Reviews.Content: Cheap product, the bracket looks like one piece in the picture however it is six different pieces that need to be bolted together to form the wall bracket. Did not seem sturdy at all.

Reviews.Title: Works as intended
Reviews.Author: Q
Reviews.Content: Works. Holding a LG 47" to 16" studs. The added HDMI cable and ties were a nice bonus. Don't trust the level, use your own. Its cheaper than other extremely overpriced mounts, still overpriced for what it is.Of note, it is impossible to fasten the safety screws unless you have a really long phillips.If I had to do it again I would use a french cleat and forgo all the added hardware.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Great Price
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: I bought this item after looking for a good TV wall mount for a week that was under $80. Read the reviews and decided to try it out.Needless to say this product is great and very tuff and sturdy. Easy to put together and mount. The HDMI cable it came with works great. I'm using it from my ATT cable box to TV. Easy to mount and comes with good hardware. I have a 48" LG flat screen mounted on it.Great price and a great TV mount.

Reviews.Title: Will fit larger LED/LCD screens
Reviews.Author: Trandy
Reviews.Content: I have this holding my Vizio 70 inch screen with no problem. The description says it will hold up to 65 inch only so don't worry about going bigger. Just make sure you anchor it well to the wall. I screwed into the studs directly and put a butterfly toggle on one corner that I was a little unsure about. The width of the mount was so much wider than my studs so I just added some extra strength.

Reviews.Title: Works well, costs next to nothing
Reviews.Author: Mike R. Becker
Reviews.Content: Please don't buy an expensive mount. This one does everything you'll need it to for lots less. I like the shallow depth. And it comes with a free level and HDMI cable - you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount
Reviews.Author: Peter C.
Reviews.Content: I am so happy i bought this wall mount, it was easy to assemble and put on the wall, plus the level they provide really helped.

Reviews.Title: Awesome simple affordable mount
Reviews.Author: SummitCore
Reviews.Content: At first I was skeptical of the four-piece base plate that needed assembly.Top, Bottom, and the two side bars equal 4 pieces...My other mounts are all SOLID thick one-piece bases.But once this unit is assembled and on the wall it is very very sturdy and left me without any worry whatsoever.It assembled very easily and all the fasteners were already in their proper positions.  Just had to unscrew, match up, and re-tighten.Plus you get a nice long HDMI cable and level in the package...

Reviews.Title: Easy to instal
Reviews.Author: kamran Khosravi
Reviews.Content: its was very easy and simple to instal and all items needed were included, very satisfied , great job guys

Reviews.Title: Decent - not great, not horrible
Reviews.Author: D. McIver
Reviews.Content: It's a decent tv mount -- people gripe about having to assemble the bracket yourself... went smooth and easy and all parts fit perfect.  It is flexible enough to mount on 16" or 24" studs and depending on the width of your screen, you can slide the tv left or right on the wall mount to suit your needs.We mounted a 27" tv and the entire width of the wall mount was just barely covered by the tv - if that helps some of you on the fence about the width.My gripe is mostly about securing the mount to the wall bracket -- by way of a screw on each vertical arm... standard on a lot of mounts, but just a pain to get to... and I wish I had bought a mount with the pull tabs / quick release mounts that other brands use.The included HDMI cable was decent quality, but I pitched it in favor of the higher grade one we already had..

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: jwindy
Reviews.Content: as others have stated the instructions aren't great but if you look at the pictures it's pretty easy to figure out. Just be sure to get a very long (at least 12 inches) screwdriver to tighten the final screws on the bottom rail

Reviews.Title: very flimsy built
Reviews.Author: Jodie D. Daniels
Reviews.Content: I have 2 other mounting brackets for other TV's. This is the very first one I would not recommend. Very flimsy and extremely hard to mount.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Joseph Canciello
Reviews.Content: Overall, easy to install.  You will not find a better product for the price point.  I will be buying from this company again if I need to mount another tv.

Reviews.Title: easy to install.
Reviews.Author: alan
Reviews.Content: Worked out great. With no problems I like it. It didn't looked like much but it worked out good for my new tv room

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bob H.
Reviews.Content: Great price, easy to assemble.  Put it together and on the wall holding a tv in 1.5 hours.  Pretty easy to put together...no issues.  All parts and pieces were there.  Ultimately needed some help to keep level when hanging on the wall but works great.  Been up for a year now and no issues.

Reviews.Title: works great for me
Reviews.Author: terry seitz
Reviews.Content: this mounting system was great for me 65" TV  made it easy to mount with just myself and my wife even with the weight of the large TV.  You do have some assembly that needs to be done, but it's simple and straight forward with clear directions included.  A very good mounting system.

Reviews.Title: I can't reach the bottom 2 set screws
Reviews.Author: John Domalewski
Reviews.Content: The mount is solid in the wall studs, but, doggone, I can't get to the bottom set screws. My first problem was that I had video/audio connectors from a VCR/DVD the pushed the TV too far from the wall for the bottom screws to catch the frame. Took those connectors out and saw that the screws would would be able to catch, but I don't have a screw driver long enough to tighten them without having my hand behind the TV. Once I put the screw driver handle and my hand behind the TV it pulls the TV away from the wall and the set screws can't catch the mount.I saw the post about attaching a screwdriver to a socket to an extension to get the job done. I guess we just have to figure out how to get a 16 inch screwdriver shaft ... and, still attach the RCA plugs.

Reviews.Title: Works as intended
Reviews.Author: andrew lombardo
Reviews.Content: The mount works as you would expect and has a very low profile against the wall. It was a bit difficult to reach the bottom safety screws that ensures the TV cannot move upward if bumped.

Reviews.Title: Missing parts and damaged
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I was initially concerned when this mount came in a small box that you had to assemble (this was not the case for my previous mount purchases).  It proved to be correct as many of the bolts were missing, including the lag bolts required to install to the wall.  Additionally, some of the nuts used to assemble the mount from the factory were stripped or damaged preventing them from tightening.  That's the last thing you want when mounting a 40lb tv!

Reviews.Title: Great rack mount.
Reviews.Author: Ron Wrench "Tech guy!"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son at college and he says it's a super well built solid mount and he couldn't believe the price! Holds his 42 inch flat screen very well!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: This mount works well. It holds my 60 inch TV on the wall just fine. Even if my son did hang it crooked. Good value.

Reviews.Title: Easy enough to put up
Reviews.Author: Allan Gray
Reviews.Content: Dosen't take a rocket scientist to figure out how to get it all together. I may have glanced at the instructions once to make sure I wasn't making any mistakes. Almost identical to one I purchased from Fry's for $95 a few years ago. You'll need a ratchet/wrench and a stud finder, but worth $30.I only wish apartment complexes would install outlets and coax jacks in obvious flat screen hanging areas, preferably recessed so that if you choose a different location you could just put a picture over it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Hangs my 32 in flat screen TV on the wall with no issues. Set-up was a breeze - took me all of 5 minutes!

Reviews.Title: What can you not like!
Reviews.Author: Thomas A Bizzell
Reviews.Content: This thing is rock solid, simple (the instructions are in very simple explanitory pictorial, if you can't figure it out from them then get someone to do it for you), the box is pretty small, I was a bit concerned until I opened it up and laid everything out. It took me about 30 minutes to assemble and hang the TV on the wall, of course that was with the help of my dogs, and unboxing the TV. It's pretty flexible as far as mounting positions, with the slots and all. The only gripe I would have is they only include two pretty large lag bolts, and a bunch of regular machine thread bolts I have quite a few different size screws and lags on hand so it was no big deal for me, but you might want to open and assemble it, hold it to the wall and then figure out what screws etc you might need to acquire. The TV actually hangs on the top bracket so screws in the bottom aren't really necessary, but I did put them on mine. The little level will come in handy in my drill box. I would recommend for sure. I wonder if they make a DVR shelf that attaches to the hanger, I shall see.

Reviews.Title: False advertising - do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Picky Consumer
Reviews.Content: I bought this to mount a 42" plasma TV which weighs about 100 lbs which is under the rated load for this mount (130 lbs). However, it DOES NOT HANDLE THE WEIGHT --- the brackets which attach to the TV became deformed when the TV was mounted on the wall and it would not tilt properly. The plastic "guides" which permit tilting popped out when I tried to adjust the tilt position.This thing is a piece of junk -- the metal is way too light for the claimed weight capacity.

Reviews.Title: very nice mount
Reviews.Author: S.S.X.
Reviews.Content: it's relatively flat against the wall and can be tiled up or down.  It's sturdy and easy to mount.  Don't use the cabel that came with it, you might not get all of your channels.  Go with the gold tip cables from your local electronic store. Good product, I have two of them

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Jorge
Reviews.Content: The quality on this is poor.  Holes are too small for the screws.  The metal is flimsy.  Buy another mount that is higher quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: groovygirl23
Reviews.Content: Quality, price and ease of installation all excellent.  I'm so happy to have my flat screen elevated and this is very low profile as well.

Reviews.Title: Brad S
Reviews.Author: Brad S
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount, works just right with my new TV. A fraction of the price compared to Best Buy and some others.

Reviews.Title: This was the janitor's job.
Reviews.Author: Leonard Gillett III
Reviews.Content: Talked to the janitor at the Rest Home where this unit was installed and it took him all of 10 minutes to put it up and mount the TV set.  Guess you could say, even a janitor could do it.  It's simple, efficient and sturdy.  What else could you ask?

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Waldroupe
Reviews.Content: Did not realize how big my tv was and then i thought about the hanging part, well to say that i did not hang it but will use this for my sons tv when it comes in.

Reviews.Title: great wall mount
Reviews.Author: b bass
Reviews.Content: This wall mount was easy to install. Works great. Only problem we've had is getting it to tip just a little when we'd like it to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Mount
Reviews.Author: CynNC ""Pug Lover""
Reviews.Content: Bought this in 2011 for our 50 in. Plasma, top quality and awesome price that cant be beat anywhere ... took my husband about 30 minutes to install .... very sturdy!!

Reviews.Title: It's cheap and it works!
Reviews.Author: Paul Cleary
Reviews.Content: Can't get much better for the price. I've purchased two now and recommend them to anyone looking for an inexpensive TV wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Level, straight, strong!
Reviews.Author: stepCHIILD "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: This mount did exactly what I needed it to. I wish it would angle just a little bit further forward, but that is neither here nor there.The included hardware was all I needed (except for installation tools) to get the job done on a 47" LG LED. It is on there SOLID.

Reviews.Title: Very Well Made - Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Tom Dauer
Reviews.Content: This TV Wall mount is very solid, well made.  Heavy gauge metal will support far more weight than my TV.  I had trouble with clearance of this model (only 1.3" is very tight), and Cheetah Customer Service was excellent in helping me figure out different right angle connectors for the coax and HDMI cables.

Reviews.Title: Solid Value
Reviews.Author: Josh Hazard
Reviews.Content: This is a solid wall mount option for a great value. For peace of mind I went out and got some heavy duty wall anchors to fix the frame to the drywall but the frame itself and the brackets that attach to the TV are really good quality. Love that the system comes with all of the bolt sizes that you might need. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value and easy to install!
Reviews.Author: Cha0831
Reviews.Content: we have a brick wall that we wanted to hang a big flat screen on, so once we bought the proper tools for drilling into concrete/brick this worked like a charm.  Like the other reviews said, there isn't much to this, but it was easy and fast to install and the directions were easy to understand!  Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: the hardware is all there, but..
Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: This is complete and everything that's needed is there to perform the installation, but....it is incredibly frustrating to actually get the teleision hung on the mounting rail, adjust the set screws, lock everything in, etc. Wow - I saw stars a couple of times and am still not really happy with the overall installation. Given the need to do it again, I would pay more for a mount that might be better thought through from an engineering/design perspective. Price isn't everything.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G Hurto
Reviews.Content: this frame works as advertised.the instruction sheet and parts identification left something to be desired.nonetheless, i recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Solid Product. Sturdy Design. Comfortable  Mounting.
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I received the package on the estimated date. I have used 2 of the 3 mounts so far and they are solid. Levels worked and HDMI cables worked as well. Thanks for the quality product!

Reviews.Title: Does as advertized
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Mount came with handy level and HDMI cable. Holds my 46" Smart TV as expected with no issues. Safe buy.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Melissa A Hoops
Reviews.Content: This item was a great purchase. I am going to get 2 more for the rest of our TVs. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Annonymous
Reviews.Content: But it didnt come with screws that were long enough to mount to my Vizio TV.  Had to improvise to make it fit.  Beyond the screw issue, it feels very sturdy and is very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Keeps my tv on the wall well
Reviews.Author: Joshua W. Keyes "JK"
Reviews.Content: It does take quite a bit of work to get it on the wall if you are an amateur (like me). Also, if you have a tv that is going to need this size mount, you are going to need help getting it up there. It is great having my tv mounted on the wall now.

Reviews.Title: Great product even better price
Reviews.Author: John gitto
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these, 1 holding a 39" in the bedroom and one holding a 50" in the living room. Easy to assemble easy yo install. Great product

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: Was inexpensive and worked fine. It is currently holding up a 48 in flat screen. Can e adjusted a small amount . Zero complaints

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Rick Maxey
Reviews.Content: This unit goes in very simply.  Level and cable are a bonus. Very happy with this purchase. I love it

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!! Fast shipping!!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Crosby
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the overall process of the order for this product. The shipping was super fast, the tv wall mount was perfect, easy installation with no complaints.. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to mount their tv on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Harold W. Melius
Reviews.Content: This unit is very well made and is a great value for the money.  It is easy to install and has enough adjustment for any angle you need.

Reviews.Title: Amazing and great price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dana_palace"
Reviews.Content: It has been about 4 months since we installed and hung our 54" Samsung TV on this thing. Could not believe how inexpensive it was but the reviews told the truth. This thing is great!

Reviews.Title: It holds the tv up, and has done so successfully for almost a year :)
Reviews.Author: OldPolishWoodworker
Reviews.Content: Really not much to post.  solid product.  holds up our very heavy ancient 42" tv and has done so reliably for over a year now.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation, very slim profile
Reviews.Author: M. Conatser
Reviews.Content: This is a relatively cheap mount that gets extremely close to the wall, looks great when installed. It is nearly impossible to plug anything in to the bottom of a TV once it has been mounted without lifting it out of the mount. This isn't much of an issue when using a receiver, but it is slightly annoying if you need to just quickly plug something in to the TV. It tilts downward a bit if needed.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: S. Jost "sweetenvy"
Reviews.Content: This is just as described and easy to install (my sons put it up for me!).  This wall mount came with everything needed, but the level is more of a toy.

Reviews.Title: buy it
Reviews.Author: frederick hansen
Reviews.Content: it takes 10 min to put the bracket together but its a lot cheaper than other brackets and has no issues I professionally hang TV'S and I only buy cheetah

Reviews.Title: These are so easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Jason Spates
Reviews.Content: anyone can install this - light and a one person job. no reason to pay a person to install... everyone has a guy or girl that can get this one on the wall.Jason SpatesTruck Lenders USA

Reviews.Title: Solid Mount
Reviews.Author: Bones jones
Reviews.Content: The mount was great.  But the bolts were too long (1") for the TV to affix properly to the mount (i have a slim SAMSUNG LED 55").  I had to go to Home Dept and buy 3/4" to mount the TV safely.  Other than that, its a great mount.

Reviews.Title: Design could be improved
Reviews.Author: nate.the.great
Reviews.Content: I was able to assemble the product properly and had no issues with the quality.  The design leaves a bit to be desired.1. The piece which attaches to the wall is in 6 pieces.  This requires some assembly which isn't a big deal, just make sure you have some very small sockets so you can tighten everything down.  My biggest issue is that you cannot slide the TV around to get it into the perfect spot because the middle joint prevents the hooks to move around freely.  1 piece designs do not have this issue (and cannot be shipped in such a small box).2. The hooks that mount the TV are all separate.  If you're trying to line up an angle properly, you have 4 hooks to adjust.  There are other designs where each set of hooks is a single piece making adjustment easier.  Also, the hooks are very thin so it doesn't slide side to side very well.3. The screws to prevent liftoff are tough to get to once the tv is mounted.  You'll need a really long screwdriver to get to them.  Other kits have a spring loaded clip which makes the locking screw unnecessary.If you don't really need an HDMI cable and a questionable level, it's worth spending $10-$20 more to get a higher quality TV mount.  This is really a one-time purchase/installation, so personally I think it's worth the extra money.  I have two TVs to mount, purchased this as a test, and will not purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Perfect brackets
Reviews.Author: Spooker "Spooker Boo"
Reviews.Content: These were easy to install and work perfectly with the two Samsung TVs we purchased for the committee room. They do not have moving arms but we knew that at the time of purchase and it is no big deal for our use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for wall mounting the tv
Reviews.Author: gigi steele
Reviews.Content: Everything you need is in the box. The directions made it very easy to install. And it came with the HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Good mount!
Reviews.Author: Terri Putman
Reviews.Content: It was great for the money! Holds the TV very well! It is worth the time to install.  I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Lyndsey Dixon
