Reviews.Content: the shipment arrived on time, everything was included as far as materials, hanging supplies and instructions.it works perfect as my tv is now mounted on the wall almost directly across from my bed; however, it does not swivel which i wish i had realized sooner.  i have no intentions on returning the product though, as so far i am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Kilbourn
Reviews.Content: Fairly easy to install, in a few min to an hour depending on your handyman/woman skills I had a friend help me put mine up.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Once you hang up you're TV on this you'll be glad you chose this over the numerous more expensive options. This little kit does everything you need and does it cheaper than the other guys. Great value.

Reviews.Title: One down one to Go
Reviews.Author: jawjadon
Reviews.Content: This mount will be great for my new flat screen 40" Tv. Instructions are very easy to follow.The HDMI adapters have not been deliverd yet , should be in the next day or two according to Amazon order

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I am so happy to have found this mount! We have an LG 55LB6100 and this worked perfectly. The mount went up without any issues, it feels very secure, and it came with extras! They thought of everything! I didn't think we would need the HDMI cable but our old one was too short. It was awesome to have one long enough included. I think the cable provided also carries Ethernet! I also received enough hanging materials to tackle whatever I would want to secure the mount to with whatever size screw I would need. On top of that, this thing came with a level and a miniature flashlight! I will recommend Cheetah to anyone in need of a mount!

Reviews.Title: Great productso far!
Reviews.Author: Mariya
Reviews.Content: Very easy to instal. I have samsung 55'' . It is holding it on strong. My friend put it on for about 15 min. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Cheetah has thought of everything
Reviews.Author: Jim C.
Reviews.Content: I love this mount.  Cheetah has just about thought of everything.  It goes on very easily, and the instructions, unlike with some products, are very clear.Although the supplied spacers were meant to compensate for TVs with curved backs, they came in handy for me to move the TV a little bit farther from the wall so that the cables could make the 90 degree turn without getting squashed. Thank you Cheetah.The braided HDMI cable that Cheetah supplied with the mount appeared to be of very good quality, but I could not really use it because it did not make the 90 degree bend in the limited space behind the TV.  I had to use a more traditional - i.e., thinner - cable.

Reviews.Title: What can I say, cheap, easy to use wall mount!
Reviews.Author: RugerRedhawk
Reviews.Content: Basically this was the cheapest tilting wall mount I could find for my 50" tv. The only feature it lacks that I like on my other tilting wall mount is that one has a hand turnable knob for tightening/loosing the tilt option. So you could reach back there and loosen the knob, change the tilt, then tighten it again. Honestly, for the money and considering the freebie extras I am certainly happy with the item, just want to point out a difference compared to my other mount. If I were buying another one I'd still buy this one. It goes together quickly and easily.

Reviews.Title: 5 STAR QUALITY !!!
Reviews.Author: Anil Sadhwani
Reviews.Content: When I opened the packaging, I was (for the first time) thinking "how do these guys make money"The packaging was extremely nice. All metal pieces were individually packed to avoid scratches. The packaging came with extra screws and very detailed instructions. I dont usually give 5 stars but this one definitely deserved it.I will buy this again and definitely recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Nice Mount. .
Reviews.Author: Robert woody
Reviews.Content: Mount works very well. Having a level with it was an excellent touch as not everyone has one.  Will buy another one when we need it.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: dobie
Reviews.Content: This mount works, and I was quick to pick it because of 5,000 plus reviews so it has to be the best right? Well, as other "newer" reviews has said they changed the design so the back wall plate comes in 6 pieces which causes a slight bow in the frame.  I notice it with my level (USE YOUR OWN LEVEL ONLY) on the bottom part of the frame which is no big deal, because we care about the top part of the frame which was straight more or less.Second problem was the left arm, bottom portion where the security screw was is, the metal around the screw was not bent completely at 90 degrees, preventing the TV to lay flat against the wall bracket.  So I got my channel lock pliers and bent the metal tab a few times back and forth to get it to the proper 90 degrees more or less.There are other cheap comparable TV mounts that have a lower 1" profile, man fault for not looking on Amazon more.I recommend not buying this and look at,http://www.amazon.com/Mount--Profile-compatible-Samsung-Panasonic/dp/B003MIEM8I/ref=sr_1_20?s=audio-video-accessories&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1399920929&sr;=1-20&keywords;=low+profile+tv+mounthttp://www.amazon.com/Cheetah-Mounts-APFMSB-Bracket-420x400/dp/B00DIF2BO2/ref=sr_1_9?s=audio-video-accessories&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1399922783&sr;=1-9&keywords;=low+profile+tv+mountThe fact is all three of these mounts will do the job OK, but why not buy something that's simpler, cheaper and better?

Reviews.Title: Low price and does the job
Reviews.Author: Randall Adams
Reviews.Content: Cheetah APTMM2B mount was used to hang Panasonic 65 inch plasma.  Once assembled and leveled out properly I hung the TV and had no issues.There is not much room to slide the TV once mounted as the VESA holes are at max range.  So if your mount is not center you may not be able to compensate with this large of a tv or VESA mount holes.Spanned two 16" apart studs and seems sturdy to hold 100lbs.  Nice extras thrown in for a little something extra, nice hdmi cable as well.

Reviews.Title: Supper Easy!
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Stublaski
Reviews.Content: It looked every simple, but once it was put together it was very strong. The levels helped especially the one that you put on the bracket. I only wished I had a longer screwdriver to tighten the locking screws.

Reviews.Title: Does as needed
Reviews.Author: D "D"
Reviews.Content: Was not able to tighten the screws that are on the TV mount to the wall mount but this has otherwise performed as needed.

Reviews.Title: Reliable and Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Otis
Reviews.Content: This mount is reliable and sturdy, however, the disadvantage is the lack of room available once mounted. Unfortunately, all of the wiring (i/o, a/v, power,etc) must be attached before attaching the TV to the wall. If you don't, it almost impossible to get to any wiring attached to the back of TV. The locking screws are very difficult to lock in place once the TV is attached to wall also (the placement is not engineered well. if you want to lock, must have a long [10" to 12"] screw driver). If you don't mind lack of space once mounted, it's a decent wall mount for the low cost. However, If asked would I purchase the same mount again, I would have to say no. Just because of the inconvenience. Pay the extra money an adjustable mount.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy
Reviews.Author: Heather A. Barnes
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit and exceptionally sturdy.  Instructions were easy and many other screw sizes for all size TV.  Cant wait to get another TV.

Reviews.Title: My TV is still on the wall!! YAY!!
Reviews.Author: Diego R. Lopez
Reviews.Content: I've always used cheetah mounts and they've always kept my 32" to 42" to 55" inch TVs on my wall. I particularly like their new design. :D Very simplistic yet incredibly sturdy! Any more TVs I ever want to mount I rely on Cheetah Mounts over and over again. :DMy hardware package had lacked a couple spacers for the right size (usually has 4 of each size, I had 3) and same problem with some screws but they immediately sent me via UPS more hardware (like their WHOLE complete set of hardware used on ALL models past to present lol XO Looked like batmans utility belt. lol) and I was able to add what was needed and replace what wasn't proper and ultimately reinforce my mount with much more stability (for my soul lol) with ease. ;)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mount
Reviews.Author: K. L. Huber
Reviews.Content: My previous wall mount did not have the tilting function so there was glare on the screen.  With this mount the glare is eliminated.  Very reasonable price and easy installation.

Reviews.Title: well designed
Reviews.Author: waverly
Reviews.Content: You have to assemble this when it comes in. It's well designed and includes extras-- an HDMI cable and a soft cloth to wipe fingerprints off the tv screen after you hang it up! Perfect and a great price!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Carlos D Fernandez
Reviews.Content: I was worried about the quality, and with a price that's hard to believe skepticism creeped in.  I can attest that the mount works as advertised and the HDMI cable that's included is of good quality.  Highly recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: A great little mount with one small flaw...
Reviews.Author: D. Oberholtzer "IT Guru"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to mount a new flat screen on a wall with 3 studs.  I wanted the mount in the studs so I could then slide the mount left/right as needed to center the TV.  That left/right movement is limited to about 3in and does not move the full length of the mounting bar.  I guess this is for stability or something but otherwise it works perfectly and I have no fear of my 3 year old grabbing onto the TV and it getting pulled off the wall.

Reviews.Title: Sweetness!
Reviews.Author: Eric D.
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Clear instructions for mounting.  Just awesome.  Also, the fact that you get a higher quality hdmi cable and a speed level makes it a killer deal.  This company thinks about how to take care of any customer problems before they are problems.

Reviews.Title: Love it! Very Sturdy
Reviews.Author: I. Hartley
Reviews.Content: I had a friend of mine install this wall mount for me. I have a 50 inch smart TV and it holds it very well. I would recommend hooking all your components up first before hanging because once it's up you can't get behind it to plug extras. You would have to unscrew. Other wise, great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Suprisingly well built for the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Le
Reviews.Content: The unit came with the free HDMI cord, which in of itself is pretty good quality, braided cord.  The unit ships in several pieces and bolts together.  The top and bottom bar are bolted in halves, and the sides connect the top and bottom.  It looks flimsy, but once you bolt it to the wall, the heavy gauge sheet metal doesn't flex at all.

Reviews.Title: Hangs well.
Reviews.Author: Adam Maffey
Reviews.Content: Only problem I have is that you have to have everything plugged in to your tv before you hang it on the wall; because if you don't, good luck getting it plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Don't Freak Out
Reviews.Author: Richard Daniel
Reviews.Content: I've ordered Cheetah Mounts in the past and have been very satisfied with them all. The previous order was a swivel unit for almost the same price. That's the unit I thought I ordered. In my haste, I ordered this one. Then I started to panic when I realized it was in pieces. Construction took all of 5 minutes, more tedious than anything, however I wasn't convinced that this was going to do the trick. Well, I only had a 60in LED Samsung tv to experiment with and that's what made it on the wall. To my surprise, it held up just fine! The tilt feature is nice since this is in a bedroom. Overall, I'm very satisfied. I dropped a star only because of the construction piece. The HDMI cable and level were just a bonus. I would have given 4 and a half stars if that was possible.Since I wrote the review last week, I was contacted about my purchase. They attempted to help me fix my order and get the swivel mounts I originally wanted. I assured them that even though "I" ordered the wrong product, I was equally satisfied with my purchase and besides offering me a bag of money, there wasn't anything they needed to do to secure my satisfaction. Still waiting on the bag of money though. 5 stars for superior customer service.

Reviews.Title: Horrible design flaw and poorly-written instructions
Reviews.Author: Beau Simpson
Reviews.Content: I was initially excited to find a product like this at such a low price. However, this product is the epitome of "you get what you pay for."First of all, the letters in the parts list (i.e a letter is assigned to each part for "easy" reference) do not match the letters in the installation instructions. I would have had an easier time figuring it out without being mislead by the manual.Secondly, the screws on the bottom--which lock the TV into place on the wall--are inaccessible, making it impossible to tighten them and fully secure the television. The 1.3" profile turned out to be more of a hinderance than anything because that's all the room you have to fit your arm between the TV and the wall. Whose forearms are less than 1.3" thick?Finally, when I had given up on trying to tighten the screws, I decided to call the toll free number at Cheetah Mounts. Why was I not surprised that the number didn't work? Tried it several times and the most I got was one ring and then that annoying electronic "ah ah ah ah ah" sound.From the instructions, to the design, to the nonexistent customer service, I would give this product zero stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas Anaya
Reviews.Content: This is a nice wall mount for our flat screen. It attaches firmly to the wall, doesn’t seem like it’ll bend and the material it’s made of is good too. I don’t mean that they are the best you’ll get, but they do pretty well considering how much they cost.

Reviews.Title: Great price and quality
Reviews.Author: watchman
Reviews.Content: I really liked this mount, its quality and ease of use. All parts were neatly packed and instructions were easy to understand, but most importantly it is strong and durable. Great product!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Sonya Combs
Reviews.Content: We bought ourselves a large screen tv for Christmas and I immediately went online to Amazon to find a wall mount for it after seeing the prices in our local Best Buy store.....my husband had it hung in no time at all and it even came with a level and an HDMI cable so all in all it was a GREAT bargain compared to the B&M; stores I shop!! Great price, great product....I'm always telling people to look for something at Amazon because they've beat the price on so many items I've bought!! Oh and the TV went on it like a dream!

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price
Reviews.Author: Aaron B.
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble and hang, comes with a level which is helpful. Mounted a 50 inch TV and difficult to get to security screws to tighten at bottom of arms. I like a different mount that I used for another TV that had pull cords to latch and unlatch bottom of TV from mount.Also the top vesa holes on my Samsung were recessed so I had to put the spacers on the outside of the arm instead of between TV and arm. Not the fault of the mount.

Reviews.Title: cheap mounting screws
Reviews.Author: smooth
Reviews.Content: One of the bolts for this broke while we were installing it.  We couldn't get it out of the stud since it was halfway screwed in.  Cheap screws.

Reviews.Title: Access to safety screws not possible
Reviews.Author: Jerry C. Shaw "psjerry"
Reviews.Content: I agree with others who complain about the so called safety screws that should engage the lower lip of the wall mount plate in order to avoid accidental uplift of the TV off the wall plate. There is no way that these screws can be accessed in order to tighten them after the TV unit is hooked and in place. As their website states, you get what you pay for. I tried this unit with a Samsung UN60F8000 to not avail. I have a complaint into Cheetah.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Snafu2066
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 50" Panasonic plasma, and it worked out great. seems kind of flimsy when I pulled it out of the box, but when I mounted it to the wall it was plenty strong. I liked this mount for all of the room in between the brackets for installing your outlet and low voltage box with out having to worry about clearance issues.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: It was super easy to put up. It's very convenient and a good design. I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful wall mounts
Reviews.Author: Angela L. Reddick
Reviews.Content: Thank you. I loved it.  I would seriously recommend this product to everyone without hesitation. There was nothing about it that I disliked.  Everything was all good!

Reviews.Title: Hope you've got a good understanding of geometry
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: All I can say is glad I'm an engineer.  This bracket comes in a small box which is advertised to reduce shipping costs and will drive some assembly required.  What they don't tell you is you end up with 6 different parts that make up just the back plate that you must put together.  It seems simple until after you put this together and realize it is more crooked than a Detroit politician.  After spending an hour getting things lined up here and getting this mounted to the wall, I got the real Rubix Cube of the assembly.My TV took the smallest screws provided to mount the two vertical brackets to the back of the TV.  These screws come with nifty star washers to help lock things into place and prevent them from backing out.  Unfortunately when I installed these, only one little sliver of the star was making contact with the bracket.  Much like you would imagine a thong on a very large woman, this thing was holding on for dear life.Once the brackets were mounted, I learned of the additional "feature" that allows for 3 degrees of rotational adjustment.  This just means there is enough slop with the various screws that you could get your TV to rotate.  In my application, I was so out of square with the mounted TV I'd have to break my neck to just make watching the thing a possibility.  After 2 hours of cursing and removing/re-installing the TV I got everything secured and square.All in all you get what you pay for here.  Cheap mount that takes considerable work to get nice and square and installed properly.  Based on my $$ savings with this mount, the 30 bucks I saved caused me to spend 3 hours cursing this bracket.  I'll let you do your own valuation from there.

Reviews.Title: Mostly satisfied the situation
Reviews.Author: Anthony A. Bruno
Reviews.Content: One suggestion that would help is to have a right angle connection for the HDMI cable for TV's with back sockets.  Very difficult to make the connection when it is mounted and if done before the mounting it sticks out too far making the mounting a little difficult.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Traci Hanna
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount!  It was easy to assemble and install. I would recommend this!  Very compact and nice packaging.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Smaller box than expected but well pack. It seems that everything is there. Have not mount yet but it looks so easy to do.

Reviews.Title: Intuitive Design and Packaging
Reviews.Author: LA
Reviews.Content: This is the first wall mount I've used, but it seems to me that this product was straightforward and sturdy.It comes with a custom level that fits nicely on its track, and is therefore easy to position.I needed help lifting and placing my flat screen, but that's more due to the weight of the TV.The product also comes with an extra cable, and if your television is like mine the cable that came with the TV is pretty short, so this additional cable will probably be the one you want to use because it gives you a little extra length.Overall, I'm very happy with my newly wall-mounted TV! It now looks like art.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Awesome
Reviews.Author: TranslogisticsInc
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd or 4th of these wall mounts that I've used.They are easy and simple to use.The only complaint I have, is that during assembly I can never figure out which way the 2 side bars go and end up having to assemble it twice because I always put it together with them facing the wrong way...The diagram in the instructions could be a little more specific... other than that I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Brad A Lents
Reviews.Content: Used on my 42" tv and was fairly easy to install.  Sturdy mount for the money - no need to spend $80 or more on the mounts they sell elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Bill Sheehy "vegasbill"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and so far absolutely no problems. Works as advertised. Installation was easy if you follow directions. Really.

Reviews.Title: Have two of these so far
Reviews.Author: Jonathan L. Lopez
Reviews.Content: I have two of these so far I bought my first one about a year ago to mount a 46" Sharp LCD screen that is a little bulkier and heavier than the current HDTVs out there and it has not fallen,sagged, or moved since I've installed it.  I just recently bought another one for my living room plasma which is larger its the Panasonic VT60 60' if you aren't aware of that model it retails over $2000 and this stand is about $30 so just think about how highly I think about this mount that I'm willing to mount that expensive tv.  The instructions are easy to follow the packaging is meh, they also include an HDMI cable which I did not use but thats convenient to have.  Overall very impressed by it.  The finish is matted black but that won't matter since the TV will be covering it.  It's adjustable if you want the tv higher and have a nice tilt set. For this price you cannot find another mount that can get the job done.  Go to best buy just to get an idea of what other brands are charging for to do the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Product was as described
Reviews.Author: Shelly Jack
Reviews.Content: Holds the TV I purchase just where I want it.  I will purchase another unit when I get my big new TV

Reviews.Title: Missing parts
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: Judging based on previous reviews, this seems to be a common issue. When it arrived, I spent around 10 minutes trying to figure out exactly why it was not possible to assemble the whole thing - that's when I realized that, based on the images in the setup guide, I had been shipped three of the pieces that should have come (top left, bottom left, and bottom right) along with a second "top left" piece that had the connector piece on it, instead of receiving a "top right" piece with the connector on it.Have to return this and find an alternate mount.I would not have rated this 1 star except for the fact this is not an isolated incident - at least one other person reported this happening not once, but twice!

Reviews.Title: Very good product for the price
Reviews.Author: James N.
Reviews.Content: The price of this kit compared to what you would buy off the shelf in any store is great.  The HMDI cable while not very long is very robust and can be easily pulled through the wall to connect to a DVR in the cabinet below.  The installation was relatively easy.  The only big challenge is securing the set screws on the lower rail after hanging the TV.  They are relatively small and require a very long screw driver to reach up under the TV and secure them.

Reviews.Title: Annoying Joint in middle of mount
Reviews.Author: James Camastra
Reviews.Content: This mount comes in two pieces that when attached creates an obstacle for the hooks to lie on.  You can't place the bracket hooks on this part of the mount.  So, you are limited on where you can adjust the TV left to right on the mount.  Otherwise, the mount works and installs as indicated.  I decided to buy a different mount for my new TV.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy, difficult to install, and deceiving
Reviews.Author: TeddyCorduroy
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE! I bought this mount based on the reviews, but after reading more and more about this mount from more recent reviews I've realized I've been dooped! This model has been redesigned for the worse! If you read reviews from November 2013 and after, you'll see others have noticed the same thing. After I figured this out, I felt I had to investigate.Here's what has changed:The Wall Bracket has been redesigned to require assembly! It took me 20 minutes just to put the darn wall bracket together!- 10 screws, 6 different parts just in the wall bracket!!The metal is thinner and flimsy (I think) based on the reviews and the product weight change difference.- My question is, how can this be the same 165lb strong mount when the wall bracket is no longer one solid piece and the metal has been thinned out???Aside from the fact I was deceived, the installation was grueling and painful. Like I said, it took me 20 minutes just to put the wall bracket together, but the cheap hardware and poor instructions required a lot of trial and error to just get the right sizing for my 55" TV. And once installed, the crummy bubble level was not accurate and I had to adjust the angle to make sure it was level!Once I got my TV hanging from the wall, it seemed to hold but after further thought and second guessing, I took the TV down and bought a more reliable mount from the store. I couldn't trust this piece of junk with my TV. The one I purchased from Best Buy is much more robust and although it was priced a lot higher, it was worth the money for piece of mind.SHAME ON AMAZON AND CHEETAH FOR DECEIVING IT'S CUSTOMERS! DON'T BE DECEIVED. You get what you pay for....

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly for us
Reviews.Author: lzzrd
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a second option in case we didn't like the $99 one we bought with our TV.  The $99 one did not come with a handy level or HDMI cable, so I bought the cable as well.After looking at both sets, we chose to use the Cheetah Mount because it was just as sturdy as the $99 one and saved us almost $70.  It was relatively easy for my husband and son to install.  The tilt has to be established before you mount the TV permanently, but that's a minor thing, We used the tilt to prevent glare from our window.Anyway - we're quite happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good product, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Scott Reed
Reviews.Content: When I first received this product, one of the mounting hooks that hangs onto the wall mount was improperly manufactured (different hole pattern) and therefore would not align with the other 3 hooks. Cheetah Mounts told me to keep the one I had and sent me another free of charge, 2nd day air. Granted it was a little annoying to have to go through that process, but it's great to deal with customer service that is all about its customers.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy avoid at all costs
Reviews.Author: elizabeth vangard
Reviews.Content: Doable BUT Flimsy Had To Buy Some Extra Screws From Menards To Secure BUT NOT Sure If It Is Fully Secured .. Risky .. Avoid Buy More Expensive For peace of mind .. not recommend ed .. Also seller didn't send cheetah he substituted w/ a generic one

Reviews.Title: good but..
Reviews.Author: D. Marcoux
Reviews.Content: Okay this worked in the long run for my new Samsung 40 in 1080p 120Hz Smart LED TV, but…..even though it says it will fit this TV it was not adjustable enough and my handyman had to saw off the tops of the vertical mounts or would have been visible over the top.

Reviews.Title: Simple, functional and does the job.
Reviews.Author: Tony C
Reviews.Content: There are fancier wall mounts out there, and ones that might have thicker rails, but after you have enough structure to hold up your TV, what's the extra metal good for?If you want a simple, no-nonsense, get the job done and don't overcharge me experience, this is a good one to consider.  Just  a few parts, easy to assemble and comes with a nice HDMI cable.The only bad part of this is the "level", and I use that term only because I think that is what it is trying to pretend to be.  The one that I got was wildly not level. Even if it was reasonably good, it is too small to really use to level a long bracket like this, so plan on using a real level when you put this up.

Reviews.Title: Best wall mount I have used so far!
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Zickus
Reviews.Content: This wall mount from Cheetah Mounts is fantastic!  It arrived early and in great condition due to the good packaging from the manufacturer.  This mount came with bolts, screws, a mini-level for leveling the mount on the wall, and it even came with a hi quality HDMI cord that I used to route my TV to my receiver.  This product fits my TV very well and has no issues holding up my 60" Samsung LED LCD TV.  Works great and was a snap to mount.  I would highly recommend this product again and I may even buy one for my dad for fathers day this year!

Reviews.Title: Works well indeed!
Reviews.Author: Howard L. Gault
Reviews.Content: This bracket takes a moment to get your mind around, but it is just perfect in the bedroom.  Its tilt is just right for lounging in the chaise or on the bed with pillows.  It makes it easy on the neck and back.Mounting is an exercise in precision.  If you don't know how to locate the studs, layout proper positioning, achieve a level mount, drill the mounting holes in the center of the studs, and work off a ladder...well, it isn't for you.  Hire someone to mount it for you!!Either way, this is a very cost effective solution to a vexing problem at a VERY attractive price point!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't go wrong. Similar mounts go for $100 at Target. Save your money and get this quality mount

Reviews.Title: Cheap but effective
Reviews.Author: Kenneth D. Lee
Reviews.Content: Okay, instructions were not the best, but it works!  Holds up my Samsung 42 inch with no problem at all.  I had to move it to another room a month or so after installing it, that move took only a few minutes to successfully complete.  The price is right too.

Reviews.Title: Nice and sturdy - not too far off the wall
Reviews.Author: Matthew A. Schroeder
Reviews.Content: This item was more than enough to mount my 40" on the wall and the finished product looks great.  The assembly was a little challenging as the instructions were a little disjointed.  Be advised that you need a drill with metric drill bits as well as a ratchet set to mount into studs.  The studs in my wall happened to be 17.5" apart at the location of the mount and this product worked great.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine
Reviews.Author: Moni Oloyede
Reviews.Content: Meet all expectations. Simple to mount to the wall, Tv slide right on it. In fact it had way more screws and parts than we needed

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: carlson03
Reviews.Content: Not much to say other than my 60" LG Plasma Smart TV hasn't fallen off the wall in the last 5 months its been hanging there. The HDMI cable is decent quality and the level is handy for hanging the mount and other projects in the future.The quality of the mount felt a little cheaper compared to the other Cheetah mount I have, but once it is bolted to the wall, it felt solid.If i need another flush mount for my TVs, I will purchase a Cheetah again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Kotic83
Reviews.Content: Easy to put together, good quality, low price, and free 10 ft. HDMI cable made this a very easy purchase for me to make. It fit my 47" Sony perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Everything great, screws could be higher quality.
Reviews.Author: M C.
Reviews.Content: Installation of this thing was pretty easy even though the instructions had a couple typos as far as consistency of lettering the parts. The only thing that went wrong was that when we were screwing in the last screw into the wall, the head broke off while the rest of the screw was deeply rooted into the wall. We tried extracting it using an extractor bit but to no avail. The only thing I would say is that the screws could be higher quality because it did take a lot of work/hours to try extracting it, going to buy another screw/anchor, taking off the entire mount by unscrewing the 3 other screws, creating a new hole, remounting it with all 4 screws. If it were not for that problem, installation would have been a BREEZE!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount !
Reviews.Author: dam builder
Reviews.Content: Assembly was easy and the quality was good.  The space between the mounted TV and the wall is a bit limited, so securing the locking screws and switching plugs behind the TV is a bit challenging, but all wall mounts are like that.  No reflection on the Cheetah product as the Cheetah product has a hook system that allows for quick removal from the wall.Cant go wrong for this price !!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mount For the Price
Reviews.Author: Harry Singh
Reviews.Content: Let me begin by saying that I'm not experienced at all when it comes to installing any hardware of this sort for a home theater.Now that that's out of the way, I'd like to begin by saying that the mount itself is excellent and extremely easy to install. It took me about 20 minutes once I had all of the necessary items together. The mount came with all the hardware to install it (screws, bolts, etc.) however, it didn't come with drill bits, which would have made my life a whole lot easier. You need two different sizes of drill bits to install this, so make sure you have a set handy. Other than that, it's pretty great. The included HDMI cable is thick and braided, and it also comes with a mini LED flashlight, level, and screen cleaning cloth (that actually works exceptionally).

Reviews.Title: Solid, inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Matthew Toschlog
Reviews.Content: This mount was a great deal.  It was a lot cheaper than other mounts but seems sturdy and well built.  Instructions are clear and it comes with every possible piece of hardware you might need, organized in labeled packets.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: May have been good at one time, but...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: ...the best thing about this was the HDMI cable.  The level was off, not that any good DIYer would use it.  Install hardware is okay, not great, but no major issues. My biggest complaint here is the tilt mechanism.  It's terrible at best.  I'd recommend looking elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Nice product and follow up
Reviews.Author: cheapshopper
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered on time. It came with installation instructions and was easy to install. I had trouble adjusting the lower screws on the TV to get it complete the installation. The customer support folks followed up on a call to make sure there are no issues with installing, which was little surprising for me. All in all, great product.

Reviews.Title: Great quality cant beat the price.
Reviews.Author: Michael Simmons
Reviews.Content: Super good quality for the price. It was easy to install and set up by myself. I have a 55" tv and its perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Christian Camilo Castellanos
Reviews.Content: on time, really fast and perfect conditions, as same as seem, working really good, i love it, i recomend this product

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: This mount does it's job perfectly. The price is nice too! No need to go out and spend $80 for a mount that does the same job.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Ryan Hunten
Reviews.Content: Great tv mount, solidly built and easy to assemble. It is difficult to get tighten to bolt on the angle, but that is it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Branden
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to install and worked with my 65" Visio TV. There was one nut that was crossed threaded and I had to get a new one from the hardware store. Very solid and stable and I would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: V. Vargas
Reviews.Content: Easy to install works great the level really helps getting the job done right and fast and the cable a plus

Reviews.Title: Worked like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: I used this for three years in college and it worked great! It was a little confusing to put together. I actually put it upside down so I couldn't use the tilting feature, but I still loved it

Reviews.Title: Final set up not easy.
Reviews.Author: Hawk
Reviews.Content: Mounting the brackets on the wall and TV were a piece of cake (I have concrete block walls and had some drilling to do). This brackets fits very close to the wall when you hang the TV and there is little room to tighten the locking screws and insert the pins if you don't want the tilt. I am a do it yourself person with small hands. You will need extra long screw drivers. If your TV has any connections to the rear, make sure you plug them in before you mount the unit especially standard cable box connections.Took 15 minuties to install the brackets and nearly an hour to tighten the locking screws, insert the pins and get in the cable box cable.Will recommend similr brackets taht do not sit so close up to the wall or those with the X braces that move forward and back.

Reviews.Title: Perfect installation
Reviews.Author: PONYEXPRESS
Reviews.Content: This bracket was a quick painless installation for our new 55 inch flat screen Samsung UN55F6300It also came with a extra hdmi cord

Reviews.Title: Excellent and Simple
Reviews.Author: Igor Raspapanovichenvski
Reviews.Content: It fits tight to the wall and looks very nice.  I have for all my TV's now.  I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: K. Lyman
Reviews.Content: Not too difficult to install. It will hold most any TV within its range. It is what it is and only offer a small range of up/down variance. Not sure why they include the cable. Maybe they had some laying around and needed to get rid of them.

Reviews.Title: Really easy
Reviews.Author: J. Floor "Duke of Leyawin"
Reviews.Content: I have used other cheetah products and this one is no exception, very easy to install and mount the TV, feels very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: mims13
Reviews.Content: I guess for the price, it's ok. I was expecting something more sturdy, and pre built I originally purchased to mount a 60 inch but use it on my less expensive 40 inch just in case it breaks.

Reviews.Title: 60" TV Overwhelmed the Mount
Reviews.Author: johnnyg618
Reviews.Content: Due to the heighth of the 60" tv that I attached to the Cheetah mount, the frame of the tv extended too far below the mount itself.  This caused the tv to "bottom out" against the wall, thus not giving the horizontal tilt I wanted.  It is adequate.  I used spacers to move the mount out from the wall in order to give me more "tilt".Also, since I am using the maximum tilt I can get, 5 degrees, there is no clearance to get a screw driver in to the locking screws to secure the TV.It is, however, a very sturdy mount.  The HMIS cable is a good touch along with the level that comes with the unit.

Reviews.Title: very easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: lauren
Reviews.Content: it was pretty easy to assemble and hang on the wall, it holds my 40" very nicely and is very sturdy

Reviews.Title: A lot for the money.
Reviews.Author: Lawman
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for the price. Easy install, directions not even needed and hardware supplied is adequate to get the job done. Tilts at a nice angle and TV is very secure on this mount.If you want a lot of fancy this is not the mount for you. But if you are looking for a basic mount it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price!
Reviews.Author: Tee
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this tv mount to put an Emerson 39" flat screen on the wall of my bedroom. Shipping was fast and the installation was fairly easy. Product seems to be very good quality and so far it is doing what it is supposed to, holding my tv up on the wall! Don't know how I went so long without it! No problems with it whatsoever!

Reviews.Title: Hangs TV's like a boss
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This thing takes about 10 minutes to setup and have mounted on the wall. When I first took it out of the package, I was a little skeptical of the quality. But after I mounted it to the wall and did a few pull ups on it I was sold. This thing isn't going anywhere. We hung three TV's in the house and it worked with all of them (2 LG and Sharp). I had to run out and buy toggle bolts for over the fireplace because the stud spacing was too far, but other then that I didn't need to buy any extra pieces. I did not expect toggle bolts would come with this. For the price, you cannot beat this. We got three for the price of the ONE we saw locally.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Great price
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: This mount is a fantastic bargain.  It's a great price and the added hdmi cable and level only add to the quality of the purchase.  I would definitely recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: great great great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Stacey Rix
Reviews.Content: I was expecting to have to return it because i did my result and the prices were much more... this caught my eye so I gave it a shot. But it is a Very good quality and great price. I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Debra Kauffman
Reviews.Content: I was really impressed with the response that I got when filling in a feedback on this product. I didn't ask for anything, and I had commented that my cable was broken, the company immediately contacted me and offered to replace the cable or refund me. Really took pride in their product and ensuring I was a happy customer.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Reviews.Title: Not a universal mount
Reviews.Author: Brenda Rutledge
Reviews.Content: Will not hold a 50" TV, will hold a 36".  Ordered but will need to purchase an additional mount in the future.

Reviews.Title: Overall good product
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: Over all its a good product, the only bad thing are the instructions. They are not clear. Pieces are not labeled. Tough and time consuming.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: DIYDanielle "DIYDanielle"
Reviews.Content: This set came with a few nice little extras that weren't necessary (ie. keychain with flashlight, level, cable, wipe for tv screen), but were nice. The wall mount itself seems like it's working fine... my husband put it together. He said the only issue he had was that once he'd mounted the tv he had trouble tightening the screws on the bottom because the tv was in the way. The tv is very close to the wall (low profile) which is why it's hard to get to the screws... I like the look of this a lot because it's further away from my son's fingers and we could mount it low enough for my son to see it okay while still leaving room in front of it on the stand (it's mounted right over the countertop on our built-in entertainment center) to put our other electronics, ie. sensors for video game systems.UPDATE: I am changing my rating to 5 stars because the company saw my 4 star review and immediately emailed, responding to the issues with the screws, stated they were working to fix the problem, and offered a couple options for resolving the problem. The item may have slight issues, but whenever I get great customer service that I'm not even asking for, I think they get extra bonus points. I wish I got this good of customer service in other businesses.Here's their comments about the lower screws: "In regards to the safety screws, we are aware of the issue in reaching them, and are quickly working to remedy this situation for future mounts. The safety screws are an additional feature, mainly for customers who live in earthquake prone zones or have small children. However, not using them does not affect the stability or safety of the mount itself."

Reviews.Title: Need another one!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Scott
Reviews.Content: Great mount, will order another one for my daughter's room. Easy instruction, easy installation and it came with hdmi cable, 2 levels and all the hardware. I mounted a 51 inch Samsung plasma tv. The mount is sturdy as a rock. I'll get another one for my daughter's room.

Reviews.Title: Update: Amazing customer service
Reviews.Author: Jusitn A. Watts "Maverick9614"
Reviews.Content: I was able to assemble the mount and place my TV on it within about an hour.Pro's:Easy to placeEasy to mount to TVEasy to mount to wallAllows about 4-6" of lateral movement without having to drill new holes.Came with all the hardware needed.Con's:The tilt is only adjustable with a screwdriver and drifts with a heavy TV. Update: A little bit of Lok-Tite (purple or blue)will fix this.If it were about 4" longer it could have spanned three studs instead of just 2.The parts "feel" flimsy. Whether they are or not is to be determined, but it is holding up my 75lbs TV just fine.(Update: Still holding the TV just fine.)Update:I received a call from this company's customer service inquiring about some of the con's I had listed. This has never happened with any other product I have reviewed on Amazon. They discussed some of the company's reasons for using lighter metals and offered me a $7 rebate for not being happy. They elaborated on their warranty and I would definitely do business with this company again.

Reviews.Title: 55" tv
Reviews.Author: AielloBaseball
Reviews.Content: mounted a 55" tv with this. no issues at all after 2 months. very stable mount. great deal too, saving hundreds from buying one through best buy

Reviews.Title: Difficult to Hang
Reviews.Author: Jillian M.
Reviews.Content: If you are hanging this above your mantle, you may want to go with a mount that only has one bracket. This was difficult to hang "straight" since our mantle is not "straight". We also live in a 100 yr old house so I doubt anything is straight or level. Could probably find an easier/better quality bracket on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Overall great purchase
Reviews.Author: Randy Thomas
Reviews.Content: Great Wall mount. The only this that takes one star away from this is that you have to assemble the mount. And after hanging the TV on the mount, it is hard to get to the screws for tightening of the TV brackets so the TV won't come off of the mount

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Marc Calderone
Reviews.Content: I can't complain for the price, but it's not as sturdy as some more expensive options.  It's good enough though.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price but
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Brown
Reviews.Content: Directions and putting together was easy.  Installing on the wall was easy as well as hanging the TV.  The only bad thing is that it puts the TV so close to the wall you would need to hook all wires up first because you can't put your hand behind the TV after hanging it on the wall.

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: jacqui thompson
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mounts works gret ,no problem puttng up on the wall or the monunt on back of tv..... in fact young grandson installed n all. Now will be ordering the shelf.

Reviews.Title: Need better directions
Reviews.Author: Charles F. Vento
Reviews.Content: The mount, once we figured it out, was easy to put up, but the directions were at bit confusing or lacked follow through.  I'm sure you can get those folks in China to print them out for ya.

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: Steven T. "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this mount for my grandson's flat screen.  It mounts on his wall nicely thus cleaning off his chest of drawers.  He loves it and so do I.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Sturdy Mount
Reviews.Author: b.g.
Reviews.Content: We were definitely hesitant to buy something so "cheap" in terms of price. We have a 47" TV and we were mounting on a stone fireplace in a new house. We are so conditioned to seeing mounts in excess of a hundred, so this was surprisingly affordable compared to the major big box retailers.When we received it, it looked to be pretty sturdy in materials, but I decided I wanted to have some larger bolts actually attach to the stone. We got some lag bolts and washers at HD and used those in place of the provided hardware (for cents) and I felt much more confident in the ability to hold. My only complaint is that when they say flush... it really is flush! Because it's on a stone fireplace, we have trouble getting our hand behind the TV to hook up cables, power, etc. This should all definitely be done BEFORE you attach the TV to the mount. If you're on a flat surface (drywall) however, this may not be an issue. Other than that, I love how close it sits to the wall and we were able to get it at the perfect viewing angle.Don't let the low price fool you - this is literally the same style and type of all the other TV mounts, you just aren't paying for retail space, fancy packaging or overly instructive instructions.

Reviews.Title: Worked as advertised - tough to adjust
Reviews.Author: Rusty_In_OR
Reviews.Content: Everything on this worked generally OK, but the design is very tough in the final adjustments.  Here's my issue ... if you want to take advantage of the down-angle, you have to wait until after the TV is hanging because you can't hang it with the angle in place, or with the bottom set-screws tightened.  So then you hang the TV flat, the screws on the sides to tighten the angle are 'very hard' to reach, and the set screws on the bottom once the TV is at an angle are "pretty much impossible" to get to.  So you have the choice of hanging the TV flat against the wall with nice tight set-screws, or hanging the TV on a down-angle, knowing that if you have an earthquake, your TV will likely end up on the floor.  Love the product, but I often wonder if people that design these things, have ever actually used them.  BTW ... we opted for 'hang at an angle - hope there aren't any earthquakes'.  If I could do it over again, I'd probably buy the one with the 'arm' that give you space to adjust anything you need to adjust.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: drejer
Reviews.Content: I had my contractor install it and it works well.  I haven't had to adjust it.  Good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and It works
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This mount is cheap for a reason. But it DOES WORK as intended. From an engineering standpoint, it does the job just fine. It is being used right now to hold my Vizio 55" on a wall. The metal is thin, but strong where it needs to be. This is noticed when you attempt to slide the tv from left to right. If you need to do this, I recommend slightly lifting the TV to take the weight off of the rack when sliding. You can pay more for a higher quality mount but I feel they are sometimes overkill. I would probably not want this on a heavier TV such as a plasma.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Amit Patel "itismeap"
Reviews.Content: For the price this mount sells at, it is worth more than 5 stars.  There are some things to watch out for, but again at the price point it is at there isn't much you can complain about.  I used it to hang up a 60" Vizio tv.  The mount comes in several pieces which need to be put together (which is trivial).  If you have any large TV then you may hard time reaching the slide lock screws at the bottom of the tv bracket.  Since the TV is mounted high up, this isn't an issue for me, but it may be for anyone wanting to hang it up at height a child can reach it.  It comes with all the screws, washers that are needed.

Reviews.Title: Very secure and fit the TV perfectly
Reviews.Author: Drue
Reviews.Content: The only drawback to this design is the last stage of mounting the TV.  The two brackets that mount on the TV and get hung onto the wall-mount after installation have a screw at the base used to secure the whole thing in place.  Unfortunately, with my 40-inch TV and at the angle the base of the TV hangs against the wall, these screws are almost impossible to reach.  With a couple of extensions and grinding my knuckles against the plaster wall, I was able to secure them but I am not looking forward to having to remove them soon to add a wire through the wall. Perhaps a long mechanics style screwdriver needs to come with the unit or the manufacturer can come up with some other way to secure the bottom connector (might I suggest some sort of spring-action release that extends upward where there is easier access for normal sized hands?).

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Josh Collier
Reviews.Content: A great mount for a great price!  It was fairly simple to put together and my only issue was getting the TV perfeclyt level.  The leveler showed perfect but was still a little off.  Other than that I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: absolutely amazing!
Reviews.Author: Milo Mendes
Reviews.Content: this is one of the best kits i have ever bought. it has everything that you can imagine. from different size screws to washers. it was very simply and easy to use. i am very satisfied with the results.

Reviews.Title: as advised
Reviews.Author: servant
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed and reasonably priced. This tv mount was easy to install and included Ann HDMI cord. Shipped fast with prime.

Reviews.Title: Great tv mount
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I've had this mount for a couple of months already and I have not one complain about it. Easy to install, supports my tv well, It's definitely worth it. Plus the hdmi cable is like a big bonus.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount.
Reviews.Author: F. Apoderado
Reviews.Content: Multi-piece design prevents me from using my level properly and the bottom screws require a very long screwdriver to reach. Otherwise a good, affordable tv mount. The TV hugs the wall and is sturdy enough to hold my heavy 46" Sony.- Update -The seller SPN Performance followed-up on my order and offered to replace with a better mount free of charge. Great service from the seller!

Reviews.Title: sturdy mount
Reviews.Author: Carrie A. Hodges "my5walnuts"
Reviews.Content: This mounting unit for my flat screen was simple to hang and is very sturdy. You can adjust up and down as well as swivel up and down.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: Kranders
Reviews.Content: Wow I can't believe the cost of this mount is so low! It's a great product. Easy to install and is holding our TV up great. I like that it tilts and comes with a HDMI cord. I'm amazed.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount Low price
Reviews.Author: LongTallDog
Reviews.Content: Nice mount. Easy to assemble. Anchors and lags included. The only minus is the powder coating on the screws. It's makes it difficult to thread some of them. Over all, a good product.

Reviews.Title: Plenty of spare parts... just the wrong size
Reviews.Author: Paul P. Eggers
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that this is a "universal" wall mount and includes lots of different sizes of bolts, it would have been nice if the bolts were the correct length.  The smaller the diameter of the bolt, the shorter it got.  I needed the smallest bolt, but it was so short, it wouldn't even touch the threads in the back of the TV by the time it went through 2 washers and the frame supports.  I had to run to a local hardware store and pick up the correct size bolt.Other than that, I thought it was a good set.  The bubble level and HDMI cable were a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again
Reviews.Author: Moquito
Reviews.Content: The mount was easily assembled and places on an apartment wall. Additionally, the package came with nice additions like an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Looks to small for a 55"
Reviews.Author: Beau
Reviews.Content: When i put this together it looked flimsy. Once it was placed on the wall i was a tad worried it wouldn't hold my 55" vizio. I was wrong when you bolt it to the wall and hang the TV it was very sturdy. Also, the HDMI cable(that comes with it) is a nice add on for this item. The cable is 8' long which was nice since i was going to us it for my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Debbie West
Reviews.Content: For the price, this Cheetah Flush Tilt wall mount is great.  It was fairly easy to install and has just the right amount of tilt to make viewing our 55" flat screen TV perfect.  We looked for a while to find a wall mount that would help us secure our TV without breaking the bank.  This wall mount is of good quality and did exactly what we needed it to -- get our top heavy TV off the cabinet it was on, so that it could not be tipped over by our grandchild.  For less than $30, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Why are other brackets so expensive?
Reviews.Author: esm
Reviews.Content: I was a little leery of the low price of this mount, but needn't have worried.  It's very solid, plenty strong for my 60" LED.  I didn't think much about the included extras, but they turned out to be surprisingly helpful.  I needed the 10-foot HDMI cable to reach my receiver, and this one worked great.  Surprisingly, the cable solved an hdcp handshake problem I was having, so I'm happy with the quality.  The little key-ring flashlight -- which I laughed at as being gimmicky -- was also handy as I poked around the back of my cabinet making new hookups.  Nice touch.  Instructions are a little sparse, but ultimately not that hard to figure out.  All-in-all it's great, and especially a great value.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great except...
Reviews.Author: C. Baker "Ilektriksky"
Reviews.Content: Subject says it all.  Was able to mount a 65" sharp by myself with this.  The only exception and reason for a star loss is that with a large tv on it there not enough room to be able to access the 'anchor' screws that secure the tv mount to the bottom rail.

Reviews.Title: Received as scheduled
Reviews.Author: David H. Baum
Reviews.Content: I don't know about its functionality as i have not installed it yet. I do not foresee any problems given its instructions (thank you) and its construction. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Frederick P Davis
Reviews.Content: I mounted my new 55" Samsung UN55H6350 on the wall with no problem. Did have to buy 2 washers each for mounting the brackets to the back of the TV, the bolts when seated in the TV had too much space to hold the bracket tight. At first you'll think it can't do the job, just seems too light weight, but it does a great job and the price sure was right. I highly recommend the product. Be sure to attach all your cables before you hang the TV, especially the power cord and coaxial cable, cause you won't have room to get your hands behind it when mounted.

Reviews.Title: Great Low Profile Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I have had two of these mounts for over three years on a 50" LCD TV.  Properly installed they hold a lot of weight, including my 190lb frame when I held myself on it for about 15 seconds to test it after installation.  It installs easily, lasts a long time and works great.Maybe the only drawback to it is because it is such a low profile, sometimes I have to remove one side of the TV to hook up new cables.  Some would consider that a drawback, I don't mind having to do that once in a while to keep a clean look.  It wouldn't be an issue with some TV's, only TV's with connections in the back, not the side.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up and easy adjustment.
Reviews.Author: The Croatian Sensation
Reviews.Content: This is the best wall mount I have seen, especially considering the price. It is simple and easy to set up and install. It fit my 42" HDTV perfectly.

Reviews.Title: good price / easy assembly / solid construction
Reviews.Author: EURO REVIEW
Reviews.Content: As the title says I was pleased with the price the most... I am using it for a 32" LCD.The assembly was easy enough for a one hour job and the construction seems to be solid.The TV is on it since 6 month now... and has not fallen down yet... so it is doing it's job.I can't say anything about the quality of the provided cable but it seems to be good quality. The included level though you better not use... It is not long enough to give you a reliable reading to see if the mount is leveled....

Reviews.Title: Good product would by from this supplier again
Reviews.Author: DIYer
Reviews.Content: Product was shipped on time and packaged well. Came with all the goodies to mount my 42in plasma. The extra long HDMI cable was a nice added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad TV mount for the money but fit against wall is a bit on the tight side.
Reviews.Author: Al in OKC
Reviews.Content: For the money this was an OK purchase to use in daughters room . Very little room to attach cables once TV is mounted.

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: Scott Vittum
Reviews.Content: The only way it wouldn't work is if I were to install it the wrong way or I installed it badly, and I didn't.

Reviews.Title: Mount worked well
Reviews.Author: Teri Melvin
Reviews.Content: Easy to install - I had one issue with a tightening screw and had to re-thread it.  Overall happy I purchased it.Update:  I got a call from the company - and to my surprise they had read the review!  Wanted to apoloagize for the defect - which was really not that big of a deal - and I was able to easily fix it.  They made it right - and I was definitely impressed with the TRUE Customer Service.

Reviews.Title: Product Good, Directions Bad
Reviews.Author: Michael Smith
Reviews.Content: The directions were not the best I have ever seen. The parts were not labeled and the instructions were just pictures. However, once I jumped that little hurdle, the rest went very well. My TV is still on the wall and I have not had a single problem. Good product, poor directions.

Reviews.Title: Easy!
Reviews.Author: BG1234567890
Reviews.Content: All the reviews are correct.  It comes with hardware for nearly every scenario of TV made.  I had reservations on whether or not I could install it on my own.  I did and it is SO awesome.  Sturdy with great instruction.  Will probably get one or two more to mount the rest of my tv's since it is so easy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount for the right price
Reviews.Author: Douglas Weaver
Reviews.Content: I used this mount for my Vizio 55" M series TV.  It was easy to put together and mounted perfectly on my wall.There is no use paying big $$$ on a mount from a big box store; this mount works perfectly and costs less than half the price of other brands.  I would recommend using a larger level when mounting to the wall.  Also, if you use the tilt feature you will need a long screw driver to secure the TV brackets to the mount.  I highly recommend Cheetah Mounts to anyone looking.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install and hangs my TV perfect.
Reviews.Author: James Harris
Reviews.Content: This was easy to install.  Tip for those who purchase this, you may need a 10-12" Phillips head screwdriver to tighten the the lower security screws.

Reviews.Title: Good mount but beware.
Reviews.Author: Michael Geier
Reviews.Content: This mount is good but beware.This mount is so flush to the wall that any outlets that may be installed behind it to plug in the TV won't work.Also, HDMI or any other cables that plug into your TV may be a tight fit.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt (1.3" Profile) TV Wall Mount Bracket
Reviews.Author: ronjon
Reviews.Content: This unit works well with my Samsung TV and is easy to install.  I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nicely Made - but not quite perfect for new Samsung 6350-40"
Reviews.Author: Kevin Strel
Reviews.Content: It's a great mount - recommended!  The steel is robust, and the TV fits very closely to the wall.  It assembles quite easily.  Some small caveats:1) On the latest Samsung 6350 40-Inch, the two vertical bars protrude an inch above the set.2) You should order an extra long #2 phillips screwdriver - at least 20-Inches, like item  B0037GU9UU on Amazon.  You will need it to secure the two safety screws on the bottom.3) It's nice they included the level - but if you already own a longer, more precise level, use it instead.4) I like the braided HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Herv
Reviews.Content: This device did what it is supposed to do. It hold my 46" Sony Bravia in place above my fireplace and it is invisible. Sturdy metal & well built easy to put together also.

Reviews.Title: nice mount
Reviews.Author: cabinetman
Reviews.Content: Worst part was the directions to assemble the mount , once I figured that part out was a piece of cake. Works great and didn't break the bank

Reviews.Title: Worked well for our LCD
Reviews.Author: David Paap
Reviews.Content: This mount was fairly easy to install with one exception: getting to the screw to lock it all down. There are two screws that keep the TV from tilting. Loosen these screws and you can (depending on your inputs) plug and unplug whatever you need. The screws require a really long screw driver and lots of patience. However, if you are like me and do not tinker much once everything is set up, the minor inconvenience is not a big deal - once it is installed. It is a solid mount and we have had no problems over the past year.

Reviews.Title: Easy, solid, great price
Reviews.Author: Jeremy R.
Reviews.Content: Easy. Seems flimsy but really it's solid. Follow the directions and you'll be good to go. It's almost free compared to store prices. :)

Reviews.Title: Cheapish
Reviews.Author: Bob "I wish I had a pair of Bongos"
Reviews.Content: It is OK, it is cheaply made which is OK for the price.  I would like to see the lock screws done so they were easier to deal with once the TV is mounted.  40" Samsung Slim LED mounted.

Reviews.Title: smh
Reviews.Author: Durrell Jones
Reviews.Content: Had to put mount together. And it didn't tilt as stated. And I can't crew the security screws in the back

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: tiffany sherfield
Reviews.Content: This was my first time looking for and purchasing a tv mount and its great. My boyfriend had little trouble putting it together, plus it came with a free hdmi cord! Gotta  Love that!

Reviews.Title: Good Product. Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Nani
Reviews.Content: installed it to mount a 55 inch Vizio LED on top of the fireplace. Well made product and comes with different sizes of nuts for several tv manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Cory McGraw
Reviews.Content: I didn't install the mount myself but I'm happy with the stability and slim design of the mount. The level leaves something to be desired.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!! A must buy
Reviews.Author: Jason Burgess
Reviews.Content: I have a 42 inch LG tv. It holds it just right.It took me about 1.5 hours to install the mount, was simple, faiirrly straight forward. The step that takes the longest is finding the studs in the wall. The packaging is nice and it comes with exactly what it says. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: joseluis
Reviews.Content: good for the price but I didn't trust with my 2,000 tv  100lbs I end up buying a branded stronger one

Reviews.Title: somewhat dissapointed
Reviews.Author: craig sallee
Reviews.Content: Once the TV is mounted you cannot adjust the tilt without taking the TV down again.  Also, the initial assembly is kind of confusingbut once that hurdle is cleared the remainder is a snap.

Reviews.Title: I bought this for the office, and it works perfectly for the 42 inch tv we have for presentations to our salespeople.
Reviews.Author: Toby White
Reviews.Content: shipped quickly and half the price of the big box stores in our area.simple instructions made the mount easy to hang.

Reviews.Title: Great price and product
Reviews.Author: memoRex1
Reviews.Content: Mounted my 65inch Sony on this and it all works good. Sturdy enough and the free items are good. Awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install... works great
Reviews.Author: Will T.
Reviews.Content: Pretty standard wall mount. The install was easy... The HDMI cable added was convenient as well. Great product. Will order this again if I have another TV to mount.

Reviews.Title: Strong but light
Reviews.Author: Betsi Campbell
Reviews.Content: This was a breeze to install, is not noticeable and does everything you want a wall mount to do. You can tilt or turn the TV anywhere you want.

Reviews.Title: easy to put together
Reviews.Author: Joeythehamster
Reviews.Content: little hard to hang a 65" tv by yourself but i was able to do it.Make sure and plug in all your cables to your tv before hanging it as it is a little tough to get your hands back behind it once the tv is mounted.

Reviews.Title: Tricky to mount on an exact level
Reviews.Author: Jared C
Reviews.Content: Great value and my 60" Visio TV fits this mount nicely. The bolts provided fastened to the wall studs nicely. The real trick is leveling the mount. The provided bubble level sucks so use a proper, carpenter quality level will spare you some stress.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: rbrb22
Reviews.Content: Product worked perfectly. Easy set up and instructions to follow. Packaging was perfect. Price was perfect. Arrived on day promised. Did I say it worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount. Easy assembly.
Reviews.Author: Nathan Dyer
Reviews.Content: If you want your TV tight against the wall, this is the mount!The assembly is pretty self explanatory and minimal tools needed.I love how close to the wall it puts the TV, but that's the only draw back, too.Make sure you attach all necessary cables to the TV first BEFORE mounting it on wall.You basically have to take the TV off to change anything (depending on TV).Currently, tightening the secure screws to keep it in the  upright position may be hard to reach, but Cheetah is working to improve the versatility of this product even more down the road. Can't wait to see what they come out with next!!

Reviews.Title: 42" LG TV
Reviews.Author: Shiznit
Reviews.Content: held up my 42" LG TV no problem, it swivels slightly and even came with an HDMI cable and level for installation. the only other thing you need to get this installed is a stud finder and a ratcheting wrench. Dont mount it to dry wall, and if you do, dont blame the product when your tv comes crashing down.

Reviews.Title: Love Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: LSB
Reviews.Content: We have had great experience with all of our Cheetah Mounts products.  This is our 4th one.  It definitely takes 2 people to install this mount, but the directions were pretty straight forward.  We had no problems at all have been very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and it works!
Reviews.Author: IndyTom
Reviews.Content: This was way cheaper than what my local stores offered. I had it up and the TV on it within 30 min of unboxing. It is in multiple pieces but once you get it all bolted together it is very sturdy. I have a 60" LED TV hanging off of it and it doesn't move in the least. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and put together. When I received it it was in a small box and I was a little skeptic, but once I put it together it was solid and very durable. Would definitely get another one to put in another room. Great product. Instructions were very simple as well.

Reviews.Title: Buy this pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: B. Nguyen "Yes?"
Reviews.Content: Hold my 46" Sony LCD perfectly. Nice versa mount and can hold a lot of weight. Make sure you take your time mounting it properly! Follow the provided instruction.

Reviews.Title: Great item, and the company seems to actually care
Reviews.Author: Sultana
Reviews.Content: It came together easily and supports my 40" tv without a care. Sounds like it's a slightly different construction than it started out as (pieces to put together vs. solid pieces), but it's not a problem at all (hey, it happens in manufacturing), *and* held my tv during the quakes we've had (March-April, Southern CA). Add to this the company puts in the effort to make certain that the customer is pleased with the product and the purchase experience. With this very low price, I genuinely hope the company is not pricing themselves out of business. I would def. buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Solid!
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Osborn
Reviews.Content: This is a very solid TV mount! It was very easy to mount to my wall and the leveler that was included worked perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Warranty does NOT cover whatevers on it!
Reviews.Author: Tom Slade
Reviews.Content: This may be obvious to others but the warranty only covers the mount.  If your $2000 TV falls of the wall because this $25 mount breaks, you only get another $25 mount.  I think they should be more clear about that..."LIFETIME 100% GUARANTEEIf ANYTHING is wrong with your mount, please contact the Manufacturer. Your mount has a lifetime guarantee."... if this thing ruins my TV, which I can pretty well assume is more expensive than the mount, the last thing I want is another one of them.

Reviews.Title: Worked Good for Me
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This product was very easy to put together.  It does come in a very small box, so I was kind of nervous, however I got over that when I was putting it together and saw how strong it was.  For the price of it, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install but hard to access connection ports once installed
Reviews.Author: susheel
Reviews.Content: I got this mount after looking at the reviews as well as the price all the mounts available online. product review showed 4.5 star and was coming at a very decent price, so I decided to go with this mount.Frame was fair easy to assemble. Then came to know that I need a stud locator for finding the stud inside the drywall. Luckily I found couple of youtube videos on stud finder using a magnet and hearing the sound of knocking the drywall. Made couple of holes before finding the actual center of the stud. Then it was just matter of time to drill holes and install the frame using the screw provided with the kit. It was very easy to install the mount and frame looked very sturdy. Installed hangers on 60" Vizio e601i-a3. Kit provided most of the hardware for various size of TV's. Till now I was working alone.Then I need to install my 60" Vizio on the mounts, which was impossible to do alone so I asked my wife to give a hand. One mistake I did was not to install the HDMI/audio/video cable before mounting TV on the wall. It is really hard to reach cable ports or get view of the text shown for ports. (I should have been a picture before hanging the TV, So I would recommend everyone to take a picture or else install all the cables before hanging the TV to the mount).Now the actual trouble starts, once TV was hanged I was unable to see the back of the TV and had tough time adding cables. When you tilt TV upward to add cables and to do this bottom screws of hanger need to be unscrewed to some extent and its hard to get to these screws due to minimum access and after tilting TV upward it just hangs on the top hook of the hangers (I was always worrying of TV may fall down any time). But I managed to add 2 HDMI cables to side ports and plan to add remaining cables when I take off the TV some time in future. But it will be impossible to tighten the bottom screws of the hangers, may be I need long long screw driver to reach it.So would like to give a 2 star overall.Pros:TV sticks very close to the wall.Sturdy frame for the price I paid ($30).Cons:Design should be improved to get the access to cable ports and bottom screws of the hangers.Improvement need on tilt functionality.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly and should perform as needed. I'm not planning to change the angle of the set once its installed, As a habit, I usually upgrade the bolts that come with these kits - not that they've proven to be insufficient - just added peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: great!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: could use a little bit clearer pictures in the instructions.  Otherwise, I never see it cause it is doing its job

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: Shedrick Mask
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product based off of previous reviews and even used the tip of using the small bubble level instead of the larger one.Didn't have too much trouble putting it together but can say be careful to not over tighten the screws and I do wish there was a better way to identify which bolts go to which washer etc, it would've saved me some time but I eventually figured it out. The supplied HDMI cable also came in handy after I realized all my previous cables weren't long enough.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: runaroundsue
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase!  We ended up buying 2 more because the are easy to install and work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Ok mount....
Reviews.Author: christopher l. courtright
Reviews.Content: Used this mount to hang a LG 42" flat screen on the wall. Mounted in nothing flat BUT (and this is a big BUT) the clearance between the wall and the mount is very very narrow. SO if your TV has it's connections on the back i would look elsewhere. If they are on the side....it will work perfect.

Reviews.Title: Perfect !! Works Great with new  55" TV
Reviews.Author: Vicki Butcher
Reviews.Content: Used this mount with 55" TV works Great nice and Sturdy and very nicely priced !!! Saved a lot of money compared to large dept store price !!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and built well.
Reviews.Author: Qbird
Reviews.Content: I read other reviews saying this was built poorly, but ours isn't! It's strong as can be. It took us like 10 minutes to put this up. My advice, get a Stud Finder. We have metal studs, just so you know, this works fine on them. So happy to have the TV mounted!

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend it easy to install and put up
Reviews.Author: troy Ropelato
Reviews.Content: worked perfect. Found the studs put it on the wall out of the dresser fit to TV perfect love it

Reviews.Title: It works..
Reviews.Author: Michelle D
Reviews.Content: I choose this because I already have one on my other tv.I does what it is supposed to do. The tv is still on the wall so I guess it works just fine. If it was not on the wall anymore this rating would probably be 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Almost 5
Reviews.Author: stmty9
Reviews.Content: The ONLY reason this is not a 5, is that it had 2 of 1 part, and 0 of another. The top rail and the bottom rail are comprised of 2 pieces each, all of which are different. Our box was packed with a mismatch. Luckily, we were able to drill some extra holes into the extra rail to make it similar to the missing piece.Had my tv been a brad new 60" 3d smart tv (instead of a 4yr old ~38" brick), I probably would have had them send a replacement piece. However, it has been up for well over a month now, and we have had no issues. the included level is very handy.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRICE and QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Love Amazon
