Reviews.Content: This item is going to Mexico with my husband and I to hang a 52" flat screen TV. We haven't moved yet so I can't attest to its functionality. But other reviews raved about it so I bought it

Reviews.Title: decent but not 1st choice
Reviews.Author: Luv Amazon "DC Amazon Shopper"
Reviews.Content: Poor instructions. Metal seems cheap and not best quality. Not comfortable with it holding my 60" Vizio. Will order different mount and return this one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the mount.  Instructions were easy to understand. Very easy to install.  Used to baby-proof our Tv

Reviews.Title: Solid Construction, could use a little better instructions
Reviews.Author: Dave H
Reviews.Content: The frame is very solid steel, and I have no doubt that it will hold my TV securely (42" LG LCD). The included HDMI cable is a welcome accessory. My only complaint is with the instructions, they are a little vague in some spots but it did not take me long to put it together or get it securely mounted to the wall. A stud finder is a must!You will need a small ratchet to assemble the frame (8mm socket, if memory serves) along with a phillips screwdriver. The brackets that bolt to the back of the TV can adjust for up to 15 degrees of tilt, but the screws were ridiculously tight out of the package.You will need a drill with different bit sizes to drill into the studs for the included bolts, along with a larger socket set to bolt them securely to the wall.After the frame is mounted, the brackets on the TV allow you to simply lift and hook it over the wall frame. Even once the TV is up, it is easy to adjust it to the left or right a bit to center if you are slightly off.The final unit is very low profile against the wall. I have seen others where the cable box can get mounted behind the TV, I don't see it being possible with this mount, the wires going into the back have just enough room. So you'll need something to set your other electronics on.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, effective, practical, minimalist design
Reviews.Author: Vivian
Reviews.Content: ..though it packs in the punch where required. That is, it can easily carry the load it is rated for. Just make sure you drill into the studs for the screws. The tilt feature is great too.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price, Poor Documentation
Reviews.Author: R. Krikorian
Reviews.Content: Why is it that even good companies seem to provide poor quality documentation.  Modern digital photo technology makes it a simple process to include hi-res photographs of the actual installation process instead of unclear, detail-obscured line drawings with small, hard to read print.  No matter, I'm not supposed to be rating the documentation, just the product, itself, and that definitely gets 5 stars.  Works great, easy to install and can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Amjid
Reviews.Content: Wonderful item easy to install, strong heavy duty material. I had no problem installing it, I am very happy buying it. It arrived on time with a long very good HDMI cable. Seems like very honest business people who are making it and selling it through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Edward Blair Morris
Reviews.Content: Seriously, it's a solid wall mount, well built, and insanely cheap. PLUS you get a free HDMI cable? Sold. Don't waste money on other mounts if all you want is a flush mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Great Price
Reviews.Author: stnlsman
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this product. The task is not easy but with the supporting tools and good instructions, was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Solid & Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Cardinal
Reviews.Content: The mount was quick and easy to install.  Our 50" tv feels solidly mounted to the wall.  The only negative I have would be the difficulty in tightening the screws that secure the tv to the mount.

Reviews.Title: Oops corrected quickly for a great product
Reviews.Author: T. Huycke-Phillips "tonnerrebird"
Reviews.Content: We were a little dismayed when we found out we had two of one part, and were missing another. I emailed Cheetah Mounts directly that night, and they responded the next day, and shipped the correct part the day after, a Friday. Estimated delivery was the following Tuesday, and it arrived a day early. Easy to install and works great with our 42" Sony LCD.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: bought this to mount up a new 60 inch TV.Pros:works great, sturdy just make sure you screw it into your studs (if you don't know what that is don't mount it yourself), cant beat the price ($25), the HDMI cable that came with it is probably worth the $25, the level was a cheep one time use just in case you didn't have one.Cons:kind of a puzzler to put together, to secure the bottom screws when the TV is mounted you need a long (about a foot to a foot and a half) screw driver or multiple bit attachments to get to it.

Reviews.Title: Good but......
Reviews.Author: Tomicka Madison
Reviews.Content: Mount and directions were easy to understand. However, the cord has a minor short in it and you have to position it just the right way to get it to work.  I didn't bother returning it because the TV was on the wall and even with bad cord still a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Came just in time
Reviews.Author: cheryl ward
Reviews.Content: I love my Cheetah wall mounts, its perfect and come just in time to setup my wonderful 47 inch Vizio, and so easy to assemble.  Great product thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great product, amazing price.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Placebo
Reviews.Content: This mount is ridiculously easy to put together and install, and the price is unbelievable.  To ensure that it will fit almost any TV, it comes with a bunch of spare parts.  And the step-by-step instructions are very clear and precise.  I cannot comment on durability, as I just bought this item, but I'm totally impressed so far.

Reviews.Title: Finally
Reviews.Author: Biancontrol
Reviews.Content: I was finally able to put the mount up--It's a great product for the price and the HDMI cable is awesome as well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv bracket for price!
Reviews.Author: Lio
Reviews.Content: Great product! Came fast! Super easy instructions. They give you different screw sizes incase you have a range of different size tv flats! Only down fall is that the bars are not labeled with the corresponding letters on the manual but you can kinda of figure out which parts are which. Other than that, great product all around! Do recommend! A-

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Richard Constant
Reviews.Content: We are using the mount for a monitor at a trade show, its work very well. Thanks for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great mount, and...
Reviews.Author: Big Al "Gadget Freak"
Reviews.Content: If you need a shelf for a cable box, you will need to purchase separately . I found a stand alone shelf on ebay for 21 dollars that was fine. The mount is very easy to mount, you need your own fasteners for drywall tho. It comes with screws and inserts for studs and plaster (?) but no drywall. Not a deal breaker. I've already recommended this mount to a friend. Level included, nice. Easy to use, very universal. I will buy another for next TV.

Reviews.Title: Well Made
Reviews.Author: Andrew Brodsky
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent value.  The construction is very solid and was nice an slim to give us an extremely low profile.  The extras were nice but weren't really helpful

Reviews.Title: Easy to put together - Big cost savings
Reviews.Author: Nathan Dahms
Reviews.Content: Very easy to put together (5 min or so) and a huge cost savings compared to other places.  Was a little worried based on some reviews, but there was no issues at all.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah has it all.
Reviews.Author: Charles D. Gebeke
Reviews.Content: Mounted a 40 inch Samsung with out a problem.  What I noticed was the extra hardware for an eventuality that could arise- different size mounting holes, spacers, etc.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Cook'n in the kitchen "Kurt"
Reviews.Content: Nice product.  Well made and easy to install.  Priced right.  I highly recommend this product!  Have had for 2 years now and no regrets.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Patricia Lopez
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that all 3 items came in this box. I was a little scared when I saw the size of the box and all the mount was taken apart but maintenance had no problems putting it together because it had very easy instructions. Very good product quality.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Up243
Reviews.Content: This is a basic Flat Screen TV wall mounting kit.  It comes with everything you need to install except the drill of course.  Very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Does its job well and ++
Reviews.Author: Rickgtech
Reviews.Content: For the price you cant beat, but i love the fact they include HDMI cable and a lever its well worth it

Reviews.Title: SOO GOOOD!!
Reviews.Author: mulletdirt
Reviews.Content: Hung my tv on drywall with togglers and its perfect!!! Great wall mount!! Cannot complain about a single thing!! ION GIVE A HOOT!

Reviews.Title: It looks fine, but didn't like the fact that it comes in small pieces
Reviews.Author: Bruce P. Riggins Jr.
Reviews.Content: I didn't actually use this product because it wasn't wide enough for my TV.  The mount looks fine and would probably work fine with the right size TV, but I did't like the fact that you have to put a bunch of small pieces together for the back plate.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to put together.
Reviews.Author: Frederick Quinlan Sr.
Reviews.Content: Too many loose parts. Every part has to be connected. Instruction manual is minimal. There is little written instructions and the picture instructions are not clear. I would have had trouble with putting this together if I had not put others together prior.

Reviews.Title: OK mounting braket, not confidence inspiring
Reviews.Author: advanracing62
Reviews.Content: This unit is ok for mounting, though I wouldn't use the "level" that is provided. The HDMI cable is stout and has a weaved jacket. Quality is debatable. Overall, this mount will do what you want, but be warned it sure isn't confidence inspiring when you put it together. I added a few drywall mounts that are rated for 85lbs along with mounting to the studs. Call me over cautious, but I'm just not sold on this mild mount. The angle adjustment is pretty annoying as mentioned in other reviews. For the money, you probably can't beat this unit. I'd rather spend a few dollars more and get something more assuring.Update:The company contacted me after reading my review and wanted to make things right. We spoke about the concerns I had and they offered to send me a new unit, which is much more heavy duty than what I had purchased. I declined, as I feel that with my added anchors the current unit works fine. I was simply amazed that the company would take some time to read the reviews and then contact the customer to see how to make things better. THIS is what ALL companies should be doing, seeking feedback from customers and improving.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: So far, very happy with this purchase. Seems to be a pretty good value for the money that was spent.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Prasan
Reviews.Content: This was a great product. The instructions were a bit confusing but we were able to figure it out. The material for the mount was excellent and was just as good as the 100+$ mounts that can be found at other stores. Going to pick up 2 more for the bedrooms.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gary W Lancaster
Reviews.Content: Very easy installation . Makes our TV look fantastic rite where we wanted,This was a great buy also we look around and the same one run about 89.00. Very well price also.  G . Lancaster

Reviews.Title: does the job, feels secure
Reviews.Author: David S. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I've put together easier brackets and harder.  This didn't take too long.  Almost didn't give enough horizontal adjustment so that I could center the tv on the  wall after finding studs were not going to allow for centered mounting

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and works great.
Reviews.Author: Silver Sliver
Reviews.Content: Couldn't believe the price. I was hesitant until I got it and installed it. My TV is on the wall, and I don't worry about how long it will stay there.

Reviews.Title: Great review
Reviews.Author: Tanner Dance
Reviews.Content: It's great - a little hassle to install, but what tv mount isn't?Liked the price - so cheap and yet great quality.

Reviews.Title: Good product at afordable price
Reviews.Author: M. Ramirez "MonicaChau"
Reviews.Content: In any store you will find a TV mounting in no less than 40-50 USD. This is a very good product, good quality, fits perfect with mi 42" TV (sharp!, I don't think that supports a bigger TV).Tip: get a loooong screwdriver with you: once you place the TV, you will neet to put two screws under the mounting, I heard my husband using all kind of inappropriate words having a hard time putting this two things on.

Reviews.Title: A perfect buy.
Reviews.Author: Jon Lamb
Reviews.Content: Easy to put up...all the parts you need...and way way less than any product I saw in the store. So glad I saved the money. A great product

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive, easy to install, very slim--it disappears behind my 50" TV. I'm happy.
Reviews.Author: J. Johnston
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, easy to install, very slim--it disappears behind my 50" TV, doesn't require a lot of mounting points messing up the wall. I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Tilt Mount for 60" Samsung
Reviews.Author: Wyn
Reviews.Content: I have had the TV hung for three days and the mount has performed as advertised, the downward facing angle is nice as the TV is mounted high on my fireplace. The product arrived with all the screws required to hang the TV from a fireplace which I thought was great. My only complaint was there were not enough of the spacers included to hang my 60" Samsung, the product arrived with 4 and I needed 8 or 12. I went to a hardware store and purchased 34 washers to make up the space to hang the mount securely. If I had not needed to purchase those washers then I would have given it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Pat Henderson
Reviews.Content: Super low profile, easy to install and it works great, make sure you buy some more of the 10ft hdmi cords if you plan on installing the tv at a normal height, i made the mistake of using my current cables and they didnt reach, mount is a great deal though, my friend bought a very simular one at target for $80

Reviews.Title: I liked the first one so I bought a second.
Reviews.Author: Michael B Stephenson
Reviews.Content: The mount is everything it claimed to be. It install easily and is secure on my wall. It was a little tricky to get it level. The level included was helpful.

Reviews.Title: Good mount:
Reviews.Author: Peter D.
Reviews.Content: Love the idea of mounting the TV on the Wall so the kids could play in the game/TV room without having to worry about hitting the table the TV was on.  The mount seems very durable, so far the TV has only been hit a couple of times without issue.  It did take a little finesse to get our set adjusted right, and a very long screwdriver!

Reviews.Title: Cheeta TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: P. Lyles
Reviews.Content: It comes in a small box unassembled but very easy to put together in less than 15 minutes. Takes 30 minutes to fully assemble and mount on wall. Very strong good product for our 55 inch flat TV.

Reviews.Title: perfect for new 60" plasmsa
Reviews.Author: J. Brininger
Reviews.Content: As others have written already, this works perfectly and is strong.  instructions are great, comes with a level, and a good HDMI cable, what more could you ask for?Just use a stud finder before mounting.

Reviews.Title: Perfect wallmount
Reviews.Author: Tyler Hartzheim
Reviews.Content: I have three of these wall mounts around my house now and I couldn't be happier with them. They're very simple to set up, and very secure on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Just as good
Reviews.Author: Larry Cox
Reviews.Content: Just as good as the 80.00 one at Wal-Mart, you just have to fig.how it goes together,looks just like Wal-Marts

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount on amazon. I was suprised when it came in the mail the box was small. No big deal the level worked for me I checked it with my 2 foot level. When I installed the bolts I drilled one hole at a time. Then I installed bolt check that it was level before I drilled the next hole. Worked perfect. Some times you got to think outside the box.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Travis Lee
Reviews.Content: Worked awesome with my 42" vizio. Easy to install and came with all the hardware. My local retail store wanted around 60 dollars for a wall mount. This had excellent value. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: easy assembly !
Reviews.Author: edward hay
Reviews.Content: this mount is easy to use ...very workable to the tv ! the level was terrific ....made it a very complete job!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME MOUNT
Reviews.Author: Viktoriya Polskaya
Reviews.Content: This mount is great! Very sturdy and did not take long to hang (even after a few hiccups on deciding the location).Highly recommend especially withe the bonus HDMI cord!

Reviews.Title: simple, light and does the job
Reviews.Author: Jorge Vismara "just a human being"
Reviews.Content: After researching all over for a way to hung our 46" TV we ended up with this unit.Do not expect anything fancy, its simple, but it comes with all the pieces and instructions to put it up together (needs to assemble the rectangle you see in the picture).The level is handy, the extra screws to secure the TV are supplied (even though needed to put a plastic washer not in the order of the instructions).Also there is little screw behind the TV, that you are supposed to tighten up... well there is NO space how to arrive to that screw. But there is little or no action this screw actually do... so no harm.

Reviews.Title: Nice product and easy install
Reviews.Author: jibberish
Reviews.Content: Anybody looking for an easy solution to wall mounting a TV, look no further. I bought two of these for two different brand TV's. The TV's, weighing from 40 to 70 lbs, are easily held up by these mounts. I even did a 'hanging test' by hanging on to the mounts before hanging the TV's. I weigh a little over 200 lbs and the mounts didn't budge. Of course, the weight limit is around 165 lbs so I wouldn't hang anything above the recommended limit but it was reassuring to do a simple hanging test. Installation took around 30 minutes. As long as you locate the wall studs and know exactly where you are mounting the TV ahead of time you shouldn't have a problem. Absolutely make sure the mount goes in to at least one stud for plenty of support. The only small complaint I do have about this product is after the TV is mounted, the 2 secure screws underneath of the mount that prevent an individual from pulling the bottom of the TV out are a little tough to reach. You would need a rather long screw driver to reach them. That being said, I still give this product 5 stars because it truly is a great TV mount and is universal for just about any brand and model. Expect my business again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Fred Daniel
Reviews.Content: Used it to mount new Sony 55" TV to wall. Came with all necessary hardware, including spacers for TV. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great, cheap, easy to install mount!
Reviews.Author: bwh21
Reviews.Content: I put it up a week ago in 15 minutes.  It's extremely easy to install once you've found the studs in the wall and seems very strong.  I have a 55" LG and it works perfectly.  Great buy!!

Reviews.Title: get it
Reviews.Author: Constance king
Reviews.Content: Here's the bottom line... You can go somewhere else and pay a small fortune for a mount or you can get this one that is well made, sturdy and easy installation.  I didn't want to spend too much for a mount and also didn't want my TV crashing to the floor.  I ordered this one and crossed my fingers.  I was very pleased when I got it and saw the quality.  I knew I had made the right choice.  I feel like I got more than I paid for and I don't get to say that very often.  It's so well made and installing was a piece of cake even for me.  I will never buy mounts anywhere else.  Ever.  Loving this product so much, I think I'll hang the TV in the bedroom too.

Reviews.Title: Best one for the money
Reviews.Author: jesse d reeves
Reviews.Content: Just bought 3 different wall mounts from amazon this one is the best and comes with hdmi cable even better

Reviews.Title: High quality wall mount at any price!
Reviews.Author: James C.
Reviews.Content: Like many others, the price point and many positive reviews of this wall mount drew me to look at it.  It is very inexpensive but do not equate its low price point with substandard quality...the quality of this mount is excellent!  It is a really well engineered mount, with sliding and tilting arms which attach to the TV and horizontal support brackets that fasten to the wall.  The steel it is comprised of feels very strong and I had no worries that this mount would be able to properly support the 42" Panasonic LED TV I was hanging above my fireplace.  All the mounting hardware is included (as is a 10 foot HDMI cable and a bubble level).  This is the second TV I have wall mounted, the first being over ten years ago when the process was a lot more difficult and when TV's were a lot heavier.  This was a much easier mounting process that required only minimal mechanical skill and tools, although I would still suggest having a partner.This is also a VESA mount.  VESA is an organization that provides uniformity standards for the different brands of consumer electronics to comply with, which as far as mounts go, means that most major TV brands will have similar mounting set-ups so the process and equipment used for mounting will be standard, or 'VESA compliant'.  This mount will most likely be an excellent choice for 99% of wall mounting applications.  I give it an A+.

Reviews.Title: Works as it should
Reviews.Author: booneman11
Reviews.Content: Pretty easy to install, and does its job.  Came with a HDMI cable which was a nice add-in and a level which I may use for other things.

Reviews.Title: this truly does what it says
Reviews.Author: Keanna Bonner
Reviews.Content: Best thing ever!!! I have not one bad thing to say about this not one it holds my purse up as promised  I really love this and it came with a super nice HDMI card. I useda board to hold it stable on my wall for extra support

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Nieves
Reviews.Content: This mount is worth the money! The instructions can be a little bit better but it's totally worth it. Very good buy!!

Reviews.Title: Great mount, only one problem
Reviews.Author: Nathan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great mount for the price! Packaged right and was exactly what I expected. Only problem is that the supplied bolts for attaching the frame to the wall are cheap/weak and I broke one off in the wall while tightening it down. I drilled the proper pilot holes and everything, it broke with a few more millimeters to go. Went to the hardware store and I was back in business.

Reviews.Title: Television viewing perfection
Reviews.Author: Dennis Matreci
Reviews.Content: We purchased the mounting because of it's price.  We were completely impressed with the construction and quality of the bracket.  It was incredibly simple to mount on the wall and the whole project was completed in under an hour for a tiny fraction of the cost quoted to us by a professional.

Reviews.Title: I like the Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: Kavon Attarpour
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. It worked great and did the job for my 55 inches . Go Cheetah Mount. Also comes with cables.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit!
Reviews.Author: Robert Griffin Jr.
Reviews.Content: Just as describe for a great price! Assembly completed in 10 min! The HDMI cord is a plus as well!

Reviews.Title: Very cheap mount that works extremely well
Reviews.Author: J. Olmstead
Reviews.Content: I have a 42" Samsung hanging on this mount in our guest bedroom and so far it's been working quite well. I used the built-in level to mount mine, but checked it with another carpenters level that I already had and had the SLIGHTLY tweak it. I have a friend who bought one of these and the built-in level kinda screwed him, as the holes on his are about 1/2" too lows on one side. If you pick one of these up, bring your own level to the party.Other than that, it's great. It mounts the TV very close to the wall, and it's fairly easy to take the TV down if you need to. Only takes 5 minutes or so.The HDMI cable that comes with it is worth the price of the entire package alone.If I ever have to get another LCD wall mount, I'll be going with this brand again. SO cheap compared to the big box stores, and it works just as well.

Reviews.Title: Fine product
Reviews.Author: Captain Recovery
Reviews.Content: There is nothing like getting what you pay for.  This wall unit is excellent and I can confidently recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly cheap, did the job.
Reviews.Author: breanna
Reviews.Content: This definitely did the job. It is only as good quality as the assembly job you put into it, as it does require a lot of assembly. We hung a 40 inch television with this and were very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, easy to install, instructions could be better.
Reviews.Author: V. Santillan
Reviews.Content: The mount is great and very good quality.  For the price I don't think you will find a better product for small TVs.  One think to note, if you are mounting a 32" TV, you don't have to use the entire frame, just use half of the horizontal pieces, otherwise the brace will be visible from the side because the entire brace assembled is as wide as a 32" TV.  I uploaded couple of images so you can see how the 32" TV is mounted with just half the horizontal frame.

Reviews.Title: Good wall mount
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: This is a good wall mount for a flat screen, but it is definitely at the cheaper end.  Good for the price, but it in no way holds the weight is says it does at any angle other than the most tilted (i.e., the bottom of the TV resting on the wall).  The tightening screws provided for holding the angles are not enough to hold the weight of any TV over a 50", maybe a 55" if the weight is less than 80 pounds.  I bought it for a 60" and am lucky that I mounted it high on my wall because the weight pulls the TV down until the bottom of the TV rests against the wall.  I have readjusted and re-tightened the screws many times but to no avail.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Jamie Balbier
Reviews.Content: Installed in minutes it looks great and came with everything needed to install on any wall. It was  a recommendation from a friend.

Reviews.Title: Wall mount bracket
Reviews.Author: P. Wyatt
Reviews.Content: This bracket arrived quickly and worked fine for our flatscreen.  The best part is, it was a fraction of the price of those from other companies.

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount.
Reviews.Author: Efren Hernandez
Reviews.Content: When I got it I was hoping for less because last time I order something from Cheetah Mounts I didn't get the HDMI, but this time I did and everything on the photo. It is perfect for my TV and money. I recommend Cheetah Mounts to everyone I sell a flatscreen where I work at. Is way better then Bestbuy and Walmart over price things.

Reviews.Title: It holds it to the wall
Reviews.Author: Mike Killingsworth "Tru 2  blues"
Reviews.Content: Hey, what can I say? It held the t.v. to wall and was easy to put into place and it does a great job of holding the t.v. just the way I want it to.

Reviews.Title: easily installed
Reviews.Author: S. Douglas
Reviews.Content: This bracket has been working flawlessly on my 47" TV.  There were some hesitation about using a cheap wall mount, but I have used Cheetah products before and they worked great so...The combined bonus of two levels, one magnetic and one clip on, as well as a free 3m (10ft) HDMI cable this product is a huge value.On a secondary note, Los Angeles just experienced a 4.7 earthquake.  Guess whose TV is still on the wall.  My friend's professionally installed mount (sounds like "pocket spish")  fell down.

Reviews.Title: Cheeath Mounts
Reviews.Author: Venitta Mayo
Reviews.Content: Cheetah mounts aptmm2b flush tilt are a high quality and a good value for the price. Easy to install and easy to mount tv on these mounts. Products were received in a timely manner. Will order these mounts in the future if needed.

Reviews.Title: worked great for my 36 samsung
Reviews.Author: Joseph Fountain "bobo"
Reviews.Content: went up easy, lots of screws, but not difficult to assembleI wish there was an adjustment for level, I used the level but after it was all installed the tv is slightly off, just enough to annoy me but I can't see a way to adjust it

Reviews.Title: Disco!
Reviews.Author: Adam Kotwica
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast. easy install. Awesome price. Quality product. Braided HDMI cord a plus!. Overall great product. Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Adam Murphy
Reviews.Content: Fits the tv perfectly and it was easy to mount.  Having the level come with the product made me actually use it instead of trying to guess if it was level.  It was a great compliment.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the low price fool you.
Reviews.Author: Denster2u
Reviews.Content: After lots of research and reading the rave reviews, I settled on this wall mount for my new 60" Plasma TV.  First of all, let me say that most of the TV mounting brackets in retail stores are insanely overpriced for a television 50" or larger, typically well over $100. I was skeptical of the very low price, but this bracket is every bit as good or better than those costing 3x as much.  The hardware is heavy duty and the included level and clear instructions made it easy to assemble and install.  Considering this bracket incorporates a tilt feature, and also includs a high quality HDMI cable, I'd say it's an unbeatable value. Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt (1.3" Profile) TV Wall Mount Bracket for
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Anderson
Reviews.Content: So far so good. 39 out of 40 have had no problems. The one that failed may have been stressed or physically pulled out of the wall by someone trying to adjust the flatscreen beyond it's limits...don't know for sure.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Chelsea K.
Reviews.Content: I have had my 55" TV mounted with this for almost two years now.  Not a single issue or complaint!

Reviews.Title: Nice quality but I don't trust it for a 55" or larger TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce Hassler
Reviews.Content: Yes, I know it says it's for up to 65" TVs and 165 pounds but the wall mount comes in six pieces which get screwed together prior to fastening to the wall. The maximum hole distance is 27 inches which means only two studs can be used for lag bolts. It comes with all the hardware and even a magnetic bubble level and HDMI cable and the pieces are nicely finished. But after mounting my 47" TV to a Rosewill RMS-MT6020 I couldn't bring myself to mount my new 60" to the Cheetah.If you visit the manufacturer's website you can get a promo code allowing you to purchase this item for $19.22 on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Super low profile
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Ok, I admit I was a little skeptical of this mount when the ones at local big box stores are selling for over four times as much.  However, I am happy to say that this mount has worked out great.  The only issue I had was with the output ports on our TV.  The HDMI ports face straight out the back of the TV.  Due to the extreme low profile of this mount (which looks great by the way), I had to buy some HDMI right angle connectors.  This made hooking up the HDMI cables possible.Also, I read some complaints about the small level that is included.  It seems to be accurate but seriously, walk to the garage and get your long level which is much more appropriate for this kind of project.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressive
Reviews.Author: Harry E. Cassidy "Harry Cat"
Reviews.Content: Installing this mount was very easy. The only challenging part was finding the center of the oak studs because the plaster walls here are about an inch thick.  But nevertheless, the mount is securely holding a 84lb, 60" Plasma TV.

Reviews.Title: Such a GREAT mount!
Reviews.Author: conan henderson
Reviews.Content: So easy to mount. Really helpful level that slid right on top so you didn't have to hold it. extremely helpful.  The Hdmi seems like a hit and a miss. really cool bundle but I had received a new one from the seller and it works fine. overall, an awesome purchase since you could buy one that does the exact same thing for about 80 more dollars.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Tincher
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 5 of these mounts have not been disappointed with any of themBy far the least expensive and best made mount that I have found for installing TV's

Reviews.Title: Well Thought Out Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: James L Scully
Reviews.Content: This wall mount is excellent. Everything you need in the box except a screwdriver and a drill. Was very surprised and happy about the HDMI cable included. My only negative would be that if you have to use the smaller screws, the heads are not large enough to probably seat on the television attachment arms.(About 3 days after my original post above) OK, I've added the fifth star for the company behind this product. I purchased two mounts and used one for a 32" flat screen and one for a 50" flat screen. With the smaller TV I had a very slight issue with the smallest screws (which were the correct size for the TV). I mentioned that issue in my review above and based on that review the company contacted me directly to offer assistance with the issue in any way they might be able to help. It is a pleasure doing business with an organization that is that concerned. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: Good tv mount bracket
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I bought this about 4 years ago for my 50" plasma tv, and it's still holding it up well!  So much cheaper than what is sold at the "big" stores.  It was rather easy to install back then, and still holding now!  It came with the handy bubble level and I see now that they have included a hdmi cable as well.  I can't say honestly about the new design now, but I do like what I got 4 years ago and still use today.

Reviews.Title: Basic Mount, Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Hickey
Reviews.Content: I mean basic in the sense that there's no nonsense.  It is just what it's supposed to be, A sturdy, strong TV mount.  It definitely beats paying $80-$100+ for the same purpose.Plus:  The included HDMI cable is amazing.  I purchased mounts from Cheetah before with the same cables included, and I've used them for 3+ years with no problems with any of them,

Reviews.Title: A GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: P Merritt
Reviews.Content: It worked for me just as the advertisement stated.  The assembly and installation instructions were easy to follow and could be performed by almost anyone.

Reviews.Title: Simple, inexpensive, perfect.
Reviews.Author: youngstreetartist12
Reviews.Content: Very simple setup, although you might need a drill or a hammer to get the nails through the wall.You might need someone to help you with a little experience in this area.The mount is very simple, and seems sturdy. We mounted a 57 inch flat screen tv without a problemI will definitely be ordering one again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV mount for the price.
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hang my 42 inch Sony Led TV that I also purchased in amazon. This product is excellent quality for the price. It is very easy to install. Bought another.

Reviews.Title: Takes Alot
Reviews.Author: Shlitshu Finney
Reviews.Content: it took a lot of tools to put together but my 50" sits proud up on the wall of my apt.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Mount performed as described and was priced right.  It was missing a couple bolts but I had spares from another project so that was not a big deal.  In the long run I wish I would have bought a mount with a swiveling arm but for the money it is a good product.

Reviews.Title: ill buy another one.
Reviews.Author: Rob Upholster
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. Easy to mount with good directions. Light weight and very affordable. Amazing how lightweight yet strong when mounted to wall.

Reviews.Title: Did the trick, but...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer O.
Reviews.Content: This mount is a basic flat panel TV mount. I used it in my daughter's room for her new 42" flat panel TV. The one I received had a slight manufacturing defect as one of the bolt holes was stripped. The one that was stripped was on the end where the vertical bracket ties into the horizontal brackets. Fortunately, I had the tools to repair it myself, so I did not have to send it back.The wall mount comes in 8 pieces plus the HDMI cable. I've installed many wall-mount brackets in my recent past.  That being said, this one took me just over an hour to assemble the wall bracket, mount the two hangers to the TV, and hang the TV. I've seen much better brackets out there, but they were also 5x the cost.One key note, you better have a really long phillips head screwdriver (more than 1' long) to tighten the two screws that lock the hangers to the wall-mount bracket. I could not physically get to the screws, so its just hanging on the top bracket. I'll be purchasing another bracket with better features & ergonomics. On the plus side, the wall-mount is very solid when bolted to the wall-studs and it comes with an assortment of hardware, most of which you wont need.***UPDATE***Cheetah Mounts Customer Care reached out to me via phone today and I must say, I was very impressed. After they saw my review and saw that my product was slightly defective, they offered to send me a new mount free of charge, which I declined as it wasn't necessary as I repaired the threads of the mount myself. In return, they refunded my purchase without asking for the now-working product back. With this type of customer service, I have upgraded my 2-star review to a 4-star review. Thank you Cheetah Mounts for this unexpected level of service!

Reviews.Title: Works but I would go with a smaller TV on this mount.
Reviews.Author: Some Guy
Reviews.Content: Love the set as it comes with a level and all the attachments you could possibly need, but I would not try to max this out. Far cheaper than from the box stores and worth the price, but strength quality could be better to improve confidence.

Reviews.Title: Quality build and easy to install
Reviews.Author: JMK
Reviews.Content: Solid, well made mount.  Easy to install with good instructions.  Nice that they include a level but might be best to get a longer one.  We really like the tilt feature.  For some reason that small tilting angle makes the viewing experience a lot better for us.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as listed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I wanted, and it arrived when promised. Very easy to mount, swivel function is great. The included level was a nice addition. My tv is 46", mount fit easily and definitely could have accommodated a larger tv.

Reviews.Title: Holds up!
Reviews.Author: mdmcuriel
Reviews.Content: This products is worthwhile, great for the price! Don't waste your money in the store, buy this one! Works great.

Reviews.Title: It just works
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Hotze
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV mount. The only thing to note is that if you're installing in drywall, you will need to be able to locate studs. This is probably common to every TV mount, given the pressure and weights.The kit includes virtually everything you need - a TON of hardware for different kinds of mounting your TV, meaning that you generally don't have to worry about anything other than a basic drill to drill your holes, and a ratchet.Once you start following the instructions, installation is easy, and again, not at all hard (once studs have been found). The included level and cable are nice bonuses, but didn't really sway my decision.

Reviews.Title: 55" Vizio LED and 42" Pioneer Plasma from 05'
Reviews.Author: Scott McNeely
Reviews.Content: I'm using a 55" Vizio and worked awesome. I also cross checked the bolts for rear of tv with my Pioneer Plasma from 2005. This bracket will work also on older tv's. Ordering a 2nd 1 soon.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Elaine B.
Reviews.Content: It went up with no trouble. The person installing it for me did it very quickly and it is just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Phil Hyoung , Lee
Reviews.Content: Well received at affordable prices.Did not yet installed, TV installation on the wall seems to be great.have a nice day.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre at best
Reviews.Author: Jordan Gooch
Reviews.Content: EDIT: I was contacted by customer service after posting this review below originally. They took excellent care of me and took all of these issues into advisement.The pieces of steel seem okay, but the way it fits together is less than easy.  Terrible instructions and a lack of any real labeling make it harder to put together than it really should be, which is only exacerbated by the lack of accuracy regarding the bolt hole alignment.  I shouldn't have to bend the frame to get the fasteners through, ya know?Also, it arrived missing a couple bolts, which was nice.

Reviews.Title: Great mount, great value.
Reviews.Author: Kevin S. Atkinson
Reviews.Content: This mount is simple to put together, and works great.  My favorite thing about it was the price.  It even comes with an HDMI cable...

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Zee Three
Reviews.Content: Don't spend any more money than you have to. Just buy this for your TV. I have a older Plasma that is quite heavy (46"). Holds it fine, just make sure you have a solid anchor. Best price around period. And…..it comes with a pretty nice HDMI cable :)Zee Three approved

Reviews.Title: Well made and working well for now 6 months
Reviews.Author: Charles King
Reviews.Content: Everything went well from putting it together to placing it up on the wall. Now after 6 months, the TV is still handing and sturdy! :)

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Kocvara
Reviews.Content: This thing is a bang for buck monster. I helped a friend install the sanus version of this mount recently and I'm glad I went with Cheetah Mounts.This Mount comes in pieces. 6 for the backplate which are not that hard to assemble, and 2 brackets which attach to the TV. I was mounting an 80 pound TV and this thing is holding it up no problem. I used my own hardware to attach it to the wall so I don't know about the screws in that area but it is otherwise packaged with a lot of "bits & pieces", some of which you will not need. It was nice to know that they included these bits, this way you should be able to mount almost any TV.The only drawbacks I found are that once you get the TV on the mount, the securing screws in the back at the bottom of the mount are very hard to access. You will need a really long phillips screwdriver to get to those. The other thing is when trying to center the TV on the mount, the sliding action isn't very smooth. This is not such a big deal, once it's centered you'll probably never mess with it again. I only mention it because the sanus motion was much smoother, and it also had a better securing design in the back. It's also almost 3 times the price. I don't think the price difference is worth it.Overall I'm very pleased with this product and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good Wall Mount for my LG 42" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Tarish Aggarwal
Reviews.Content: We sturdy and strong construction. I did not have basic tool so I have to buy them from Home Depot (Drill Machine, Stud Finder and Screw Kit). It took me and my brother 2 hours to wall mount our LED TV. Overall good product.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Michael Brown
Reviews.Content: Bought this because so many others rated it highly. I was not disappointed. All parts were good quality and none were missing. Has heavy duty wall attachment. Really like the nice HDMI cable that is included.

Reviews.Title: worked great
Reviews.Author: maria c.
Reviews.Content: We have a 32" on this and works amazing, holds great and does not stick out too much, love it

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: krazyk411
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount for my 47" LG 47ln5700 and i have to say wrote what a great mount. It arrived on time with all the parts plus some. I had no problem putting it together. I've read other reviews saying it was hard to tell how it went together from the pictures but I had no issues. After I found my wall studs it was as simple as doing a few holes and making sure it was level. The brackets for the tv went on easy, then it was just hanging it on the mount. Looks great and very sturdy, and I live in southern California and I have no worries of this not holding up.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Richard "Entrepreneur, and triathlete powered...
Reviews.Content: Secures my TV to the wall well. Took an afternoon to install it, but I could do it very quickly if it wasn't my first rodeo.

Reviews.Title: Simple TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Random
Reviews.Content: After going to BestBuy and being disgusted at the prices of their TV mounts I proceeded to check Amazon and found a much more reasonably priced mount.  Shipping was quick and install was a breeze, I currently have a 50' Plasma hanging on this thing and I have had zero issues.

Reviews.Title: Secure TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Pat "Pat"
Reviews.Content: Very secure mount for our large screen TV.  Not overly difficult to install.  Love the way it secures the TV.  Highly recommend this product.  Be sure to familiarize yourself with what is behind the panel, drywall, etc.  Experience is a great teacher.  "Good judgement comes from experience, and a lotta that comes from bad judgement".  Check the wall!

Reviews.Title: Great value wall mount
Reviews.Author: Andrew P. Long
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first given the price, but this turned out to be a great deal. My 42" Panasonic plasma attached securely, and looks great on the wall. The quality is good enough, and the included HDMI cable is a nice bonus. The package also includes a small bubble level, but it's pretty low quality, and I ended up using my own standard level. But hey, if you don't have your own its better than nothing, and its free.The most difficult part for me was actually assembling the pieces prior to mounting it. The instructions were somewhat vague as to how the pieces connected together, but once I figured that out, it was fairly simple.The only other issue I encountered was actually attaching the mount to the wall, due to the fact that my apartment has older plaster walls, not drywall. A word of warning: if you have plaster walls, you will likely have great difficulty in using a drill/driver and the included screws. Save yourself the trouble, and go to a big-box hardware store and get a hex-wrench set for about $10, and use the included lag bolts. Not only will it be way easier, but the mount will be more secure as well.

Reviews.Title: Great basic mount
Reviews.Author: M. Portelos
Reviews.Content: Awesome mount and easy to install. Its been on the wall for over 6 months now with no issues. I would definitely buy again!

Reviews.Title: Great TV mount
Reviews.Author: deutom
Reviews.Content: I used this TV mount to hang a 60", two 47" and two 40" LED flat screen TVs. Easy installation (mounted the 60" and one 47" TV on to a sheetrock wall using toggle screws and the other three units onto wood panel). The included and magnetic level comes very handy for the installation and so is the included 6 feet HDMI cable.While the parts seems less sturdy than those that come with other more expensive TV mounts, they are sufficiently strong once put together. The tilting capability is also useful as it allows to adjust the viewing angle in the vertical direction (e.g. straight as a presentation unit in a walk-in area or tilted down for a seating arangement such as in a living room).For this very low price and functionality I would definitley recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ang
Reviews.Content: I got this mount last summer and it has worked great. Sits very close to the wall and is very sturdy. i have 4 kids rough-housing in the living room all the time and totally trust this thing to keep my TV up. Surprised by the cheap price of it but has defiantly exceeded my standards.

Reviews.Title: Did the job
Reviews.Author: LisaM
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to hold a a 55" Vizio flat screen TV.  I had some difficulty getting to the lock down screws, but just had to take my time.  I shared my feedback with the customer service department of the company and they shared some hints for getting to them.  They also let me know that they had recently made changes to the design and that my feedback was important in helping them to redesign the product. Holds TV perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal - Mounted 52" Sturdy
Reviews.Author: CRad
Reviews.Content: Mounted my 52" and it holds very sturdy. Excellent deal given the price. Assembly takes a little while to figure out, but it's not rocket science.

Reviews.Title: No complaints. Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: No complaints. The mount works as advertised. I was hesitant due to the low price but it has help up my TV perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: richard rioux
Reviews.Content: Fantastic deal for the money. Came packaged in a small box. I thought it was wrong at first. You have to assemble it. Worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: A decent bracket for a small low weight TV.
Reviews.Author: P. Barnett
Reviews.Content: This was a great match for the 32" bedroom TV and I'm sure it will do the job adequately without risk of falling. It's nicely made, no sharp edges. All hardware was obvious and easy to assemble. Instructions are adequate, not frilly. I'm good with that.It's a good value for a small weight TV. Not really any pan to speak of and limited to about 15 degrees of downtilt.I'd buy this brand again if I needed one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product and a great value. It was easy to install and holds the 50" TV easily. It's very well made and has everything you need but the tools.

Reviews.Title: Good mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: This mount held a 55" with no problem, hardest part of mounting with this product, we'll any wall mount...finding the studs. Worked as described. Never had any issue. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Tv Mount
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Litz "MJL"
Reviews.Content: Bracket came with all the parts, was easy to put up and is holding my 52" TV on the wall for about 2 years now

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, works very well.
Reviews.Author: R4mbl3R
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for about 8 months to hold my 47inch TV, along with a Sound bar (soundbar brackets are NOT included with this). It was easy to set up, it includes all of the hardware and includes different sizes to fit different TVs. And has held my TV for 8 months, no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Adequate!
Reviews.Author: Stever
Reviews.Content: Everything I needed was in the package.  Installation was easy.  Sturdy construction.  My only beef:  it did not fit my little Dynex TV.  The mounting bracket doesn't line up properly.  Maybe I was supposed to have read somewhere that it was unsupported, but fortunately, I have a Sanyo that fits fine.

Reviews.Title: Why are people complaining?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This has been a great product so far and at a great price!! I don't see why people are complaining, holding my 46" without any issues!!

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: Matthew C.
Reviews.Content: Use to. Mount 60 inch tv.  Easy to assemble and alot of different mounting options making it a truly universal mount.  Hdmi cable that came with it was crap and showed whit dots in the picture.

Reviews.Title: Customer service is 5 star
Reviews.Author: chris bazy
Reviews.Content: The TV that I wanted to use on this mount just didn't fit 100 percent. It hung on the wall but I wanted it to be secure. With the help of customer service they help resolve the issue in a timely manner.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Hugh B. MacLeod
Reviews.Content: I have become a fan of Cheetah products. For the price the quality can't be beat. Well made, clear directions, and easily assembled and mounted.

Reviews.Title: easy install
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Great product.......would recommend this product for use on any TV its recommend for. I used it on my 60" tv and its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great price for high quality
Reviews.Author: C. Chandler
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this... especially the price being so low.All the hardware stated was included, nothing missing. They include enough screws and washers to fit a variety of TV mount sizes so, you'll be left with all the sizes your TV doesn't need. It's not that you missed a step and forgot something.Assembly and installation was a snap. I went from opening the box to turning on the TV while on the wall in under 40 min. Consider this... if any of your TV's connections you need face the wall, you'll want to consider getting 90-degree angle connectors for those cables because this bracket doesn't leave much room for cables coming straight out the back of the TV. Of the cable connections I used that face the wall, the cables are squished against the wall. You may not have to worry as some TV's connections face a side of the TV.I'm using this with a Samsung 40" and would be happy to order it again if I needed another one.

Reviews.Title: Great mount!
Reviews.Author: Chad Buhrandt
Reviews.Content: This T.V. mount worked great, I was able to install without any problems.It has very adjustable wall mounting holes was simple to install.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality, easy installation, and so affordable!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This mount is awesome!  It was extremely easy to install my 40" TV on the wall using only the hardware included with this product.  My wall studs are not set on normal centers, but the design of this mount made that a non-factor.  I DID read the directions, thoroughly, before installation and I suggest you do too; no reason to take chances with an expensive TV.  Bottom line, this mount is really easy to use and, at less than $30, is a really great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Lynn L.
Reviews.Content: It works exactly as it was designed to work & it's a great price.  Can't really say more than that.  Glad we bought it.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: howard berman
Reviews.Content: Mounted a 60 inch vizio with no problem,great value.works fine for me since I don't need any adjustments left or rightThe set screw in the back ,that is a safety is almost impossible to get too,

Reviews.Title: Buy it
Reviews.Author: Darren S Turner
Reviews.Content: Once you figure out how to assemble it, its a piece of cake to install. And comes with a decent HDMI cord, and a sufficient little bubble level for installation. I have purchased two so far, and recommend highly for a fixed mount application.

Reviews.Title: Best value for wall mount out there
Reviews.Author: WheelManJH
Reviews.Content: This company works quick, they send it out right away and even make sure you received it ok. Has all the necessary parts and some to hang just about any flat screen out there and it is quality materials. I am very impressed with this setup and would recommend the Cheetah to everyone.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: got this for the TV works great. I can tilt the TV to my liking. tv is on the wall with no more clutter.

Reviews.Title: Stop shopping!  This is it!
Reviews.Author: T. Riehl "Quiet Patriot"
Reviews.Content: Installs easily, works as advertised, low profile, tilt is adjustable with the TV installed, HDMI cable is full 3D, priced very favorably, and my heavy 65 inch Plasma is very secure.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Bracket that does the job.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this bracket mainly because of the price. I was not disappointed by its performance, I am using it to hang my LG 55" Plasma TV. It was not difficult to mount and it holds the weight with not problems.

Reviews.Title: wall mount bracket
Reviews.Author: Theresa M. Huling
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this wall mount bracket to anyone, my husband and son had no problems installing this. great buy

Reviews.Title: Good mount. You'll need metric tools.
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Day
Reviews.Content: This is a really good mount.  However, if you are mounting on a brick wall the problem is that the bolts are all metric and it is near impossible to find 10mm and 8mm bits in the US. It takes some play with a 3/8" bit to get a hole that will take the anchor.  You would think that a product for the US would have imperial screws and anchors.

Reviews.Title: what can I say
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: It works and I don't know what else to say. It does what it says it is going to do.

Reviews.Title: Simple and functional
Reviews.Author: CandD
Reviews.Content: We used this to mount our 48-incher. It was simple enough to piece together and secure, though it took a fair amount of time to install, all things considered. Make sure to have a stud finder handy. I just purchased this same product for the smaller TV as well, so I think this rating should count twice.

Reviews.Title: Very good product for the price
Reviews.Author: David West "Hard to please"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a wall mount that didn't cost as much as the TV and this is a very basic, but effective product. It was shipped with several parts missing so I don't know that I would recommend the seller, but, to their credit, they did respond to my complaint and ship out the replacement parts fairly quickly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit great quality
Reviews.Author: Tim  Kendall
Reviews.Content: Exactly the perfect amount for my 50 inch TV this was recommended by a friend who has one Amazon offered it at a great price with quick shipping

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: Lyndsey
Reviews.Content: I love this mount and I will be buying a few more of them.  Its super simple to install and adjusts easily.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Moore
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this product to anyone. wasn't missing parts. went together smoothly. HDMI cable works great. perfect perfect perfect.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Mount
Reviews.Author: S. Stewart "StewartSJ3"
Reviews.Content: Easily the best TV mount out there. Can't complain about the price either. Installation was super easy and holds our 47" Vizio just fine. Definitely buy this!

Reviews.Title: Holds good so far
Reviews.Author: Yasheka
Reviews.Content: I haven't had an issue with this product. I like the way it looks on the wall. Only thing was i thought it would deb flat against the wall but thats not the case. I bought two of these and really like the way it looks on the wall.

Reviews.Title: just as advertised
Reviews.Author: jerry horstmann
Reviews.Content: worked just as advertised  recommend to anyone in need of wall mount for large flat screen  easy to install and great price  flat screen is easy to remove at any time

Reviews.Title: does the job as stated
Reviews.Author: Toto
Reviews.Content: Instructions could use additional explaining for the rest of the parts that are in the package. A lot of left over pieces that might be critical but instructions don't apply them

Reviews.Title: Big surprises in a small package.
Reviews.Author: Dustin Burt
Reviews.Content: I was concerned when a small box for this mount arrived on my doorstep. "This looks nothing like what I see in the store".  After I opened the box I found it all there. At this great price all of my televisions will be mounted into the wall. This mount is the real deal.The only word of warning is that you really need an electric drill with ratchet heads to get this into the wall. The main anchors are bolts that need power to get into the wall.5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Pretty simple to set up and good value for what I paid
Reviews.Author: A. Dare
Reviews.Content: Clear instructions and easy to assemble. Really good wall mount which I feel is good value for what I paid.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: casey feathers
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping. Easy installation. Works perfect. I should have of ordered two more. One more for me and one for my kids.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: bstempka
Reviews.Content: Works great and installs in about 30 mins. Getting to level with the mini level included is a bit tough, but otherwise a great product with easy installation.

Reviews.Title: SMALLER than Before!!
Reviews.Author: J.Ramdath
Reviews.Content: I bought this SAME mount in 2010 from Cheetah Mounts. It was at least twice as big, it had to hold up a 40 inch heavy (2010 model LCD)This one is going to mount a 32 inch, much smaller LCD. So im still happy with the product. IM SURE it can handle this smaller tv.I have SERIOUS doubts as to whether this smaller mount can hold up a >50inch LED or worse a PLASMA.

Reviews.Title: I've had it for almost 3 years
Reviews.Author: Anabel Perez
Reviews.Content: Yes, I trusted a 20 something dollar mount to hold up my 3k TV, but I read the previous reviews and gave it a try. It has held up rather well. My TV is still on the wall and no sign of it going anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: rmarks65
Reviews.Content: Directions were pretty easy to understand but very basic. I used a wall stud finder that seemed to be very helpful. It went up pretty easy. Its a JVC 55 inch TV on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Vee Girl 34
Reviews.Content: I purchased one mount to try it out and the instructions we're so eAsy to follow and the tv looks great that I had to  another one for our 3rd bedroom.  You can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: wrong part
Reviews.Author: K-FLEX "Flex"
Reviews.Content: I think this item would have been a good bracket, but the package had some missing parts. I never got the chance to use it. I went to the local store and bought another bracket since I had started putting holes in my wall.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: SAPCV
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive and does the job. Seems very secure and I like that you can slide the tv one way or the other to center on the wall if your studs aren't exactly perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: TV Wall Mount is easy to install
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It comes with extras, like a leveler and HDMI cord.  Great price and excellent product!  I was able to put this up on the wall and watch my TV within 30 minutes!

Reviews.Title: had to assemble
Reviews.Author: A. Renck
Reviews.Content: We had to assemble the brackets which took more labor time than we would have liked.  The bracket functions properly.  We did notice some slight differences between different orders.  Some had 2 screws per half side and some had 4 screws per half.  I understand cutting the size down to make it easier.  Some of the mounts did not come with a level but it wouldn't have mattered as we have our own.  We viewed the level as just an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Harder than hell to install.
Reviews.Author: Phil Bestic
Reviews.Content: You will need looooong screw drivers and an extra set of knuckles to install it. Comes with a cute little level that does not. It's about a quarter of a bubble off level. Don't bother trying to tint it. You'd have to make the adjustment from the other side of the wall. It does hold my flat screen on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Price
Reviews.Author: Ryan Peterson
Reviews.Content: Excellent wall mount and I will be buying more of these in the future. I did have to cut down the screws that attach the brackets to the tv (too long) but other than that it was a good quality product.

Reviews.Title: Customer service is nice
Reviews.Author: William stone
Reviews.Content: The customer service really cares about helping the customer to be happy with the product. Product itself wasn't the best for me but to each is own.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: Justin Schaefer
Reviews.Content: I was initially skeptical at first because of the price, and the size of the package once it arrived. Boy was I wrong! This think is very easy to setup, and has a very nice low profile look.I would recommend loosening the adjustment screws a little before hanging the tv. Find out what angle you want, carefully unmount the tv, and tighten the adjustment screws agian. Then plug in all your devices, and re hang.The included levels made installation a breeze, and I have two tvs hung with this mount. Great price for a great product!

Reviews.Title: I love the mounts
Reviews.Author: Houston Bear
Reviews.Content: Everything you need is right here for mouning TV, including level and HD cable. I can't say enough good about these mounts. BUY them!

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: S. Turner
Reviews.Content: Used to mount a 47 inch LCD. Mount is small and light but holds up. Comes with a nice cord and a level. Instructions were easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Captain Eric G
Reviews.Content: Unlike my earlier review of the full motion mount, this was a breeze to assemble and mount on the wall. A easy do it yourself without needing an extra hand. Great quality, Great price, Really Strong and Easy Assembly!!!!! A 5 star product all the way!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product for price!
Reviews.Author: Kelley Pankake
Reviews.Content: Cheetah very easy to use price is awesome and I would buy another bracket again.  Cheetah is made very durable and instructions are super easy.

Reviews.Title: lots of hardware
Reviews.Author: tinangel301
Reviews.Content: this was really useful in that it came with alot of extra hardware pieces (that I was able to use on my new TV downstairs) and a beautiful HDMI cloth braided cable. A real value!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount for the price!!
Reviews.Author: GinaRenee
Reviews.Content: Bought this because we were in transition of TV and TV stands, needed something cheap for a temporary solution. Ended up keeping this and using it on our TV in our bedroom! Works great, easy install and best of all cheap! We did use two 2x4s to mount the TV stand against because we didn't have studs where we wanted our TV exactly. Made it even all the more sturdy, would def recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: The mount and instructions are great. A couple of the screws (when assembling the mount) are a pain to manipulate, but once together it is rock solid. For the ultra minor inconvenience of the initial assembly, it is well worth the price.The lock screws are a bit tough to get to, you will need a long screwdriver or some ratchet extensions with a phillips bit.The included hdmi cable and level are a nice touch.The tilt feature is nice and has enough tension to hold at whatever angle you choose.If this were something that would require any attention after installation, I could understand lower reviews, but it's more of a set it and forget it item. And it is perfect for the intended purpose.

Reviews.Title: This seller will take care of you and the mount for the price isn't bad
Reviews.Author: WKE "Wibber"
Reviews.Content: Yeah, so it was cheap so I am not going to slam this mount too much.  But the screws they use to hold the thing together are very small and VERY cheap.  One of the screws stripped the threads (they gotta be using the cheapest Chinese made screws possible) and I had to turn the thing 180 degrees because I was afraid it might not hold the weight.  Once on the wall it seemed sturdy but maybe 0.05$ more for better quality screws wouldn't be too much to ask.  Just be very careful when screwing the frame together or you might strip a couple and then you're going to the hardware store for more screws.  It was just unpleasant having to find a way to make sure the thing hung together with the 50 lb plasma on it.  Next time I'll buy elsewhere.So I need to update my review.  This company just called me (this is what, 6-8 hours after I posted my first review)  and they are sending me a replacement mount and it's better than the one I originally purchased.  They are also sending it two day shipping which was above and beyond if you ask me.  The women who helped me gave me the option of a full refund or a better mount.  She was very helpful and understanding. So I am going to change my review to five stars.  Really, when a company goes to the trouble of losing money to make me happy they deserve praise.  There is good customer service and then there is the customer service I experienced with these guys.  If this is what you can expect from this company than I can't recommend them enough.  By the way, I was able to get this mount up and working and it does sit really close to the wall so if that is what you want then go with this one.  It does leave enough room so that you don't need the 90 degree angle adapter.  At least on a pany p50st60 which has the hdmi, cable, and ethernet cables pointing down anyway.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2b Flush Tilt
Reviews.Author: Gerald D. Gershon
Reviews.Content: This arrived immediately unlike the TV that was 2 weeks late.It is perfect and packed well easy to mount and am very satisfiedThe HDML wire that came with is very thick and had no idea that was included

Reviews.Title: little space in back
Reviews.Author: Devin Crane
Reviews.Content: There's barely enough space behind the tv for my HDMI cable, and my ChromeCast doesn't fit at all. I also can't get the mount to loosen to take advantage of the tilt. Maybe I'm just not strong enough. Besides that, it works great, and we love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Caroline Beckwith "carob"
Reviews.Content: Used this to hang a 60 inch plasma LG TV to the wall. We placed it into brick. appears to be sturdy enough  to hold this TV which weighs over 90#.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what its intended to do (For a wall flush mount)
Reviews.Author: Oisin Mcguigan "Guigsy"
Reviews.Content: So... Having read all of the reviews I can say that this mount will mount your TV and take considerable weight. Its a very simple design and works well. Where This item loses a star for me is that if you own a TV with rear ports at the base and not the side it does not work well at all. I could say that it was my fault as it is designed for HDMI ports at the side. If you are like me and have numerous things hooked up to it and you have ports at the rear base then you should skip this item. I had use a separator so I can hook up things like my xbox and audio system as it is wall flush. Otherwise I am well impressed overall. Price is certainly difficult to beat. Well packed and simple to assemble.

Reviews.Title: flat screen bracket
Reviews.Author: Robert Dunham
Reviews.Content: I chose this from Amazon web site. It worked perfectly and was easy to install. I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: solid mount with HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: David B King
Reviews.Content: How can you go anywhere but positive on this even if the mount was a bust, (which it was not) you get an hdmi cable that would normally cost you at least half the price of the mount.With that said the mount was/is sturdy it has supported 2 of my TVs.Its currently Supporting a 42inch Plasma and was previously supporting a 42 inch LCD.  Both TVs where hung and I was not worried about the strength or durability of this product

Reviews.Title: Nice product works very well
Reviews.Author: Donald Stubbs
Reviews.Content: Directions for are about the worst I have every seen. You can eventually figure it out.  Once put together it is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install looks great
Reviews.Author: RobT
Reviews.Content: This was a very easy to install, very solid tv mount. It is much less expensive than some competitors, but is very well built. The instructions called for metric drill sizes, so I had to look up the English equivalent but otherwise it was great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: SHAWN E ROWE
Reviews.Content: Great for the money. I have it mounted on my wall with a 47" sharp led TV. Very easy to mount.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: jenjenison
Reviews.Content: idk what everyone is so upset about - yes the mount came in pieces and you had to assemble it - what doesn't come in pieces in a box anymore?  the directions were easy to follow (again not sure what the complaints are about) and it didn't take long to get it up - we ran into some issues in our apartment when there wasn't a stud 16 inches across so had to run to the hardware store to get it rigged up for drywall (one side only).  the HDMI cable works and we had all pieces necessary to get this baby up on the wall.  took us about 2 hours start to finish -again we had to run to the hardware store and we probably killed 45 minutes to an hour out doing that.  but the TV is hung up and looks great.  BTW it's a 42in Plasma we have by samsung - the part that attaches to the TV barely fit - but it fit.  just measure your stuff and you'll be fine.  we (my husband and i) don't regret buying it for a minute.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Rex Rose
Reviews.Content: When I received the wall mount kit, it didn't look right, and they sent 3 of the same sides not two left and two right, three left and one right. with a drill I modified the extra one and made it work. after that all was good

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted at a great price
Reviews.Author: Bondo
Reviews.Content: This mount works great! It was really easy to assemble and install. The hardest part was locating the wall studs. The only "complaint" I can make about it is that in order to screw in the set screw on the bottom bracket you have to have a really really long screwdriver, and even then you have to leave a big enough gap between the TV and the wall to get the screwdriver in there. Not a big deal, but it does mean that you won't be able to tilt the TV at too much of a downward angle. That really wasn't a big deal to me though. My placement on the wall only required a small amount of tilt.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!  Sturdy, easy to assemble/install, love the extras
Reviews.Author: miss.sarah
Reviews.Content: Worked out great with my new 55in Samsung HDTV.  Had just enough room in back for the HDMI & component cables.  Instructions were easy to follow and thorough. Mount is sturdy and I have no doubt it will continue to stay that way.Not that I'd encourage it, but I was able to mount the tv by myself even though I'm a paltry 5'1", but it took all my core body strength and I almost thought I wasn't going to be able to do it, lol.  Two people would be the smart way to go on that.How adorable is it that it comes with not one but two levels as well as an extra HDMI cord?  That kind of thoughtfulness towards the consumer plus a quality product makes Cheetah a real winner.  Highly recommended.  Definitely begs the question,"Why pay more?"

Reviews.Title: Decent, simple, best for small size TV.
Reviews.Author: Stephen P. Hill
Reviews.Content: This mount is very basic and works well for smaller TVs ( worked fine for my 39 inch TV ).  If you put a large TV on this mount you are limited to nearly flat to the wall - a larger TV just hits the wall at the bottom and prevents any further adjustment.I mounted to drywall so I added extra anchors - it is nice that the mount includes not only flexible TV attachment points, but also flexible wall-mount points.

Reviews.Title: Wall,Mount for TV
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Lipscomb
Reviews.Content: Currently not installed. It does appear,it will meet the requirements necessary for whatever walls  in the home it will be installed upon.

Reviews.Title: Nice and secure mount...
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Can't really beat it for the price. I have purchased both the flat and articulating cheetah mounts and haven't had any issues with either product. I would buy again and have recommended them to friends.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Bruce Moughler
Reviews.Content: Had a problem with one of the screws or something being stripped out brand new.  Kind of made a headache trying to rig it up, but in the end our new 60" vizio mounted very well on this.  Really liked the HDMI cable that came with it.  Used it to hook my computer up to the tv and play a movie from I-tunes.  Pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: first time
Reviews.Author: ronald warren
Reviews.Content: pkg. first arrived i thought wow really small. took it all out and inspected the parts all was there. assembly was easy and fast had my tv up on the wall . i didnt miss any programs. the only problem i had was that a few of the scews were hard to get to to tighten.

Reviews.Title: Company promotes reviews but good product nonetheless
Reviews.Author: Michael T. Williams
Reviews.Content: I leave very few reviews and have to say that a company that asks me to review their product stands an even lesser chance of a review. Having said that, I received an email request to review this product (asking for a good review no less) and I was provided a coupon for a discount on future purchases (in fairness, whether I chose to review the product or not) and despite that I'm going to say a few words.I bought the APTMM2B mount after reading several reviews and because it seemed like a great price to value for the mount. It required a reasonable amount of assembly that was explained well enough and I hung it above my mother's fireplace for a 40 inch screen. It was easy to use the existing studs and I still had plenty of room for adjusting to center the TV despite being mounted slightly off-center above the mantle. Very sturdy and perfectly centered made for a happy mom. It's funny because I actually thought about providing some comments on Amazon but as usual let life get in the way of my altruism and until I received the email from Cheetah Mounts had forgot it. I guess the marketing efforts are effective then huh?I'm giving it 5 stars...and to make it clear have no intention of using their coupon to buy anything else in the near future. I would however use the mount again if the need arises with or without a discount. It's seems reasonably priced already.
