I've not read the reviews since I purchased it but remember some whining about how small it was or something. In my opinion it is a quality mount that if installed within the manufacture's guidelines should be adequate. And that's all I've got to say about that.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I liked the mount so well I bought this one as a second one, only issue I had was hdmi inputs on my tv bought a couple swivel adapters and problem solved

Reviews.Title: Did the Job
Reviews.Author: Paige Yocum
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these and like them a lot love having my T.V.'s off the floor, was difficult to get the 55 in T.V. mounted due to the lack of clearance behind the tv to wall but we made it work.

Reviews.Title: Great product - great price!
Reviews.Author: Todd Sery
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this product.  I've installed several TV wall mounts and the assembly and mounting was as easy as it gets.  Add to it a decent HDMI cable and the product value becomes second to none.I mounted a 60" Panasonic plasma which is about 70 lbs and the mount is solid.I would recommend this to anybody needing a reasonably priced wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: apdial
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this and had no complaints while installing.  the cord are heavy duty and durable, we are happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Compact and sturdy. Buy it!
Reviews.Author: Sigkill(9)
Reviews.Content: I hung my Sharp LC-60LE757U 60-Inch Aquos Quattron on the wall and it looks great. And the mount came with a nice HDMI cable to boot! I dig the Cheetah mounts. Compact, lightweight and well made. Get one and don't look back.

Reviews.Title: Good mounting brackets
Reviews.Author: Snaky
Reviews.Content: The tv fit perfectly with this bracket. I'll recommend this to others that are looking for an inexpensive and good bracket for the wall tv.

Reviews.Title: Simple product at a great price
Reviews.Author: Cy Comer
Reviews.Content: Was referred to Cheetah on Amazon from a friend and was surprised how reasonably priced they are. It seems obvious to me mounting kits and HDMI cables are where the box stores are making up for such slim profit margins on selling TVs.This model mount is very slim and if the TV has connections that point backwards you aren't going to have room unless you are poking holes in the wall. That's fine if that's what you are looking to do. The slimmer the better as long as it is sturdy which this is.If you would need to change connections for some reason you shouldn't get a mount so slim cause that would be a pain.Easy to install. I even used the level provided which is not ideal cause it's so short but does the job.

Reviews.Title: Awesome price does its job.
Reviews.Author: MaBaIL
Reviews.Content: It came quickly. Its a great price. And so far, it does what its suppose to. Cant see why it wouldnt ever. Also it was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: What's Not To Like?
Reviews.Author: Meine Mo "Michael R"
Reviews.Content: Works great, and the price is right!Doesn't have a lot of movement, but it's enough for me, so I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: did the job, although the bottom runner is to small
Reviews.Author: stefanie davis
Reviews.Content: holds the tv great, easy to fit but it tells you in the instructions to screw the lower bar so it locks the tv, can only do this if you have a 2 foot screw driver that can go through the wall, nice and strong

Reviews.Title: Thank you Cheetah
Reviews.Author: Paul C.
Reviews.Content: This was a quick and painless purchase. Cheetah have great customer service. They follow up very well and does not disappoint with their product. Would definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: Does the Job!
Reviews.Author: R. Segletes "Arbiter"
Reviews.Content: Installed fairly easy, only problem I had was finding studs, but that is irrelevant to this product. Holds 47 inch LED TV perfectly and very sturdy. High quality for amazing price. I am very happy and would recommend to anybody looking for a sturdy mount!

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount and works great
Reviews.Author: AndrewR
Reviews.Content: Once the position on wall for T.V is determined, the bracket and t.v. can be installed in less than an hour.The bracket is solid and and holds the T.V. at whatever tilt viewing angle desired.  There is no worry of thet.v. falling from the wall with the latches engaged.  Simple to adjust for center, level or tilt. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard Engler
Reviews.Content: I've got three Cheetah mounts now. I love them.Pros:Very easy to hang (the hard part is finding the studs in your wall, which is true for all mounts).SturdyFree bubble level (there is also a small magnetic bubble level, which I ignored)Free HDMI cable (I didn't need one, but if it's your first HD TV, maybe you do)Comes with different size bolts and washers for a variety of TVs.Cons:They're so slim, it's hard to adjust the tilt. You can adjust the brackets before mounting the TV, but it's very difficult to ensure the two arms are parallel. I use them in the flat configuration, so this wasn't an inconvenience. If you need to tilt your TV, drop my rating to four stars.Requires about 10 minutes of assembly with a screwdriver and hex wrench.Don't pay hundreds of dollars for a mount from your big box store. Get a Cheetah.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mounts for a 60 " tv.
Reviews.Author: NER R. DABU
Reviews.Content: REVISED REVIEW 03/20/2014:I received a call from Heather of customer service saying I will be receiving an improved replacement mount free of charge because I was not satisfied with the original. Too good to be true, right? Well, no. The replacement was received a day earlier than Heather promised. I can't believe it. How many manufacturers/sellers will do this. I installed the new mount soon as I got back from vacation. I am very happy with it. It not only recesses into the wall but it also tilts up and down and left to right. It is very easy now to connect and/or disconnect every sort of cords needed to take full advantage of my 1.5 inches thick 60 inches digital TV. The mount is easy to work with as it is a lot lighter than other mounts I looked at at local stores. The lock screws as well as the tilt lock are very accessible. The price almost sent me into shock.... FREE as promised including S/H. Unbelievable service. I highly recommend this seller and this mount. THANK YOU THANK YOU for making this customer happy. I WILL GIVE THE PRODUCT A 5 STAR only because 5 is the max allowed.P.S.  Assembly and mounting can be done by one person easily. Oh, and the replaced mount need not be returned. I was told to keep it for smaller TVs. It works well for my son's 46 inches TV.

Reviews.Title: Did the Job!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Trovitch
Reviews.Content: I recently put up a sharp 60" TV. When I opened the mount it didnt look sturdy to put up a 60 inch TV, but I went ahead and did so and it turned out to hold up the TV pretty sturdy. It did the job and for the price you really cant beat it. I would recommend this product to anyone!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product, however the directions leave a little to be desired.
Reviews.Author: Beth Marangoni
Reviews.Content: I'll start off by saying that I love this mount. I love it so much that I ordered two more for two other TVs in the house. It's solid, made of quality material, and fairly easy to work with. I did use the level that came with it so that served it's purpose. It was nice of the manufacturer to include an HDMI cable as well.I've seen instructions that were far worse than these but with a little tweaking they could be slightly more understandable. For example lettering the pieces may help the user assemble the mount in a more timely manor.Overall it was easy to install and I will recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount!
Reviews.Author: grcoffee
Reviews.Content: The mount was reasonably priced.  It was easy to mount.  It holds the tv perfectly, and it has enough room for the wall outlet and wires.  I highly recommend this mount.  I will buy this again if I ever need to mount a flat screen again.

Reviews.Title: Rock solid mount
Reviews.Author: NicG
Reviews.Content: Installation was very easy and quick and this thing is rock solid.  I'll bet my 5yo son could do pull-ups on this.  I have no doubt that my 50" TV is very secure on this.  I am a Cheetah user for life!

Reviews.Title: Can't believe it was so inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle E. Eggleston
Reviews.Content: this was an inexpensive wall mount for our TV.  It mounted easily - we didn't use all the screws/hardware that were included.  It works just fine.  Like other reviewers, I was skeptical because it was so inexpensive.  But if you're looking to mount your TV for a fair price, this is it.  Works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: MarLee Fowler
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product. Mounted for a 60" TV. Works wonderfully with no problems. Easy to install and hang the TV. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding bracket for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Sox
Reviews.Content: Was skeptical at first but after item arrived and was assembled I began to like what I saw. I mounted it to the wall as instructed.  I am using this for a 60 inch TV so I wanted to make sure it was sturdy. Before I hung the TV I personally hung on the bracket to test it's durability. I weigh 220 pounds and this item didn't move! TV has been haning for 5 months now and have had absolutely no issues! Works great!

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Lacey Gaddy
Reviews.Content: Great TV mount! Does the trick for the price I paid. Overall a good purchase. Ordered a second one as well.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Zuzana Martins
Reviews.Content: Easy to put on & easy to assemble, great price, what's not to like?I would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount for my 50" flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: david shine
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to install and works great with my 50" ViZIO flat screen TV. I love the fact that this one holds the TV so close ot the wall.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Sturdy Product
Reviews.Author: Elliott S.
Reviews.Content: I am currently using this with my Sony KDL70R550A 70" TV and it has secured it to my wall with no issues whatsoever ever since I installed it on October 2013.  This TV in particular is as flush to the well as it could be with this mountl.  I literally have less than a 1/4 inch of space between the TV's speakers and the wall.The included HDMI cable works fine; even with 3D 1080P movies.  However, I can't vouch for the level because I haven't used it.

Reviews.Title: wall mount
Reviews.Author: Antonio Ponzi
Reviews.Content: I kind of liked the wall mount, but I had to adjust the width otherwise the brackets would not fit into the frame.  Other than that, itsa very good tv wall mount, very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: William K. Hall "RBS"
Reviews.Content: Very good instruction, adequate construction with simple assembly. It preform it's function great and I would strongly recommend the product. Shipment was made timely.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is...
Reviews.Author: J.A.M
Reviews.Content: It's most def a $30 mount...  It's metal, it holds my TV, and it's a TV mount... what more do you want.The reason I say it's a $30 mount... as in cheap...  because of the simplicity of more expensive mounts have that this one doesn't.  I bought a $120 mount for another TV I own and you bolt the square mount on the wall, bolt the hangers on the TV, and THERE YOU GO... it has nice hand twist knobs that you can adjust and nice handles.ANYWAYS... this one doesn't have it.  The instructions are horrible.  Nothing is labeled.  Since I have extensive experience in building with Lego's and putting 300 piece puzzled together, I put 1 and 1 together and assembled the mount.  Got that done.Then I attached the hangers onto my TV... each as pie.  Hung the TV.  Now I noticed why I liked my $120 mount... the hand adjustments on the hangers to adjust the tilt on the tv is a PAIN.  Instead of having nice knobs and leavers... it's all done by a screw driver... phillips head bolts.  After an hour of looking through my house for a nice LONG screw driver.  I adjusted my TV and it was done...I give it 5 stars since it was cheap and my tv hasn't fallen YET...  for $30 and a little more extra work, it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Worked great with our Panasonic LEV 55" TV
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: I will a little concerned at first because of the extra weight of the TV, but the mount worked great.  I did add some additional TapCon Screws for mounting into the brick on the fireplace.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount ! great customer service! Read my review!
Reviews.Author: fresh
Reviews.Content: Seems like great Mount!  But I have a LG 2008  TV and holes are to far apart so didn't work for me but it was nice and slim would have been perfect ,but is a solid Mount would definitely recommend!  There customer service was great they contacted me with in an hour of my review and could not have been more helpful they seen my issue and told me they were already sending out the bracket that would fit my TV no extra charge so now I will be able to hang my TV no problem I was very happy to hear this cause first Mount was very song and good product , and great customer service!  Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: So simple a child can do it....a relatively bright child anyway.
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. I hate to give it such a good review. I don't want the price to go up. Talk about simple. It also allows me to easily change TV's if I want. it will work for all my TV's and large monitors. I can't believe there are any negative reviews. I read them but I'm trying to figure out what they are referring to unless it's all operator error.

Reviews.Title: TV wall mounts
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mounts were easy to assemble and hang up on the wall. Really had no problems with assembly and using the product. Holding up my tv very well. Dyann

Reviews.Title: Excellant price
Reviews.Author: Samuel St. Louis
Reviews.Content: The price was great and holds our TV well. It is easy to remove TV from but easy to secure back on. I would buy another for our house.

Reviews.Title: Great mounts, easy to install!!
Reviews.Author: Greg Swaney
Reviews.Content: I love these mounts! Not only we're they very inexpensive, they were very simple to put together and install to the wall, and they came with an awesome HDMI cable.I would buy these over and over again in a heartbeat and will in the future if I need to mount any more TVs.

Reviews.Title: Light weight but does the job
Reviews.Author: A. Jackson
Reviews.Content: This wall mount feels a little light weight and comes in two pieces with a bag of nuts & bolts, that said it does do the job. I wouldn't got it myself for a TV larger then 32".

Reviews.Title: Can't believe it's this good for being this inexpensive
Reviews.Author: William Sprague
Reviews.Content: Just set this up with an old 32 inch Vizio i moved.  Comes in a tiny protable box with good instructions and once assembled is simple and really solid feeling.

Reviews.Title: You will be highly satisfied with this mount!
Reviews.Author: Troy Glidden
Reviews.Content: I'll keep my review short because your time is valuable -TV used on: Samsung UN55F6350 (55" LED)I purchased this mount in the past, but it has continued to set next to my TV for two reasons: I was not ready to remodel my living room and I wasn't sure just how good this mount was and didn't wan it to ruin my television. I'm kicking myself for not putting my TV on the mount sooner!The mount was fairly easy to set up and is extremely lightweight. I haven't tested the HDMI cable at this point, so I cannot speak for the quality of it, but it does look nice! My television sets as flush to the wall as it possibly can and boy does it look sexy! This mount ROCKS.Notes about installation:The illustrations aren't really that great; IKEA has better illustrations. The SIDE brackets do NOT go over the top/bottom brackets, but rather INSIDE the brackets and then it screws together; if you try to slide the side brackets over the top/bottom brackets, your screw holes will NOT line up.The security screws (after you mount the TV) are a pain in the butt to tighten. I had to go to my local hardware store and purchase an extremely skinny 10" flathead screwdriver to reach up behind the TV to tighten the screws.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this mount and the time it took to install it. If the directions were a BIT more clear I could have installed about 15 minutes faster, but not too bad either way.Now that you've read this and countless other reviews, what are you waiting for? Click that 'Buy Now with 1-Click' button now!

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good quality for the price. Installation isn't the easiest, but not impossible. The level that comes with it isn't the best, but the cable isn't bad. I'd definitely buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: My new Cheetah TV mount
Reviews.Author: raul santiago
Reviews.Content: Purchased one and loved it, Couldn't believe we paid so little for it. Then needed another and bought it from Cheetah. The value of this mount is EXCELLENT! The instructions were easy to read.  Will order one more needed.Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: G. F. Sullenberger
Reviews.Content: Product delivered on time and was as described. Great quality and easy to install. Don't think the price/quality can be beat - will be purchasing more when i have the need.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Day
Reviews.Content: The product was easy to install, looks good on the wall and I would certainly recommend it.  When I received it I was a bit surprised that it smaller than expected.  However, it is simple design that works great.  I combined it with a Arlington TVBR2505K Flat Panel TV Cable Organizer 2-Gang Kit and the cables are completely hidden.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install!
Reviews.Author: John H. "John"
Reviews.Content: I hung my 52" TV up with one of these mounts.  It was easy to use, foolproof to install and works well.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and sturdy. Great value!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Ryans
Reviews.Content: This mount was incredibly easy to install and very secure when installed into studs. My 60 inch LCD flat screen is pretty heavy so I did not even attempt installation with the wall anchors. I was so pleased with it that I purchased a second for my other tv. I lost the original wall mount bolts for my Samsung tv and the bolts included with this mount were too long so a trip to home depot was needed but I can't blame cheetah for that. Installation was so easy that I was able to hang my smaller 46 inch tv by myself.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount and price
Reviews.Author: Matthew A. Mckean "Mamckean"
Reviews.Content: Heavy duty and easy to install. Used it to hang an older, heavy (60 ish pounds) 42 inch flat screen TV on the wall. Had the mount and TV up within 10 minutes with zero issues. Good product.

Reviews.Title: Comes with everything you need and so easy a caveman can do it!
Reviews.Author: terrence
Reviews.Content: Intuitive design comes with everything you possibly need.  Fast install..  It was cheetah fast.  The included hdmi cable was nice. Doubly nice that it is designed for in wall routing which I plan to do.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: James G. Magnano
Reviews.Content: My only gripes with this product are the manual isn't very clear and the included levels aren't very accurate.  The mount is easy to assemble once you've played with it a bit, and while it seems "light weight" it is very solid.  Very securely holding my 40 inch Samsung.  I have never mounted a TV before, and this product made it fast, easy and safe.  Total time (not counting figuring out the manual/parts) 15 minutes to mount.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Robert Carnes
Reviews.Content: I have a 60" flat screen TV and most of the mounts I were looking at were so expensive, after reading the reviews on this product I ordered it. It came within a few days and took me and my cousin 10 minutes after opening it to have everything done and hung up. The TV looks great. I will be ordering more for my next Tv. Great product.

Reviews.Title: 2nd purchase, still happy
Reviews.Author: Eric Gregg
Reviews.Content: This mount is easy to install and works perfectly. The included HDMI cable and level are a nice bonus.This is my 2nd purchase of this particular mount. If I ever get another TV I'm sure I'll be buying a 3rd.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: DWH
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time, and at a great price.  Assembled easily -- found some studs in the wall and mounted the rack in 10 minutes. Then hung a 70 lb 46" LED TV on it without a hitch!  Love it.!

Reviews.Title: Good mount for the money
Reviews.Author: dieter hirsch
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. All the hardware needed was included, I used better screws to anchor to studs in the wall. Do not trust the level in the box!

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Easy installation!
Reviews.Author: Priscila
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and wasn't sure if I could install it on dry wall. I asked a question and got very helpful answers from some nice customers, so I decided to give it a try. I am glad I did it! The product has a nice construction, solid metal, and instructions are very clear. It comes with an angle level indicator to make installation even easier. My husband installed 2 Samsung 46" TV's on dry wall with the help of a Zircom Edge stud Finder (we used HD25 - $9.99 at Home Depot and works perfectly). We had no issues at all, TOTALLY RECOMMEND IT!

Reviews.Title: Vesa 100x100 problems
Reviews.Author: Orlando
Reviews.Content: If your TV is Vesa 100x100 then you will have a problem mounting it on this bracket. The wall bracket that attaches the two pieces together (the bracket has to be assembled) comes into conflict with the TV brackets. I had to use a dermal to carve out space for the TV brackets to land properly. Also the TV feels very loose with the over sized brackets. On a TV larger than 32" and with VESA 200x200 or larger you'll be fine.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount...
Reviews.Author: Les
Reviews.Content: This was a perfect buy...we mounted our 46" TV and it works great...at first we bought a different name brand it worked ok...then we bought this one at a better price and we are very satisfide.

Reviews.Title: Good light mount
Reviews.Author: Ollen D. Wamsley
Reviews.Content: The mount is a good light weight mount. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a quick easy to mount TV mounting bracket.

Reviews.Title: Some assembly required, but gets job done for less $$.
Reviews.Author: Matthew McConville
Reviews.Content: Great product. Some assembly required, but very solid construction once everything is in place. Used for a 60 inch plasma. Easy tilt functionality.

Reviews.Title: Diificult to set up
Reviews.Author: younsoo kim
Reviews.Content: Its difficult to set up 65"tv ,  .  Difficult To .fasthen  lower  screw  bolt that is located  on the  rear of  the  Tv...

Reviews.Title: Hung a very heavy 60 inch plasma with no problem
Reviews.Author: Aslan Deacon
Reviews.Content: Works great, solid and sturdy.Not worth spending more for a similar product.  Easy to setup and lots of extra stuff like cable adapters and levels.

Reviews.Title: How is this so cheap?
Reviews.Author: Midwest Mike
Reviews.Content: I have to rate this five stars for being one of the best values I have ever received. I almost bought a mount at Lowes for over $100 and I'm lucky that I decided to check amazon first.This is one of the most reviewed item I've seen on amazon, so I'll keep this short.Pros:Very sturdy, doesn't budge side to side when my kids are messing with the tvAmazing priceComes with everything you need to mount itTilts and holds tilt in position you set it toDoes the same thing that a $100 plus mount does from the big box storesCons:NoneI would recommend

Reviews.Title: A good strong mount.
Reviews.Author: kYpondman
Reviews.Content: installed this for my 65" Samsung TV.  I like that it can be pulled out to do cabling, etc., and is fully adjustable (both sideways, up/down and forward/back).  The price was great also.  A very secure mount.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Matthew E. Schwarm
Reviews.Content: and much cheaper than similar items.  Easy to assemble and install.  sturdy. low profile allows tv to mount about 1-2" from wall.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Toodlebop
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a flat screen mount.  We purchased a 50" Sceptre tv and wanted to mount it.  Looked in store at Wal-Mart & there mounts were 2-3 times as much for the same setup.  Looked on aAmazon and found this and decided it was worth the waiting for the 2 day shipping time for the price difference plus this one also comes with 10' HDMI cable and the one in Wal-Mart did not.  Walmart online had similar mounts for similar price but the shipping would have taken longer for site to store plus the HDMI cable that came with it would have only been 6'.  So glad we purchased this one.  Installation went smoothly and it is functioning great after about a month of use now.

Reviews.Title: Cheap product, poor intsructions. Side support braces where bent.
Reviews.Author: AllanS
Reviews.Content: This TV wall mount bracket was horrible. It took me about 45 minutes to assemble and hang. The box looked as though it had been exposed to moisture, and as a result there was surface rust on the mental. When I laid out all the pieces and cleaned them i noticed that the side support braces that bring the top and bottom pieces together both where bent when I got to that step. So I bent them back into shape, and because of that the bracket was no longer square so I to get creative when I went to mounting it on the wall to make sure that the TV would sit level. I didn't return the item because after I made it this far I wasn't about to take it apart, send it back, and wait around for another one.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert   Mohra
Reviews.Content: Received it in 3 days,very good instructions, very easy to install ,every thing was included for a very smooth and easy installation. Would definitely buy again .

Reviews.Title: Nice rack
Reviews.Author: drivingfool
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and came with everything needed except tools. Had two different types of levels and various fasteners. Will buy again when I mount my other tv

Reviews.Title: It holds the big TV
Reviews.Author: buck
Reviews.Content: Bought this to mount my 60 inch Vizio on the wall.It does the job well.  TV is secure.It's tight to the wall, so not easy to plug things in once it's mounted.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the money
Reviews.Author: Keith Rounds
Reviews.Content: This is a great bargain for the price. I mounted a 55" Samsung smart TV on it into concrete in a basement bedroom. It doesn't really look like it would be the strongest mount but after almost 3 months, the TV is still hanging so I guess that counts for something (for me and the mount).The level with it is junk, don't use it. Also, the tilt feature doesn't work and stay in place well. Still worth the savings over more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Needs a redesign, but customer service is great
Reviews.Author: Curtis Rice
Reviews.Content: Basically the set screws that need to be used to anchor the tv in place will only work if you mount it flat against the wall. I have mine at a tilt, so the set screws don't reach their destination point under the frame. Therefore my tv is just hanging by the top bars and not secure at all. I don't have too much of a problem with it as my son cant reach it yet and we don't have many earthquakes. The manufacture is aware of the problem and are fixing it for future models. They gave me some money back for the inconvenience.Thanks Cheetah Mounts.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Nick Blake
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the price, my friend installed it with ease and it hasn't fallen off the wall yet! Lol great so far.

Reviews.Title: A little scary
Reviews.Author: J. Rutledge
Reviews.Content: I've worked off and on in home theater stuff (Best Buy installs, A/V industry recently) going back to 2006. I've seen many, many, many kinds of mounts. There is (or was) at least a 70% markup in stores for what you got, but it still felt like you got something substantial for it.True, those mounts would probably bring down the wall before they broke, but it's a nice feeling of security. When I got this Cheetah mount I was shocked to say the least. The box is tiny. The pieces are thin and bendable by hand. Despite the reviews my doubts started to grow.If you feel this way too when you get it don't worry too much. This really is a clever design to make something function as cheaply to manufacture as possible. There is nothing wrong with that for this because it just has to work (there is no fundamental "this one works better" for a flat wall mount). All it is doing is transferring the weight of the TV to the wall and is reinforced exactly where it is needed and nowhere else. I put up a 47" LCD up which wasn't the lightest model you can get these days but I had no real concerns once it was on.It's pretty close to the wall so the tilt will be limited to how large your tv is before it hits the wall. If you need a lot of tilt I'm sure there are better options. The plastic level that came with it actually worked great for me but it is very cheap.My advice to anyone is make sure you screw in everything perfectly and predrill your holes exactly. There isn't a lot of leeway for error.I'm only giving it 4 stars because despite everything, I'd much rather pay $5 more dollars and getting rid of the HDMI cable for a slightly sturdier product. It really does seem like it's cutting it close. But like I said, that's all you really need. The only real complication I can imagine is if the TV gets bumped and it can't handle a sideways force on it.

Reviews.Title: Good product and easy to mount
Reviews.Author: Susan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these mounts to hang two 51" Samsung TV's. All the pieces and hardware were easy to identify and organize. Easy to mount the brackets to the TV. No problem mounting hardware to the wall. Easily handled the weight of the TV's with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, great value
Reviews.Author: Aaron M. Smith "@@ron"
Reviews.Content: The installation kit was very easy to use.  I had two of these installed and done in less than an hour.  As mentioned in other reviews, the safety screw is a bit hard to reach, but I was able to do it with a regular screwdriver on 50' and 55' TVs.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Golf Book Lover
Reviews.Content: This is the second mount I've ordered.  Both were easy to install and supported the wall mount precisely as I needed, and at a great price.

Reviews.Title: If debating a tv mount, buy this one
Reviews.Author: Steven Slaugh
Reviews.Content: For price, this was the best product.  The only issue was that without tiny arms I could not put on the safety screw, so the tv is hung without it.  Better than any product I could buy in the store.

Reviews.Title: Not For Me
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I thought I wanted a low profile mount and I had previously bought an extendable mount from Cheetah Mounts for another TV and was very pleased with it.For some reason I had a great deal of trouble mounting my TV on here. I think a big part of the problem is the wires and connectors getting in the way behind the TV.I'm not sure if I can really blame the mount and I definitely can't blame CHeetah Mounts. But, I could NOT get this to work acceptably well for me. I think I'm going to order another one of the extendable mounts that I had gotten before. It doesn't mount as flush to the wall, but was soooo much easier to work with.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase! Love it!
Reviews.Author: Grateful Father
Reviews.Content: This product did exactly what I purchased it to do, and was worth every penny that I spent on it. Would definitely purchase this brand and product again if a similar need arises.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount.  Directions could be a little more specific.
Reviews.Author: billysastard
Reviews.Content: Once I got the bracket put together, it was a piece of cake. Don't get me wrong, I am very handy and can follow any directions and put anything together, but the bracket was not simple.

Reviews.Title: Small and perfect!
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: These mounts are suprisingly small! From the box the arrive in to the wall, they have everything you need to mount and hang your tvs. I have 2 Vizio TVs, one 47" and one 32". We used this mount for both of them, the mount does NOT peek out from behind the 32" but it is close! I wouldn't use this mount for anything smaller than 32". It's a great kit and is really efficient. I'd recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Not very sturdy
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: It's thin and frail. It doesn't allow enough room to tighten the bolts. All the others I've used have thumb screws.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: taylor williams
Reviews.Content: The directions are easy to follow and as long as you have the proper drill bits and a medium grade drill it is easy to set up.  I hung up 2 tv's one took me about 45 minutes.

Reviews.Title: I love it !
Reviews.Author: Leonard Shterenberg
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount is an incredible value. The mount is amazingly sturdy and very well built. It took me about 30 minutes to assemble the parts out of the box. Then another hour to mount the TV to the brick above our fireplace. I used 4 Quicktap blue masonry anchors to attach the mount to the wall, and it is so secure I could probably hang from the TV itself.I was also pleased to find that the mount included all of the hardware (bolts, washers, spacers) that you would need to mount almost any VESA compatible flat panel. Our TV is a 52 inch Samsung (750 series) and the bolts I needed were included.Overall, a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Judson911
Reviews.Content: Freed up plenty of floor space in our home. No more tv stands. Got rid of cable and have internet only. HD cable perfect for roku. These are very sturdy! Not cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: great wall mount
Reviews.Author: Craig Brown
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy bracket and good value. Installed in ~15 minutes. Directions pretty good and hardware kit was a pleasant surprise, each size screw separated and labeled. I've bought two.

Reviews.Title: Worth it.
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Easy simple and as advertised. I would recommend this product to a friend. Worth it! This requires more words to submit so these are words.

Reviews.Title: Great TV mount
Reviews.Author: Smason
Reviews.Content: Not much to say, it's a solid TV mount that does exactly what it says it'll do. Installation was straightforward and we have had no issues with anything so far. highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Never go wrong with Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: Installation was easy once you figured out the instructions of how the support mounts were to be connected, but after that it went up in no time and holds the 47" LCD secure to the wall. I'll be ordering more of these to make the entire house clutter free of cables.thanks Cheetah

Reviews.Title: Better than what I thought!
Reviews.Author: Tava Brown
Reviews.Content: I was unsure about ordering this off line because the price was so good. Because it was so low in price I thought maybe it was made cheap and would not hold our TV on the wall. The day we received it we put it up and so far it holds our 55 inch just great. This is a great buy for the price as looking around at places like target and walmart they are much more.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Dale R. Warner
Reviews.Content: The transaction itself was smooth.  However, I found the mount to be very flimsy.  I understand green engineering but I wouldn't hang a 60" led on it.  Furthermore, while adjustment is incorporated, it would be extremely hard to access with the tv hung.  I still don't understand how one could rotate for level.I will keep it but only use it on a smaller tv.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: Great product  fast shipping and easy to install recommend other people to buy this product. Looks good in the wall and even better with the tv mounted

Reviews.Title: Poor quality construction and didn't work with my TV.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Keen
Reviews.Content: Although this is supposed to be a universal mount, be careful. This didn't work on my older Panasonic Th-42PX60U as the back was too curved. I should have spent the extra $10.00 and purchased from my normal mount provider - Monoprice. My fault for being cheap and wanting it within two days.**Update**I must say, SPN Performance has fantastic customer service. After my review, they gave me a phone call and wanted to understand why I was upset with my purchased. I had explained that I didn't like the poor quality of construction or the fact that it didn't have many of the bolts I needed. Because of my experience, they insisted on sending me a complimentary HDMI Cable I needed. Although this doesn't change the quality of the product, it does go to show that this company certainly puts the customer FIRST, hence the update two two stars.

Reviews.Title: Great deal great value
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Assembly went very smoothlyThe build quality and finish is great for the priceA very good valueHighly recommended

Reviews.Title: Great Mount & Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Yogg
Reviews.Content: This is mount arrived as promised and well packaged. The mount is made of quality materials and comes with easy to follow instructions. It came with different kind of screws to attach to the TV and an HDMI cable. I was able to find two studs and attached the mount to them. I have an LG HD Smart 3D 47" mounted on this bracket. I did the installation and hanging of TV by myself. My TV weights about 40 lbs.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Greg kümmel
Reviews.Content: Great product great price easy to install tv is very secure on the wall highly recommend this product A+++ �

Reviews.Title: buy this
Reviews.Author: Paula Gray
Reviews.Content: the only reason your looking at this is because you want a wall mount.look no further this one is great!  it holds my samsung 60 inch plasma tv perfectly

Reviews.Title: Great, simple mount
Reviews.Author: jared
Reviews.Content: I used this to mount my 60" plasma which is pretty heavy.  The mount feels very secure.  There is some assembly required, but once assembled it was great.  I did have a small issue getting the tilt of both arms the same, but once i set them they worked good.  The HDMI cable and level are a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Leandro Lencina
Reviews.Content: Wheverer I need to hang a plasma I always get the same mount, this one !!! (bought 4 so far) Great product, not bulky, easy to install and has  a tilt option. Plasma stays nice and flushed against the wall. Plenty of hardware comes with it, always had the right size screw for every tv so far :)

Reviews.Title: Please Read - Samsung 60" TV
Reviews.Author: Drewbie
Reviews.Content: The wall mount serves its purpose.  Its holding the TV on the wall (Maybe 2 months now).Issues:  The level it comes with has a margin of error to it, compared to a better quality level.  The frame came bent, and we were unable to fix, therefore the TV does not tilt.We hook up our Wii and use component cables (Red, Blue, Green) and they stick directly in the back, and there is not much room to switch if needed.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv.
Reviews.Author: Guy
Reviews.Content: Heard that this is a good mount. Not yet installed.  will give report when it is up and running soon.

Reviews.Title: Great sturdy product!
Reviews.Author: Stefan James
Reviews.Content: For under $40 for this Cheetah wall mount this is a GREAT sturdy product! I highly recommend you get it today!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: D. Winston
Reviews.Content: Great value and is exactly what I was looking for. Walmart is still charging almost $100 for the same type of mount.

Reviews.Title: No more yelling at the dogs to move
Reviews.Author: Kathleen McDermott
Reviews.Content: came when expected easy to install and now my husband can watch tv and change chancels without the dogs being in the way.

Reviews.Title: Great TV mount, great price (can't argue!)
Reviews.Author: Sergio A.
Reviews.Content: It worked like a charm for me. I recently used it to mount a Philips 46" LED TV right above my fireplace on sheet rock. The screws and plastic anchors provided worked well [actually, I lost one of the 6mm ones and TV mount still solid on three of them]. Definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: For price great value mounts
Reviews.Author: Ty Pittman
Reviews.Content: Get what is advertised decent mounts especially for the price. The tilt is nice and the material seems durable not cheap and flimsy. Mounts of similar size at like Best Buy go for 80+ dollars total rip off from Best Buy !!!

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Benjamin B. Owens
Reviews.Content: This mount is amazing, I don't understand why anyone would buy one from Best Buy or any other large retail store.  I completed installation by myself for my 40" Samsung.  Took me a little longer than normal because I didn't get all the tools I needed up front so I had to go to my shed a few times but no complaints.  I installed this today, everything seems solid and strong, guess we'll see if it holds up (hopefully my tv won't be on the floor when I come home from work or in the middle of the night)!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CHOICE for wall-mounts!!!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Hiser
Reviews.Content: I have THREE Cheetah Mounts brand wall mounts. THE QUALITY IS ABOVE ANY I've seen in the stores! Made from VERY sturdy metal, and installation A BREEZE! I am not "mechanically inclined" and neither is my husband, however mounting my televisions using a Cheetah mount was very easy.  The only help I needed to mount was someone to help support the weight of the television so I could attach the mount. This is the very first product review that I've ever written, however I felt compelled to do so here. Two of my mounts are full movement and the third, a tilt only. WHY PAY $200 to $300 dollars for a more popular brand? YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED WITH THESE MOUNTS!!

Reviews.Title: Great mount for a great price!
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Purchased this mount for about 1/3 of the cost of a similar mount at a retail store and couldn't be happier with it holds my 46" LED with absolutely no problem and is very adjustable so it will fit a wide range of televisions.

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Gdog
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to mount and worked extremely well - directions were great.  Very good product for the price that was charged.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount does the job
Reviews.Author: Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I used this to mount a 32" Sony LCD.  Worked well, easy to put together and plenty of slots to line up easily with studs behind the drywall.  I didn't use the HDMI or Level, so my review does not include those items.

Reviews.Title: great mount for 60 inchflat screen
Reviews.Author: J. Moore
Reviews.Content: this was the easiest unit to mount to the wall and to my 60 inch flat screen. after the unit was mounted to the wall it was very easy to install the tv on it. the only problem was the set screws to secure the tv to the mount were very hard to tighten when the set was in place. very good item and would recommend it to anyone that has a large tv

Reviews.Title: Skeptical
Reviews.Author: Seth Middleberg
Reviews.Content: When it came in the box I was very skeptical.  You see the size of the boxes in the stores so what was I to think. I was very easy to put together and it was very light.  Well, it's up and working. Very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and well made
Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I never order expensive tv mounts and I have always been pleased.  This unit was not very expensive and it works great.  Was easy to put together and went on the wall very easily.  Tv feels very secure and to date I have had zero issues.

Reviews.Title: The price was right
Reviews.Author: Kyle Flavin
Reviews.Content: The installation wasn't so straightforward.  The instructions didn't match the pieces in several places.  In some places they were wrong for the TV, which took some time to figure out.  Also, once I'd mounted the TV I realized I'd forgotten to plug in the cables first.  The TV sits so close to the wall that I found I was unable to remove the securing bottom screws because the screw driver head couldn't fit in the space between the wall and the television (neither could my hand).  I had to run to Lowes to purchase a 16" phillips head to get them out and plug in the power.It's fine now that it's up, and seems to be pretty sturdy.  If I had to do it again I'd probably look around a little more first.**EDIT**: Adding another star because the customer service from this company was very good.  After I wrote my initial review, they reached out unsolicited and gave me nearly a full refund without my even asking.  They indicated there was a newer set of installation instructions, and said I may have received an older copy.  I'd buy from this vendor again just for their service.  I was really impressed with their response.

Reviews.Title: Beware it does not fit every TV
Reviews.Author: Frank D Pulaski
Reviews.Content: The unit does what it says - it is a low profile, 15 Deg tilt TV wall mount bracket.  And it is a fair price.  What I did find out is that the product does not have the correct hardware for the TCL television.  The spacers were too big (ended up shaving them to fit), the top 2 bolts to attach the arms to the TV did not fit (the bolts were too long - had to go to a hardware store to get bolts 3/8 inch shorter), and it is impossible to tighten the bottom 'safety' screws to insure that the TV does not move (ended up just taking them off).  One other annoyance that is common to most inexpensive wall mounts - there is no provision to route the cables through the bracket to keep them organized.Overall, will use it - but will do more research for the next unit I buy...

Reviews.Title: The price is right
Reviews.Author: Robert Leaper
Reviews.Content: Looked locally at TV mounts and they were way more expensive. I am very handy and was ready to make a mount. found this one that was less costly than to make one. Good quality, good instructions and does the job well. I highly recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: Electronics salesman approved!!!
Reviews.Author: renoroc
Reviews.Content: I Currently work at a Big box retail in the home theater department where a wall mount like this will run you over 100 dollars. this mount is just as good if not better as the ones we sell. the only thing is make sure you read directions and hit studs and make sure it is very even.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: iMe
Reviews.Content: I got this wall mount for a 32" Sony TV after reading all the great reviews.  For the cost, I would say this wall mount is a great purchase; however, there are some cons to purchasing a mount at such a great deal.My first challenge was with the instructions/packaging.  The document is actually well put together and each piece is assigned a letter in the diagrams; but none of the pieces actually have the letters on them.  Each piece comes in a bag, and neither the piece nor the bag contains a label.  This isn't such a big deal though.The second challenge was with the parts.  Out of the box, one washer was broken, and I somehow cracked and broke 2 others during the install.  I also managed to mess up a screw.  I'm not sure what materials the parts are made out of, but do use caution if using power tools.  The bad part of all this is that no spares are really included.  Luckily I had extra washers/screws I could use from past furniture purchases.Overall, I do not regret the purchase, and in fact really do like the wall mount.  I would just suggest being careful assembling it since the parts aren't labeled and that you be cautious in not over-tightening parts if using power tools.An HDMI cable is also included, making this even a better deal, and the included levels really help!!02/18/2014 Update:I just wanted to post that Cheetah Mounts provides exceptional customer service.  The company quickly followed up with me via email and by calling me after this review.  Most companies would not care to follow up, especially considering this review isn't very negative.If you experience any challenges with this mount, be sure to contact Cheetah Mounts - they are available, and happy, to assist with any issues.

Reviews.Title: Did the job
Reviews.Author: M. Dewar "Semper Fi"
Reviews.Content: Did its job of holding up our TV. Seemed pretty solid. Been up over a yr + now. TV still up there strong.

Reviews.Title: Strong and easy to install
Reviews.Author: LicheeNut
Reviews.Content: I got a new 60" LED TV and wanted to hang my old 40" plasma TV in my den.  Its a bulky and heavy TV (i.e., about 80lbs) so I needed something that could handle the weight.  The Cheetah Mount worked out perfect and was relatively easy to mount.  For heavy TVs you definitely want to screw mounting bracket into studs. Did not like the color and pattern of the HDMI cable but it was a nice bonus that came with the mount.

Reviews.Title: Good sturdy mount!
Reviews.Author: J Ponder
Reviews.Content: I purchased this mount for a 46 inch LG LED.  It does the job without worry.  It allow for some vertical tilt.It does not give you much room to get to inputs and such when TV is mounted, especially is you're a male with decent sized or large hands.  Thankfully, I actually screwed a two 30" 2x4 to the studs first and then attached the mount to the top 2x4.  This gave me the ability to mount the mount as needed to the 2x4s without respect to where the studs were.  The bottom 2x4 serves as a rest point for TV without having too much tilt.  Even with this setup that gives me an additional near 2 inches of room to work with behind the TV to connect to inputs, I still struggle to get to them.  I can only imagine if the 2x4 was not there.  I would probably have to remove the TV to add inputs.  This would make swapping or connecting to inputs a two person job.  Overall I'm happy with this mount.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jim Jonas
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for my wall mount tv and was extremely economical. Would recommend this product to anyone looking to mount their tv.

Reviews.Title: Works well once assembled
Reviews.Author: Just a guy
Reviews.Content: The assembly instructions leave something to be desired and the attached bubble level does not really fit on the frame at all.Once assembled, however, mine is square and true.  It works very well.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed, but Compensated.
Reviews.Author: A. Wilks
Reviews.Content: *Updated Review:The first review still stands for the most part(see below). I was able to get the mount to work. It seems like it will hold. The brackets that connect your TV to the mount are flimsy. Trying to center my TV bent those way too easily. Hopefully they fix that in the future. A nice lady from Cheetah mounts contacted me. She was very concerned about my comments on the mount, and asked me a few questions about it. I answered them, and she was able to "rectify" the situation. I spent more time than I should have installing this mount, and had to do some things to make it work in my situation. Let's just say, I'm satisfied with how Cheetah Mounts handled this. Their costumer service is much better than most others I have experienced. I will buy from them again. The best I can give is 3*s, and it's mostly for the customer service, had to -2* for the flimsy mount.*Original Review:Significantly not as pictured. The arms that hold the tv to the mount are not as pictured. They are much thinner, and have many "cheetah" holes in them. They bend extremely easy while trying to center your tv. The levels that come with the mount are almost worthless. The "built in level" is no longer built in, and you are not able to place it in the center of the mount due to its horrible new design. Luckily I have a 4' level, and that's how I was able to get this mount on the wall properly. The mount itself gets 1*, I added another * for the hdmi cord. I have 2 other cheetah mounts in my house, and they are great, but I can not recommend this one. I'm more than likely going to replace it with a higher quality mount because I do not have much faith in this one. It says it can hold 165lbs, I have a 60" Sharp Aquos that weighs maybe 65lbs, and I don't trust it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Allen P. Buck IV
Reviews.Content: I've been buying these mounts for 8 years and they keep getting better. Now they have the level built in, and include a free HDMI cable. So fast and simple, very highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: J. Boice "13Bentarm"
Reviews.Content: For the price, SHAZAM!! Love this mount.  It takes a little bit of mechanical know how but if you have that this unit will save you a ton of money.

Reviews.Title: Just what you need at a great price
Reviews.Author: Dave Bock
Reviews.Content: This was at least half of what you would expect to pay for TV mount. I found it easy to assemble and mount on the wall. The only knock was the tilt adjustment screws are very tight .If your not careful you could strip the head of the screw .

Reviews.Title: Strong Mount/Great Price
Reviews.Author: SirBarksALot "SirBarksALot"
Reviews.Content: Love this mount. My new 55" fits perfectly on it, and it doesn't budge on the wall. The tilt feature comes in handy when adding components or plugs, and had no problems attataching it to the TV. I priced similar mounts at the big stores, and they ran $50-150. Thanks for a strong, affordable mount without all of the fluff.

Reviews.Title: Very Tight access
Reviews.Author: Brian Messenger
Reviews.Content: Anchors well but access to the small bolts at bottom of brackets, which anchors the brackets into the frame are extremely difficult to get to once TV is hanging and really limited on other options/opportunities to perform tightening on bolts.  Have seen others with better style locking mechanisms.  Value was great and is workable just might be better to redesign that option.

Reviews.Title: great idea!
Reviews.Author: Sean Best
Reviews.Content: This product really assisted in creating space in my tv room by mounting same on the wall. I would recommend this product to all my friends and family members.

Reviews.Title: The installing of a 55" thin screen mount for a 55" TV
Reviews.Author: Herbert  Norris
Reviews.Content: I rec'd the mount quickly ,,,,found the mount assy'd very easy,, didn't even need the instructions After finding the studs we where done within a very few mins,,.We did use a stud finder it helps a bunch.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Christopher Tracy
Reviews.Content: This product was great!  I have bought and installed three of these mounts.  There were easy to follow instructions and they were easy to install.  I would recommend this product to anyone interested in a wall mount bracket for their TV.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mattfswife
Reviews.Content: This tv wall mount is great for the price and works perfect above our fireplace.  It was easy to install, fits our 46'' flat screen tv perfectly, and the only issue we had was my husbands inability to measure correctly.  It was easy to lower and re-install though so we can't complain!

Reviews.Title: Don't let the price fool you
Reviews.Author: Sharif Jameel
Reviews.Content: For the price I was definitely concerned about purchasing this however after now having 2 of them I can say although they seem flimsy out of the box, once you assemble it properly it's solid as a rock. The price is amazing AND it comes with a nice HDMI cable and a level... awesome.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality.
Reviews.Author: Blue Moon
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and reasonably priced. Included enough hardware to cover all possible installation scenarios.Would recommend using your own larger level.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Flaherty
Reviews.Content: I've bought a few expensive mounts in the past and they all do the same thing - hang the tv on the wall.  The Cheetah Mount is no different and is much cheaper than a lot of the alternatives.  As long as you only want the TV to hang and maybe tilt a bit - this is the product for you.  The level is a nice added bonus and the HDMI cable can be very useful if you are in need of a long cable.

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Valerie Tagliavia "40 sumthin' mom"
Reviews.Content: No reason to overspend on a bracket.  Hung a 55" LG t.v. and its great.  OK it comes in a very small box and you have to put it together which was a little perplexing...maybe the part names were not labeled correctly, but I would not pass on the 50 to 80 dollar savings for that!

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount!
Reviews.Author: Careful Consumer
Reviews.Content: I used this mount to hang our new 46" TV.  The bracket proved to be sturdy and pretty easy to assemble and secure.  I was particularly impressed with the selection and packaging of the included hardware: it's like they tried to anticipate virtually any mounting situation their customers might encounter, and then packaged the parts up in individually labelled pockets so you could never go wrong!  The included HDMI cable was a nice bonus, too, especially considering how reasonable the price was to begin with.  Plus, even though the instructions assume that your TV will have come with the correct mounting screws, they provide a comprehensive assortment of them anyway.  Which was perfect, since our new TV had no mounting screws included with it.The only thing I'm wasn't thrilled with is location of the two bottom screws that are included as a safeguard to prevent you or an earthquake from accidentally knocking the TV off the mount (which would be pretty hard to do even without the safety screws).  They are kind of hard to get to, but not so bad that I would deduct any stars from my review.  Part of the reason they are hard to access is the way the bracket hold the TV so close to the wall, which I think is a great feature.Very satisfied with the purchase and the price.  Good bargain, good product!

Reviews.Title: Thin metal construction
Reviews.Author: John J Czechowicz
Reviews.Content: When first used, the product worked ok (although a little flimsy) - upon relocating the display and mounting it a second time, the metal ended up bending, then breaking with a 55" LED display.  Other slightly more expensive products use much heavier duty metal.*** I revised from 1 to 3 stars do to excellent customer service, if you have any issues with the product, I encourage you contact them.

Reviews.Title: Perfect item
Reviews.Author: Gallage Amarasena "Austin8210"
Reviews.Content: Perfect wall mount. Easy to install. I made a mistake at first by holding the mount upside down on the wall bracket. Great item.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: extremely easy to install, handles the weight of the 50" TV very well (regular LCD, about 40 lbs). The included HDMI cable and level are useful as well.

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: easy to mount and great price i will buy again for an other tv for my living room and my kids room

Reviews.Title: fit perfect for samsung 75" LED
Reviews.Author: J. Ji
Reviews.Content: product works perfect for Samsung 75" LED flat TV, strong and study. accessories are nice. Installation is easy enough to do DIY.

Reviews.Title: First time wall mounting
Reviews.Author: arahey
Reviews.Content: I have never mounted a tv on the wall before and was a little apprehensive. This mount was simple to assemble and put up. Very happy

Reviews.Title: Great mount kit for a great price
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: This kit is great. (The hdmi cable is a really nice perk) As for the mount itself, the instructions were very detailed and explanatory, and before long my tv was hanging perfectly on the wall. Definitely would recommend this for anyone looking to hang a large tv

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: I love this product !! it was easy to assemble and holds my flat screen very nicely up high so my 5 kids can not touch the screen !!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Michael Falkner
Reviews.Content: TL;DR:Pros: Sturdy mount, great price, came with some bonuses (level and HDMI cable).Cons: Screws were too long, bought nuts at home depot to supplement the gap and the TV hangs fine (2 months now).Full Review:I bought this mount for my 32" Samsung LED TV that I have in my room.  Mounts at major retailers are $50+ and being a former retail employee I know the margin is HUGE on these items.  The added HDMI cable and level weren't a selling point but a great bonus and since I don't own a level I was happy to have that added confidence when installing the mount.The mount itself is fairly simple to put together, if you have ever played with Legos you probably figured it out sooner than people who have not and decided to read the instructions (meaning the pieces fit together a certain way perfectly).  The biggest trouble I had was with applying the brackets to the TV.  The screw was the right size but was too long and the brackets shifted back and forth on the screws.  I went to home depot and purchased nuts to supplement the gap in the screws.Update: Cheetah reached out to me and apologized for the inconvenience for the screw size and offered me a make good.  Awesome service, I was taken by surprise to receive that phone call, A++++ Customer Service!

Reviews.Title: wall mount
Reviews.Author: Jamie Bhan
Reviews.Content: this wall mount is great, not bulking and easy to install.  hardest part was finding studs.  quick shipping and arrived in time.  all reviews of this product were on.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Wendland "jeffwend"
Reviews.Content: Its very affordable and it mounted easily to the wall. However, there is not enough room to latch the bottom support on to the TV. As a result, it is hanging by only the top bar and not the lower. We have a dresser in front of the tv so there is little worry about bumping it, but if it was on the wall in the living room and kids were playing it could easily be knocked off the wall.

Reviews.Title: Flush mount gets the job done quickly
Reviews.Author: Douglas Parrella
Reviews.Content: This kit was rather easy to work with and came with a few decent accessories.The level was okay, a few air bubbles in the level made it hard to work with so I wouldn't count on this entirely.I did happen to use the HDMI cable on my FIOS box which is longer than the one supplied and provided equal results.Its not a replacment for a high end cable but most folks won't buy one of those anyway so its a decent option if you need the extra distance.The best item of all was the flushness I achieved since I was mounting over a fireplace. I wanted little to no noticable gap with the ability to tilt forward. This was perfect for this kind of application and the cost was hands done perfect.The only negative design aspect I found was the overall length of the assembly. For instance if your wall studs are not positioned pretty close to the mounting area you may have not achieve true center due the rail length. If you notice from the picture there is limited left to right movement before you hit the stops on the top rail. So in short if you have to shift the mount to the right or left some in order to hit the wall studs you may not be able to slide the TV far enough down the top rail to position it where you want. In my opinion on my 50" TV I had plenty of room for a larger bracket that would allowed for a longer rail system. This mount would not be a good fit in that case - but for me I was lucky on the wall stud position. Others may not be so lucky.

Reviews.Title: Cheap made
Reviews.Author: charles r rector
Reviews.Content: This is the worst mount I have ever bought ,its made out of thin metal half the bolts used to put it together were stripped out I was afraid to use this on my new 65 inch Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Saunders "Papa Smurf"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to put up, The instructions were clear and the Television was a snap to hang.  Job done.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount FTW
Reviews.Author: Oakley707
Reviews.Content: I've purchased 3+ of these are they are simply the best.  They are WAYYY cheaper than the brick and mortar version and work just the same. HDMI cable that came with is just gravy on top.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Matt Haller
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this mount.  I prefer this style of mount as it is nearly universal and offers a good amount of adjustment left and right, up and down, etc.  One note is there is no adjustment for level so you'll need to make sure everything is level during installation.  The included cable is nice, and I gave the included level to my kids as a tool toy.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install, Hold's Up Well
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: Used this for an older 32in for our daughters room.  I'm no carpenter, but install was smooth, adjustments are easy enough, and mount has held fine last few years.  Solid overall product.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: a.miller
Reviews.Content: had some trouble with two of the screw holes ez fix with a power drill. but mount is strong. good product great price!!

Reviews.Title: High Value for the Money - Works Exceptionally Well - Very Solid - Minor Work Arounds
Reviews.Author: Going Gazelle "Going Gazelle"
Reviews.Content: Things to Love:1) It works exceptionally well.  All things said and done its solid and works great.2) The mount itself is darn near invisible unless your right on the wall looking down the wall.3) Tilt degree works perfectly.  I have a set it up and never move it install.  It's been up 2 months and it's perfect.4) HDMI cable and Level included was useful.5) Aesthetics is clean and simple.  Hide the cables well and you have a sexy install.6) Very reasonably priced without being super cheap garbage.There is only one design element that keeps this from 5 stars:1)  The biggest issue is that main frame that mounts on the back wall is in 8 pieces.  The top piece and bottom piece of the frame are NOT a single piece of metal.  It's three pieces of metal that bolt together to make a single piece.  There are two drawbacks with this design.  a) It took an extra hour to figure it all out.  Instructions weren't as clear as I'd have liked.  b)  My best stud to use was dead center.  However, look at the picture, the bracket as a good 6-8" in the center where you cannot mount to a stud because of the three piece design.  I'd have rather paid a few more dollars for single piece of metal along the top and a single piece of metal along the bottom with stud mounting holes available in the dead center of the bracket.I was able to accommodate the design by mounting the entire bracket off center and then hanging the TV on the side.  Given its a 60" and I had exactly 64" to mount the TV between two windows, nobody can tell the bracket is off center.  The TV hides this fact.  The TV is very stable as well.  I would have preferred to use 3 studs and kept it centered but it just wasn't going to work out.This is petty but the teal HDMI cable is ugly.  I kept in the drawer for a backup cable or a loaner cable.  You buy a slick mount like this to keep things looking sexy.Ultimately, I would buy another one for my next TV install.  I'd even suggest it to my friends knowing full well I'd get roped into helping install the Cheetah mount.  (Note to friends - you're buyin Pizza and Coke).

Reviews.Title: Good for the money and worth a  couple of extra minutes
Reviews.Author: Hellride "Jay"
Reviews.Content: These mounts require some assembly but they are cheap (price) and worth the extra 10 minutes. I used these to hang my 2 50" office monitors and the tilt function is pretty nice and works very well for that purpose. To keep the tilt identical I used a small nail and inserted it into the alignment holes. If you are scared of the assembly you shouldn't be hanging your TV :) but it is very simple and requires a screw driver and 8mm socket.The included HDMI cable appears to be pretty good quality and the length is perfect for hanging a TV. They are probably better than half cables I use in my house.

Reviews.Title: Fool Proof.
Reviews.Author: Andrew K "Andrew Khozouri"
Reviews.Content: I couldnt assemble this the wrong way. That is powerful design. Every time i tried to screw two incorrect pieces together, i just could not do it. I began to notice a pattern of, if its not easy im not doing it right. Took me an hour to put together, and let me tell you i am NOT a handyman. If you know anything about a screwdriver this will take you 5-10 minutes, tops.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Curtis Garwood
Reviews.Content: Great easy mount. No problem at all to install. Have done 3 of these now, and they can be done in about 5 minutes if you skilled with a driver.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed.
Reviews.Author: M. Rigdon
Reviews.Content: Great price for a simple mount. Mounted easily on the wall with clear instructions. So far has been very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Older 72 lb sony 40 inch still on the wall
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: Works great, but not one to be moved around alot as the tv hits the wall below the mount and makes it hard to unplug unless you have a second person to help hold a heavy older model. Works for what I needed and thats what matters.

Reviews.Title: simple and affordable
Reviews.Author: V. Santos "Jayspot"
Reviews.Content: With excellent directions and even with a leveler and HDMI cable this is one sweet wall mount.  Had it up in 30 minutes with the proper mounting brackets and locating wall studs. My 50 inch Samsung plasma is mounted on this and it looks great and I'm confident that it's not going anywhere!

Reviews.Title: Solid built tv mount, excellent price
Reviews.Author: Runnrgrl
Reviews.Content: This mount is solidly built. It have been holding my 55" Samsung Smart LED tv for almost a year now. We had some install but it seemed pretty easy. It was mounted on walls studs. While being installed I did pull and hang a little from it, and it did not budge. I love how low profile to the wall it i, looks very sleek. Steel seems to be good quality. For the price, this cannot be beat; it is right up there with the $100+ mounts. The included HDMI is good quality as well, I actually purchased another cable just like it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure if it would be strong enough for the 60in television but its great. Content with purchase, would buy again

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: John Forbes
Reviews.Content: Good mount overall. I have a panasonic 51 inch plasma. Fit just fine for the money you can go wrong .

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Flat Screen TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: D.C.  Falcon "Dan"
Reviews.Content: This wall mount is very well designed and has a wide variety of extra assembly parts. It has a variety of parts to fit various TV models. It even has a level included. It is an exceptional value.

Reviews.Title: TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: Bruce Erickson
Reviews.Content: It was reasonably priced.  The mount is very steady.  All the hardware was included, including a level.  I would buy this mount again.

Reviews.Title: Strong stand
Reviews.Author: Michael T Pulos Sr
Reviews.Content: Was purchased with TV to add strength. Attaches and assembles very easy and does an excellent job.  Recommed to others.

Reviews.Title: The wall will fall down before the mount will
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Mckinnon "IdiotYankee"
Reviews.Content: The hex bolts supplied to mount the brackets into a studs requires a little more arm power than a career paper pusher has available. Just keep a drill handy to pre-drill a larger pilot hole than required to make sure its screwed all the way in. But once in place this mount, and whatever is hung from it, won't fall down this century. The supplied level is better than the built in bubble leveler. I'm going to use it on my other projects. The supplied HDMI cable is a plus. It's not related to securing the panel, but it's probably superior to the cable supplied by the TV guys. Just a guess on my part. It's just a superior product from it's well laid out packaging, easy instructions, to steel brackets at a cost far less than what you would expect from a $50 item

Reviews.Title: bargin
Reviews.Author: pjs
Reviews.Content: Does the job, easy to use and level and includes the HDMI cable.  It is my second Cheetah mount and love the cable with it

Reviews.Title: Great price for a mount and a HDMI cable.
Reviews.Author: Angie Doporto
Reviews.Content: I searched in many other places and the prices were way too high. This one is a great price and includes the HDMI cable. I mounted my 55" Sanyo with no problem. Easy to install. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works just like it says.
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Came with all the parts needed for wood, drywall, and cement. Just used a ratchet to tighten to screws in. The included "free" level was inaccurate, but i was expecting that

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: cicsos2 "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I got this along with my TCL TV ... and didn't notice that it came with a 10' HDMI cable - which makes the price even better.  My boys did the install and my wife and I get to enjoy.  Its a very good basic TV mount.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: T V Mount
Reviews.Author: Susha
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and it is very easy to install.  5 stars tells it all so why insist on more words...annoying.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Vancrizzy
Reviews.Content: The price was exceptional.  Really can't beat it for the quality.  A little bit disorienting at first when putting together as the instructions could have been a little better but once it is put together it is very easy to install.  Installed a 61 Vizio TV on it and it holds it perfectly fine.  Very sturdy construction and parts.  We just have the arm hanging the TV off of the the top ledge.  The only thing I couldn't figure out while installing was how to get behind the TV after installing to tighten the arms to the top ledge.  Doesn't seem like it is possible since it is so close to the wall.  Regardless, I really didn't need to tighten is at the weight holds the TV on the ledge anyways.  Decided not to downgrade the rating due to one small thing.  Added the AS2B two shelf component underneath it and with the pair they look great and all my cords are hidden.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: wade phillips
Reviews.Content: yet very good.  save $30-$40 buying these compared to walmart.  easy to install and sturdy.  will buy it again when needed.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This mount works as good as any other, installation is simple and the item is very reasonably priced, I have bought 3 and they all are being used.

Reviews.Title: doable and durable
Reviews.Author: Pamela D.
Reviews.Content: It was the best price in town. I could not beat this price at any store. So sturdy that it hung my 55 in' with no problem. I told my brother and he bought one too. We all are pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great value and product!
Reviews.Author: Heather Hendrickson
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to put together and get our flat screen up on the wall.  Very good product - I don't feel like it is going to come crashing down - very secure.

Reviews.Title: Decent tilting wall mount - could use some minor improvements
Reviews.Author: Matt Oliva
Reviews.Content: It works for what I need it for, but has a couple of flaws. Otherwise, it is a sturdy mount and great deal for the price.1) With tv fully tilted 15degrees, the bottom screws to secure tv don't work because the arm doesnt extend far enough.  Its ok with my because I am not too worried about it getting knocked off wall, but you would have to lessen the tilt for the arm to extend lower to use the secure screws.2) Its hard to reach behind the tv to loosen the screws if you want to adjust tilt, would have to take tv off wall to do this.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: JustinFranke
Reviews.Content: this mount is just what i needed. It is a simple design that was easy to assemble and quick to mount on the wall and the level and HDMI cable (although not the best in the world) were an added plus.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: LMCOR
Reviews.Content: Pretty easy to install. Sturdy and held our 50" Plasma with no problems. Great additions of level and cable for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Working so far.
Reviews.Author: DCM
Reviews.Content: It was pretty easy to put together.  The instructions aren't perfect, but I could figure it out.  The only problem I had was with the tilt feature.  The screw to loosen it was very tight.  It was so tight that I thought I was doing something wrong.  I finally got it loosened enough to tilt and installed on the back of my tv.  Unfortunately I tightened it back up.  When I hung it up it looked great, but when I went to tighten the security screws the little piece of metal wasn't under the bottom bracket like it should be.  It was hitting it.  Apparently I tilted it too much, which I didn't think was possible.  So I took the tv down and readjusted the tilt and hung back up and it fit on to where I could tighten the security screws correctly.  Although it takes a long screwdriver.  Then was able to adjust the tilt and tighten the tilt screw a little.  I feel confident that my new tv won't fall.  My advice, when you are adjusting the tilt screws before installing on your tv, hang them up to make sure you haven't tilted it too far.  You wouldn't think that is possible, but it is.  It was just a little too far.  I still think it would have held, but didn't want to take the chance with my kids getting smashed under the tv.  The mount is very low profile, which is nice, but is very hard to hook up your cables, so I'd try to do that before hanging.  Would buy again if needed to.

Reviews.Title: Basic bargain
Reviews.Author: Dan Wasilewski
