Reviews.Content: This is a basic television mount that has no frills but works every time I have purchased 3 now and have had no problems ( mollies work very well for mounting this unit if your chosen spot is in between the studs) very glad I got a functioning 20$ unit vs the ridiculously priced 150$ ones you see in electronic stores......sad day when the mount costs almost as much as a tv!

Reviews.Title: Don't let the price fool you--great quality item!!!
Reviews.Author: clmiles1
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive but very durable.  Well worth the price I paid.  Great quality product and perfect for hanging my 46" television.

Reviews.Title: Good deal!
Reviews.Author: Peggy Johns
Reviews.Content: The hdmi cable was included with the mount and it was long enough for our needs and it came with a level.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Good quality, easy to install with the user friendly instructions. Contained all the necessary accessories. Packaging was professional, too.Good deal.Thank you,

Reviews.Title: Perfect item in perfect price... I love it, too good in the price... delivered on time...
Reviews.Author: Ratinder Kaur
Reviews.Content: Perfect item in perfect price...I love it, too good in the price... delivered on time...perfect for my 43" TV...love to shop on Amazon. Highly recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: Jayne
Reviews.Content: This works just as well as the more expensive items.  It was very easy to assemble and install.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: One of the best I have seen
Reviews.Author: Geoff Wheatley
Reviews.Content: Excellent product easy to install and seems to be reliable as far as the TV is concerned..I would also add that the price was right I have seen others more expensive

Reviews.Title: Mount review
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: The price was vas very efficient and it meet all my expectations. Installation was very easy. I was watching tv in a matter of minutes

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed, some of the screws were missing but in most handyman's tool box for sure, Great instructions and the price is better than any store I went into, quick delivery also,

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: ES
Reviews.Content: I would have to give it a 5. I had the unit out and ready to mount but ran out of time. I liked the way the hardware was bagged in a bandolier fashion. Easy to keep track of. I look forward to putting it up on the wall when I return home.

Reviews.Title: 46" Insignia
Reviews.Author: J. Swander
Reviews.Content: I like this bracket.  It was easy to install, with universal mounting capability.  Hardware looks pretty well made, to the point that it would hold a considerably larger and heavier TV.  I would not hesitate to buy another.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Deal!
Reviews.Author: amazon addict
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant based on price alone.. have you priced these at best buy? I ordered one to be safe.. and immediately ordered 2 others for my house. My In Laws also purchased 2 of these and can't be happier. I am not sure of the quality of the HDMI cord that came with it.. I haven't found any use for a 6 foot HDMI cord that is blue!

Reviews.Title: Easy to assemble, overall amazing.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Hold my TV well, haven't had a problem with it yet. The HDMI cable included is of very good quality and is also pretty durable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Craig Fongyee
Reviews.Content: Great product, very sturdy and works with majority TV sizes.Assembly instructions could have been better but over all great quality

Reviews.Title: Will not lock in place whenscreen is tilted
Reviews.Author: steven ford
Reviews.Content: The mount is inexpensive and sturdy, and even contains a free HDMI cable.  But when you tilt the screen downwards, it is impossible to lock the screen to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Does the job but not much room to work behind
Reviews.Author: N. Heinrich
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount, easy to put together.  If you're looking for a mount that isn't flush to the wall and you want to plug and unplug cables easily, this isn't the mount for you.

Reviews.Title: Does the job perfectly
Reviews.Author: FAL
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy mount easy to install. Excellent value! Keeps the TV very close to the wall, which I liked.Some people might find it difficult accessing the back of the TV to make your connections this is depending upon were they are located on your TV. If in a difficult location you can always connect cables first before hanging the TV to save you some time.The included level and HDMI cable were nice bonuses.

Reviews.Title: Tv Wall mount Bracket
Reviews.Author: DLC
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect mount.  We had purchased one previously and have had no issues. We would buy another one if we had another tv to mount.

Reviews.Title: Has a few flaws
Reviews.Author: Sean P. Donlan "Brokendog58"
Reviews.Content: I had no problem assembling the bracket but after mounting the TV I had a lot of trouble plugging in the cables. There is a little swivel to allow you to squeeze your fingers behind the TV and wall. once attached I noticed my power cable which comes straight back out of the unit was oddly pressed in a 90 degree angle.The larger the TV, the less movement you will have to get behind the unit.

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: GeoMass "GeoMass"
Reviews.Content: A great product - met all of my expectations. Easy assembly and easy to install. A good product at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: KZ
Reviews.Content: This was a great price on a TV Wall Mount. It arrived on schedule in brand new condition. The instructions were clear and it works perfectly. If the opportunity presents itself, I would buy Cheetah products again and I would buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Works but seems flimsy
Reviews.Author: Angela Grupas
Reviews.Content: This hangs my 47 inch Vizio but it is not substantial. All the mounting hardwAre was there so that was great. Just seems cheap but actually it was cheap.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Easily Installed
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Fan
Reviews.Content: A simple and easily installed bracket. Our flat panel is 55", about 60 lbs, easily within specs for this bracket. Hardest part is finding the studs - used both a magnetic and another borrowed finder. It comes with many packets of potential hardware you might need. However, the 6mm screws for mounting the TV itself to the vertical support arms were too long. The ones needed for the Sony were spec'd to be 8 to 12mm; too dangerous to put a longer screw in because it might hit something!I'm not certain about how the tilt would work, it seems like the top and bottom screws thru the vertical supports into the TV back want to clamp the vertical supports parallel to the back of the TV, but if the supports are angled about a bolt near the center, it would seem like the angle would be fighting against the screws clamping against the TV, perhaps trying to deform the metal of the TV. Decided not to tilt and avoid the issue.There are two "safety" screws at the bottom of the vertical supports that should be screwed upwards to capture the flange on the bottom horizontal rib mounted on the wall so the TV cannot swing outwards at the bottom. These are difficult to get to once the TV is hung from the top horizontal rib, and you can't swing out the bottom for easy access to screw in the screws because then they will not catch behind the bottom flange. Not a problem, we don't have kids around.Very good quality for the price; I would recommend it to anybody with TV's in the specified sizes.

Reviews.Title: Works, but it is not great. Flimsy, with some quality control issues. You need to know what you are doing to mount it properly.
Reviews.Author: CM477
Reviews.Content: While this mount will work to hang your TV at a good price, it cannot compare to more expensive models (e.g., OmniMount U3TB). The problem is that the metal is thin and somewhat flimsy (especially the arm brackets which attach to the TV), and there are quality control issues. For example, three of the screws would not screw in. Fortunately I have a metric tap and die set, and I was able to re-tap the holes. These screws were not integral design by which the TV hangs, so I wasn't too worried about screw holding as strongly  as they should have (cross bracket screws, and safety screw).The included torpedo level was useless. Throw it away. You can check the accuracy by flipping it 180 degrees and making sure the bubble still lines up in the same place.Use your own level, which you should have if you are undertaking projects like this one. I don't know if the HDMI cable is any good. I would have rather they spent money on their steel and not the HDMI cable (which I am sure most of us have in great numbers).Finally, once you have hung the TV, it is impossible to get at the adjustment screws with a regular length Phillips screwdriver. I ordered a TEKTON 2773 20-Inch by #2 Phillips Extra Long Screwdriver on Amazon (hopefully no earthquakes in the meantime). From the reviews for that screwdriver, apparently this is a common problem with these cheaper TV mounts. Also, the pictures show a T-handled adjustment screw. Mine had a regular Phillips head screw. I guess nobody has hands thin enough to reach in between the TV set and wall to adjust the screws.Overall, the TV mount works, but if you don't have handyman or other previous experience, I can see this mount being set up poorly. I definitely would not try to adjust the TV tilt angle frequently, as I don't think this mount was designed for such use.

Reviews.Title: Something you should know before installing
Reviews.Author: Everstar "WonderWoman"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Price was great, the HDMI cable it comes with is good quality (I have two of them at work), and it's convenient that you get a level with it. All parts included, instructions were clear and in English, quick installation (less than 30 minutes).Cons: I wanted to bolt this into the studs to make sure it had a good strong hold, problem is, the studs aren't always exactly where you would want them, so the bolt on one side was a few inches in from the edge. After hanging the 47" Vizio, the side that didn't have a bolt on the edge pulled out and down, un-leveling the TV horribly. I had to add a drywall screw on the very edge to hold it back up, which isn't a big deal, but would have been nice to know before mounting it.The other star is because the "safety screws" are really a pain to screw/unscrew.Overall, it's a good value for the price. I will probably get another one when I get another TV because I have already discovered those little tricks that will make for a better installation.EDIT: The customer service for Cheetah Mounts contacted me and has really gone above and beyond any expectations I had, to make sure I was satisfied with the product - which I am... you just need to know that wherever you put the mounting bolts, you MUST also have some bolts on the outermost placement for a bolt to keep the mount against the wall so it doesn't bend out. Also, measure and level 3 times, bolt it once. :)

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and easy to hang plus a great price! Can't go wrong with that.
Reviews.Author: D. Lingenfelter
Reviews.Content: This was an easy to assemble and very easy to hang product. I liked the idea of a level included, so I didn't have to dig thru all of my tools to find my level. Good quality craftsmanship plus it comes with the HDMI cable which I was able to use. That was such a great idea. If you want an exceptional product to hang your valuable TV, then look no further then this Cheetah Mount APTMM2B flush Tilt wall mount bracket. I have my new 40" TV hanging right now and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: This is a good mount for the price. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a low priced good quality mount.

Reviews.Title: Best mount for the Money
Reviews.Author: Zachary P.
Reviews.Content: Pros:PRICEQualitySmall SizeBonus HDMI cable and levelCons:The instructions could stand to have a little more text.  IKEA has unfortunately made this acceptable, but this mount needs a little more than a picture for a couple of steps.This is nit-picky, but the free HDMI cable has the appearance of a braided rope or a bungee cord.  Kind of neat-looking but a standard black would match the rest of my cables.Overall very pleased.  Assembly took around an hour  with us taking our time and double-checking everything.  My TV is a 50" Vizio at around 50 pounds.

Reviews.Title: Funny thing happened on my way spending $200 on a bracket
Reviews.Author: Peter "Short Bald and Ugly"
Reviews.Content: Let me begin by stating: This bracket does everything it does exactly as advertised.It comes with the mini level and the cool looking, long HDMI cable. So what could possibly go wrong?A few things.First, each of the horizontal bars are a two piece assembly, reinforced by a connecting bracket in the middle. No big deal, if you know how to operate a screw driver. The instructions are clear and readable, augmented by pictures to make the assembly process clear.Second, once hanging on the wall the back side of the TV is near impossible to access. So make sure to plug everything in first, then hang the TV.Third, the only problem I had was with the tilt function. You have to establish the tilt before you hang the TV, and tune it in perfectly to avoid a left-right slant. This is not easy and is a separate activity from leveling the bracket on the wall.It is certainly possible to spend a lot more money on a bracket at So-So Buy. But are you getting anything more for the extra money you spend? I don't think so.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy Mount at unbelievable price!
Reviews.Author: Brad Neely
Reviews.Content: I have 3 of these cheetah mounts currently in my home and could not be happier. Two of the mounts are holding up 55" Samsung flat screens and the third is holding up a 65" Samsung. These mounts are easy to install, all you need is a stud finder, drill, socket wrench, and phillips head screwdriver. Total install time took about 15-20 min to locate studs, drill holes, mount bracket to wall and mount braces to the back of the television.I was a little concerned with the third mount holding up my brand new 65" samsung since that is the largest size television these are made for but it fit like a champ.If we have any other televisions to mount in the future, I will once again purchase this mount in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but good enough for me
Reviews.Author: Dwight J Bejec
Reviews.Content: Chose this because it was cheap and had good reviews. Overall I am happy with the purchase.  Instructions are not easy to follow but the pictures were clear enough for me to figure out how everything went. I used this to hang a 32" samsung smart led tv up.

Reviews.Title: not adjustable
Reviews.Author: Erick Zuber
Reviews.Content: You can tilt the tv, it just isn't easily adjustable.  But heck, you are paying half the price for this thing and you get an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Simple and affordable.
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Kisha
Reviews.Content: My 15 year old son assembled and installed on wall. They are fail safe and simple to use. Love it.

Reviews.Title: It actually works
Reviews.Author: akitchen756
Reviews.Content: I did not have high hopes for this wall mount - probably none in all honesty. In fact, I really just purchased this in order to justify buying the insanely expensive one from the big box store. But this worked - perfectly!  I'm blown away that it is so much less expensive then the other ones and worked so easily. We have two of these one for a 32 inch tv and one for a 55 inch tv.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: Brian P Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these mounts.  I used them for an LG 32" LED TV, and LG 42" LED TV and an LG 60" Plasma TV.  They worked great.  The supplied HDMI cables functioned perfectly also.  When mounting larger  TV's (like the 60"), you need a very long screwdriver to lock the TV to the mount.  I would recommend this mount to anyone looking for a high quality, value priced flat screen TV mount.

Reviews.Title: Fairly easy installation but need better directions
Reviews.Author: Cindy Yubin Xiao
Reviews.Content: This was overall a fairly easy installation. I did it all by myself within an hour, granted I am slow at home improvements. However, there were some tinks with the product and the instructions. The socket size they specify in the instruction were wrong, I believe instead of the 6mm and 8mm they tell you, you actually have to use a 10 mm and 12 mm instead. Also, the tilt was hard to reset in my particular product, but I was able to get it loosened after a long time.Overall, the other steps were simple and easy.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy For The Price
Reviews.Author: Scott Dunkin
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these mounts at the same time. Both arrived quickly, in good condition, and without any missing pieces.Pros:-On one of my mounts I hung a 51-inch Plasma TV that weighs 96 lbs. I was nervous at first, thinking that the lip of the mount might bend under the weight, but I had no such problem. Additionally, when I replaced the Plasma, the mount did not have any visible signs of wear from supporting all of that weight.-The tilt option works great, and my TV doesn't 'creep' down under the weight.-Installation (with one exception - see below) was a breeze-An HDMI cable is included. For the price, you can't beat that.Cons:-The only issue I had was that one of the bolts snapped as I was installing the first mount. The bolt was only about halfway in, so it was not from overtightening. I got another bolt from the second mount I ordered, but now I have a broken-off piece of metal in my wall. The TV covers up any physical damage, and I am sure I just got a lemon bolt, but that keeps this from getting 5*.Verdict:I would definitely buy one of these mounts again. I am looking to mount another TV in the near future, and I will, without a doubt, purchase another one of these mounts for that chore.

Reviews.Title: Mount is fine but didn't work for my 65" TV
Reviews.Author: Neil Collins
Reviews.Content: The mount it self is just fine. It's a little bit of work to put together. You have to assemble the back bracket with some smaller screwes and nuts.My biggest challenge with this mount was the fact I have a 65" TV. The mount is rated for up to a 65" TV, which is true it technically fits, but gives you no wiggle room for adjustments. The back bracket barely fits where the mounts on the TV needs to go so if your studs do not line up perfectly then you can not adjust much. I ended up buying a second mount that was rated for a 70" and that worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Steven Ketterman
Reviews.Content: Price, ease of installation and overall quality. Would buy again, have recommended it to friends and work to purchase. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: moshedanger "moshedanger"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic for the price.  Make sure as always that you put these into the studs.  This is a lot of weight with the TV and the bolts need to be mounted into the studs.

Reviews.Title: Arms can be too big
Reviews.Author: Tim Foy
Reviews.Content: I got this to mount a 32" TV. It works great, feel solid and everything. However, the arms that attached to the TV stick up above the top of the TV. So, you can easily see the mount, which sort of "breaks the illusion". Otherwise, the mount is awesome. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Not very robust but works.
Reviews.Author: J. Wagoner
Reviews.Content: When the product arrived we were shocked at the small box.  We were concerned it would not hold the TV.  We re-read the reviews and discovered the rave reviews were for a previous design.  The current one does come in multiple pieces so care is needed when putting it together to make sure it is square.  We did not have the leveling issues that others reported.  The mount and TV were straight with the first install.  The instructions were a bit confusing.  There seemed to be a lot of extra hardware.  The quality of the hardware was poor.  We had to use some spacers to move the mount away from the wall to make the tilt work.  It still doesn't tilt as much as we would like. The mount has been installed and holding the TV for a couple months with no issues..

Reviews.Title: great buy for the price
Reviews.Author: George Bertocchi
Reviews.Content: The bracket comes in a small box and requires assembling the frame but its only a couple of screws and takes 5 minutes to complete. Bracket seems strong and comes with a nice hardware package

Reviews.Title: Solid Mounts
Reviews.Author: Sudip Shah
Reviews.Content: very sturdy, it took me 5 minutes line up the holes and drill.  Couple minutes to put in the screws and with the help of my neighbor, the entire tv was up.  Good product

Reviews.Title: Barely Noticeable and Sturdy
Reviews.Author: DI79
Reviews.Content: It was very simple to understand. Light weight within itself, worked very well with the 60" thin Samsung TV and you can't beat the price! However,  the ONLY issue was that there were not a sufficient amount of larger washers to help keep the bars snug on the back of the TV. The recess for the screws was a bit deeper than what the mount kit anticipates and I had to buy (4) 3/4" washers to help fill in the gap. So pretty much used one of each washer provided in the kit for each hole (4) and one extra of the 3/4" for each hole.Overall,  I'm very pleased with the product.  I would recommend it to anyone. I will definitely look into purchasing another one for my current 2nd TV.Thank you for the great product!

Reviews.Title: fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: works as expected, a little hard to put together once it was on the wall, but i would definitely purchase again and you cant see it behind the tv

Reviews.Title: Perfect inexpesive mount
Reviews.Author: Michael J Stuparits
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect mount for the price. well designed, sturdy metal, and easy to install, I had my TV up on the wall in about 1 hour.

Reviews.Title: Good to buy
Reviews.Author: emmanuel appiah
Reviews.Content: Good to spend on. It worked perfectly fine for me. The only thing is that I find it difficult to put my TV cord at the back. Too close to the wall

Reviews.Title: Good, Cheap, Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Drew Patel
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, works just fine. I did not even use the screws or bolts they provided, I used my own screws and bolts(longer screws and longer bolts). The tilt is kind of hard to figure out. The best part is it has multiple areas to screw in the mount. I had to use 8 bolts just to hold up my 60" inch TV's.Advise: Use your own screws(bigger and better a plus).

Reviews.Title: works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: No compaints. Easy to assemble. Works like a charm. Easy 1 person assembly but obviously need a second person to hang your tv. Great value.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy and easy to install.
Reviews.Author: Ezekiel Tschumper
Reviews.Content: This mount did not fail to perform. I hung a 50" lcd tv on the assembly and it is holding fast. The instructions are clear and easy to follow.I wouldn't recommend using the screws that come with it when mounting to plaster or brick. I used red head sleeve anchors. Maybe an 800LB weight limit was too much but its better than having the tv fall!

Reviews.Title: Simple straight forward inexpensive TV mount
Reviews.Author: A. Getchell
Reviews.Content: Simple easy to use TV mount.  Nothing complicated about it.  I used on a 60" led TV and seems to works great.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: mike lafave
Reviews.Content: Easy set up, great directions. All good. Would recommend! Good price and appears to be a quality product. 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: The Dude
Reviews.Content: So the frame that mounts to the wall isn't a single piece... its 8 pieces that bolt and screw together with little wimpy screws. And since it bolts together, there's no place to bolt through the center if that's where your stud happens to fall. Also, since its less than 34" wide, it won't span three studs if one happens to fall dead center on the mount (like it did for me).Overall its a good kit with a free HDMI cable and level and lots of extra screws and bolts for mounting to the TV and wall.The included metric hardware that connect the brackets to the tv were too long and I had to use spacers (included) to fit tight.It also included two sets of two lag screws, and not 4 of the same screw for screwing into the studs. Luckily I had spares from my previous Monoprice mount.All and all I was disappointed and while I got it to work, it wasn't optimal or center on the wall. Go with Monoprice and you won't be disappointed...

Reviews.Title: TV mount flush or tilt
Reviews.Author: Eddie S.
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to install in our master suite next to the ceiling. It works as designed. I would recommend the unit to anyone.

Reviews.Title: cheetah mount for 55" tv
Reviews.Author: olivia
Reviews.Content: worked great. very sturdy. easy to put up. super product for a super price! have used this product before and highly reccommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Michael Clarkson "Michael"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the job I hung an older 37" TV and it holds it with no problem all hardware needed to mount it to the wall is included.  Great price great product.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: John silvers
Reviews.Content: This is a basic mount. It doesn't swivel etc. that also means your TV will be very close to the wall - isn't that the point of hanging a tv on the wall in the first place. I'm buying 3 more for our new home as I'm extremely pleased with the quality. Se reviewers mention that it doesn't seem as sturdy... It held my 50" plasma for 3+ years with no issues whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and difficult to use!
Reviews.Author: Toasterize! "Massimo Allen"
Reviews.Content: The bracket took for ever to assemble, you have to assemble every part of it and its not precision made, I know the price was very low but at the end of the day my time was worth lot more.

Reviews.Title: Overall pleased -- easy to install
Reviews.Author: Michael Clites
Reviews.Content: There are some design flaws that could make this a lot better product, but for the price -- great value.  Super easy to assemble and install.  There is no way to adjust the tilt or really secure the TV to the bracket.  To give credit, there is a lock screw, but there is no way to reach it once you have the TV in place.I would recommend this...if you are looking for an inexpensive and easy product to hang your TV -- this is it.

Reviews.Title: Robust, yet simple design
Reviews.Author: xfacter03
Reviews.Content: I like to consider myself an average handy man capable of tasks around the house, and this thing made me feel pretty good about myself.  The installation was pretty easy to complete, and the design allows for alot of flexibility in height in case you think the tv is too low or too high.  The fact this is priced WELL below anything at electronics stores, and they throw in an HDMI cable, made it an easy choice for me.  After a couple months on my wall, absolutely no complaints and it looks like it could stay there forever.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Kha
Reviews.Content: Very easy install, sturdy metal. Holds my 50' plasma with no problems. I am a female that did all the installation myself, just couldnt mount the tv myself....too heavy. Will purchase another one for my 70 inch. Definitely beats spending $100+ on one very similar.

Reviews.Title: 60 inch TV mount
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. hattan
Reviews.Content: Worked like it should!! Make sure you follow directions !! easier to adjust tilt before you hang TV up , but it can be done!

Reviews.Title: Cheep and it works
Reviews.Author: Rabbit
Reviews.Content: Easy to put together and my 65 inch TV has not fallen off the wall so I would say it's a win.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the price
Reviews.Author: Turner D
Reviews.Content: This is a great wall mount kit, it comes with a lot of the extra things you may not think of, the HDMI cable, and the level. You don't want your TV lopsided after you put it in, and screw a bunch of huge screws in.The tilt is a little bit, but not too much, so don't expect a lot from that. It seems very stable either way,

Reviews.Title: Works well, but it is made with soft, flimsy metal
Reviews.Author: ThatOneGuy
Reviews.Content: Pros:Low-profile: it sits very close to the wallIt hangs TVsCons:You will not be able to install this without a metric socket set!The screws and bolts are very easy to strip and break. I had to replace two of them.Don't over-tighten anything, and don't use a drill for anything other than pilot holes!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: bought two of these in 2013. They are very easy to install and are great. I really like the tilting option, it makes it simple to watch a tv that is higher than the eye level

Reviews.Title: High quality low cost bracket
Reviews.Author: wmjackson76
Reviews.Content: Easy to put together, clear instructions.  I can barely draw a straight line and hanging this thing on a wall level was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again.
Reviews.Author: Conrad B. Senior
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a cheap method to mount a TV.  It works.You have to slide the TV onto the wall portion from the side, and it nicked up the paint on the wall.I wish i bought a larger more adjustable mount and put a bigger TV on the wall.That is what I'll probably do. I plan to buy a bigger TV and play musical chairs with several TV's in the house.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Simmons
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount to fit my 60 inch Sharp Aquos, and it has not moved for months!It is a little hard for me to reach behind the tv to secure the underside bolts to the frame, but otherwise is a Fantastic product

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount.
Reviews.Author: Dbaucom82
Reviews.Content: Great price, easy to install. Simple to put together. You won't be disappointed unless you buy a more expensive version.

Reviews.Title: Good little mount!!!
Reviews.Author: Alex Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: My only problem was the mount was just inside the width of my studs I needed to mount to.  So I had to custom build a wall mount across the two studs to be able to mount the mount to.  Maybe offer the same mount in a wider width across... I have an older 80lb LG 55inch flat screen and the mount itself holds it up like a champ.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: Used this mount to hang a Samsung 55 inch LED TV. The installation was easy and despite it's lack of significant "heft," the mount performs flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: work the money
Reviews.Author: William Medina
Reviews.Content: cheaper price than any store in my area and my tv looks great. totally a recommended purchase over national retailers.

Reviews.Title: does what its supposed to do and does it good
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: pretty simple, its easy to build low price and high quality. holds my 47in tv well. well writen out directions also.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Trevor Higley
Reviews.Content: Awesome mount. Easy install. East assembly overall a great product. Very easy to use. Looks great and hangs tv nicely.

Reviews.Title: STURDY!
Reviews.Author: Tegan
Reviews.Content: The last thing i wanted was my couple thousand.dollar TV falling off c cheap wall mount. This was easy to install and feels solid. I trust our giant plasma on this, without worries. No swivel just a tilt, that's exactly what we needed. Sits nice and flat to the wall

Reviews.Title: Easy Cheetah
Reviews.Author: Arthur R Stark
Reviews.Content: Piece of cake to install. I installed on concrete block wall and Cheetah had it covered with all the necessary hardware. Could not have been easier. I would recommend this mount, strong, sturdy and easy! Used it on 46" Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great value - But you need tools
Reviews.Author: Guad "USA"
Reviews.Content: You'll need a long phillips screwdriver to get the safety screws turned in when the TV is mounted.  Make sure you test the tension of the mount arm claw screws so you can adjust the angle prior to putting it on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Kent Horne "Starch"
Reviews.Content: I could not be more pleased with the product.  It was built well,  easy to install and very easy to mount the TV on.  I, as some of the other reviewers also stated, was a little skeptical about how inexpensive the product was especially after pricing Best Buy and Lowes but it proved to be a great product.  I used it to install a 42 Inch Flat Screen in my garage.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: J. Trefethen "jaytref"
Reviews.Content: this is a really nice tv mount. It is fairly easy to assemble, and is really stable. Probably the best mount for the price anywhere, as long as you don't need it to swivel. The fact that it comes with a level and an HDMI cord is really a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: GREAT MOUNT!
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 2 of these mounts from Amazon and recommend this to anyone looking for a good sturdy mount. I have used this on a 60" & 52" TV. If your looking to save some cash on a good quality and strong mount this is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: I would recommand
Reviews.Author: Babu
Reviews.Content: Best bet for your money.. I like it . I bought two ..it works good and easy to install . Add on is a plus

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Paul Ericson
Reviews.Content: The only downside is that it only tilts and does not swivel, but at this price point that seems reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65 inch
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I received the Wall Mount in a timely manner. I have not installed it yet, but I am sure it will get the job done. So I am rating you this four stars because I got it before Christmas and could use it has a gift by wrapping the box and putting it under the Christmas tree as surprise gift.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensively mounted a 55 inch TV
Reviews.Author: La'Maze Johnson
Reviews.Content: Took a second to figure out how to assemble the rectangular bracket, but after I figured that out it was just a matter of finding the wall studs, lining it up (I used a 2- foot level I own instead of the supplied one) and drilling the holes.  If you make sure to hit studs I seriously doubt you will have to worry about this thing coming off your wall.  My TV is VESA 400X400 and the two tilt pieces that attach to the TV fit perfectly.  After attaching those with the supplied hardware, mounting the tv was as simple as lifting the TV and hooking it on to the wall bracket.  I was able to do this myself with a 42lbs TV.  Once the TV is mounted there are two "safety" screws at the bottom that will essentially lock the TV to the bracket.  These screws are a bit tricky to get to and will require a long phillips head screwdriver to get to, but by no means is it impossible.  By far this was the most tricky part of the install.For my purposes this was a great mount.  All the hardware was included.  It holds my TV securely and sturdily to my wall with a very low profile.  Very clean look.  You can spend more for a mount, but I see no reason why you would do so unless you need something with a swivel.  For my home gym this was perfect.  People who spend hundreds of dollars on these things must really have money to burn.  I'd rather spend that money on the parts of the TV I will be actually watching.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hang a 50" Vizio that I got for Christmas.  The only thing wrong was that the people (wife and I) hanging the TV could not figure out which wall they wanted it hung on.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Wade T. Funk
Reviews.Content: This thing is the perfect mount for my 42" Magnavox TV. And with the included HDMI cable, an EXTRAORDINARY value!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Matthew De Leon
Reviews.Content: It was easy, directions were plain as they should be and I appreciated that it came with a hdmi cable all for so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Top of the line
Reviews.Author: CHRISTOPHER
Reviews.Content: Love itGreat quality. When it comes to amazon and saving money this is the place to do it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: KZ "K.Z."
Reviews.Content: It's been holding the TV on the wall now for over a month so that's a great sign! It was kind of difficult to put together, too bad it didn't come assembled but there was lots of hardware which is a plus, directions could have been better. But overall the Wall Mount is perfect, it has a built in level, durable, and is perfect. We haven't quite figured out who to use the tilt but will once we need it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Van Tyn
Reviews.Content: Great unit for the price. This is my second one of these and I like them a lot. Nice and close to the wall which is nice for appearance but a bit hard for cable and wiring access - I don't lock mine in place so I can just lift the TV off if I need access.

Reviews.Title: Good, but you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: C Hurc "C Hurc"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a 50" plasma.  After using a couple of $200 mounts for other TV's you can really tell the difference. The more expensive mounts allowed full grown men to hang from them.  This one just isn't on the same level.  However those are likely overkill and cost 4 times as much or more. This comes in a small box and has to be bolted together.  The instructions are just OK.  Anyone that has put things together before should be able to figure it out.  The mount flexed a bit more than I wanted but the TV is still hanging after a month so it is doing it's job.

Reviews.Title: Why do people spend so much money on mounts?
Reviews.Author: Bryan & Esther Leonard
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how much mounts cost these days, we got this mount for our 55" Panasonic Plasma, which is no light weight by any means (though it does weight about as much as our 2008 Panni Plasma). This mount holds perfectly above our mantel, and was just as expected on install, if you've got basic mechanical and construction knowledge, you will be more than capable to install this on your wall.Will Probably buy another of the same when I mount another tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Elido Villa Jr
Reviews.Content: I would say this is the best wall mount for thin flat screens. But hard to get behind the tv for plugs or connecting hdmi cables.

Reviews.Title: Used to mount a 50" Plasma
Reviews.Author: med student
Reviews.Content: We used this to mount a 50" plasma. The mount was a little challenging to install, taking us about 2 hours, but any other mounts like this will take a similar amount of time. We were pleased with the quality and the cost. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and simple
Reviews.Author: njrx
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice ultra slim simple mount. I have my Samsung 65" LED mounted with this mount and it looks gorgeous. Good praises all the way around.

Reviews.Title: came with a broken cable but customer service sent me a working one
Reviews.Author: Kin Cheung
Reviews.Content: Bought this mount to install a new tv.  Mount is sturdy, easy to put together and installed fine, but cable didn't work.  Contacted Cheetah customer service but did not get a reply.edit -  Customer service got in touch with me and shipped me a working cable.

Reviews.Title: simple and quick
Reviews.Author: ty mckenna
Reviews.Content: It was light and strong.verry easy to put up.it also had a nice coating on it.great weight rating on it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Naomi Williams
Reviews.Content: These mounts were great, easy to install, and looks great. Me and my husband are very satisfied. I would most definitely refer a friend.

Reviews.Title: Tiny box, easy to assemble.
Reviews.Author: Frank R. Stehlik
Reviews.Content: Great price, easy assembly, strong, 2 levels included, hardware for all possible configurations. Even comes with an HDMI cable. Awesome product!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: mango l. ali
Reviews.Content: I loved this product and will order it again. I didn't have to buy anything, everything I needed came with the products. Thanks...

Reviews.Title: It works. I bought two :-)
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: The brackets at Home Depot and Best Buy are 3 times the price, lesser quality and are difficult to install.This bracket is a great value. I installed it by myself. It hangs my TV just fine. It doesn't look like it will ever fail.It works fine. Thanks.I bought two :-)

Reviews.Title: Very good for price
Reviews.Author: Krystal Nugal
Reviews.Content: I ordered this knowing that it was one of the best on amazon. They guys installed it perfectly to my wall, but they said that they wish the brackets for the walls were one long piece instead of two. Other than that, it's a great buy.

Reviews.Title: good tv mount
Reviews.Author: Kathy Darkes
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mounts are just as good as the much more expensive brands sold online and in retail stores.  You can hang your tv with any worries.

Reviews.Title: keep looking this is junk but service is good
Reviews.Author: David Vasil "2gr84u"
Reviews.Content: This mount is garbage. Be sure to read the reviews from within the last year because this new design is awful. The hardware is junk, most of the screws were seized and strip out too easily. Spend a little more this is NOT worth the hassle***UPDATE***Was contacted directly by company and was asked to share my concerns to help them develop the product going forward. I am impressed with the handling and I am updating my rating to 4 stars based on the handling of the representative I spoke with.

Reviews.Title: Awsome wall mount on great price
Reviews.Author: Syed h shah
Reviews.Content: This wall mount was great i just hooked it up in  a half an hour my tv is safe now.I will say thank you cheetah.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Bodie Orman
Reviews.Content: Does what it says it will do. Super easy to mount. Kinda hard to get to the 'safety lock' screws but I don't have kids, and there hasn't been a super big earthquake where I am in a while, so I feel allright about it.

Reviews.Title: 2 years later and it's still doing well!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Straightforward set up, came with all items listed which was very much appreciated and 2 years later it is still going strong, holding my 40" tv!

Reviews.Title: Good basic mount
Reviews.Author: person
Reviews.Content: This was easy to install and does a good job. The only issue I have is if there are any ports on the back of the tv you have to hook those up first. There is no room to put cables in the back and the safety screw on the bottom is difficult to reach, so if I ever want to switch out what is plugged into the RCA ports it is a pain.

Reviews.Title: GOOD QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Bob T.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Cheetah TV wall mount to secure a 50" flat screen TV to the wall. The install went very smoothly and the unit is rugged enough to handle the weight of the TV and then some; very good unit for the money.

Reviews.Title: Wow.(review from a the opposide of a handyman)(the exact opposite)
Reviews.Author: RedSoxNation76
Reviews.Content: First, the HDMI cable is braided. Are you kidding? Very impressed. This thing goes together in a snap. Went up in a snap. Will be buying another shortly for upstairs!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive, effective, easy to install
Reviews.Author: bfo
Reviews.Content: I purchased based upon reviews and price.  Was fully satisfied.  Instructions must have been simplified/upgrade since originally offered, as it was very easy to assemble and mount (took more time to identify the route of my very crooked studs).  The only watch out is depending on the shape of the back of your tv and the height you are mounting, 15 degree tilt angle may be inadequate (I had to adjust the mounting bracket after the orignal install, because the back of my older tv angles out towards the bottom).

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, quality product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Thompson
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, quality product at a great price! I was worried that for the price it would be cheap, but after reading all the reviews I felt at ease. I was not disappointed. I mounted my 50 inch Samsung plasma with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Robert Diaz
Reviews.Content: The mount is a great product for the price. I purchased a 60 inch tv that weighs 125lbs. The mount holds it like a champ! It came with all the nuts and bolts to install the tv correctly, it also came with a level which came in handy. I would definately recomend this monunt.

Reviews.Title: i mounted it all by myself!
Reviews.Author: E. Sachs "Sweaterfolder"
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah is fantastic! It was so easy to figure out and I was able to mount my TV all by myself - in spite of not having one of the correct tools (I used a flat wrench, not an adjustable wrench, and it worked just fine). Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great stand for the money!
Reviews.Author: Madge
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this item I was skeptical due to all the recent reviews about the new additional assembly required. Truth is the assembly is simple, it takes a total of maybe 10 minutes to put the mount together with the right tools. As for leveling it, thats not a mount issue thats a user issue. You should check if its level after you tighten each anchor bolt. I would advise you to use your own level and not the small one that comes with the mount. Its a quarter of the price of department store mounts that serve the same purpose. All in all great product and I'll continue to buy for my future TV mounting needs.

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: Denise Berger
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and feels very sturdy! Came with an HDMI cable and level which was great! Highly recommend, especially for first time TV mounters.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: KM
Reviews.Content: Great quality wall mount for my 47" TV. I didn't give it 5 stars because it didn't fit with my 32" VIZIO I had in another room (the back brackets didn't fit) and this product advertises it fits with all major brands, so be warned it just possibly MIGHT NOT fit with some of the less common TV types of major brands. It did fit with my 47" Samsung.The instructions for set up are thorough. It comes with tons of extra pieces, leveler, HDMI cable, etc. The only tools I needed were a ratchet set, Phillips head screwdriver, and drill with drill bit set. As a woman who doesn't typically do these kinds of projects myself, it was pretty easy with a helper. I'd buy another one of these in the future.

Reviews.Title: alot to put together.
Reviews.Author: Heather Goughnour
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's room.  Directions were good just dont really like putting things together so that wasn't fun.  Next time I would purchase one that has already been built.  On the plus side the boys loved the level they now have that came with.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kimberly a Willan
Reviews.Content: It served its purpose, mounted 55 inch flat screen as promised if I need another one I will order it here

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: john b zimmerman
Reviews.Content: Great solution.  Works as advertised.  One warning though, you're tv needs to have side or down facing(inset) hdmi ports as if they come straight out the back, the cables get in the way given how close the rack mounts to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Good value easy to put together.
Reviews.Author: Morgan A. Leyes
Reviews.Content: Instructions were clear and concise. Each piece was individually packed and labeled in the instructions.  Was very easy to mount.  Item arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: quality products by cheetah
Reviews.Author: Louis Berardi
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best mounts I ever installed it took less then five minutes to assemble and another ten minutes to mount it on the wall i would recommend this mount to anyone thanks cheetah for producing a quality products

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: skeptical with the low price..but a great buy. I would recommend this mount to anyone looking for a great deal

Reviews.Title: Easy and works
Reviews.Author: Alice Willis
Reviews.Content: Simple to install and works great. Price sold us on this mount and it is built sturdy enough for our 37" tv.

Reviews.Title: Hard to assembly
Reviews.Author: Adriana Lomeli
Reviews.Content: Hard to assembly and the quality is not the best. The are others in the market more solid and easy installation. It does the job however I will spend 5 or 10 more dlls to get better mount.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy A Cummings
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Wonderful price. Very sturdy product. Received earlier than expected today and immediately installed. Took about 20 Minutes. Only needed a drill,  screw driver, and a small socket set. Now or bedroom 50" tv looks amazing.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Shutt
Reviews.Content: It worked really well on my 2008, 50" Samsung plasma tv. It was easy to install and the mount itself was pretty light. No complaints

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Aditya
Reviews.Content: Go for it - it does a good job! We are happy with the purchase and fully recommend the mount.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cory Palmer
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to expect when I purchased this mount, but I must say I am exceptionally pleased with its functionality. It took a few minutes to put together and the instructions could have been a mite clearer but once it was together it turned out to be one of the sturdier mounts I have worked with previously.My only complaint is that I had to go purchase different sized screws because the mount screws didn't fit my television. Although, I am sure, with a little more research I could have made a determination as to whether or not this mount would have worked immediately for my television.It was worth a trip to Home Depot's hardware section though.

Reviews.Title: Does it's job
Reviews.Author: Carey
Reviews.Content: Does what I expected it to do. It's holds my new 60 inch perfectly. I'd recommend to anyone for ease of install and strength.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Mount Deal in Town
Reviews.Author: Opal
Reviews.Content: I have a 50" LG and the mount fit perfectly. It was priced low enough that I knew it wasn't going to be gold plated or anything, but it did its job wonderfully. My TV is nice an secure on the wall AND Cheetah Mounts gets bonus points for the long, awesome HDMI cable it came with. Not only was the mount affordable, but the HDMI they sent along with it saved me an extra $20.Yay Cheetah Mounts.

Reviews.Title: GOOD MOUNT
Reviews.Author: j.chapple
Reviews.Content: I love this mount works well easy to mount the only thing I didn't like is how I had to assemble the bracket they may some with it done

Reviews.Title: Buy it
Reviews.Author: Angelo
Reviews.Content: If u want a flush mount this one works excellent! Strong and easy to set up.  Great deal for a simple mount.

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: It did the trick, but it seemed a bit cheap, but it is holding up our very heavy older 50in tv just fine.

Reviews.Title: Bonus!!!
Reviews.Author: Eric M. Griffin "Griff"
Reviews.Content: Went together easy.  Does the job.  Instructions were clear.  Didn't require too many tools.  Comes w/ a bonus HDMI!!!!  What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I liked this mount but it could be made with less pieces to connect.  I have since bought mount with a better structure.

Reviews.Title: Perfect mount for my thin 55" LED
Reviews.Author: Steven Meyer "Steve"
Reviews.Content: This mount allowed me to mount my 55" LED thin Samsung UN55F7050 on the wall, tilt down towards the bed, and have enough room for a thin power surge, and DirecTV mini Genie box.  Good quality as well.  The spacers included weren't sufficient to allow the bracket to screw to the TV without pressing on the metal back of the TV, as the Samsung has some pretty large depressions around the mount screw holes.  However, the TV is securely mounted and I'm not taking it back down just to insert more spacers.  I'm happy with the mount.

Reviews.Title: Cheeply designed.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: My last 3 mounts were monoprice brand mounts. 1 slim mount similar to this, 1 large screen articulating mount, and 1 small screen articulating mount. I get that the articulating mounts need to be more robust to hold the weight when it is in motion so I'll ignore the fact that those are built like tanks and compare it to my other slim mount. Its bracket 1 piece of thick steel.This cheetah mount on the other hand is comprised of 6 pieces of thin steel that you screw together like an erectors set. I tell you, my confidence was not high putting at 60" tv on this mount like I have been with my other mounts. I sure hope it holds. Essentially only the top 2 wall anchors are doing anything with the design of this mount. If one were to fail, the support structure is not strong enough to pass the load to one of the bottom anchors since the unit will twist and flex dropping the tv.I wish I realized this was 6 pieces instead of 1 solid mounting plate before purchase.

Reviews.Title: Tilt Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: brad in pgh
Reviews.Content: Comes with a level and very easy to install.  9 foot HDMI cable is very high quality.  Great deal at an awesome price!

Reviews.Title: Great Bracket
Reviews.Author: Dustin S Knight
Reviews.Content: You simply cannot beat the price on this quality bracket.  I have several of these in my house for hanging LCD TVs and they are easy to install.  Save your $$ and don't buy an expensive bracket at the local store.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal Mount, assembly is kind of a chore
Reviews.Author: NJScreenwriter
Reviews.Content: As per one of my previous reviews on a different mount, I'm a professional installer.  This is an outstanding mount.  It's sturdy, does exactly what it says it is going to do and does so well.  My only complaint is that assembly can be a chore.  I've sat down and assembled 3 or 4 of these in a row and it takes some time.  That's my only complaint, and the only reason I won't order it regularly, but an outstanding mount for a one or two off situation.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality.  Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Dahle
Reviews.Content: Buy this TV wall mount!  My only regret is I didn't buy this one earlier.  It is very sturdy.  It is also very durable and easy to assemble. I will use and recommend to other's for years.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Brit628
Reviews.Content: Holds the TV and looks great on the wall. The motion is perfect since its just for our bedroom. Thinking about getting one for the guest room too. Now just have to hide the wires.

Reviews.Title: Mount's your TV to the Wall... Seriously it does exactly as they say!
Reviews.Author: S. Pohorecki
Reviews.Content: So this is an inexpensive mount for flat panel Televisions / Monitors to be mounted to the wall.  It performs the job flawlessly, however you have very little if any tilt adjustment.  Could just be the older Television I have, but I doubt it.  Anyway, I'm completely satisfied with the purchase and will probably replace my other mount with another one of these.  I love the fact that this is a very close mount to the wall, meaning the Television / Monitor does not hang 5-6 from the wall.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Brice
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Initially used to hang a 32in tv, now being used for a 42in. Very sturdy on the wall. Highly recommend for the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: This bracket worded perfectly for my application. I bought a Westinghouse TV from Tiger Direct and needed a way to mount on bedroom wall. Worked as advertised. Thanks

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Carl Abseck
Reviews.Content: easy to hang, easy to get on and off the wall, and can't beat the price compared to Best Buy!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: jro
Reviews.Content: I would not hesitate to buy this again. I hung my 60" led Vizio in about 20 min. The hardware it comes with is perfect. My father in law paid 5 times more for a mount from an electronic store and it is poor quality and partly made of plastic. This thing is an incredible bargain. It's all metal. Very solid and not flimsy. It comes with everything you need short of a drill or socket wrench.

Reviews.Title: good mount, cord did not work
Reviews.Author: Danny J Kell
Reviews.Content: Mount worked good and was easy to set up. However, cord did not work with the tv. Overall it was a good buy

Reviews.Title: Mount for 65" Panasonic Plasma
Reviews.Author: Richard O Broyles
Reviews.Content: It says it will work with the Panasonic 65" Plasmas. It appears to be strong enough but I would like to see it longer. It mounts right at the end of the bracket. I would feel a lot more comfortable with a couple inches on each side.Update:  Cheetah Mounts contacted me about the concern  of not enough length for the Panasonic 65" Plasma. They are sending me a longer mount model: APTMLB that will give me more room.  I have upgraded to 5 star for the superior customer service.

Reviews.Title: Seems good
Reviews.Author: Russell Bushong
Reviews.Content: I have not been able to install because I have been waiting for TV to be delivered but looks good.

Reviews.Title: 50 in. Looking good
Reviews.Author: Lcskinnyb
Reviews.Content: I chose to go into studs in my wall and the number of mounting holes allowed us to center the tv where we wanted it. The articulating arms make it relatively easy to access the ports on the back when they need to be switched. It's been 6 months now and it's doing a great job

Reviews.Title: fine product, don't use if you have metal studs
Reviews.Author: Matthew Barnes
Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong with the product, seems fine and sturdy.  But if you have metal studs in your wall I would recommend not using a wall mount for a TV that is more than 50 pounds heavy unless you do some heavy duty bracing in the wall.

Reviews.Title: Hung 2 TVs using this mount
Reviews.Author: Simon P. Burnham
Reviews.Content: A 55" Sony KDW-55900a and a 46" Toshiba something or other. Mount works great, sturdy, easy install and great retaining system. Plus it's a freakin' bargain as it comes with a level and a good HDMI cord.Get right in!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mount for My 65" Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Finally got around to the install.  This mount came with good instructions and plenty of mounting hardware options.  The TV looks great on the wall...finally.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Gale Pfaff
Reviews.Content: Used this to mount a 50 inch vizio. Great product! Others were much more expensive. Easy to mount. Even has a HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Better options out there
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Ultimately it's doing what it should, holding up our 58" tv....But the fact that the bracket comes in 2 pieces, and is not level after screwing them together, made leveling the TV more difficult than it should've been. There are better options for not much more. Had I purchased this at a store, I would've exchanged it for one that doesn't need to be assembled.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Zach G
Reviews.Content: Putting it together took a little longer than expected (45 minutes) , but every good quality and does what it's designed to do.

Reviews.Title: It holds my TV on the wall!
Reviews.Author: Michael Porter
Reviews.Content: I have a Vizio 42" LED that weighs about 75 pounds.  I wanted a bracket that would hold it securely.  This one does the job.  It was easy to mount.  Includes lots of hardware for attaching the mounting brackets to the TV.  It includes a small level that slips onto the horizontal bracket and a larger magnetic level.  Those and a 10' HDMI cable are a bonus and make this bracket package an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Lara
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, easy to assemble and the directions were easy enough to follow. I never imaged that mounting my TV would be so easy and cheap.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Xiaoxiao Gao
Reviews.Content: I did my research and came home with this baby for my 46" samsung LED TV. It came as advertised, with frame, cables and levels. Installed twice because i didn't like the spot after my first installation. Pretty easy and simple, does require drill with different drill bits and wrenches. Very very close to the wall, so be prepared to buy those HDMI bent adapters if your TV's ports are facing the back and not to the side. As mentioned by other posts, the main frame comes in two pieces that requires assembly prior to installation. And as mentioned by other posts, the main frame, upon assembly, does look a bit bent out of shape to the naked eye, but it is in no way flimsy. However, when you install it, combined with the tightness of the screws, it does sit flush against the wall. So it is not an issue imo.

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Brings all that's needed and easy to do. Also is great for the price. Anyone can install it.  Just get help to attach the TV.

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Pay For
Reviews.Author: je555
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this. Besides being flimsy, there are 2 bottom holding screws that are impossible to tighten.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: RWH
Reviews.Content: I have bought multiple for myself and even more for friends and family. I have never had a missing piece or a bad product. The HDMI cables have always came in great shape and not a one has failed. I will continue to buy these mounts due to the price being significantly lower and being good quality.

Reviews.Title: cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: Mike Mahan
Reviews.Content: Very well made bracket. Easy install. I would highly  recommend this product to anyone and you can not beat the price

Reviews.Title: This is a solid and well built mount!
Reviews.Author: S. Ashour "nambi"
Reviews.Content: It's built well and versatile to hang, giving the end user multiple mounting holes to use for different circumstances and positions.  I would definitely buy again, In fact I have already purchased 4 cheetah mounts and have been happy with all of them.

Reviews.Title: Great quality at a low price
Reviews.Author: Manuel
Reviews.Content: I have installed two of these mounts. One for a friend who has a 55" LCD and weighs very little and one for myself. I have a 32" LCD television that has a lot of weight to it since it's a much older model. Both installs went without much problems and the problems that I did encounter were not because of the mounting hardware. Before you mount your television though, make sure that you plan ahead. Keep in mind that this mount will place your TV very close to the wall so if you have inputs in the back of the television then it's going to be very difficult to reach them once the TV is mounted and secured. Plan on extending those ports somehow with male-to-female cables or using audio/video wall plates and installing all of the cable before finalizing your mounting install. Additionally, I used my own leveler combined with the included (smaller) leveler from this Cheetah product, just to make sure everything was leveled properly. I did not use the other (larger) level that was included so I cannot speak on the quality of that item. You should also purchase, or borrow, a long phillips screwdriver (I had a 22" long screwdriver on hand). The long screwdriver will be needed to secure the TV to the mount and adjust the tilt. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Complete package... and then some
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: Overall great build quality. Holds my 50" Plasma securely to the wall. Great tilt and side shift adjustment. Added HDMI cable a bonus for the cost. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great mount at a good price
Reviews.Author: J. Wild
Reviews.Content: I really like this mount.  I've set it up twice now after having moved homes.  The only things I'm deducting a star for are that it doesn't quite tilt far enough and the set screws are very difficult to reach without a very long screwdriver (12"+).  I was able to get the angle I need for my family room, but this shortens the distance between the top and bottom hooks on the arms (the two arms attach to the back of your TV and the top hook on each arm are what hang from the wall-mounted portion).  Normally (at tilt degrees less than 15), the hooks on the bottom of the arms reach past the lip on the bottom of the wall mount and then you tighten the set screw to prevent them from coming back over the lip.  But when you tilt past 15 degrees, the bottom hooks don't reach far enough down to get over the bottom lip, so I can't secure everything with the set screws.  I'll have to figure out another way to secure the TV before I have kids, but at this time, the weight of the TV does a pretty good job of keeping everything in place and secure enough.I really like the braided casing on the HDMI cable.  It's my favorite HDMI cable as weird as that sounds.  I would definitely recommend this wall mount to others and I would purchase it again, but it could be improved with a couple slight modifications.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Was very simple to put together. It took me like, 10 minutes. Simplicity at it's best. It lets gravity do the work.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Griffon owner
Reviews.Content: We bought a new TV and looked at mounts.  I could not believe that they wanted almost $100 for a mount a the big box store.  I figured there had to be a better option.  Amazon to the rescue..boom $29..two days later it was here.  It was easy to assemble and easy to mount.  The instructions walked you through.  Vey happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: awesome mount
Reviews.Author: Mike byers
Reviews.Content: I have a mount that holds my 65 inch TV that I spent $75. The cheetah mounts is a better mount for much better price

Reviews.Title: Low Quality Construction Apparent in Assembly
Reviews.Author: Ryan Magargle
Reviews.Content: I'm sure this mount is fine if you get it up on the wall, but I didn't get it that far.  They have you construct the frame from four separate pieces.  I was fine until I got to the last vertical support bar.  The screws were tight to remove from their pre-assembled positions, but securing the screws once it was in place was impossible.  Whatever was used to secure it during pre-assembly fused the hole threads, so it couldn't be completely secured.  They must have cheapened their manufacturing to make it all fit in a smaller box, and as quickly as it arrived, I'm sending it back and buying a mount from another manufacturer.  Based on previous reviews, it appears they have possibly cheapened the product to reduce costs, I disregarded based on the early positive reviews, but I can now saw recent buyers beware.

Reviews.Title: An affordable mount from a company that really cares
Reviews.Author: Jtishi
Reviews.Content: Okay so I initially wrote a review about this mount. I was initially unhappy with it and was not really all that crazy about it. However my TV has been up for a few weeks now and it has been fine and the mount works great. It comes with an HDMI cable and a level with a magnet on it so you can level the mount properly. It also comes with all the potential screws you may need and even dry wall anchors which eliminates a lot of the hassle. The only things you need to install it would be a phillips head screw driver, a an electric drill to mount it in the wall. My initial review was not very stellar on this product. A few weeks after I bought it the company contacted me about the experience I had with the mount and why I gave it a neutral review. I explained to them a few things about the product and they offered to send me a free shelving unit for my troubles. I may not have been blown away by the mount but I definitely was by their customer service. I have never had a company do that and it is so refreshing to see that a company truly cares about the experience that their customers have with their product. I am thoroughly impressed by my experience and how it was resolved.

Reviews.Title: Cool beans. :)
Reviews.Author: J. Gammage
Reviews.Content: VERY easy to put together, strong, and comes with nice extras.  I've mounted several TV's and this thing was pretty simple.  Although it specifies using it with a 31-65" TV, I used it to mount an 80" Vizio.  The weight requirement (and the mounting configuration on the TV) is all you really need to be concerned about.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended Product
Reviews.Author: Colin Lubbe
Reviews.Content: I was looking to purchase a mount for a 46" APEX Slim LED TV. The TV was to be mounted about a fire place. I did a lot of research and spent a lot of time looking for a good mount. Looking at big-box stores like Best Buy, Wal-Mart, Target, etc. I was quickly thrown off by the high prices for seemingly low-end mounts. I looked into mounts on Amazon when I bought an Amazon Prime account. Went back and forth looking at reviews for Cheetah and VideoSecu mounts and ultimately decided on the Cheetah mount based off of good reviews and reasonable installation.Got my mount through UPS in 2 days and was a little concerned when I looked at how small the packaging was. Once I unboxed everything and laid it out, I wasn't as concerned. The material seems sturdy and everything that was supposed to be in the box, was in the box. I've seen some people complain about how vague the directions are, I didn't find them very difficult to figure out. I built the plate that mounts to the wall first, installed the mounting brackets on the TV, secured the back plate to studs separated by 24", hung the TV, and adjusted where it sat so it was centered.Super-easy installation. Took my all of 20 minutes to get it done. My only suggestion is to use your own level. The level that came with the mount was not 100% accurate. It wasn't way off but it wasn't spot on.Ultimately, I am very happy with this product and how easy it was to install. Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 47" Vizio
Reviews.Author: R. Bardos
Reviews.Content: Bracket simply installs very securely to the wall with 4 lag screws into the studs.Then mounts to the TV with 4 included screws that fit perfectly on my 47" Vizio. Once all is screwed down, just hang the TV on the bracket, almost like hanging a picture frame. There is a locking screw but I am not able to get my hand back there to tighten, but it's not necessary. Once hanging, you still have a few inches to slide the TV left or right to center it up.There is also plenty of space to install a low voltage mounting bracket in the center of this mount.I have two young children running around and this mount holds the TV no problem, now for several months. I just ordered my second one for hanging my father's 55" Samsung.

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: lynziloo20
Reviews.Content: Great product. I have had it for a few months. and it is wonderful. i will for sure buy from them again in the future. A++

Reviews.Title: Functions as advertised
Reviews.Author: A. Solomon "netboy"
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket functioned just as advertised. I have a 58" plasma TV...it is heavy, and the mount does a great job.  A couple of nits that keep me from rating it 5 stars:1) Assembly is required. Each piece has to be bolted together. Not a huge deal but it took me about 20 minutes to complete this task. The directions are entirely clear so there was a little trial and error involved.2) Centering the TV on the wall is trickier than I imagined. I'm not Mr. Handiman, so finding the studs then figuring where to bolt it in such a way that the TV is centered was beyond my skill level (it's about 3 inches to the left of where it should be). I suppose that if I moved it over to the next set of studs it could have been centered but I already had drilled my holes.  I'm not sure if this is the manufacturers issue or mine, but a paper template would have been useful!

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Randy Webb
Reviews.Content: This mount has been great so far. I mounted my 50" LED above my fireplace and it has held strong so far. Really easy to install. The only problem is that I dont have enough access behind my TV to screw the locking screws in. But it doesnt seem like it is going to come off even without those locked. Great mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: rp100204
Reviews.Content: The price on this is phenomenal for what you get.  I have now ordered two of these and mounted TVs without a problem.  Straight ford, durable, and you get an extra HDM Cable!  This product can not be beat, do not let the low price fool you, it is a quality product.

Reviews.Title: worked fine
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Great wall mount for a decent price. I had no issue with using this wall mount. I would recommend using this product for just a standard mount

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: vesselin hristov
Reviews.Content: It fits all tvs and has a level that comes with it and its easy to assemble and install .

Reviews.Title: Best Mount By Far
Reviews.Author: M. Steimel
Reviews.Content: I have a variety of different wall mounts throughout my house and found Cheetah Mounts to be one of the best.  Not only are you given a few extra tools to make sure that things are level and squared but they are WAY more cheaper than the big box stores.  When I purchased my first plasma TV years ago I was so discouraged from mounting because of the big box store prices.  Get one of these - they are super easy to install too.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Estella Valladares
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy, was very easy to install. Not to mention it comes with a level and connections if needed. Great!

Reviews.Title: Quality product if you take some time and patience
Reviews.Author: Ryan Slater
Reviews.Content: I debated on this product due to the recent reviews of it being a changed design.  I went ahead with my purchase figuring if it didn't pass my quality control I would return it.  Once I received it I spent some time going over the contents making sure nothing was missing, and verifying the assembly instructions.  At this point I had to remove the brackets used to connect butt connect the support bars as they would never create a level line as they arrived.  After getting that reassembled, I then was able to complete the assembly of the wall bracket.The instructions call for using metric drill bits, which I didn't have.  A quick google search got me the fraction equivalents and I was off to the races.Using a quality stud finder I located two studs and drilled the required holes in them (the upper holes are a different size then the lower holes, so pay attention here).  I the attached the bracket to the wall and was happy with the mount.  It provided enough room to securely mount to two studs and I was able to have it in the position that I wanted the tv to be without any issues.  I then mounted the brackets to the tv, using the hardware provided, and attached the tv to the mount.  This was a two person operation due to the size, so make sure you have an extra set of hands for this step.  The mounts have enough holes in them that I was able to adjust the height of the tv to be exactly where I wanted it.In all the whole process took me 2 hours to assemble, level, and mount.I was not missing any hardware in my package, and the metal brackets were not damaged in my package, so other then having to take the time to fix the butt connection bracket, and having to take the time to verify drill bit sizes ( remember when substituting drill bits, always go smaller) this is a great product and I couldn't be happier with it.  I have already committed my self to helping my neighbor install one for his tv after he helped me with mine.Note: I did not use the supplied level or hdmi cable.EDIT - 1/17/2014I am updating my review of this product after talking with a staff member at Cheetah (as you can see in the comment they reached out to me based on my review).  My original review of this product was 4 stars.  After talking with them, and going over the issues I had with the product that resulted in me not giving it 4 stars, they let me know that they valued my feed back and would like to extend to me an offer of either a partial refund, or a second unit of the product.  As I am very happy with the unit I received, I didn't feel that they needed to provide either of these to me, but I decided to take them up on the offer of a second unit, so that I could take a second look at the product.  They quickly shipped out the second unit, and all I can say is that I was even more impressed by what I saw in this new unit then I was to begin with.  They have upgraded the packaging of the unit, and the parts seem to aligned properly straight out of the box.  Instructions are the same as far as I can tell (I didn't keep the original ones to compare against).  Now I am going to give this is a gift to my neighbor, and based on his experiences with it, I will most likely upgrade my rating to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: Skipper41
Reviews.Content: Product is well designed and constructed. Everything needed is included. I would buy this product again. I wonder why some people pay so much more for completing brackets.

Reviews.Title: The mount works great!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Hicks
Reviews.Content: The price is great, and it goes together easily.  The safety screws are the hardest part, because reaching them requires a long screwdriver.  I had a problem with a missing part originally, but the customer service was great, and they made up for it promptly.

Reviews.Title: The price is right!
Reviews.Author: PositiveRate
Reviews.Content: This mounting kit is hard to beat for the low price. The clearance from the wall is a little tight depending on exactly which kind of TV you're mounting. At the full down tilt angle, I was unable to plug in any devices to the HDMI ports, but this was due to my older TV that had a "large" behind. I remedied this by picking up a low profile HDMI cable.It included all the brackets, washers, and spacers I imagine you'd need to make things work out.
