Getting to the locking screws is a bit clumsy unless you have a reallllly long screwdriver that's just the right size.Anyway, if you need a simple angled inexpensive wall mount, this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: darin
Reviews.Content: this product does everything is said it would in the advertisement, it was packaged well and arrived quickly. this product will be very useful and I am very happy with the purchase.I would highly recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good mount, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This TV mount works as described.  I would have thought it would have been a little more sturdy, but once it's on the wall and your TV is stuck to it, it holds it up without issue.  It seemed a little week when handling the mount by itself, but when it's all bolted together it gets rigidity from the TV and is pretty sturdy.The TV mounts very close to the wall and is easy to remove to connect cables, etc.I recommend this for a flat mount.  It has served well.

Reviews.Title: solid TV mount
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Graebener "KenG"
Reviews.Content: Installed at my daughters apartment while she is at medical school.  It was easy to install and easily hold the weight of the 46" LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Peggy "nikon5"
Reviews.Content: Had it professionally installed since rewiring into a plaster wall was necessary.  Sturdy & secure for a 40" Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: Eh, it worked kinda
Reviews.Author: Samuel Scruggs Jr.
Reviews.Content: This mount would have been awesome, but there is a major flaw. The mount is in two pieces. You have to bolt the two pieces together, and as a result there is a week spot in the center of the mount. And due to my wall stud layout, one arm of the mount rests exactly in the center of the mount, making it impossible to level the TV. It isn't that bad however, and is only off a 1/4 of an inch. But it's not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very good customer service
Reviews.Author: H. Numan
Reviews.Content: Very expensive for the quality of this product. The professional who mounted my TV said I could have found one much better for the price. I don't know why the reviews I read said it was pretty good, perhaps they were smaller TVs, mine is a 46"UPDATE: After my review, I received a phone call from customer service and got a $15.00 refund for my purchase. It's been 3 months; the wall mount is still up and I have not had any issues with it. Thank you Cheetah Mounts

Reviews.Title: great product great price
Reviews.Author: guy that buys stuff on amazon
Reviews.Content: got 50 inch samsung from best buy, they wanted me to buy 100$ mount. Went with this instead. Totally worth it. Comes with lags, I hit studs did not use drywall things. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amanda Staley
Reviews.Content: I have my 47" Vizio flat screen on this wall mount and it is secure and low profile.  Works perfect and for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Solid buy
Reviews.Author: Timothy O'mara
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent buy with the tools to help mount and hook up a HD tv.  I was able to do the job myself and several months later the job still holds up.

Reviews.Title: Works as described, and good price
Reviews.Author: Gaurav Jain
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done at a fraction of the price of other mounts available in store. Would totally recommend it.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: G. Gervasi
Reviews.Content: It was as described and the TV went up without issue.  The assembly was easy I mounted it to a fireplace.  The mounting hardware worked great.  I would recommend this mount for any TV.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: D. Bryce
Reviews.Content: It is difficult (almost) impossible to lock the TV into the crossbar. (which nullifies the pivot) because the TV is too close to the wall.You'll need a 18" phillips screw bit....

Reviews.Title: Decent quality...
Reviews.Author: Ron Ulmer "ulmie"
Reviews.Content: Decent quality, with horrible lack of instruction for assembly.  Be prepared to spend a bit of time before hanging it on your wall.  Also, unless you have hands the size of a Hobbit, forget about making tilt adjustments after it is up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mount
Reviews.Author: Josh Naftolin
Reviews.Content: I just installed this mount in my living room and it was simple.  I have a 55" LG TV and this construction was perfect.  Not the strongest looking support but if installed correctly you should have no problems.  Great price!

Reviews.Title: Quality Mount-Good price
Reviews.Author: swintero
Reviews.Content: Good mount that was fairly easy to install.  Very nice that my TV is so flush to the wall.  Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Easy install, Cheap, Perfect
Reviews.Author: Gpick
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on all the positive reviews.  Couldn't have asked for a better product even if I had paid twice the price.

Reviews.Title: Good, Solid Mount!
Reviews.Author: Jerry Choate
Reviews.Content: I mounted my LG 42" tv. Easy and did the job. Looks great! I couldn't be happier.The level is a joke. It's too small to do any good. Use your own level. Anyone mounting a tv on the wall will have their own level to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: Good product that secures our TV effectively, fast ship, and included all the parts we needed at a very competitive price.Thanks Cheetah mounts!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: C. Hatten
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these and love them. I love that they give you ALL of the hardware for mounting just about any TV.

Reviews.Title: For TV with side ports only
Reviews.Author: Uncle Sem
Reviews.Content: This mount is well made but it is designed for TVs with side ports. If you have rear ports, especially HDMI ports you have to look for something else. I would like to give 10 stars to the seller. The Seller contacted me after my initial review and offered a replacement which is a better fit for my TV. Thank you for excellent services and great products.

Reviews.Title: to easy
Reviews.Author: jake sieg
Reviews.Content: hello the cheetah tv mount I would rate the mount a 5 why because for the price of 20 some $$ it was great. strong design and easy to install. I have seen very complicated designs sell for over 100$ this mount is great. simple, durable, and affordable is always a way to go. The HDMI cable is a great idea but I use my ownJake

Reviews.Title: Product does the job
Reviews.Author: Michael S Arrington
Reviews.Content: This is not a thick guage mount (stiff) by any means, but once secured to the wall, she works great. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Jesus S. Alvarado
Reviews.Content: best mount for the money, very sturdy made of good strong metal. self explanatory and very easy to assemble, loved it

Reviews.Title: Price is right and it works
Reviews.Author: Bill Vancil
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mount to install my 60 inch Vizio TV. I was able to accomplish the task of installing the hardware on the wall by myself. I only needed help for lifting the TV onto the mount. Piece of cake. The thing I like best is the price. Way less than the mounts available in the appliance and big box stores. I shopped quite a bit and found the Cheetah to be the best value. I highly recommend it for the larger flat screen TVs.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what it looks like
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a reasonably good product and an excellent value.  Two problems:  the wallmounts themselves need to be assembled, and my package contained one wrong piece. I was able to engineer around that, but you may choose not to.  Second:  the slim-ness is both a plus and a minus.  It is flush to wall, but it is almost impossible to tighten the lower screws without a very long philips head.  No room for my fairly ordinary size hand to manage the lower screws.Otherwise, good product.

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Montgomery "Hustle"
Reviews.Content: Very lightweight but sturdy. It was easy to setup. I bought two, I already installed one for my 32in. and you can't see any part of the frame behind the TV. Next I will install for my 55in.

Reviews.Title: The BEST bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Hammy
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the mount.  Overall quality and workmanship I would give a 4.0.  Not top of the line, but very respectable and it does not have that cheap look or feel.  The parts have decent tolerances and the paint is uniform without obvious flaws.  Having the fasteners in individually sealed compartments is a nice touch.  The hardware included seems like good quality as well (not like the poorly manufactured stuff that has a lot of slop in the nuts/bolts).Regarding value, this is a 5+.  I shopped around for mounts and found the price charged at retail stores  to be obscene.  Better still, this has an HDMI cable included with the kit!  Overall, I am very happy with the purchase because the mount is a very good quality with a superb price.Given my experience, I would gladly purchase more of their products in the future.

Reviews.Title: These mounts Rock
Reviews.Author: TJC "TonyC1968"
Reviews.Content: I am devoted to the Cheetah mounts.  They are well constructed at a great price.Directions could be clearer, but how much common sense does it take to screw two bars into your wall and hang a TV on it ?

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This mount came with everything to make the installation easy (except tools, of course) and the instructions were clear and easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Make sure you buy a long screw driver to secure the tv.. a 16 inch will do. there is no way around this.
Reviews.Author: zx
Reviews.Content: Make sure you buy a long screw driver to secure the tv.. a 16 inch will do. there is no way around this.Make sure you buy a long screw driver to secure the tv.. a 16 inch will do. there is no way around this.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: William Bertsch
Reviews.Content: Installed a 60 inch plasma and with the help of my son found it no big deal. You will need 2 people to lift the TV. Just make sure you have a solution for the cable runs.

Reviews.Title: worked well
Reviews.Author: J. Slater
Reviews.Content: My husband and I got this wall mount together and put up all by ourselves! Works well. Very sturdy. Satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Perfect mount
Reviews.Author: Elliott Harris
Reviews.Content: I have several different cheetah mounts and everyone of them is better than expected.  I highly recommend this mount to anyone who wants a good solid mount for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Metallover
Reviews.Content: Great mount.  Nice that it included an HDMI cable.  We used a normal carpentry level but I guess it's nice there's one included as well.The two screws which keep the TV held to the mount are really tough to get to, without a long phillips head screwdriver.  We eventually got it with a normal screwdriver, but a long one or extension will come in handy.Definitely a great deal and great price

Reviews.Title: Mounted 58" TCL Flatscreen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: All the hardware is included. Note that you will have to assemble the two halves of the mount together which will take about 3 minutes if you are at all handy.  For the price I don't think you can beat it.

Reviews.Title: Work well!
Reviews.Author: Flower Mound, TX
Reviews.Content: I had these installed by a friend.  He told me that they were not complicated to install just a bit timely.  They lie right against the wall the way I wanted them and offer versatility if I want to slightly move them or tilt.  Very good product.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Good product for price
Reviews.Author: BG2003 "quad hauler"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to assemble and the only improvement I would like is fixed holes to mount the bracket to the tv assuring it is level. However, the slotted holes to mount brackets to tv allow for leveling if wall bracket is not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed for my 60" tv. Really easy to install and works great.  I would recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Was easy to install and looks great. I like how close to the wall the TV sits. Can hardly tell there is a mount behind it. It is also easy to take the TV on and off the mount if you need to make adjustments or connect more cables.

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: alexander lavin
Reviews.Content: money worth it,easy to install,i am no a professional on tv wall mounted,but i feel like a pro when i have done mounting my tv

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Jessika Balderston
Reviews.Content: wall mount oh wall mount.  You are a magnificent wall mount.  You look so shiney when my TVs on you and on you I can count.

Reviews.Title: Great price for excellent product
Reviews.Author: BMW-ATL
Reviews.Content: Why pay more for a mount when you can get this one and it completely does the job?  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: katie
Reviews.Content: For this price, you can't find anything better.  I've purchased 3 of these wall mounts and each has been sturdy and works well. No problems to date, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Easy tp put up
Reviews.Author: H. G. Butler "4 Corners buff"
Reviews.Content: This TV mount is as advertised.  It is strong, easy to mount on a wall, and it holds my 42" plasma TV nicely.  Good value for the dollar.

Reviews.Title: TV Mounting kit
Reviews.Author: noe
Reviews.Content: Easy installation...Really liked the convenience of this flat screen TV mount. I highly recommend this item to all my friends

Reviews.Title: Simple, does the job
Reviews.Author: ReillyWood
Reviews.Content: Was easy to set up and install.  The only issue I had is that the bottom of the TV brackets are each held to the frame with a screw that's impossible to access, so my TV hangs on the frame only by the hooks at the top of each bracket.  Good enough for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Chris Ivanoski
Reviews.Content: This is the second mount I have bought from Cheetah Mounts because I moved to another house. I will buy another mount from them when i move again! You cannot even get an HDMI cable for the cost of this mount and it comes with one. Very reliable seller, great product, and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: steamwolf
Reviews.Content: We were gifted with a flat screen for the boys game room and really didn't want to spend a lot on the mount to use it.  This had great ratings at a decent price, installed easily and works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount!!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin J. Fataua
Reviews.Content: You cannot find a better tv mount at this price!! I have an older 55" Vizio tv and it is quite a bit thicker and heavier than the tv's sold today.  It was very easy to install and holds my behemoth of a tv just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great mounts for my 40 inch samsung
Reviews.Author: Texas customer
Reviews.Content: Fixed my Cheetah Mounts on the wall in 30 minutes, plugged in the new TV and all settled.Love the mounts, was easy to fix

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works great
Reviews.Author: Ricky Nigro
Reviews.Content: I really don't understand people paying huge prices for TV mounts.  This worked great.  Assembly was easy, mount is definitely working fine.Even includes a level! How nifty.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 3/4/14- changed review
Reviews.Author: Jordan T.
Reviews.Content: Updated 3/4/14 review.: Shortly after placing negative review online the supplier SPN performance called my cell number listed with amazon and were extremely professional and apologetic. They insisted, even after I had already received full refund on sending for free their new higher rated (weight wise) mount. Their new larger mount is wider and handles a 55 inch very well. Great customer service and very impressive attention to a upset client. Well done .Original Review:This mount sags bad and I mean bad, truly unsafe....That's major problem number 1. ( I was way under the weight and size listed as the max)Major Problem 2: The wall plate is 17.5 inches wide compared to all other mounts wall plates which are much wider (which allow for some adjustment side to side (sliding) on the wall plate, to "center the tv" etc.) - if your stud work is off center from we're you want tv, then your tv is off center- there is no way to adjust trust me I tried.Simply put DO NOT BUY.... (I truly can't believe the good ratings, it's actually concerning- maybe those TVs were tiny?) if I could give no stars I wouldAmazon prime returns? .... Of course awesome and easy, money back in a matter of days. That's the only five star moment of this transaction. Well done amazon

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I have this wall mount and purchased it for my uncle.  We are both happy with it.  Definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: T. O. Connor
Reviews.Content: For the job to be done, this is perfect.  It was delivered exactly when the smart TV arrived, and my hubby and son were able to install the mounts and TV immediately.  Many thanks for a great product, great and speedy service, and efficiency.  Best wishes to you.  Prosper well!!!  :)

Reviews.Title: I expected much worse
Reviews.Author: Michael Lee
Reviews.Content: Solid construction, and a cornucopia of hardware to hang this unit on a variety of surfaces.  Cable and level are both fine.  If you're suspicious how they can sell this so cheap, join the club.  I thought is seemed to good to be true, but my 42" is still hanging on a 108 year old plaster wall...not much more I can ask out a wall bracket.

Reviews.Title: Very sad returned
Reviews.Author: William Guanipa
Reviews.Content: I sent this item back did not work property with my lg tv 55" did not hold at all,do not get this for your 55"

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jack P. Scharnberg Jr
Reviews.Content: The direction where easy to follow and the level supplied may thing much easier for those who don't have lots of tools!Only thing I would add would be a paper template get the mount in the correct spot on the wall!

Reviews.Title: Tough to assemble, but works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Tchaikovsky08
Reviews.Content: As other recent reviewers have mentioned, this product now comes in multiple pieces.  I found it tricky to attach the two sets of long pieces together while ensuring the metal remained level.  However, once I finally succeeded in attaching the long pieces, the product works as advertised.  It is currently holding my 60" Panasonic Viera TV on the wall and it seems extremely sturdy.  I would have given this 5 stars if the long metal pieces came pre-assembled (or better yet, as one long piece rather than two shorter pieces).UPDATE 1/6/2014:  I received a call from Cheetah customer service the same night I posted my original review.  The customer service representative seemed genuinely interested in my feedback and explained that Cheetah had switched to a four-piece horizontal bar set instead of a two-piece set in order to conform the box to Amazon Prime's shipping requirements.  Because of my partial dissatisfaction with the assembly process, the customer service rep reimbursed my purchase $10.  In light of this customer service, which I found surprising and refreshing, I have upped my review to 4.5 stars (of course, Amazon doesn't permit half-stars so I rounded up to 5).

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Thanks for providing a nice wall mount at a very reasonable price. I will look your way the next time I need something similar!Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: theITcrowd
Reviews.Content: These mounts are far better than I could have expected.  This is the 2nd that I've bought since the first worked out so well.  There's nothing fancy about these, but they're strong and I have no complaints.  Simple design, yet very effective.  I have 2 TVs with these mounts; 1x 47" LED LCD HDTV and 1x 50" Plasma HDTV.  It was easy enough to mount and the HDMI cables were a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: Certainly worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey  and Danielle  Otterson
Reviews.Content: I could not have made my own for this money.  Like many of the other reviewers, I was skeptical, but the mount is solid, and with the included 10' HDMI cable, almost free.  I used the included lag screws to attach this thing to my wall, and I drilled an extra hole, right in the middle, to add one more lag screw (probably overkill.)  I hung a Samsung 65" LCD TV on this bracket, and it seems very solid.It is definitely pretty low-profile, and I wanted this.  The only downside of how close this mounts the TV to the wall is that it is about impossible to plug anything into the set once mounted.  Plan ahead, plug in all your wiring before you tighten the screws after hanging the TV on the wall.Pro: cheap and strong.  Price made better by the addition of the free 10' HDMI cable.Con: The assembly instructions could be improved.  The included level is a toy, useful if you don't own a real one.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Was everything i wanted in a mount. I would recommend it to everyone that needs a easy to install mount.

Reviews.Title: Nothing fantastic
Reviews.Author: tillamooktim
Reviews.Content: Nothing out of the ordinary here.  I think a little overly priced for what you get. If you don't own a 6 inch level ( I own at least a dozen) this product might appeal to you.Amazon got in touch with me and we got a nice discount on the shipping, thus my up grade.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Praveen Sethuraman
Reviews.Content: Sturdy, easy to install and cheap.I bought 3 of these a month back and I'm very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: John Schaefer
Reviews.Content: Reasonably easy to install on drywall-over-wood-studs construction.Required a *very* long shank screwdriver, and insert-bit-without-being-able-to-see-it technique, to tighten the lock screws after hanging the set.

Reviews.Title: Not up to par for Cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: Mr. Jimbo
Reviews.Content: After purchasing and mounting swivel and straight mounts by Cheetah with great success, I was disappointed in this mount.  To save on shipping size (I'm assuming), this mount requires additional assembly and is not as sturdy as the previous mounts.  Two major problems:  1) two of the lag screw heads broke off when the tightening the mount to the wall.  Had to re-measure and level two more times and buy better lag screws.  2) brackets that attach to the TV  - one came assembled incorrectly (upside down) and had to reassemble it to fix the bracket.  I like Cheetah mounts, just not this one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Mount
Reviews.Author: chris santarmes
Reviews.Content: This mount is awesome and comes with everything you will need including a very nice heavy duty HDMI cable. I got one of these for my parents and they love it and it only took an hour to install and most of that time was finding a stud to mount too (crazy built house).

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price.
Reviews.Author: jongmoonchoi
Reviews.Content: I'm using this wall mount with LG 60LN5600.Pretty good for the price and easy to set up.I think this product is enough to stand up to 65''.

Reviews.Title: Good mount for cheap price
Reviews.Author: Gavyn Essner
Reviews.Content: This mount is okay for the price. The other upside of the level and had I cable are a great bonus. I am not very happy with the strength of the mount after being assembled. It isn't very robust compared to my old sanus mount the unfortunately doesn't accommodate my larger tv. I will be replacing this cheetah mount in the near future with a more quality mount. You get what you pay for as the saying goes.

Reviews.Title: My thoughts.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: It's a nice looking mount but the television cable that came with it doesn't work.  It will be returned soon.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Rodrigues
Reviews.Content: Not much to say other than it does it's job. It's holding up a 52" TV perfectly and it was easy to put together.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: ck
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast and super easy to install. A drill and stud finder and you'll have your tv on the wall in no time. The levels it comes with just make the job that much easier. Also comes the wire you need to hook your tv up to your PC. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Christopher O. Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Ordered this with next day shipping to take to my In-Laws to help them setup a new TV in a guestroom. Unfortunately UPS dropped the ball, so I had to buy one locally at Costco, but Amazon handled the situation as well as could be expected.This kit is a good deal compared to box-store alternatives.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Minus One
Reviews.Content: For the price this is definitely the best wall mount you can purchase. The HDMI cable that comes with it is actually a nice cable that could cost upwards of $30 alone in most stores. The mount itself is not difficult to put together and I currently have a 60" television that has been hanging from it for at least 6 months. The only downside I could say against it is that some of the ports on the back of your television can be difficult to reach, but the same could be said for any wall mount that doesn't have extendable arms.

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Bad instructions but great once you get it up.The cables alone our worth the price. I would definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Ashley Arnold
Reviews.Content: works perfectly as decsribed. was easy to assemble and install. have not had any problems since installing, and definitely made my life easier.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our 46" Samsung. Also bought recessed low voltage cable plates so that the cables could be hidden (side note about those: would have gone with something bigger if I had thought more about it before ordering).Delivery was timely, install went smoothly. I did most of it by myself and got help for lifting the tv up there and getting cables connected.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bethany Herman
Reviews.Content: This product worked wonderfully for us. Highly recommended for anyone that has a television to mount! Would definitely buy this again!

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Justine
Reviews.Content: I dont know the difference between this and other ones but this one works. my tv is hanging on the wall like i wanted it too. Thats all I Can say

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: i like the cheetah wall mount! it works great, no problems to install and everything. It was also nice that it came with a long HDMI cable also!

Reviews.Title: easy to install does the job
Reviews.Author: MKAFILM
Reviews.Content: Not too much to complain about here, its worth the money and supports the TV, if it could print money, provide sex, and offer helpful life suggestions I would give it 5 stars but its only a wall mount bracket.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mount
Reviews.Author: joshmoutlon
Reviews.Content: Needed a good mount for my new TV in my basement office. This worked like a charm. Large size selection so I could basically get any size TV I wanted in the future if needed

Reviews.Title: It is a TV wall Mount Bracket
Reviews.Author: Ginny Clark
Reviews.Content: We mounted it on the wall.We mounted the TV on it.The TV did not fall down and go BOOM.All is good.

Reviews.Title: For the Price - can't beat it
Reviews.Author: Bobby B.
Reviews.Content: For the Price - Can't beat the value, seems sturdy, hopefully it's a good buy.Fairly Easy to install, did it myself in less than 2 hours, including a run to home depot for drill bits (I never have the right one).The bracket fit my 60 inch Sharp which was a relief - at first sight i didn't think it would.  but it's all good.Now, I don't know if i'm just an idiot or if you need magic tools - but the low profile design of this, while appealing because the tv isn't hanging over like a shelf, makes tightening the safety screws nearly impossible - and then to get anything plugged into the tv is a pain because the clearance is minimal between the wall and unit. easy remedy is to plug everything in before of course - and i did pick up a nifty little hdmi switch so i have just one cable running to the tv instead of 4 or 5 (Kinivo 501BN Premium 5 port High speed HDMI switch - 39.99 here on amazon) back to the safety screws - i still haven't tightened them - i think i'll have to find a long narrow screw driver to do it, because i just can't get it done with my normal set and my large hands - so before you buy - understand that low profile look - means hard to reach spaces. Other than that - i think it's a solid buy, compared to similar look and quality mounts that sell for double even triple the price.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV mount!  Great price and super easy to install.  We plan to order more to mount all of the TV's in our house.

Reviews.Title: excellant product would recommend to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Rodney Roberts
Reviews.Content: Bracket worked perfectly. easy to assemble and provdided level made it easy to mount and make sure tv was level.

Reviews.Title: the right price
Reviews.Author: benn
Reviews.Content: i uesd this to mount a 46" tv and i must say i was a bit worried when i saw the construction of the mount but it is a great product it comes with a a leveling tool which is a nice touch. over all great product

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: Jminor548
Reviews.Content: Does it's job as described. Totally satisfied. Was unable to secure bottom screws because screwdriver wasn't long enough. Will get longer one.

Reviews.Title: Decent quality for the price, missing lots of features
Reviews.Author: Eric S
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for the price, but after install I find myself wishing I'd paid more for a Sanus / Chief mount.Pros: sturdy, included level is a nice touchCons: NO adjustments post install, can't move a side slightly up or down, difficult to reach the safety screws and really need to take off the wall to adjust the tilt

Reviews.Title: GREAAAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Not only the price is unbeatable but the mount is super easy to set up. I do have a 60" inch TV hooked to it and worked perfectly

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with a Cheetah mount (as long as you replace the bolts)
Reviews.Author: D. Michael Medlin
Reviews.Content: I've used Cheetah mounts for multiple mountings (personal, friends, work, etc.) and I love them.  The first thing I do is get the bolts from the box, go to the local hardware store, and replace them with galvanized ones.  Once that is done, I'm good to go.  I bought two of these for a work setup mounting two 50" LG TVs and they look and work great.

Reviews.Title: Great price - great product
Reviews.Author: Michelle Weaver
Reviews.Content: Some of the other posts said the screws that came with this product were wrong - I used the ones that came with the mount & it's great. Easy - secure - very straight forward.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but solid!
Reviews.Author: Michael Prinster
Reviews.Content: The instructions are clear, the mount is solid, and a first-timer like me was able to successfully wall-mount a 60" LED TV.  You might want a long Phillips-head screwdriver for tightening the final screw, though, because it's a long reach in a tight space -- I'm sure every wall mount that keeps the TV close to the wall would have the same need.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Happy
Reviews.Author: Andy Mc
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect mount for a recent 40" wall mount job.  Not to mention the great price.  Very sturdy, kit instructions easy to follow, all misc screws required were included.  The included level was dodgy, so I used my own instead.  You'll spend this money for an HDMI cable alone anywhere else.  Walmart wanted $100 for a mount kit with similar functionality, no cable included.  Shipping speed was excellent.  The spacing between the top and bottom rails is just big enough for a standard electrical plate in a portrait (tall) orientation, and I was able to mount a plate for AC power on the left and low voltage plate on the right both inside the bracket.Word of caution: The TV I got has rear connectors flush with the back panel.  This mount is so flush to the wall that I could not use standard HDMI or component cable plus because the backshells were longer than the available spacing.  I solved it by purchasing 90 degree right angle cables (I could not use included HDMI cable due to this problem).  I recommend instead that you make sure you get a TV that has ports on the back which are recessed or otherwise oriented so you do not have my problem.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount for Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Jano
Reviews.Content: I am perfectly satisfied with this product.  I just bought it withing the last year for my 47" Flat Screen and it does the trick.Easy installation and TV perfectly mounted.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Zee
Reviews.Content: Nice and sturdy the level is handy also.good quality, good price.I would recommend this, I have nothing to compare this too have not had a tv installed on wall before.But I am happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Be Warnd!
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: This comes with a level, HDMI cable which are great. BUT BE WARNED.... The instructions are horrible.  It comes in many pieces and parts. To make matters worst, the parts are not numbered or lettered so it is like a puzzle putting this thing together. I guess one can't complain for the price. Once you finally figure out what piece connects to what piece and how, it holds up pretty good. My opinion..... it is not worth the time.  Get a product with better instructions because the one that comes with this are useless. Remember, you get what you pay for.  I had my own High quality HDMI cable already so I cannot vouch for the cable that comes with this product.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: JSLuik
Reviews.Content: Nice mount, works well.  Used with 32" tv.  Would recommend to others. The included levels helped when mounting the TV.

Reviews.Title: SUPER SLIM
Reviews.Author: Karen M Lenhart
Reviews.Content: I love this item it fits against the wall perfectly,super slim and easy to put together.nice color.and also nice to get the hdmi cable and leel.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: martin hernandez
Reviews.Content: Is really good I have it on my bedroom and is all what I need and good price too I Like It

Reviews.Title: Economy TV Mount, nothing more.
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: This is a very simple TV mount without anything extra. I would not purchase it again, but I used it and don't plan to return it. I feel it is adequate, but I think it is easier to make mistakes with this than with other TV mounts I have used.It is composed of two horizontal bars of heavier metal that are joined by two vertical bars of flimsier metal. Once bolted to the wall it rests quite securely. My issue is with the brackets joined to the TV. The twin hooks on each bracket that mount to the bar don't line up with each other perfectly. There are four of these hooks with two on each bracket. On a single bracket, one hook might engage the wall mount and the other might not be engaged. I had to try a few times to get all four hooks engaged on the wall mount. Also, I used this for a 60 inch TV and while this is low profile, it can be a challenge to see behind the TV to be sure they are all engaged. The second issue I have is the security screw to prevent accidentally removing the TV. I had a hard time tightening this as it is too high behind the TV and with my hand behind the TV I could not tighten this well even with a long screwdriver. This would not be an issue with a smaller TV.All in all, I do think the is adequate economical mount. However, I do feel there are issues with this, so you need to use care when installing this.

Reviews.Title: basic mount, tilt is poor
Reviews.Author: Andrew A Reinhard
Reviews.Content: Good for flush mount, although it does tilt out I would not recommend it for any TV that you want to tilt out as it's adjustments are poor. If you want a thin mount to keep flush to the wall, this is your unit.

Reviews.Title: Buy This Mount!
Reviews.Author: Carlo
Reviews.Content: Do not waste money on expensive mounts!  Buy this one!  I have wall mounted 2 tvs both with these mounts. They are perfect and hold the tvs strong. There is absolutely no reason to spend money on the expensive mounts no matter what anyone tells you. These are perfect.

Reviews.Title: Carjud
Reviews.Author: Carjud
Reviews.Content: Pros: This is a great mount for the low price, well able to handle a large TV, and easy mounting. Comes packed with everything that is needed for a good wall installation.Con: If you are mounting a 65 in Samsung, as I did, you don't have enough wall clearance to get to the safety screws that secures the mount to the frame and you will need to plug into the TV back, all of the Cables that you will be using, because there will not be room to reach them later.Also, it does not give the 4 inch wall clearance that Samsung recommends for air ventilation.

Reviews.Title: can't reach bottom screws
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I've had/installed several Cheetah mounts, and this is by far the cheapest.  A little extra work is required to assemble the mount.  It's also odd that you can't really tighten the bottom screws that keep the bottom of the tv against the mount.  Gravity works, so this isn't an issue, but a better design could help this.

Reviews.Title: Works great, although a bit hard to lock into place.
Reviews.Author: Michael Shepanski
Reviews.Content: The product is great! My only complaint is the lock in screws on the bottom are nearly impossible to screw in unless you have a screwdriver about 1.5 feet long.  Maybe it's easier with smaller TV (ours was a 52" Samsung).  I've seen some other mounts have a long pole that you can slide in from the side which seemed a bit easier.  In any event, we didn't lock it in place and it still feels pretty solid and not going anywhere.We used 6 Toggler SnapToggle Anchors to fasten it directly to the drywall as our apartment doesn't have wooden studs behind the walls.  It's been 6 months and the TV feels very secure still. The price is unbeatable, well worth it despite the minor locking issue.EDIT: I am upping my 4-star review to a 5-star review because this company's support is crazy good. After posting the original review they promptly called me to answer any questions I had about the product and helped me out with the lock screws.

Reviews.Title: little cumbersome to assemble, no complaints on the stability of the mount
Reviews.Author: Joseph Holaway
Reviews.Content: hard as heck to assemble, and the low profile will not work for some.my tv has 5 HDMI inputs on the left side, which made this mount ideal for me.no problems with anything other than the assembly

Reviews.Title: research before you buy!
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: I ordered these as they were best seller. Product is fine BUT:I have a 55 inch tv and you need one helluva long screwdriver to set the safety screws!Also if your tv has the cables coming directly out the back (not side)  it may not be enough room. The wall is pressing against my cables.Overall this product was easy to install and cane with a free hdmi cable.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Rusignuolo
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, put them up quickly. They work just fine and are inexpensive. Plus you get a free level and HDMI cable. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Real cheap, does the job but real flimsy
Reviews.Author: John P.
Reviews.Content: It does the job and con't be beat for the price, just don't try to lift and move the TV much to add cords etc. because this thing flexes a lot and is pretty thin. BUT when it's on the wall your TV won't go anywhere so it gets the job done. Once installed you will never see/touch it again so it was a good buy for me.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to work with
Reviews.Author: J. Bonillacarrasquillo
Reviews.Content: After installing this mount unto my wall I found out that it was not easy to as my studs are spaced 24 inches apart and the hole pattern would not allow me to accurately center the TV and mount. Second once the tv is mounted on the wall it is very hard to get it to hook on the mount and when you do it is even harder to get into the screws on the bottom. As you would need an extra long philips screw driver to get it. In addition when you have to install cables because the way it is design it makes it nearly impossible to get the cables on without barely pinching the wires. I would definitely not refer this product to someone else....Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: G.W. Hedrick
Reviews.Content: It works great and has met all of our needs perfectly.  Very well made product.  Instructions were easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have mentioned, this item is very good at this price and was able to hold my 50inch tv very well. Relatively easy to install as well.

Reviews.Title: My first wall mount
Reviews.Author: James O'Brion
Reviews.Content: I chose this mount for the price and for its quality.  The mount was easy to put up and I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Not enough range of motion
Reviews.Author: Jack from Michigan
Reviews.Content: Nice that they included the level and HDMI cable but after looking it over I ended buying a full motion swing and tilt mount.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: peggy
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my son and he was able to install them by himself and they worked perfect!

Reviews.Title: wall hanger
Reviews.Author: tppercha
Reviews.Content: The item came when promised and is exactly as it should be. Holds my 47 inch TV perfectly on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Nice extras, but questionable quality
Reviews.Author: Harrison Logan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this mount for my new Samsung un55f7500 based off of the 4.5 star rating and over 4000 reviews.  Upon receiving the mount everything looked great.  Once I started to put it together though, I began to regret my purchase.  The vertical braces for the mount are held together with small screws.  One of the screw holes for my mount was drilled too small for the provided hardware and would not hold the braces tight... Still jiggled.  This gave me an uneasy feeling with it not being solidly held together, so I ran to home depot and got some 3/8 length 10 32 bolts and a couple nylon locking nuts and used those on the 4 corners to hold the braces together instead.  Once the mount was assembled, I went to put it on the wall.  Got everything lined up and level and started to torque down the lag bolts into the studs.  I didn't even torque one of the bolts down fully and it ended up shearing off leaving me with just the bolt head falling out into my hands.  Another trip to home depot and I had 4 galvanized lag bolts, some remeasuring and leveling later I got the mount bolted to the wall.  One of the braces that attached to the back of the TV was stuck in the no tilt position.  I donty plan on tilting my TV, so this wasn't a big deal.  When it came time to screw in the safeties, only one of the holes was drilled properly.  Couldn't get the other safety to screw in, so my TV only has 1.Overall I'm happy with some parts of the product, but pretty disappointed with some of the installation issues I had

Reviews.Title: great price, not very functional
Reviews.Author: Reston, VA
Reviews.Content: great price as cheetah typically does offer excellent products, industrial strength at competitive prices.  The problem is, shipping to return costs a fortune b/c the items are so heavy so make sure you know what you're buying.purchased this for a 45+ inch TV.  The only problem is it only hangs.  I can't swivel with it, can't do anything but lift it off the large hooks, up and off the mount.  Strange design b/c it doesn't do anything but hang there.  Also the cords look terrible. So,  purchased the item that hides the cords and it isn't long enough, so now I have a TV on the wall that is just stuck there with cords hanging down and i can't swivel the mount to the kitchen when I'm cooking.  Should have planned things out a little better.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Miserable
Reviews.Author: Liam otool
Reviews.Content: cant get the safety screws installed as no space to fit screw driver once installed...stay away this thing is total junk

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts are Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Randal Arcand
Reviews.Content: Mount went on the wall fast.  Easy to assemble.  Only problem was my lack of experience in mounting something on the wall next to a pocket door..oops...installed the mount and the door wouldn't open because I had run the lag screws into the door.  Be aware of what's behind the wall!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price.
Reviews.Author: Eryk
Reviews.Content: I don't get some of the negative reviews on this mount. I found it sturdy and simple to assemble and install. Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: THe best mount for the Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kay
Reviews.Content: Got for xmas, and wow does it work amazing!!! Great mount, will work and is super slim. Would recommend to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: I Love My Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Laura Arne
Reviews.Content: My Flatscreen TV looks so great on my wall. The wall mount is working great. It is very secure and can twist if I want it to. I have even had fires in my fireplace below and it is very sturdy and durable.I really think for this great price and it's durability I scored. No way was I going to pay over $200 or more at a high end store like Best Buy.You won't be disappointed and yes, all the parts came with it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and everything you need.
Reviews.Author: Gar Russell "Krondor"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my new 60" TV. It's a solid build with a cord and level as a bonus. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the money
Reviews.Author: Aspen266
Reviews.Content: The reviews criticizing the instructions are accurate - but if you read those reviews, they will steer you correctly.  Using that info, it still took a little time to assemble and install, but not unreasonable.  The product it is as described, and certainly sturdy enough for my TV, which is several years old and weighs 58 lb, according to the manufacturer specs.  It has been mounted for several months now with no problems or signs of issues.  For the price, this mount is tough to beat - before you complain, compare the price with that of similar products out there and in brick and mortar "big box" stores.

Reviews.Title: A tremendous TV mount.
Reviews.Author: P. Driscoll
Reviews.Content: My 5 star rating is simply based on a few things. The setup is relatively easy, and I encountered no problems. The mount itself is beyond sturdy (I put lots of pressure on it with body weight). It has a nice low profile look, making it completely hidden behind my TV. The 15 degree angle adjustment is also great for people who don't want to strain their necks while looking up! A well-built product.

Reviews.Title: 25 BUCKS WITH A LEVEL and an hdmi cable?
Reviews.Author: Adam Briller
Reviews.Content: u really cant go wrong with this..only drawback is you have to put it together.really not a big deal but it comes in a relatively small box because all 4 sections have to be put togther..but again for 25 bucks..it does its job!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Barks
Reviews.Content: This was easy to put together, but does not tilt well.  In fact, I couldn't even adjust the skews underneath, as you do with most, because there wasn't enough room to reach behind the TV.  The wiring behind the tv is very tight.  It's nice for the price, but not the best I've seen.

Reviews.Title: Hard to put togather at first but worth the price
Reviews.Author: CrazyShopper918
Reviews.Content: Once I got this put together it worked perfectly. Well worth the price it's holding a older heavy LCD screen on the wall with no issues

Reviews.Title: Simple. Strong.
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Does what it says it does. Simple, strong, straightforward. Hanging a 50 inch TV. Bought this for a welder and he trusts it, so...

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts worked fine
Reviews.Author: Conrad Cross
Reviews.Content: Good value, it had all the accessories to make the installation easy, Price was very good and the installation intruction were on target.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Carlos Vincentelli
Reviews.Content: Easy to install it yourself and very low profile. Perfect if you don't need your tv to swivel. Very good

Reviews.Title: Good product overall
Reviews.Author: Bryan Humphreys
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these and mounted a 42" TV and a 50".  They go together fairly easily and I was able to mount both with limited effort.  I would have appreciated more detailed instructions, but other than that, these were great for the price.

Reviews.Title: tvs are holding
Reviews.Author: frank k
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these to hold two 50 inch plasma tvs and they're doing great. The HDMI cable that comes with it is really nice also. Definitely get better anchors (the big butterfly deals) if you're not mounting directly into the studs - I wouldn't trust the anchors that come with it to hold in drywall.  This mount doesn't leave a lot of room between the wall and tv so you may want to get angled HDMI adapters  and bigger spacers to minimize pressure on the cable and outlet.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, but Quality.
Reviews.Author: Stephen B
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and install. You do have to put it together, unlike other mounts I've used in the past. The mounted portion comes in 6 pieces, not counting the 2 TV hang brackets.The included Level and HDMI were a nice bonus. However the HDMI is about 10ft, and too long for what I needed, so I used a shorter cable I already had.I didnt use any of the provided screws or drywall mounts because I always shoot for mounting on studs, which I was able to do. Once it was mounted on the wall it was strudy as a rock. 42" TV hung up no problem.

Reviews.Title: Cheap product. Hopefully holds up.
Reviews.Author: KrazyKorean
Reviews.Content: Bought this based on reviews. However, the product itself seems a little flimsy. I also had a difficult time getting it level. I will have to use shims in the end.The biggest drawback to this product was that one of the mounting bolts snapped in half as I was tightening it into the wall. What a pain! Now I have to get another mounting bolt and anchor. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Does not level
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: As others have reviewed, I was extremely careful mounting this level, using my own level in addition to the one provided, however after installing it the TV was still not level and I had to lodge a nickel in between the mount and the tv to make the tv straight.  Otherwise it is ok.

Reviews.Title: Soild Mount, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jdog"
Reviews.Content: They did an awesome job on the construction.  Feels sturdy and has been holding my TV strong for a few weeks now.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: jermcd50
Reviews.Content: Perfect item. Used for my 65" Samsung. I would buy again. Good quality and great price. Mounted flat on wall.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I used this to hang my 65" TV and it work great.  Product is well made for the price and was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great sturdy mount but not really for a 32" TV but it will work
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: This is a great sturdy mount for any TV.  I used it for a 32" Flat screen.The only problem I found with mounting it to such a small TV is that it lacks 4mm flat washers and 4mm lock washers.  The back of the 32" TV has 4mm mounting bolts so spend a couple of bucks at the Lowes or Home Depot and pick up four 4mm flat & lock washers.  Also, if you use it on a 32" TV, you may see the top of the brackets depending on how high you mount the TV.  NOT a deal breaker for me since it is going into my daughters room.  Other than that it is a great mount for the price.  The included 10' HDMI wire and the levels are great too. If it would have had washers then it would have gotten a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: nice mount for my 50 inch tv
Reviews.Author: James p cornelison jr
Reviews.Content: Works great just what I expected easy to put up and seems to be good quality nicer than I expected

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: S. C. Wright
Reviews.Content: I have bought 4 of these - they assemble easily and work great.  I guess I wouldn't have bought the fourth one if the first three weren't any good!  Two minor issues:  1.  The last one had a missing screw and stripped thread on one of the four end attachments.  A sheet metal screw from my junk drawer worked fine.  The other issue is that it's a little small for a 65" TV.  It fits, but it has to be place on just the right place on the wall to get the TV to be where you want it.

Reviews.Title: It's cheap and works.
Reviews.Author: Jesse S Gill
Reviews.Content: I can't find much wrong with this thing.  It's simple to put together, provides a variety of nuts and bolts, and has easy to understand instructions.  It's basically two pieces.  One you mount to the wall and the other attaches to your tv.  You then hang the tv onto the wall mount.  Other reviews said it was difficult to level but I didn't have that  issue at all.  Take it slow, read everything, measure twice and go through the entire process in your head first before doing everything and you won't have any problems.  Installation is a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Price, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ryan D. Griffin
Reviews.Content: As many of the other reviews have stated, this product is very well made (where it needs to be) and was not difficult to install. The one word of caution is that the instructions are a little lack luster - just go slow and note that you will not need to use all the parts (they have to include multiple sizes of bolts depending on which type of surface you're going into).

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive TV mount.
Reviews.Author: John C. Lin
Reviews.Content: I had no trouble mounting this on a basement concrete wall with a hammer drill and the provided parts. No need to run out a hardware store! Rock solid mount for a 51" Samsung plasma TV. Comes with a useful, long HDMI cable as a bonus. THis is the only mount to get, for the quality and price!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: aspuhead "APSUHead"
Reviews.Content: Just mounted my BF 60' Vizio TV with this bracket. Very simple and strong mount. Easy to assemble and works great!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts wall  bracket
Reviews.Author: Shopping Queen
Reviews.Content: This bracket was relatively easy to install and works as well as the more expensive brackets on the market.  My husband put it up in about 45 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Junk. Don't Buy
Reviews.Author: Troy W. Danekes "Paperbak Writer"
Reviews.Content: I too was skeptical when I saw the box. Lesson learned. Always go with your gut. Half the nuts were incorrectly threaded making it impossible to secure the parts together. Do yourselves a favor and pay for a solid, trustworthy product.And don't believe the positive reviews. They're BS

Reviews.Title: Watch out - Inconsistent Product - Great mount at affordable price
Reviews.Author: customer_from_ma "customer_from_ma"
Reviews.Content: Update:-(Amazon apparently does not let me link to pictures; you will have to cut and paste the link in your browser)On my recommendation, my brother bought the same mount.  However he had lots and lots of problem.  After he sent me his pictures, I realized that vendor is shipping two different products under the same same product SKU.  Here is the picture of what I had.  Notice how there are three fasteners holding the horizontal component to the center piece  [...]HOWEVER, this is how it looks like when my brother got his mount.  Notice only two fasteners.  He had trouble with all of the hardware and in general he was very unhappy with the mount.  [...]If you get what I got, you would be OK but if you get what my brother got, you would have problems.  I am knocking it down by another star.---------------The only reason I knocked down a star because tilt adjustment or the safety screw tightening needs unusually large screw driver *AND* included levels are completely and utterly junk.  They are *NOT* level.  You need to throw them away and you use your regular 3-feet level or buy one.  Another reason I put this as 4-star instead of 5-star is because the instructions to connect the vertical pieces could have been better.  I was trying to hook them up as I thought there was a slot for the piece.  On the plus side, there was a phone number in the included English (!) directions (well done!) and I was able to talk with a real live customer service on 3rd ring.  While trying to explain my problem, I realized myself how to attach it correctly.  This part of the instruction could use some re-wording and a exploded picture showing it would be tremendous help.Something else to keep in mind is that it is low profile mount and once TV is installed, you barely have room to put a finger or two behind it.  So make sure all the cables are pre-hooked before putting the TV up.  As a matter of fact, if there are any connections in the back (versus on the side) put cables in there even if you are not using them now.  Leave the other end tucked up somewhere on the side, so you can hook them up later.  I installed my 55 inch LG LCD TV right over the gas fire place.People who are having trouble with this are the ones 1) who thought the levels were level 2) did not tighten everything down, 3) did not realize how low-profile this mount is.

Reviews.Title: Good wall mount.
Reviews.Author: Capri Hutchens
Reviews.Content: It's a little tight to get cords into the back of the tv once the mount is on the wall, but loved how cheap and good quality it is at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Printed Concept
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and fit perfectly for my 50in tv. Very stable and durable...planning to get more, its worth the money!!!! Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great mount, easy to understand directions and installation
Reviews.Author: macboi3000
Reviews.Content: This mount was very inexpensive and easy to install. I highly recommend this mount for anyone looking for a way to install their TV on a wall.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount
Reviews.Author: cardley
Reviews.Content: This is a good mount for my TVs.  The only thing I would say could be better is that it hugs the wall so tightly that it makes connecting your wires difficult on some TV models.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this mount
Reviews.Author: Tricia Meinhart
Reviews.Content: I assume the other people who reviewed this have not installed other mounts before; I have installed several and this is by far the most difficult to install and adjust.  It comes as 8 pieces.  6 separate pieces are attached to make the wall plate.  The only redeeming quality is the HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: steve tibbit
Reviews.Content: Very good quality, worked great! Would definitely buy this again, and recommend to a friend! Free bonus hdmi cable is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: Susanzd
Reviews.Content: I own a few of the Cheetah mounts and since the first two worked so great I decided to buy this one for my 55" Samsung flat screen. Since my studs are 20 inches apart we had to use the last holes in the mount on each side, this worked and the TV is secure on the wall in the studs. The Cheetah mounts always secure well to the TVs and feel secure when moving them (rotating up, down or side to side). Keep watching, the prices change frequently from what I have noticed. You cannot go wrong with these mounts! Hardware is always include, I have never had any missing parts.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: JM "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Simply follow the directions and your TV is on the wall, it even comes with a level and HDMI cable. Can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable price for a solid mount
Reviews.Author: Jay Kraus
Reviews.Content: It was a little difficult to get to the locking screws once it was flush mounted above the fireplace on marble tile.  It is secure and well hidden by the television.  The price was excellent and worth a little aggravation mounting it.

Reviews.Title: Id use this again
Reviews.Author: Joe Cappi
Reviews.Content: I have a 55" Samsung led,...this does the jobThe price is unbeatable, putting it together is simple.Very low profile to the wall (which i like)only draw back is making sure all your cables are run to the tv before you hang it. youll never get behind the tv again unless you take it down (which only takes a minute.slides nicely left & right on the bracket for easy adjustment.slight tilt which is perfect in my case.all in all,..for the $$ id buy this for all my tvs.only scenario i wouldnt (for my bedroom tv) is because i need a swivel bracket. otherwise this is solid & great value

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Terry Davis
Reviews.Content: I purchased two mounts for my new 50 in. Tvs.  Both were just alike and work like the much more expensive models , would buy again.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Just as described.  Great company, even came with a level, and an hdmi cable.  Companies just don't do that any more.  Held our42" tv up just as expected!!!

Reviews.Title: great tv stand
Reviews.Author: Kristy
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I found this tv wall mount....it was so much less than any I've seen in the stores.  The only problem is its hard to get behind the tv if you need to switch around cords however that has more to do with the tv than the wall mount. I wish they would put the inputs on the sides of the tv rather than the back.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product at a Very Good Price
Reviews.Author: Robby R Garlington
Reviews.Content: Highly Recommend this product for a stationary mount.  I also have utilized their cantilever mounts which work very good as well.

Reviews.Title: easy to install and durable
Reviews.Author: marcin wosik
Reviews.Content: item was cheap or should I say inexpensive. I used it to hang a 46" tv and its still hanging on strong. HDMI cable and small level were a plus

Reviews.Title: A+++
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great product and seller. I'm a well please customer and I would definitely recommend anyone else to buy. I also myself plan on buying another one in the near future A+++

Reviews.Title: Cheap...But works great
Reviews.Author: Grayexchange
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these.  I mounted a 2013 Sony 60" LED on one without any issues.  The TV isn't going anywhere and the mount itself is extremely simple in both operation and installation.  The TV actually fits more snuggly agains the wall than I expected.  I actually had to install a recessed power outlet for one of the two TV's I have installed on this mount. The second TV is a 40" Sony LCD that weighs over 60lbs.  Absolutely no issues.

Reviews.Title: Price is right
Reviews.Author: Freedom
Reviews.Content: I have a 55" Vizio mounted on the wall with this mount. It works great and the price is right. Took a few minutes to figure out how to assemble it. I couldn't mount it on studs because they were not where I wanted to position it so I used SnapToggle anchors to mount it to the wallboard and they work great.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I needed this to hang a 50" flatscreen.  This was about 1/3 the price of the Best Buy wall mounts, and with Prime, it was worth the risk.  Fortunately it paid off.  It was easy to install, and has stayed right in place.  I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Great for buyer on a budget
Reviews.Author: Dan Collins
Reviews.Content: This stand exceed my expectations on both quality and price point. Don't waste your money on much more expensive mounts when you have have this one. You can move the tv on the mount from side to side for your viewing pleasure. I currently have a 46" plasma attached to it with absolutely no issues.

Reviews.Title: Forget about spending hundreds at Bestbuy
Reviews.Author: milehibones
Reviews.Content: Why spend a ton of extra cash for overpriced hardware from big box retailers. This wall mount was up in less than 30 minutes, including clean up. Best $25 I have spent on electronic hardware!

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup
Reviews.Author: Muks
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup and its sturdy. I have 40 inces tv mounted flawless. The leveler is very helpful which comes with this product

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: antonio
Reviews.Content: Does what its suppose to do. If anchored to the wall correctly this works as a charm. I've used about 10 of these so far for the house and friends and family members houses. The HDMI cable could be longer for some applications but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: NDec
Reviews.Content: A great mount for the price. Not really adjustable once it is up but solid and easy to install with a few screws.

Reviews.Title: Good product, handle with care
Reviews.Author: Jose Jaime Gamez
Reviews.Content: This mount is easy to put together and install and it works well, but the materials (especially the bolts) are of marginal quality.

Reviews.Title: Great bracket at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Ricky D. Gordon "Attorney at Law"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bracket to hold my new 58" TV.  It is durable and very easy to install.  I highly recommend this item and the seller.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: A. Randolph
Reviews.Content: After reading several reviews, I purchased this item to support a 60 inch 'LG' flat panel TV that weighs approximately 60 pounds. As advertised, it came with the HDMI cable, and a small level indicator. Be advised, this is not  a one piece bracket.....It has two parts that must be mounted separately. I see this as a "positive" because it gives the consumer the flexibility to support mounting a wide variety of flat panel TV screen sizes.BTW - I used two pieces of 2x4 inch wood to mount this bracket between the wall and the TV. This gave me a a few more inches of room to work with behind the TV for different plugs and connectors.It's been over 1 month since my TV was installed and I'm very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount for 32" Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jack H. Margolis "Goose"
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered this Cheetah Mount for our 46" Samsung LED TV that was to be mounted in a recessed area. Had no trouble putting it together (no missing parts) and had it mounted when I read in the TV instructions that it had to have at least 4" all around for ventilation, which it would not have with this flush mount.  I then ordered another Cheetah mount that provided the ability to position the TV away from the wall.  This mount will be used in our bedroom to mount our new 32", which will be on a flat wall, therefore no air flow restrictions.  I found that both mounts are very sturdy and mount to the studs with heavy duty lag bolts.  I am very please with this product.  I did however find another website that had these mounts cheaper.  I was initially reticent to order from other than Amazon.com, but the other Cheetah Mount arrived also in perfect order.  The only issue I have found with these mounts is that you have to use a little extra muscle to get the bottom of the TV brackets to lock into the bottom rail of the mount, and then it will not adjust to less than the 15 degree tilt; which is ok since the EV is mounted up above eye level, and the tilt is needed.

Reviews.Title: Not for an LG 32" TV.
Reviews.Author: HaveBrain.WillThink
Reviews.Content: The brackets have the right dimensions for most TV's but will not fit the LG 32"TV. The bottom of the TV bumps out so the brackets can't be secured.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: purduepete2
Reviews.Content: Get what you pay for. Does the trick..holds the TV on the wall. Has to put it together and that was a pain. I would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Tommy Styles
Reviews.Content: Didin't know what to expect with the store brands being so expensive and this online brand so cheap. I have had these hung now for about a year with different size flat screens and they hold up very very well. The price for these and the strength, makes the store brands and the expense of them, a no brainier.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah is top notch
Reviews.Author: O. Malik
Reviews.Content: I have been extremely happy with all of the Cheetah Mounts I purchased. Great quality at a great price. I dropped this to four stars because I had to make a trip to the hardware store to purchase bolts to mount the brackets to the TV. The bolts supplied didn't work, nor did the bolts already on the TV. Cheetah also gives a free level and HDMI cord with this mount. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia M "Cynthia M"
Reviews.Content: This is a simple review..... GREAT price.  Easy to install for anyone.  No complaints.  Highly recommended.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: albert lucarelli
Reviews.Content: Easy to put toghter and built very strong. Hung my 55 on it and it is so tight to the wall it almost looks like there is no mount holding it up

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to.
Reviews.Author: Trenton T Stokes
Reviews.Content: This is certainly an ample flat  mount wall bracket and does a decent job.  Takes a few minutes to put together but does not move on the angles very well.  The price was definitely right, but I would probably find one that was easier to maneuver next time I buy one.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: C. Thiebaut
Reviews.Content: Saved more than $60 over a comparable mount at walmart.  Installed easily within 20 minutes and have a 60 inch Sharp securely hanging from the wall.

Reviews.Title: Holding on.
Reviews.Author: Jackson65 "Jack's Woodworking"
Reviews.Content: Holds the 42" Panasonic easily. The forward tilt is just enough to reduce glare. The lock screws are a pain...

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jordan Symanietz
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to put together and hang. I also loved that it came with a Hdmi cable so i did not have to buy one separately when i got my TV and came with all the necessary hardware. The only thing was that the safety screws where a bit difficult to get to to secure it when tilted.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount for TV
Reviews.Author: Erin Rubio
Reviews.Content: Super easy to put together, easy to mount on wall, fits most TVS and all parts included, great product for the price

Reviews.Title: Don't look any further!
Reviews.Author: Chris Vause
Reviews.Content: If you are in the market for a wall mount for you led/lcd tv look no further. I mean it, I research everything I purchase, especially when it's supporting my new led tv. I have this installed on a 42" vizio led weighing about 23 lbs and it's more than sufficient.Items included:Mount:The assembly people have been mentioned takes about 2 minutes and should not even factor into your decision to purchase or not.The finish on the metal is much nicer than my other more expensive mounts, it's a nice flat black and feels high quality.When mounted on the wall this thing is solid, the lower screws on the tv brackets that screw in the guide rail are hard to get to once its on the wall unless you have a long skinny screwdriver but they serve very little purpose. I'm not currently using them and it does not affect the tv from moving/falling.Level:Can't really comment on the level, I used a different one.Hdmi:Works good for me, the braiding on the outside of the insulation is nice as well. Hard to beat a free 10' hdmi cable!Overall:This was a fantastic purchase. I'm going to be purchasing several more just to store away for future use. I've used a lot of different brands/styles of wall mounts but this one has been just perfect. 5 stars all day long and highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Powershifter
Reviews.Content: This bracket is amazing, especially for the price ($25 when I bought it).  It comes with the latest HDMI 1.4 cable, 10ft long.  It also came with two levels - the small level was a nice touch (it's separate and not built-in like I had thought prior to buying it).  It's rated to hold about 160lbs, which is more than enough for my 30lb 50" Samsung LED 3D Smart TV.  I'd recommend this to anyone, but make sure it fits your TV (size and screw thread requirements).

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Percy
Reviews.Content: Very easy to mount. Leveler made it easy to hang it straight and the HDMI cables has my picture showing CRYSTAL. About to order 2 more, the price is unbeatable. ONE WORD, "AMAZING"!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Why does this cost so much less than similar mounts?
Reviews.Author: Power User
Reviews.Content: I was a little leery of this mount because the price was so much lower than others like it, but I had to see it to be sure.  If I didn't like it I could return it it, right?No worries.  This mount is solid, straight, and easily assembled and installed. It took no more than 20 minutes from the box to the wall.  It came with lots of spare parts; that is it comes with bolts and spacers for all the different possible TV sizes.  I only needed the largest as I was mounting a 65 inch which mount easily accepted and supports solidly.  The trickiest part of the installation was managing a screwdriver long enough to reach the the safety screws on the bottom of the hangers after the TV was up!  With a  large television you'll need a LONG screw driver.  My screwdriver was a little wobbly as, not having one long enough,  I had to use extensions to reach the screws.I would buy this again if I ever need another and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Misleading
Reviews.Author: dogawesome
Reviews.Content: Unit overall was ok and I made it work.  But--Back plate that mounts on wall is not long enough to span two sixteen inch center studs to attach to.  I centered on one stud in middle for the lag bolts and then used wallboard mounts on each side further out to secure unit to wall.

Reviews.Title: Great price worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Eljayt "Eljayt"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure how good this would be considering the low price and extra freebies that came with up but this wall mount is great. It holds up our 65in plasma perfectly, fits snug against the wall and even has the ability to tilt. I'm gonna get another one for the TV in the guest room.

Reviews.Title: it does everything that it needs to do/cant beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: targeted demographic
Reviews.Content: it is just a simple little metal frame that you assemble,that you hang your TV on,and a few screws to attach your TV to the frame with...there is nothing to it,and they know it,and they are not trying to take advantage of you,like the other mounts,that arent any better,but are 5 times as much!![the one at walmart was over $100 ]i put it together with no problems,and it even came with a level,to make mounting it easy.i was so pleased with it that i bought another one!

Reviews.Title: why pay more?
Reviews.Author: bojaby
Reviews.Content: This is a great product at a great price.  It was easy to install.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a low profile mount.  I also recommend it to any parent with children.  It is no longer a worry that my toddler will pull the 55 " TV onto himself.

Reviews.Title: ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
Reviews.Author: DR
Reviews.Content: Easily a 5-star mount. Come with more than enough hardware, and a level to make things really easy. The bonus HDMI cable saved me another purchase, so I really couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: no difficulties
Reviews.Author: D Blake Gillespie
Reviews.Content: Mounted this using my own larger (2.5") lag screws, since my house is not drywall, but thick stucco over the studs. No hassles at all in mounting. Came with a good range of mount screws and spacers that worked perfectly for my tv, which has recessed mounts. Still looking solid after a week, mount hasn't budged at all. One drawback is that the set screws for locking the tv-arms to the frame are really hard to get to.

Reviews.Title: 10 out of 10
Reviews.Author: Andrew Walker
Reviews.Content: The mount works great for my 55 inch tv and was easy to put up.It was hard to believe it would be that great from the price but I am pleasantly surprised at the quality.Just the HDMI cable is worth more than what I paid for the mount and the level works great too. I got a small level and a larger magnetic one!I would recommend this to anyone looking for a simple mount that tilts.I have bought one other cheetah mount and I still use it. Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount!
Reviews.Author: Jonal T Coleman
Reviews.Content: Simple to assemble and very solid construction.  I use this to mount my 32" LG TV i got from amazon.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: The Bracket is light duty , and you have to piece it together which doesn't take too long . The drawback is the bracket that locks the pieces together prevents you from sliding the TV left or right  more than a an inch or so  if you want to  adjust it for any reason

Reviews.Title: Good price, but very little room for rear access for a 65" TV
Reviews.Author: AnDy
Reviews.Content: Good price, but very little room for rear access for a 65" TV. Recommend other brackets which can be extended out.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price
Reviews.Author: Schoen
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these mounts. One for a 46" LCD and one for a 46" LED TVs.Pros: - cost was very cheap - easy to install - includes HDMI cableCons: - It technically can tilt up to 15 degrees, but neither of the TVs I mounted could be tilted. The TV is so close to the wall there just is not much room to work with to tilt. I debated listing this as a con, as this just seems to be a consequence of a flush mount. - Have to assemble the frame of the mount.Overall I am pleased with this mount and would purchase it again if I need ever need another. But if you need to be able to tilt to the TV down, this not the mount for you, and you will just be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: Keech
