Reviews.Content: it is sturdy. hard to mount the tv as it is so close to the wall, but you can do it.

Reviews.Title: Worked out well
Reviews.Author: Enrique Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The tv wall mount bracket is durable and easy to install. You can't beat the fact that it comes with an HDMI cable of better quality than I expected. I recommend this as a good buy.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: F. Rizzo
Reviews.Content: There is a reason this is under $30 and a Sanus is triple the cost. Quality.I bought two of these. The first one was perfect, the second one was sketchy. Two of the screw holes for the spacing brackets did not line up. I had to open them up with my Dremel to get them to line up with screw holes on the bracket spacers. Then one of the M8x25mm machine screws that hold the VESA mount to the back of the TV had galled threads and would not go in more than a couple of threads. Glad I noticed it and did not try to force it in, that would have honked up the threaded insert on the back of the TV - and I don't that it could have been repaired without trying to disassemble and removing the TV back and replacing the threaded inserts. Had to make a trip to Home Depot for a replacement screw, kind of a pain.Finally, as others have noted - there is really no way to access the securing phillips screws unless you have an 18 inch phillips on a flex shaft.It works fine, holds the TV's to the wall and are low profile. Probably would not get again, and would do the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Boogiegirl
Reviews.Content: You will not find a better price for a TV mount at any store.  It was easy to put up and holds our 42" TV on the bedroom wall.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Martin Singer
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought two of these. One is hanging a 65" and the other a 32". Both work just fine and were easy to assemble.

Reviews.Title: How did this get such good reviews?
Reviews.Author: Jordan E Beck
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for the cheapest route this is probably it. It works, but you get what you pay for. If your picky and want a quality product don't even look at this. You will be turned off soon as you see the tiny light weight box it comes in. First the frame that bolts to the wall is 8 separate pieces that screw together. 3 across the top, 3 on the bottom, and 1 on each side. After you screw them together you can bend them to make it square and then bolt it to the wall and it would work, but just a cheap design. The two brackets that screw to the back of the TV are alright, but just thin metal like everything else. The paint looks like it's just spray painted flat black and scratches really easy. I spent a lot of money on a nice TV and just couldn't use this cheap mount. I ended up going with this Sanus Systems Vmpl50A-B1 it's a lot more money, but in my opinion well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Tv Wall Mount Bracket
Reviews.Author: glenhandy
Reviews.Content: All Parts necessary to mount TV on your wall. Important to find wall studs, as Lag screws need to be anchored secuely.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: 5cats
Reviews.Content: Does what it should, of sound quality. I will buy another when the time comes to redo my bedroom. Hardware for most tv's  included.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: The mount was great, since it was easy to assemble and holds my 32'' LCD just fine without any problem.  I also love the fact that it came with two bubble levels, which helped me mount it on the wall without any assistance.

Reviews.Title: Great product and price.
Reviews.Author: ragman
Reviews.Content: I give this item a 5 star rating. It met all of my expectations. Arrived quickly, and installed very easily. Truly a great product, and exceptionally priced.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: 993TT "Porsche"
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly!  Easy to install and instructions were easy to follow.  Definitely need to mount on studs to ensure it is safely mounted.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: Emerson
Reviews.Content: I recently bought two of these and the ease of installation and quality is outstanding!  They work great!  I highly recommend them!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: J Blank "J Blank"
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble; easy to attach to the wall. Definitely strong enough to hold any LED TV. Great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Simple easy set up
Reviews.Author: John "John"
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before buying and then bought this unit.  It arrived in less then 2 days, actually came on a Sunday.  I took it out of the box and laid all the parts out on the table.  Don't know why some reviews say the instructions are not good, I had no problem for my 50" plasma TV.  I put the frame together mounted it to the wall (i did use my own level).  I found the proper screws to install the hook parts to the back of my TV and then my son and I put the TV on the wall frame.  The instructions are step by step with illustrations that match up to the words.  They give you a long plastic pouch with all sizes of screws for the TV mounting screw and that's it. It's a simple system that works well and for $25.00 it's well worth it.  I intend to purchase more.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: This is not the best mount.  When you assemble it its not as sturdy as some I have used and it doesn't keep square.  Also when the TV is mounted it is nearly impossible to secure the bottom bracket in the wall mount bracket.I would not purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jonne' Brunette
Reviews.Content: Awesome mount, does everything as advertised and easy to assemble. Makes you wonder why other mounts cost so much more money!

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lamson
Reviews.Content: Bought this crossing my fingers due to the price.  It's held up my 60" LG LED tv for over a month so far without any issues.  Easy to assemble, free HDMI cord.  I'd recommend that you have your own level as the one supplied (for obvious reasons) is less than ideal.  Though it's still awesome that they included it.  Also, a drill, and socket/adjustable wrench is necessary.  Once we had the proper tools, the entire TV was set up in less than 45 minutes.In short, if you don't need a full motion mount, save yourself a lot of money and pick this up.

Reviews.Title: It works, but not ideal for a slim HDTV
Reviews.Author: Z Peng
Reviews.Content: I installed the wall bracket early this week. It does the job but IMHO not be the best choice for your slim HDTV. The design leaves almost no room between the TV and the wall after mounting your TV onto the wall bracket. This creates a few problems:1) you will have to adjust tilt before you mount your TV2) makes it almost impossible to tighten the security screws, which are important to keep the TV in place3) you will not be able (or extremely difficult) to get access to any inputs/outputs at the back of the TV

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Paid For
Reviews.Author: Alex Lu
Reviews.Content: I believe the Cheetah Mount is a great product in terms of visibility, stability, security, ease of installation, and price.Pros:1. It is a low profile mount that does not protrude out of the wall too much. It looks almost hidden because of how thing it is.2. Despite being thin, this mount is very stable and does not feel flimsy at all.3. Security is probably the most important quality when it comes to wall mounts. Ultimately, you do not want a mount that makes you worry and nervous about falling off.4. The mount was also simple to install. The picture instructions were not complicated nor was the actual installation. The only time-consuming step was finding the studs with my old/malfunctioning stud finder; however, this step is irrelevant to the actual product and the ease of installation is not based on my malfunctioning tools.5. For $25, it is well worth it. I believe the price gone up a bit from when I bought mine, but it is still affordable. Don't be skeptical about the quality because of the price. The price is fair in my opinion, as it does not create a dent in my wallet nor do I feel ripped off.Cons:My biggest problem with this is the lack of flexibility with the tilt. The tilt is not designed very well in the sense that your cords need to be plugged into the back of your TV. The tilt leaves little room for your arm to reach through and plug the cords.This is actually very inconvenient for me because my 40 inch Sony TV was from 2009, so it is bulkier than most Flat Panel TVs nowadays. Because of this, it is very difficult for me to to plug in all my cords (HDMI, aux, etc.). The mount is simple and only serves to mount the TV to the wall, so if you like a mount that can tilt frequently/easily, this is not the mount for you. This is my only problem with the mount, and why I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5.My advice:1. Plan ahead and see how you are going to plug your cords to your TV. If you have your inputs on the back, make sure to plug the cords first before mounting it.2. Make sure if you want a flexible/swiveling mount or a simple mount. This is a simple mount and should be purchased if you do not need to plug/unplug cords too often.

Reviews.Title: Good buy as long as your TV will work with it
Reviews.Author: Mark Barker
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wall mount to use with a Sony KDL60R550 LCD TV.  Everything went together fine, but when I put the TV on the wall I could not lock in the bottom of the bracket becuase the bottom of the TV was touching the wall.  This is a very slim (flush) wall mount and unfortunately the Sony is the thickest at the bottom and not where the brackets attach to the back of the set.  So I am left with an openend package for this bracket that I cannot use and had to order a bracket with more clearance.  I don't blame the bracket other than there were no indicators that this may be a problem on this model of Sony TV (which is why the 4 starts and not 5).  So check out the TV you will be mounting to and make sure the thickest part of the TV is not more than an inch deeper than where the mounts attach.

Reviews.Title: cheetah walk mount
Reviews.Author: marie travers
Reviews.Content: This cheetah mount I purchase on Amazon. Wasn't disappointed, came within a week. I had a 37" TV, it worked great.  Definitely would recommend.this to anyone wanted to mount,a TV.

Reviews.Title: Good little mount
Reviews.Author: Joseph Tyler
Reviews.Content: This wall mount worked well with my 42" plasma. The TV I mounted was approx. 75 lb. HDMI cable didn't work but I didn't buy this mount because I needed the cable so no sweat

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: monty12
Reviews.Content: Super easy install. I highly recommend this TV mount. Plus, you get a free HDMI cord and small level. Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Not flush enough.
Reviews.Author: Robert Trigg
Reviews.Content: Easy to install ...... Just doesn't mount as flush as i would like. But for the money and you get a 10' HDMI cord HEY who needs a flush mount.

Reviews.Title: A great TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: J. Getchman
Reviews.Content: Bought this when I saw the great price - much less expensive than other mounts.  I read the reviews which were mostly good so that influenced my purchase as well.  The package came very quickly, was well packed.  It was easy to put together and there were screws and other hardware to fit any TV.  Everything lined up just right on our 50" Samsung Smart 3D TV.  Easy to hook the TV up once it was secured to the wall.  It is REALLY close to the wall so there isn't any manuvering room.  So we were not able to tighten the bolt at the bottom to secure the TV, but it's not going anywhere.  Great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic value, extra time to install
Reviews.Author: nosebreaker
Reviews.Content: I am using this to hold my 50" TV, and it holds it just fine, however I do wish the metal was a bit thicker. I have it mounted over my fireplace, and the wall isn't exactly even there due to the stones, and this bends a little.  It seems to hold the TV just fine though, but it was a PITA to level because of my setup.  Also took a little time to assemble, I probably should have gone with a more expensive one but this one is fine otherwise, hence only 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Double Take
Reviews.Content: I have a 65 inch ultra thin vizio that I installed with this wall mount.  I can't believe the price for how sturdy all the pieces feel, this really is a great deal.  I would use a better level that is bigger than the free one provided and I would definitely drill into 2 studs, this isn't meant to hang on sheetrock.  So use a stud finder to find two studs and hopefully they are centered where you want to put the tv.  Our studs weren't exactly centered in the space where we installed, but we still anchored to 2 so it will hold just fine.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Evan J. Lawson
Reviews.Content: Good strong and cheap mount. mounted 32 inch screen easy. had no problems with the product at all.  Would recommend

Reviews.Title: Perfect for 55" Vizio
Reviews.Author: Gen X Dad
Reviews.Content: Easy to install; comes with a level and a good quality HDMI cable; great price.  No need to pay more.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for two different TVs
Reviews.Author: MaskedMexican
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive wall mount for a 60" TV, this worked perfectly and I was able to install in under 20 minutes. I liked it so much I got another for a 42" TV. It was strong enough for both TV's and not at all complicated.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Mount at a Great Price - Samsung 55" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: RAlbright "RAlbright"
Reviews.Content: This mount goes together very easy, and comes with all and any hardware you may need to make it work with your application. There really is no need to spend hundreds of dollars on a TV mount. This rack once mounted, is plenty strong and sturdy to hold any flat panel TV. It holds my Samsung 55" Smart TV perfect. I also purchased the Cheetah brand wall mounted 3 shelf system and I love it as well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Mount
Reviews.Author: Clinton R. Davis "Clint3PO"
Reviews.Content: I loved this mount so much for my first TV that I purchased the same exact one for my second TV.The fact that it comes with a really nice HDMI cable really sweetens the deal too

Reviews.Title: Excellent and simple install
Reviews.Author: Sean D Young
Reviews.Content: OK, this was my first tv wall mount.  I found it very simple to install and love it.  The only problem I found is that our TV has connections in the back and we occasionally move our Xbox360 to another TV-- with this mount, you can't really get to the cables in the back without taking the TV off.  However, it's sturdy, simple to install and overall definitely worth purchasing.  If you aren't moving devices that are connected to the back of your TV, then I'd 100% recommend this one.  And for this price, seriously better than anything at the big box stores I looked at.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Diane H
Reviews.Content: Would purchase again. Fairly easy to assemble,love the option of tilt,comes with everything you need to hang and more. Great value for your $$

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Tracy L.C.M.
Reviews.Content: perfect! This was very easy to install and allowed for tons of adjustment of both the wall mount spacing (to hit studs) and the tv itself.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Todd Reynolds
Reviews.Content: works great, easy install and keeps TV nice and close to the wall especially for having the tilt feature as well.

Reviews.Title: Perfect. Simple to setup and install.
Reviews.Author: J. Schoon
Reviews.Content: Don't even consider a more expensive mount. Buy this. I have no idea what else you would expect from a wall mount that would make it more expensive, this is a great price for an item that works exactly as needed. I even used the free cable!Two tips:* This does sit very flat on the wall (maybe a half-inch to inch clearance other than on the mount arms?). This is what I wanted, if you don't , this may not be for you.* The included level is worth the price you pay (free). In other words, use a real level.

Reviews.Title: Some are faulty
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I bought several of these and for the most part the design and quality is good.  However....I had one of them that the side bracket screws were stripped out on.  I couldn't get the screws to stay in the side brackets to hold the thing together.  It's bad enough with such a flimsy piece but when the side pieces don't stay together it's virtually impossible to get this thing mounted.  It was almost as if the screws were too small.  Last thing, the tv automatically wants to lean forward.  That's fine except you can't tighten down the bottom screws to "fasten" the tv to the mount if the tv is leaning forward.  Right now all of my TV's are just hanging on to the top of the mount because I can't tighten those screws.  I'm not sure what the solution to this problem is, but just a warning, it's very difficult to tighten the bottom screws which are what really holds the tv on the mount.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sherry K. Manchester
Reviews.Content: I purchased a new 46" flat screen for my son and ordered this mount to hang it.  It was easy to install, priced right and works great.

Reviews.Title: Almost a year and standing strong
Reviews.Author: Robert Roberts
Reviews.Content: Works great on my 50 inch panasonic (TV is pretty awesome too). I have had it for over 6 months and no issues

Reviews.Title: good to go
Reviews.Author: phelonius
Reviews.Content: easy to assemble and easy to mount.  i had no difficulty.  so far it hold up well.  i took off 1 star because the mounts leave very little space between the TV and the wall and on my set, the hookups all face toward the wall so there is not enough space to unplug wires.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lewis G. Phillips
Reviews.Content: Mount was easy to install and provides a secure wall attachment for our 32 inch TV. Highly recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: Great simple mounting bracket
Reviews.Author: Dominic A. Reina
Reviews.Content: I have 3 of these in my house holding a 32" LED, 40" LCD, and a 60" Plasma.  Easy to install and use.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount
Reviews.Author: Sarah J Bittner
Reviews.Content: We bought this wall mount four our 51" Samsung TV. My fiancé and his dad put it all together and mounted the tv with no trouble that I noticed. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: One size fits all!
Reviews.Author: Alan Nuhaily
Reviews.Content: The cheetah TV wall mount is easy to assemble and use, it is sturdy and mounts well on the wall, plus it comes with a 10' HDMI cable, you can't go wrong with that, after I bought one for myself, I bought one for my girlfriend, we absolutely love it, I recommend buy this item.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Kris Lauro
Reviews.Content: The instructions are adequate.  You shouldn't have ay problems understanding them.  I did run into one issue.  The mount is not compatible with all TV's.  For instance, I bought a 60" LG 3D TV from another site for a Cyber Monday deal of $600.  Replaced my 47".  HOWEVER, the LG I bought has integrated speakers that are "down firing" in the base and the bottom is approximately 3/4 of an inch wider than anywhere else on the TV.  So, after I placed the TV on the wall, because the bottom speaker was slightly larger, I could not get to the safety screw of the mount.  So, the TV is hanging, but, the safety screws are not tightened.  You can't ever so slightly pull the TV from the wall either or the screws will not line up.  Does it work? Yes.  But, if you have kids (which I don't), or live in an earthquake area (which I don't), you may not want to use this with certain LG TV's.It's is sturdy, it does include a long HDMI cable and a level.  The value is great, the construction is good.  I would recommend this.  Just heed my advise if using an LG TV.

Reviews.Title: Works and looks great
Reviews.Author: blainebassett
Reviews.Content: Exactly as advertised and works flawlessly great, easy installation. Everything looks professionally installed now. What should I add next ....

Reviews.Title: what a great product
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: We used this product to mount our new 60" Vizio tv. This product worked perfectly and is truely universal. We did not do a wall mount, we used it to mount on the rocks above our fireplace.I had to use some different anchors due to the rocks that I mounted to. after mounting I was unable to pull it from the rocks. This is a very sturdy product that I trust to hold my new tv.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Briana Renteria
Reviews.Content: We hung our 60 in tv with this this weekend and It looks great on our wall. Super easy assembly!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: John Carr "rigpapooh"
Reviews.Content: screwed to TV and wall fine but, after mounting, there are two long screws that are suppose to connect the two parts of the mount to avoid the TV falling off the track in a moderate to severe earthquake. However, the space in the back is not wide enough to screw in the screws.TV tilts down and can't be positioned at a different, smaller angle; luckily the tilt is just where I want it.The "instructions" page looks like a chicken's feet was placed in ink and forced to walk around the paper for a few seconds. I hired a handyman who does lots of TV mounts so no way to see/read about those two screws or how to install brackets to TV and wall for a novice with a PhD but tiny handyman intelligence.

Reviews.Title: good enough for an apartment
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: I made sure to get the wall mount spot on level, but once I put the TV on it, it was obviously crooked.  I was able to mess around with the brackets on the back of the TV enough to get it closer to level, but it's still off by a little bit.  I'm just glad I'm using this in an apartment.  When I buy a house I will be getting a higher quality wall mount that will actually have the TV sit level without major adjustments needed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome basic tv mount
Reviews.Author: Lee Feder
Reviews.Content: There's nothing else to say except that this is an excellent basic wall mount for a wide range of TVs.  It comes with a variety of bolts and other hardware to ensure compatibility with all TVs in its size range.  The mounting was very easy and it even came with its own level!  Great intro level product at a fair price point.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Bonsai
Reviews.Content: The price was good and delivery was right on time.  However, I was disappointed that  the mount is not of good quality.  Two of the screws  were tiny, making it a little difficult to mount the bracket.  Purchased it for my son-in-law's new flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Strong against thieves
Reviews.Author: Lovem
Reviews.Content: I bought the Cheetah Mount APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount for my 42" tv. The only reason I bought it, was because of the amazing reviews. The package came on time (Thanks Amazon prime!) and in a nice little package. The instructions were so-so, but it's not rocket surgery so it didn't take too long. This bracket is extremely sturdy, I tested out the durability of the bracket and my wall by pretending to be a thief and ripping it from my wall... it withstood the test.I recommend this bracket to anyone I can :)

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Wayne C "DIYer"
Reviews.Content: It worked perfectly for my 50" Emerson/Funai LCD TV. One of the brackets weren't exactly level, but there was enough play in the whole frame that I could make up for it. I had to add a couple of heavy duty drywall anchors because my TV wasn't centered on my wall studs, but that was not unexpected for something this cheap.

Reviews.Title: Not Engineered Well
Reviews.Author: Thomas H. Dickason
Reviews.Content: This product is NOT engineered well and unfortunately some of the screw holes don't line up exactly.  This results in the extra time to drill out new holes to get the bracket assembled properly.If I were to do this again I would pay the extra money for a decent, well engineered bracket.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit and great price
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit and great price.  I used it in my bedroom with my 42 inch television I love it and it was easy to install

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Jan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Our son purchased the same mount bracket and so we knew it would be the best one for us!  It was easy to install and we are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT deal!
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this mount and actually bought another one. I, like some other buyers, was skeptical of the quality considering the price, but was very happy with it. It even includes and HDMI cable! :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect wall mount for my 65" Samsung LED!
Reviews.Author: Justin Quon
Reviews.Content: If you're curious as to why this mount is so highly rated, buy one for yourself and find out!Some may question the low price and wonder "why is this wall-mount so inexpensive... it can't be any good!"  Well, that is simply NOT the case.  This wall-mount is excellent!  Strong construction, everything necessary included in the package (just need tools), instructions easy to understand, and everything properly labeled and separated for easy installation.  There is some assembly required, but nothing major.I had pre-measured and marked where I would need to drill into my wall and had the TV up on the wall within 15-20 minutes.This is an excellent wall-mount and fit my UN65F7100 Samsung LED TV perfectly.  Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Requires substantial modification if electrical, cable and coax connectors are normal (90 degrees) to the back of the TV
Reviews.Author: Roger Gerber "rogger"
Reviews.Content: This product requires major redesign, or at least a warning that it will not work if any of the TV electrical and cable ports are normal (90 degrees) to the back of the TV. I was mounting a five-year old, fifty-inch Samsung plasma TV. As designed, the mount positioned the back of the TV so close to the wall that, even when I set the TV parallel to the wall (I wanted the advertised fifteen-degree tilt), the electrical, coax and cable connectors were crushed and kinked against the wall. I had to buy longer lag bolts and attach the mount to the wall through 2x4's that I used to space the TV out from the wall. This provided just enough space when the TV was tilted.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Mark Karber
Reviews.Content: Hung a 40" Sony LCD on this mount and it's perfect. And what a great value. They even include an HDMI cable, which I used. The instructions could be a bit clearer. I would especially like to have seen better diagrams, but it didn't take too long to figure it out, and everything is clearly labeled. Hint- keep items in the bag until needed because the plastic bag has the parts letters on them.In any case, whole project took 90 minutes from first marking the studs until it was mounted and plugged in.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Russell Creed
Reviews.Content: Works perfect.Low profile, and as described. I am glad I went with this bracket, i am happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Used for 55 Vizio Tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: This is the best wall mount EVERSo easy to install and has even a mini Level in it .I am a contractor and really pleased with easy installof product. Just remeber Wood Studs in your wall are 16 inches apart so if you find one stud you know where the other is 16 inches awayI would just find a stud to have good bracing (incase of earthquake i live in Bay area) or even good Butterfly type wall anchers would work great Make sure you get  the right heavy duty butterfly availible at Home DepotExcellent product metal and Quality

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount is easy to install and adjust.  The instructions are very clear.  I would purchase this mount again if I needed to hang another TV on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This mount has held up for many years and a couple moves. For the price and what is included, there probably isn't a better mount on the market. Installation is fairly easy, but a stud finder is very helpful.

Reviews.Title: solid and easy to setup, directions are a bit vague
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Milk & Cheese"
Reviews.Content: Could use slightly more detailed assembly/installation instructions.  Other than that, a great value for the cost and worked without issue.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: chris93555
Reviews.Content: The mount does what it says it does and works great. The only problem is the you have to put together the rails, with 10 little screws and nuts. It took about 25 min. to do. For the price it was worth it. Also a great add-on is the HDMI cable that comes with it.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Theresa Peterson
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny we spent. Installation instruction could be clearer but we figured it out quickly. Highly reccomend to anyone needing one.

Reviews.Title: Very Well Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Rodney Reed
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone in the market for a wall mount. I was a little skeptical at first due to the low price, but once my package arrived all that went out the window. The Cheetah mount is sturdy and well made. It has a heavy weight capacity that compares in price to wall mounts that cost 100+ dollars. I have two high end Panasonic Plasma televisions that are both pretty heavy. Both TV's are installed with this mount. This is a great purchase, and oddly enough I wouldn't feel comfortable mounting a tv in my house with any other mount. I hope this helps with your decision.  Have a good day

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bracket
Reviews.Author: J. Whitley
Reviews.Content: I've installed a few LCD TVs using wall mounting brackets and so far this is one of my favorite designs. Very sturdy, as minimal as necessary, and comes with a free HDMI cable. What more could you ask for? The instructions for attaching the end pieces could be a little more clear but that's getting nit-picky. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Second Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: TP260
Reviews.Content: This is my second cheetah mount and i'm equally as pleased if not more than with my first one!  This one came with a nice (and long) hdmi cable and the first one didn't.  Easy to install and looks good on the wall.  Had to install in basement with aluminum studs which wasn't addressed in the mounting directions.  I simply used the wood stud install instructions and added 4 lag bolts and it's holding a 60in plasma just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Jesse Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble and easy to install. Great product. I would recommend to any body who is mounting thier tv on the wall.The only thing negitive would be the level that comes with it. Not very accurate.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: These are perfect for a good cheap mount, easy to assemble and everything I's conveniently  packaged. The only problem, I cannot get these to hold a tv flush to the wall or level!!!

Reviews.Title: not very burly
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought I was ordering one that i've got in the past but it wasn't.  This thing does the job but its a bit flimsy.  It mounted up to my TV just fine and the HDMI cord is some fancy crazy color and it comes with a baby sized level but it just feels so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Easily Installation
Reviews.Author: maleyam
Reviews.Content: Easy install. Holds our 60 inch tv up with no issues. We will definitely be purchasing again for future TVs.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Filmscore
Reviews.Content: The only real caveat, is that there is some tedious assembly that has to be done. However, once completed, it is sturdy and does the job quite effectively. I used it to mount a Sony Bravia 40" LCD to my living room wall. Finding the wall stud was not fun. And I did have to rig up something to hide the cable that runs down the wall. Not really much else to say about it. It does the job well.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the dollars
Reviews.Author: Scott Potter
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the money.  I've bought two of these.  I have a 40" and a 47" LCD hanging  from this mount, not together of course.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, not great, but it works and It was inexpensive...
Reviews.Author: Buy Guy
Reviews.Content: It took some time to assemble. arrrrg. Forget about the included HDMI cable...it's a piece of junk! It snapped in the TV. Had to go out and get another one. I pushed the mount to the max...I hung a 65" plasma to it. It's still on the wall so I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy and easy to mount
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Solidly built and easy to put up. Can't ask for much more than that. I've bought two so far and they're doing the job.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount and Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Jay Leonard
Reviews.Content: Mount is sturdy and Installation was fast and easy. Great value for the price and they even included a cable and level..

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: F. J. Parado
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  The only problem is that the hdmi chord provided was defective.  If I get a replacement, then I would rate this a 5.

Reviews.Title: 30-45 min install - Works Perfect!
Reviews.Author: PaulH
Reviews.Content: Take your time, get your measurements correct. We use this in our bedroom, with a rice bed that's very high.  Wanted to make sure it was high enough on the wall to see over our feet, but not too high that we are looking up all the time.  A little simple math, and a little over 30 minutes (go slow and get right) and with a little help getting the tv on the mount - it works great.  Wow - it's much nicer to have it mounted on the wall.Pro: Comes with lots of mounting hardware (I didn't use half), levels etc.  Decent directions  HDMI CableCon: A little difficult to plug in cables on some tv's.  You may want to attach cables to tv before mounting...

Reviews.Title: Why Pay More ???
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: I bought this certain I was going to be disappointed, but the price was great.  Attached to the wall with ease.  Hung a 60" HD Plasma TV and gave it an slight angel downward.  This product is excellent!  I wonder why anyone would pay hundreds for any walll mount unless they wanted it to swivel.

Reviews.Title: Great Product at a much more affordable price
Reviews.Author: SundayReviews
Reviews.Content: It works great. Install was easy and It's been holding my 55" Sony Bravia up for over a year and half now.

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: dsc
Reviews.Content: the HDMI cable is too delicate and broke right away. the Bracket works very well. easy to assemble and install.

Reviews.Title: TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: Dan Lazenby
Reviews.Content: Wall mount fit perfectly & was very simple to assemble & mount to wall. 55" Samsung TV was easy to mount.

Reviews.Title: Perfectly adequate for the job.
Reviews.Author: Founders Keeper
Reviews.Content: Mounted fairly easily, although it did take some tweaking to get the TV level.  Great price--product is perfectly adequate for the job.  We mounted a 42" flat screen with this mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Wall mount
Reviews.Author: Duane Goldsworthy
Reviews.Content: This is a very strong wall amount. Fits flush on the wall and is really solid.  Highly recommended for large tv's.

Reviews.Title: Strong and secure
Reviews.Author: Cynanne
Reviews.Content: We've had to remove the 60-inch TV from the wall several times to get everything hooked up to our own home entertainment system, and it is easy with this wall mount to get the TV off the wall and to put it back in place.  I really do recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Paul G Tolman
Reviews.Content: Easy to put up and install.  Was exactly as it was advertised.  I would buy this product again if I needed too.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy set up
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: It was easy enough to put together and well worth the money for all that's included. Appreciate that all pieces are separately packaged in plastic. Only suggestion is to make sure that you have a stud-finder on hand. I'm relatively experienced so I used the tapping method, but that won't work in every house. You always want to make sure you're mounting to the studs. Period. Not worth the risk otherwise

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: John R Wilson
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with the original mount and Cheetah sent me an upgraded, fully articulating mount free of charge.  The new mount works great and is built very well.

Reviews.Title: Best mount for the money, not so great for older sets
Reviews.Author: Rex Kramer
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Cheetah mount in the past, so I had a good idea of what I was getting. What makes them affordable are the fact that they're modular. While this keeps the cost down, it does have some drawbacks, especially with older, bulkier flat panels.Some minor issues I experienced:- Because the corners are screwed together, it's easy to knock the whole mount out of square. Be careful after it's assembled. Resist the urge to tweak the squareness by pushing on the corners. I did this and almost made it worse.- With 16" stud centers, this mount's center can be thrown off quite a bit. It left one end sort of "dangling" on my installation. With the hangers on the TV pushed nearly to the ends of the bracket's width, that dangling end wanted to droop with the weight of my TV on it. I had to compensate by loosening the bracket and shifting the lesser supported end upward (and out of level) to get the finished installation perfectly level (leveling off of the TV).- My set is an older Panasonic TH-50PZ700U and the bottom end of this sucker is FAT (about 4.5" to 5"). Because of the thickness, the bottom of the set is against the wall and the maximum tilt is looking more like 5-7 degrees. This also makes it impossible to lock the set onto the bracket.- Panasonic puts the weight of this old set at almost 106 pounds. While I believe the weight rating on the mount, my set seemed to be giving it a workout.- Metric lags suck. Why? Because I don't own many metric tools! A cordless impact is my preferred tool of choice for a job like this and I don't own any metric nut drivers. I substituted them (8mm?) out for some 3/8" x 2-1/2" lag bolts I had laying around.Despite the issues, the end result looks like it should.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Picture Man
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical due to the low cost. Rest assured, it doesn't disappoint. I am not sure what the negative reviews are about - this rocks. It is hell easy to install, and feels solid. I appreciate the cost saving eco friendly measure, but at no point felt that it compromised the design or integrity of the mount.The only thing that one needs to be sure of is that they hit studs. If you have a stud finder (or reliable knuckles), you are set.I mounted my 60" panasonic plasma. The supplied hardware was perfect.Although putting up the mount was a one person job, I recommend two people for mounting the TV onto the mount. That is NOT a 1 person job. I wasn't about to risk a $2000 TV to get it up in a hurry. As soon as I had another adult in the house, we hung it up on the mount without a hiccup.It took me 15 minutes or less to get the mount on the wall by myself, and less than a minute to get the TV on the mount with help, and a few minutes to secure the two screws behind the TV to tighten it all up.Highly recommended - and without reservations.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: It is very nice because it works. It's holding my tv to the wall like it should. D o n e

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Derek Coleman
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to assemble and works great! Love that it came with an HDMI cord. Great price too, would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: James Wilson
Reviews.Content: Rating a 4 star as the product does its job as advertised, however it's not an overly high quality mount but gets the job done at a fair price.Nice that it comes with hardware for different TV models and an hdmi cable. If your just looking to get a tv on the wall with little aiming options, its a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Very good mount
Reviews.Author: blablabla
Reviews.Content: This TV mount is excellent.  its very easy to put together and it is supposedly made of steel which is great.  the free hdmi wire and levels were nice too.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: T. Gale
Reviews.Content: This rack required some assembly, so if you prefer to only screw them to the wall and your TV, you can spend more and save yourself a little hassle, but for about half the price, the 20 or so screws I had to assemble was worth it.  The included level is not one you're likely to use again, but it's better than nothing, if you don't have a level.  I haven't used the HDMI cable yet, but it seems pretty nice, especially for free.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste your time and labor!
Reviews.Author: E. Miller
Reviews.Content: This at first look seemed an economical answer to a wall mount. However after assembly and installation one discovers there is insufficient room between the wall and the back of the television to  accommodate the necessary HDMI cables. This includes the cable furnished with the mount. One can adjust the hooks out to allow room, but then the safety screw will not engage with the bottom of the frame. I ruined two of my HDMI cables in the attempt to get this to work. I did give this product a fair day in court, and this is my very first review. I felt so cheated by my investment of time and labor in this project I wish to vehemently warn off any other potential victims. This is most definitely poor design and not in the least a universal mount. As for the high grade steel claim on the front of the box, let me ask you, have you ever tightened a nut and had the head of the bolt pop off? This actually happened and is testament to the cheap Chinese steel this mount is composed of. Quite a collection of bolts and washers are included, but the 8 to 12 mm screws necessary for the mounting of the hooks to the back of my Sony Bravia were not. Even the plastic level which remains unopened has a piece of plastic rattling around inside. I must say I am completely disappointed with this product and am for certain going to box it up and return it to Amazon. CAVEAT EMPTOR in capitalized letters! I will be contacting Sony for a quality mount for my Bravia.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - Simple to Use
Reviews.Author: Hank Reardon
Reviews.Content: Outstanding value and very easy to install.  Quality overall was good, but I knocked it down one star because the pins that are supposed to slide in to fix the bracket vertically (without a tilt) didn't fit through the holes (poor machining / alignment).  Otherwise the product is worth at least 3 - 5 times more based on the alternative available from other manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Great product, easy to assemble/install and the tv hasn't fallen off the wall. I'll be getting another one for my basement

Reviews.Title: You could do better.
Reviews.Author: eflange
Reviews.Content: Mount was kind of flimsy..although strong enough...I guess.  It was missing hardware, and also had a couple of the small bolts that were  pre-started were stripped.  After a trip to ACE, it finally served its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Exceptionally awkward assembly
Reviews.Author: P Johannson
Reviews.Content: I may have more to post if I ever get the thing assembled.  While the instructions are written clearly, the parts are very, very awkward to work with.  And in frustration, I warn others about this reality.2 hours later and I haven't finished stage 2 of the assembly.  EVERYTHING that could be wrong is wrong.  Black on black everywhere, just a treat for old eyes.  Screws that are just too short to fit properly before the screwdriver gets there. Ledges and edges that prevent easy access for the screwdriver ...  VERY badly thought-out procedures here and I am not a happy camper.Be warned.A later update:The unit had a bent member that made the assembly very difficult.  It wasn't until I discovered a missing part (which I solved myself) that I realized the unit was probably a returned item.  It had a defective part and missing parts, which doesn't say much about quality control.But I persevered and assembled the unit and put it on the wall.  It meets expectations, save for a very important item: access to the TV, once installed.  This unit fits VERY close to the wall and access to the TV is nearly impossible.  Well, perhaps a child's hand could get in there, but not mine.  A solution is to have extenders for the HDMI cables and USBs that one may want to insert.Be warned.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: P. Christopher
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and sturdy.  I have a 40" LCD mounted and do not worry about it being secure.  I like how its adjustable from side to side.Added cables were nice, but not a deal breaker.I would order again

Reviews.Title: Best mount at any price.
Reviews.Author: Tony B.
Reviews.Content: Have used several Cheetah mounts over the years in our house. For the price, you just cannot beat them. Easy to use and easy to install. Nice high grade steel used. BOnus with an extra HDMI cable thrown in, can never have too many HDMI cables.

Reviews.Title: Great buy added HDMI cable= Big Plus
Reviews.Author: DCarnahan
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with this item.  Much cheaper than others and I really like the addition of the hdmi cable.  The cable is what sold it.  I had already added a cable to my cart, but deleted when I found this mount.  Easy install for a person that isn't overly handy.

Reviews.Title: Not a great product
Reviews.Author: Daniel S.
Reviews.Content: Mount does not have solid holes for full length of connection to TV. Where my TV had to mount, the screws had to be located in slots that allowed the screws to slide in the slots rather than having an unmovable hole to fit into. Also, to fit flush on wall it would work fairly well. Where I had a slight recess in order to allow sheetrock to be place on the mounting studs later, the mount did not allow much latitude.

Reviews.Title: Very affordable - works great!
Reviews.Author: S King "S King"
Reviews.Content: Very easy install - came with a level and cable (the cable is usable but, inflexible FYI).Hung this TV on my wall in my bedroom - I used to have the TV up on a piece of furniture. It would give a crick in my neck - now it's hanging right in front of the bed and no more neck issues!

Reviews.Title: Sturdy and easy put up
Reviews.Author: doodlebug
Reviews.Content: Cheetah mounts rock.  Bought several now and no problems with easy assembly.  Holds weight and looks slim. NGreat purchase

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: D. Osborn "kimber6337"
Reviews.Content: Really easy to put up.  Felt secure that it was mounted well and my TV wasn't going to crash to the ground.  Great mount!

Reviews.Title: Installs easily
Reviews.Author: Linlou
Reviews.Content: The price of this wall mount was very competitive, easy to install,  and easy to mount our 60" TV .

Reviews.Title: it was everything i needed and it came with everything ...
Reviews.Author: william mutton
Reviews.Content: it was everything i needed and it came with everything to mount it to the wall and to the TV Thanks so very much

Reviews.Title: Good TV mount
Reviews.Author: Matt M.
Reviews.Content: Good TV mount. Very easy to install. The level wasn't even close to level though. But can very easily use your own level. Very good detailed instructions.

Reviews.Title: I cannot believe how easy this was to put together and mount
Reviews.Author: Wallflower
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe how easy this was to put together and mount... I have a 37 inch flat screen which weighs about 29 pounds.  It was just me, had it up and mounted on the wall watching netflix within a hour!  Worth every penny!  Plus it comes with a 10ft. HDMI cable that is working perfectly.I have a rental and the place I mounted it was above my gas fireplace.  I wasn't able to hit a stud due to where the flue is behind the drywall.  However, I picked up some 50lb. weight drywall anchors which took care of that problem.  Combined with "Evriholder Cable Zipper Cord Organizer Kit, White, Large" also purchased from Amazon, perfect solution!Note, that the levels that come with the mount are not the greatest though so I did use my own level.  Otherwise, awesome purchase.  I'm so glad I did my research and went with a Cheetah Mount.

Reviews.Title: Great mount amazing price.
Reviews.Author: Samir "Samko"
Reviews.Content: Works like the other $100 wall mount brackets. I have my 46" LED TV hooked up to this for over a year now and no problems. It was super easy to install and the free HDMI cable was plus. I recommend this to anyone looking to mount their wall on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John Bailey
Reviews.Content: The believe the listed Item was just as described and fictions as stated in add. Very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: For the price and what this does, works great. I used one of these on a 42" TV and just bought another for a 60". And have recommended this to others. I read other reviews about the level not working well. I used both the level it came with and my own to help mark out the holes. I didn't notice any problems with the level it came with, but I thought it was easier to use my own. Added bonus is the HDMI cable it comes with. Nice solid cable. If you want a simple kit to hang a TV, this will do it.A few tips that are probably obvious. I would recommend looking into flush mount electrical outlets and units to handle the audio/video depending on how you will be running your cables. I had an outlet close the floor below where I was hanging the TV. I was able to add a flush mount electrical unit behind the TV that also had a cutout for the audio/video cables. I have wiring experience so took power off the unit close to the floor. Dropped the audio/video cables back through the wall and ran them to the devices going to the TV. The end result is no visible wires. I'm used to doing this sort of thing so no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Scott Briggs
Reviews.Content: This is a quality mount with the added bonus of a long HDMI cable. It was easy to put up with the included level.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Rolando
Reviews.Content: The product had everything that serve it's purposes.The color and quality of material speak for itself.What a great product to have.

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount and assemble
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Bland
Reviews.Content: This was easy to measure, assemble, and mount by myself within less than a couple of hours (even though I'd never mounted anything in my life).  It works flawlessly.  No swiveling, but I didn't buy it for that purpose.  Also the extra HDMI cable comes in handy.  I paid $75 for my first HDMI cable in 2007, so you can imagine how convenient this was.  Screw you, Electronics Industry!

Reviews.Title: Does the job for less
Reviews.Author: madsdad
Reviews.Content: Directions leave a little to de desired but it does what it is supposed to do and for the price and simply cannot be beaten.

Reviews.Title: Quality for Value Price
Reviews.Author: Vetterun
Reviews.Content: I would rate the product as, "5. A great product - met most of your expectations." It is as good as any mount I have used among many. It took a little more time to assemble due to the frame being shipped in pieces, but that may account for how you are able to offer such an excellent value. This feature might be a bit of a challenge for a novice user. I would definitely recommend the product and purchase other Cheetah products in the future.

Reviews.Title: Feel secure that my new 60" TV is going to stay right there.
Reviews.Author: Rusgirl01
Reviews.Content: Simple to install.  Feel secure that my new 60" TV is going to stay right there.  Not difficult to install.

Reviews.Title: Some assembly required, but a good bargain it seems
Reviews.Author: David Prouty
Reviews.Content: A little work putting it together, but for the price, seems like a good bargain compared to some others out there...

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Rich Horton
Reviews.Content: An inexpensive mount for a flat screen TV. Easy instructions to follow, all the parts and screws necessary to use included.

Reviews.Title: A good product but...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I want to be clear that this is a good product but I would suggest getting a wall mounting arm bracket that is articulating and a full swivel...you're going to want something that moves around in every possible direction...trust me.

Reviews.Title: Good-value TV mount requires some assembly, super-long screw driver
Reviews.Author: Hoogineer
Reviews.Content: I finally installed the TV mount after it was sitting in a box downstairs for four months.  I managed to install it and hang a 75-lb Sharp LC-46D64U (46", late 2007) by myself (which required true feats of strength).  I'm very careful with reading instructions, assembly, measuring and leveling -- which took me three attempts of hanging, checking levelness, removing, and adjusting -- so it took me over an hour to assemble and hang the TV.Assembling the mounting bracket from six separate pieces was a little annoying, but not a huge deal.  When you consider that each bracket is secured by a separate bolt, it doesn't really matter that each of them is a separate piece, although the bottom bracket isn't going to provide a lot of support (if any), since nothing is hanging on it.  (This is where a one-piece design would have been nice, but it's probably why the lower bolts were reduced in size as someone else alluded in his review.)I found the included level to to be inaccurate and used my own instead.  I didn't bother using the tiny bubble level, although it was included.I was impressed with the array of extra hardware provided for securing the hangers on the back of my TV.  There were spacers and bolts that were a perfect match for the bolt holes in the rear of my TV.  (The spacers were necessary, because the holes in the TV were not as deep as the included bolts are long.)As others have mentioned, getting to the safety screws with anything approaching max incline is rather difficult.  I managed to piece together enough extensions (quick lock, two extenders, and a long Phillips head driver on a manual screw driver handle) to reach the safety screws in the back, although it wasn't easy.  It won't be fun if I ever take down the TV ...  If this is too daunting for you, I recommend buying a mount that tilts left-to-right (not just up and down) to afford easier access.It's been up a week and so far everything is secure.  The lag bolts felt sturdy, an each one is in a stud.  The brackets didn't budget after I secured them to the wall.  There's plenty of room for running cables behind, although I elected not to do that at this time.  The description says it's rated to 165 lbs (which is why I feel pretty comfortable hanging my 75-lb unit), although I don't think I'd test that.  I feel uneasy as it is with my 75-lb TV set, but it held.  I wouldn't have any qualms at all about hanging a 40-lb TV, which is probably what a 50" is going to be nowadays.If you're looking to save money, don't mind some extra assembly, and can deal with difficult-to-reach safety screws in the back, then I recommend this TV mount.  I'm not sure you can do better for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great value, easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: Jenny Cook
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed; easy to assemble (clear instructions!), HDMI cable was a nice bonus. what's not to like? will buy again

Reviews.Title: Sturdy but frustrating assembly
Reviews.Author: Ayayou
Reviews.Content: The mount is sturdy and easy to install. However, the design is flawed.First, I don't see why the bracket alone comes in 6 separate pieces one has to screw back together. Second, the fit on the 2 vertical braces is very bad. The vertical braces are too wide to fit properly in the indentations of the horizontal pieces. Even with rotating, I could not make them flush. Second, they use tiny short screws that further complicate assembly. I'm quite handy with tools but just assembling the bracket took 15 minutes!

Reviews.Title: Great Inexpensive wall mount for TVs
Reviews.Author: Bobolou
Reviews.Content: The mount came quickly and was very easy to mount by myself.  I was a little concerned with the price of the unit, thinking it might be chincy or break after I put my 52" high def TV on it.  When I first mounted the anchor on the wall I pushed and pulled in order to see if there was any give to it - I didn't notice any movement whatsoever.  As long as it's attached to studs it should be good to go.  Be aware, though, that there are different size bolts.  Of the four total that are needed, the two in the top are the same size, and the two in the bottom are the same size, but different from the two in the top.  I didn't realize that until I installed the two larger bolts on top, predrilled the hold for the bottom smaller bolts, and went to install the smaller bolts.  It didn't turn out to be an issue, as the mount has still been rock solid.  I guess I should have read the instructions!  As others have stated I didn't rely on the level that was provided with the mount.  The HDMI cable seems to be of high quality as well.It's been installed for a few months now and I have had no issues whatsoever.  I will be definitely be buying more of these when I need to install more TVs in more rooms.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: R. B. Stine
Reviews.Content: First time wall mounting a TV. Bought this for my 4 year old 40" Proscan LCD to hang above my computer rig in the office.Did a ton of research before stumbling onto this gem. I received the item in 2 days time. Stellar/speedy shipping. I'm not sure what all the negative reviews are about, but this wall mount rocks in many ways. It's a salute to Engineering design in itself.Yes, you have to put it together piece by piece. The horror! Yes, it's slightly tedious with small screws and awkward screw placement. Oh no, takes 10 minutes! Then however long you take to mount it to your wall and throw your TV on it.I'm dumbfounded that it comes with every piece you need besides a drill and a stud finder. For $28 bucks you're getting a lot of product here. A 10 FOOT HDMI cable (normally $50-$100 at Best Buy or Fryes). You're getting a nifty level. You're getting a small attachable level that clicks onto the frame (someone in the negative reviews mentioned that it stopped coming with the small attachable center level, yet, mine came with it so I don't know what that's all about). You're getting solid instructions that don't take a rocket scientist to figure out. Can't read simple step by step pictures? Then you have bigger problems going on besides mounting a TV.Overall, great product and FAR CHEAPER than a lot of the wall mounts I researched that don't even come with 80% of the product this does.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: dannybetz
Reviews.Content: Works great for my samsung 50 inch plasma tv,Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65-Inch

Reviews.Title: Great mount.  Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal.  The fact that it came with a level was a plus for me since I wasn't able to locate one.  The level that it comes with has come in handy for several other projects around the house.  The mount itself feels substantial and I found it very easy to put together and install with absolutely no issues.  Oh and getting an HDMI cable with this was a plus.  Given the fact that many retailers rip people off on HDMI cables, it was awesome getting one for free.  I'll buy this mount again if I ever need another.

Reviews.Title: Great TV mount especially at this price
Reviews.Author: D. J. Salls
Reviews.Content: This little hanger was just what I needed for my 42 inch tv. It's cost was small compared to retail stores and it's in my opinion better constructed than most I have seen in Wal-mart or Target.

Reviews.Title: Effective and worthwhile !!!
Reviews.Author: James Vaughn
Reviews.Content: Cost effective, and works great. Instructions easy to follow and several options to fit various televisions. Mine was hung and in operation in less than 30 minutes once I found the darn studs. The little level is ok, better to use a 3' but if you don't have its a nice touch to help make sure everything looks pretty.

Reviews.Title: Base plate - two pieces not one
Reviews.Author: PemPines
Reviews.Content: I thought the base plate was one piece and it's actually two.  It serves it's purpose but not as reliable as a solid base plate would be but with manufacturers making lighter TV's I guess it will not matter.

Reviews.Title: Gets the Job done and it tilts :)
Reviews.Author: Jimi Williams
Reviews.Content: This thing works great and is very easy to use! I mounted my TV in about 20 minutes.  The hardest part was getting it to be leveled. The Level it comes with is pretty crappy,  But I say that if you are using a level that comes with your TV mount, you should not be mounting your own TV!

Reviews.Title: Does what it should do
Reviews.Author: S. Crangle
Reviews.Content: Sure, I love it.  In the year we've had it the TV hasn't fallen off and the wall remains upright.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: abt13
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount. It was so easy to setup and it came with the very convenient levels. Took me less than 1/2 hour to put it together and mount the TV on the wall. Gotta love a simple efficient product. The HDMI cable is long enough and it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Weak frame = poor product
Reviews.Author: Logan Saito
Reviews.Content: Mount framing bent upon installation, needed to buy a different brand due to the poor quality construction. Spend a few extra bucks and get something a little heavier duty.

Reviews.Title: One of the mounting bolts broke during installation.
Reviews.Author: Kenny Austin
Reviews.Content: One of the mounting bolts broke during installation.  I used a spare I had laying around since my help was leaving.  I probably should have returned it but after getting the other three in, I just wanted to be done.  Let's hope another one does not break and my TV fall off the wall :(

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal!
Reviews.Author: BeachHappy
Reviews.Content: Awesome purchase!! And, it came with HDMI cable and level. Perfect for what we needed. Total package for setting up your flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount and we can easily install, very good for light wight LED/LCD TVs. Highly recomend this mount.
Reviews.Author: ravi karnati
Reviews.Content: Very nice mount with easy to install. Nice mount and we can easily install, very good for light wight LED/LCD TVs.

Reviews.Title: It's worth it
Reviews.Author: Sparkle
Reviews.Content: Fantastic.  I used this to hang up my 50 inch samsung tv so my little one would not knock it over.  It hold up pretty well and is a lot less expensive than the ones you get at walmart, target, and kmart.  It is doing it's job 2yrs later with no problems.

Reviews.Title: This wall mount is unbelievable!!!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Perfectly fits, generally awesome!!!I enjoyed everything on it and it was completely easy to install and just observe my plasma on the wall :)

Reviews.Title: beyond getting what u payed for satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: barbie montano
Reviews.Content: Excellent product with a great price. I was very satisfied. my bro installed it he also was pleased with product

Reviews.Title: Held up my 65" samsung without a hitch
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Assembly wasn't as bad as others have said.  Not only that, this mount is wider than the VideoSecu my friend bought (I'd say a foot wider).  To top it off, the HDMI cable is top quality. I can't remember the brand, but I Iooked it up on amazon and it got great reviews.  I'd say it's as good if not better than my BlueRigger hdmi cable, and this one is 10 ft long!A tip for hanging, use a tape measure and measure from the ceiling instead of using any level.  You want it to look straight, not actually be straight - two completely different things when it comes to homes.  Take it from years of hanging things on the wall.Another tip, if you want to screw in the safety screws after the tv is on the mount, you'll need a 16-20 inch long philips screw driver to reach up behind the tv.  To me, the tv seems secure enough without tightening the 2 safety screws, but as I write this I'm convincing myself I should buy a long screwdriver since it's worth the cost of the tv.I was able to put most my 180lbs weight on this just to test, and it didn't budge.  The lag bolts that come with it are good size.  It comes with all the hardware you need for many different sizes of tv's.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with only one main complaint
Reviews.Author: JoeF
Reviews.Content: Installation was pretty good.  Instructions leave a little bit open to interpretation.  But if you have any clue what you're doing and can figure a few things out on your own, shouldn't be a problem.  It does seem to be of the 'cheaper' quality mounts.  Fairly thin and a bit flimsy.  But I don't have any doubts it'll hold my LCD TV (50") just fine.  My only major issue is the lack of clearance in the back.  If I need to access the wires or ports, it's near impossible because the mount puts the TV is so close to the wall.  Even tilting it doesn't help much.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for my Bravia 60" TV.
Reviews.Author: Scott Soto
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly with my Sony Bravia KDL-55EX720 60" TV.. Have had it a while now and its as good as new! Fit like a glove.

Reviews.Title: Second time buyer, will definitely go for the 3-peat in the near future.
Reviews.Author: Josh Thompson
Reviews.Content: Second time buyer, just as impressed as I am with the first one I bought over a year ago. From start to finish it took me 15 minutes to install and have my flat panel operational in my master bedroom. Highly recommend this product to anyone who wants quality for an extremely inexpensive price. Same quality as the "big box" stores and you can buy three from Cheetah for the price of one. The HDMI cable is of decent quality and with it being free.....no complaints. It would be a mistake to pass this up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit & exceptional value
Reviews.Author: Jeremy von Hoff
Reviews.Content: The mount fit my TV (Vizio 55") exactly as it should, and I feel 100% secure that my TV is safely mounted.

Reviews.Title: disappointed in mount
Reviews.Author: L. Williams "online shopper"
Reviews.Content: Add nothing about having to put the mount together before use. Was discouraging, and lock to hold TV in place is non functional. Just a slight bump to either lower corner of the TV would probably knock it loose.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: J. Aguilar "Phone junkie"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and works great. Used on 40" flat screen with no issues. Will definitely order another for 50" TV.

Reviews.Title: highly recommened simple tv bracket
Reviews.Author: Tibman
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to install. There is a lot of room for user error installing this tv bracket and you can easily adjust.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Really easy to put together, and the free level was a nice bonus to help you install it. I'd definatly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it, pretty easy to install
Reviews.Author: John Cullom
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price.  I was able to install this myself, and I never do this sort of thing.

Reviews.Title: Decent cheap mount
Reviews.Author: goodwilldrums
Reviews.Content: A little disappointed in the quality of the mount. Having to screw the left and right parts of the mount makes it really difficult to get the TV level. After everything is screwed down tight, the mount starts to bow at the ends. To make sure it stays level, I recommend they start making this thing in one piece. The decision to split this up in two pieces was a bad one.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B
Reviews.Author: Bill Kurps
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mount came on time, was easy to put together and mount to the wall. The Mount came with two levels, and all the fasteners to attach to the wall and TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a low price!
Reviews.Author: Gal Sivan
Reviews.Content: Great product. Holds my TV like a charm, and at a very reasonable price point! Installation was easy and instructions clear. Packaging easy.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: tscobey
Reviews.Content: Great mount and it seems very stable! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the level they sent with it was very cheap and didn't work and the directions could have been better. It took my husband and 2 friends about an hour or so to get it up and luckily he has his own level or we would have either had to go buy one or just wing it.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Saberin
Reviews.Content: I own far more expensive mounts ($200+).  Those expensive mounts are of higher quality, but this mount gets the job done for a fraction of the price.  The TV was mounted about a month ago, and it's still hanging.  It wasn't any more difficult to assemble than other mounts I own.  Everything fit as it should.  I couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: You could pay more for less but why!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Blubaugh
Reviews.Content: Great price no need to buy any thing else more expensive. The added hdmi cable is brilliant, level is a nice extra as well.

Reviews.Title: nice stuff
Reviews.Author: Betson
Reviews.Content: very nice...wesome awesome, like it so much and really enjoy the mount indeed..it was very very good and very nice indeed...

Reviews.Title: Soild. Does the job. As described
Reviews.Author: Sloan Ranger
Reviews.Content: Barebones mount...works but no features or options. Comes with everything you'll need and a cable for $25 you can't complain about it. Using a 65" TV for this.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed by the design of this.
Reviews.Author: Josh Cramer "house of trim"
Reviews.Content: Beware! This unit was incredibly disappointing and difficult to assemble. It hardly feels secure on the wall, especially considering the bottom "safety" screws which prevent the monitor from sliding off of the railing are impossible to screw in without a ridiculously long screwdriver. This might have been made well in the past, but read the other low rated reviews and get the full scoop. Yes, it is cheap to but, but also cheaply designed.

Reviews.Title: Does the job as expected
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Mounted my Sharp LE550 60 inch tv in a snap.only issue is the safety lock screws at the bottom can't be adjusted due to the bottom of the tv being as thick as it is.  No big deal, still sturdy and seems very doubtful anyone will be lifting it anyway.

Reviews.Title: sturdy and accomodating to tv size
Reviews.Author: D. Maul
Reviews.Content: Easy install. Lots of options for different tv sizes. Sturdy and feels tough. I have no concerns this will hold the tv on the wall, mounted it to wall studs. Mounted a 60" Vizio Razr LED. Everything I needed to do the job was included.

Reviews.Title: Good mount for a good price.
Reviews.Author: David Elias
Reviews.Content: Mounted a 51" plasma TV with this no problem.  Uses two studs to secure to the wall and will hold a lot of weight.  Easy to set up and install.  I honestly could have just got a flush mount but I don't mind giving up a little depth so I can tilt is should I need to in the future.

Reviews.Title: Inaccurate Hype
Reviews.Author: 0morphine0
Reviews.Content: It sits well on the wall. Looks great. With that said, it should be mentioned that it takes a 7 - 8 inch screw driver to tighten the screws once it is mounted. Very annoying.UpdateLike I said earlier, the mount is great. I just wish it was clear that access to the back of the TV and it's screws to tighten it are difficult to access once mounted on the brackets. For a while I was wondering if I was doing it correctly and so it took longer than needed. Also, no other review said anything like this and so I wanted to let others know. The company is VERY VERY helpful.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive, Sturdy, & Effective Product
Reviews.Author: Joel D. Moore "Joel of the Moore Clan"
Reviews.Content: Great product. Inexpensive, universal, seems sturdy, not too difficult to install. I did procure my own toggle style drywall anchors, but it comes with mounting hardware that would likely suffice for most applications. I couldn't find a stud so I felt I needed a little more holding power than the included hardware would provide.

Reviews.Title: A totally great buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We are so impressed!  I had my fears due to the price, but thanks to the reviews,  we went for it and i'm so glad we did! It holds our 55" tv with ease, and though installation wasnt the easiest ever, for the price, no complaints!

Reviews.Title: perfect!!
Reviews.Author: staci moore
Reviews.Content: works PERFECT with our tv, had to put the whole thing together, but can't complain for the price we got it at!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount!
Reviews.Author: C. Durkin "CD"
Reviews.Content: Went up easy, works great!  Well worth the money spent.  I would recommend this to anyone looking to mount a TV.

Reviews.Title: looks good. But tilt mechanism is flawed.
Reviews.Author: Kool K
Reviews.Content: mechanism to adjust tilt does not work well. Right side tilt arm adjusting screw and bolt gets stuck and cannot be moved.

Reviews.Title: Wall mount review
Reviews.Author: retmedc
Reviews.Content: I read some reviews on amazon and purchased this one. The price was right and the cable is really a nice touch, both are well made. It was not difficult to put together at all. I used it to hang a larger screen tv.  I highly recommend this for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: A. Stewart
Reviews.Content: Awesome price. This is an item that either works or doesn't. This mount works as well as any others could. I looked at other brands in local stores and they are made identical. This is an excellent value!

Reviews.Title: FIRST TIME HANGER
Reviews.Author: David J. Riebe "lxluthr"
Reviews.Content: This was my first time hanging a TV on a wall and I must say this Cheetah mount made it a breeze. There is no way you could not find a position on the frame to bolt this in. And the hardware they send you is unbelievable, every possible piece you can use for all scenarios. I hung a 42 inch LG LCD

Reviews.Title: Average TV wall mount.
Reviews.Author: Anthony C. Alleyne
Reviews.Content: Decent mount for the money .i would recommend this product.  But it is budget type product. It will hold your 65" TV,.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service on the delivery of the Cheetah Wall Mount Bracket for our 58" TV
Reviews.Author: Janina DeLibro
Reviews.Content: Cheetah Mounts  APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket arrived one day earlier.  It was  packed well and easy to put together.

Reviews.Title: Super Mount for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: peedee
Reviews.Content: This is really a flush mount.  I was mounting a flat screen in a narrow TV cabinet that hangs on the wall.  Inches really counted.  This mount uses so little depth space, I had no trouble at all getting the mount and the TV in a cabinet that was only about 6 inches deep with plenty of room to spare to close the cabinet doors.  My TV only weighed 33 pounds, but this mount will handle much more weight with no problem.  Really easy to put together and install, too.  Hell of a deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very sturdy and secure.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Mayhall
Reviews.Content: The product held and didnt have an issue with my 60" Visio and it has been hanging for 1 year now. Its just awesome like that.

Reviews.Title: Basic slim mount for my living room - does exactly what it needs to do
Reviews.Author: Bryan Campbell
Reviews.Content: Title pretty much says it all.  It's really basic but does exactly what I needed it to do - hold my slim tv on the wall in the living room.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Cervantes Jr.
Reviews.Content: SUPER EASY to assemble. Directions were VERY clear. all parts were labled. They even give you a 4" Bubble level and hi quality HDMI cable.My 65" Toshiba HD 3D LED snapped right on. LOOKS GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Probably the best bang for your buck on TV mounts.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Decker
Reviews.Content: I have two of these and I believe that they're the best bang for the buck.  I have a 55 inch and a 60 inch tv hanging on my two mounts.  Set up was easy.  The HDMI cable it pretty worthless, so I would plan on using a different kind, like the kind you can find on Monoprice.com.  But I didnt buy the mount for the included cable so I don't feel that the product should be marked down.  The included level was a cool move on Cheetah's part.

Reviews.Title: highly recomended
Reviews.Author: DG "Den"
Reviews.Content: this unit is well made ,easy to put together, easy to mount and more than strong enough to mount my 47" flat screen

Reviews.Title: tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: CliffT
Reviews.Content: Great value includes hdmi cable. Comes with various sizes of screws and bolts.  Easy to assemble. I would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work the way it was made to.
Reviews.Author: Cameron Moss
Reviews.Content: If you want to mount your t.v. at any angle besides flat, the mount wouldn't fasten to the bottom of the bracket properly. Basically my t.v. ended up just hooked on the top of the bracket. And make sure your screw holes on the back of your t.v. are spaced like it shows in the picture. Mine had all 4 screws close together in a square pattern on the center of the back of my t.v. so it made it more unstable. Once you mounted your t.v., you can't adjust the degree of the angle without taking the t.v. off the wall.

Reviews.Title: Good mount + useful accessories
Reviews.Author: Zachary Anderson
Reviews.Content: The included accessories make this mount package into an easy-to-use kit for anyone with basic mechanical skills and a desire to mount a television to a wall. This mount is well-engineered and truly is thin.
