My only gripe is that I wish the horizontal bars were solid instead of a two-piece construction that I had to assemble; I didn't mind the assembly, but a one-piece horizontal bar would provide greater rigidity. That said, there is value in this mount at this price point and I would recommend it for any standard installation.

Reviews.Title: Price is right
Reviews.Author: paxhungaria "paxhungaria"
Reviews.Content: Price is right...when Best Buy, Home Depot, you name charges in excess of $70 for this plus the HD cord, this is a total winner.  A little work to install but for the price, well worth the effort.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Hines
Reviews.Content: This is a very good flat screen TV wall mount bracket for my 50 " TV.  I would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great TV wall mount.
Reviews.Author: M. Whitehead
Reviews.Content: Great mount. Was a breeze to understand and put together. Holds firmly on my wall, and the extra cable was a nice bonus.I installed this for my 46" flat screen TV. Fit like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Bracket
Reviews.Author: Doris F Webb
Reviews.Content: I have other brackets for my TV's. This one is sturdy and installed so simply. Great buy for the money

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price, High Quality!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Maher
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to mount my 50" Flat Screen TV.  Came quickly and mounted perfectly on the wall!  Very strong and good quality too.

Reviews.Title: Great product one Criticsm
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Great product the only criticism would be that in order to tighten the security screws I needed to use my 1/2" drive set with a 14" extension to tighten them (I used it for my 55" Flat Screen) the instructions didn't say anything about that.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount at a great price
Reviews.Author: Paul M
Reviews.Content: This mount worked great on a 60" TV.  Once mounted to the wall it was very solid.  The TV was easy to hang and adjust (side to side).  The included HDMI cable also worked as well as all my others, so no complaints there either.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris Morgan
Reviews.Content: Good wall mount for the money.You have to put it together, about 15 minuets.The only problem is that it has safety screws to secure the TV,but after I hung the TV,I couldn't get to the screws to tighten. I just have to be careful not to push the TV up  and I'll be ok.Other than that,it's good enough. My TV's 46".

Reviews.Title: Super value - functions well
Reviews.Author: Vincent Rago
Reviews.Content: Worked great with 60 inch model.  I have numerous, much more expensive mounts and this one worked just as well and had just as much tilt.  The gauge of the steel is lighter than some of the other models, but way more than adequate for the job.Was as easy to install as other mounts.  There are four bolts that hold the sides of the back frame to the rails and there are a set of bolts and a union plate that join each of the rail' two pieces.  It is very easy to assemble and makes the unit way more cost effective to pack and ship.The brackets fit my TV with no problem. There are plenty of bolts of varying lengths and bushings to hold the bracket away from a TV with an irregular back.Would certainly purchase again and recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Jay Groleau
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these. They were inexpensive, and have lasted through two moves. They are currently being used on older plasma TVs which are relatively heavy, and they still work great!

Reviews.Title: Great product, not so good directions.
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: Directions were not very clear, I didn't see anything about the 2 small pieces that go on the top mount, I did not install them.Basically all of the weight is on the top mount, the bottom mount is really only for the safety screws which were a big pain to screw in.We had to tilt the TV forward, I barely got my hand behind it, you need at least a 12 inch thin screwdriver to get to them. I was only able to get to the one, but it is sturdy. Make sure you hit the studs on center, everything else is fairly simple. I do recommend a 10mm wrench to tighten the nuts, which the directions do not recommend, also the lag bolts are larger than the directions say, I needed a 13mm and 10mm for both of the 6mm and 8mm bolts according to the directions.Took me about 90 minutes, Getting my height and getting it level was the hardest partOverall for the price, you cannot beat it!

Reviews.Title: Nice wall mount for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Kissell
Reviews.Content: This works mostly as expected.  Does what I wanted it to do.  It holds a TV well.  My only complaint is that I needed to have my TV angled down the maximum amount.  When you do that two things happen.  1) My rear-facing HDMI plugs press into the mount and breaks them, so I had to get new cables and 90 degree HDMI corners.  2) There are screws in the bottom to help hold this all together, they're not really necessary, just nice to make everything a bit more sturdy, and they're impossible to get to if you've angled this down all the way.  But the mount is cheap and nice for the price.  If you don't need to angle your TV downward or to the side and just want a cheap wall mount that will hold a TV flat against the wall then this is for you.  I've actually ordered another one that I'll also be tilting downward all the way, but I'll just use more of the 90 degree HDMI corner thingies and don't really care about the bottom screws not being able to be secured.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: C. Frame
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Has been holding my 60" Sharp Aquios for a year now and it hasn't crashed to the ground.  That's a good thing!  Decent quality, strong and does the job.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for a great price
Reviews.Author: Randy D.
Reviews.Content: Easy to understand instructions and quality product. Once installed it secures to the wall tightly. I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended. Save some money!
Reviews.Author: Ty Phelps
Reviews.Content: These Cheetah wall mounts are very cheap and work well. I hung an older model 42" TV that weighed about 70 pounds.  Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: This bracket for a television is strong and secure.
Reviews.Author: Borbas Family
Reviews.Content: This is a tough bracket that will hold an elephant.  I am safe with this design.  I will order again in the future.  Thank you all for a quick delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money...would buy again.
Reviews.Author: A. Boekestein "ajboek"
Reviews.Content: Had my 50 inch LG mounted on the wall in about 90 minutes.  Assembly took a little bit of time but I am happy with the result.  Bolted solidly on my tv and solidly on the wall.  I think I could do a pull-up on the mount without any trouble.  No worries about my tv falling off the wall or crushing any of my kids.  The rumors are true that you will need about a 16" screwdriver to set the safety screws.  Also, some of the holes to put the mount together don't accept the bolts perfectly but did work with a little persuasion.

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: selina boles
Reviews.Content: Much cheaper than it was in the store. Finally able to make room in the family room with the TV sitting up higher now. It holds my 55" very well and sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Mount is good, but cumbersome to work with.
Reviews.Author: Hunter Bonner
Reviews.Content: The safety screws are not easy to get to, in order to engage.  I could not adjust them at all with a 55 inch Plasma TV mounted.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to install.
Reviews.Author: Rachel Downey "electrogirle"
Reviews.Content: Missing 2 screws. Installation directions were very poor. It would help if it said what tools you need on hand right on the box. Who has an ratchet wrench on hand? Bracket seems strong though.

Reviews.Title: Great value - adjust TV angle before hanging
Reviews.Author: Brice Hope
Reviews.Content: Great TV mount and everything works as expected.  The only reason I give this a 4 star rather than 5 is because the other Cheetah mount I purchased on Amazon had hand tightening nuts that would allow you to adjust the TV angle after the it was hung on the wall. This model requires a screwdriver to adjust the angle and must be done before hanging the TV.  Only other area of trouble is that since it is a low profile mount, I wasn't able to tilt my TV the full range because the bottom of the TV was pressing against the wall.  Other than those minor complaints, this is a solid TV mount that works really well.

Reviews.Title: NOT good for large screens, good for small screens
Reviews.Author: zodiac711 "Furisdead.com"
Reviews.Content: EDIT: OK, it's December 8, 2013.  Cheetah customer service reached out to me (see their comment below) on my original review (see below).  I appreciate a company that believes in customer service, and definitely have to give them applause.  Especially since we aren't talking about a multi-hundred dollar purchase, but rather a sub $30 wall-mount.Per Cheetah's request, I contacted them and have a great chat and vented the frustrations that I had.  The 60" TV I have is properly wall mounted -- I'm happy with the mount.  But, as I explained to the customer service rep, while this is a good product, and while it's "rated" up to a 65" TV, it (and probably most other slim wall mounts) really aren't "good" on large screens.So, I've bumped-up my rating from 2-stars to 4-stars.  -3 because it was an absolute NIGHTMARE to install on my 60" screen.  +1 because the price was great (which pushed it up from 1* to 2* originally), another +1 because of the great, pro-active customer service, and another +1 because it is a good mount (for smaller TV's) and, if I were going to do say a 40", I'd gladly buy this same mount.-----I'm torn on what to rate this.While the price was cheap, and it came with an HDMI cable and a level, it's a case of you get what you pay for.Used it to mount a 60" LED TV to the wall.  You have to first put the wall mount together (simple enough, but does make me question just how sturdy the thing really is).Aside from sturdiness (it is rated to 100+ lbs, so my 70# tv *should* be OK), but there are two *BIG* negatives of this over a wall mount I used for my other TV.1) Due to it being a low(er) profile mount, it's VERY DIFFICULT to get the safety screws screwed into the back.  Perhaps it would be easier if the TV were smaller?  We managed to get it (after a LONG time), but absolute pain.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount fotr Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: William A. Lang
Reviews.Content: Great product at great price.  Well made. Installs easily.  The level is an added bonus. Recommend this to anyone needed a mount.

Reviews.Title: Good price, OK product, but poor design in my opinion
Reviews.Author: Tim Cherny
Reviews.Content: Decent product, competitive price, value for the money (includes HDMI cable and 2 levels).  However I don't get why the wall mount frame comes in 4 pieces with 4 connecting brackets and 14 screws.  While this allows the whole thing to fit into a small box it adds 15 mins to assembly and severely compromise on rigidity of the product.You can get same slim tilting wall mount that has solid one-piece frame with built-in level from Monoprice.com for even less money if you're OK with 5-7 day shipping.  I needed this in 2-day time frame and here Amazon's Prime shipping is tough to beat.UPDATE:Had to raise review from 3 to 4 stars.  To clarify, this is a quality product and seller follow-ups in attempt to resolve any issues I may have is exceptional (immediately after first review was written).  However I can't rate this product 5-stars simply because Monoprice sells identical in features mount which has better design (no assembly required) for less.I've installed(hanged) little over 10 flat-panel TVs using this and similar mounts.  I haven't experienced any issues with either mount, so my feedback basically narrows down to assembly complexity/quality/value.  This product certainly beats most overpriced mounts in local stores, but in my experience could have better design to simplify assembly.

Reviews.Title: DO your research...
Reviews.Author: Wilfredo Torres Jr.
Reviews.Content: The product itself is worth the $25 dollars. I'm just upset that I did not do my homework before this purchase. I spent another $25 on shipping and handling so that I could have it the next day... I later found out that my mother in law bought a more durable and classier wall mount for her tv at best buy for the same price $50....SMH. Her wall mount included two safety straps, 2 HDMI cords, and the instructions were very simple to make out.. The ONLY thing that I do not like about this product is that its shaky.. Yes shaky... And I believe that it is "shaky" because you have to screw on 4 different pieces to the main body of the wall mount frame.. I guess for the money is great, but theres not guarantee that my $1500 t.v. will be safe...

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount, great price!
Reviews.Author: Brett Wells
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install my 47" LCD television with this mount. The included level and HDMI cable were a big help.

Reviews.Title: Low price but not cheap!
Reviews.Author: Robtonic
Reviews.Content: I've ordered two of these now. One I use on a very slim LED TV. The other is a bulkier, older LCD TV. The mount handles both with ease. Like most have said, your TV will sit VERY snug to the wall. So be prepared for that and you'll be fine. There is no reason to waste money on a $100-$200 mount!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV wall mount!
Reviews.Author: Mike Baumgarten
Reviews.Content: Great purchase and easy to install.  Very good product that is versatile to fit almost any size TVs.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for my 60" Sony!
Reviews.Author: Kristofer J.
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mount TV bracket is a great slim design for wall mounts.  I utilized it for my 60" Sony LCD and it worked perfect.  Easy to install the wall mounts, just ensure your holes are placed far enough apart.  I mounted the bracket between two studs in the wall.  Perfect distance.  The only drawback is once you get the TV on the wall mount, it is a little tough to tighten the screws.  Make sure you have a phillips head screwdriver extension.

Reviews.Title: So easy to mount a Samsung 50: TV
Reviews.Author: lmc
Reviews.Content: Wow! Just received this and used it to put up my new Samsung TV!It came in a small box so I was a little worried that it would be able to support a 50" TV. However, after reviewing the instructions, it took only 15 minutes to put it together and mount it on the wall. It came with screws and washers of different sizes to to match each size of TV supported and had the included level.I was able to mount my new Samsung 50" LED TV by myself! Awesome!B0001FTVEKWith an included HDMI cable this cannot be beat. I was talking to someone last night who had paid $89 at a retail store for a mount. I got this for $25. Super deal!

Reviews.Title: difficult to assemble, functions well
Reviews.Author: Alan Nasar
Reviews.Content: This tilting wall mount for flatscreen tv works perfectly. Unfortunately it is difficult to assemble. Instead of shipping in 3 pieces, it is shipped in 8 pieces, 6 of which have to be assembled. I am embarrassed to admit that it took me more than 30 minutes to assemble the wall plate. It actually was missing one screw which I don't think was entirely necessary. Once assembled, it works like any other wall mount, that is it functions well.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: trevor Mays
Reviews.Content: Worked great for an old Mitsubishi pf5050 plasma weighing about 100 pounds. Works the same as a 100 dollar one from the store. Easy to install with a power drill.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Christopher Svetcov
Reviews.Content: The mount was really easy to install using the directions and hardware provided.  It is a simple mount which does its job well.  It is really easy to remove the TV if you needed to change out a cable and I never worry that the mount is going to come out if the wall.

Reviews.Title: Nice Mount!
Reviews.Author: John T. Shea
Reviews.Content: Solid value here. The unit is sturdy and easy to adjust. Just be warned that it comes in a box about the size of a checkbook. "Some assembly required" indeed.

Reviews.Title: probably would by a different one next time
Reviews.Author: david helminiak
Reviews.Content: It comes to you in pieces which you have to put together. It has no adjustments to swivel it left out right. I would suggest being very accurate with a level and your measurement as there is no adjusting the tv level on the mount.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap tv wall mount!!
Reviews.Author: J. H. McRae "J. H. McRae"
Reviews.Content: I got this because I had free shipping with some other products. I decided to wall mount my tv and wasn't going to pay an arm and a leg for a mount.I originally bought this to mount my 55" tv.  Only problem is that most if not all tv mounts are based on 16" center 2x4's instead of 24" centers like most houses are. This results in only being able to screw on one end of the mount and toward the middle of the mount.  This caused my tv to not be in the middle of my wall.  The mount itself is only 29" wide so I needed a few more inches. For my 55" tv in the living room, this didn't work because of how wide the wall was. It worked fine for my 42" in the bedroomOverall, it is a quality mount and it fit my 55" and my 42" tv with no problem. Even the new mount which was 33" wide and got my tv centered is still based on 16" on center. Until the mounts are based on 24" on center 2x4's, there will be problems with any mount, no matter what the brand or cost.

Reviews.Title: Works on my 42", but the directions suck
Reviews.Author: stellaxtine
Reviews.Content: I needed a wall mount and considering how most of them are over $100 in-store, I thought I've give this a shot since it had a lot of really good reviews. I've never set up a wall mount before but was able to set it up all by myself in an hour. It took a lot of trial-and-error, though, because the directions included are terrible. Someone needs to write more thorough instructions because it takes a lot of squinting and guessing to make out what the pictures are telling you (the written notes don't help at all). I also had trouble trying to figure out how to get my TV up on the rack securely, at the 15 degree angle setting, only the top clamps slid onto the bracket so it was just hanging there. I spent most of the installation time balanced on my tiptoes with the TV in my arms. Quite precarious, considering I lack any upper-body strength. I ended up needing to leave it set at no angle (straight vertical), then take out the tilt-adjust bolts once it was mounted properly so that I could tilt it down to 15 degrees, then put the bolts back in. That required one of those wiggly extensions for my screwdriver, which I luckily have.It's pretty sturdy though, and I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket
Reviews.Author: Mr. S. Porges "Sacha"
Reviews.Content: Very straightforward and simple to put together, love the free HDMI cable and 'tilt' feature to get the perfect viewing angle.  Also love the enclosed level that helps you perfectly position your falt-screen TV.

Reviews.Title: No suprises.
Reviews.Author: CNG
Reviews.Content: The mount was pretty easy to install. You do have to construct the frame and all other pieces. But once I put it up, I feel safe that my TV will stay up. All hardware is included. I had to mount it on a plaster wall.

Reviews.Title: Love my TV on the wall
Reviews.Author: larry white "Larry"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and works great. The TV looks great on the wall and this product comes complete with everything you need for a quick and simple installation.

Reviews.Title: Nice STRONG bracket and LOW profile!
Reviews.Author: Ken C.
Reviews.Content: This mount is ROCK solid, and trust me, if installed correctly....it ain't going anywhere. It had plenty of adjustment range for me and is a nice wall hugger! Comes with clear instructions and all the hardware assortment you'll need, PLUS a nice HDMI cable. Only thing I had problem with, was access to bottom locking screws to lock tv to bracket. But tv hangs securely from top catches. This is a great bracket if you're not needing side to side swivel or extension, 15 degree up and down swivel is PLENTY of adjustment!

Reviews.Title: it works just like other people suggested.
Reviews.Author: H.
Reviews.Content: it works just like other people suggested. I did not put in all the screws since it is hard to make hole in some part of my wall.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective alternative to high cost brackets
Reviews.Author: arjayess
Reviews.Content: Lower cost than similar products and even includes an HDMI cable.  A little more assembly required but worth it.  The only problem was that I had to purchase longer screws to mount the TV because the included screws were too short.  Not a big deal since the screw size is available at the local hardware store.

Reviews.Title: I would have expected to way more for this! Thanks Amazon!
Reviews.Author: G L Kim
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the price. This thing is a beast and is definitely worth it. It looks like its made of plastic in the photo but it's made of heavy duty metal. My 42" television is mounted on my wall and I have absolutely no fear about it falling off. As a 5'4" woman, I had no issue mounting the television by myself, but I recommend getting help.  My only regret is not buying this sooner.

Reviews.Title: Very well engineered
Reviews.Author: stvgrc
Reviews.Content: Easy to put together, well engineered, super strong, and a thin profile. So far the TV is still hanging on the wall, so I guess it's doing its job! And they included a HDMI cable for free - and it's a good one!

Reviews.Title: Very solid and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Devlyn
Reviews.Content: This mount works very well. For as little as it costs it sure works like the more expensive brands. The assembly was easy and mounting the TV to it was even easier. The bonus HDMI cable and leveling tool were above and beyond what even some of the bigger mount manufacturers decide to include in their overpriced TV mounts. You cannot beat the price/quality of this mount.

Reviews.Title: Only Thing Better Is The Price!
Reviews.Author: Dagbaugh "Dagbaugh"
Reviews.Content: Solid mount at an outstanding price. Lots of hardware for just about any application. Used to hold a 55" TV with no problem. Very well built, HDMI cable a huge bonus and level was convenient. Easy to setup. Love it!

Reviews.Title: no instructions...
Reviews.Author: ChubbyMidget
Reviews.Content: Only 3 stars because the box came without instructions.  Granted, it only took me a while to figure it out... but come on.  half the screws were just flying around in the box and fell out into the shipping box.  Seems to hold my TV well and flush, other than that.  Only 3 stars because of the crappy packing by the vendor and lack of instructions.  Package arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Ashish Bhandare "Ashish B"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. Works great. TV mounts real close to the wall. I am using it with my Sony 60EX645 series.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the price fool you!
Reviews.Author: The_Walking_Bread
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, but not cheap by any means. It's an incredibly sturdy mount and it holds my Sammy 55 just perfect!

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Juvenal Llanes "Juvenal"
Reviews.Content: Perfect mount, easy to install and all thenecessary hardware was included in the kit when itarrived. Prompt deliver. I could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Buy this!
Reviews.Author: L. Mahoney "leslie37"
Reviews.Content: Great, inexpensive mount.  Since I spent extra money on a slimline Samsung 50", I wanted a mount that would get my slimline as close to the wall as possible.  This mount appeared to be the right one for the job.  It's made well and I love the easy on/off capability. It wasn't difficult to install - my husband & I installed it in about 20 minutes. I did need to purchase longer screws to use with my Samsung 50" in order to get it as close to the wall as was possible, but that wasn't a huge deal.  I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Good mount
Reviews.Author: Evan T.
Reviews.Content: Works perfect w/ my 40 in Spectre TV, comes with 2 levels and a lot of extra hardware for easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: WhitDowden829
Reviews.Content: Great TV mount! I was a little skeptical because of the price...you know.. hanging a $1000 TV on a $25 bracket... lol But it was perfect! I am pleasantly surprised! Very sturdy and there is no doubt in my mind that is a good quality product! Definitely will buy again for any other TVs that require hanging!

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Sophia Bright
Reviews.Content: Just a minor issue with standoff for the hdmi plug but it was easily remidied by getting a right angle hdmi plug.

Reviews.Title: if you have it, you will love it
Reviews.Author: Techgeek
Reviews.Content: I use this to mount my 32" LED TV on the wall such that I can enjoy watching movie when I am running on treadmill.The installation is not hard as I thought before I bought it.It comes almost everything you need to mount the TV.I installed by myself within 30 minutes.That is no wonder it ranks #1 in TV mounts.It is a good buy and I recommand this.

Reviews.Title: As expected.
Reviews.Author: Shopaholic1971
Reviews.Content: Its a good mount. But was a little too big for my 32 inch tv so i had to use only half of the wall mount. A little tricky but did the job vs returning it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job very well for the low price
Reviews.Author: Kairav
Reviews.Content: Great price for the product. Have had it for 2 years, hooked up a 50 inch plasma TV, no issues.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Candace
Reviews.Content: We really didn't want to spend a lot on a wall mount, so in our search I came across this one for our Vizio 55"It was pretty easy to figure out and get straight on the wall and its held our heavy 55'' just fine! We decided to reinforce it with some of our own screws and wall anchors.My only complaint is if you want it to tilt, you have to take the TV down and adjust it like so, I thought it'd be a bit easier but where the TV is, it looks great! Great for the price and gets the job done!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the savings.
Reviews.Author: Megan J Busch
Reviews.Content: Directions were not as clear as they could have been, but well worth the price. Mount is up and secure. Fit our Vizio 55" and came with a variety of screws, nuts and bolts to fit lots of different TV's.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and sufficient. Did the job.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Purchased to hang my 60" flat screen over the fireplace. Easy installation, easy hanging, tilts easily after installation for plugging/unplugging wires without taking the whole TV off the wall. Did not use the security lock so really can't comment on that aspect.

Reviews.Title: great product for great price!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Tuthill
Reviews.Content: This mount is awesome!  Very easy to hang. The price was great!! And the tv went in very easy. I wish I had more tvs to hang. There is nothing complicated about it

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Nikki Walton
Reviews.Content: My tv is very heavy and I was scared about hanging the tv on this thing and it crashing to the ground. Hung the tv up and it never moved. Very well worth the money and gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best bargins out there went up without a hitch and is a excellent mount if you want it tight to the wall. Installed it in about 20 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount and Even Better Price!
Reviews.Author: Timothy
Reviews.Content: We used this to make use of our recently upgraded 43" TV.  We upgraded to a 70" Sony and didn't want to get rid of the old TV so we used this mount to mount the TV in the Dining Room.  Now we have a reason to eat in the dining room.  The mount worked great.  It is very solid and was easy to install.  You can't go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: Working great
Reviews.Author: EvilLuke
Reviews.Content: Fit great onto the wall and onto my tv. The level and HDMI cord are just bonus. Heard to beat for 25 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Very versatile and practical to mount and install
Reviews.Author: Lynn Blakely
Reviews.Content: This mount is strong, and easy to install. We mounted the mount on a rectangular piece of half inch plywood, fasten to a 2x4 triangular frame on three door hinges so the flat screen could be folded back against a wall. We like the tilt feature so that the screen doesn't reflect the lights in the sanctuary.

Reviews.Title: excellent holiday gift for myself
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Beaudin
Reviews.Content: purchased this to place in a newly remodeled room in my house. It will be nice not having anything on the floor on that wall

Reviews.Title: Easy Install, Permanent Results
Reviews.Author: David D.
Reviews.Content: The wall mount does a really good job.  It was so easy to install, even I was able to do it by just following the instructions.  Comes with everything you need to install.  My 51" TV is still on the wall so I guess it works well.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: good, solid product.  it couldn't have been easier to install if it came with a technician.  will order another one for my other tv

Reviews.Title: Sturdy bracket once assembled and hung.
Reviews.Author: M. Hull "NoSpam714"
Reviews.Content: Assembly of this mount was pretty straight forward and I feel confident with the sturdiness of it holding the TV on the wall with no issues.  There's just enough wiggle room in the mounting holes that you can make very fine tweaks to get it perfectly level after everything is screwed to the wall.  The included level is decent enough to get the job done, I didn't use the included HDMI cable because I had another one that was slightly longer, and I needed the extra length for my application.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice for wall mounted TV!
Reviews.Author: arodrig2
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to mount and very inexpensive. The hardware that is included in the package has everything you need to install a flat panel TV over the fireplace in my case.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Abigail
Reviews.Content: The bracket itself is pretty small and looks like it wouldn't be able to carry larger TVs but it actually can withstand a lot of weight. The box it comes in is a medium sized box and you have to assemble it. The directions are extremely easy to read and you can generally put this together in about 15 minutes. I mounted my 52' flat screen TV almost a month ago and everything still seems to be working fine so amazing product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Too many parts to assemble....I'm out.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Wittrock
Reviews.Content: I install professionally, and these mounts require too much to be put together.  Maybe I'm old-school, but I'm used to the mounts where the plate that bolts to the wall is already put together.  You have to put each section of this mount together manually, which simply adds too much time when on jobs.  Not to mention giving the "Human-Error" element.  If you drop a tiny screw and can't find it, you now can't put the mount together at all.Once assembled, the mount does work fine.  But considering you can get other mounts the same price that are far easier to put together.That said, I prefer the following mount.  It also requires snapping two parts together, but only if the TV requires it.My RECOMMENDED REPLACEMENT (same price)VideoSecu Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket for Most 23"- 65" LCD LED Plasma TV Flat Panel Screen with VESA 200x100 to 600x400mm, Bonus 10 ft HDMI Cable and Magnetic Bubble Level BBM

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Used this before for a 42" Vizio and now going to use it for a 32" Vizio.  Easy to install and assemble and works so well at keeping TV anchored.  Tilt is easy and you can mount TV higher if needed than with other mounts.  All the extras like cable and screws and level make installation a breeze.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great mount!  Great price!
Reviews.Author: svitiel "inthebackwoods"
Reviews.Content: I had bought this after I decided to finally get a new 50" flat screen HD TV.  I had chosen this mount because of the price and the stellar reviews.  I received the mount several days before the TV.  I hung the mount on the wall the day I received it and it was very easy.  Once I received the TV, I finished the mount and put the TV on the wall.  It's only been a couple weeks, but I have no idea why anyone would want to choose more expensive mounts that perform the same function.  Great design and no issues.

Reviews.Title: Okay but limited
Reviews.Author: R. McDowell
Reviews.Content: This was okay but is very basic and I really had and have had problems whenever I need to hook up something to the TV.  There is nothing wrong with this unit but this style doesn't come out from the wall far enough to make connections easy.

Reviews.Title: How is this so much less expensive than every other mount? Works great!
Reviews.Author: T Spizzy
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as advertised. A little more difficult to put together than I thought, but it works great. The mount sits really close to the wall, so make sure your cables are ok to fit behind the tv.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic and affordable!
Reviews.Author: Lap K. Chu "Kwanjai"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these and they are extremely sturdy. You can tilt it and slide it to its position. Only thing to worry about is getting it on the right height.

Reviews.Title: A great mount for the price.
Reviews.Author: Craig Sixta
Reviews.Content: Solid mount.  Unfortunately, they changed the design so the TV mount doesn't line up with the old wall mount.  Not a problem if you only have one, but a little frustrating if you have two TVs and needed to swap locations.

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount for little money!
Reviews.Author: Shakes81
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount for an older plasma tv that I believe weighs well over 100#'s.  All of the mounts I found locally were well over $120 plus tax.  I was skeptical when I first ordered it but am absolutely amazed when I received it!  Exceptional mount and came with an HDMI cable as well!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Bart Van Dessel
Reviews.Content: sturdy, and the help of the levels included make hanging this a breeze.  As always make sure you find the studs in your walls.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up, does its job perfectly
Reviews.Author: Hari Demirev
Reviews.Content: Really easy to set up and allows for a good deal of customization and movement of TV once you have attached the mount to the wall. So far it has been holding up the TV just fine and it looks and feels very sturdy. There isn't really much to say besides that; it does its job perfectly. The included HDMI cable is also quite nice.

Reviews.Title: Third One Purchased!
Reviews.Author: Gary E Larson
Reviews.Content: Great product and value.  Third one I purchased!  Would recommend to any one looking for a bracket that is a good value and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount. I bought a spare.
Reviews.Author: Raul E. Adan
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup. You just need to make sure you have all your wires in place before u mount your tv. There is very little room after you put the tv on the wall to run wires without removing it from the wall again.

Reviews.Title: Exaclty what the doctor ordered.
Reviews.Author: Debo
Reviews.Content: I put this up with the help of my 13yo Daughter with not issues. Hold my 47 inch vizio with no porblem. Very simple and sturdy. Exaclty what the doctor ordered.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Boilermaker "Just the average dude"
Reviews.Content: Instructions were not the best, but I've seen worse.  It is simple and sturdy.  Holds my 42 inch TV fine.  Great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the price fool you, it's well made and easy to install...
Reviews.Author: Emerikol
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install.  Did not need the level, but now I have an extra one, thank you.  Screwed it in the wall, hooked the two arm hooks up to the back of my TV (50") and then had someone else help me to hang it from the wall mount.  I could have also screwed in the bottom for extra security, but it locks by itself without screwing the bottom lock just fine.  Not screwing in the bottom means that I can also easily mount and unmounts as necessary, which I have done a few times now.Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: good quality, great value. difficult to tighten locking screws.
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Gougeon
Reviews.Content: Although the mount was easy to assemble,  it was difficult to tighten the lock screws due to their location once the tv was on the mount. Be sure to have a long screwdriver.  The overall quality of the mount was very good and a good value. I have to say that Cheetah's customer service is second to none. They were quick to contact me to ensure customer satisfaction regarding the locking screws. They are very professional and seemed to care about me as a consumer and input on their product.

Reviews.Title: Better for new TV's
Reviews.Author: SeekerMommy
Reviews.Content: It worked for us, but the issue about the older tvs (ours is 3 years old) not fitting this very well happened to us.  Luckily my hubby is very handy and just managed to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: David Gray
Reviews.Content: This mount is easy to set up, very light yet sturdy.Comes with its own level and the included HDMI cable although ugly is a nice bonus,

Reviews.Title: skip it
Reviews.Author: rascallymom
Reviews.Content: This thing was a nightmare I ended up returning.  Parts missing, incomplete instructions and defective parts. I was so disgusted I bought a stand for my tv :(

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This bracket is perfect for my 40" TV.  It was simple to install.  I have had it up on my wall for well over a year now and it's doing exactly what I need-- holding up my tv on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Strong mounts, even with very heavy tvs
Reviews.Author: Josh Shrader
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these Cheetah mounts. They were extremely easy to set up and the price couldn't be beat anywhere I looked. One of the mounts is holding my older flat screen TV, which is quite heavy, with no issue at all.It took approximately 20 minutes to set up each mount and mount the TV to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: I have ordered two of these now, and no complaints here.  They are very easy to put together, and do the job I need them for.  They are much thinner than the mounts I have purchased in the past, so they sit much closer to the wall (which I like).  Depending on where your hdmi inputs sit on your tv, you may need to purchase a right angle adapter.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Wall Mounts!! The best!!
Reviews.Author: Tx Mimi
Reviews.Content: Great, well made, sturdy TV mount.  My husband, Mr. Awesome, had our 50" plasma hung in our master bedroom in about 15 minutes!! Cheetah mounts are absolutely the best for hanging a flat screen on your walls!

Reviews.Title: CHEETAH  WALL  MOUNT!!
Reviews.Author: kit-kat
Reviews.Content: I am beyond pleased with my purchase, MY cheetah wall mount is  working out  much better than I expected love it...xo...xo :-)

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: reviewit
Reviews.Content: This product gets great reviews, but I was concerned with some of the reviews about missing hardware and lack of directions.  I decided to go with it based on price and thin profile and I couldn’t be happier with my decision.  I didn’t have any issues with hardware or instructions and it looks great on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Ryan Thompson
Reviews.Content: So far this has been a great product! Was going to buy a mount kit from Wal Mart for 75-100. Mounted in brick over fire place just fine. Larger (as in bulkier/heavier Phillips 47") steal at $25!

Reviews.Title: Great hardware to install your TV for less money
Reviews.Author: D. Styer
Reviews.Content: After years and its second install, these are still holding my TV on the wall. I couldn't be happier since it cost so much less than in the stores locally.

Reviews.Title: Stellar flatscreen mount at the best price around.
Reviews.Author: Eric B Vogeler
Reviews.Content: This mount has been holding up our 60" plasma for over six months now.  Couldn't be happier with the quality, with the engineering, or with the price. If you have any doubts about its construction or durability, don't.So long as you don't try to swing from your television or use this as a pull-up bar, it will handle your TV without a hitch.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Cybrex
Reviews.Content: A very nice an simple mounting bracket for the TV.  Recently purchased a Samsung 50" LED and this bracket holds the TV on the wall with no problem at all.  The TV is maybe 35 pounds so well within the limits.  One thing to note is that this bracket holds the TV very close the wall, which is what I was looking for, but keep in mind if you have any connections in the back of the TV (i.e. HDMI, Network cables) especially towards the bottom they will be very snug.  Overall though for the price I recommend it, very simple and seems to be solid construction.

Reviews.Title: buy,  buy,  buy!
Reviews.Author: Calvin Arrington
Reviews.Content: Really sturdy mount. Makes TV look like its hanging up directly on the wall. Awesome product.  Holds my 60 inch with ease.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: William Lovett "W. G. L"
Reviews.Content: Great Buy for the Money!  Great Value, Functional and Practical. I would definitely recommend to a Friends and Family, Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great Price + Value + HDMI CABLE
Reviews.Author: P. Ferrer "Sir Snacks Alot"
Reviews.Content: Great stand for the price and came with a high end HDMI cable that is probably a lot better then the stand itself.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal!
Reviews.Author: Michael Hardy
Reviews.Content: This mount package is a great value.  The only downfall is you have to assemble the mount with the included tiny screws.  If you are just buying one then its not that big of a deal. But if you are an installer like me, then it is very time consuming.  I would recommend prepping the mounts the day prior to installation.  The HDMI cable is very good quality,

Reviews.Title: Great bargain.
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV mount. It is very basic and externally low priced compared to other mounts. I had to re-mount it with a couple of 2X4s. This will need done if most of your cabling ports are in the back and not on the side. As is there was not enough clearance and my cables were damaged. (my fault, I saw the problem and did not re-mount at the time.

Reviews.Title: Simple mount at a great price
Reviews.Author: PeterD
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount does the job at a great price. Love the fact that it includes a 10ft long HDMI cord. Assembly is straightforward, as is the actual mounting to the wall.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: good product I really like this a lot I think is a good quality product for the money and price

Reviews.Title: Easy install and it works as described.
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Works as described. Looks like picture. Easy installation. Liked this product. Took me 20 minutes to put the whole thing together.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but there are better mounts for just a couple bucks more.....
Reviews.Author: jason alpaugh
Reviews.Content: seemed a little on the lightweight side to me, but mounted fine and so far......is holding tv nicely. Like that the cable was included.

Reviews.Title: Works well enough
Reviews.Author: Deb D
Reviews.Content: Easy enough to install and does the job of holding the T.V.  again this was a gift but they had no complaints about the item.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Barbara Mack
Reviews.Content: It is sturdy and holds my tv in place very strong. For each room I buy this sturdy Cheetah Mount.

Reviews.Title: A great product, amazing price.
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: I've purchased mounts that did less and cost more. I greatly appreciate the two levels that came with this mount. It takes so much hassle out of installation. The design is minimalist, but it's exactly what I needed. The viewing angle adjustment is great and allows for some space behind the tv to store all the cables without showing. The mount is a flush mount and does not protrude from the wall very much at all. Buy this mount you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great mount and helpful add-ons
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This has become my #1 tv mount.  I have 2 of these now and they were both fairly easy to mount.  One holds a 55" and the other a 40".  I was able to pull the 40" off the wall and place it back on a stand for the "NFL Sunday Experience" without removing the brackets from the back.  I typically use a 4' level when mounting just to make sure nothing funny happens.  The small levels that are included appear to be well made and actually level (I placed it on a level surface and flipped it upside down and it was still showing level).

Reviews.Title: Good product, great price
Reviews.Author: Techguy
Reviews.Content: Great mount for the price! The cable it came with was better then the installation! Nice and close to the wall. Id buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Price on a Mount that saved my living space!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Nimrick
Reviews.Content: Super deal on a mount that transformed out living space!!!!! It took about 3 hours to install, but that had to do with our fireplace, not so much the mount!!! Small price to pay for a beautiful living room!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65-Inch...
Reviews.Author: DCfromtehburg
Reviews.Content: Great TV mount. Needed a mount to hang my 55 inch TV above the fire place and read the reviews on this and made my purchase. The mount was easy to assemble and it has a nice feature which allows the TV to tilt.

Reviews.Title: The built in level isn't mounted correctly, so don't trust it!
Reviews.Author: Bevoduz "bevoduz"
Reviews.Content: The mount itself is great, easy to use, etc... However, the level that's built into the unit isn't level!  I'm going to upload a picture showing what I mean.  After getting it securely mounted to a BRICK wall, which required a bit more than just screwing into studs, I was very upset to see the tv hanging crooked.  Unfortunately I forgot about this and when I moved to a new house and remounted it, I had to adjust it again!  Don't follow in my footsteps, don't use their level!

Reviews.Title: great deal, very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Miguel Vela
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount cuz of the price. You cant beat that price in a store. It does require a little assembly but doesnt take but a minute. And even though it might seem flimsy when you assemble it, it is sturdy as a rock once you mount it up. And it has a locking screws in the back to hold it in place so it cant be knocked off the mount, and even makes it alot harder to steal. Plus it comes with a free hdmi cable, and even though its not a more expensive cable like the monster cables I like to use, I hooked it up and it works great. Even a cheap cable cost about ten bucks. Here you get a mount and a cable for 25 bucks. That is a hell of a deal. Very happy with this purchase. And delivery was only five days

Reviews.Title: Good product. Great price. Keeping it simple.
Reviews.Author: Drew Scogin
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Very sturdy. Fairly easy to assemble. Mounted a 46" LED Samsung slim TV to the wall. The two levels included came in handy.

Reviews.Title: Great mount- easy instructions
Reviews.Author: Aimee Oakes
Reviews.Content: This wall mount came with easy to read and follow instructions and different types of screws depending on type of wall you have. In about an hour, our 60 inch TV was hanged on the wall and we've had no problems since.

Reviews.Title: love both of my cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: Always love the Cheetah mounts very easy to put up and super durable. Awesome product and cheap price too! I know cheaper isn't always better but the Cheetah mounts are very reliable and I have 2 55" tvs mounted with Cheetah mounts.

Reviews.Title: Quality Mount
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Chapman Jr
Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations...Quality merchandise..Arrived in timely manner....Extra screws were added ......Very easy set-up.....I would reccomend it  to anyone who wants a good bargain.

Reviews.Title: Perfect mount, perfect price.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This mount is great. I hung an old heavy 51" plasma on it before upgrading to a lighter new model. I anchored it into brick above the fireplace and never had any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for that new flatscreen you just bought!!
Reviews.Author: AnalogElvis "Analogelvis"
Reviews.Content: For the price this is the best bang for your buck! High quality and very easy setup. I bought two and both have worked out fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic and easy. Small issue with tilt
Reviews.Author: pearcoop
Reviews.Content: The item comes with everything you need. It's solid and very sturdy.The one negative thing is the tilt adjustment. Other than taking a measuring tape from the back of the tv to the mount you really can't tell if both sides are equal. In other words one side may have a tilt of 5 degrees and the other side can easily be some other degree.Other than that fantastic and very easy set up

Reviews.Title: great value and strong
Reviews.Author: B. Kellman "Woodshop Teacher"
Reviews.Content: It took about 1 hour to put together and install. I knew where studs were so that saved time.  For larger TVs you need 2 people to lift and mount.  Seems very good especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount for the money - "Assembly required"
Reviews.Author: cthiggin
Reviews.Content: Very nice larger mount.  Only downside for me was it required tedious assembly - but, still very nice. Good price.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, but instructions are vague
Reviews.Author: A. COLLEY
Reviews.Content: Instructions were a little vague, but I managed to get it put together and mounted on the wall in about 30 minutes. It is holding up an older 100lb plasma TV without any problems.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: David Paretti
Reviews.Content: Simple, cheap, and well built. I recommend it to everyone that is looking for a flat screen mount. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Cheap... no tilt from stripped screw
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Cheap, easy to put up. The tilt feature did not work.the screw to loosen it into tilting stripped on the first try. Works well enough...

Reviews.Title: Strong, Durable, and cheap!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Carter
Reviews.Content: Very glad I listened to others advice and didn't spend a fortune on a mount. This mount has held my 60 inch Samsung without issue. Installation is simple and straightforward, and the mounts are a strong metal. I did not buy different screws either. We moved, and uninstalling the mount and installing at a new house was simple. Highly recommend if you are on the fence. Do not waste your money on the overpriced mounts that turn and bend if all you need is to simply put your 50" plus tv up on the wall.

Reviews.Title: As designed
Reviews.Author: hector j barreto
Reviews.Content: Not much is needed to hold the TV to the wall so I didnt want to spend alot. Works great!

Reviews.Title: Easy value choice.
Reviews.Author: I. Helgens "Uber Dork"
Reviews.Content: Minimal instructions, but not really necessary.  Take a long look at the pictures on the box and you'll easily see how this goes together.  This mounted easily to one of my medium size Vizio LCD units and I have no question about its ability to hold the TV without issues.  The HDMI cable included is of a questionable color if you're looking to clean up your tv setup and the included level is no frills and appeared to be effective.

Reviews.Title: Nice Mount
Reviews.Author: Hmmm
Reviews.Content: Affordable mount that holds my TV in place. Never tugged on it but trust the TV is secure in the wall. Only problem with this unit is it sticks out about half a inch on the top of my 40 inch but other then that it is perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Great, durable product for the money
Reviews.Author: Jsteen
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Easy to install. Easy directions and very durable. Does exactly what is designed to do. Not much more to say

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Hold Fast
Reviews.Content: Why spend $$$$ at Best buy when the Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook works just as good for a fraction of the price

Reviews.Title: Don't buy anything else
Reviews.Author: Kastertroy
Reviews.Content: Awesome mount!!  For the price it cant be beat.  Lets face it, a mount is a mount, I've owned plenty and they're all the same so there is never a need to waste your money paying outrageous prices at BestBuy, Target, etc...  and the fact that this unit comes with an ultra durable long HDMI cable for free is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT pay more for a mount!
Reviews.Author: ahoffoss
Reviews.Content: I've installed hundreds of TV's over the years.  Way back when the mounts alone were $300-$400 each.  These are without a doubt the very best mounts you can get for the price!  There is no reason to spend any more on a mount because it can't do any more than this one can!  Excellent product for an even more excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount and awesome deal.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great Mount with all possible screws and combinations. TV looks great being so close to wall. The instructions were simple to follow. Although, now I wish I had bought the mount that was a little flexible, and you could change the TV's direction.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: micah
Reviews.Content: It was awesome, I love that it came with an HDMI cord. I also loved that the anchors for the wall were included

Reviews.Title: CHEAP
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: kind of Cheap. You get what you pay for. I would not recommend this product. don't waste your money. Your welcome

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: D. Patel
Reviews.Content: Easy to Installation & Very Strong Mounts & easily read instruction & follow. for installation it take 30 min very strong

Reviews.Title: Great mount, love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin Buskirk
Reviews.Content: Great mount!  It's inexpensive, but sturdy--I mounted a 46" Samsung LED TV to it, and it looks great and works admirably.  I ended up mounting it over the fireplace (I know, not the most popular choice in some circles) with the bolts anchored into the mortar, and it's completely solid.Pros:  - Very inexpensive!  - Sturdy  - Good down-mounting angle  - Holds the mounting angle great, for my TV (I tightened the bolts on the mounting arms a fair amount)  - Crazy thin!  Looks like there's hardly anything at all behind the TV  - The HDMI cable is a nice bonusCons:  - I found the levels, both the one you can attach to the mount during installation as well as the standalone unit, to be incorrect.  YMMV.  - Possibly a little too thin?  Some of my cables get pinched against the wall behind the TV (I bought a right-angle HDMI adapter to help with this); also there's no way to tighten the little screws at the bottom of the mounting arms that "secure" the mountAll in all, very happy with this mount, especially for the price.  Would strongly recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: worked ok.
Reviews.Author: Katherine H.
Reviews.Content: The mount its self is nice good and strong and easy to put together.  But I ran in to problems once I out the TV bars on the wall support.  The lower screws that lock them in place hit the lower bar.  I read the directions 3 or 4 times and compared all my work nothing wrong by that.  So I had to modify the upper hooks that keep it at 15' or flat.  Once every thing was fixed it worked great.  I cant give it a 5 or 4 sense i had to make modifications to it to work.

Reviews.Title: This wall mount works ok.
Reviews.Author: zoobu
Reviews.Content: I am actually using this wall mount to hold up a 65" samsung LED flat screen.  This mount is rated to hold up a 65" TV.  So far it is doing the job, however, I only have my TV hooked at the top.  I could not fasten the bottom of the TV mount because my TV is so big, and this mount is so close to the wall.So my big tv is hanging off of 2 hooks on top of the mount.  It seems stable enough.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 55in LED
Reviews.Author: jnjewlz
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed for my 55in Samsung.  Installed exactly as described.  It's sturdy and came will all required parts.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mama of 4"
Reviews.Content: I expected that we would be able to move the TV (tilt), but once it is mounted (you need to determine the angle before mounting) it is completely stationary. Otherwise it seems to be sturdy and works well. The HDMI cord seemed to be of good quality and has worked well.

Reviews.Title: Defiantly would recommend
Reviews.Author: SSS
Reviews.Content: Defiantly would recommend. The price and quality are great. The price is very competitive; Home Depot and Lowes are more expensive

Reviews.Title: very nice wall mount
Reviews.Author: clay15612
Reviews.Content: very nice wall mount for out new TV, we love that it has the tilt and will handle a TV up to 65 inches.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it!
Reviews.Author: jerryjet
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for the job it does. Solid construction. Easy to assemble and mount onto wall. One thing though, because it's only 1.3 inches from the wall you need a long Philips screwdriver to tighten the safety screws. No biggie! Why would I spend $50 more at Best Buy for basically the same thing?This is the only wall mount I've ever bought so I can't give it 5 stars without a comparison.

Reviews.Title: Good, Inexpensive mount
Reviews.Author: iamb0b0
Reviews.Content: This is the second one of these mounts I have purchased. Both have worked flawlessly.My only complaint would be the first one came with the frame slightly bent. However a pair of pliers quickly fixed it and I have had no issues since.This is the best deal for a quality wall mount on Amazon. I've bought Cheetah mounts cables as well and haven't had any issue.Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: BeniLoCash
Reviews.Content: Did everything exactly as it was supposed to, even came with an HDMI cord.  These are about 1/4 the price of my local hardware store.

Reviews.Title: Good only if you must have the lowest profile and no cables
Reviews.Author: M. Andrews
Reviews.Content: While this held my TV very firmly, it's actually too low profile. It was a struggle to screw in the safety screws and get any cabling up and behind my TV.Unless you're running cables through the wall directly behind the TV, I wouldn't really recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: awesome product at a reasonably price
Reviews.Author: Paul Dulac
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble and makes the room more spacious. I like it so much I bought another for the second TV

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: WNCBNL
Reviews.Content: Very nice mount for the price. Easy to install and looks good. Buyers should be aware that they will likely need to purchase right angle adapters for cable/HDMI/optical/etc. cords.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value!
Reviews.Author: Carole Dutton
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my 55" LG flat screen mounted above the fireplace.  Very secure, stable, and well-made!  This is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: mememe
Reviews.Content: I rate this item a five star because it is awesome. It was easy to install and even easier to mount the 50" tv. Not to mention how discrete and cheap it is. The only thing is that when i used the leveler to make sure it was evenly set it ended up being a bit cricket, but the product is great.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy enough
Reviews.Author: Juan Magsalin
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised. Sturdy enough. However, for Insignia 32-inch LED TV NS-32D200NA14, the mounting screws are less than 5 inches apart, the Cheetah vertical mount hooks sit on top of the horizontal mount joints. It's a challenge to level the TV because of it. Secondly, the TV mounting screws have small heads that it requires washers to keep it from going through the mounts. There are no included washers that fits the screw heads.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: well my husband bought it last year when we bought new tv, the tv is still on the wall so im thinking this is good product, my husband lov it so much that recently he bought one for our friend... its good..

Reviews.Title: As simple as it gets
Reviews.Author: Scotch83
Reviews.Content: The Mount was everything it needed to be. The biggest challenge was getting my fat fingers behind to tighten some bolts but consider buying a 20" Phillips screw driver, that thing comes in handy sooo much for various projects. I think the longest/hardest part was removing the base from my tv and its really helpful with 2 people to mount your tv and enjoy beers with.

Reviews.Title: Connecting plate makes the mount too thick in the middle.
Reviews.Author: Whammi
Reviews.Content: The mount comes in pieces and have to be connected in the middle.  This interfered with the where the hanging brackets ended up since the spacing between brackets on my TV were fairly close together.  Had to use only one half of the mount to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Great price for Item that works
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great price, good quality, I bought this for a 30inch flat screen and it worked great. Does not turn side to side but does tilt up and down.

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount
Reviews.Author: Joshua D. Gearhart "Josh"
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount. Space was a little tight behind the TV trying to get my cables installed.  I got in contact with Cheetah Mounts about my trouble getting my cables installed and they offered to send me another mount with more clearance free of charge. As I had already installed everything, I declined, but then they offered a full refund for my troubles. I'm very pleased with the great customer service from Cheetah Mounts.

Reviews.Title: Superb Product
Reviews.Author: Ocala Man
Reviews.Content: Absolutely a terrific product.  It is easy to secure to the wall and it is even easier to secure the TV to the bracket.  I would not hesitate to recommend this product for anyone seeking an excellent wall bracket for their television set.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Shaunna
Reviews.Content: Great price -  install was a breeze - the in-store prices are ridiculous.  Just make sure you know the size and weight

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY ANOTHER OVERPRICED HDTV WALL MOUNT EVER AGAIN!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Fuller
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these mounts for a 42" HDTV LCD and a 55" HDTV LCD. The mount is very sturdy and holds both of the TVs with no sign of strain. The included HDMI cable is a great bonus as is the level. I wouldn't think anyone would dare try to install a wall mount without a level, but just in case you don't already have one then this make the purchase all that sweeter.The wall mount comes disassembled and you have to assemble the top and bottom pieces along with the side. Other than it being a minor annoyance, it was fairly easy to put together.The box also includes enough screws, nuts, and washers to fit your exact VESA mounting pattern size.Pros: Inexpensive, very sturdy and fits many different TV sizes. Free HDMI cable and level.Cons: Mildly annoying to assemble. Top holes and bottom holes don't line up, which makes mounting to a stud a little more difficult than necessary.

Reviews.Title: Jig saw puzzle
Reviews.Author: Mike Myers
Reviews.Content: Mount requires assembly prior to installing.  A little time consuming. When mount is installed it is difficult to secure bottom of bracket because mount is so tight to wall you cannot get a screwdriver behind it. I have installed several tv mounts over the years and this was just a pain.  Shipping was fast and no complaints for seller.

Reviews.Title: Easy product, great package deal.
Reviews.Author: Memphis Customer
Reviews.Content: Great product. Very sturdy mount for a good price. The one complaint I have is that the mount is two main tracks for the top and bottom (for the price, I can't complain about the quality at all). Overall, the delivery was 2 days sooner than expected and the mount hung easily. The HDMI cable was a nice added bonus.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable deal on a solid mount
Reviews.Author: ralechner
Reviews.Content: I mounted a 70lb LG plasma with this. I can't begin to say how great a design this is, very well made and easy to install. I was looking at mounts that were 2x-5x the price of this one and I am so happy to have selected this one. It's well worth the price as-is, but they throw in a quality HDMI cable and a handy bubble level. Such a deal.

Reviews.Title: Easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: A. Flores
Reviews.Content: The box had all the right parts and was easy install. The included cable and tools was also a plus.

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: katrena
Reviews.Content: I love it, I now have more space in my room. And watching tv is much better than before, Thank you

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: omar gomez ledesma
Reviews.Content: You know when I putted it on the wall and I inserted my tv was amazing, I recommend it very much

Reviews.Title: Good stuff.
Reviews.Author: Edward Morris "Ed"
Reviews.Content: Great product with easy installation.  It is well worth the money and much cheaper than you can get in a big box store.

Reviews.Title: Don't be fooled by the price!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Collins
Reviews.Content: Our Cheetah Mount is GREAT!!  Couldn't be more happier.  I read the reviews but still a bit skeptical on why it is so much cheaper than others!!  But the design works and the TV looks great!!  Thanks Cheetah Mounts!!.....oh and I bought the shelving brackets as well to hold our devices!!  AWESOME!!!  All on the wall and off the floor for under $100.00 can't beat it!!

Reviews.Title: Assembly is required....
Reviews.Author: Kevin H.
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.....  Some assembly is required with very small screws.  If you don't mind taking a little extra time, this mount works just as good as any other on the market

Reviews.Title: Priced right
Reviews.Author: Tim Kraft
Reviews.Content: Exactly as advertised. We used it to hang a 65"Samsung LED TV to a standard living room, wall. Worked perfect. Very pleased.  Good instructions and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Jay Crowder
Reviews.Content: I never believed a $25 mount would hold up my thousand dollar Samsung, but I saw how many good reviews it got and gave it a try. It worked perfectly, even though I had to use some different bolts since I have no studs where I wanted to put my television. The mount is more than worth it; you can adjust the tilt, and they give you an HDMI cable that is worth the cost of the mount. Just make sure you know how to do the minimal assembling when you get the package, and the pictures are way better than the written directions, but I was able to figure everything out. Buy it if you need a mount, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the money
Reviews.Author: BHERNDON
Reviews.Content: I definitely would still buy this over the $100+ equivalent at most stores. However, it didn't quite fit my 50" samsung tv. None of the screws/spacers that came with it were quite the right length. Pretty easy fix by using extra washers as spacers. Also, the screws are pretty cheap so they strip easily. I got them on but may never get a couple of them off!

Reviews.Title: Strong, versatile and sturdy
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: As far as I'm concerned, this is a good value.  We mounted our 50 inch TV on the wall with it and it is secure.  Be sure to follow the instructions so you mount it correctly.  It has to be mounted to studs in the wall or into concrete with special screws.  I love the fact that it tilts and that it came with the bonus cable.  The level was handy but I would suggest you use a laser level just to be sure.

Reviews.Title: good for the price but... *SEE UPDATE!*
Reviews.Author: June Butler
Reviews.Content: We ordered this because it was about $100 cheaper than others that were compatible for our type of tv, but the problem is that with our model of tv there's no way to install the safety screw. It would be nice if it held it a little bit further from the wall so we could install that. As it is, we rely on strategically place furniture to keep people from walking close to or under the tv and thus reduce the risk of it falling off.Update 11/10/2013After posting the above review, the manufacturer (Cheetah) contacted me to find out more about the issue I reported above. It turns out that the issue is that I ordered a mount that was too slim for my model of TV and I needed the APDAM2 model which was significantly more expensive. Even though this was my mistake, Cheetah sent me the correct model at no charge (2nd Day Air) and said that I could even keep the original model that I had ordered.I received the replacement mount within two days and installed with no issue. The new mount was very easy to install - even easier than the original mount even though it was physically larger. Unlike the original model I had ordered, this model comes with a scissor type mechanism that allows the TV to be pulled away from the wall and pivoted up to 130 deg and 15 deg tilt. This allows for easy access to the rear of the TV (big plus!). The mechanism collapses down to be very compact - not bulky at all.TL;DR - Cheetah contacted me after seeing my original review. Found out I had ordered the wrong mount - sent me a new one (linked below) no charge.Check it out:Cheetah Mounts Plasma LCD Flat Screen TV Articulating Full Motion Dual Arm Wall Mount Bracket For 32-65 inches

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: bronwyn klimas
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this product.  Easy to install and looks great. Would purchase more of their products.  All parts were secure.

Reviews.Title: Giving it 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Christopher Lochan
Reviews.Content: This item is great and works well. The HDMI cable included is also awesome. I would recommend for anyone. I installed mine for a 32" LED Samsung TV

Reviews.Title: Once put together, easy to hang and use
Reviews.Author: G. Hunter
Reviews.Content: Was a little tougher to put together than I thought it would be, but once put together it was fairly easy to hang.Only complaint is that it is hard to work with the cables behind the TV, but that would be the case with any Flush Mount.

Reviews.Title: Decent Mount, great price
Reviews.Author: Chris Hopkins "newcastle68"
Reviews.Content: This mount went up really well and was priced aggressively compared to what you pick up in the stores.  Recommended buy.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what i was looking for
Reviews.Author: Merle Thorne
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 32 inch Samsung lcd tv and I couldn't ask for a better product. At first when I read a few of the other reviews I was skeptical because some of them complained that it's flimsy, but I decided to go for it anyway. When I received the package and I took everything out I realized that it's actually very sturdy and not flimsy AT ALL. It's strong enough to hang a huge heavy tv with no issues. But one thing I didn't like was the instructions were a little hard to follow. Other than that everything is great, especially for that price.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but great product
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Yancey "Joseph Yancey"
Reviews.Content: This mount was very affordable and did exactly what I needed. My 46 inch TV hangs perfectly on it. I certainly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Hard to mount my Samsung 40: LCD TV
Reviews.Author: J. Park "Rafael"
Reviews.Content: After mounting the TV, it was really hard for me to connect all the cables such as video, speaker, power cords, etc. because there's no enough room between the wall and this mount.I'll probably prefer to buy any different design than this for the next time.

Reviews.Title: Good solid mount
Reviews.Author: jwmwu "j"
Reviews.Content: Overall a good mount but I wish the 2 vertical hooks come in longer with more holes for bigger screen like 55" for vertical adjustment.  It maxed out on both ends of the hook and I have no room to adjust vertically so the TV is a little bit above the niche.Follow up on Cheetamount.  I was impressed with their Customer Service and how they take their customers' feedback seriously and address the issues in a timely manner.  I received a call from them and they resolve my problem.  Great seller.  Strongly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Budget but Awesome
Reviews.Author: George A. Easton
Reviews.Content: Sure you can buy a kit at Costco or Best Buy, but it's essentially this.  If you know how to follow directions, this is a super economic option.  It comes with a wide variety of mounting hardware depending on where you're putting yours.  Essentially, you'll use 30% of the parts that they send, but I know that regardless of where i'm putting a tv, I know this kit will suffice.  My only complaint is that with our smaller tv (32 inches), you can see the horizontal bars jutting out a little.  Sure it's built for any tv size but it can look lame with a smaller tv

Reviews.Title: mounts
Reviews.Author: Debbie Richter
Reviews.Content: Great product and alot cheaper than best buy.  Easy to hang and i actually made use of the level that was included.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good mount
Reviews.Author: iAmGonzo
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a 5 star product. It comes with a HDMI cable and a level. Not only is there a separate level but there is also a level built into the bracket itself.(Good Idea) The mount is made with good quality and is easy to install. I recommend this to anyone mounting a TV.

Reviews.Title: Incredibly easy
Reviews.Author: kyle Riippa
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to set up. The hardest part was trying to get the angle. Instructions were easy to follow. I didn't even realize that there were written instructions. I just used the pictures. This product is easily the best value and worthy of 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Nice Mount!
Reviews.Author: MyReviewMyStory
Reviews.Content: This thing is very easy to install on the wall, and also easy to install on the tv.  The only trouble I had was the installation of the tv with the bracket onto the wall bracket.  With the tv weighing as much as it did, I wanted to make triple sure that the tv was on there correctly and not going to move.  The issue comes when you are trying to screw down the safety clips after the installation.  There is really almost no room to get in there.  I had to use a flex screw driver with an extended neck.Other than that, the mount is great and the price is right.  The TV looks great on the wall!

Reviews.Title: Bought these a couple of years ago..
Reviews.Author: Vienna
Reviews.Content: And they still work and hold my 46" TV with no problems whatsoever. Really happy with the purchase. I've never removed them from the wall and tried re-attaching them but considering they are made from metal that shouldn't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: TV Set Up
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: Order this for Big Screen TV at our cabin.  Worked like a charm, guys said it was easy to install and all pieces and parts were included.  We did notice once TV on the wall you need about an 18" long screw driver to tighten down some of the last screws.  All worked well and our TV room is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ifioma
Reviews.Content: The person that installed this mount said "this is a good mount because it came with the screws and cord.

Reviews.Title: Its perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: José G. Garcés Ferrer
Reviews.Content: It works great. I brought everything needed to install it. is quite sturdy and very easy to use. I recommend it 100%.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts is a really great company
Reviews.Author: Brian R Collinge
Reviews.Content: this is a well built mount.  I really liked it except that it didn't fit my 37" TV, and although it is simple to assemble and install the instructions are vague.  I left a 2 star review and Cheetah Mounts contacted me and bent over backwards to make sure that I had the proper mount for my TV.  To be clear, my TV is an off brand and the holes on the back of the tv for mounting are not standard.  This is the first wall mount I have ever purchased/installed and I was not sure how they worked.  I really should have done my homework before purchasing.  Cheetah Mounts is a great company and this is a great price for an excellent product.  I will use Cheetah Mounts for all my TV mounting needs and will recomend all of my friends do so too.

Reviews.Title: Great value, the one at Costco is $70
Reviews.Author: Gearhead
Reviews.Content: I installed this with a TV that weighs about 90 pounds. I did mount into the studs. The HDMI cable is great quality too. The level is accurate within an imperceptible amount. Come with 4 different sizes of screws to fit any TV large or small. Plastic washers to protect TV's back surface from mount.All around great product.It you have ever used LEGO's in your entire life, than these instructions are easy, ages 4-12...

Reviews.Title: Sturdy but hard to understand instructions and missing hardware
Reviews.Author: Dmitriy Zak
Reviews.Content: I brought this wall mount to mount my Sony Bravia 40" on the wall. I was impressed with the sturdy construction of this mount.It took me in total 30 minutes to get everything up on the wall and mounted.Looking through the instructions they were no help at all, Lucky I am pretty handy and was able to put in together.I was missing several pieces of hardware, lucky I had the same size nuts and bolts to replace the missing hardware.All in all I like the mount and it has held up for 4 months with no problems. I was disappointed with the missing hardware but i was able to solve the problem without having to send it back.I have already recommended this mount to several people and have installed it for a few of my friends, who also had some of the hardware missing.

Reviews.Title: Works great at very good price
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I put it outdoors on my TV under my deck--does a great job.  I recommend this to everyone. I am well satisfied
