Reviews.Title: OK TV Mount
Reviews.Author: MGBMike "MGBMike"
Reviews.Content: Bought this mount to go with a Vizio E390i-A1 39 inch TV.  The mounting screws on the TV are close together, and this makes this mount a bit awkward to install with this mount.  It might work better with another TV model.  You need to have everything installed right on the money to have it look right.  Overall not a bad mount for the price.

Reviews.Title: Might Need 90 degree HDMI & Coaxial adapters
Reviews.Author: Rockin' and Talkin'
Reviews.Content: Since the Connections on my TV are straight out the back of the television, they push right up against the wall since it hugs so close to the wall.I just ordered a couple of 90 degree adapters for both HDMI and Coaxial here on Amazon.Hope this helps save somebody else from waiting for more shipments or worse yet, going to Best Buy and paying $50 for something that I just bought on amazon for $10.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: T. Mo. "tman98"
Reviews.Content: It works and was easy to install.  Can't say much more than that!Follow directions - install frame on wall - install brackets on tv - hang tv on frame - tight a couple screws - done.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, easy & strong
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Use this to hang an older model flat screen which was quite heavy.  The screws in the back of the TV were too short to work with this hanger, but we found some from another project to use.  Once the bracket was on the TV we just lifted it into place.  Very quick & easy to hang & I love how the TV just lifts on & off the bracket so easily.

Reviews.Title: very sturdy
Reviews.Author: CM33
Reviews.Content: This mount is very sturdy, sits snug against the wall and fits our 42 inch TV just fine. Easy to install. Good product.

Reviews.Title: Great price... Great product
Reviews.Author: jshaddo
Reviews.Content: The pricing of this mount is what attracted me to this item because I had to buy 3.  The quality and simplicity is what will make me buy more.  I have installed TV's over the past few years in my home, this is by far the easiest mount to install.  It keeps the TV flush against the wall for a "low profile" look.  It can be tilted to fit your needs.Great wall mount, you don't have to look any further.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Adam S.
Reviews.Content: My tv is still on the wall.  Couldn't have hoped for any better.  Product was priced correctly and works fantastically.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Alexander Barnhart "ACBARNHART"
Reviews.Content: We hung our basement 40" TV on this unit and altho  the metals do seem VERY flimsy and I was concerned that it would eventually bend.. at 1 month of holding the TV it appears to be stable.  It does the job and was a fantastic price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: Randy "Frequent Amazon Buyer"
Reviews.Content: I mounted a 39" LED TV above our fireplace using this kit. I did get anchors from the corner Ace hardware store to make sure it was mounted firm. I never wall mounted anything heavier than a mirror before. This kit makes it easy!

Reviews.Title: Assembly Required
Reviews.Author: Bill Williams
Reviews.Content: You have to assemble this product only because they want to save money on packaging. It just adds 15 to 30 minutes to installation time.

Reviews.Title: Works great and looks awesome on the wall
Reviews.Author: Tufan Uzun
Reviews.Content: Put up a nice Sony 55' tv on my wall and decided to buy this guy. Came out awesome and flush.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy Design, Easy Installation, Cheap Price
Reviews.Author: William C. Lehmitz
Reviews.Content: I received my order from amazon in about 3 days and then went about putting this together.  The different parts for the mount are all labeled, which made assembly quick and easy.  The mount comes with written instructions as well as step by step pictures for assembly.  Everything fit perfectly with by LG 47LN5700 47 inch tv.  The hardest part of installing was finding the studs in my wall.  Also, the screws used for securing the mount to the wall have metric heads on them, so just make sure you have the right tool set, which would include a metric socket set and a phillips head screwdriver.  The materials are all strong, and since the mount comes with an HDMI cable too, you can't beat the value.

Reviews.Title: good for its price
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: Screws didnt even line up to put it together. Had to drill and tap it in order to get it together.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: This was great and so inexpensive.  The setup and installation was a breeze.  My 83 yr old mother and I installed it.  Great for the money!

Reviews.Title: mount
Reviews.Author: Shella P Marksberry
Reviews.Content: We purchased a 55" TV along with this mount and wasn't sure it could handle the weight.  But it mounted easily and holds the TV perfect.

Reviews.Title: My husband says its a good basic mount
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: he says its fairly easy to install and get the tv mounted on it. I am taking his word for it )

Reviews.Title: TV Ends Up Snug to Wall
Reviews.Author: Dawson
Reviews.Content: Very snug. In retrospect, I'd prefer something a bit further off the wall. For the price, this is a great mount, though.

Reviews.Title: Wall mount
Reviews.Author: Talisa Lucas
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, fancy, rich looking. Easy to assembly, only took about 20 minutes. Mounting our TV changed the entire look in bedroom.Thank You

Reviews.Title: How can you beat this deal?
Reviews.Author: TommyG513
Reviews.Content: I would have had to pay $150 in Best Buy for this, but got it for $30.  It does exactly what I wanted it to do and how can you beat that?

Reviews.Title: It is easy to mount and works great!
Reviews.Author: Jason lopez
Reviews.Content: I mounted it in about 30min with help from another person so I do not understandwhy other people find it so difficult to assemble, just follow the instructions and usecommon sense. I am using it to hold a 46" LCD. The cable and level are cheap andthey do not work properly but the mount is worth the money alone.

Reviews.Title: Steal of a deal
Reviews.Author: Michael Ortega
Reviews.Content: For $25 this thing is great! I was confused when it showed up at my door in a such a small box but it made sense when I opened the box to find that you have to assemble it from 4 individual pieces.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: eenyok
Reviews.Content: I've had this mount for about two months. It went together relatively pain free, but the bottom section is all but useless. It is nearly impossible to secure the tv to the bottom piece and I doubt it does a whole lot of good anyway.Fast forward two months, I've bought a new tv and upon installing it on the mount I realized it was slightly crooked. I pulled the tv down and spent several minutes trying to figure out why the mount was suddenly crooked. It turns out the mount itself had begun to bend.Both tvs I have used weighed around 50lbs. I'm not sure how they bent the mount, but they did and now my display is slightly crooked.  I would stray away from this mount if you plan on mounting a large television on it.

Reviews.Title: I am speachless
Reviews.Author: Garretto
Reviews.Content: This TV hanger thing is well built, easy to assemble and a beautiful addition to any room.  I like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount at an Affordable Price
Reviews.Author: SemperPaulo
Reviews.Content: So my friend purchased this mount first and recommended it to me. I needed a flush mount with limited tilt and this cheetah mount did the trick. My only real gripe with it is that you have to assemble the mount as it comes in 6 pieces (not counting the mounting brackets/arms). Most brackets don't have to be assembled like this one; they're usually cut out of one piece of metal but you'll pay more for a mount like that.The mount is pretty sturdy once assembled and screwed into the wall and it supports my older/heavier 46'' HDTV. It does the job and I couldn't be happier. If you're looking for a mount that is affordable and flush, then this one should be a contender on your list.

Reviews.Title: TV wall mount found on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Betsy L Sealy
Reviews.Content: This item came in a timely manner and with some assembly was easy to install on the wooden wall and mount the tv.  My son found a tv mount at a second hand store for $25.00 and thought he got a good deal.  This was the same price but brand new.

Reviews.Title: Perfect !
Reviews.Author: Dank241
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah Mount is excellent and for the price it can not be beat.. I got it shipped and put up the next day. It took only 30mins. It is a great sturdy product and it mounts flush to the wall perfectly. The instructions are a easy to follow. I did use my own Level though. Its been holding up my Samsung 46" Series 6 LED HDTV - UN46F6300 for about three weeks now. Well it works perfect in my bedroom and the tilt is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah APTMM2B
Reviews.Author: Michael M
Reviews.Content: If you are thinking about this mount go ahead and order it. You wont be disappointed. It is well made and very sturdy. Be aware that the distance between the top and bottom pieces is just enough to fit an outlet (receptacle).

Reviews.Title: Easy to install!
Reviews.Author: rbowers8829
Reviews.Content: This was very simple to put together and install.  Made of strong steel and very sturdy! I would recommend this product and the price is great.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Alan Z.
Reviews.Content: Great item for price. Not the best but descent quality. Wouldn't use for high end tv but great for smaller rooms.

Reviews.Title: No proble here
Reviews.Author: D. Craine
Reviews.Content: The mount listed is what I got and it was good quality and the discription listed was accurate. This was a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Great mounts
Reviews.Author: LMNOP "Lisa P"
Reviews.Content: We have now purchased four of these cheetah mounts, they're a great buy! You can't go wrong, especially for the price. Very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Buelter
Reviews.Content: This item was exactly what I needed. Quality manufacturing and my television looks great on it. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: The good reviews were right!
Reviews.Author: speechteach
Reviews.Content: This is a good/sturdy mount.  It took less than 30 minutes for set up.  Great product for the price.  We are so pleased we are buying a second and third for bedroom and home gym.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done, could be improved
Reviews.Author: Sam G.
Reviews.Content: This item does get the job done, but I had a couple issues with the design.First, let me say the item goes together very easily, you just need a screw driver.My tip... before you order this, check the stud location in the wall where you want to mount the TV.  The wall I was mounting on (in between two doors) had three studs (~25%, ~50%, ~75%).  Naturally, I want to center the TV, and the closer you can center the mount on the wall, the better off you are.  Which leads to...#1) There are no mounting holes close to the center of the bracket.  I refuse to use wall anchors and want the bracket to span two studs.  But in order to do that, I had to put the mount 2-3" off to one side or the other.  Because of where the arms mount on the TV, when I put the TV up, I need to slide it all the way to one end of the bracket to get it CLOSE to center, but I'm still off by ~1-2".  It wouldn't be noticeable on a large wall, but the TV just fits between these two doors, so it is noticeable.#2) I had a hard time increasing the angle on the arms (tried to do it before putting the TV on the wall.  I finally successfully got one arm to be at an angle, but couldn't get the other one.As I said, the mount does it's job and was pretty easy to put up, but I'll probably look for a different mount in the future (although it will be a while before I need another one).It was a bonus to get an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: This thing is strong
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: We could have hung 200 lbs on this thing.  It was easy to install on sheetrock walls and hit the 2X4 studs behind the sheetrock. The 52" TV hangs close to the wall and the tilt can be adjusted to satisfy most installation heights.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount APTMM2 B
Reviews.Author: Narrah McCoy
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. More than enough ability to hold the 65{" Panasonic TV. Adjustable angle for TV screen is nice.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: lchancey
Reviews.Content: Very sleek design! You can barely see it behind the TV. Very easy to install too. My fiance isn't the handiest and this only took him a little while to put up.

Reviews.Title: solid tv mount
Reviews.Author: iknowmatt
Reviews.Content: The price was right and the mount is solid. Set-up was fairly simple. I would buy again if I wanted to hang another tv.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install. Extremely affordable
Reviews.Author: Ovat-68
Reviews.Content: Very affordable.I had my doubts when I ordered it because of the price ...  And also when I unpacked it (it looked weak), but still gave it a try.Easy to assemble and install ... The results could not have been better: it solidly holds my brand new 42" 3D-TV... And I love the price.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for athletic department
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Harris
Reviews.Content: Purchased for School District.  I can only assume that all was okay with the purchase because I didn't hear any complaints.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great price
Reviews.Author: max corbett
Reviews.Content: Cant beat the price.  Holds up my 60" plasma tv that weighs 60lbs.  Was easy to install.  Use your own level instead of the crappy one it comes with.  Comes with hardware to mount in studs, brick and other types of wall.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these, one for the living room and one for the bedroom.  Price was more than excellent. I had a handyman install these and he did have a few issues on the installation.  Once he got through those, he installed them expeditiously. They are working great.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. I would recommend leveling your predrilled holes on the wall and ignore leveling the frame. It has ridges and bumps that make that difficult.

Reviews.Title: How is this so cheap?
Reviews.Author: C10layman
Reviews.Content: Was looking at TV stands at Target that started at 75 dollars, I did a quick Amazon search and saw this for 25.  Seriously how do they make this TV stand for only 25 dollars with a level and HDMI cable? An HDMI cable alone at best buy or target would probably cost 25 dollars.  I mounted it and it seems extremely sturdy and I actually needed another HDMI cable and the included one works great. I was very pleasantly surprised to find this TV mount!

Reviews.Title: Good as a mounting bracket. Difficult to assemble
Reviews.Author: Jason T. Hart "Jason Hart"
Reviews.Content: They didn't leave enough room to easily get a screwdriver behind the TV after it's mounted. This makes it difficult to adjust the screws back there. Once it is installed, it's a fine mount though.

Reviews.Title: Good, sturdy design, 2 minor flaws
Reviews.Author: PKI
Reviews.Content: Wanna start out by praising Amazon's customer service policy. The first package never reached me and Amazon refunded in 3 days. I re-ordered the same item, this time it reached me fine.Pros:Simplistic, elegant design.SturdyEasy to assembleComes with all the bolts, screws, washers and spacers you'll need, and more.Cons:HDMI Cable isnt small profile, if ur TV is thick (Plasma/LCD), the HDMI cable will push the TV slightly forward if the ports are at the back. May need to buy a right angle adapter.Flaws:The angular tilt on both arms are difficult to get right without a protractor. Why is this critical - If you get one arm tilting at a bigger angle than the other, ure essentially distributing the weight of the TV unevenly on the back frame, hence the wall. Its not going to bring your TV down but if you're looking for max precision, I recommend you get a protractor before adjusting the angle.The other flaw IMO, was the length of the safety bolt. With bigger TVs, the distance from the lower end of the TV to the safety bolt is too long, and if you have a Plasma/LCD TV, there's virtually no gap between the wall and TV (the bottom frame of the TV rests on the wall if you tilt around 7 degrees downward). The predicament here is that unless you have dainty hands (or a philips head screw driver with a 10inch arm length) you're struggling to snake back and get to the safety bolt. Obviously the safety bolt can't be fastened before you put the TV on the wall.Tips:The back arms are pretty easy to mount (highly recommend using spacers so you dont thread the bolts too deep into the TV).Use a protractor to adjust TV angleMount the wall piece lower, and move the TV higher using the arms, as opposed to the other way round.Get a REALLY long philips head screw driver for the safety boltSummary:Great TV mount, cheap and easy to install. Requires some planning and maybe putting the TV up a couple of times before you get the correct angle and position. Definitely worth the price, and a fun DIY project.If your TV ports are on the back surface(i.e. not on the side panes), try getting a bigger tilt to make some space between the wall and TV to fit the HDMI cable heads.Highly recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value, easy to install
Reviews.Author: J. Bewley
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount....just put it up with a new 65inch plasma.....no problems at all....comes with all needed hardware and directions are relatively clear..

Reviews.Title: Great low-profile tv mount.
Reviews.Author: Kym Horn
Reviews.Content: This worked great for our 39" flay screen TV. Low profile, but you can still tilt it. It seemed to be okay to install and I'm confident that it is durable to hold the TV. Some other styles appear to flimsy, but this is a good design. Inexpensive at $25 and comes with a level and HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0012S4APK/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_5
Reviews.Author: shae/paul
Reviews.Content: i love love love it! very easy to install. strong sturdy and i trust it. i have 2 kids and im not worried about it falling. it comes with every thing you need for it to work!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: mary humphries
Reviews.Content: Great product, have bought 2 and very impressed! Much cheaper than buying at store and works just as good. Will definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: rob park
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble great price and does the job mounted my 60 inch great. Does what all the others do at a price that can't be beat

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Joe Green "tire guy"
Reviews.Content: I recently installed a wall mount for a friend that he purchased locally for more than twice what I paid for the Cheetah.  There is very little difference between the two products and I have no fear of the Cheetah mount failing.  The free cable is a bonus as well.

Reviews.Title: Quality piece.
Reviews.Author: Susan Carden
Reviews.Content: Mount went together really easy and found the studs and mount it bolted up easy enough .The only issue I had was trying to get those small screws to turn to keep the tv from coming up and /or loose.Had to use like a 8in 1/4 extension with a screwdriver bit to get them to turn.

Reviews.Title: cheetah mount  APTMM2B Flush tilt dual hook(1.3" from wall)flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: Magaly Hayes
Reviews.Content: It came as advertized, with all the parts. The only thing is  I have not have time to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv Mount!
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: This mount is holding my 46' Samsung LED flat screen tv, i thought it was going to be cheap since i seen several other tv mounts more expensive but this mount is great. Does exactly what i wanted and feels like a quality product that i can trust with my $1000+ tv. Even has a small level installed in the middle of the mount which makes installing your tv really easy. I installed it myself with no experience at all and watching a simple youtube tuturioul video, the only hard part is finding the studs in the wall but i managed. Unless your looking for a special kind of mount that swivels in all directtions, buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Paul Lambert
Reviews.Content: Had to put it together and the directions are no help.Picture shows it one way and it does not work,had to take apart and reverse top of frame. Once put together right it worked fine and very good value.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, a bit wide
Reviews.Author: Mattias R Cape
Reviews.Content: As advertised, very easy to set up, great directions, and holds the TV up just fine. The frame is as wide as my TV (32"), so it is visible on the wall when viewing from the sides. Having a narrower frame would have been better for me, but all in all great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: dc
Reviews.Content: As other reviews point out, the directions are hard to understand. Look at the pictures closely and you will be okay. For $25 shipped with a ten foot cord it is a great value. I like the way it is as close as possible to the wall as well; some mounts stick out several inches which looks sloppy.

Reviews.Title: good mount for 40" tv
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: Product came exactly as described. Easy installation. Bracket was strong is exactly what I wanted. Fyi if you need to change the angle of the mounted tv you have to take the tv off the mount change the angle and re place tv. No big deal for me i keep the viewing angle the same all the time. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great wall T.V. mount
Reviews.Author: Edwin Echevarria
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and holds perfectly. I like the secure clip's that makes sure the T.V. will not accidentally fall.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but sturdy
Reviews.Author: Bill R.
Reviews.Content: Can't go wrong here - cheaper then almost any other wall mounts but very sturdy.  I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brandie Lee Friedrich "Brandie"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this purchase all the way around.  I was a little skeptical, but after reading other peoples reviews, I decided to go on an buy it.  A guy friend of mine had it installed in about 30 minutes and it has worked like a champ!

Reviews.Title: Cheeta Mounts are great
Reviews.Author: shanedh22
Reviews.Content: I only buy cheataa mounts and I have never had any issues I have tvs from 19" to 65" mounted with these and have never once had an issue. Only problem I have ever had is 1 of my HDMI cables did not work but that was no big deal to me.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: William J. Gunther
Reviews.Content: Works great, holds up my 60lbs TV. Just be sure to tighten the tilt adjustment or it will tilt more on its own. Had to take mine down and fix that because it moved the first time. No idea why you would want to spend more money unless you needed articulation.Needs to be mounted to wall studs!Included HDMI cable works great, supports 3D playback.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy for Westinhouse TVs ~40"
Reviews.Author: Paula Ferreira
Reviews.Content: Does not fit properly with my Westinghouse TV because it prevented power and HDMI wires from being inserted into TV back.

Reviews.Title: Nice buy
Reviews.Author: Paolo Monaco
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be just for inclined position but it works perfect for flat as well. Easy to put together.

Reviews.Title: Great Wall tv rack
Reviews.Author: Keith A Peterson
Reviews.Content: 1/4 the cost of retail.  easy to install, sturdy construction, easy to hang the television, the holes easily aligned with the Visio tv i mounted on the wall.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Michaela Gordon
Reviews.Content: very great product. love that they give you a free hdmi cable. seems to be a great quality product even for the price. will definitely recommend this

Reviews.Title: Great Bracket
Reviews.Author: Rocky
Reviews.Content: The bracket works great, the included HDMI cable was needed for the extra length. My 60" Sharp panel is mounted and seems secure.The safety lock does not seem practical though, I could not get my arm back there to tighten it up.

Reviews.Title: Easy!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Works well and is easy to adjust my husband can easily put our 55in tv up on the mount and adjust as needed

Reviews.Title: mounting 46inch tv
Reviews.Author: baljit billing
Reviews.Content: cheap  but not strong  holds tv and  is shakey appears as it is going to come appart will suit 40inch or less

Reviews.Title: Difficult to assemble
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Does the job but far more difficult to assemble. need an extremely long philips screw driver to tighten botttom locking screws andtilt screws after installation.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Lindy Snyder
Reviews.Content: Finaly got the tv on the wall no more big bulky tv stand. Very easy to install only took us less then 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Kari Walker
Reviews.Content: I thought this went together brillantly.  The mount fit perfectly on our 46" TV.  Once everything was up we slid the TV to the center of the space.  It's very strong.  Yes, there is lots of bolts, spacers, etc leftover only because they send you a ton to cover the multitude of different type of TVs out there.  The HDMI cable is very long so it will hook into the tv go through wall and up to the BluRay player.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: evannever
Reviews.Content: Easy installation, quality hardware. Holds TV to the wall securely. Extremely similar to $60 mounts from big box stores for less than half the price. Ordered a second one for another room.

Reviews.Title: Does it purpose
Reviews.Author: Jason T. Dameron "Shaggy"
Reviews.Content: It has a poor design, it is REALLY hard to install the cables after you have installed the TV, and I have NO CLUE how you are supposed to tighten the mounting brackets once the TV is installed, as per the directions.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount
Reviews.Author: R. Woodlee
Reviews.Content: I bought this a couple of months ago and installed my 42 inch LG tv with it. The instructions were easy to follow and all the parts were included. I highly recommend this wall mount. I would buy this one again if I needed to mount another tv.

Reviews.Title: Easy assembly, easy to install
Reviews.Author: Susan M Bryant
Reviews.Content: Got it, followed the directions, done. Easy. Our TV is a 46' and this is perfect! It hangs on the walkout for easy access to the back of the TV! Don't spend $300 at the store.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy to assemble.
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: Not as difficult to mount as most reviews said. My son glanced at the instructions and illustrations for a quick 2 minutes and he had it up on the wall in 30 min. The hardest part was finding the studs in the wall. I'm ordering three more for our other flat screens in our home. Great buy!!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: MoJo
Reviews.Content: Solid mount.  Easy to follow instructions and easy to install.  Used on 40 inch LCD TV.  HDMI cable is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit, like the accessories......Seems to be holding up great
Reviews.Author: Manzo
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Unit is holding up well.  The cable was nice but would like to see a 90 degree connection as the TV is very close to the wall.Box was very small as you have to build the frame.  Seems a bit flimsy at first but it does work well and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Very sturdy product
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Selan
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy product. I bought two, one for the bedroom and one for the living room. I did have to buy seperate drywall anchors because the placement in the living room was not over studs - but that was for more security and peace of mind (they were $3 at Home Depot). I would definitly reccomend this product - suited my 47 in TVs perfectly!

Reviews.Title: For the price, can't beat it.
Reviews.Author: Ivan Ruvolo
Reviews.Content: No complaints here. I don't have much else to say except all the other reviews were what persuaded me to grab this mount. Works great, especially for the price, since I would've paid 3x as much at a retail store for a mount with less quality.The included HDMI cable is a nice little throw in too.

Reviews.Title: Great bracket
Reviews.Author: MKS
Reviews.Content: I've installed two of these so far, and they're insanely simple to mount.  The spacing allows for the cable holes and outlets to pass through the center and the clip mount is just super handy.  One of the best mounts I've used, especially at the price.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: fibi59
Reviews.Content: These work well with our 32 inch TV in the bedroom. No problems and its a nice mount that is easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install, and quite study.
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: This TV mount was very easy to install.  Extremely sturccomenddy, no fears of the TV falling off the wall.  I would recommend it to anybody with a  to install it.drill and srew driver.  Thats all you'll need to install it.

Reviews.Title: Very good product for this price. Installed was easy for a novice.
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Very good product for this price. Installed was easy for a novice. Make sure you install it to the studs behind sheet rock wall. Product came in with sufficient hard wares. It was a bit flimsy but it is OK for 46 inches Samsung TV. Only two lock screws on the bottom were hard to install without a very long screw driver.

Reviews.Title: flat screen mount
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: perfect.  best buy $100 - costco $68 - amazon $25.  go figure. works well. easy assembly and installation. all that was needed for a 32' flat screen

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: MDeezy
Reviews.Content: Straight forward. It worked good just as expected. Leaves some good room behind the tv. Sturdy, strong, easy to install. I had to drill a new hole thru the bracket since it wasn't spaced out far enough to meet the stud in the wall but I'm installing it myself so whats' another couple mins to drill a new hole and mount.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: shannon madison
Reviews.Content: seems to hold the 50" tv up great. Only downside is adjusting the angle and any movement after installed is difficult with a large tv.

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Great for the price.  Instructions could be better, but overall great product especially for the price.  I didn't even have to buy additional screws.  Product came with extra screws.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: r. storteboom
Reviews.Content: Great price compared to my local Wal-Mart and Best buy. Thought I would give it a shot because it was < half the price of the wall mounts at Wal-Mart and Best Buy. It was easy to assemble and install. TV looks great hanging on my wall!

Reviews.Title: Good bracket for the money
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bracket for my 55" because the other ones available seemed to be way too much money for what they do. This one works great and is priced appropriately.

Reviews.Title: A must have for mounting.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Lopez
Reviews.Content: Cheat Mounts are without a doubt a great product, this one in particular is no exception. A bonus is the HDMI wire that's included.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: Mr. GM
Reviews.Content: The mount was perfect easy to mount, instructions are easy to read and all the equipment that came with it was a great specially the level it was very useful. The free HDMI cable was as well very use didn't have to shop around for it, it was included with the kit.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Franz
Reviews.Content: Came with everything, plus. Went together well, assemble the four parts of the wall mount first, use one of the two levels after locating studs and bolt it up. Then you just screw the two rails to the TV and hang it on the wall mount and tighten the screwson the bottom of each rail. Awesome setup!

Reviews.Title: Nice Mount
Reviews.Author: Nicholas D. Haake
Reviews.Content: This works great, holding my older 65 pound Sony flat panel on the wall with no problems. Installation was a snap, with the right tools.

Reviews.Title: it is mounted on my wall
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: I have yet to mount my tv I have a center speaker mount bracket in the way as soon as I remount I will let you know more

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Reid
Reviews.Content: This was easy to mount.  Very inexpensive.  So worth the money.  Exactlly as pictured. I would order again and actually ordered a second for another tv.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Steve Caruso
Reviews.Content: I purchased a similar mounting kit at Best Buy for a different TV, and it cost 4x as much, yet this kit was pretty much the same.  Good quality, and plenty of hardware that will work with pretty much any TV.  Instructions with pictures and WORDS so if you like to read what to do, this is for you.  Plus I have seen the cable that is included in the kit at Best But for about 2x what this whole kit costs.

Reviews.Title: worked fine, holding my tv up!
Reviews.Author: Dillon Shaw
Reviews.Content: This installed easily and fits well. I had no problems with it and I actually bought another one to hold another tv up in my other bedroom. Good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great no-frills mount...would definitely buy again!
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: Not much material-wise, but, works great an easy to assemble.  The only reason I didn't give the mount 5 stars is that I have used 3 of these mounts on 3 different brand TVs and not once has the included hardware (to attach the mount to the TV) fit; I have always had to buy different screws.  Despite the hardware snags I would definitely purchase this mount again and would recommend it to anyone.  On a related note, the included HDMI cable works great.  Go ahead and throw away the included level and use your own...

Reviews.Title: Seems solid, but not a great fit
Reviews.Author: Brian Perry Mcnamara
Reviews.Content: The mount is solid and will work well.  My only issue is that I mounted my TV over a fireplace mantle.  The mount is not quite wide enough that I was able to perfectly center the TV in the middle of my mantle.I am bolted into 2 studs, but the bolts on one stud are all the way near the middle of the wall mount bracket.  Then I had to slide the TV all the way to the opposite side so that it centered on the mantle.  If it was just a little wider, I'd be able to slide the TV farther over  on the bracket and it could be perfectly centered.  As it is, it's not noticeably off and I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price!
Reviews.Author: BBuju "BB"
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable price for a unit that has such a wide range of TV size mounting capability.  Unit is slim and doesn't push the TV off the wall much.  Also has 2 locking screw for safety.  Mounted mine last week.  Its not the easiest unit to put up due to the fact that the wall bracket has to be assembled together in order for you to mount to the wall. The instructions are well laid out with accurate diagrams. The HDMI cable and bubble level are nice pluses. Wound recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: great mount easy to install
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Williams
Reviews.Content: This mount works great and was easy for me to install, tv fit fine. Will be buying another soon for another room

Reviews.Title: No Problems
Reviews.Author: Paul Randall
Reviews.Content: Feel the same as many of the other reviews.  So far, so good.  No issues and no complaints.  Would recommend it for the price.

Reviews.Title: nice fixed mount for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Nate "Nate"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice mount for what it is.  It really is difficult to get the TV to finish perfectly level though.  The she during screws are difficult to get to with the TV on the hanger.  If either bracket isn't at the same angle as the other the TV will look crooked.  Once all aligned however it suits its purpose.  I definitely wouldn't recommend this product if you wanted to frequently pivot the TV up and down however.  This is more suitable for fixed mounting

Reviews.Title: Great product..with great price.
Reviews.Author: Ibe
Reviews.Content: It fit perfect for my tv..the price also was great..what a nice combo..nice job cheetah!!if your thinking about it..stop thinking and make the purchase.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive and sturdy.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very inexpensive and sturdy. Was easy to mount and is very close to the wall. Was a little tricky to get it inclined. Seems to be holding my 52" Sony just fine. Very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it for the price
Reviews.Author: miked
Reviews.Content: This is a cheaply priced product...it is made with thin metal.  However, installed correctly it is more than capable of holding the weight of a flat screen monitor.  I have a 40lb Plasma. Make sure it is firmly attached to the wall (through studs!) and center the monitor on the mount.  The weight of the monitor should be evenly distributed on the mount.

Reviews.Title: Love This Product
Reviews.Author: Gregory E Busby
Reviews.Content: This mount was so easy to put together and install that my friend and I had it put together and TV on the wall in about 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: The assembly was very straight forward except when it came to putting the brackets that hold wall mounts together. Lets just say they don't fit. The level that comes in the box, throw it away. For the price, It works!

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was very Easy to assemble. Well worth it and a Great price. Even comes with a level for perfect mounting.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Bob Winke
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv bracket. Great price and works great. This is the 4th one I bought and all work perfectly. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for great price
Reviews.Author: Andres Echevarria
Reviews.Content: This mount is easy to install, sturdy and looks great.  The packaged HDMI cable and level are a nice bonus.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: security
Reviews.Author: Snoopy
Reviews.Content: If you mount your television on it properly it will be hard for anyone to steal it from you easily off your wall. I will buy a couple more for the rest of my flat screens.

Reviews.Title: Good for smaller tvs.
Reviews.Author: john d johnson iii
Reviews.Content: This mount would be great for a smaller tv. I used it for a 60" plasma and it was extremely difficult to get the bottom screws locked in and it will be impossible to adjust tilt angle now that the tv is on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly sturdy for such a small mount.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I hung 2 Tv's and assembled the brackets in about 2.5 hours parts are smaller and take extra tim e to put together. The hardware is good and when mounted to studs surprisingly sturdy. I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Needs to be redesigned.
Reviews.Author: The Dude
Reviews.Content: Mounting to wall hardware poor.  Screws will not tighten in the plastic. Hard to adjust angle of the TV and tighten.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: David Benson "handyman"
Reviews.Content: This mount will come with all hardware to mount to wall and comes with screws to mount to rear of your tv, It was very easy to install and the bubble level is a handy tool to have around, If you consider this comes with HDMI cable and the bubble level the mount cost almost nothing. We mounted a 50 inch lcd and it worked great for the job.

Reviews.Title: Size doesn't work for the brackets.
Reviews.Author: Alan Beebe
Reviews.Content: After putting the initial bracket together, which just like previous reviews was not easy to figure out, the brackets that mount to the TV do not fit the bracket that gets mounted to the wall.  Unfortunately, I had already drilled holes and mounted bracket to wall when this was discovered.  I can still use the bracket since it still sits there, but it can be unsafe for a bracket that is mounted lower and can be bumped since the screws that are supposed to keep this from happening are not engaged.  If the cross brakets were either mounted differently (which did not fit) or they are shortened by 1/4" each, this would fit perfectly and there would not be an issue.This does not mean it is a bad bracket, jsut that mine was incorrect made (or maybe I didn't put it together properly), but this could cause a dangerous sitation, not only for a person, but fo rthe TV as well.  It is made of good quality material and I am happy with the strength and material, just concerned about the safety of it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product...espeically for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ashleyy
Reviews.Content: We have a 60" LCD led sharp television. Weighing about 100 pounds without the stand. The mount was easy to assemble, easy to put up, and works wonderfully holding up the tv. With some of the other reviews, I was worried it wouldn't hold the weight...but it's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV...
Reviews.Author: Nick-Talla
Reviews.Content: There was no problem of installation. Like other reviews, the instruction should be improved. There are included parts (for concrete wall installation etc.) was not mentioned. I was able to figure out. The wall i installed it on has metal stud. It was kind of tricky. The included level is not very good. I have a much better one which I got from other projects for my house. My old 46" Sharp LCD (2007) is about 50-60 pounds and it seem to hold very well.

Reviews.Title: love this
Reviews.Author: katie W
Reviews.Content: i have a 32 inch lg tv and its held it up there very well. i did not install not sure hiw easy that was but i kniw its holding very well as my cat can jump on top of the tv without much movement of tv.

Reviews.Title: cheap and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Robert White
Reviews.Content: This is very easy to install and mounts very easily to the wall.  Just find the studs and you're good.  The only problem I have is the tilt adjustment needs to be done before you put on the wall but if you tilt it all the way down then it is difficult to secure the screw in the bottom to prevent the TV from sliding.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: C. Lee
Reviews.Content: This is a solid wall mount and is holding my 40" LCD well. It's an older model TV so it weighs probably around 35lbs. The wall mount was easy to install and the HDMI cable is a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Brian D Massett
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price on this item - similar mounts can go for a lot more.  I did need to get a stud finder and a laser level, but you're set if you already have those tools.  Works great!!

Reviews.Title: Would Buy Again
Reviews.Author: charleston cash 4 gold
Reviews.Content: This mount arrived very quickly!! I would buy from this seller again. This was my first wall mount that was not a full motion. It was difficult to hang and we had to use an extremely long screwdriver to reach the screws that hold one section of the mount to the other. The rest of the assembly and hanging was a breeze it was just a challenge to reach those screws.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jessica "Jess"
Reviews.Content: Heavier than I expected. Took about 2 and half hours to get it all set up. I saw similar products at Walmart for $100, so I was excited to see a mount at this price. Big pain was that you have to tighten the screws once the tv is mounted onto the wall. Pretty tough to reach the screws behind a flat screen. We had to duct tape an extra long screwdriver to reach.

Reviews.Title: Very Easy
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Had our 60 in Sharp TV up in no time. Super simple and looks great. The HDMI cable wasn't cheap feeling either. Overall very happy.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it
Reviews.Author: D. Johnson "Dr. Duck"
Reviews.Content: For $25 you get a fantastic HDMI cable and a fully functional mounting bracket!  It's not the best quality, but its good enough to hold my 60" LED without a worry from me.  Nothing fancy but it does its job, or you could spend $100 for one.  I'll buy this again,

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: buellmaineiac
Reviews.Content: Doesn't get any better.  Little qwerky to put together but everything is there to mount several different TV's.  WILL BUY ANOTHER SOON.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Ray Y. Thompson
Reviews.Content: The mount is good, takes a little work to assemble.  The HDMI cord alone makes this a good value buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: jbassett
Reviews.Content: So happy I bought this mount. Sad to say I spend over $90 on the one for our bedroom. Wasn't sure about it, seemed to good to be true, until I got it and mounted it on the wall. Rock solid!!! Don't hesitate buying it...

Reviews.Title: A good, sturdy TV wall mount!
Reviews.Author: nponch75
Reviews.Content: Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase. It's very sturdy and the price is very reasonable. It took me about a half hour to from start time to actually having my TV mounted. I would recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount- terrible HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Kyle E. Sanchez
Reviews.Content: The wall mount was pretty easy to assemble and put up. The directions were understandable and my 60" samsung TV looks great mounted. However, the HDMI cable that this comes with is cheap and already broke.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Giana
Reviews.Content: Bought for our fifty inch tv.  Works great and is easy to install.  Very strong!  Don't use the level that it comes with.  It is junk.

Reviews.Title: Good buy just need stronger screws
Reviews.Author: Alcharver Hayes
Reviews.Content: It is good buy just if you are to strong watch the screws. Don't over tightened them because they will break off. Very easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Ashley McMillan
Reviews.Content: This product is as described and works well. We were unsure if it would fit or work for our tv as it isn't a normal flat screen and is much heavier but it holds up well.

Reviews.Title: durable product and easy to install
Reviews.Author: John Tran
Reviews.Content: overall the product and assembly is really good. very easy to install. just simply hooked the TV and it is in place. THE ONLY DOWN SIDE!! is....not enough room to secure the bottom screws. To plug any wires or cables you need to unhooked the TV off the wall then hook it again....bit of a hassle. ps; wish it could tilt further.

Reviews.Title: My television hasn't fallen off the wall.
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Needed to mount a 46" Samsung television as I needed to move my television into my room when a housemate moved in with a much larger television. Hard life, huh?Why I like it: It is a very sturdy mount. Made out of thick and quality materials. Easy to put together. Price is awesome.What I don't like: Some components are difficult to get to with larger televisions. Like I think there is a screw or something you are supposed to tighten once the television is on the mount; I can't reach it. I don't think it is an issue for me as I don't live in an area that has earthquakes, and the television is sitting pretty firmly on the upper portion of the mount. Also, the back panel for outputs/inputs is very difficult to reach on the Samsung television. I have to pull the television off the wall in order to plug something into the back panel, which isn't very easy with a 46" television. Instructions are also bit screwy, but it is pretty intuitive how it is supposed to piece together, so it is just minor annoyance. As a side note, triple check to make sure the mount is level if you have a huge television! My mount was within the level range, but since the television is pretty large, it is still noticeably skewed by a tiny bit.This television mount gets a 5 star for being a sturdy mount, easy to install, and not yet having my television smash onto the ground and possibly smooshing my dog who likes lying underneath it. I docked off a star because I don't think it is designed very well for larger televisions and creates some minor inconveniences.

Reviews.Title: Good, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Nate Train "Nate Train"
Reviews.Content: I picked up this mount for my Sharp 857u 60 inch tv.After I opened the box I noticed all pieces are in plastic however there were a few locking washers loose in the box. Luckily nothing was missing.The mount has to be assembled which is pretty easy, just make sure all nuts are tight. It comes with 2 different types of levels so there's no excuse to not have it level on the wall in the end.Make sure this will fit your tv. Even though it says, "up to 65"" doesn't mean it will fit. Check the vesa on your tv. This just fit my tv as I had to use the very last hole for the screw on the brackets to fit my tv.The mount comes with a lot of bolts for different types of walls so it's really easy to attach it to the wall.Here's where I had an issue with it.There is no space below the tv once it's up. I had to use a few spacers on the brackets, but even if I used all of them I can't get underneath the tv to tighten the screws underneath that help keep the brackets secure in place on the mount itself. Even if I had a long screwdriver I still wouldn't be able to tighten them.There will always be a slight tilt so if you plan to use this mount to keep your tv flat, it might not happen and you might want to get a mount without the tilt option or one that can swing out. It might be possible with using more spacers to even the brackets out with the wall mount, but all depending on your tv, it's possible it just won't happen.It you want to change the tilt angle at a later point on a large tv without having to take the tv off of the mount good luck.A really good tip is make sure you plug in all of your cables before putting the tv on the mount.The price of the mount is great and can't be beat, but for me I think another route would have been better. If the screws that are underneath to help lock the bracket in place were easier to get to, I'd give this mount a better review. It could have been designed better in my opinion.The HDMI cable that comes with it is of pretty good quality and is a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: This is a great mount for flat mounting a TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Gregory
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, this sounded perfect for me and my setup.I used this mount to mount a 32" TV above my computer Monitor and the 15 degree angle was perfect. The mount is very easy to put together and the instructions are easy to read and understand. I can see where some people would have issues understanding the directions, but most people would be able to assembly this in 10 minutes.It holds the tv flat to the wall or at a tilt. It does not swivel or extend, but that is exactly what I needed.I am extremely happy with the quality of this mount. And would highly recommend this mount to anyone who needs to mount a TV to a wall.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat easy to install, works great
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: It took awhile to install and we managed to put some good sized holes in the wall, but after some manipulation, it has been working great for years!

Reviews.Title: Just what you need.
Reviews.Author: Geoff Williams
Reviews.Content: Actually a great mount. Only reason for four and not five stars are that you are going to need a really long screw driver to secure the bottom screws of the mount because there is no way you are fitting your hand between the wall and tv after the tv is hung. Tv hasn't fallen down yet! but it's only been a day.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Cincymom "Love my kiddos"
Reviews.Content: Great price. Nothing fancy. Tv will not fall off the wall, but it also does not give a lot of space to plug DVD player into the tv

Reviews.Title: Some Assembly Required
Reviews.Author: Michael Conrad "Movie Nut"
Reviews.Content: Altogether this seems to be a well put together.  The wall mount was a number of pieces when taking it out of the box and seemed flimsy at first but once fully assembled was very rigid.  It had a good assortment of screws to mount everything and the direction were clear and all the parts were clearly labeled.My one complaint is that it mounts very close to the wall (even with the spacers so I had to make all my connections before attaching it which is more of a problem with the TV I had.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Watts
Reviews.Content: Worth every cent - to adjust the angle you do have to dismount the tv, but I expected that at this price. The free 10ft hdmi cable was just icing on the cake and easily worth the price of the mount alone!

Reviews.Title: The tilt works, but it's a very small tilt....
Reviews.Author: Rebs
Reviews.Content: The tilt is not as much as shown in the picture. But otherwise, it works fine. It's not that easy to install, so I called Task Rabbit.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly this cheap thing is more than adequate
Reviews.Author: Pen and Teller
Reviews.Content: I have to give this thing 5 stars.  It was either a $140 rack mount from Best Buy or this super cheap alternative.  Trust me, I have a $3000 Panasonic plasma and I was scared as a mother that this wouldn't hold it up on the wall.  When the package arrived, I was like what the heck, this box can't possibly have a rack mount that can hold up my tv.  I was almost certain it wouldn't work.However, when the professional home theater installers came, they looked at the box and said, this thing is cheap, but all of our customers have been using it and it is perfectly fine.  The only problem is it is a two piece that needs to be put together.  Luckily, our installer had surprisingly worked with this very model many many times in our area.Forget what the thing is made of or how it is packaged or how it doesn't look like the rack mounts you purchase from Costco or Best Buy.  In the end, it is strong and it holds up the TV just perfectly.  If you need a different set of screws, get your butt over to Home Depot and purchase 4 screws for $4.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: josh ross
Reviews.Content: This is a great sturdy mount for the price. It was kind of difficult to hang but I am quit satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jager
Reviews.Content: Perfect for hanging my 55" flat screen on the wall.  Instructions could be done a little better, but overall for the price and quality, this product exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: I have purchase several......
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Arrington
Reviews.Content: There is nothing to dislike about this product......I use it to mount the cheapest tv that I own to the most expensive....outstanding mount....all the others are marked up for no reason....they are all serving the same ppurpose

Reviews.Title: Cheap and the best
Reviews.Author: Amir
Reviews.Content: Looked cheap but ver solid and didn't have any problem to install it. Very easy and the most good thing about it is that the mount will come will the screws that you need even it replace the one in the back of my tv which were not fit to it. I definitely recommend it for this price .

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we were looking for, for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Addison G Layfield
Reviews.Content: We ordered this and it came very quickly. I understand how some of the reviews say the directions are a bit vague, however it doesn't take long to figure out. Just make sure you have a good socket set for the bolts as a screw driver will not do. Overall a great product which we are very pleased with.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jonny Torino "Jonny"
Reviews.Content: It is very low profile-bad news very low profile.  Tough if you have to take it down when the cable guy has to check for problems.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: S. Legha
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mount few days ago and while waiting for it to be delivered, I was checking some online reviews. I don't know about those who are giving it less than 5 stars... Seriously! One guy wrote that it took him 30 minutes to assemble it and complained that the manual wasn't clear enough! Come on people!! it is all in all 6 pieces for the mount to wall frame and the 2 others for the TV. It is not "ROCKET SCIENCE"!!! The whole time I took since unboxing until powering on the TV was about 1h with time wasted here and there. I used my Galaxy S3 to locate the studs. It works very good! I had 2 screws on the studs and 4 others on the drywall. I got some good fixation kits from HomeDepot. They are rated 101lb on drywall.. My tv is about 11lb only! and I am mounting it over the chimney. So, TV installed, tilted to the max and voila... Everything is perfectly working...

Reviews.Title: Great product - Great price - Great value!
Reviews.Author: ibcruzn "Doadnshag"
Reviews.Content: Great product - Great price - Great value!  I thought at this low price the product might not be constructed very well but I was wrong.  It took a while to put together the backing but it finally came together.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Used with Samsung UN46EH6000.  Easy set up with drill and stud finder.  Good value for the price.  Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: set up sucked
Reviews.Author: hayrhea
Reviews.Content: I like it. It took all day on and off and using all my tools at least once but it's on the wall, extremely sturdy (except I didn't even bother to screw the "safety screw" in), and makes everything look cleaner. mine came with an accurate enough level and the awesome HDMI cable.  instructions are crappy but im a this-is-what-you-payed-for-deal-with-it kind of person and prefer the lower price to a tutorial. I'd rather have my tv on the table than pay $100.  I only seriously considered it when i came across it. I will not be buying another because of how intense the process of getting it in the wall was. Or, at least, my husband will be tackling the next one (and I'm more inclined with the tools than he.)

Reviews.Title: Okay not Great
Reviews.Author: Matias R. Cardiel
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on all the other reviews online.  The product is okay and does the job.  I mounted my 47" LG LCD and my only complaint is that the two locking screws at the bottom of the brackets are impossible to get to.  The TV seems stable but I been reading they are important to lock in case on any type of shaking or tremor. The extras such as the level and included HDMI cable are really what earned it the three stars. Price was average. After I ordered it I found some at same price on Groupon.

Reviews.Title: good price good product
Reviews.Author: sheng
Reviews.Content: I have a 42' Panasonic viera and its held up really well.  installation was easy once we found the studs

Reviews.Title: Great Price.
Reviews.Author: scott anderson
Reviews.Content: I use this behind my bar at my house.  The product works great but i do suggest making sure you have all the required tools to put it together.  You will need a 5mm and a 3mm drill bit along with a socket set.  I ended up having to rent some tools but it wasnt a big deal.  All in all great product for the price "I would almost think the HDMI cable included is worth more at some stores so thats a +".

Reviews.Title: Works wonderful!
Reviews.Author: 1995gt03
Reviews.Content: Works very good. I have a Vizio 42" tv and it installed without a problem. Instructions are tricky, but easily figured out without them. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Fast Cheap and Easy - my Favorite Kind
Reviews.Author: Pringette
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and I have no worries that it will hold my tv securely.  Love the HDMI cable that comes with it, too!

Reviews.Title: easy cheetah wall mount
Reviews.Author: Falex "A college professor said that he appre...
Reviews.Content: This particular mount worked even better than the flush mount model I purchased before. This was a good investment. I certainly would recommend any prospective buyers to consider this as an alternative to more expensive models.

Reviews.Title: excellent bargain
Reviews.Author: Not happy
Reviews.Content: easy to put togethere, right now it's holding up my 55 LED.  great buy includes the HMDI cable.  Can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Amy Moxley
Reviews.Content: It works well, but it was very difficult to install.  Overall I would recommend this mount for the price and quality.

Reviews.Title: Worked just fine
Reviews.Author: Mark Mitchell
Reviews.Content: It did exactly what it said it would do. Lag bolts were just fine.I mounted a 50" TV with no problems.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bush
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wall hanger for my television and it is great it was not hard to put up very simple in very sturdy I will recommend this product great price great value just great

Reviews.Title: Perfect.  Just perfect.
Reviews.Author: P. Carhart III
Reviews.Content: I fit my Samsung without any issues, it was easy to mount on the wall, the package came with just about every time of screw, washer, etc. that you'd need to mount it, heck it even came with two types of levels!  Whoever designed this and put this package together was thinking of the consumer.  Very sturdy as well, I have no concerns for the stability of my TV.WHERE WAS IT MOUNTED: On masonry, specifically a brick fireplace.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Willis
Reviews.Content: The cheetah mount was very easy to put together and mount my tv on. 50 inch Sony Bravia is now securely, and attractively, mounted on my wall.

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I have used a cheetah mount in the past before this one and liked it so much I got another.  The wall mount is high quality and includes many bolts and washers for attaching to any tv.  Instructions aren't the clearest but if you don't go into the process knowing what you are doing it's best to do more research online about how to mount a tv wall mount or let someone else do it to avoid damaging the wall.  Includes a small cheap torpedo level, which I still use, and a high quality HDMI cable.  All in all, it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rac
Reviews.Content: Great product and value, highly recommend this if you are looking for a basic TV amount. Took me about an hour to assemble and install.

Reviews.Title: I don't get it. So many positive reviews.
Reviews.Author: G. Hatos
Reviews.Content: So many satisfied customer. I am a bit puzzled. I am mechanically inclined, in other words I have usually no problem to assemble like this  wall mounted bracket. My TV is a 38" size, pretty heavy, just about the maximum weight that I am able to lift above my head. I needed a bracket that holds my TV straight, but  angles it downward. I am sure for a smaller TV this bracket would do much better, but for my TV it was difficult to install. I am also sure it did not helped that I wanted my TV pretty high just a few inches below the ceiling. I was using a small step ladder for the job. The material is OK, but I can't imagine to put a 65" TV on this bracket. Please leave me a note if anybody have used it for a 50" or larger TV. I am just very curious.The biggest problem is angling downward and still able to tightening the screws that secures the hook pat of the bracket. It is pretty much a guessing game. Depends of the TV size, for me I needed about a 18" long screwdriver that I did not have. To maximize the angle, the TV eventually touches the wall and yet that angle is actually not that much,  but then there  is no way to reach the security screws, so you can't maximize the angle, you need to leave space for the screwdriver to reach.  So the final angle that I was able to get is very small and for my convenient is not enough. For a larger TV forget the angle. My recommendation place two about 1" think wood  strip between the bracket and the wall. That way the whole thing moves inward from the wall and gives more space for the screwdriver to reach and in the same time able to gain a few more degree angle downward.  Also if you need a very long screwdriver Harbor-Freight had it and it is  pretty cheap.So, for smaller TV the bracket is good enough for the price. For around 38" TV is it much easier if two people doing the work, and do not expect much angle downward. For larger TV this bracket for my opinion is questionable, unless your TV is very light.

Reviews.Title: cannot remove TV from mount
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I cannot remove my TV from the mount. After hours of trying to no avail I have given up. Looks like the landlord will have to deal with a permanent wall TV.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect!
Reviews.Author: lwarren74
Reviews.Content: You can't get anything this good for $25.  With so many good reviews, I decided to try this as well because I didn't want to spend a fortune at my local Best Buy.  This mount came and it goes together easy.  The parts and instructions  are laid out well and labeled properly.  The first one is supporting an older and HEAVY 42" Pioneer plasma, hanging flat on the wall. I did have to go get some shorter M8 bolts, but with so many TVs you can't expect every piece of hardware to be supplied.  But the instructions tell you what size you have, so you know which size bolts to buy instead.  The second mount one is supporting a 42" Samsung LCD, hanging flat on the wall.  The level it comes with is handy, and HDMI cable seems to work fine. Both hang perfectly flat and look great.  Why would anyone pay 6 times as much for the same thing at Best Buy?

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jak8787
Reviews.Content: Works great, was easy to install, the included level was a nice touch, good price, fit the LG 52'' just fine.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The mount works great. It was easy to install. The only down side is it took a long time to ship.

Reviews.Title: does the job - why spend more?
Reviews.Author: Joe Savino
Reviews.Content: it isn't the heaviest mount, but it has enough steel to do the job, esp with a light weight LCD TV.  don't like the bright blue HDMI cable but it's mostly hidden.

Reviews.Title: Works really well, nice tilt
Reviews.Author: Mike Meyer "mwm"
Reviews.Content: This mount works really well for what it does. It comes with extra screws, and even an HDMI cable. While it's not hard to put together, the instructions are a bit slim. Checking the pictures and examining the parts for labels (like "UP") that aren't mentioned in the instructions is required to get it together. Barring that, it went together - and onto the TV - easily enough.It does mount close to the wall, which can make getting cables plugged in difficult, especially if you get the final "safety" screws in place. This seems to be an issue with all or most wall mounts, though. At least according to the reviews of other mounts, no matter how expensive.As others have noted, getting the safety screws in place is a major pain. I finally gave up on the second one - my TV isn't moving without more effort than I'm willing to give it.I'm amazed that a mount at this price point works at all, much less as well as this one does. I can put up with minor flaws that make setup a little more difficult for the savings. If I couldn't, I'd have paid someone else to install one for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price, Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: This mount is perfect.  When the HDMI cable and level are added in, you cannot beat this price anywhere. I looked. Delivery was fast and installation was super easy with easy to follow directions. I lovr this product and will buy from cheetah mounts next time I need a mount.

Reviews.Title: For the price... Amazing
Reviews.Author: DRTMUSIC
Reviews.Content: After getting screwed over from a seller here on amazon, my tv was left sitting against a wall with no brace for the main stand. So i was forced to get a mount. So i chose this one. Great piece of machinery. Very simple and if you can think on your toes, assembly is one two three. Cant go wrong with this mount, flush or tilted. Finding the stud was the hardest part

Reviews.Title: Works exactally as described
Reviews.Author: Andy P
Reviews.Content: Works as described.  Easy set up. I'm using it on a 52" tv and its working fine. There's not much side to side movement to center the tv though. I thought there would be. I had to mount it on 2x4's placed horizontally. Great product though.

Reviews.Title: Economical TV mount
Reviews.Author: ChazM
Reviews.Content: I just installed this in my son's apartment. It is a very good mount, particularly for the price. Take care not to tear open the cellphone wrappers as they are labeled. Great Wall mount for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the money
Reviews.Author: vincent guida
Reviews.Content: Plenty strong enough to mount a 55" TV.  I had to replace a small screw that broke during assembly.  If you are not handy and don't have some nuts & bolts around the house, you may want to consider a more expensive mount, but that's no guarantee it will be any better.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good mount
Reviews.Author: Bob Samp
Reviews.Content: I mounted my 40 inch widescreen sharp aquos on my wall and not really seeing any problems. THe tilt is not as much as i would have liked. I wanted it to tilt down more so it is easier to use while I sit at my desk, but it is not so bad. The mount is very cheap. Instructions are a little difficult to understand. My tv is on my wall and I do not see any problems. That's good!

Reviews.Title: The mount was great, But HDMI was broken
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: The mount was great and easy to install.  The HDMI was broken.  I had to go purchase a new HMDI, I

Reviews.Title: Great mount.
Reviews.Author: J. Deagan
Reviews.Content: Recommend purchasing. Like many other reviews have stated, this mount is inexpensive but solid quality and works great. Don't be scared

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the big screen
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. Pearson
Reviews.Content: I have a 55 inch big screen, about 4 years old. Used this to mount it on the wall. It holds something like 165 lbs. It's a killer deal for the price! you have to put it together, but hey, you want to save some bucks right? I have spend over $100 on another brand, and I actually like this one a lot better.

Reviews.Title: Make sure where you want your tv.
Reviews.Author: Shawn Martinson
Reviews.Content: Make sure where you want the center line of your TV is between two studs otherwise it is difficult to use. Also very limited cord clearance in the back. I had to buy an angled adapter plug for my HDMI cables to make them work.The Price sue is right though, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: db
Reviews.Content: worked great for me. not hard to put together.  holds my 42 inch tv with no probs.  cheap and worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Bracket for the Price
Reviews.Author: NoBlarney
Reviews.Content: This is a great bracket for a straight forward Flat Screen installation.  Other reviewers seemed to have an issue with the instructions, but if you take your time - it is really fairly foolproof . . . . and once mounted - was extremely durable.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Michael C Delaney
Reviews.Content: I found what I was looking. It came with everything I needed including the right price. What more can I say?

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: DaveEconomist1969
Reviews.Content: Relatively easy to install. Had no problems with it hanging my 55" LG 3d LED. The tilt is pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Mount
Reviews.Author: N. Reed "DesigninNikki"
Reviews.Content: This product is great! Nice materials, easy to install and holds our TV up like it's suppose to! We are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not bad but it is difficult to plug hdmi cable to the back of the TV
Reviews.Author: Chau Su
Reviews.Content: Not bad but it is difficult to plug hdmi cable to the back of the TV after the TV is mounted.

Reviews.Title: Flush mounted
Reviews.Author: Marleen McDaniel
Reviews.Content: I dont use the tilt but wanted a flush mount.  This does the job, beautifully.  Get this one.  You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: grahambr
Reviews.Content: Its a mount. It works.  Not the best mount I have had.  You do have to put together the main mount which takes more time. Again...its a mount. It works.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Rachael
Reviews.Content: We used this mount to hang our tv above our fireplace.  It is working out perfect.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great flat screen mount
Reviews.Author: nv11
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to assemble and install. It was nice to have the HDMI cable included-- it was the perfect length for what I needed. The mount is truly low profile; there is very little room behind the screen, especially at the bottom if the mount is tilted. It was difficult to tighten the bottom screws with my screen tilted to the right angle.

Reviews.Title: Great mount, for TV's less than 55"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount is AMAZING for the price. It will hold your TV on the wall, it does have the ability to angle 15 degrees; and was well thought out by the engineers. It doesn't work well in all situations= my installation.Now the issues I found (Specific to my install)60" Samsung LED TV1. I have 16" stud spacing. the problem I had- the stud was centered in the middle of the mount (No available way to secure it there first- would have made making the mount level a lot easier)2. The outputs/inputs on my TV are angled, allowing the HDMI cables an easy install. The only input/output that is not, happens to be the optical port- the mount is directly in the way. This eliminated any chance of having a 15 degree angle.For $25.00, I spent a bit of time reconfiguring the mount to work for me- it's worth it. I could have spent four times as much to have a simple install- but the TV would have been 4 inches off of the wall.Bottom line- If you have a decent brain, and a little time- this will save you money. If you have a little brain, time and money do not matter to you- pay someone to do the entire install for you.

Reviews.Title: Strurdy and inexpensive.
Reviews.Author: ScottPatrickBigness
Reviews.Content: I chose 4 stars because it was tough to put together by yourself with those little screws. I like the finished product though and hanging it was a breeze. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Consumer "Roger A"
Reviews.Content: The price was right for this TV Mount and it does the job, but I wish the manufacturer took a little time assembling it, so wouldn't have to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount
Reviews.Author: J18181818
Reviews.Content: works for my 55" LG. Easy installation, sturdy. For the price, I cannot imagine anything better than this wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook TV Mount
Reviews.Author: rburch
Reviews.Content: Mounted a SONY 46" LCD Television.  The unit seems strong enough.  Changing the tilt angle is a little challenging due to the fact that the TV is close to the wall.  I don't adjust very often so it is a good trade off for me to have the TV tight to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: J MORRIS
Reviews.Content: Have bought two of these and they are great !  Easy to install.  Why pay double the price for a mount at a retail store?  Purchased this based on the ratings and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: TV Still on Wall
Reviews.Author: Henry Lind
Reviews.Content: It has been a few weeks now and my TV hasn't fallen off yet. It was relatively easy to install, although I had to get some heavy duty drywall anchors since I couldn't fit it to my wall correctly on more than one stud. This was mainly due to a design flaw in the house, not the mount. Good mount.

Reviews.Title: quick and easy
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: Although I was hesitant to order this TV mount after seeing how inexpensive it was, I am extremely pleased with the value I got for the price. The directions were straightforward, and the installation process was quick and easy! I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great mount!
Reviews.Author: Charles Taylor
Reviews.Content: I really like this mount. It mounts the TV really close to the wall. You will need a #2 Phillips screwdriver about 18" long to be able to tighten the two screws that lock it in place.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: This product was great for the price it is not as fancy as some other models but you can't complain the HDMI cable seems to be OK quality too I expected to get something that you would find at the dallor store all and all this was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: misty lockhart
Reviews.Content: This mounting system is awesome! It had everything in it that was needed to get our T.V. up on the wall. And it is the best deal money-wise that we found anywhere especially considering you get an HDMI cord with it.

Reviews.Title: sterdy mount
Reviews.Author: johnfarcas
Reviews.Content: I would of rated it a 5 but the fact that its in 2 pieces  killed it also could not tighten the bottom secure bolts even to this day to dayother than that .

Reviews.Title: Great mount, Works as Described.
Reviews.Author: Brandy.A.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this mount to replace my Cheetah Articulating Wall Mount.  Although it was nice to swivel my TV, the articulating mount sat too far from the wall, sagged a small bit when the arm was extended and sort of ruined the look of my tv on wall.  I finally after 2 years, decided to buy this Cheetah mount instead to achieve a more "flush" mount of my Tv on the wall.  Overall, I am very pleased.  My Tv now looks like a picture on the wall.  The tilt on this mount still allows for the perfect 15 degree tilt which is great if you are placing above a fireplace or above eye level.  Couldn't be happier with my purchase.  Assembly is a little bit of a pain but still relatively easy enough.  I had my husband assemble it.  Installation was simple.  The included levels are nice.

Reviews.Title: Quality parts.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: It works! Make sure you have a "Stud finder" so you install it properly. It is worth the money. Satisfied!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Song Soo Park
