Reviews.Content: easy to assemble, very sturdy.  great instructions and what else can i say about this product.  I bought 2 for both my flat screen and had\ve no problems so far.  oh yeah it comes with a lot of nuts and bolts for your size tv plus the added leveler was a bonus

Reviews.Title: Great price and product
Reviews.Author: CHRISTIAN ORDUNA
Reviews.Content: Loved it! You can not beat the price for everything you get and very sturdy.  Used it mount an old and heavy 42" tv and it worked great.  No complaints...highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Own Two
Reviews.Author: Clinton Dullin
Reviews.Content: I had previously bought one for my bedroom TV and loved it so much I bought one for the living room TV.  The mount is very user friendly and it fit my 42' and 51" Samsungs perfectly

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit for my 60 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Trushar K Patel
Reviews.Content: I bought the 60 inch led 3d TV.I had before 40 inch one.I was worried that if i get this bigger size TV, my living room looks too small but no, after fixing TV with this wall mount, i feel that i can have bigger size TV...

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: J. Castle "ajcastle"
Reviews.Content: I don't know why anybody would pay the ridiculous prices for other wall mounts at regular stores.  These mounts are great for a fraction of the price.  I have purchased 4 Cheetah wall mounts and everyone of them perform exactly as required.  There is ample hardware included so I never have to purchase anything additional.  These wall mounts are sturdy and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Tapper
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV mount and worth so much more then the price! Buy this one and you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Sturdy mount.
Reviews.Author: Al S
Reviews.Content: This mount was inexpensive. It lived up to his expectations of being flush and having a slim profile. The only issue I had was screwing in the safety screws the bottom of the mount. I have big hands so it gave me trouble.

Reviews.Title: Good Product!
Reviews.Author: Hans Hebert
Reviews.Content: It worked very good for my 42in insignia. It was easy to put together.  feels solid. Quick installation and overall good product!

Reviews.Title: Simple, Effective, Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This mount does exactly what a TV mount should - hold a TV on the Wall!  The nice thing is that you won't have to spend $100 for a few pieces of metal to do such a simple task.  This has sturdy construction, easy mounting and includes a HDMI cable.  Hard to beat this deal for $25.  The nice thing also is that it includes a bubble level that you can attach to the wall plate for easy mounting by yourself.My only wish was for more variety in the mounting bolts.  The bolts were a little long for my Samsung TV and I had to buy some shorter ones. A very easy fix, but a little frustrating nonetheless.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. M. Goldenberg "Classic Rocker"
Reviews.Content: I really like this mount. I don't think you can beat the utility and quality for the price. Also very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: surprisingly good
Reviews.Author: Tamara Osborn
Reviews.Content: takes a few minutes to put it together which is new for me - all other wall mounts I've purchased have been at least 1 big solid frame out of the box.  This has some setup you go through prior but it works great, feels sturdy and is easy to use.  The TV looks great on the wall.OH! and don't slip the little level on centered - mine broke because the center is thicker due to the bracket and screws.  Move it a tad to the right or left and it will slip on better.  However, if you use the free external level they provided you'll be fine.Mainly I was shocked that it worked great and had the freebies like the HDMI cable.  I will buy this for my next TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: William Torres
Reviews.Content: Purchased this mount to use for my vizio 42inch plasma. The assembly could not have been easier. it even included a level and hdmi cable. This deal cant be beat

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to attach to the wall and the brackets easy to attach to the TV, only problem is it should come with better hardware for mounting but I had some hollow wall anchors that did the trick.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the $$$
Reviews.Author: Patrick A Botten
Reviews.Content: Easy to put togetherGreat instructionsNo one should pay the price of a Big Box storeIf you can get this type of product at 1/3 the cost

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Garry
Reviews.Content: Good price. Easy to install. I was nicely surprised by HDMI cable quality. I both another 3 sets for my company.

Reviews.Title: Meets my needs, but could be easier
Reviews.Author: Jason Davis
Reviews.Content: I purchased two mounts. One for my bedroom and the other for my living room.  Packaging was very good.  I love how each of the pieces is sealed and labeled in a separate pocket of the plastic bag. I found the assembly to be cumbersome due to the small screws but not terribly difficult.  I just wish it was easier to access the safety screws to lock the tv to the mount once it is on the wall.

Reviews.Title: What more do you want?
Reviews.Author: Gawdzila
Reviews.Content: We bought this mount because of all the good reviews and, even more, because it is 1/3rd to 1/4th the price of even the cheapest mounts for this size range at the likes of Best Buy, Target, or even WalMart.I was pleased with what was in the package; the stamped sheet steel is reasonably thick, the HDMI cable was good quality, and it came with all the hardware I'd need to mount it* (see addendum).  The bubble level is a little bit cheap, but it worked fine.  If you want to be extra sure, just use a measuring tape to get the floor-to-mount distance equal on both sides.While I could imagine that there are mounts that use thicker gauge metal than this, I can't fathom why you'd need it.  Once this thing was bolted to wall studs with lag bolts, it was absolutely rock-solid.  It also fits a variety of TV's with ease and it is extremely easy to take TVs on and off the wall mount.  We first used it with a smallish 32" TV.  Once we upgraded to a 55" we simply removed the rails from the back of the TV, bolted them to the back of our new TV (with the larger bolts and some spacers that came with the mount), and hung our new TV back on the frame.  It felt just as solid and sturdy with the big TV mounted as the smaller one.  I doubt I could pull the TV off the wall if I tried; I'd probably end up breaking the TV itself before the mount gave out.The bottom line is, if you want a simple wall mount, don't bother with anything more expensive than this.  Just get this one.  It is way more than strong enough, easy to mount, and even comes with an HDMI cable.  What more could you possibly want for 25 bucks?*Addendum: The hardware that came with the mount were 2" lag bolts of perfectly reasonable quality.  However, the wall I was mounting to had extra thick drywall and necessitated the purchase of extra-long lag bolts to reach the studs.  The included bolts should work for just about any standard wall but if you are having trouble bolting the mount up (or just want to be extra sure), use this easy procedure:1. Find a stud2. Get a long nail, place it on top of the stud, and start tapping it gently into the wall with a hammer.3. The nail should sink easily through drywall and meet resistance once it gets to wood.  Once that happens, pull the nail out.4. The depth that the nail sunk in tells you the thickness of your drywall.  You'll want at least 1/2" longer lag bolts than that.

Reviews.Title: great value for money
Reviews.Author: SG
Reviews.Content: I will keep it shortpros:simple and very cost effective.the additional HDMI cable was a bonuscons:instructions inadequate (i was prepared for it as I had read other reviews)no instructions for dry wall. I live in a highrise with dry wall and metal studs. This combination is not covered in instructions. If you have a similar setup, the suggested approach is to use toggle bolts. I used 3/16" bolt for my 55 inch LCD TV (weight 70 lbs). There is a fancy new toggle bolt at Home Depot which uses a smaller drill size than the one required for regular butterflyI still gave 5 stars because of the value for money

Reviews.Title: Good Quality at very good price
Reviews.Author: Joe Shepherd
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble and is perfect for hanging my new 60 inch plasma TV .Price would be double at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Does not fit VESA 100 x 100, as advertised.
Reviews.Author: maurice ferrell
Reviews.Content: Two piece top and bottom rails when attached, will not allow the brackets attached to the VESA 100 x 100 pattern om 39 inch Vizio, to hanger level.  I will use a die grinder to remove the inside hooks to gain clearance to attain a level television.  On a larger VESA pattern there should be no problem.  I is very annoying, to "make" something such as this "work".  I would return it, but it less difficult to "fix it".

Reviews.Title: Easy and solid
Reviews.Author: Teague Moore
Reviews.Content: This was a great mount and easy to install out of the box.  They supplied many options for mounting. A+

Reviews.Title: It's cheap and it works
Reviews.Author: Jaleshya Brown
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because it goes up fairly easily, works with older homes with crazy spaces between studs, and comes with an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: DL "DL"
Reviews.Content: Yes, it may appear cheap, but for $25 including a 10 ft hdmi cable, you can't go wrong.  Be aware - this sits extremely close to the wall.  the description was not lying when they said 1.3" from wall.  right angle hdmi cables are a good idea if your outlets are not recessed into the back of your tv.  However, this does the job for cheap and looks good when it's installed.On one of my TV's I had to hacksaw part of the mount because it covered some ports on the tv.  Any mount would have needed that to be done the way the back of my tv was setup....

Reviews.Title: Mount and hardware is very complete and universal. Good quality.
Reviews.Author: rick walsh
Reviews.Content: The issue I have with it is with the level that was included with the hardware package. I used it to set the mount. After I hung the TV it looked out of level to the naked eye. I put the level back on it and it read perfectly level. I turned the level around 180 degrees and it registered way out of whack. I put my own level on the mount and it was, in fact, way out of level. Throw the level they give you in the garbage and use one you can trust.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for and the best price ONLINE!!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This mount was easy to install and fit perfect with my un55es7500 samsung TV!! Amazon hasn't let me down yet!!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Tegan "iinja_nai"
Reviews.Content: This mount comes in pieces but they are easy to put together. It felt sturdy on and off the wall. I assembled and mounted the mount by myself, and my husband helped me lift our TV on to the mount. We have a Sharp Aqous 60" LCD. It weighs 98lbs, and though I was nervous about the weight, the TV is still up on the wall a week later. I would definitely order this mount again.

Reviews.Title: Be Patient During Assembly, Get Metric Wrenches, and Worth the Savings
Reviews.Author: Robb Zbierski
Reviews.Content: Was a bit skeptical yet cautiously optimistic about this mount.  I was mostly right and it still exceeded my expectations.  Assembly was a bit tedious and time consuming but one the mount itself was assembled, my TV was mounted and ridiculously secure in 4 mins.Be sure to have access to metric wrenches in order to assemble it.

Reviews.Title: MET MY EXPECTATIONS!
Reviews.Author: TEA Party Patriot # 3 MIL
Reviews.Content: Interesting that one has to bolt together the two horizontal spars before assembling the components, but nonetheless, it performed admirably. Slim and sleek, just the way a flat screen should look on a wall. Like the Cheetah mount very well -- will probably purchase another for the guest bedroom.

Reviews.Title: good mount
Reviews.Author: sailplane
Reviews.Content: all parts included, but need to assemble the frame (minor hassle).  Works well.  Supports 32" LED TV well.  Good price

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, great value for the price
Reviews.Author: RabMarf
Reviews.Content: Mount works well as advertised. I didn't give it 5 stars for the following: (1) require some assembly (not that big of a deal but the directions are not great) and (2) they did not have the correct size screws to screw the mount to the back of the TV. These were easily picked up at HomeDepot... so not a deal breaker.  Overall, worked as advertised. Great value compared to other mounts and i would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Chuck L.
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize how low profile it was, and I was lucky to have 90 degree HDMI and power cable for the back!  It was very easy to set up otherwise, and a fraction of the cost of my Omnimount.  The built in and extra torpedo levels were a nice tough, and the very long HDMI cable is a bonus!

Reviews.Title: Great mount!
Reviews.Author: D. H. Scelza "DaveyCrockett150"
Reviews.Content: Bought 1 for a 50" TV. Very good value. It came w/ a HDMI cable that the $1000. TV did not come with! It also came with very good and plenty of hardware so you can mount it in many different situations. Saw similar mounts at Best Buy and Radio Shack selling for $100. and more! Once mounted you can slide the TV left or right  for exact positioning, then secure it in place with locking screws. I bought another one for a 32" TV for the bedroom. This is the smallest TV for this mount so its about as wide as the TV. You may want a  smaller mount, but the quality is so good that I didn't mind so much. I used a better level than came with the mount, but if you don't have one you're covered. Very thoughtful on the Cheetah Co. Very impressive mount and at a very good price!

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Goose
Reviews.Content: Ii purchased this product primarily because of the price and the reviews. The product does what it is suppose to do: Hang a flat panel on the wall. It is easy to put together and hang. My negative are two:* Plug your cables into the back of the TV prior to hanging, it is really tough to plug them afterward. Also purchase a elbow HDMI adapter as plugging your HDMI straight in puts pressure on the cable* You will need a extremely long phillips screwdriver to tighten the bottom holderBiggest question is would I purchase another one (I have two), only if there is not a better, similarly priced product out there.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the right price
Reviews.Author: Cav
Reviews.Content: This mount was very well priced and turned out to be a good deal. Came with a very sturdy HDMI cable while was very nice. Also came with a level that you can use for other things since it's not attached to the mount. Great buy

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: YoAdrienne
Reviews.Content: This came in just as I expected. Good quality and did what I needed it to do. Plenty sturdy.I would purchase this item again.

Reviews.Title: it holds the tv good
Reviews.Author: Kevin Boudreau
Reviews.Content: hard to hang the TV in upright position cords get in the way for the price it holds up but you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Advertisement a bit misleading
Reviews.Author: James F. Lowry
Reviews.Content: Not enough indication that the 3" from wall criterium will not leave you enough room to attach a standard coax or wall mount.  In an existing wall this is a problem.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Beth Maguire
Reviews.Content: Easy to install mount and TV to wall.  Don't be hesitant of low price, great buy!  No complaints!!!  Shipping was prompt.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Mike T
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my house for my 47" TV and it works great.  Then I bought a second as a gift to my daughter.  These are about 1/3 the price of retail stores, and works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Roy Brown
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount was much easier to install than I thought and was extremely pleased with the sturdiness of the product.  Once the project was complete it looked better than a friends and he had a professional hang his television.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value!
Reviews.Author: eblak3
Reviews.Content: This was a little bit of a pain to setup but that's to be expected. Comes with all the hardware you could imagine and even a level and HDMI chord. I have been using this for a couple months and am very happy with it so far. Using a 47" flatscreen.

Reviews.Title: everything needed included
Reviews.Author: Alan Barnes
Reviews.Content: I actually bought two different televisions (returned the first one) both very different in their attachment methods but this had everything I needed from the screws into the back of the televistion to the mounting hardware for the wall, and even included a high quality HDMI cable.  It is a very low profile mount so the TV fits nice and close to the wall which is what I wanted for the extra thin TV.  Brackets are sturdy and hold a 60" plasma very well.  only draw back the securing method of the brackets on the TV to the Wall mount.  It takes an extra long  and slim screw driver (15" long for a 60" TV) to tighten in the screws that keep it from getting bumped off.  If you don't tighten them it's not a big issue I am just protective of my TV.  Honestly you wouldn't accidently knock a 70 lb TV up and off a mount, but a thief would have to rip the wall down to get it off the wall.

Reviews.Title: No less quality than others for which I've paid 4X more.
Reviews.Author: Brian S. Urie
Reviews.Content: Seems like it is as sturdy as another for which I paid 4X more.  Required some assembly to make up for the low price.  But, my 42" plasma is hanging from it right now.  Worked well.  The HDMI cable appears to be of exceptional quality.

Reviews.Title: Great price, good product
Reviews.Author: John Harrison
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure about this when I bought it because the price seemed too low, but it is actually pretty good! It is made of solid steel with all hardware neatly laid out in labeled baggies. The only critical thing I can think of is it didn't have enough spacers for my Samsung LED so I ended up using over-sized nuts.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Brian Potvin
Reviews.Content: Good quality product.  I have had this on my wall for some time now, and it really makes the whole setup look good.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic & easy (with the right tools)
Reviews.Author: Bunnypennyz
Reviews.Content: This mount was perfect.  Used it in my bedroom for an RCA 47" flatscreen.  Installation was simple, but I had to borrow a drill from my father in law, there was no way I could have gotten the bolts in without pre-drilled holes.  Took about... 45 minutes I guess to attach but WELL WORTH IT.  Love the price on this mount as well.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Paul Brooks
Reviews.Content: This item was fairly easy to assemble out of the box however you need a small degree of patience dealing with the small bolts included in the assembly. Other than that it's super simple to wallmount and easily holds my 55" Samsung LED TV in my basement. I haven't installed the HDMI cables behind my wall just yet so I can't speak to the quality there, but I would recommend this item overall for anyone that needs a simple non-swivel wall mount for a flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Martin Farrow
Reviews.Content: I'll throw my two cents worth in - it is worth every penny and has no problem supporting my 60".  It'll take a little while to understand the assembly, but once you've put it together it is solid.To echo everyone else's comments1] Get yourself a wall stud finder - The small cost of one will save your large investment.2] Take the time to assemble it.  I tried after installing a hardwood floor and had to stop because I was too tired ;)3] The included level is not worth a dime.  I unfortunately used it and even though it claims the bracket is level my TV is off by a couple of degrees (will have to fix that someday)Its worth it though!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: bradi2001
Reviews.Content: Bought the new Samsung Smart TV, and this fit it perfectly! The instructions were a tad bit hard to follow at some points, but it is really straight forward installation. Have a friend to help when marking your pilot holes and leveling. Great addition to my living room! Saves space, and looks awesome! Tilt is an added bonus feature!

Reviews.Title: A good product
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Good quality and easy to mount and the hardware came complete. For the price you can't expect more. I recommend the product

Reviews.Title: Nice sturdy mount
Reviews.Author: ilovegod2
Reviews.Content: This mount was very easy to install and isn't made cheap like some others that I looked at. I am happy that I ordered it at the same time that I ordered the TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Price
Reviews.Content: As others have said in their reviews, this mount is an amazing value, and one need not spend more money for a TV wall mount.  The mount is extremely strong as our installer actually hung from it before attaching our 47-inch TV.  Included with the mount is an HDMI cord and a level just to make the purchase an even better value.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the pre-drilled holes were not in exactly the right place for the screws, and my installer (who charged by the hour) had to spend some time carefully re-drilling the holes so as not to compromise the integrity of the metal.  Still, even with the added labor expense, the mount was an excellent value over other much more expensive options.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Silvia A Ramirez
Reviews.Content: This mount was great for the price. Did a great job supporting my 30+ pound tv. I moved and unfortunately lost a couple of the pieces and had to buy a new one, too bad!

Reviews.Title: Love them!!!
Reviews.Author: Dallas R
Reviews.Content: MY THREE TVS HAVE YET TO FALL!!! THESE THINGS HOLD UP GREAT. GREAT QUALITY AND ALL HARDWARE INCLUDED... TAKE MY ADVICE AND BUY THEM. I HAVE THREE =)

Reviews.Title: Best Mount for the Money Hands Down!
Reviews.Author: M. Seaton
Reviews.Content: If there is a better mount package like this available you should probably buy it. I've never found one so this is my choice. I have purchased 3 of these mounts over the years and I'll buy more if I ever get additional TV's.The construction on this mount and on the mounting hardware are top notch. Instructions are also great, very clear how to get this up on your wall and make adjustments. Throw in the HDMI cable for free and this is one tough bundle to beat. You are going to spend double at a big box store for a mount, why not buy it here, not pay tax and get it shipped to your door free?I would recommend this mount to anyone who is getting a new TV and wants it hung on their wall.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kreger55
Reviews.Content: Good buy for the money.  Easy install and works well.  Seems as durable as most. For my son's college apt.

Reviews.Title: Cinder or Concrete Mounting Tips
Reviews.Author: Robin Cheskin
Reviews.Content: My challenge was to mount my 47'' 40lb flat screen to my wall made of cinder block.  The screws that come with the kit will not work for cinder/concrete, so I purchased Red Head Poly-Set #8 1 1/4 inch wall anchors.  The screw head is not quite big enough to overlap each side of the holes in the metal square mount, but one of the washers that comes with the kit does the trick.  I also had to rent a 1.5'' rotary hammer drill from Home Depot ($20/day) to drill into the cinder block; a cordless drill will not do the trick.  So far these anchors seem sturdy enough to handle my TV.I don't like that you have to eyeball the angle adjustment up to 15 degrees.  Also, if you mount the TV with very little tilt, it is almost impossible to secure the safety screws because there is not enough room between the TV and wall.Overall I am happy with the product and would recommend it to anyone taking on a similar project.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: krees
Reviews.Content: Great mount, nice and sturdy.  Very low profile WITH tilt, awesome.  So low profile that the soundbar sticks out more than the actual TV.  Free extras are great

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and excellent item
Reviews.Author: r. reno
Reviews.Content: Assembled and put tv (40" 25 lbs) on the wall with no problems. I did use my own lag bolts into studs. I recommend this mount. I don't think I would use it on any set over 42".

Reviews.Title: Amazing bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: David Box
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for my application. Plus a nice miniature level and cable. Great buy at a great price. Will do it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: Great quality, easy to install, works well for bedroom tv. Received quickly and it has clear, easy-to-follow instructions, was set up and using within an hour.

Reviews.Title: Everyone loves this mount. Everyone is right.
Reviews.Author: Scott Pezza
Reviews.Content: This is advertised as the most popular TV mount on Amazon. After installing it, I can see why. It's a no-frills static mount. No swiveling here. It was very easy to set up, mount, and finish off with the actual TV attachment.

Reviews.Title: great mount, greater price
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL ELLIS
Reviews.Content: This mount is very strong, easy to assemble and use, holds my 65" LED with ease! Would highly recommend to everyone

Reviews.Title: Would Recommend
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. Good quality. No hassel. All hardware included for easy set up. Cheaper than brick and mortar store.

Reviews.Author: Gianlucca
Reviews.Content: This product is ok, everything it's fine, I have not complaint with this, highly recommended if your tv is big

Reviews.Title: Great for Price
Reviews.Author: J. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: Seeing as how others are $100+, this is a steal. Yes, you have to assemble it yourself, so if you can't do that, don't get this. As others have said, the instructions are pretty much crap, but if you have common sense, you should be able to do it. It takes about an hour to put it up, and it hasnt fallen down yet...

Reviews.Title: just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Julian S.
Reviews.Content: This a a very serviceable and sturdy mount. I have a Sony 60" and it fits nicely. It is a lot better product than the price would suggest.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Installation was easy and comes with everything needed plus extras. Arrived fast. if this product doesnt receive five stars then someone doesnt know how to install. 50” plasma

Reviews.Title: Cheap and easy
Reviews.Author: joseph e trzepkowski
Reviews.Content: It came with a level, hdmi cable, easy to install but durable bracing. It was more than I expected. will get again for my next TV.

Reviews.Title: WALL PLATE NEEDS ASSEMBLY
Reviews.Author: Italia301
Reviews.Content: Product was good for the $25 I spent on in. Took some time to assemble (pieces did not match up evenly).  WARNING it is not one solid piece like the more expensive models.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Mr. Wendal
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  HDMI cable is good quality.  Need a super long phillips head screwdriver to secure the safety screws on the bottom.  Other than that, excellent product for the money.For the best installation, use your own level to make sure the screws are lines up before drilling the holes.  I used an electronic stud finder and a laser level.

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: for the money this is an unbelievable product. Its very similar to a $100 mount you would buy at another store. was so happy with the first that i bought another one.

Reviews.Title: wallmount
Reviews.Author: John R. Bowser
Reviews.Content: It was my first wall mount tv. It works fine except where my tv inputs are on the back. I would have done better with a mount a little farther from the wall. I had ordered both online and didn't have the tv to see this problem before I bought it. The mount is great and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Good product and very stable
Reviews.Author: S. Othumpangat "good_y"
Reviews.Content: very strong and well fit to my 46 inch TV. Only thing it is slightly difficult to put the cables behind (mine is a sony TV). Otherwise likes it and recommend. Instructions are bit confusing but several reviewers warn you far ahead.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount
Reviews.Author: Hitek
Reviews.Content: Item advertised on amazon with everything included, but when the item arrived it has cheap hdmi cable and item inside was missing. Would not recommend this mount to anyone who's lo

Reviews.Title: Simple to put together
Reviews.Author: Ronald Freudenheim
Reviews.Content: This wall mount was simple to put together and to attach to the wall.  The level that comes with it is really not that useful because it is so small.  Overall, very satisfied and would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Light weight and great price
Reviews.Author: CameraGuy
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these and they hang our 55 inch tv very nice. Good quality and easy to assemble.Very good price. No need to spend 100$ at Best buy.

Reviews.Title: easy to install but difficult to lock TV in place
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I had no issues putting is up on the wall, but with a 40" TV it was very difficult to reach up to the bottom screws to lock the TV in place.  Also my TV requires the HMDI connections to stick straight out in the back.  something I wish I would have considered before buying a flush mount.  But my TV is still up and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Ive had my 47'' TV hanging and moved a few times and no issues at all. The HDMI cable works really well, although i dont know it's specs. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount - Crappy HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: grafxfx
Reviews.Content: The mount is great.  Installed easily and holds an "old and heavy" LCD TV.  Nice tilt of the screen for near viewing in a smaller room.  The HDMI cable was garbage, though.  Picture was grainy and the sound was jittery and dropped out every 5-7 seconds.  Bought a new HDMI cable locally and the problem went away.

Reviews.Title: Simple, cheap, and sturdy.
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Easy directions, easy assembly, easily mounted on the wall. Make sure you get someone to help you lift heavier TVs onto mount. If you struggle with this, you are a sad individual.

Reviews.Title: Best mount by far
Reviews.Author: michael montville
Reviews.Content: Excellant mount. Exceeds expectations. Comes with hdmi cable a real plus. Mounts easily. No problems with the install.Highly recomend this mount

Reviews.Title: cheetah knows what they are doing
Reviews.Author: Brady
Reviews.Content: cheetah stepped up to the plate to be the first to figure out how to mass produce a universal wall mount that is easy to install. they realize that it's a simple concept it's just used to mount a TV on the wall and nothing more that that, you would be baffled to even hesitate not buying this great product.

Reviews.Title: Standard, Cheap, Just Right!
Reviews.Author: PeanutButter
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect a whole lot from this mount but it's actually not too bad. The price is definitely right in comparison to other similarly functioning mounts found at big box stores. There's nothing fancy about it and you have to assemble it, but it does the job of holding a TV on the wall and providing a bit of an angle for relieving glare. I would rather have paid a couple dollars less and not gotten the level and cable that I don't need, but oh well I now own another level and cable.

Reviews.Title: Get a really long screw driver
Reviews.Author: chris cre
Reviews.Content: Great wall mount for the price, comes with plenty of extra hardware for different situations and fasteners are organized in seperate bags. HDMI cable works and can reach very far, it is pretty thick with the outer sheathing so if you are putting your cables into some kind of wire hiding thing it may crowd up your cables. Also, you need a pretty long #P2 screw driver to tighten the angle lock and the side to side locks once it's all mounted. I think I needed at least a foot long to mount a 49" tv. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Good bracket but know where your studs are
Reviews.Author: M. van Balgooy
Reviews.Content: This is a good bracket for mounting a television to the wall--simple, strong, and secure.  If you're attaching it to plaster wall, it must be secured to the studs so you'll want to know where they are located.  In my situation, the studs were not placed 16" on center.  And while a stud was nicely placed at the center of the tv, you can't secure the bracket at the center because there are no holes (look at the photo and you'll see it's solid steel in the center).  That means the bracket has to be shifted 3-4 inches to the left or right to secure it to a stud that's centered behind the tv.  That's no problem if your tv is 36" or larger, but the bracket will be visible if the tv is smaller.

Reviews.Title: Nuttin wrong with it, and an HDMI cable!
Reviews.Author: monique tope
Reviews.Content: Currently holding a REALLY heavy 55 inch in my daughter's bedroom, no probs.  Recommend finding a stud though.  The dry-wall mounts might fail for heavier TVs, imo.  4 stars and not 5 for SLIGHT distortion of metal frame near edges under load, but I will be buying 2 more of these, no matter.

Reviews.Title: priced right
Reviews.Author: Carl J. Collins
Reviews.Content: This is a good buy for the money.  When you install make sure you use the level and not the indicator on the unit because it could be off a little bit.  I would recommend that you use a long level before tightening the wall unit.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff!
Reviews.Author: D Porter
Reviews.Content: Good stuff. May require a little common sense, but works great! I don't have nine more things to say. Peace!

Reviews.Title: Product good, seller questionable.
Reviews.Author: KBT3k "kbt3000"
Reviews.Content: I got my cheetah mount in about 5 days. It came with no manual and no HDMI cord in a over taped & beaten box. Thats the end of the (slightly) bad. The mount is sturdy and only 3 pieces (not including screws). The quality for the price is exceptional. Installed and was watching the game in less than 30 minutes.(tip - once you've found a stud [with whatever means you use] make sure to drive a small nail into it and make sure to pinpoint the middle of the stud. sometimes the drywall nails are on the edge of the board, and could really hurt your wallet if you sink an anchor into a weak edge. Being approx 16" (in most homes) apart, measure & test w/ nail.. You'll sleep better knowing there will be no crash in the middle of the night.)

Reviews.Title: very nice mount
Reviews.Author: Mark Moyer
Reviews.Content: I could not ask for a better mount for the price.  Do not be afraid of to buy this one if you want a solid one poisition mount.

Reviews.Title: Tilt Dual Hook
Reviews.Author: Oliver Garcia
Reviews.Content: This product is nice, does the job and places the t.v. against the wall. The only downside about this product, is that the angle doesnt leave allot of room for placing hands behind to adjust wires, or connect components to the t.v. It is simple to put together, maybe took me about 10 minutes to put together.I would recommend this product, just wanted to point out that the t.v. doesnt give that much space to add cords once its up on the wall you have to be settled for what is up there, or take it down and add items.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Amir Ali
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  Hold a 40inch, 20lb tv without any issues.  It does come in two separate pieces so you will have to connect them with the screws that come with it before putting  it on the wall.

Reviews.Title: 2nd time around!
Reviews.Author: LSS
Reviews.Content: We bought a Cheetah mount for our 52" flat screen.  We were pleased with the product.  We now purchased a second mount for another tv.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: R. Collins
Reviews.Content: works just fine for a heavy 42" pioneer plasma; good price for a wall hanger;  would recommend for its intended use

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Aimée
Reviews.Content: This is a durable product with a great price! This item sells for much more at a local electronics store. Don't be fooled. This is the exact same item with a better price! It's pretty easy to install; although you will need a super long screwdriver and small hands to tighten a few of the screws. That's the only difficult part.  Otherwise, its definitely worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice, Works as desired
Reviews.Author: Ajay
Reviews.Content: was easy to mount my 40" TV . installation was complete in a hour. for the price  it is definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Sunny865
Reviews.Content: Outside of it taking a few minutes to hang on the wall because you have to make sure you get it on the studs, this is a great product at a great price!  I have a 55" TV and it holds it just fine.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Austin  Lee Tilley
Reviews.Content: great product, works perfect, quality is great, HDMI cable works great and included level came in hand.  Will defiantly be buying at least 1 more

Reviews.Title: Okay Unit But......
Reviews.Author: B. Rosen
Reviews.Content: This is a relatively nice TV mount, but, it is a bit light weight in construction.  As a result when I tried to mount my 60" TV with it I was not able to do so quite where I wanted the TV to fit.  In my desired location the mounting bolts for one side were only 2 slots from the center on the left side and almost all the way to the outside on the right side.  When I put the TV on it, the left side of the unit actually bent out from the wall so the TV hung out further on the left.  I had to rehang the unit with the mounting bolts on both sides being in the second slots in on both sides, thus the TV was shifted to the right from where I really wanted it, but since the mounting bolts had to go into the wall studs I had no choice.  In summary, if you want to mount a unit in a specific spot that is not going to be centered, you might want to get a heavier gauge type mount.  Also the TV is extremely tight to the wall so I had to install HDMI cables with 90 degree plugs.  Be sure to install your cables before hanging the TV on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Eli_RV
Reviews.Content: Cheap, easy to set up, works wonderfully, and comes with handy HDMI cables and a leveler. What more could you want?

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: This went together easily. It is holding a 60 inch Samsung Plasma TV. Use the wall studs. Easy to install on the wall. Use your own level.

Reviews.Title: great tv mount
Reviews.Author: pete
Reviews.Content: great  and easy to  install .great price works great.you could install it yourself with no help install less then one hour.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to Assemble
Reviews.Author: Colts7(
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy, difficult to assemble. Instructions are horrible. Worth the price if you have the patience to assemble. Other mounts locally are $100, so overall happy w/ this mount.

Reviews.Title: You Won't Believe This Mount
Reviews.Author: Jane M Schlosshan
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount for my daughter's 45" Plasma TV.  When we saw the size of the package, we were concerned.  When my husband started putting it together, he was pleasantly surprised.  It proved to be very strong and the TV mounted. With ease.  I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and sturdy
Reviews.Author: Tommy K
Reviews.Content: I hung a 46" TV from this with no issues.  It was super cheap yet really did a good job.  Even came with a little level to make life easier when mounting.

Reviews.Title: working great
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: this is a very nice setup and is very sturdy. My only issue, if you can call it that, is it has to be completely assembled. eh whatever, just didnt expect it.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Max Braun
Reviews.Content: Somewhat annoying to set up, but hey it is a cheap wallmount. It works perfectly. Overall a great purchase for me

Reviews.Title: Real nice!
Reviews.Author: Shannon Miller
Reviews.Content: Product works great!  The levels included are pretty cheap though, broke them both, but since that was an added bonus I deduct no points for freebees.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount APTMM2B flat screen tv mount
Reviews.Author: edwinb
Reviews.Content: great product.  the adjustable tilt was very convenient. it held up my 60 inch 90 pound television.  the mount to the tv was perfectly aligned to the bolt holes.

Reviews.Title: Everything you need to wall mount your TV
Reviews.Author: L. Bower
Reviews.Content: This is a great wall mount kit - HDMI and level included - great deal.  Only thing to know is it require a non-standard socket which was a little annoying.

Reviews.Title: Very nice mount.
Reviews.Author: Ro12
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice mount. It is easy to put together and hang the TV. The one thing I can gripe about is the level that they send with it. DO NOT USE IT. I did and after I got done I thought the TV looked slightly tilted. I got the level back out and put in on it and it showed it was OK. I went out to the garage and got another level and put on it. It was off. Other than that, it really a great deal. I would recommend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price, but would go with more expensive one piece design in future
Reviews.Author: Rob Poole
Reviews.Content: For the price, you can't beat it, compared to your more expensive Peerless mounts which I have previously used. The downside to this mount is that it the upper and lower bars come in 4 pieces that have to be joined in the middle with a couple screws and a joining plate. This is not a problem if you are centering your TV in the middle of the mount. However, due to the location of my wall studs, and where I wanted the TV, I have to move the TV to the far right of the mount. This is fine, except that the mount tends to sag just slightly at the joint in the middle when weight is on the right which causes the TV to dip just slightly, like 3/8 of an inch. It doesn't sound like much, but for anyone who has mounted a TV before, even a tiny bit off level is noticeable. I was able to solve this issue by cutting a piece of stock aluminum to use as a post to prop up the middle of the mount to keep it from sagging, but this kind of defeats the purpose of buying a ready made mount. I learned my lesson in being cheap. Again, it's a fine product under the right circumstances, but if you really want something tough and will work with all situations, I would look at the other more expensive mounts.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Fletch
Reviews.Content: Another buyer be forewarned...  The description states this will handle a 50" TV, wrong, this mount handles no bigger than a 32"  Very misleading in the description.  Item was returned.

Reviews.Title: good mount for price
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: it works great but the only problem I had was the washers were the wrong size but I had extras laying around so it wasn't a big deal. the hdmi cable isn't the highest quality bcuz it broke as soon as I hooked it up.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and quality mount.
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and universal. Already used this mount on 3 different tvs. Very satisfied customer. Really recommend this quality mount.

Reviews.Title: Simple to Install... very good
Reviews.Author: Pedro E. Mojica
Reviews.Content: Really happy with it, simple to install really practical and really an economic solution for a simple problem very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great Product Great Value
Reviews.Author: Elba McCurley
Reviews.Content: Our whole house uses these wall mounts, from the kitchen, bedrooms, and the living room. Our oldest one has probably been up for over a year and we have had no problems with it. The stylish HDMI cord is a definite plus.

Reviews.Title: Works like it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: James Cotten
Reviews.Content: It is however a little tight and I couldn't really set the bottom safety screws because I do not have a foot long (what it would take for me) screwdriver to tighten the bottom safety screws. But it seems to hold well and has been sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts are great!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I can't imagine why someone would go into a big box store and purchase a mount for $100+.  This held our 50" Plasma TV just great and was incredibly close to the wall.  The level and HDMI cable that come with it only add to the deal.  All of our TV's are on these mounts and we've never had a problem with any of them.

Reviews.Title: solid support
Reviews.Author: AWKWARD in Arizona
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Easy to assemble and install.  I got thid for my Mom and a new TV.  The only reason it get 4 instead of 5 stars, the HDMI cable that came with it already broke from pushing the Bluray player too far back in the entertainment unit.

Reviews.Title: awesome wall mountmount
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, very affordable. Similar item at least $100!!! Looks awesome on my wall can't even tell it's there!!! That's how think it is

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Comes with everything you need but a drill!
Reviews.Author: Blake Barnett
Reviews.Content: I am truly pleased with this purchase. It fits my 37" Insignia TV and does all that is advertised. It is also very convenient that it comes with an extra HDMI cable and a level. I would recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Jennifer White
Reviews.Content: This is a great wall mount and works well for my tv. This was easy to install and came with all of the items needed.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: mp180
Reviews.Content: the mount itself seems to be good quality and was easy to assemble.  Some of the hardware included with it to mount to the wall wasn't.  The drywall anchors that came with it were not the correct size for the bolts sent.  Not a big deal--used my own that I had.  Would recommend attaching to studs not using drywall anchors, but in my case had no choice. That said, overall happy with purchase and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Easy Instructions, Easy to put together, Easy.
Reviews.Author: daniel schoeff
Reviews.Content: Simple product that has been mounted with no issue.  Total time for assembly and mounting was less than 30 minutes.  Instructions are not out of this world great, but simple and easy enough to understand.  Holds a 46" Samsung with no issues at all, no strain, no creaking, just a solid hold.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Aaron Huefepohl
Reviews.Content: This was the first time I have ever seen the actuall wall mount come in four pieces, that bolt together. Was a little skeptical when I started bolting the parts together but the seem to be solid when mounted on the wall, but time will tell otherwise. Adjusting tilt is difficult when tv mounted due to the depth being very shallow. This might dependt on the thickness of the tv but overall it gives final product a very slim appearance which I like. Overall at this point happy with the mount, the tv is holding and looks nice and flush with the wall.The most frustrating issue was the included hdmi cord. The hdmi cord that came with the kit didn't work. I tried it multiple times with multiple tv's and nothing. Was upset with that, would recommend if you want to knock the project out in one night, I would go ahead and purches another hdmi cord in case the one included doesn't work for you either. So don't buy this over other mount just because it comes with a hdmi cord.

Reviews.Title: be prepared to do own assembly
Reviews.Author: Dustin D. Page "vegas designer"
Reviews.Content: i have installed many tv mounts,  this one is in peices.  the mounting square is not assembled and one solid unit like most others.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Ali Yaacoobi
Reviews.Content: Works well, but it's fairly flimsy. Instructions were not clear on certain parts and I didn't like how you have to assemble the entire thing.

Reviews.Title: worked well
Reviews.Author: John P. Lucey
Reviews.Content: no problem to install it was a little hard to put together. The directions need a better blue print and pictures

Reviews.Title: Good mount
Reviews.Author: S. Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a good mount.  Just like others have said do not use the built in level.  It's not very accurate.  As a bonus they include a nice HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah TV Flat Screen Mount
Reviews.Author: CT
Reviews.Content: Ordered this a while ago. Easy to mount and holds my 60" flat screen no problemo. If you are looking for something that does more than tilt up and down this isn't for you but if you are looking for a cheap but well built and easy to install wall mount this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Brian R. Hartley "lightman07"
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Easy to install and easy to hang TV.  All parts were exactly what was needed for my 60" LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Too many pieces to be put together
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: Once it is assembled, it works fine; however, I definitely prefer the ones that come already assembled and all you have to do is attach it to the wall. I just prefer simplicity.

Reviews.Title: Not really for 32inch TV
Reviews.Author: James D Danielson Jr
Reviews.Content: Runs a bit big to use with 32 inch tv but would be fine for larger tv s can see the edges of mount with the smaller tv

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: W. Worman "WormanSunny"
Reviews.Content: I was bit concerned when this was so much less expensive than other wall mounts I'd seen, but it is good quality and is working out just fine.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: Elgie Hill
Reviews.Content: Mount worked good for Vizio 55in LED fit like a glove and also mount is strong and durable. I would order again! thanks

Reviews.Title: Better options out there
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: This is the second TV I've mounted and this one doesn't inspire much confidence.  First the bracket mounted to the wall has to be assembled where as the first mount I used was a solid piece. One less step and a much more solid bracket. Second and the bigger issue is that the way this mount is designed it appears to be impossible to fasten the TV to the wall.  You are supposed tighten a screw on the bottom of the TV bracket but I can't see how it would be possible to see or even reach the screws because the TV blocks access. So the TV just hangs there!?  If your TV was in a high traffic area or anywhere it could be bumped into this would make me really uncomfortable.  Maybe if you had a uber thin TV or smaller TV (mine is 50") it maybe possible to reach these screws but I doubt it.  Really stupid design especially when you're going to hang a $700+++ piece of equipment on it.  I would not buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts - good for the cost
Reviews.Author: gary renaud
Reviews.Content: The mounts went together rather easy and the instructions were very clear. I had a rocketfish mount before and it was much better but it cost 3 times as much. I had a problem getting at the screws that lock the bottom of the TV to the wall mount - can't get my hands and a screw drive behind the TV to tighten when the TV is slightly over an inch from the wall. The rocketfish mount snapped in on the bottom and to release to dismount they have two pull down release levers at the bottom - very easy to use. The tv is heavy so I am not concerned it will slide off the wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Mike S.
Reviews.Content: I got a new larger tv and needed a beefier mount. I had a thin tv and wanted it close to the wall and this is very low profile. The parts were all included and great detailed directions, and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to use.
Reviews.Author: AR
Reviews.Content: The unit is sturdy enough for a 60" TV. But there is hardly any room after attaching it to the wall to do anything with the wiring while hoisted. Additionally hoisting the TV because of the very narrow space is EXTREMELY difficult. I wish Amazon did not and I belive they should not recommend this for larger TV's

Reviews.Title: Solid mount that works well! (some assembly required)
Reviews.Author: DT "Buy it and try it"
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that this is a very nice mount, the tilt feature is easy to use, and they've made hanging the TV simple once the mount is on the wall. You do have to assemble the mount though, it comes in 8 pieces that need to be bolted together to make the rectangle you see in the picture. Not a big deal, just plan on an extra 15 minutes to get that done. Once it's together, it's the usual stud finding and 4 bolts to mount. You can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: good stuff at cheap price
Reviews.Author: Tranquility89
Reviews.Content: the mount is perfect, my samsung 60" led tv sits on it nicely, only problem is the screws that comes with the package, they are not strong enough to hold the weight if you have drywall, i went to home depot and got those fastener with anchor, then problem solved.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Mount
Reviews.Author: Dianne Butler
Reviews.Content: I think it is a good product. The only problem I had was the fact that the TV cords were too thick for the flush mount, which I didn't even think about. I did have to get adaptors for the TV plugs. Now it is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv mount
Reviews.Author: Chris Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought 6 for my restaurant, hang tight holds 37" to 47" no problem.one of them I had it over 3 years right above customer table stay strong

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our 46" above fireplace
Reviews.Author: smw
Reviews.Content: Purchased to hang 46" Sony above the fireplace in our great room.  Installation was relatively straight forward, but I would definately recommend two people to do so. We used the full tilt for above our fireplace mantly.  Holding strong so far and we had to pull it off and put it back on once to connect additional speakers, done without issue.

Reviews.Title: Not a fan
Reviews.Author: J. Lyon
Reviews.Content: I'm not a big fan of this mount.The back plate comes in multiple pieces that needs to be put together before it can be used.Since the back plate is not a solid chunk of steel (like every other mount I've owned) its not as stable on the wall, and because it will flex your TV will not stay mounted flush or level.I would recommending looking else where. I've hung multiple TVs and mounts, but this is by far the worst one I've used.

Reviews.Title: Well my TV is still on the wall...
Reviews.Author: Tiny
Reviews.Content: So for the price this is nice. Wasn't super easy to install so for 40$ our maintenance guy did it lol

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Kay Mcgahen
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount bracket on the wall. Then just screw the hangers on the back of the TV.  Lift the TV and slip the hangers on to the wall bracket.  Done.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic product for the cost, very sturdy materials, it's totally solid once put together. Would recommend and will buy again.

Reviews.Title: Solid Mount
Reviews.Author: Jose M. Guzman
Reviews.Content: Great mount for the money! Easy to install and very light weight.used on my 50 inch Phillips tv that is very heavy

Reviews.Title: Installs easily, very sturdy.
Reviews.Author: William Kasper
Reviews.Content: There is not much else to be said.  It went up in a snap and holds my TV securely.  The TV does not wiggle one bit if I try to torque it.  While I was hooking up my A/V cables I could easily remove the TV for rear access, and them put it back up on the wall.  If I get a flat screen for another room I'm coming back to Cheetah Mounts again!

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price.
Reviews.Author: richard p pickett
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these mounts. One for a 55" and one for a 60". Sturdy mount. Only thing is you have to assemble it. But for the price you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Easy, cheap, works
Reviews.Author: J. Christ "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Cant ask for a better deal.  Just note that a 65" TV cannot tilt the full 15 degrees, the bottom of the TV will hit the wall at about 1/2 that.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!
Reviews.Author: lxmirman
Reviews.Content: This is holding my 60 inch tv. Easy setup  and extremely cheap I would definitely recommend to others looking for a solid tv mount

Reviews.Title: Mount bracket needs to be wider for larget TV's IMO
Reviews.Author: allison
Reviews.Content: While not a bad looking item & certainly a good price I found that, due to where I wanted to place my TV only the left side lined up with a stud. The middle of the bracket sat over the stud in the center and I would have to drill a hole in the bracket to get to that stud. Not excited about that so I got a bracket elsewhere that is 42" wide as opposed to this one from Cheetah that is ~28". I am a little curious as to why (with home studs 16" on center in MOST homes) this thing should not be made 5-6" longer minimum to potentially span three studs (and easily span two) so as to maximize the chance of getting anchors into studs. I am not mounting my $2k plus TV with molly(s). Ugh. Anyway, I think if you have a TV more along the 32"-40" this might prove OK if you don't get lucky with wall alignment like I did. I do not totally blame the item as (like I said) it was just bad luck with placement but maybe a longer bracket is something they should think about.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: jeff b.
Reviews.Content: Went together easily and the additional HDMI cable made the purchase a no-brainier.  It only took about 30 minutes to install start to finish.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: The scariest purchase you will ever make
Reviews.Author: Kira
Reviews.Content: The mount looks like it is made from a couple of beer cans welded together. The metal is extremely thin. When you hang the TV on the wall your heart will be in your throat because it seems certain that beer can metal is just going to fold and drop the TV.The mount has worked so far though. The design is not so good because they recommend tightening the mount with some screws on the bottom, but once the TV is on the wall the only way to get the screws into the holes and tighten them is with a screwdriver that is at least as long as half the height of the TV. That could be a two foot screwdriver in some cases which most people do not have lying around.For peace of mind I would recommend a different mount with thicker looking metal. I have another mount with what looks like 1/4 inch think metal on it. I have no doubts at all about that mount supporting the TV.This mount does seem to do the job and the price is much better than the thicker metal types.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: Very good, very nice value, great all around deal.  A lot cheaper than best buy and all those places but probably better quality

Reviews.Title: Legit
Reviews.Author: Brian Damage
Reviews.Content: This thing was a breeze to install! In fact, I don't think mounting anything to a wall has ever been less of a pain in the ass...Find your studs, get your drill out (or a manual screwdriver if you just love punishing yourself), put your big boy pants on and lift the TV up - that's it.I'd definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Hard to secure with flat panel tv
Reviews.Author: Corey Friends
Reviews.Content: Impossible to reach the secure screws once tv is on the wall.  Not sure what the plan was with that?

Reviews.Title: Very secure, not a lot of space behind TV
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: This mount was incredibly easy to put up. A buddy of mine came over and we installed it in about an hour over a few beers. The positioning of the studs behind my fireplace did not allow us to drill straight into the studs, so we opted to use the anchors in the dry wall. While I did have a few more anchors lying around that I used in addition to the ones they sent with the mount, the TV hung very snug, safe, and secure (those utilyzing the studs should have no issues). I have a Samsung from 2006, and it weighs about 70 pounds (very heavy), so if you have anything newer then you should not have a worry in the world.My one hang-up about the mount (no pun intended) is that it does not allow for much space behind the TV; even at a repositioned angle. The power chord and HDMI chords are a bit smashed behind the TV, but everything still works well. Keep in mind, this is also more of an issue for me personally because I have a heavier TV than most, so others may not have to worry as much about smashed chords.Overall this is an excellent product, you absolutely cannot beat it for the price!

Reviews.Title: Best cheap TV mount
Reviews.Author: Cameron Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I wanted to mount my TV on my living room wall, but I didnt want to spend over a 100$ just for a wall mount. This mount is great for the price and perfect for a simple TV wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup
Reviews.Author: nickname sin
Reviews.Content: Instructions are a bit lacking, but this mount will do the job of holding your newer, lighter HDTV. I have a 52" RCA that weighs 45lbs and is easily held in place by this mount. Price is right and the included HDMI cable is a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Debra Ann Mac Nair
Reviews.Content: We bought this to be able to mount our 40" LCD in the bedroom. As with some other reviewers, my hubby had some trouble getting the tv mounted because of some design features. Trying to tighten the screws once the tv was on the mount was nearly impossible because of the lack of space between the tv and the wall. Other than that it seems to be holding up just fine.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Clinton G. Horton "Ceegrove"
Reviews.Content: I was quite sceptical about this mount, considering the price. It's easy to assemble and mount.mit comes with a small level which I've used for other projects, and a HDMI cable which is long enought o reach wherever. The mount handled my 42" tv quite well. The only problem I had was getting to the locking screw after mounting the tv but that's minor considering.

Reviews.Title: WORKED OUT GREAT
Reviews.Author: LIlie
Reviews.Content: Looked like it would be easy to mount on the wall and good quality from others that I looked at.  Had everything in the box that I needed.  Arrived in excellent condition and took just a few days to get to me.  Worked out great....

Reviews.Title: Solid design
Reviews.Author: Joshua M McDonnell
Reviews.Content: Sturdy product that I used to mount over a fireplace (wasn't the first option), but it came out great and very clean professional look.

Reviews.Title: Just what we were after
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This purchase is just what we were after.  If I had to purchase again I would do so from this supplier.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: maria c. docampo
Reviews.Content: Very good wall mount for the price. It took about we 15 minutes to install and our TV looks great !

Reviews.Title: nice not bad at all considering price
Reviews.Author: Ro Tha Great
Reviews.Content: nice not bad at all considering price great value fast shipping on time easy instructions was able to put it together in no time at all

Reviews.Title: Overpriced even at $25! ZERO HORIZONTAL ADJUSTABILITY! BEWARE.
Reviews.Author: a
Reviews.Content: I dont understand why this product gets so many good reviews. Its 6 metal bars, painted black, (which the buyer needs to screw together) and it offers ZERO adjustability of the most important kind...the ability to easily adjust horizontal angle of the tv once youve placed it on the wall.If your wall isnt perfectly flat or if you dont screw the large lag screws in EXACTLY LEVEL, your TV will not sit perfectly horizontal!!!! BEWARE.Once the bracket is screwed onto the wall, you CANNOT make any adjustments other than the forward-backward tilt of the tv (0-15 degrees) without having to completely remove the bracket, drill new holes and start again.No wonder they give you a "free" HDMI cable....the frame should cost about $10 AT MOST.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Shellie Thomas
Reviews.Content: You cannot beat the price... Best Buy charges 79.99+ and you have to buy the cable separate. And you also get a level!  How cool!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Shawnp31
Reviews.Content: Easy install. bolts that came with were an overkill. I used anchor bolts for sheet rock and it holds my samsung 6300 46 inch no problem. I only paid 25.00 came with a 10ft HDMI. Theres not a bad thing about this mount!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: APeterson
Reviews.Content: Delivery was the next day - vs expected 2 days!  The mount was not too complicated and works as I wanted, but is a little tight on placing the cables from the TV,

Reviews.Title: Great TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Great TV mount once you get past the confusing instructions. $25.00 is a great buy. Walmart wanted $49.99 for pretty much the same TV mount. I would buy another one. It would have gotten 5 stars but I took one off for the bad instructions.

Reviews.Title: Will be using for my families tv when to be installed
Reviews.Author: David Hagermann "David Hagermann"
Reviews.Content: I will be using this tv wall mount when my new TCL tv arrives and to be mounted on the wall, which I also bought from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Product works!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sherrod
Reviews.Content: The product came with all of the needed hardware (including the screws/anchors) and the directions were extremely easy to follow.  There was only one step that was slightly confusing (how to engage the tilt) however, it was not enough of a problem to knock off a star.  I would definitely use Cheetah products again.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: JP Pos
Reviews.Content: The mount exceeded my expectations.  However, I do not wish to be bugged by Amazon every time I make a purchase.  If I do not make a complaint, consider that I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my tv mount, it everything that I was looking for.  It worked out just right so I'm giving you all a good review because you deserve it

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: David Geraldson
Reviews.Content: Price was right.  Ease of installation was not difficult and the adjustment to verious sizes of TVs was simple.  I got this one mostly because it had the best price, but it is also very functional.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Lauren Austin
Reviews.Content: Arrived fast, easy to build and install and looks great! Holding well. Great product for a really great price. Ordering another soon for our other flat screen!

Reviews.Title: Product Great, Instructions Blow
Reviews.Author: Tessa Moore
Reviews.Content: The product itself is fantastic, once you figure it out.  It took a few hours and my engineer boyfriend to help me get the sucker put together correctly.  But it is sturdy.  Once I had it drilled into the wall, we both hung from it, and believe we're a little bit heavier than a TV!Overall, I'd give it a go... but do have an extra set of hands to help you get it up right!

Reviews.Title: Works as it should
Reviews.Author: Owen J.
Reviews.Content: My only complaint would be that the bracket needs assembly and the instructions could be better for performing the assembly process. Otherwise it does a great job of holding my 42" LED in my "workout" room.

Reviews.Title: Very good mount for the price
Reviews.Author: atw5545
Reviews.Content: I have 3 wall mounted flat panels.  I used this one to mount a 60" Sony.  This seems like a sturdy mount.  Lots of extra screws/spacers/washers so it only takes a few minutes to assemble and mount the TV if you know what you are doing.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective and self-contained
Reviews.Author: Tony E
Reviews.Content: Although somewhat time consuming, the bracket assembles sturdily with some patience and attention to detail. Check parts list carefully and inventory parts prior to assembling. Allow 1.5 to 2 hours for assembling and mounting. Ic you follow those guidelines, you'll find yourself satisfied with the product results.

Reviews.Title: Seems to work well.
Reviews.Author: Ty Dynamo
Reviews.Content: It was cleverly packaged to save on shipping weight and size. As such, it required some unexpected assembly. But for the cost it seems to work fine for holding up my old 42" plasma tv, which weighs *a lot.* It's now been a month or so and it hasn't fallen off the wall yet!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Tom Hiltbrunn
Reviews.Content: I got this cause i wanted my TV mounted obviously haha It is a sturdy product and it came with easy instructions so installing it was easy. I have not had any issues at all with it and the extra hdmi cable is always a plus.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal, Solid Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Godsgirl
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised at how well made this mount was. It was very easy to assemble and came with more hardware than you can imagine. The written instructions were clear, though the pictures suffice.  I've mounted a 32" tv, which is as wide as the mount, but can tell it's strong enough to hold a much bigger tv. The HDMI cable and level are great too. If ever we get another tv, i'll definitely buy this again!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: G. Davis
Reviews.Content: Couldn't ask for better. 15 minutes to get get installed and I can hang off the thing it's so sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount!
Reviews.Author: Jason Adams
Reviews.Content: This mount was super easy to install and holds my 42" Sony TV incredibly well. I will be buying another one for my other TV very soon.

Reviews.Title: Great extras low quality mount.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Logan
Reviews.Content: The balancer and HDMI cable are the best of this bunch. The mount is bending under the pressure of my tv I have a Vizio e552vle which is around 92 lbs and this mount is supposed to hold up to 160. So be cautious when buying this mount it might not hold up your tv. I put 9mm screws in to make sure mine does not fall.

Reviews.Title: Many pieces for a simple bracket
Reviews.Author: JAMES NEWMAN
Reviews.Content: Took way to long to assemble the numerous pieces. It holds the television fine but could have been engineered much better.

Reviews.Title: A great value and a pretty good bracket
Reviews.Author: Joshua Gould
Reviews.Content: The things that I enjoyed with this kit are that it includes anything you'd need. It had many types of screws for different mounting surfaces. The directions were good. I didn't have any trouble putting the bracket together, attaching it to the TV or mounting it to the wall. My only criticism is that the bracket itself flexes when the TV is on it. The bracket seems very sturdy in your hands but when you put the TV on it, it flexes pretty easily. I have some concerns about how the bracket will hold up over time. Even if it does eventually need replaced, I'd likely replace with the same since it's still such a good value!

Reviews.Title: Wall mount for a 55" & 40"
Reviews.Author: Robert Newcomer
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these mounts for my 40" flat screen and while it may take a little while to mount it correctly, it is very stable and works great! The kit came with several different sizes of mounting screws for the back of the television as well as some spacers to fit the mounting holes which was great. I then ordered a second kit for my 55" and it works great for that one too. The level works, the HDMI cable works and looks great, overall fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Needed additional hardware not incuded
Reviews.Author: Tess "Tess"
Reviews.Content: It's a great deal for the price and incudes an HDMI cable if you need one.  One word of caution: it didn't have the right size screws or something my husband needed to install a 32" TV.  He isn't a novice when it comes to installing something like this and luckily he found some that were the right size in his workshop. Other than that it's great.

Reviews.Title: Really Good
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: Really easy to install, it brings everything you need to installed, it can hold a heavy tv like my 50" inch plasma TV 2inch deep. thank you

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: lharris
Reviews.Content: I've had this mount for over a year now and it has been great. I don't know why people buy products 5-10X the price of this one. I didn't find the instructions all that complicated, and there's even a couple of 'instructables' website pages that can help you (I had to find them when I got a new TV and had to relocate my mount.)Basically as long as you follow the instructions and make sure that you're mounting into studs, you should have no problem with this mount at all.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nicholas L.
Reviews.Content: Worked as described.  I would get this again and I am glad they included an HDMI and 2 levels with the purchase.  Very helpful!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Delivery time and delivery is good, the price is right and the quality is indisputable cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV...l products.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive mount for a TV that won't be moved or have any reason to be tilted/extended etc. This one did the trick just fine (and got an HDMI cable with it!)

Reviews.Title: pros and cons, but good for the price
Reviews.Author: Mr. Kyle A. Delabar
Reviews.Content: Seemed small for a 55" LED, but it proved to be sturdy enough to get the job done. The locking mechanism was quite a challenge to engage; hint: you need a long skinny phillips screw driver and small hands. My only other issue is that while it did come with metric bolts of a variety of sizes, they were too long for an LED TV. I had to go out and buy shorter bolts.The included HDMI cable and level were a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Karen K Ziegler
Reviews.Content: It came quickly and wasa easy to install. We would reccomend this product to other customers. Four, three two one.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Ericka Smith
Reviews.Content: It worked out perfectly.  Thank you so much.  It was very easy to put up on the wall with the help of my brother. (:

Reviews.Title: easy install
Reviews.Author: A. Alcala "Mexglx"
Reviews.Content: This mount has been holding our 47" LG flat screen for 8 months. The ability to use off center studs was important for our installation. No issues whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: WARNING for SAMSUNG 2013 TV's
Reviews.Author: BD
Reviews.Content: I have used many TV mounts over the years mostly from Sanus. They have all worked without issue or modification. For most this mount will be the same. However if you have one of the larger Samsung LED LCD's (or maybe all newer LED Samsung's), I would pass on this mount. The main problem is that the VESA mounting holes on the back of the Samsung are recessed and not flush with the back of the TV. Therefore when you screw the back of the mount into the TV, the washers will not make contact with anything when the screw is fully tightened and lead to "play" in the arms. To overcome this, you have to use all the washers in the bag to fill the gap space. The problem is that the other washers will not have the same diameter and you will need to expand them. I used a dremel to "hack" the other washers so they would fit. And you will have to use ALL the washers in the bag.TV Mounted: Samsung UN65F6400 - 65 inBottom Line: Not plug and play with Samsung TV's that have recessed VESA mounts.I will also concur with others comments that the safety screws are nearly impossible to access with a 65 in TV. From the bottom of the mount to the bottom of a Samsung 65 inch TV is 12 inches. So you need a screwdriver that has a tip of 14 inches minimum to tighten the safety screws.

Reviews.Title: Would Have Been 5 Star (*****) But....
Reviews.Author: H. Shergill
Reviews.Content: I have "Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color" TV which has a flat back with the nuts around 1/2 cm inside from the level of the back. I had to use custom longer bolts and add 1 inch cushion so that I can keep it at an appropriate distance from the wall to provide some room for the HDMI cable and power chord . Secondly, the vertical mounts that stick to the TV with these bolts are so small that there was no room to adjust the TV height using the multiple slots for bolts that were on these vertical mounts. The bolts were at the two extreme ends of these mounts for my TV to fit. But I an happy that they at least  fit, else I would have to return it. I would suggest that the manufacturer should include longer bolts and cushions as  an option for such TV's and the length of the vertical panels should be such that its adjustable and can be lengthened or they are made bit longer in the first place.Last thing - The included HDMI cable did not work . My TV started flicking with a sound (tuk..tuk......tuk) and when I replaced the HDMI cable, that I was using previously , It went away.Apart from the above it works and the price is attractive and with a free HDMI cable , the deal becomes irresistible! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I can only reiterate the other favorable comments that caused me to buy this.  Great quality and value with top-notch packaging that includes all the parts you might need for a variety of installation types.  The only slight negative was the assembly instructions.  They was a bit too concise and I had to review them a few times to make sure I got the pieces and screws aligned right.  But this is a small nit for an otherwise impressive product.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Does the Job
Reviews.Author: David Michael Silverman McHugh
Reviews.Content: Perfect for an inexpensive wall mount with no fancy features. Easy to install, and holds my 40" close to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Only good for smaller TV's with connectors on the side
Reviews.Author: L. Bui "Sweating while working Out"
