Reviews.Content: I recently moved into my new home and bought 2 of these wall mounts for a 60" LG plasma in the living room and a 47" Vizio for the master bedroom.  Based on all other reviews I was expecting a better product then what I received!!!  Here are the issues I had with these mounts:1)  You have to assemble the frame of the mount.  Not a hard task but instructions are lousy!  The biggest issue with assembling these mounts was the side bar that connects the top and bottom rail.  If you look at the picture on the instructions it appears they both face towards each other, this is not the case because the holes don't line up that way.2)  It's nice that is is relatively flat unit that makes TV appear flush against wall, but no room to connect cables unless the connectors are recessed in or on the side like the newer Samsung LED's.  You will also have a tough go at tightening the screw underneath since its so flush!3)  This mount is suppose to be able to tilt but physically impossible with the 60".  The bottom portion of the TV pushes it away from wall so you can not tilt and mount it.  Larger TV's have to be mounted flat.4)  Studs are usually 16" apart so the best the mount will catch is middle and one edge.  If you try to mount it center on a wall you may have difficulty lining up the base with the mounts to catch the studs.Worked ok for the 47" but will have to look for a better mount for the 60" plasma.

Reviews.Title: great sturdy wall mount for both 32 inch and 60 inch TV
Reviews.Author: P.K.
Reviews.Content: great wall mount for multiple sizes. Comes with HDMI and leveler but you will need a drill and stud finder in order to install

Reviews.Title: mounting
Reviews.Author: Lonnie
Reviews.Content: Screws were to long to mount bracket back of tv. Locking screws were hard to get to.Otherwise tv is hanging on wall

Reviews.Title: I thought I wrote my review
Reviews.Author: bigo
Reviews.Content: This is made great. Very easy to put together. Plus looks good. You also get Ia level and HDMI with it I have bought mounts before and never got that with other mounts I bought.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jalfaro
Reviews.Content: it took me a little bit longer to get it installed, but the tv looks good. i recomend this product

Reviews.Title: perfect for our needs
Reviews.Author: Isha
Reviews.Content: There are so many different types of wall mounts out there, it makes it hard for one to know what they need. Cheetah Mounts made our choice easy. It wasnt complicated to assemble. There werent a wholes bunch of parts. And it came with everything we needed to mount it. All we needed to provide ourselves was a drill bit, a drill and a screw driver. And the price was rediculously low. All the others i have found were between $200 and $300. I have recomended this to my friends. I was scepticle that it would be of cheap quality for the price but my 47 inch flat screen is in good hands with Cheetah.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Barbara A.
Reviews.Content: My son=in=law installed this item for me so I  really can't comment very much.  However, it seems like it all went well with the installation of my mount with the TV

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: maurg
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price. Works just as good as the expensive ones the big box stores talk you into. I will purchase this product again if/when I need another. I highly recommend this product...save yourself some money!

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Bullwinkle
Reviews.Content: This was not too hard to install with the help of another adult.  It holds our 47-inch Vizio securely in place.

Reviews.Title: Cheap & Easy To Install
Reviews.Author: Brian NY
Reviews.Content: It took about an hour to put this mount together and install my 60" TV to the wall.  Instructions were easy to follow and it came with every possible screw, washer, spacer and bolt you could possibly need.  As long as you know how to find a stud, you'll have no problem installing this.  Don't waste over $100 at an electronics store, get this mount!

Reviews.Title: Works Great and low cost
Reviews.Author: Robert Lapointe "RLP2010"
Reviews.Content: Be prepared to put it together (come in 10 pieces) but once that's done it hands and holds the TV very well. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Riley75
Reviews.Content: I used this to mount a 51" Samsung TV over the fireplace.  I'm not sure what the other people are talking about, but this was very sturdy and didn't bend at all.  It took my friends about 25 minutes to install.  I also purchased two other Cheetah mounts, but haven't installed them yet.  Can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Review from the perspective of a TV installer.
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: I have installed many flat panel TVs in my career. This review is quite long but if you want the quick summary here it is.This wall mount is one of the worst I have seen in my experience. The frame is a thin and flimsy 2 pieces that must be assembled before installation. Very cheap overall, I believe the only thing that makes this wall mount appealing is the price compared to what you will pay at a physical store and the perceived value of the included HDMI cord and level. But does it work? Yes it does as I installed a fairly heavy 50" Panasonic plasma. For a similar price on amazon there are much better mounts.Pros: does what it's supposed to doCons: cheap, flimsy, low quality, have doubt's of its maximum rate weight capacityFull review:Comes with all the hardware to put the mount together and includes most common mounting screws for your TV. Includes one tool a small level, an HDMI cable, and instructions. The instructions are adequate and easy to follow.Wall Mount frame bracket is by far one of the worst. Why? Because it is thin gauge steel and is two pieces. Also the two halves are held together by small screws with nuts. You also need extra tools that are unnecessary for the common wall mount installation such as either an adjustable wrench or tiny sockets for those tiny nuts on the screws. Also the screw hole openings make putting together the bracket difficult because they don't line up perfectly. On my wall mount the holes didn't line up so badly that I had to drill into the metal frame to make one of the holes line up. Once the wall bracket frame is put together it is very easy to bend. What you want to look for in a wall bracket is a solid one piece frame with heavy (thick) gauge steel. The height and width of the frame aren't even that important as long as the thickness of the steel is thick and solid.The arm brackets that are attached to the TV aren't that bad. They are on the low end but of God enough strength not to easily bend. They do an adequate job of mounting the TV to the wall bracket. They come with screws to lock the tv from being lifted from the wall after it has been installed. This is pretty standard as many wall mounted have the same screw to lock the TV. No complaints here for the arm brackets. They do allow to tilt the TV down if needed and have to be tightened to hold the angle you choose.I installed a 50" Panasonic plasma and it was fairly heavy at about 60-80 lbs nothing difficult for 2 people to carry. I didn't notice any issues but I seriously doubt this mount can hold a TV up to 165 lbs. TVs are getting thinner and lighter and I bet modern TVs don't even come close to that weight and believe the manufacturer makes such a claim to promote confidence in a buyer and is a bluff since it will be rare if a TV that weight ever gets installed.From the perspective of a TV installer, putting together the two halves of the frame does take a long time which adds to the overall time to install a TV. Also the holes didn't line up and I had to modify the wall mount frame by drilling into the metal to make it work. Time is money and an installer wants to install a TV as quickly as possible to keep a customer happy and to fit more installations in a day.From a value standpoint this wall mount offers a low value because it is very cheap. Low price but you get low quality. The included HDMI cable doesn't add much value as these can be had for as little as $2-3 on eBay. The included level isn't much of a bonus either since this is a pretty common tool around the house. And for those that don't have any, they Can be had at a local dollar store for a buck.It is definitely a 3 star product. Would rate it less but it does what it's supposed to do and for a low price. But I can argue with you all day that there are much better products in this price range here on amazon. I've tried brands like avf which has been my low price favorite here on amazon for quality wall mounts. Designer habitat also offers good mounts for a low price but stay away from their 2 piece designs. Don't be fooled by the perceived value of the included HDMI cable as it's best to put the most money on the wall mount itself and buy the cables separately. If you want really good mounts, Sanus is a good brand if you can afford them as their mounts use very heavy gauge steel and are very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount, but some problems
Reviews.Author: Robert Smith
Reviews.Content: This mount is sturdy, but the side portions do not line up exactly.  Additionally, when mounting the TV, the hook-on portion attached to the TV are easy to attach, but the set screws on the bottoms are extremely difficult to secure to the bottom portion of the mount.  I had to use 3 socket extensions with a Phillips head bit to get to the screws.  The TV cannot be pushed forward to get to the screws, because if you do, they do not line up with the back of the lower portion to secure the set.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Scott D. James
Reviews.Content: I mounted two 60" televisions with these. They worked great.  They provided a clean look for the wall mount.  I highly recommend them for the price.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Robert Mardis
Reviews.Content: Works great and easy to install. I appreciated the two bonus levels that came with the package. Didn't have to go dig through the garage to find mine. Plenty of hardware to use for differnt applications.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: don bostwick
Reviews.Content: I've looked everywhere for a cheap wall mount, I chose this one for the price,I'm glad I did! Easy to install

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Eryn
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done. Good buy. Why spend a lot of money on one, when these work. Easy to install. Took about 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Less than half the price
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Warmbier-ramp
Reviews.Content: This is less than half the price of competitors. Works great. Need a short 1-2 ft cable TV cable to install TV to wall or get wireless. Great value!

Reviews.Title: Easy To Install And Convenient
Reviews.Author: Eldah Yute
Reviews.Content: I can simply say this was a snap to assemble and install. The components were few and the unit does not protrude too much from the wall. Its light yet sturdy frame is a plus. It also allows you to slide the TV horizontally to center it before locking into place.The included HDMI cable works nicely too.Generally good value for money and I am not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: K. Carr
Reviews.Content: I mounted a 46 inch Sharp TV in our bedroom and this mount was very easy to install and is still holding great after about a year. Plus, thankfully it came with a 10 foot HDMI because my 6 foot cable didn't reach. You cant beat the price of this without a free HDMI let alone a free one threw in. Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Mcnona
Reviews.Content: So pleased with this purchase. Going to order another for my son bedroom. Also it was very easy to install

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: Really fast to install and works great!  I love how it hugs the wall.  I'd purchase this again in a second!!

Reviews.Title: Mounted our 42 inch plasma
Reviews.Author: Josh Simpson
Reviews.Content: Ordered this mount and it arrived within two days. Great price, solid construction and a bonus HDMI cable. The quality of the HDMI cable is really good, especially for the price of free.This came with all hardware to mount the tv. Went up like a champ, has been rock solid. The tilt feature works great for our bedroom tv. We mounted it a little high so we can watch more easily from bed.Great product!

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: John Walsh, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Easy installation, great quality and works well.  What more can be said.  I have looked at several mounts for my TV, some being 3x the price and this ranks up with the best ones.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount
Reviews.Author: Will Taylor
Reviews.Content: I mounted a 32" LG LCD tv on the mount. Works good for what it is supposed to be. I like that it came with a 14 foot HDMI cable. The reason for 3 stars is because the wall mount comes in six pieces. Would be much better if it were a one or 2 piece design as my other wall mounts are. Besides that the mount works good.

Reviews.Title: tv jam
Reviews.Author: kimmy burke
Reviews.Content: we bought this big tv and need to put it up out of the way it was the first time I looked online for something we for it quick

Reviews.Title: just what my my bedroom needed
Reviews.Author: Donald Harris
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Its just what my bedroom needed. It didn't take long to put up once i found the studs in the wall. Very durable.

Reviews.Title: easy to set up and love the hdmi wire
Reviews.Author: YU HAN YU
Reviews.Content: was very easy to install. instruction was clear, and all the stuff i need was in there. good quality and excellent price!

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Celeste S.
Reviews.Content: This mount was very affordable. which caused me to be skeptical about product.  Once receiving product I realized that this was a great deal!  Super easy instructions and super quick install, even included level and HDMI cable!

Reviews.Title: Item is as sturdy as the reviews I have read.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The item has held up well and is a great deal.  Helped out a lot with them including the HDMI cables, because what I had would not reach with the TV hanging on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Tv mount
Reviews.Author: Miranda Whitman
Reviews.Content: Received it and everything was there, haven't been able to put it up yet due to some remodeling but can't wait.

Reviews.Title: sturdy mount, slim profile
Reviews.Author: Brock Rumer
Reviews.Content: This mount ships in a small box - so small I thought I had gotten the wrong product. But once assembled, it's full size and very robust.It's easy to assemble and easy to get hung. It comes with anchors for wood studs and masonry, if you have another surface you may need to get another type of anchor. The mount gives you a lot of flexibility in getting the TV where you want it relative to studs, etc. And the built-in and included levels make getting it just right a cinch.The hooks on the arms make it easy to get the TV in place, and are sturdy enough that you will feel confident letting go if the TV. The screws to lock the TV in place are tricky to reach, but important if the TV is anywhere it could get bumped.The tilt is handy. I needed to mount my TV slightly higher than the theoretically "perfect" height but by tilting it down slightly the viewing experience is awesome. However, it's important to note that these are intended to set a permanent viewing position - you'll have to take the TV down to adjust the angle.This mount is very low-profile. That's awesome for a super clean look, but it does make it a chore if you need to run a new cable or something. I wanted a mount that was as slim as possible, but in retrospect a mount that pulls out a bit would already have been handy, and a little more depth wouldn't have been that big a deal.Overall, I'd highly recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: great item for the price
Reviews.Author: blue
Reviews.Content: This worked perfectly for my 47" flatscreen. Very well made and easy to put together. The 15* angle is perfect for viewing from above my fireplace. Plenty of hardware to chose from in the package. The hdmi cord was a nice bonus. Level was handy too.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: SJ
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and the mount is strong for a 46' tvIt just has too many small pieces !

Reviews.Title: lots of screws for every purpose
Reviews.Author: AskMeAboutRNA
Reviews.Content: Very nice kit, easy to mount, except for the part where you screw in the safety screws from the bottom, which I found very annoying since they are behind the large TV and hard to get to, and the screws are very small, so the screwdriver slips out pretty easily.  However, the kit is well-designed and comes with tons of screw options, which is welcome.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: GT
Reviews.Content: Just purchased second mount. The first has performed great and was easy to install.  Recommend for 25 bucks can't go wrong

Reviews.Title: Great price. Works as stated in discription
Reviews.Author: Robert Miller
Reviews.Content: Bought this flat screen mount for over my fireplace. Was easy to install and only took a few minutes. The angle adjustment was perfect looks great.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Dave S
Reviews.Content: This is my second Cheetah Mount.  They have good quality and are easy mounting.  The biggest hassle is finding the studs in the wall. The ability to tilt the TV also makes this a great buy.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Monroe
Reviews.Content: For the money you can not beat this mount. It is very strong and it has the ability to fit may different sizes of TV's.

Reviews.Title: perfect kit
Reviews.Author: Uige Lopes
Reviews.Content: I bought this but my TV dont arrived in my house . I can't test this mounts. Wait my words to it

Reviews.Title: A good basic mounting bracket for the money
Reviews.Author: LePaul
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble, easy to mount. Light weight but plenty strong enough to do the job. No use spending a lot of money for a bracket from box stores when this $25 bracket will do the job. Also it came with all hardware needed which was a pleasant surprise. Have not tried the cable yet since the cable I had was long enough.

Reviews.Title: GREAT MOUNT! NEEDED A SPECIAL TOOL THOUGH
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Ausley "AJ"
Reviews.Content: I bought this and it is awesome. My only complaint is that I needed to get a 12" socket extender (a long handled driver would work) to reach up in there and tight down the clamps. If you are ok with your tv just hanging, you are fine. However, I am a little worried about my house being broken into so I wanted it bolted down.The cable seems great too.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Francesca LaRosa
Reviews.Content: I have to admit, I was quite skeptical of this product when I saw the price, but then when I read the other reviews I felt a little more at ease. I'm pleased to say that I was happily surprised by this wall mount. I mounted a 47" LED HDTV in my bedroom and it works great! I may even purchase a second one for my living room!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I used this product to mount a 60" LED television to my wall yesterday.  Assembly and installation were straight forward and easy.  Finding the center of the studs was the only mildly hard step and that was easily accomplished with a stud finder.  The mount is pretty basic in that it doesn't tilt left or right and the up and down angle must be set before hanging the TV.  The TV will be very close to the wall when done.  I had to use the included spacers to gain enough space for the optical cable as on my TV the optical connecter comes straight from the back.  The rest of the cables mount from the side so were not an issue.  If needed I would purchase this mount again and do not hesitate to recommend it to anyone not needing left / right angle adjustment.Update,  I liked this so well I purchased another one to mount my bedroom set.  Being able to adjust the tilt 15 degrees allowed me to mount the TV high on the wall, angled down so my wife and I can lay in bed and comfortably watch with out any strain.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Wall Mount works great!
Reviews.Author: Bambi Greene
Reviews.Content: I'm really glad we bought the wall mount. We live in an older house and all we had to do was walk by the TV and it would start shaking. With the wall mount, we can jump all over the place and the TV never shakes. The price was great. It actually arrived before the expected date and the packaging was perfect. I would definitely buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: gteat value
Reviews.Author: jsp
Reviews.Content: This mount was so simple to install and very inexpensive. The only caution is with the level, not very accurate. Use a 2' or 4' level and you won't have a problem. TV hangs great.

Reviews.Title: best tv mount and great price
Reviews.Author: cinfan566
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a cheap made mount,but the cheetah mount was well made and very easy to assemble. I recommend this product highly.

Reviews.Title: Bracket worked great, HDMI cable not so much
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Irwin
Reviews.Content: Got the bracket in a timely fashion and it went together well.  I like the way they package all of the little screws and fasteners (IKEA take note).  The HDMI cable that came with the bracket failed and I had to throw it away.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal, Great Price
Reviews.Author: RA Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Hey at this price who could go wrong, it works perfectly.  If you're I the market this is the way to go

Reviews.Title: Awesome product for the price.
Reviews.Author: James Inabnit
Reviews.Content: Most cases you get what you pay for. This was a cheap price with a nice product. I liked the fact that it had enough hardware to accommodate most any installation.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: IvotedforRomney
Reviews.Content: Best out there. Sturdy, easy set up and great price. I bought  and love it!  Comes with everything you need.

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: f
Reviews.Content: Worked great and the price was great.  Not sure why anyone would spend more on a mount found at the local stores when you can get this one from amazon!

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and quality
Reviews.Author: Erich
Reviews.Content: After being disgusted by BestBuy's $100+ mounts i hopped onto Amazon and noticed this mount for $25 and the decision was simple. With all the great reviews, i pulled the trigger and this product is great from what it offers to the quality it has. 10/10 will purchase again for my tv upstairs.

Reviews.Title: Good solution
Reviews.Author: Luke2080
Reviews.Content: Great solution for the price, and a good mount.  Took me longer then I expected to install, just because it is tough to get 4 separate holes completely level, so had to play with it for a while.The only downside, is it is impossible to tighten the "safety screws" once the TV is on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Good price and works good.
Reviews.Author: Elvira
Reviews.Content: It is a product that have a good price and really do what is expected to do.I am satisfied

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Sutherland
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical buy this due to the price. However, it is awesome! After only two sets of holes in the wall, the husband was able to get it low enough and straight. Yay!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Bantheni
Reviews.Content: Very affordable and works fine. Won't span more than 2 studs so need to be creative if you need to center on one stud.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: K. Waldroff "KW in LR"
Reviews.Content: Used it to mount old 42" TV and it worked great.  Really good value for the price.  Not hard to put up for the average person.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: RW2
Reviews.Content: This is my third Cheetah TV mount. I was so satisfied (cost and design) with first mount that I bought two more.

Reviews.Title: Works great, worried me at first
Reviews.Author: Brady Dowling
Reviews.Content: The mount has been awesome for the month that I have owned it. I have an old widescreen but SD 42" TV and it is heavy. I really had my doubts that this thing would be able to hold it onto the wall and cringed as I let it go onto the mount but it has been going strong since I put it up.I don't know if it's the way I installed it on the wall or the position of the studs compare to the TV but the left side of the bracket seems to lift off the wall just a little bit. The right side looks fine but I think it's because of the positioning like I said. But once I drilled holes in the studs in my wall and had the mount on there, I was too scared to move it so it'll have to stay there.Anyway, solid mount and my TV hasn't fallen off yet!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: jenn
Reviews.Content: What a deal...these mounts a lot more money anywhere else. I was able to mount my television all by myself and I am a 37 year old female..no man required...took about 2 hours to complete the job...solved my problem for a fraction of the cost of hiring someone else.

Reviews.Title: Worked well
Reviews.Author: AJ99
Reviews.Content: We got this for our Samsung Aquos 60" flat screen and really like it. Husband said it was easy to install and I like that it has the tilt feature.

Reviews.Title: works perfect
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: for the price or even priced more its a great product have 3 TV's that ive used this mount on works perfect easy install

Reviews.Title: Works Just as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Alex B Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Other than the difficulty with the instructions that others have already mentioned, this product worked great.  My only complaint is that the vertical hinges don't really leave much room to tilt the TV up or down.  Other than that, no complaints with this product.

Reviews.Title: Good Product...
Reviews.Author: Duane
Reviews.Content: found it to be very sturdy and does exactly as expected as advertised. I like it and use it...try it  :-)

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mario Torano
Reviews.Content: Thin, Light, Strong!  A+I love that it's easy to assemble and how compact it is.  Don't let the small compact frame fool you, it is strong and durable.

Reviews.Title: Simple to put together. Works great.
Reviews.Author: Brian Keyes
Reviews.Content: Simple to put together. Works great. It is well made and very sturdy, I would purchase another when it's needed.

Reviews.Title: Bare bones but does the job well
Reviews.Author: William Mandell
Reviews.Content: No frills wall unit assembled easily and attached to the wall quickly. I feel like we could have spent a lot more and not received anymore features. I'm very satisfied. The TV is on the wall and you don't even see the wall unit. The prices in for wall mount units in stores are considerably more.

Reviews.Title: 4 Stars
Reviews.Author: ALANNA
Reviews.Content: Very good price for its quality. Only thing is the tilt is rather stiff and takes more effort to extend the tv out. This is a better deal than the ones you find in Bestbuy. Got the tv mounted in an hour at most including installation (directions weren't too clear).

Reviews.Title: ITS OK, FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: THE PRICE IS GREAT BUT IT KIND OF FEELS CHAEP AND YOU HAVE TO PUT SO MANY THINGS TOGETHER THAT DONT FIT THE GREATEST. ITS COOL THAT IT COMES WITH AN HDMI CABLE

Reviews.Title: Outperforms mounts costing 3x as much from the big box stores!
Reviews.Author: techman
Reviews.Content: This mount works great on every TV and monitor I’ve used it with.  It assembles in 10-15 minutes and comes with a bevy of accessories including an HDMI cable and a bubble level for easier installation.  This is now my go-to mount for new TV installations.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, ok instructions
Reviews.Author: Katherine Simmons
Reviews.Content: We had a little bit of a confusing time putting it together and getting it up. The instructions were not that helpful, but the product is fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Very Easy Install
Reviews.Author: R. Cantor
Reviews.Content: I can screw up and DIY project, but this worked like a charm, and hasn't dropped the flatscreen yet. Easy install instructions with everything included.

Reviews.Title: Works fine with a light 32" flat screen I had to mount.
Reviews.Author: B. F. Beckham
Reviews.Content: First time I had to put together the support bars on a wall mount but it wasn't hard.  I had to purchase longer bolts for the hanging hook bar, the bolts that came with the bar were a little shorter than what I needed.  It was an older model 32" TV.  Easy to hang with supplied screws.  Works fine so far and it's still on the wall.  If I can do it anyone can.

Reviews.Title: Simple, perfect, bomber...oh yeah, and cheap!
Reviews.Author: Ross B Gimpel
Reviews.Content: This could not have been a better purchase. I did read that the instructions were a little sparse and while that may be true, it didn't take me long to figure it out. Once together and on the wall, I was able to hold my body weight with no flex. I can't believe that you get the mount and a high quality HDMI cable for this price!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at the quality of this product.  It is very well made.  Very sturdy.  The instructions that came with it was very straight forward also.  Installation was a breeze and the plasma is now on the wall out of the way.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price!!
Reviews.Author: GRTrnka
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and it comes with a 10ft HDMI cable.  Hung a 42" flat screen by myself in about an hour.  It comes with two levels...but best use longer level for more accuracy.PROs - Low Cost, ease of installation, instructionsCONs - Don't judge a box by it's cover (packaging)

Reviews.Title: Does the job well
Reviews.Author: Happy Buyer
Reviews.Content: Exactly as showed in the picture (included w/mini leveler+cable). Simple assembly, fits and looks well on a Samsung 42". No complaints here!

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: FCguy
Reviews.Content: Went up easy - came with HDMI cable that I don't currently use but that was a nice freebie. It is a bit fiddly trying to actually hang the TV once the mount is on the wall and the brackets are on the TV. You need two people so you can look down the back and line up the 'hooks'. Trick is you should rarely have to do this. Just have a friend to help you.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: Azzazzello
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about this product when I received this in a box about the size of a hardcover novel. I was very satisfied after the assembly. It is a sturdy mount, despite the size, that comes with all the hardware to hang up any television. About half the weight of my other mount I bought from best buy and a quarter of the price. Even comes with a leveler and a decent HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: chadginoza
Reviews.Content: The instructions weren't the greatest, but the unit is so easy to assemble just by looking at the box.  The levels provided are cheap, but get the job done.  Cable works fine.

Reviews.Title: it is great
Reviews.Author: Buddy L Cromer
Reviews.Content: Instructions really good and it went together in a snap. Put the 42 inch on the wall last night and it took all of 30 minutes. This is a good product

Reviews.Title: Great Mount For The Price
Reviews.Author: JaredL
Reviews.Content: This mount was easy to put up and install. It came with too many bolts, screws, etc. (which is a good thing). The instructions weren't very clear, but it is pretty self explanatory. The level was cheap, but I didn't buy this for a level. For a mount that comes with a 10' hdmi cord I don't think it can be beat. The cord is long enough where I was able to stick it through the wall behind the TV and float it down to the cable hole and plug it into my PS3 with room to spare. I can't believe what some people pay for HDMI cords as the lower priced ones are just as good and this one is no exception. I have a 50" Vizio and the mounting brackets went on it perfectly. With the tilt mount it makes the TV easy to see when it's higher up  (53" to the bottom of the TV to keep it out of reach of 2 yr old). I really don't see how anyone who buys this doesn't feel like it's money well spent.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Vthieu
Reviews.Content: pretty much the cheapest wall mount i could find, but it was easy to install and it holds the 34 inch tv in my bedroom just fine

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: brannigan
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the price.  Easy to install.  I bought 4 and they are tight to the wall.  I will buy again.

Reviews.Title: For my parents
Reviews.Author: Equan Glenn
Reviews.Content: Works just fine, Bought this for my parents as a gift. They love this and the 42 inch I bought with it. They're happy, I'm happy

Reviews.Title: Excellent easy wall mount
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: We really like this wall mount for our 42" tv. It was really easy to install. The only complaint is the level that was included seemed off. Overall well built quality item. I would recommend it. Price is great compared to buying in stores.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: lucas
Reviews.Content: I have 60 Samsung plasma. It holds mt tv no problem. I would get another one If I need ed to. The one down side is that it is hard to reach the keeper screw s on bottom on a big Tv. In happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Definitely OK for the $ ... but ...
Reviews.Author: Rico C
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty decent bracket - especially at this price point.  However, had I realized that the top and bottom rails are not a single piece, but instead are 2 pieces (each) that must be connected together (and to the vertical brackets), I would have bought something else.  Cheetah actually does a nice job at ensuring they align well, but if I had this to do over, I would pay the extra for a one-piece bracket.  Mine seemed to align OK and the level showed the assembly to be level, but once I hung the TV, it was off by a couple of degrees.  I could have possibly missed something when leveling the bracket, but the 2-piece design conceivably allows one side of the rail to be level while the other could be slightly off ... I think this was my issue, but haven't had the opportunity to disassemble everything and recheck.  Again ... this is a decent bracket - just be sure you know what you're getting and what to watch out for when mounting it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I have this mounted to my TV. Love it. I had to do drilling into my wall studs as I would recommend. The rectangle piece is mounted to the wall, the 2 arm looking things hook up to the back of the tv, at that point you just let it hang from the arms into the top rectangle rack portion. Easy set up, no need for instructions, common sense set up. You will need a drill for drilling into the studs(I personally have wood studs), Obviously if you have concrete walls or metal studs, would need a different type of drilling tool and screws. I used a ratchet for the screws as they are huge.

Reviews.Title: Mounts easily enough.
Reviews.Author: Danny Barker
Reviews.Content: It does require a drill and some tools to hook it up.  The instructions seemed pretty clear and straight-forward.  Wish I had hooked it up to the concrete wall instead of the studs, the screws are really big, so be careful how you place them, one of the studs started to crack from the screws cause I put it a little bit too far off center.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Michele Holt
Reviews.Content: This works just like I expected. Would recommend this item for the large size wall mount flat screen tv. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: rd
Reviews.Content: This thing works well. It is not too difficult to put together and mount. Placing the TV on it was a breeze. It is my second one and I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: good mount, good price
Reviews.Author: davis
Reviews.Content: Found this mount a few weeks ago on Amazon for a good price with free shipping so I figured I would try it. The installation is easy and it comes with all the hardware needed for mounting, even on a fireplace. Good product for price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Mr. Moik
Reviews.Content: As advertised.....amazing bang for the buck!!!!!All the hardware you could ever need.Raise the price now that I have mine!!!  ;>)

Reviews.Title: good deal!
Reviews.Author: Stephen (CLT)
Reviews.Content: it works with my Samsung LED 55 in. it took some times to find out which part goes where and about two hours to install. it's a good product. Very good deal compare with other brands.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount.
Reviews.Author: John P. Byer
Reviews.Content: Nice mount. Does what it is supposed to. All the hardware I needed was included. The included HDMI cable is a nice touch and seems to be good quality. As some other reviewers have noted, it can be a little difficult to reach the safety latches. I would buy another when the need arises.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: charlie greenwald
Reviews.Content: Simple install up, in minutes. Easiest mount I've ever used. Came with everything except a person to install it. Would highly reccomend

Reviews.Title: Fully Universal and Good Value for money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The mount was supplied with every combination of screw/washers/spacers/lags you could imagine. Of course I only used combination for my system but its comforting to know that it would have worked for any TV.Setup was easy. Great value too. You get a 10' HDMI cable and a spirit level with it free!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Cos
Reviews.Content: This was the first wall mount we installed. We installed my bedroom one first which is a 42" LCD tv just to see how it went. Just make sure when you put the screws in it stays level. Just being off a little bit makes your tv look off. Then the living room TV which is a 55" LED TV which I just bought looks beautiful. The mounts are well made and heavy. Great product for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Easy Install
Reviews.Author: CoachMan
Reviews.Content: You can find wall mounts in the big box stores for 3 or 4 times the cost you can find them here - which is outrageous. This item comes well packaged and it is solid. At first, it can seem a little intimidating if you've not installed wall mounts before. Don't let that happen to you! Just take each step one at a time. Once you begin assembly, you'll see there's a method to it all and how it works.Your key is going to be hitting the wall studs. Take the time to accurately find them - use a finish nail to make sure you've fully located them - remember that the t.v. and mount will be able to cover the little holes left by the finish nail. Once you've located the studs, you're good to go! The mount allows for flexibility for where you want the t.v. to finally sit on the wall and takes into account that the studs may not be centered to where you'd like the t.v. hanging.My other suggestion - use your own 2'+ level - don't rely on the small level that comes with the packaging.

Reviews.Title: Gret TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Country Girl
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my son and daughter-in-law for their new TV.  The say it mounted with ease and is really nice how it is  so close to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price and works great.
Reviews.Author: Roger McPherson
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised and you can't beat the price,easy assembly of wall bracket, even comes with a small level and HDMI cable.  Works as advertised and can' beat the price.

Reviews.Title: When in Tilt, can't fasten the lower screws
Reviews.Author: Josh Frommie
Reviews.Content: We have a 55" LED Vizio and when the mount in tilted, you aren't able to secure the lower securing screws.  So it is just hanging on the top hooks.  Not safe.

Reviews.Title: Great low profile mount for the price
Reviews.Author: Eric M
Reviews.Content: Great mount for the price. Very low profile. Only bad thing is I had problems with the HDMI cables out of both mounts I purchased. One Tv had white dots everywhere. I assumed this was interference since I ran power and HDMI cabled right next to each other. But then the cable guy couldnt get my other tv to work. I switched the cords out and no interference and no problems. Still a great deal for the mount, just dont count on the cables that are included.

Reviews.Title: Great match for a 55" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: H. Stone "Harry"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to mount an RCA LCD TV(see my other reviews) high up on the wall in our church. Assembled it easily, and was able to stud mount it with no problems. The free level and HDMI cable just added to the fun. It was inexpensive and yet made well enough that I have no problem hanging a TV 8 feet off the floor above peoples heads.

Reviews.Title: Great product, easy to install
Reviews.Author: Konstantin Ivanov
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I wall-mount a flat screen TV and I must say it was really easy with this inexpensive mount. I used two different stud finders (one with magnets and an electronic one) just to make sure I pinpoint the center of the stud. Assembling was very easy as well. Highly recommend this product. One thing to note though is that there's barely any space between the TV and the wall, but this is the look I was looking for and since I drilled a hole behind it cable management was not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: It was an excellent decision to go with this mount not expecting to perform. Great choice I think in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: D. Andrews
Reviews.Content: There are usermade instructions on-line if you have trouble with instructions(kinda confusing?). Still my tv looks great on the wall, and the price!!! Excellent sturdy product. Would buy again (but I won't need to ;). Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Terrific value
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: This was easy to use, works great and was priced right.  Can't go wrong with this wall mount tv stand

Reviews.Title: simply awesome!
Reviews.Author: Nha T. Vo
Reviews.Content: In short saying This mount is freaking awesome! There's so many great reviews of this product that probably my review doesnt even matter. But since this mount is so great for so little price, i felt like owe the company a 5 star rating and review.The installation was easy. I was able to have mount put together with the TV hang up within about 1 hour. That is with me having no experience in construction lol.My older brother saw it in my room and was so impress with it that he kept on bothering me to order one for him for the last 2 months. As a baby brother i had him waiting all this time, while he's watching my tv sitting nicely on the wall :DLast but not least, the HDMI cable included is no cheap cable, i was so impress with it that i return and bought a second one for myself as well.all in all a great 5 star product, Dont hesitate to buy.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: FABIOLA MONUMA
Reviews.Content: This item was easy to mount to the wall as well as the tv. The price was great as well

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: Jamal Samaha
Reviews.Content: If you are going to buy a TV mount, buy this one!!!! It holds my 50 inch TV up with no problem

Reviews.Title: Minimal to get it done
Reviews.Author: mtnrunner
Reviews.Content: I used this for a 60 inch TV and it fit, barely.  The wall bracket is not a solid piece, it comes with mending plates for the top, bottom, and sides, which I didn't love.  When I hung the TV, I couldn't reach the screws on the bottom of the brackets that mount to the tv and rest on the wall bracket, so I had to go buy an 18" screwdriver that could reach it.  Its a fine wall-mount, but pretty cheap and the minimum to get the job done.

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: C. Norris
Reviews.Content: The mount is great for the 37 inch tv I bought it for. Just be careful if you use the level that comes in the box, it is pretty much useless. When I was finished and stepped away the tv was about an inch low on one side, had to move the screws and use a real level.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: cellthehut
Reviews.Content: Pros- easy to installfits well for my panasonic 42 inch TVCon- it sits so close to the wall that it has no space for the HDMI cable to protrude from the TVAlso once on the mount it is almost impossible to lock down the  retaining screws on the bottom you will need a long screwdriver and some patience

Reviews.Title: perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: michael e carr
Reviews.Content: did exactly what i needed it to do. came with an HDMI cable. holds my old 47" tv that weighs about 80 lbs with no drama.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: Pat Bailey
Reviews.Content: Have used different manufactured mounts in the past for other TV's - but this one was superior.  Will purchase from this supplies again when needed.

Reviews.Title: Great kit deal
Reviews.Author: W. S. Lynch
Reviews.Content: I originally purchase 3 but found that the deal was so good that I have recommended this item to several friends wanting to mount their flat-screens too.  The price is about two-thirds cheaper that the leading electronics firm (BB) and comes with a HDMI cable & great instructions as well.The only negative comment I would say is it really does not work for 32" flat screens as advertised.  I could have used a smaller mount for the 32" TV.  The vertical support bracket is the same height as the average 32" TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount! Easy Install!
Reviews.Author: Matt Lonseth
Reviews.Content: I was very skeptical at first when I purchased the mount even after reading a lot of the reviews.  But I have to say I was greatly suprised when it arrived.  It arrived in great condition and after opening it was pleased to see there were no visible defects with the product.Just for reference I was mounting a 7 yr old 42" Plasma that weighs as much if not more than some of the newer, larger LED TVs.  The mount set up in minutes with no issues, the instructions were perferct!  The only issue I had were the bracket mounting bolts for the back of the TV.  Since my TV is 7yrs old, the ones included with the mount were not long enough, but with a quick run to Home Depot and the use of the included spacers that issue was resolved quickly!Overall very pleased with the mount and will be purchasing another one when the need arises!

Reviews.Title: Mount bracket is very large.
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: We bought a 32" TV and this mount to put it on the wall. The TV just covers it so we could not adjust the wall placement of the TV at all. It was pretty easy to install and it's easy to use, but I would recommend it more for a larger TV.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Paula Perras
Reviews.Content: We had bought another more expensive mount at at box store for triple the cost.  When I saw this on-line before using I ordered, it was as good if not better and did the jobe we needed.  We have a 55" mounted and it is perfect.  Great product for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a good product!
Reviews.Author: Byrd
Reviews.Content: Easy install and works great.  Much cheaper than a similar product at a big retail store. Get yours today! I will buy Cheetah whenever I buy a new TV.The one thing I thought was odd is that the bracket comes in 6 pieces.  You have to put it together for either a big TV or a small TV, whereas other mounts come as one solid piece of metal.  This may be how they keep the cost so low.  Once it was put together and mounted, it was just as sturdy as my other mounts that were double the cost.  The leveler and the HDMI cable are a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: The product works fine. I am totally happy with the purchase. Will purchase additional items when the need arises.
Reviews.Author: Paul T. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The product works fine. I am totally happy with the purchase. Will purchase additional items when the need arises. bye now

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: stex806
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  It was easy to install and is hold my 55 inch tv with no problems.  Think I'm going purchase another mount for the tv in my guest room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount
Reviews.Author: James Geiger
Reviews.Content: Mount was everything as advertised.Bought it because of previous positive reviews.Excellent value for the money.Instructions were a bit convoluted, but in the end, got it together nicely.

Reviews.Title: Easy to mount and disappears behind the TV
Reviews.Author: Mathias Hoehn
Reviews.Content: I love this mount  - easy to install, the TV is still close to the wall. The only you should check is how your cables are existing your TV as the TV will be very close to the wall and it might no work anymore. I had a short HDMI connector so it works - but there are also long HDMI connectors that would not have fit.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: Mrs LaB
Reviews.Content: My husband said to give this 5 stars. He said it was much more durable than expected, went together easily and quickly and he's certain it will hold our 42" insignia. He did mention the tools do not come with it, and you should use your own level. Overall, an excellent purchase and the TV looks great on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Works great and easy to install.  I havr to modify slightly because it does not span my stud arrangement.  If you are going to use, make sure you land on 2 studs 16" apart

Reviews.Title: very easy to install and adjust ... and my tv hasn't fallen off yet!
Reviews.Author: Cliff Bunch
Reviews.Content: it took me some time to get it up because I live in an old house with plaster walls, but, once I got the anchors drilled and the brackets hung, it was easy to hang and adjust my tv.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: JOK "jhn in ok"
Reviews.Content: Excellent, did the job, cost effective, exactly as described, well designed, easy to install, just what was needed, no problem.

Reviews.Title: Great price.
Reviews.Author: Basspro
Reviews.Content: This is not as user friendly as the more expensive ones, but it is a great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Directions are a little hard to follow, but by taking my time it went up right.  Almost perfectly level also.

Reviews.Title: A little difficult to put together, but sturdy
Reviews.Author: Andrew Simmons
Reviews.Content: Instructions are lacking, but overall, the wall mount works well and is very sturdy (an important part of the value) at a very fair price. Mounts shouldn't cost more than $40 and this fits the criteria as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: JP-Man "JP-Man"
Reviews.Content: The mount is exactly as described. If properly assembled, it is very sturdy. I hung a 51" TV with no issues. The mount is very low profile so you may need to attach your cables and the hang th TV. Overall this product cannot be beat for the price. Please not that this mount does not articulate or telescope.

Reviews.Title: Worked very well for me
Reviews.Author: Rob Mason
Reviews.Content: Item worked very well to attach 32 inch LG flat screens, only wish it had the ability to be locked somehow for commercial applications by a small lock.

Reviews.Title: 2 piece screw together
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: Thought it was one solid piece of metal not two that have to get bolted together. Does not say any thing about the in description.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Hermann E. Wagner
Reviews.Content: Just the cable is worth the price of the whole thing. TV fit perfectly easy to assemble. Good quality and great price!!

Reviews.Title: Quick shipping. Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: Worked great for my 60 Samsung plasama.  It was also an added plus to recieve the cheetah HDMI cord. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount
Reviews.Author: Jason Kemp
Reviews.Content: The mount works great and feels sturdy. The 10ft HDMI cable is a nice little bonus as well. It's just what I had hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Best Value
Reviews.Author: Scott H. Reed
Reviews.Content: Excellent, came with HDMI cable, plenty sturdy mount, tilts great! Best bargain I've had in a while.Thanks! love It!

Reviews.Title: great product.
Reviews.Author: Charles Taylor Jr.
Reviews.Content: price and quality were excellent. cant wait to hang my new tv. I cant believe a new hdmi cable came with it for that price. awesome.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts w/Samsung 55" LCD
Reviews.Author: Big E.
Reviews.Content: This mount works great! So much so, that I recommended it to a friend, and he bought two! I helped him mount his TV's too, and they were a piece of cake! You can't beat this price, either!

Reviews.Title: Great price and good product
Reviews.Author: John Loveless "kc7ekk"
Reviews.Content: Great deal but it comes in such small pieces, the assembly time is extensive.If you don't mind making lots of extra screw connections just to build up the frame, go for it.Mounting is a dream.  It goes up and holds the TV like it should.  Great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Banks
Reviews.Content: This product is so easy to install.  I recommend it highly.  I actually bought another one to hand in the bedroom..

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Relatively easy to install, much more affordable than competitors products. Would highly recommend.  Even comes with a 10foot HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Vizio had issues with this mount
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: The 100x100 VESA screws were too short, had to go buy longer ones.It was difficult to mount the TV at its smallest setting due to the way the mounting plates are bolted together rather than being one piece.

Reviews.Title: cheeta mount
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL
Reviews.Content: I tok a risk in ordering this but it was worth it ... now I can hang my 32 inch TV ... for 25 bucks and free shipping and here the next day ... it was shipped 10 miles away so ya .. fast lol ...... I think u can mount any TV on this .. it has a lot of mounting holes so u can pritty much put a 10" TV ............anyways good price;) .....

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: B. West "Ninnie Babs"
Reviews.Content: You know you like something when you get one then decide to order another one!What a great price. Arrived as promised. Packaged well.I did not hang these my son in law did and it didn't take him long.He was impressed that it came with a small level so you get your tv straight.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Janis
Reviews.Content: I had just bought a different Cheetah Mount "full motion swivel one" the week before and was very satisfied. Since I had another 32" TV I decided to buy another one however I needed it to be flush with the wall is why I choose this one. It was equally as easy to assemble and hang. The only downside to this one is that you can see the metal bars sticking up from behind the TV. If you have a larger TV I don't think this would be seen. It's not a big deal but a little of an eyesore...so to speak.

Reviews.Title: Works great but the level is not level
Reviews.Author: Kris Rice
Reviews.Content: Get another level.  The one that came with it was about a bubble and a half off.  Other than that it works great !

Reviews.Title: EASY AND AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Christina Orr
Reviews.Content: GREAT PRODUCT! IT WAS VERY EASY TO INSTALL AND DIRECTIONS WERE EASY TO FOLLOW AS WELL! LOVED HAVING THE LEVEL!

Reviews.Title: Great product...Great price
Reviews.Author: Brad_B
Reviews.Content: This was first TV wall mount I purchased and am extremely pleased. Mount arrived quickly and all pieces/parts were accounted for. Parts were high quality and very sturdy. I had no problems assembling as the instructions were easy to follow. If I need another mount it will definitely be a Cheetah Mount.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: E C
Reviews.Content: Best mount for the price..came in 2 days.... HDMI cable worth the cost alone...instructions well explained and easy to install....level very helpful...

Reviews.Title: A- item
Reviews.Author: Keller
Reviews.Content: Great for the money. Not much room to work behind the tv after its hung. So plugging in cables could be a pain. Only complaint, other than that, it's great. I hung it by myself.

Reviews.Title: cheetah mount
Reviews.Author: bowhunter1212
Reviews.Content: Everything i wanted and more! I highly recommend this product. I look forward to buying more cheetah products in the future!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Fuzz_e_2
Reviews.Content: Good deal for the price. Product works exactly as described. Only negative aspect of this product is the final screws on this product were difficult to reach. Could be because of my tv.

Reviews.Title: great price and hold your TV to the wall really well
Reviews.Author: customer
Reviews.Content: great price and works great.  I have 3 of them now.  Ships fast.  Easy to install and the level is nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: anand mishra
Reviews.Content: Missing Parts. Not enough room on the back to reach for cables. Instructions is horrible. Free HDMI was the only good thing out of the package.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: McShopper "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: I was weary buying this mount because this was the least expensive wall mount I have ever seen. One of my co-workers recommend this, so I gave it a try for my new 60 Inch TV. I am very pleased with this product, it was easy to install it was very sturdy and priced excellent. It stays very close to the wall and can tilt if you want it too.  Very very happy with this mount.

Reviews.Title: Easy(ish) to install and highly adjustable!
Reviews.Author: Carl Belso
Reviews.Content: The installation was simple, other than the trouble of locating the studs in the wall.  The real plus was the amount of adjustability after it was installed.  After I got the TV on the wall my daughter pointed out that it was not centered.  I just simply moved it over some, and I still had plenty of room to move even after moving it about a foot!

Reviews.Title: perfect mount above the fireplace
Reviews.Author: Robert Connelly
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a "thin" mounting bracket for my flatscreen over the fireplace and this was a perfect fit.  It is very slim against the wall which was important since you can see the bracket from the front entry and the 15-degrees allows enough flexibility to not feel like you  are looking at the ceiling to watch the television.  Installation was very simple and the universal mount fit my tv perfectly.  Great product at an excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Good, Strong Mount
Reviews.Author: Alexis Meyer
Reviews.Content: Only reason I didn't give a higher rating is because it won't let the vesa 100 x 100 TVs sit in the center. Because the way this mount is assembled, with two separate pieces screwed together, the tv with vesa 100x100 must sit either 3 or so inches to either the left or right of dead center.However, it is a great deal for what you get! I mounted it to the beams (16inches), and I could hang from it (200 lbs) without it coming from the wall!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: C. Alcala
Reviews.Content: Easy to put together, easy to install. HDMI cord is super long and way durable. Will purchase another in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great secure wall mount
Reviews.Author: Jupiter H
Reviews.Content: Cheetah mount is a decently made mount that is easy to put up once you figure out how to put it together.  Although some may comment that the instruction were lacking, I did not find it to be that difficult once you read and study the parts.  This kit comes with the wall mount (which comes in four total parts and will have to be assembled), adjustable TV brackets and a plethora of screwing options, two bubble levels and as a bonus, a 10' HDMI cable. The slotted holes in the wall plate will allow for as many connections as you'd like to the wall. The tricky parts about the mounting process is setting the angle (which you need to do BEFORE attaching the bracket to the tv) and screwing the set screws once the tv is hung.My trick to setting the angle is using a flashlight (or laser pointer if you have it) and with the butt against the wall approximately where the center of the screen would be and shining it toward your viewing location (head high).  Look at the angle you need and transfer to the bracket.  The set bracket exactly the same, lay them side by side flat on the ground and screwing them in place. The set screws at the bottom of the bracket is there so that the tv will not lift out of the wall plate accidentally, but it's really hard to get to without a very long screwdriver.  I ended up not tightened mine but in it's location, I do not anticipate any physical contact with it at all.All in all, a very good deal for a pretty good mount.  My tv was only a 42" Plasma that weighs around 40-50 lbs. but I can see this thing easily holding up more. My biggest fear is not tv falling off the mount rather the mount falling off the wall.  If you are going into wood stud(s), the supplied lag screws will be sufficient.  I had to go into just 1/2" drywall so I used 8 drywall anchors (50 lbs capacity each) and two metal stud screws into the only stud available. I feel very secure with this setup.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Cricket
Reviews.Content: This is the a great item.  It was installed so well it kept burglars from stealing our living room tv.

Reviews.Title: cheetah
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: after a month of use i have to say this product works i have a 55 inch vizo on it and it is holding it solidly, the only problem i think besides the difficult directions is getting to the safety screws on larger screen sizes to secure the set, i had to purchase a  long screw driver to adjust the tilt and  to tighten the security screws,i also want to mention that it may be difficult to plug in hdmi's and other cables once mounted for people with larger hands on certain sets do to how close the tv sets to the wall once security screws are tightened.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: S. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: I had bought the "same" Cheetah mount two years ago for my great room HDTV and then re-ordered another Cheetah mount for my bedroom TV. Incredible difference in quality...in two years the price has gone up and the flimsiness of the latest version is amazing. The new Cheetah mount felt like it was constructed from wire clothing hangers.

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Cesar A. Velazquez
Reviews.Content: Attaches well to the wall, the box includes all you need, inhalation does not require 2 people but I recommended.Well made durable

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: This Worked great! It was Easy to install, quick and looks great! I Definitely recomend to anyone. The best bang for your buck!

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: CH
Reviews.Content: Bought this to hand my 55" LCD and worked perfectly! Easy to install and a price that can't be beat. I will purchase again when I need another.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. Quick delivery and hold a fifty inches Panasonic viera plasma TV. Easy to install took couple of minutes.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Mount, Horrible Accessories
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: The mount took some time to set up, which is alright. Pretty sturdy for what it is. Instructions could have been a little clearer, so you have to use your best judgement putting all the pieces together, but I was still able to get it done the first try. The HDMI cable they included is worthless. I made the mistake of using it as my main input cord from the receiver, and now I have to run the wires through the wall again with a better cord. Should have tested it before running it through the wall... the level I didn't even use, since I already have a good one. All in all, pretty good, cheap solution. Just don't use the crappy cord.

Reviews.Title: Multi Piece Mount, plus doesn't align
Reviews.Author: Clay Thornton
Reviews.Content: Took 30 minutes to assemble and get everything to align properly after figuring instructions out, it is a cheap mount. I am hanging a 32 inch Samsung LCD and vertical brackets didn't align properly, the TV is mounted but no room to get to the adjustment screws, no matter how I hang the TV! However returning isn't an option cause its already mounted and don't want to patch holes and scared a new mount will not use same holes. The TV is wobbly because the vertical bars will not mount to TV flush, maybe I got bad mounts or vertical bars......

Reviews.Title: Very complete and useful but.
Reviews.Author: Charlene J. Wood "dwood"
Reviews.Content: The lower hooks need to be about 1/8 inch more distant from the upper hooks. When adjusted for maximum tilt they hit the wall frame rather than clear it as the adjustment shortens the distance between the top and bottom hooks. I should have checked the fit on the frame before putting them on the tv. I will probably leave it as is, just hanging from the top rail, since there is very little room to work in and the tv is not likely to get bumped and fall. Besides this design flaw it is very well constructed and packaged.

Reviews.Title: WORKED PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: S. Pennington
Reviews.Content: Price was great - free ship - used it to hang a 55" flat screen - worked perfect and easy to install!Love AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: 4air
Reviews.Content: Tv mount worked great will definitely order more in future and recommend to friends and family . Small packaging surprising but still sturdy product for my old school heavy plasma tv.

Reviews.Title: Good Mount.. Only One Thing..
Reviews.Author: funguy
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a few months now. My 42" flat panel sits on it.The set up wasn't that hard, Just make sure you are hanging iton the studs.Pros:installation was easy. The build in leveler worked great.the item is solid and cheap compared to othersthe up and down tilt works well enoughCons:taking the tv off can be a pain

Reviews.Title: 50" TV
Reviews.Author: Gerald G.
Reviews.Content: After looking local I found this product. Don't let the price fool you it is a great product. It does take a little assembly but is well worth the savings

Reviews.Title: Solid and durable. Easy installation.
Reviews.Author: Cooke
Reviews.Content: I bought this product to mount a 60 inch LED tv. It is made of solid materials and putting the pieces together takes minimal experience. The various holes in the main part of the frame allows one to mount to various widths of studs. The unit also comes with many different mounting options (concrete, wood, sheet rock, and other applications). I used the lag screws to secure into wood studs. After mounting the base, the other half attaches to the tv and can be slid to the right or left to center the tv perfectly, even if your studs are not perfectly centered on your wall. The tv fits very flush to the wall, accurately meeting the product's description. The level is cheap but does work accurately to level check your work. The HDMI cable is very good quality; I am using it with no degradation issues. Having your own power tools and wrenches are necessary to install this item. I highly recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Great value and good quality
Reviews.Author: Kim Baschke
Reviews.Content: Was a little work to put together and put up but well worth it considering the price.  Is sturdy and solid.  I'm glad we found this mount.  The other mounts for this size that we priced were quite a bit more money.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount
Reviews.Author: Timothy Gross
Reviews.Content: Minimal assembly required then it was easy to hang. Nice to have the extra HDMI cable that came with it!

Reviews.Title: Poor design, terrible instructions, but not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Ron Smelkinson
Reviews.Content: There are set screws at the bottom of the vertical struts that are just about impossible to access. Didn't even both to try, so the TV is not locked on the wall, but the weight of the big screenkeeps it in place.

Reviews.Title: It's cheap and works like a charm
Reviews.Author: penny
Reviews.Content: I saw this exact mount at a different shop for a way more expensive price. Nonetheless, I was skeptical. But it was fairly easy to put up, and firmly supports my 42" tv just fine, and the level is a cute little additive. Also, I received it wayyyy earlier than the date I was supposed to (within 3 days). What more can you ask for? cheap, works great, good/fast shipping, love it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Gordon
Reviews.Content: Great product for a great price. Finally have the tv mounted.The contractor did mention this one didn't have the longer screwsincluded like his did, but wasn't a problem. Went to the local hardwarepurchased the screws and all is well.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: David C.
Reviews.Content: Works great on new 50 inch HDTV. Price ($25.00) was fantastic. Only drawback was poor machining for assembly which was frustrating. I had to redrill some holes and use different fasteners in some cases.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: What can I say, its a TV mount, it works... The level was wayyyy off when you set the magnetic side down, be careful with that.

Reviews.Title: Pretty impressed
Reviews.Author: Jaaq Ingraham
Reviews.Content: This had to be hung up on a fireplace wall. It was hung up with ease. The locking screws were a bit out of place, but we figured another way for them.

Reviews.Title: Low cost but good quality!
Reviews.Author: MannyFresh
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying this is a good quality product for the price, you can go to the store and pay double or in some cases triple. Arrived fast and in a good secured box. Only down fall is you do need to have common knowledge on how to hang things and set up or else it could be a headache. Instructions were crap but I had some help putting the TV up so in other words it's a two person job for the final step.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: Jo Beach
Reviews.Content: The tv mount is awesome, better than we expected and we have reccomended it to others.  We are so happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Flimzy and broken parts
Reviews.Author: PastorMC
Reviews.Content: Had to purchase additional parts to compensate for size issues and washers that were not able to fit even with the enclosed instructions. Item not appropriate to hang a 32 inch flat-screen.

Reviews.Title: best for not mounting on a stud
Reviews.Author: aprildi
Reviews.Content: What I loved the most about this was that I could easily mount on a wall without a stud! So pleased!

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: RJB "ricosan"
Reviews.Content: Great product that comes complete with everything you need including an extra level and a 10' HDMI cable that supports 1080P and 3D. Great value

Reviews.Title: Not a good bracket for mounting TV's on the wall
Reviews.Author: Tauf
Reviews.Content: Not a good bracket for mounting TV's on the wall.  Comes in multiple pieces that requires significant assembly.  The bracket is so low profiled to the wall that the HDMI connector rubs against the wall.  Now I've to buy special connector(s) to prevent damaging the HDMI cable!  I've seen better Cheetah products :(

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Les111
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived fast and is exactly what I needed. These worked perfect. It's awesome that it came with a hdmi cord and all the equipment.

Reviews.Title: Chetah doesn't mount easily !!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Prizzia  dba   A T PublishingAt (Cons...
Reviews.Content: It was almost impossible to tighten the bottom screws ,,,  In the list of tools required,,,, add an 18 inch philips head thin screw driver !!  I would not recommend  !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Saved a few bucks, thats about it
Reviews.Author: Na
Reviews.Content: The mounts are good to hang flat, solid sturdy metal and all the screws are well made.  The tilt is totally worthless, two stripped screw mechanisms with questionable functionality.  The levels are basically worthless, if you arent measuring square its going to wind up crooked.  The levels are good to about 2 inches, which is basically worthless.  The HDMI cable is totally worthless.  I replaced the one on my cable box with this longer one and if you touched either the cable box or the cable it would short out or ground out or something strange and lose both audio and video.  Went in the trash.  Got two of these mounts and both the cables had the same problem.  Totally worthless.  Saved about $10 bucks each on these vs retail....With the stripped screw mechanism tilt I would say if you want these slightly tilted down (mounting the tv higher than your eye level) go retail and buy something meant to tilt.  If you are mounting at eye level, this thing might save you $10.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Nick Cornett
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of one of these wall mounts, both being very successful. There isn't as much adjustment available as with some of the more expensive mounts, but for the money you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: 55" Samsung LED 3D TV mounted flush to wall!!!
Reviews.Author: SLC Rich
Reviews.Content: This mount is great! It mounted my 55" Samsung LED 3D TV very close to the wall... It almost looks like I used a very strong adhesive or double sided sticky tape to mount it. I can't even see the mount with how close my TV is to the wall. Perfect for my new home! Very happy customer

Reviews.Title: Great value and quality
Reviews.Author: Komrad
Reviews.Content: I held off on buying a wall mount for my television because was in front of a window and also because I thought that they were really expensive. Couple that with my incompetence with mounting something on the wall and keeping it level, and you have a recipe for failure.So how did it turn out? I reorganized my living room to put the TV/entertainment system in front of a wall. I decided to save up for mounting kit, and was shocked when my search found this one. $25 shipped? Seriously? New? It's not broken or missing pieces? I hit 'buy' right away. No saving up required.The mounting process took some time. All of the measuring, marking the way, using the included level to make the holes even(I failed at this), finding wall studs, etc took me a while.  Unfortunately, the wall studs in my wall weren't spaced out optimally for the holes in the wall bracket. I made compromises and figured that it would hold my TV ok.Getting then mounting brace on my television took some work. Again the wholes didn't line up perfectly, so I made compromises on how high I wanted to the TV. Don't get me wrong, this item gives you a lot of flexibility, it's just with so many different mounting environments that it has to work with, it can't be perfect for all of them.ProsThe product is well made and not flimsy in any way. They give you good instructions and different thicknesses of screws and even tell you what drill bit size to use.Cons:The large level that this unit comes with seems to be off a bit. I used to for this product and for a couple of posters that I mounted yesterday and what it said was level definitely wasn't. I recommend using your own level or measure and remeasure the height of the holes to make sure that they are the some.Since I'm so bad at making items level, I'm going to look for an attachment for my television that let's you correct the level of the screen after you mount the wall brackets. Why? It's guaranteed that I am going to mount it unevenly, and I don't want to make my wall look like someone sprayed it with a machine gun from all of my attempts to get the leveling part right.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Sandakota "Sandakota"
Reviews.Content: Needed wall mount for 32" TV in my craft room. This fit the bill perfectly.  Did have DH drill extra holes in brackets because was limited to small area of wall space due to storage/door jab. Because of adaptibility of product, was able to put TV right where I needed it. Sturdy enough for a much larger/heavier TV. Very happy with product.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: scibs
Reviews.Content: Can't beat this mount for the money. Heavy load capacity, fairly easy to assemble, sturdy, tilt wall mount. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Renae
Reviews.Content: I purchased this not knowing much about tv mounts. It arrived promptly and was super easy to hang up. The price was right too.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but works
Reviews.Author: jayss
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for is the line for this.  The screws that hold the framing together stripped out.  But what can you expect at this price.  It hold the tv fine and that's all that matters.  Put a 32 inch lcd on this.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Gerald M.
Reviews.Content: Just what I required and the instructions were easy to follow and assemble I mounted a 51 inchSamsung with it worked perfect.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Tam Xuan Mai
Reviews.Content: Worked great with my 46" LED TV. The instructions are user friendly; all it took was the first time. I would recommend this mount for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Mounted a sixty inch Samsung Plasma with little or no effort. For those that need a simple bracket then this one is more than adequate.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: We have order these for our store and for our customers' who choose to mount there TV's, they are well made but inexpensive.They have a built in level on the actual bracket that insures you have mounted it level.The  10 foot braided HDMI cable that the mount comes with is of good quality, it is better and longer than most standard cords that you receive with a cable or satellite box and since it is included it is an extra selling point to our customers.We have mounted TVs' that range in size from 32" to 60" and they have all fit the bracket and mount without incident.We will continue to order these mounts as a cheap alternative to your standard TV with a  base mount on a stand.UPDATE: I have now ordered these mounts a half dozen times this year, I am as pleased as ever with this wall mount.I have yet to find a TV that this mount has not fit and it is still the best price that I am able to find on a universal mount that fits so many different sized TVs.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Tag Fan
