Reviews.Content: It's safe, cost less than most and looks great. What else can you ask from a Tv mount? We like it.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: jnaki
Reviews.Content: hello,  as we put this flat screen mount together, there were several glaring items missing from the supplied kit.  most tv backs have predrilled and tapped holes for wall mounting.  but, they are inset and most tv accessories included a washer to form fit into these predrilled holes.  but, this cheetah mount kit supplied washers, but not enough or ones with holes large enough to use the supplied larger 4 tv mount screws.  luckily, washers are in abundance in our garage tool parts box.  in order to make a flat fit for the mount onto the back of the tv, a thin washer was needed to take up the space between the tv supplied insert and the cheetah mount.  then a search of the cheetah supplied washer collection came up with 4 thicker ones to allow the larger screws to tighten the mount to the back of the tv.  once these were put in place, it was level and ready to tighten.  also, the angled hooks need to be movable together and not get out of alignment.  instead of two separate angle mounts, maybe it can be a molded one piece hook mount.  then as the mount is pushed out to try and catch the wall plate lip, each individual hook will not go play elsewhere while holding up a 70 pound tv.  a better design of this one item and the washers would make this cheetah mount superb.  after configuring the whole system, it worked and does the job, with modifications.  yrmvupdate:  the lifting and installation of the large screen tv was made easier if the dual hooks on each side are pulled out as far as possible.  when you lift and hook the bracket to the wall mount lip, then the whole tv can be pushed back for adjustments.  make sure the mounts are actually hooked onto the lip of the bracket.  the first time hanging resulted in a fairly straight hang, but the loose dual hooks were not lined up correctly making the tv slightly up on one end.  using a large bubble balance (not the one included) showed how far off we were.  after lifting again and moving it to fit the space, it fell into alignment and now it is perfectly level.  if you need to hook up your wires, do it first before hanging.  afterall, the tv is heavy and access to the back area is about 3 inches.

Reviews.Title: Way too big for my 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Steve K.
Reviews.Content: This is an extremely heavy duty mount that would be great for a large TV. Unfortunately, for my little 32" in the bedroom, you can see the mount hanging out from both sides. Definitely overkill for a small TV. FYI, the mount is 29" wide. I'd say, unless your TV is a solid 35" - 40" wide, you'll see a ton of this mount when you're anything but dead center from the TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value & Quality
Reviews.Author: Ku
Reviews.Content: I've had this wall mount for about 4 months now. I purchased it for my first 50 inch flat panel tv. Installation was pretty easy for me. Assembled it, leveled it, drilled holes, and mounted it. I love how flush my tv sits with the wall just the way I wanted it to. It might be wise to know how you want your tv/cables setup before you mount because the 1.3in spacing may be to small for big hands to plug cables in. Also make sure to have a good stud finder because my cheapo stud finder made it tough to be sure.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: garboy
Reviews.Content: just what i wanted at the right price easy to moun,t adjust, looks etc.  can't beat the product for the price.

Reviews.Title: theman
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: Worth the money :-) it was ez to put together. It came  with everything shown. I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: nat1227 "nat"
Reviews.Content: my brother assembled and hung this in no time.... tv's been on the wall about a month, no problems. For the price i am highly impressed.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service, Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: NRB
Reviews.Content: Good as their word!Months after we bought the Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B kit my son hooked his foot on the 10' HDMI cable and yanked it out of its port. After that the cable was useless. I contacted Cheetah about a possible replacement and despite the fact this was a case of user damage (not covered by the warranty) Cheetah was good enough to replace the cable anyway. That was unexpected and I'm grateful for their customer service!The kit itself is heavy gauge steel, well constructed, and simple in design. Essentially, the mount provides a ledge from which your TV hangs.  Two vertical struts attached to the back of the TV, via VESA spaced screws, have hooks which hang off horizontal rims along the top and bottom of the mount. Not complicated at all to understand how the parts are assembled. Cheetah scores!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: N. Miller
Reviews.Content: I chose this one over the MANY others for three reasons. One it mounts very close to the wall. Two, the supplied HDMI cable is a little nicer than the others I saw. And probably most importantly three, the center of the mount is all open. I have a pre-existing outlet and cable spot that extrudes from the wall a bit. This is one of the few I saw that is totally open in the center.The one con I noticed is it's a big pain to adjust the tilt once it's up. I saw others have have levers and seems like it would be easier.

Reviews.Title: Probably the worst mounting bracket ever
Reviews.Author: Brian C. Massie
Reviews.Content: Needless to say, when I purchased this mount I was excited cause of the number of 5 star reviews it got and the price of the mount; rather than spend maybe $20 more, I got this bracket and I really do wish I could give it back. For one, the instructions are HORRIBLE, USELESS, UNCLEAR. Your better off looking at the box and figuring out where pieces go. 2nd it doesn't work for all TVs. We purchased a 32' Vizio and low and behold, after we assemble the mount (which was stupid...) and go to screw in the TV brackets....they don't come with the correct screws for our TV. The length was too short; so off to Home Depot to get longer ones. Once we did get to the point of mounting the TV...it was SOOOOOOOOO close to the wall that we couldn't screw in the bottom screws for locking the bracket in! The holes for our TV were boxed (rather than rectangle) and the mounts ended up right on top of the bracket screws for the wall mount...the wall mount you had to put together yourself!Got it installed and on the wall...so 2 stars is what you get.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: motoxracer
Reviews.Content: This product is great! The ONLY problem I have with it is I wish it could tilt downward a little more is all.  Because with it tilted down as far as it goes, in my house there's still a glare from the window.  Also, the bottom screws on the mount wont work if tilted all the way down. Even with that, it's very secure on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but gets the job done!!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel E Grose
Reviews.Content: I was apprehensive about buying this product too.  My other wall mounts all cost around $80  - $100.  When I saw this mount for $25 dollars and with all of the good reviews I wanted to give it a try.  To my surprise it worked like a champ.  Looks just as good as my expensive mounts.  The instructions were a little confusing but after a short period I figured it out.  Good product, Great value.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: love it works with almost all tv's the only thing is it doesn't swivel but great wall mount can't beat the price and quality.

Reviews.Title: A little too flush, a little too narrow
Reviews.Author: Sven Zethelius
Reviews.Content: The mounting bracket is pretty easy to put together, but it has a couple of drawbacks.1) It's width is just barely enough to for fitting between two studs so unless your studs in exactly the right place for where you want the TV centered, you'll need to mount at least some of the screws in drywall.2) Becareful of the TV your mounting to.  I'm using this to mount a 60" Sharp Aquas, which has the mounting area inset compared to the bottom of the TV, so the bottom of the TV is completely flush to the wall.  This represents a problem for tightening the locking screws to secure the brackets to the wall mount.  They're in the few inches for spare room where the TV doesn't touch the wall.  Needless to say I can barely fit the screwdriver back there, much less my hand and arm to actually turn the screw driver.If you're planning to mount this to a modern LED flatscreen, consider mounting a 1" board behind the mounting bracket to make it a little easier to get behind.

Reviews.Title: Product Doesn't Seem to be Strong Enough
Reviews.Author: mandito
Reviews.Content: I don't like it because I don't feel comfortable hanging up my 65 in. tv because I don't feel that it's strong enough being two pieces put together. So I might return this item even though I might use it for my 40 in. tv.

Reviews.Title: flat screen t.v. mounds
Reviews.Author: DARLENE BROWN
Reviews.Content: very quick and easy to use. Holds the t.v. just great this mount sets close to the wall so it is to view the t.v.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Wall Mounts
Reviews.Author: E.O
Reviews.Content: Arrived immediately. It was perfect could have not asked for better. I am a air head when it comes to this stuff and I did all by myself. It helped to have everything I needed included in the box only need a few tools.  For all Woman out there this is the route to go when installing a wall mount for a TV.

Reviews.Title: Set up difficult but good product!
Reviews.Author: Annaleah
Reviews.Content: Set up is time consuming but it was well worth it! Bought 2 of them, will buy again if I ever get any more tv's

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, strong, easy to install
Reviews.Author: Malcolm Galland
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, strong, easy to install. Would buy again. Ordering another one shortly. I have a 720p 46in monster of a panasonic TV, and it holds it up quite nicely.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: soy
Reviews.Content: After reading a lot of good reviews on this mount I decided to give it a go. Package came in undamaged. Item was as described.  I agree with most people that the directions suck, but its all common sense.  Those who gave this item a poor review must be lazy and can't figure out how to put things together by just looking at it.  This mount is perfect and holds my Samsung 46" LED no problem. As long as you rachet in the lugs in your studs you should be fine. I would not recommend wall anchors.

Reviews.Title: best mount
Reviews.Author: David C. Garrett
Reviews.Content: these mounts are my favorite mounts i have 3 cheetah mounts and will purchase a couple more for other rooms easy assembly and installation

Reviews.Title: All you need
Reviews.Author: DAVID KRAS
Reviews.Content: Well made and performs well, no need to spend big bucks on this type of product.  Easy to mount and complete.

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: Steven B.
Reviews.Content: Great mount, WAY cheaper than Big Box stores.TV looks excellent up on the wall. Sturdy mount.Sony Bravia 54"

Reviews.Title: Panasonic TC-P65S60 Hangs Perfectly
Reviews.Author: MarinMan
Reviews.Content: We just purchased a Panasonic TC-P65S60 65" plasma and used this mount to hang the TV above our fireplace. Like others, I was skeptical of this mount at first (low cost and simple design) but after installing the mount and hanging the TV, I'm a believer. The Panasonic TC-P65S60's bolt holes are 27" on center (side to side) and just fit within the dimensions of this mount - it's a great, secure fit, but you will not have the ability to move the TV side to side - in other words, place the mount exactly on center of where you want the TV.All told, a great product.  It should be noted that we are not using any tilt and have the tilt lock-out pins inserted.

Reviews.Title: Very weak
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: Flimsy metal, Some screw holes were not drilled all the way through for assembly.  Paid 25 bucks for it and you pay for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Worst mount ever
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I have installed over 10 mounts in my life, I am well versed in carpentry and I have every tool.  This mount blows! Don't waste your time.  It took longer to put the mounting rack together than it did to bolt it to the wall.  Once installed there is no way to get a regular screw driver up underneath to ticket the secure screws unless you have a 8" long small Phillips head screw driver.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect, love the little level
Reviews.Author: Mike Brooks "Tech & Media Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I bought a bunch of these because the professional contractors installing them all wanted to keep the little magnetic levels. The mounts work fine and tilt as descibed.The real prize in the box was the levels though.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install - good instructions
Reviews.Author: Kristi G Grant
Reviews.Content: Good price - very strong. We used it with  VIZIO E552VLE 55-Inch 120Hz Class LCD and were really happy with the product/install.

Reviews.Title: Works better than my $100 one I bought
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: While it may be more difficult to put together than others, once you set it up, its GREAT!! I like it better than the one I spent $100 on at walmart. I highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Strong and sturdy
Reviews.Author: Jesse M.
Reviews.Content: My only issue with the mount is difficulty in setting the safety screws once you have the tv up if you angle the tv at the maximum.  To work around it, I mounted it flat, adjusted the screws, then titled the tv while mounted, contrary to the directions included. Otherwise, you can't get a screwdriver anywhere colse, even with a 24" driver like I used. The mount is very strong, study and easy to mount, and I am confident it will hold my tv perfectly for years to come.

Reviews.Title: The right price.
Reviews.Author: mathew
Reviews.Content: The mount took some time to figure out because of the confusing directions but it works great. No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Solid product, easy install, great price!
Reviews.Author: fotb
Reviews.Content: I could not pass this up for the price, but was little skeptical.  I was pleasantly surprised, very solid, easy to install and you jus can not beat the price.  I have bought several and highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: very sturdy and easy to install
Reviews.Author: S. Dickerson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to mount a new 32 tv from here, I was just going to buy one at a local store, but this one was about 40 less than a comparable one from there, so I purchased it, but it is great, very sturdy and easy to install. Would purchase this brand again.

Reviews.Title: great wall mount
Reviews.Author: Van V Truong
Reviews.Content: Great wall mount kit. Great price! It came with all the bolts and screws needed. Even had some left over. Came with a good hdmi wire long enough for wall mounting, and a level. This mount holds my heavy early generation plasma flat panel. I was skeptical but it did the job. Would buy again, will be doing so soon.

Reviews.Title: Basic flat mount that does the job
Reviews.Author: chris sauder
Reviews.Content: If a solid flat mount is all you need, this product in fine, product was a expected, I would reccomend

Reviews.Title: Son installed at the restaurant with no problems.
Reviews.Author: Don Lindsey
Reviews.Content: We order two for the TV's (2) and it took my son no time to install them. They are great supports. I'm just glad we found your site.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount for 45" TV
Reviews.Author: cynmar58 "cynmar58"
Reviews.Content: I put the mount together and my husband and I marked and installed it on the wall. It seems very strong, and went together easily. The brackets at full tilt (15 degrees) makes a great viewing angle for our bedroom size, but they do not then allow the bottom of the brace to catch under the wall mount bottom lip. Doesn't really matter for us since there is a dresser under the TV and the top hooks are securely held by weight and gravity. It came with a nice HDMI cable we were able to use as well.The only thing I had to buy were 2 flat washers for mounting the top bracket to the TV itself. I did not like the locking washers included for that area due to their size, but they worked well for the bottom mounting.

Reviews.Title: Holds my 60" LG 3D plasma on the wall
Reviews.Author: Hilda Rose
Reviews.Content: Its your average wall mount, very slim. Works well. Cheap (cost, not quality) which is always a plus.One small issue which cost it 1start for me. When you put any TV I say larger than a 42" and you intend on angling it (using the upto 15degree adjustment), first realize that 15degrees is not really 15degrees, that only apples to say a 32". Once you get a larger TV the bottom of the TV will hit the wall before you even get to say 10degrees. That really isnt a huge issue to me, but the bigger issueis once you get that angle you want, lets say you max it out in my case on my 60", its barely 5degrees angle, you have absolutely zero ability to access the screw on the bottom side of the mount where you must screw it down to keep the TV from being lifted off the mount.So you thinking let me screw that bottom one first before angling it, well if you tighten the bottom one you cannot angle it anymore because the screw keeps it from allowing the TV to get angled because the angle itself requires more length between the bottom of the bracket mount and the top of the hook part. So you have to losen the bottom screw at least 5turns then angle it. Then once you angle it, good luck tigtening down the hand screw to keep the TV from angling more or being pushed back.Thats the biggest issue with these slim mounts, there is zero zoom to put even a screw driver in once its on the wall to make adjustments or tighten a screw down.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Mount
Reviews.Author: Francise R Reeves
Reviews.Content: First I read the reviews and was a little skeptical to order. Glad I followed my instincts and ordered anyway.Great price. All the screws and the level was in the package. The bonus was it arrived a day earlier than expected and I was able to install the next day. I have passed this information on to all my friends and family. My media room rocks.fr in birmingham.

Reviews.Title: would highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Cyberlinxz
Reviews.Content: This kit comes with everything you need to mount your tv to studs, and drywall / sheet rock.i mounted it into dry wall with only provided supplies & let me tell you i can hang off this mount so i trust my tv to hang on this mount!

Reviews.Title: Excellent strength
Reviews.Author: Jason Milligan
Reviews.Content: Great value with exceptional hold and strength. I would recommend this for anyone that is looking for a non articulating arm wall mount for a large flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great value
Reviews.Author: Robert A Dana
Reviews.Content: For the price I was expecting a compromise, but everything is right about this mount kit. The mount itself is rock solid, very well designed, and well made. What really impressed me is the attention to detail. The fit and finish is first rate, and they've gone the extra mile with features like an included magnetic bubble level and the best-organized and labelled hardware packaging I've ever seen. It's a really great value at a fraction of the cost of the mount kits in the big box stores.

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: Dickson
Reviews.Content: ive had it up for over a month with a 55" tv and its doing just fine. yup. just fine.

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: George E Marinescu
Reviews.Content: great product looks really good on my wall and also very durable will definitely recommend to friends and family very sturdy good quality

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Timothy J Giles
Reviews.Content: Don't pay ridiculous prices for other mounts.  Cheetah mounts are very solid.  Very happy with product and would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great deal very sturdy
Reviews.Author: C. Naylor "Book Worm"
Reviews.Content: I really liked the mount never had a problem with it easy to install and very reasonable on price would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Eaves
Reviews.Content: This was just what was needed to install our flat screen tv.  It was very simple to put together and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great Mounts..
Reviews.Author: Leonard Montoya
Reviews.Content: Got the mount up quickly and didn't need many tools. It was a bit hard to get the wires hooked up, not much room to work with once the TV is on the wall. I should have hooked up the wires to the TV before I hung the TV. LM

Reviews.Title: It's a wall mount!
Reviews.Author: Real Raleigh Reviewer
Reviews.Content: It's made of fairly heavy-gauge steel, pretty strong. Installation is no easier or harder than any other wall mount. We've had an old-ish 55" LCD (not an LED - so it's about 4" thick, even 5" at the base, and about 90lbs) hanging on this for almost 3 years, and so far, there have been no problems. I will add that we have some serious bass in the room, and that the kids stomp on the floor upstairs from this room all day every day (jumping off beds, chairs... dressers... what have you) so this is about as much abuse as you could imagine a wall mount experiencing, other than being placed on a boat or in a camper/RV. Solid buy.

Reviews.Title: nice mount
Reviews.Author: Robert Seeliger
Reviews.Content: Very nice mount. it doesn't come far off the wall though and my samsung is a little bulky so i kind of crammed the HDMI wires behind the tv. Very strong mount though, would recommend to a friend

Reviews.Title: Great Wall Bracket
Reviews.Author: Tiffany D.
Reviews.Content: This wall bracket was easy to install and came equipped with additional hardware to accommodate a range of TVs works well thus far.

Reviews.Title: great prouduct
Reviews.Author: Gb Enterprises "GBELECT"
Reviews.Content: nice mount easy to install no problems perfect fit great for a wall mounted tv so simple love this would recomend it

Reviews.Title: flat mount
Reviews.Author: weezee
Reviews.Content: It's a good flat mount especially for the money the only down side is fighting two screws on the bottom at the end but I did it.

Reviews.Title: Needs assembly and weak
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: The product must be assembled. Easy to do, but odd.The tilt requires you to adjust a screw, however it is too weak to hold the angle with that one weak screw. Plus it is hard to get your hand in behind the tv to adjust. Your TV will hang tilted down, the only thing stopping it is when the bottom of the tv touches the wall. That will give you a two-three inch gap on top.Also, it mounts very tight to the wall, only a 1/2" gap. So if you plug your tv into a socket behind the wall, you will have an issue, the plug will interfere with the mount.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: DK
Reviews.Content: Package was missing a screw, but I was able to use one I had already.  Otherwise, 5 stars.  I have a 42" Samsung and the brackets that mount to the TV were just large enough.  My TV was purchased in 2004, so I imagine the newer lighter LED/Plasmas might have closer mounding holes, but just a heads if you have anything larger than a 42.

Reviews.Title: Great Sturdy Mount
Reviews.Author: Aaron S. Tiffee
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy this mount because of the low low price. Definitely didn't want to hang our new 47" TV on it. When it came in I was surprised, the material was very sturdy, the lag bolts were of adequate length and it mounted to the TV and the wall with ease. the TV is more study now than it ever was on the stand that it came with. You can buy this without hesitation!

Reviews.Title: This is a Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: HopeW
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this, easy to install and the price was very affordable. We live rural and the price at our closest store was 3x more.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: D T
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, no need to spend much more to get some of the other mounts. Easy to install and all the correct pieces included. Definately buy this if you need wall mounts

Reviews.Title: Great wall mount especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Darryl
Reviews.Content: First of all, I was very skeptical upon purchasing a 25$ wall mount. However seeing as how many people had success with it I thought I'd give it a shot. Worked out great. I previously purchased a Sanus wall mount that apparently could fit my 42 inch led tv. It didn't. So I looked for a bigger mount and this fit perfectly. The bars that attach to the back of the tv were literally a perfect fit. The length was right for the holes for the mount on my tv. The metal itself seems pretty sturdy. I've had my tv up for a few days now and it hasn't fallen yet.I didn't get to use the HDMI cable but I'm sure it would have worked fine. I really do like the level that it came with however. Really helpful and now I have an extra one!For 25$ this mount is a steal! The only thing I'm going to complain about this mount is how hard it is to tilt the tv. I wish I could just push it up or down with my hand but you can only adjust it on the back of the tv with a screwdriver. It took a while before I found my sweet spot but still, that would have been a good feature.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a smaller one. It was very easy to install and holds my new samsung 40" tv perfectly, no problems!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Mike Elliott
Reviews.Content: This wasn't all that easy to mount,  but it's very solid and has worked great. I was worried that it  be shabby quality, butthat's not the case at all.  We have been pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: great mount for the money
Reviews.Author: zig
Reviews.Content: this is a quality flat screen mount-i have used it to mount a 42" and a 32" tv-all hardware is included plus a small bubble level

Reviews.Title: Easy but poor design
Reviews.Author: kugrad07
Reviews.Content: The installation is a breeze and directions are great, and it is very secure.  However, there is a terrible design flaw where the safety screw, which is designed to prevent the TV from pulling away from the mount, are almost impossible to screw in once you have the TV mounted.  There is no room behind the TV for a screwdriver to tighten the screw.

Reviews.Title: Overall great 50 inch tv mount.
Reviews.Author: Ebony
Reviews.Content: Overall this mount works, like meny others I was initially skeptal about the price but decided to order it after reading the reviews. I also was slightly worried when the box came and it was so small, however I was able to have out 50 in TV mounted with no problem. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because I though we would be able to tilt the TV as described in the title, the TV is tilted donward slightly but does not really move.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and does the job...but
Reviews.Author: Will4077
Reviews.Content: As a lot of the other reviewers said, the instructions are a little unclear and it took me more time to figure out how to put the bracket together than it needed. Once together though, i mounted it easily. The attachments to the tv went on easily too. Not sure why others had problems...the kit comes with all sorts of various thread screws. Mine used M6 screws. The thing I did not like though was the safety screws. I have a 51" samsung plasma. Once on the wall, you could not reach those safety screws. The tv does not angle out enough to reach. I ended up buying a 2 foot screwdriver (available on amazon too) to get to the screws. Probably not a problem with a smaller tv, so just beware of that.

Reviews.Title: It functions for the price
Reviews.Author: Jason Walters
Reviews.Content: I was able to use this mount, but I had to modify it.  The kit came with two many top right bracket pieces, and not enough top left...  I was able to drill some holes and make it work.  I was in a time crunch, or I would have sent it back.  Holding up my 42" plasma just fine now.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping.
Reviews.Author: kindle reader
Reviews.Content: My tv is now mounted! It was very easy to hang and I'm so glad I did not pay 99 bucks at bestbuy

Reviews.Title: Thought it was a good buy.
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this was a sure bet. Unfortunately it was not. I bought a 60 Samsung led the 7100. The provided bolts that screw to the back were not the right size, I had to buy a bunch of washers to put against the tv due to the lack of bolt sizes. Also the directions were terrible they recommend using a large drill bit for the 8mm lag bolt, if I would have followed their directions my tv would have been on the ground. The fact the you have assemble the thing is a bit annoying, I mean you really have to put this thing together. You get what you pay for I guess. Also the screws that are use to secure the thing to the bracket are a pain, you better have a long screw driver if you are mounting a large TV and patience because you will be trying to screw those in without any visibility.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: George Beals
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. Works just as described and makes a more comfortable experience when I'm watching tv at home.

Reviews.Title: Delivered as Described
Reviews.Author: Linda Gutman
Reviews.Content: We haven't actually used this yet, but it looks perfect.  I'm sure we will be very happy with it.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Excellent build quality
Reviews.Author: Caden
Reviews.Content: Easy installation. Great organization of hardware. Installed in about 15 minutes. Looks clean and performs as expected. Is not inferior to the more expensive wall mounts in any way. The person who helped with install was amazed at how cheap the product was for the quality of it. I am going to recommend Cheetah Mounts to anyone who needs a mount. The 10ft. HDMI cord works flawlessly with my 360 and still would've paid the price without the HDMI cord. The TV I used for the mount was a 46" and had recessed mount points. Luckily this product comes with spacers in two different sizes and they worked great. I had to use their hardware because it wasn't included with my TV. I'm very thankful that the product came quickly and functions and looks great!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: dbrand
Reviews.Content: Was easy to install and was able to hang a 60 inch TV on it. It is a little hard to adjust with your TV on it, we just leave it on one setting since we would have to bring the TV down off the wall to adjust. Other than that it works great!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we wanted! Easy install, very low price!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin "techi"
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly for our 42" Vizio TV.The mount works as described. It was very easy to install, the instructions were clear and all the required parts were provided.This mount delivers a very low profile, snug fit to the wall, this was the most important factor for us, because when you enter the room the first thing you see is the side profile of the TV. The exceptionally low price was a big plus!I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: its a tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: Leif Arnseth "Larnseth"
Reviews.Content: pretty straight forward... its a solid wall mount.  i have a 46in LED tv on it and it works great. solid design, easy to assemble and install.  the only thing was the anchor/screws are kinda iffy, so i bought my own metal wall anchors.  other than that, its great

Reviews.Title: Not complicated to install.  Sturdy enough to hold the TV securely.
Reviews.Author: Liza Anne Deneice
Reviews.Content: Not difficult to install.  Adaptable to various postitions.  Sturdy enough to securely hold the TV.  Seems a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: good price, good product
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: would definitely get again.  less than half the price of "store bought" mounts and performs the same....added bonus was hdmi cable

Reviews.Title: solid wall mount
Reviews.Author: T. Westbrook
Reviews.Content: Surprised at the quality of this mount after pricing wall mounts at local suppliers.  Easy to install and confident that it will not fall.

Reviews.Title: click buy now!
Reviews.Author: Ryan899uv7 "Yugi P."
Reviews.Content: simple installation with alot of included hardware. it didnt come with butterfly clips so go out and buy those if u want the hold they offer. the hdmi cable is pretty good for a 55 inch tv. and the level dies a great job for that perfect install!

Reviews.Title: 46 incher on the wall!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: exactly what i needed and for a great price, level is a little cheesy but i used real tools to put it up anyways and thatll probably be on the side of my tool box forever now. tvs been on the wall for about a month now! 5 starts!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: i. smith
Reviews.Content: The price on this is ridiculous. You also get a level AND an HDMI cable? Who are these people? Installation was very manual but worth the extra effort for the price. Very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous and easy!
Reviews.Author: Blorebz
Reviews.Content: This was extremely easy to install and sooooooo worth the price! We looked a local stores for a mount and came onAmazon and found the price to be significantly lower. The only negative we have is that this is supposed to shift up and down and it doesn't.,.. not sure if that was an install error or if its made wrong.. but we def love it!

Reviews.Title: Served its purpose
Reviews.Author: James B. Smith "Ramblin' Wreck"
Reviews.Content: With a stud finder, I was able to easily install this mount.  It comes in a compact package due to the weight to strength ratio as mentioned in the description.  Once the components are assembled and mounted on wall, it seems very sturdy for its size and weight.  As other reviewers have stated, don't expect a lot of tilt.  I mounted rather high on the wall in the bedroom and did not need any tilt for great viewing from rather high bed.  I mounted an older Samsung (7000 series) 52" LCD, which is rather thick compared to my newer Samsung 3D 8000 series.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Jean Young
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I don't like about it is that you don't have access to the connections on the back of the tv without taking it off the wall.  Otherwise it was easy to install for both my 32" and 60" tvs.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Hodgdon
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these last year and they are still holding our tvs on the wall... We have a 40" a 42" and a 55"

Reviews.Title: Worst Mount Ever
Reviews.Author: Esteban B
Reviews.Content: So this is the 4th TV i have mounted, and the 3rd mount Ive used, and this has been the worst experience. Came very vast via prime - great. But it comes in many pieces, and they dont all fit together. The 2 side pieces that connect the top and bottom (4 pieces total, not 2!)wont connect and the screw doesnt make it through both holes to secure the pieces together.After a long time trying to follow the instructions i decided to just use the top bar and the 2 hooks. I used 4 of the 8 pieces that came in the box. I dont feel its sturdy but im not in a position to wait for a refund. Cheetah wins this round.BTW the mount i was replacing was 12 dollars - i wish i had another one of those. it felt flimsy but secured through 3 studs not 2. It was low profile and my outputs are on the back panel not the side so i went with a tilt mount this time.Even tho bestbuy will charge 70 for a mount, its at least a solidly constructed piece of metal.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Brandi Harding
Reviews.Content: This was the first TV mount I had purchased. It was easy to install and seems to be working great!

Reviews.Title: The Cheetah , Holds On to Wall & Flat Screen Great..
Reviews.Author: Mickey Bailey "montana kid"
Reviews.Content: It Works Like a Cheetah, Great Hold & Sturdy,and very Sleek..Was easy to install and fast attaching..I Highly Recommend it.The Cheetah..

Reviews.Title: Great so far.
Reviews.Author: Rene Betancourt
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for less than a week but putting this thing together is exremely simple! and my tv looks great above my fire place!

Reviews.Title: Good strong mount
Reviews.Author: Stevefloor
Reviews.Content: Did the job. My 40 inch Samsung is happy. Easy to put together and mount to the wall. TV then hooks onto the mount. Should have a helper but you can do it alone. I did. Good value and free shipping. NICE

Reviews.Title: Straight Forward
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: This was a simple and easy mounting bracket to install.  It also was shipped fast.  The downside is that it hugs the wall so close that it's difficult to tighten the safety screws and it was also difficult to connect my cables to my TV.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars for the price.
Reviews.Author: SocraticM3thod
Reviews.Content: This is a very decent TV mount. What I didn't realize when I bought it, is that it actually comes with a leveler and an HDMI cable. The cable alone is worth the cost of the mount. The mount serves it's purpose beautifully. Came with all the required pieces and was intact after shipping.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly at 1/2 the price!
Reviews.Author: D. Lai
Reviews.Content: I got the itch to hang our plasma tv from the wall after owning it for a few years & started looking at mounts. The local warehouse store had one for around $55 or up to $100. Since I didn't need a swinging feature, the cheaper tilt only was fine. However after checking on Amazon, I'm glad I didn't buy it right then.I chose this one because of the highly positive reviews & figured for $27 I could re-sell it or return it, no big deal. After receiving it & verifying all the contents a friend & I got it mounted. Putting the bracket together was easy, although the side pieces took me a minute to figure out which way they were supposed to be screwed in. The whole thing seemed like it wasn't strong enough for my 54" plasma but once we mounted it with the included lag bolts it was fine. Make sure you measure good so you hit the studs properly & get everything lined up.We screwed down the brackets to the locations on the back of the TV (there are several sizes of screws included to fit most standard TVs. Mine were the largest), loosened the base & lifted it up to hang on the wall mount. Everything stayed perfectly & a now a few weeks later, it's still not moving or loose.Great bracket, holding up well, lots of pieces included to make sure you can mount it anywhere & the HDMI cable & small level are nice bonuses. Will buy again if I ever need to mount another TV & have already recommended it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Very sub-par.
Reviews.Author: Zachary Joy
Reviews.Content: Not what I was expecting, but then again you get what you pay for. This is a very sub-par mount that did not work well AT ALL for my 55" LCD. The problem is that it is not adjustable to change where the screws go into the wall to match up with studs. I was mounting mine above a gas fireplace, so it had to be centered, this would be easy to do if the mount was adjustable. Also, hanging the TV on the mount was a tedious process and it doesn't give you hardly any room to work with. The HDMI cable is also as stiff as a board due to the casing they put on it. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not quite big enough for 60 in
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: So, this wasn't quite large enough for my 60 in TV.  We could have made it fit, but it wouldn't have had any leeway to move the TV up or down a couple inches on the mount.  That said, good mount for the price, and if I were mounting a 55 or smaller, I'd buy this again.

Reviews.Title: So easy to install
Reviews.Author: Martin Mills
Reviews.Content: I expected the installation to be fairly easy but it was even easier than I anticipated.  It took less than half an hour to install the Cheetah and mount my 42" TV.  Great quality and a bargain price.

Reviews.Title: Works ok
Reviews.Author: R. Young
Reviews.Content: This was an ok item for what it was needed for and though it seems a little flimsy it does work.The inclusion of an hdmi cable was nice.

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: KSENIA
Reviews.Content: If your hands aren't grown from the....This is the best product and very reasonable price.And a lot of things in addition which you could use.

Reviews.Title: Great value on the bracket but the surprise of an extra cable became a disappointment when it broke.
Reviews.Author: Craig A. Geller
Reviews.Content: Had professional come and hand the bracket.  Works great and will most certainly hold up.  I returned the HDMI cable I purchased when i realized that a cable was included.  Then the end of the HDMI cable cracked apart when putting it into the tv.

Reviews.Title: Things where missing
Reviews.Author: Michael Liggions
Reviews.Content: This was not good at all, but it was 20$ what I suppose to expect , overall  it hangs my TV hasn't fall yet so it will do for now

Reviews.Title: Very simple and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Cman
Reviews.Content: I have an older Panasonic Plasma 50" which weighs around 155 lbs and it was fairly easy mounting on the wall and attaching to the back of the tv set. Great quality for the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Joseph Rinaldi
Reviews.Content: Perfect  for my 32' flat screen for my office--Product came earlier than expected--Easy ro assemble---Easy to install on the wall...gteat product !!!!

Reviews.Title: 3rd one in house, added cable is a bonus
Reviews.Author: DP "DP"
Reviews.Content: Cheap, effective and holding up well.  I have three of these now in use.  The only CON is to get to the locking screw on the bottom of the hanger you better have a long skinny screwdriver.  I'm talking at least 4 feet long.  haha.  It is a pretty tight fit to get to this. This is why my rating is not 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: KV
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and does minimal damage to wall if ever needed to be moved.  I highly recommend this mount.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and is barley visibale on the wall.
Reviews.Author: Douglas_the_awesome
Reviews.Content: Assembly on the mount is really easy, just follow the picture and you'll have it together in 15 min. Attaching the braces to the tv is a little trickier but still easy once you figure out which of the many pieces you need for your tv. My advise for brace attachment is to play around with the different washers and spacers to find the best, most snug fit. With a stud finder mounting the assembly to the wall is easy.The only reason it didnt get a 5 was because i dont think the lag bolts for the studs are U.S standard sizes. If you've got a metric socket set you should have no problems, if not, a crescent wrench works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what you would expect
Reviews.Author: Balla
Reviews.Content: Fits the tv and hasn't fallen off the wall... Not too difficult to install. It's exactly what I had hoped for!

Reviews.Title: Works Great---be careful where you put the outlet
Reviews.Author: mschu
Reviews.Content: This works great and is a much better price than those big stores.  If you are doing this on a fresh install, its best to put your outlet in the middle of the bracket or higher.  Once you tilt it, there is only a little room for a plug.

Reviews.Title: so far so good.
Reviews.Author: D. DeJong
Reviews.Content: When I bought my 47 inch panasonic, I didn't want to spend the a ton of money on a mount.  Then I found this.  It was easy to install and now it sits above my fireplace.  It's done its job so far and the price can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Fred Wray
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. Straight forward instructions at a 1/10th of the cost of the "name brand" mounts at Best Buy. Slim mounted my 50" Samsung LCD in 20 mins. Why would you pay 5x as much for a mount that you cant even see & does the exact same thing (tilts 15* down). Don't get me wrong, I love Best Buy, I go in there just to wander around & kill time but I will never buy another tv wall mount from there.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Easy Mount
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: For the price, this mount is simple to install and was easy to hang my 55" Vizio HDTV. The tilt was just enough to allow me to have a perfect angle while mounting my TV a couple feet above eye level.

Reviews.Title: Working very well
Reviews.Author: dieselgeek
Reviews.Content: Great mount at a great price. I have this mounted in our bedroom and it's working well for us.  It was very easy to install and once it is mounted on the wall is very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Flush wall mount
Reviews.Author: amoz
Reviews.Content: ordered two of these decided to use only one, my mother bought a flat tv i gave the second to her. works great with a very good price.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: CaptCabo
Reviews.Content: Good assembly instructions, easy to assemble, priced right.  Easy to install.  It might take two to lift TV to the rack if it is too heavy or large but it catches well and sits well and secure.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B
Reviews.Author: Sharon Ashby
Reviews.Content: We are very satisfied with Mount.  It fit our new TV just perfect.  So nice having the TV off the floor.

Reviews.Title: worked just like it was suppose to
Reviews.Author: Yoyoyoyo
Reviews.Content: mounted it to a brick wall, holds up my 60' flat screen TV.  My TV was heavy but the mount held it up just fine, no complaints at all, very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Tv mount review
Reviews.Author: James Braxton
Reviews.Content: We love this product and enjoy the tilt in case of lighting.  The product was easy to install and came with completed instructions.

Reviews.Title: Works as Expected
Reviews.Author: KPDL
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for a friend, because I had purchased a couple a while back.  I told her this one is awesome product for the price. The cable work for a year or so, but for the price you can't beat it....

Reviews.Title: Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Cat Mom "1 of 12 chicago"
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews about this mount on line and considering the cost ordered it. My son-in-law installed it in our lodge and it works just fine.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a product like this for about 1 1\2 yrs. Finally I found what I wanted at a reasonable price, I liked mine so mush I got my parents one as well and they love it. Very easy to install and sturdy and everything you need is included. It is well with the price.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: FiFi
Reviews.Content: A quality product for a great price. I found the instructions were easy to follow. I have all the tools that it recommends and found installation to be easy. It took no longer than a half hour to read directions to having the T.V. hung. I used it for a 42 inch flat panel.Definitely reccomend

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: TS
Reviews.Content: This was for a 42 inch vizio. It was a little tough to access on the wall to adjust the angle but that is very minor. It is sturdy and at a fraction of the price of the stores around here you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount, Bad level
Reviews.Author: David M. Brenner
Reviews.Content: Don't trust the level that is sold with the mount.  After bolting my mount into studs and confirming the top rail was level, the entire thing was off by more than a quarter of an inch.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Scott B
Reviews.Content: While they are a little time consuming to set-up (due to being packaged in a very small box), these mounts are a tremendous value.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: David Todd
Reviews.Content: It is hard to get  a screwdriver in behind the TV to tighten the set screws and the tilt on it. the installation is easy.

Reviews.Title: cheetah
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: I liked the price on amazon it has a nice finish.instructions were ok.could have been better,a nut was missing and stripped a thread putting together.but I would buy again

Reviews.Title: Not quite what I expected
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: Seller was great.fast delivery. The issue I had was my 60 inch sharp when mounted was to close to the wall to get the wires in. I remedied this by mounting a 2x4 to the wall and then mounting the bracket to the 2 x4.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Jlightner
Reviews.Content: Product works great, not too hard to set up. I especially like how flush it is with the wall. I makes our new LED TV look amazing.

Reviews.Title: Solid mount with good instructions
Reviews.Author: anna lee
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 60" LG LED TV.  My first thought was that they shipped me a box that was way too small to hold my TV but upon further review, it was the right mount.  Everything was included and the level was a bonus.  Instructions were easy to follow and the pictures matched the mount.  I like to assemble things myself and I put it together in less than 30 mins.  I think an average person can take up to 1 hour if they find the studs in the wall.  Once on the wall, the TV is SOLID and for the price, it was a no brainer.  The only drawback (as with most mounts that extends very little) is one the TV is mounted, if you have to put a cable on the back of a large TV it will be a hassle but I knew that when I got it.  In all, great product and price.

Reviews.Title: Besdt choice
Reviews.Author: Wayne Matthes "movie collector"
Reviews.Content: This mount is strong and simple with understandable directions. It comes with a clip on level bubble, and a regular level. I didn't need the HDMI cable and I wonder why it is included with the mount. Most people hanging their TV on a wall already have a cable.

Reviews.Title: Good mount
Reviews.Author: William A. Vickers
Reviews.Content: Good mount and easy to put tv up on the wall.  Just wish the instruction book was a little bit better with the pictures when you are assembling the mount.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Norm De Plume
Reviews.Content: A couple of things....First keep in mind that this unit works with metric.  If you don't have metric sockets you are going to be spending some time cranking down the bolts with pliers/vise grips.Secondly a lot of construction.  It seems they have reduced size (probably to reduce shipping costs) by taking apart the bracket that fits against the wall.  Itll take you about half an hour to put it all together.Third, I had some trouble fitting one part of the bracket together,  Seems like the metal on the bracket wasn't bent correctly so I couldn't fit the piece on.Final Thought - Its not a bad value for the price, but I may wind up spending a few more bucks next time.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV mount to hang my 46in LCD TV on the wall. It works as expected, quite easy to install.The stud in the wall were not evenly distributed, so I was able to have only two screws run in the stud and had to use drywall anchors on the other side. Since there is no moving part once installed, this is OK. I wish the mount was designed to have more holes to allow all screws run into the stud. This is the reason I give 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Dad
Reviews.Content: Great price, easy to install, light weight, tight to wall, wide enough to hit 2 studs with margin for movement....would recommend!

Reviews.Author: miguel
Reviews.Content: A $41 value for $25 is a nice bargain, I bought this two days ago and I'm currently waiting for this to get deliver to me!!!

Reviews.Title: 4 star for the mount
Reviews.Author: K. McDonald "Forsythe the Dwarf"
Reviews.Content: 4 stars for the mounting.  -1 star for horrible instructions.Essentially find the studs in the wall and secure in using the lag bolts (larger on top, smaller one on bottom).  After 2 weeks of hanging, still solidly up there.I would recommend adding some quality anchors for additional support.  For my 51 in, Samsung plasma I used two additional 77lb drywall anchors.

Reviews.Title: Poorly Designed
Reviews.Author: Brian Hunt
Reviews.Content: Most importantly, once my TV is up, there is no room to reach the set screws to secure the TV to the mount.  Secondly, unless your inputs are on the side of the TV do not buy this mount.  1.3" inches from the wall leaves no room to plug in components without ruining your cables because the weight of the TV is resting against them.

Reviews.Title: Wall mount HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. R. Dyer
Reviews.Content: A great priced TV rack that solved all my problems, Keeps TV up and off furniture where it can be bumped and damaged.

Reviews.Title: Great for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Lyle D. Rohr "SurviveStyle"
Reviews.Content: Yep, it's a TV mount.  Strong enough for sure.  Not a lot of features, but that's ok because it's not very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: wifiman
Reviews.Content: This mount is a good deal considering the cost of just an hdmi cable at Be$tBuy!  Not the easiest mount to hang, but still wasn't too difficult.

Reviews.Title: Great mount great price
Reviews.Author: Dgoff
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to install. I have never done it and it took maybe 30 minutes. We have a 55" TV mounted on it. It came with a level which was cheap and was destroyed by a fall. My only complaint is that accessing the two screws at the bottom of the mount can be difficult.

Reviews.Title: Does a great job holding my TV
Reviews.Author: Deborah H. Cornman
Reviews.Content: I love how my Sansung HDTV looks on my wall with this mount.  It is very sturdy, and I am confident that my TV is not going anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Hangs above the fire place
Reviews.Author: D. K. Edgecombe "CDN in Tx"
Reviews.Content: This product was so easy to install and fits perfectly. The TV looks great up there and I am not concerned that it might fall.

Reviews.Title: Wall mounts don't have to cost an arm and a leg...
Reviews.Author: Todd Yeager
Reviews.Content: Like several other reviewers, the price of this mount worried me at first, since when it comes to certain purchases, you often get what you pay for. In this case, you get something you could have paid triple for.Construction is heavy and solid, and installation was a breeze even with the somewhat vague instructions, as long as you have a little bit of DIY know-how. The included HDMI cable seems to be of decent quality, although its braided sleeve is pretty ugly if you're not going to be hiding the wires. The box contains several sizes of bolt to connect the TV to the mount, as well as concrete and stud mounting hardware. The TV I mounted is a 53-pound 42", but I'd trust this mount up to the rated 65".

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Great price for great product.  No need to spend a fortune on something as simple as a wall mount.  Comes with a HDMI cable is a great bonus considering they can be expensive themselves.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bobo
Reviews.Content: This is my second order for this mount and it is easy to assemble and mount. I recommend it for any beginner or Do it yourself!

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: JEFF GERLING
Reviews.Content: Monitor is perfectly mounted on the wall and now I have all this extra desk space... Installation took about 30 minutes and now there is about a quarter inch gap between the monitor and my desk top, so you don't see the cables. Sweet!

Reviews.Title: Strong and Good Price
Reviews.Author: South Cackalacky Jim
Reviews.Content: Why pay $100 or more when you can get this one for a fraction of the cost of one at Walmart's.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Valentina Sullivan
Reviews.Content: So easy to assemble and works great! I love that it holds bigger tv's as well as we have contemplated purchasing a bigger television for our living room and it will work with the new one as well!

Reviews.Title: Does not work with 32" Visio Smart TV.
Reviews.Author: pete
Reviews.Content: You will need to buy 4 washers to attach the brackets to the back of your TV.The ones supplied do not work.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Assemble, Works Great
Reviews.Author: Dat Hong
Reviews.Content: I am currently using this with a 47 inch Vizio LCD.  The mount was easy to assemble, and the instructions provided were easy to read.  You basically build the frame, then mount the frame to the wall, and then clip the TV onto the frame.  Mine came with 2.5 inch lag bolts, and I had to use a wrench to put them in the wall.  The way they went into the studs, I doubt the TV will ever fall down (hopefully!).As others have said, the included level is junk, so make sure you have a quality one.  The mount is just the right size to fit over a standard outlet box.You could pay 4x the price for a TV mount, but you don't have to.  I recommend this.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Glynna Helms
Reviews.Content: This was just as described.  It worked perfect for us.  I would recommend it to others looking for this type of item.

Reviews.Title: Like my Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Gail Higdon "Gail Fuller"
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to install after I read the directions step by step. It is serving the purpose of holding up my new TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice wall mount and quick delivery
Reviews.Author: Steve Farmer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase. I looked around in stores and all the wall mounts were expensive, but this one was affordable and functional.

Reviews.Title: Lots of assembly required
Reviews.Author: CP
Reviews.Content: More complicated than it seems.The rear bracket must be assembled from 6 different pieces.Typically it is one piece.It works but it takes much longer than a normal mount

Reviews.Title: ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Coralie Tran
Reviews.Content: So you have to spend half an hour, just to assemble it.Then once mounted, I wasn't able to reach the little screws under the rail, that suppose to secure the Screen, under the rail.So the screen is hanging with the hooks above and I guess it should be fine as the TV is big enough to not move on the tv wall mounts.

Reviews.Title: Nice mount
Reviews.Author: Max Weeks
Reviews.Content: Just got this in yesterday. It was pretty easy to put together and install. It took me about an hour total from finding the studs to hanging the TV. The worst part as other people have pointed out is the securing screws on the bottom of the mount behind the TV. I had a long screw driver and it could barely reach. There is very little room to move back there once it is hung but it is enough to get the job done with the right tools. I was also worried that there wouldn't be enough room for the cables, but there is just enough. The HDMI cables aren't kinked up or anything and I was able to hide the excess cord behind the TV rolled up with zip ties. I also adjusted the tilt before I even put it on the wall. This made the process much easier as well. I knew that I didn't need a full 15° tilt so I just kind of split the difference and it's perfect. My TV is a 46" Sony Google TV. I didn't weigh it but I would estimate it at about 50lbs or so and it is completely solid on the wall. I have no reservations about this mount working for as long as I need it. Great purchase and great product.

Reviews.Title: It works great... BUT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Henry Sheffield
Reviews.Content: The mounting part that goes into the wall doesnt fit "older" tvs (2008). I learned this the hard way last night when i installed it. So what i had to do was take a piece of the bottom bracket and line it up with the top on to make it fit so I could hang my tv on it. It works fine but its not correct. So just beware.

Reviews.Title: Good quality. Would recommend for a little larger than 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Kenessa D.
Reviews.Content: The quality and price are great for this mount. We did have to modify it a bit for our 32" Samsung LED but It was only for aesthetics--the mount showed a little on the sides. A little bigger of a TV with a larger frame and it would have been perfect. The free level came in handy more as a toy for our 3yr old and we chose to use a better quality HDMI than the one provided but they were free so no complaints there!

Reviews.Title: Oversized
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The mount is rather large because I can sort-of see the bars out from behind my 32" TV but for the price I cant complain. Besides seeing the mount behind the tv it stays very close to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very durable
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Great product was very hard for me to mount but hold my very very and heavy big flat screen love it !

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: John Harris
Reviews.Content: Good directions made the install very easy. The only thing that was difficult was finding a screw driver to tighten the bottom screws to secure it.

Reviews.Title: Great product, Very tight to wall
Reviews.Author: Brooke Fominaya
Reviews.Content: Very good product, only 2 minor problems with it.First, it is very, very close to the wall. So close that I have issues plugging things into the television while it is mounted. This is also partly the television's design, as the plugs are not right at the edge of the television body.Second, the only way to adjust the angle of the television (up to 15 degree adjustment) is to loosen a bolt, manually adjust the angles, and tight the screw back up. If you are not doing 0 degrees or 15 degrees, it is very difficult to get these lined up precisely with a larger television. In some cases it is impossible to do this while the television is hung. This doesn't make a huge difference, and the vast majority of the weight is not on the bottom of the television.Otherwise, I really like this product. The price is unbeatable, and the product is very sturdy. Even with the largest television listed for this product (65"), I feel more than confident that this will hold the television until the studs are torn down.

Reviews.Title: Simple, easy to put together rack that works great with my 55" google TV
Reviews.Author: YaleGirl
Reviews.Content: You don't need Best Buy's $120 rack. This one works great and is easy to put together yourself. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to showcase their TV on the wall. It is a adjustable and simple to use.

Reviews.Title: No adjustment for error
Reviews.Author: genie at WC
Reviews.Content: I have a 50" set that is about 4 feet wide.  The mounts on the set are 16" apart with no vertical adjustment.  If you do not get the wall brackets EXACTLY level, you cannot change or correct it, and the out of level is magnified 3 times.(3 x 16 = 48).  When drilling the holes into wood, the drill wandered 1/16 inch, and now the TV is out of level by 3/16"..........bummer.

Reviews.Title: Returned the product
Reviews.Author: Dileepkumar S R
Reviews.Content: I have returned this product. Because i don't have any chance to use this one in my apt. it is not a use full for me.

Reviews.Title: worked great
Reviews.Content: everything worked great thanks for an excellent product will be shopping again with you guys i would recommend you guys to my friends

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts
Reviews.Author: tom tamura
Reviews.Content: I don't know why they call this a cheetah - it takes forever to assemble because the instructions consist of small pictures and are poorly labeled.  It shipped with tons of parts, most of which are different screws to fit the mount to the TV; unfortunately the one that fit my TV was too small and went right through the part of the mount where it should have secured too.  Oh, and there were no washers.  I spend most my time finding washer in my spare parts that would work with the size bolts I needed.  The spacers which allowed you to tilt the TV, again didn't work cause the size bolt I needed was too short to thread in the hole with a spacer and washer on it.  And not to mention there was missing hardware to assemble the part the secures to the wall.  Good thing I had some spare nuts and bolts around the house.  This is the third TV I've installed and by far the worst.

Reviews.Title: Happy w/Purchase
Reviews.Author: LuvnLuke
Reviews.Content: It does just what it's supposed to. Easy to assemble and holds the TV well. Thinking about getting another one for our second TV.

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Andrew Eaton
Reviews.Content: i can't believe how low-profile this thing is.easy to install, no issues.unbelievable that stores will charge 10x the price for similar item

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install, hardware included, level and HDMI cable a bonus
Reviews.Author: B. Good
Reviews.Content: I have been using this mount for over 6 months and it works great. Keep in mind if you want to be able to rotate your TV left and right (swivel) this is not the mount for you. This is a tilt mount that tilts up and down only.+ Easy install+ Instructions Included for Several Types of Install+ All Hardware + HDMI and Small Level+ Tilt and Lock by Tightening+ Excellent Price! Cannot Go Wrong Here- There are no Cons to report_Bottom Line_ Yes, I would recommend this mount to a friend. The price is unbelievable for how well this mount works, how durable it is, and the bonus extras included. Simply cannot go wrong with this purchase. Easy 5 Stars!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what is needed
Reviews.Author: Ryan Ward
Reviews.Content: It is easy to put together and mounts easily.  My only recommendation would be to get your own anchors.  I ended up using hollow wall anchor for mine and it is secure.I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for an easy way to mount a TV does not need to move it.

Reviews.Title: Installed 3 of Them, Great Mount for the Money
Reviews.Author: Joshua J. Ulfers
Reviews.Content: At under $30.00 these mounts are great. I bought 3 of them for less than what the chain stores would want for 1 mount.Installation: Installation went smooth as we had two of doing the install. It wasn't really different from any other mount I've worked with.Tilt: These were installed as a point of sale display behind a counter. The bottom of the TV was about about 6-7' feet from the ground and the tilt was perfect for my application.

Reviews.Title: Great mount but...
Reviews.Author: CheapArseAudiophile
Reviews.Content: I love this mount, it holds my 60" led tv almost flush against the wall, yet still allows for tilt adjustment... but... Because its so close to the wall, I'm not able to reach the bottom screws that secure the tv to the mount. If someone bumps it, or there's an earthquake, the tv is probably going down. Luckily I'm in an area where I don't need to worry much about that :-)

Reviews.Title: TV WALL MOUNT
Reviews.Author: David Ruff Sr
Reviews.Content: TV wall mount was put together and installed with your directions.  It took approximately three hours to install.  It performs as advertised.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Brandi Palmer
Reviews.Content: Shipping was quick and the product is solid. Holds our 60" led with no problem. Instructions could have been better but overall great product!

Reviews.Title: Difficult
Reviews.Author: Jay K. Din
Reviews.Content: Difficult to set up.  Very small pieces.  It doesn't look very sturdy but it's holding up the 58in plasma.  Prob wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Title: This mount was as expected except for one notable flaw.
Reviews.Author: RK
Reviews.Content: The mount came with everything as advertised.  Assembly went fine and the mount fit level.  The one issue we have with it is that the two lower screws that prevent the tv from being lifted off cannot be tightened because there is no room to fit a screw driver behind the stand once the tv is in place.  The stand works fine without the screws tightened but there might be some risk that the tv could be inadvertently lifted off unexpectedly when trying to adjust the tilt.

Reviews.Title: TV Mounts
Reviews.Author: Todd Barrios
Reviews.Content: For the price it work fine.. I bought 2 of them to do the job... I had no problem installing my TV whuch was 36" & 42"..

Reviews.Title: Interesting design
Reviews.Author: Andres R.
Reviews.Content: This is a new design for me. I own a couple of the older cheetah monts and they are just as good but the box is usually twice the size. By using this clever design they can keep the costs down and the quality equal.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: This wall mount is awesome. It is currently holding up my 60" tv in the living room and looks great. The only drawback to this product was installing it. I used a drill with a drill bit that allowed me to put the screws that were going into the wall onto the drill, but had a very hard time getting the two bottom screws in. The top two screws were bigger than the bottom two screws so I had to use different drill bits that held the screws. Well it was nearly impossible to find a drill bit that would make the bottom two screws screw into the wall. The one I used only got them in about 1/4 of the way but after that it would not screw them in. It was very frustrating so I ended up using a wrench that locks to screw them in myself that way. It took a while but got the job done. I could have done it with a ratchet but didn't have one and I just wanted to finish installing the mount already since those two screws were the last thing needed for me to have my tv up in the wall so I improvised. I wish all the screws were the same size like the first time I bought this product. I bought it for a 50" tv and all four screws in that one were the same size so it was very easy to screw them in since they actually fit one of the drill bits I had. The design of it also changed but looks better if you ask me. All in all it does the job and there's no cheaper wall mount for this big of tv's (not that I found at least) so I highly recommend it if your looking for a reliable wall mount. Oh and it also comes with an hdmi cable and 2 levelers!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Mount!
Reviews.Author: PkFloydLvr
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these mounts and am very pleased. One was used to support a new 65" Samsung 3D LED unit, the second was for an old (but great!) 42" Hatachi plasma. Given the light weight frame components I was concerned about the integrity of the mount for the very heavy plasma unit. Once bolted to the framing studs my concerns were over done. These mounts provide rock solid support at a great price!Pros: Price, simplicity, strength, easy to use.Cons: A slight one - the space between the horizontal support rails is not "high" enough to install my wiring boxes in that location. Just something to be aware and plan for.Summary: You can not go wrong with these mounts. They are more rugged than they appear and are a fraction of the price of others.

Reviews.Title: very flat to the wall
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: You will need 90 degree power and hdmi cables if your outlets are behind the tv. 55" samsung LED tv was too close to the wall on this mount to make connections and access lock screws.

Reviews.Title: nice and cheap
Reviews.Author: brian woolf
Reviews.Content: Alright, this thing was cheap... and well, nice...pros: Good constructionSmall profileTiltample supplies.Cons:instructions... they were a little lacking...Ample tools... too many of them.summary: Took about 30 minutes for me to get it put together... i first put it together inside out... yea... too many screws... other than that i's worked pretty amazingly

Reviews.Title: Great, simple mount
Reviews.Author: The Third Bird
Reviews.Content: This mount is easy to install and position.  Be sure to get a studfinder for the installation!  You don't want $500+ to fall off the wall because you thought sheetrock would hold your TV.On the downside: the bezel on my Sony KDL-42EX440 flares back at the bottom, so I was not able to tighten the screws that hold the bottom of the hangers to the bottom of the wall mount.  But this isn't a big deal: it just means my TV is kind of hanging on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: Captain Trips
Reviews.Content: Holds my tv on the wall and hasn't hit the floor yet.  cant ask for much more!  :D(Friend installed it by using the large bolts and hammering them into studs then bolted it down.  works like a charm.)

Reviews.Title: I made it work
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I bought this because the price and the good reviews.  I just got a 55 inch tv.  The directions were straight forward and I had all the tools already.  You will need a drill with 3/16'' and 1/8'' drill bits, a stud finder, phillips head screwdriver, socket wrench or adjustable wrench.What should have taken me 30 minutes, ended up taking 3 hours of frustration.  I put the wall plates together, found the wall studs, drilled pilot holes in the wall studs, and connected the bracket to the tv all in about 30 minutes.  The last steps are to connect the tv bracket to the wall plates and tighten the screws.  The last steps sound easy right? Wrong.  I initially had no tilt.  When I connected the tv bracket to the wall plate (all you have to do is hook it in on the top then tighten the screws on the bottom), there was no room for my arm to go behind the tv to tighten the screws or put any cables in.  So then I took it off and decided to do the tilt.  Now I put it back on the wall plate and I now have arm room to put cables in the back of the tv, but I still don't have arm room to tighten the screws on the bottom and now the tilt made it so the screws don't even go under the wall plate anymore.  So I try halfway tilt (same issues as full tilt).  Now I get really frustrated because I thought it was bad design and couldn't work out.  Finally, I did some genius thinking and made it work.  What I did was first (while the tv bracket is not on the wall plate) tighten the final screws on the bracket about 1/4 of an inch.  Then loosen the tilt screws so that it can move.  Put it at the no tilt position then hook on the tv bracket to the wall plate.  The screws on the bottom should barely fit under the bottom of the wall plate.  Then I pulled the tv so that it tilted (This was the reason I loosened the tilt screws).  After causing it to tilt, the screws on the bottom came up under the wall plate on its own and was secure (I couldn't take the tv bracket off unless I pushed it in to cause no tilt).  I just had to lastly tighten the tilt screws (and I was barely able to fit my arm behind the tv to tighten the tilt screws).  In a way it is a good thing it will be so hard to take off because burglars would have a difficult time unscrewing it.  I now have enough room to plug in cables in the back.  I was pretty happy with the end product after I made it work.Pros:-It looks nice-It seems secure-comes with hdmi cable and level-the bad design in a way makes it difficult for burglars or even myself to take it off.  I'm putting this as a pro.Cons:-Mandatory tilt in order for some arm room behind the tv.-I had to make it work.  If you follow the directions, there is no way anyone can tighten those screws on the bottom of the wall plate unless they have a small tv or a super skinny arm.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend this product any time!!  It was easy to install allso!.
Reviews.Author: Jorene W. Turner
Reviews.Content: I thought it a good deal and price! Especially like the fast order!! I have run out of compliments for it!!

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV..
Reviews.Author: Shaban
Reviews.Content: Ok for not heavy stuff like Flat Screen TV 32-52 inch. No much work to install just follow the instruction. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful product for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Sean Tierney
Reviews.Content: I bought this to mount my plasma tv up on the wall. They are definitely not lying when they say it's a flush mount. Just be careful because my HDMI and power input's mounted perpendicular to the wall which caused me to have to cut a small hole to allow the cords to recess into the wall when plugged in. You may look into getting cables that mount flush into your television. Otherwise simple installation and great fitment onto my television. Thank you, Cheetah Mounts!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing quality
Reviews.Author: Steven T Bissey
Reviews.Content: I ordered a cheetah mount for my first big screen wall mount a few years ago. It was a solid, one-piece stamped chunk of steel, very well made, sturdy, I was tickled to death to see how stout it was constructed. Fast forward a few years, I orderd this mount for a 60" Sony, expecting the same quality. The picture for this item is very deceiving, the upper and lower bars are actually in two pieces that have to be bolted together.The end plates also are flimsy and have to be bolted together to make this one bracket. So, overall it is not near as stout a bracket as the old one used to be. Also, the pivot hanging brackets are made of a metal about hal fthe thickness as my old bracket mounts were. This just gives the overall mount a cheap and flimsy feeling that I am very disappointed in monting to my wall. Is it functional, yes, I guess. But I feel "cheatah'd" (pardon the pun) by this mount, based on my experience with the way they used to be built. I won't buy one again, I will look for a better one or make my own next time.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT mount,especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mick Schnabel "Miklaus"
Reviews.Content: First off,I had no use for the included HDMI cable.But it IS a nice bonus,can never have too many.At first,I was a little skeptical because of all the pieces,I thought "why would they make it in so many pieces when the old one had just a single one-piece plate to attach the tv to?" But after a quick glance at the directions,it was super simple to assemble.My new Panny plasma fits nice and snug on the wall,and looks great.Very durable.You can't beat Cheetah wall mounts,especially for around $25 or so!

Reviews.Title: Solid mount
Reviews.Author: williamreview
Reviews.Content: Works well for my purpose (does not swivel left to right, which I did not need).  Tilt is adequate unless mounted very high on wall and sitting very close, which would be uncomfortable looking up anyway.  Two screws on bottom bracket to secure TV from being bumped off of the mount can not be reached with normal screwdriver.  They should provide a tool, but you will have to improvise.  I used a flexible drill shaft extension.

Reviews.Title: This kit includes everything
Reviews.Author: Raymond J Isaacson
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing I have to say about this kit is that once the TV is hung on the wall you can't fasten it to the bracket as shown in the pictures because the pictures assume you hung it in mid-air.  This kit comes with EVERYTHING; 2 levels, hardware, everything needed to make the job a snap.  Close up pictures of joints would have been nice but I figured it out easily enough.
