Reviews.Title: Simple to put together!
Reviews.Author: DesertLady
Reviews.Content: I had dreaded having to put this together since I had never done it before but the instructions were easy to follow. A bonus was that my new television did not include bolts in the bolt holes on the back but this mounting kit had a variety of bolts to choose from in the event that occurred! I'm very pleased with the product. There was one "hitch" - when the television is lifted onto the mount, there are two small screws on the install hooks behind the television that need to be tighted to ensure no movement. It is very difficult to get to those screws - had to get creative and put a two foot "extension" on a screwdriver in order to tighten them!

Reviews.Title: Great Product.....EXCEPT
Reviews.Author: Hooked on Amazon
Reviews.Content: This mounts works great and is easy to assemble and mount the tv.  I mounted a Vizio 60" LCD.  This tv uses the largest tv bracket option, VESA 600x400 or something. Attaching tv and wall brackets was a breeze.  The only issue I had with this product is that you cannot tighten the lower bracket screws to the wall bracket.  This mount is only 1.3" from the wall and depending on tv size, you may have a problem tightening those screws.  Again, a 60" tv would require a super long screwdriver just to get at those screws.  Im ok with not tightening those screws as the tv is thin and light and the tv bracket hangs just fine, but for those who want to lock the tv bracket to the wall bracket, it could be an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Patricia Sterrett
Reviews.Content: This is the third wall mount I purchased and each one works great.  They are easy to mount to the wall and I have no fear of them falling.

Reviews.Title: high quality product, easy to install and price is great.
Reviews.Author: Raymond M. Powell
Reviews.Content: I cannot imagine why anyone would want to pay more money for a wall mount.  this mount is very secure and it was one of the lowest cost tilt mounts for large tvs.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pickering
Reviews.Content: WE GOT FAST COURTEOUS SERVICE AND THE PRODUCT WAS JUST WHAT WE WANTED,HAD EASY TO FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS, NOW HAVE BOTH TV'S MOUNTED ON THE WALL

Reviews.Title: solid, but not as easy to install as others
Reviews.Author: JT "JAT"
Reviews.Content: I've installed several wall mounts and this mount is not the best, not the worst. Just about the middle of the road. The tilt did not want to lock into its place, and despite the fact that it registered as level on my wall, it was clearly off by a hair and there was little possible adjustment in the without shimming the arm on the mount where it rests. Not ideal, but again, not a show stopper.

Reviews.Title: My TV is mounted
Reviews.Author: Justin Bortnicker
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the price for the mount.  Setup was pretty simple.  The instructions took a few look overs to make sure I got it right.  If I had to mount it again, it would take me no time at all.  They provide extra hardware for different TV's so I think that confused some reviewers.  But so far so good with it.  It hasn't dropped!  :)  I'll definitely consider this again if I mount my other TV's.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive mount
Reviews.Author: Jeanne L. Otey
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice mount for the price it is easy to put up and easy to take down. It was delivered early and intact.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Kelly A Kolp
Reviews.Content: Good price and it works well. I have a 62' TV and this has held it up well for over a few months now.

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: sugar213
Reviews.Content: great mount especially for the price!!! cant beat that!!!! it took about 15 minutes total . I would def buy again

Reviews.Title: Great mount even Greater price!
Reviews.Author: Khris
Reviews.Content: I've already bought and installed three of these mounts, and they are great. The price is incredible and it even includes an HDMI cable and level in the box. It comes complete with all types of screws for different wall types. (even concrete ones, which i needed in one of the rooms). I will always buy these mounts as long as they maintain this quality and low price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Sloan
Reviews.Content: The directions for assembly and installation were clear and easy to follow.  The product functions exactly as described and the tilt for the TV is great for viewing.

Reviews.Title: Works great and easy to set up!
Reviews.Author: Erica L. Miller
Reviews.Content: Very simple set-up and fits our tv great! They supplied several different sized screws to fit multiple varieties of tvs.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Slurpee
Reviews.Content: No issues with my LG 47inch flat panel LS4500. Mounts for the back of the tv were barely long enough. I didnt measure before I bought the mount, so I got lucky. Used a few washers to make the mount fit better but all in all very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: I got this for my LG flat screen. It was a pretty straignt forward setup and mounted easily. Haven't really found anything wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive, awesome mount
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: Great item, worked on my 32" and my 50". Very easy to assemble and disassemble. The HDMI cable that came with it is also a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Center screws on plate ruin it
Reviews.Author: Azim
Reviews.Content: The mounting wall plate could be longer. We can't center our tv over our fireplace because the wall plate (APTMM2) is short. By centering our setup, the plate's center screws covers a center stud, which we cant use, so we are left to rely on drywall to secure the plate. I don't want to rely on drywall anchors to mount a heavy 60" flat screen.Maybe returning this soon.

Reviews.Title: Product price good...but balance is not
Reviews.Author: Talismic "Talismic"
Reviews.Content: I think the product pricing is extremely competitive, but after balancing it 100% and installing it, the TV was still not aligned. Had to remove the stand and rebalance it multiple times manually, just using plain judgement, as with the current bubble level t it would never be straight. Which is huge issue. Also the locking bolts behind are hard to reach. But if you want a cheap mount which is flush and don't mind the above issues, then it should work for you.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy
Reviews.Author: BroMark
Reviews.Content: I wasn't to sure if this was going to support my TV and my wall ,but I sure was surprised. It has the strength to do both. Way to go Cheetah.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount, Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Wave Phillips
Reviews.Content: Great mount. Take your time with the installation and you will probably need a very long Phillips head screw driver to secure and a flash light to secure the security bolts (especially if you angle it). My only gripe was it came in a bigger box so you dint have to waste time assembling the wall mount but just a minor gripe. Overall though you won't be disappointed. I'm definitely going to purchase another one for the bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' It
Reviews.Author: F. Morgan "phredbob2"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and plenty of hardware for a lot of different models.  Very nice.  Very affordable considering what anything in even a discount store has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: bradenbru
Reviews.Content: No reason to pay more for a simple TV mount you'll never see. But, do note that this is fairly flush with the wall, and if you have cables that stick out from either the TV or the wall you'll want about another half-inch or so. But, if you don't, this is perfect for a flush look.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Cindy Upton
Reviews.Content: I was afraid for the price that this was cheaply made but very impressed with the quality. It was perfect kept the TV very flush to the wall just like I was hoping and a HDMI cord was such a great bonus!

Reviews.Title: Don't let the little box fool you - it's plenty sturdy and easy to use.  Price is right also!
Reviews.Author: Jimbo
Reviews.Content: I read the other reviews and was eventually convinced to try it.  The price is right.  Don't know why you want to pay more for any competing unit - this one works fine.  It goes together quickly.  Time needs to be spent finding the studs in your wall - not sure I would want to mount ANY TV to the wall without locating studs.  I didn't like the little provided level ( about 2" long) but I also own a 3 footer so I used that.  The bracket goes on the wall easy and the "hanger bars" attach to the TV easy as well.  They provide  many sets of standard bolts to make sure you have those matching preset holes in your TV.  I used this bracket on a 60" Sharp Aquos that weighs about 65 lbs. - not one problem holding that weight steady.  Super great value.

Reviews.Title: Great design, easy to install, despite missing part
Reviews.Author: Nathan Hemming
Reviews.Content: Okay, so like others i was skeptical due to reviews about it missing parts but i ordered anyway.  First I want to say anyone who's worried about missing parts, don't be.  The screws that may fall out in shipping can be picked up at a hardware store for $1.50.  The mount itself is joined in the middle by these screws that come pre-installed.  I was missing 1 nut, not a big deal to me.To make installation easier make sure you have a stud finder and a laser level.  Assemble the rectangular wall part, figure out where you want it to be, mark the spots, drill holes, bolt down, then attach the tv brackets and hang.  One thing to note, if you have aluminum studs (as I do) the included lag bolts might not be sufficient, so in addition to the lags I added fine thread sheet metal screws.This is a great no frills mount, up and down and left to right adjustment is about 4 inches in each direction if you start off with everything centered (this probably varies with tv size, mine was a 60 inch plasma.I would recommend this to a friend, but let him know he might need to make a hardware trip.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts Flat Screen mount
Reviews.Author: Ike4president1970
Reviews.Content: Was sceptical due to such a low price.  However, was pleasantly suprised at the quality of this product.  Very sturdy set up.  Also, very easy to install with a variaty of tv's.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price....
Reviews.Author: Greg in AZ
Reviews.Content: Fit my Panasonic plasma like a glove.  Hung on my master bedroom wall and did it by myself.  Easy install.  No brainer for the price.  I definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel
Reviews.Content: Easy to assemble and mount. saved a lot of money by buying it from amazon. A buddy and I mounted it in a couple of hours probably could have been done faster but we are no where near being pros.

Reviews.Title: Ordered two of these so far
Reviews.Author: A. Dayton "ThinkReason"
Reviews.Content: If you don't need a swivel mount these are awesome TV mounts. My first one I mounted a 42 inch Dynex in my bedroom, for my second I mounted a 60 inch Panasonic Plasma in our main living room. For by first one I ran normal outlet behind the tv I put if on the top of left side of the mount and it worked fine because I tilted the TV out as far as it could go. I have it high up on the wall and tilted so we can watch it in bed. For the Panasonic I ran a recessed outlet in the middle of the mount between the mount bars and that worked much better and hides the outlet a lot more. For the Panasonic I also put a low voltage cable plate next to the recessed outlet to run three HDMI cables behind the wall. The mounts feel very sturdy and good quality, I mounted both TV's on the wall studs to make sure it was secure so I cannot attest to how this would mount in drywall. It comes with plenty of screws and bolts mount it for lots of TV models. It also comes with two levels, a small single bubble level and a little bigger one that is magnetized. They are accurate levels, I still used a full sized level along with those to make sure it was perfect, my only advice is to check, double check, and triple check your measurements and levels to make sure everything is straight before drilling all your holes.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like that its adjustable, allowing me to span across wall studs.I don't like that it used metric bolts.  One of these days I've got to get a metric socket set.....

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: A. Randall
Reviews.Content: Works well. Very easy to install. I was skeptical because it was so cheap but my 42" LG is still on the wall! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Easy to get level
Reviews.Author: Ajohnhype
Reviews.Content: Easy to get level and is holding our 56" tv perfectly!  I've had my living room the same way for 28 years and once we mounted the tv on the wall we realized how much more space and how many more options we had in the room!

Reviews.Title: Careful...
Reviews.Author: Royce Germain "Royce"
Reviews.Content: We had to do some modification on this bracket for the LED TVs are so low profile that the power cord on the 55" Samsung was in the way. Just had to notch the bracket to make it fight correctly.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: tpfeifer
Reviews.Content: Product was easy to install, less expensive then Wal-Mart and durable as ever! Will buy another when we get our basement finished!

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Frank C
Reviews.Content: Works great with my 42" vizio. Has tilt adjustments as well as horizontal. Product feels strong. Took me an hour to put together and installed Into wall studs taking my precious time. Would recommend this mount, especially the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up
Reviews.Author: trabajo tieso
Reviews.Content: I was little skeptical because of the price, but this mount exceeded my expectation! I had it together and on the wall in about 1/2 hour. Made the adjustments to my TV and up and beautiful. One warning you will need a very long screw driver to make adjustment to the mounts once the TV is on it.

Reviews.Title: Good price, good product
Reviews.Author: Nicholas J. Huber "Funran"
Reviews.Content: Works like it should, the HDMI and level are a nice bonus. It's at a cheap price and requires more assembly than some mounts but it saves on costs and works the same at the end of the day. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: auntecarol
Reviews.Content: Good mount for the TV I have between my kitchen and dining room.  Only problem was the cheap lag screws.  One broke

Reviews.Title: for an inexpensive mount it sure is nice
Reviews.Author: Craig Sanders
Reviews.Content: i just have a 32" LED that i wanted to mount so i dont know how it would perform with a really big tv but for mine it worked great.  it's not really heavy gauge metal but i dont doubt that it could hold up a tv a fair amount larger than mine.  the instructions are ok but not great -- definitely easy enough to follow for anyone paying attention.

Reviews.Title: Love the price and the quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is holding up my 60" flatscreen in my daughter's living room, so obviously I had to be pretty careful with picking one that won't fall off the wall. This has not budged. Great quality, easy to install and the price can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Viewing Pleasure
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: We are able to watch our nightime/sleeptime programs lying down in our snuggy bed.  THhs was easy to install and easier to handle.

Reviews.Title: Great for larger TV
Reviews.Author: Pegster
Reviews.Content: I bought this because the one I bought at a local Discount store "Mal-Wart" did not meet my expectations.  This was great.  It had enough pieces to assemble, and went together well.  I must add, however, that because of the low profile theme going on with this mount, one cannot get behind the TV to secure the lifting screws.  Not an issue in my set-up though, because I am not using them.Great product overall.

Reviews.Title: Pieces fall into place
Reviews.Author: medina4me
Reviews.Content: Hello,So I ordered the Cheetah Mount for around $35 with shipping.  As with most everyone else who wrote this kit may come in several pieces but it is sturdy angle iron and will support your Television as advertised.I mounted mine over the fireplace on a brick and mortar wall and I am having no issues.  In fact, I have taken the Television down at least 6 times since I've had it to connect and disconnect cables (my television has the connections on the back) and the Television is easy to remove and remount on the bracket.Just like everyone else said this bracket comes in 8 pieces.  I didn't even have to use the instructions but if you have never put furniture together or are not mechanically inclined then I suppose you could be a bit confused.  Although, the top pieces come in a bag together as well as the bottom piece.  There is only one way to attach it together and the two small pieces at the side can only go in one place.So I'm not sure what everyone is complaining about the instructions since I didn't even need them.  I highly recommend this to anyone and if you are installing it on a brick wall as I did make sure you use the proper type of bolts (masonry bolts or screws).  I couldn't be happier with this system and I saved $100 from what I was looking at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: No wonder it is #1
Reviews.Author: Shane Davenport
Reviews.Content: Quick. Easy. Good instructions. Great value. Happy I got this instead of one from a big box store. Can't beat the price and it came with a HDMI. Only thing I dislike is the bottom of the arm uses a screw instead of some kind of quick release, but this is also a good feature as there is no way for the tv to come off the wall without you wanting it to.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: alwi alsaqaf
Reviews.Content: this mount is easy to install and its a good quality,can/t beat the price.and fast shippimg too,its an A+ product.thank you.:)

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Curtis Rihn
Reviews.Content: Mounted my 50 lb 47" Vizio TV above my fire place in under an hour with this guy.  Would recommend using your on level instead of the one that comes with the kit.  The HDMI cable that comes with it works great though.  Make sure to find those studs and pre-drill.So necessary non-standard tools: Drill, standard drill bit set, and levelKeep in mind the instructions are written by someone who's first language is not English.  Definitely not a difficult job though.

Reviews.Title: Quality product, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Navarro
Reviews.Content: Bought a couple of black friday tvs and didn't want to blow the savings on tv mounts.  The ones at costco are better quality (smoother motion, smooth paint finish).  However functionally this is exactly the same.  In addition it comes with an hdmi cable which can be used for some of your lower quality hi def sources.  I tied it with my cable box and it matched the picture I had on a monster cable I bought for about $30.Installation was easy (make sure you buy a stud finder and a drill as the the screws for mounting are quite thick and would be pretty tough without a power drill).  It took me about 20 minutes to mount the tv to the bracket and about  a minute to mount the bracket to the wall.I would highly recommend buying this for your money.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Geno D. "Ol' School Basshead"
Reviews.Content: No issue with quality of cable I read in other reviews. Level is very short but quite useful. Seems light and flimsy. But once bolted to the wall, its power to hold was revealed.

Reviews.Title: I bought several and they rock.
Reviews.Author: M. Hagen
Reviews.Content: I'm realizing that no product can make everyone happy. I browsed a retailer and couldn't find a mount for less than $100 for a 50". This mount was easy to install and came with the necessary mounting equipment, regardless of the brand of tv you buy.  It also came with an hdmi cord and level. Do yourself a favor and ignore the bad reviews on this one. Maybe they got a completely different product than the four mounts I got or they wouldnt be happy with anything they bought. Good product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Latrina Hunter
Reviews.Content: This came with everything you need to install.  The installation was very simple, I did it on my own.  I recommend

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price!
Reviews.Author: Big B
Reviews.Content: Clear instructions, and easy to install! This mount comes with a small bullet level, helping you make sure everything is plumb and level. As a bonus, it also comes with an HDMI cable!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: stuart suemoto
Reviews.Content: Works good Good Value for the price. a little hard to assemble but does the job i would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ben Brown
Reviews.Content: Don't waste you're money on an overpriced store mount when you can get this for a fraction of the cost. Assembly wasn't difficult but the set screws underneath are difficult to get to without a flashlight and an EXTREMELY long screwdriver! Would give 5 stars if not for the difficulty with the screws

Reviews.Title: Priced right and does the job well
Reviews.Author: jaxgsxr
Reviews.Content: This mount holds up my 46" Samsung Smart 3D TV just fine. I did have to mount extra holes in the wall because of the thin drywall but it's holding up just fine. I bought this TV to use at work and needed something inexpensive to mount it on my office wall and it looks great. Super thin, too. DEFINITELY worth the investment when compared to Rocket Fish mounts from Best Buy which is astronomical in pricing when this one does a comparable job at a considerable savings.

Reviews.Title: NOT compatible with Sony 32bx330
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: If you own a Sony 32bx330 and are looking at this wall mount kit be forewarned. This kit IS NOT compatible with it. I had togo to the Hardware Store and search through those endless little drawers full of screws to find a screw long enough to attach the frame to my TV. Look at the back of the Sony 32bx330, see the 2 bottom mounting holes?? Now look at the top ones....see the depth difference?? For those of you who dont own this great TV, Ill explain. The bottom mounting holes for the TV are fine, just like every other TV on the market. However, the top holes are somewhere in the neighborhood of 3 to 3 1/2 inces deeper than the bottom ones due to the back of the TV having an irregular shape. Hence, the mounting frame wont attach to both holes simultaneously (without going to the Hardware Store and buying a screw thats about 3 inches longer than the ones provided).Take my advice, for what its worth, look up the recommended Sony Kit here on Amazon and spend the extra $20-30 now, itll make your mounting much much easier. I wish I had.....

Reviews.Title: Simple and effective, exactly why I chose it.
Reviews.Author: Harrison_Bergeron
Reviews.Content: I've had my 42" Plasma hanging from mine for at least 6 months now, and it has done it's simple job effectively.The only 'flaw' is that it positioned the TV too close to the wall so I needed a flexible HDMI connector to plug in my cable, and because of it I can only use 1 of the two available inputs.  I'd consider that more of a flaw with the TV though, some manufacturers seem to have realized that pointing inputs straight back is not conducive to wall mounting a flat screen, I guess Samsung/Insignia had not caught on yet when I bought mine.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money.
Reviews.Author: MBarker
Reviews.Content: Make sure you check your stud width prior to ordering.  I ordered one first that only fit on 18" studs.  I returned it and got this one and it works fine.  Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert Albritton
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 because I refused to pay the $120.00 and up prices in the stores. Purchased for 55 inch LED Vizio...easy to mount, everything I needed. If you are trying to save a few bucks and get a very good mount, this is it!!

Reviews.Title: My experience was different than others have reported...
Reviews.Author: Greyquill "entropy"
Reviews.Content: So I decided to write this review. First the good: I thought the product was well made...a heavy enough gauge. I found the instructions were actually pretty good, I just had to read them a few times. They did mention that the tilt should be adjusted before hanging. So here's my beef: When you hang the TV on the bracket you have attached to the wall, you are then supposed to secure the bottom of the TV with 2 set screws to the bottom channel. The problem is that the screws are supposed to go under the wall bracket and lock it into place in the event of an earthquake or unruly children. Well the bracket is about 1/16" off so you cannot use the set screws. I scratched my head in this one for a few hours. I thought maybe I could have bent the steel but no way. Then I described the problem to friend and he said he had the same problem. We both decided that the TV seems pretty stable and we haven't had any earth quakes here, so we're not going to take the TVs down and try to bend the brackets. So, it really seems to be a design flaw. If I were to do it all over I would try another mount.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: David Christensen
Reviews.Content: Pro: Comes with HDMI Cable 10'Con: other than Placement of adjustment screws for tilt Nothing Bad I have 3 Of these now in use for more than 2 Years. no issues with mounting.

Reviews.Title: Worked great with my 47" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This is a great item. The quality was a lot better than I thought it would ever be. I use this on my 47" Vizio HDTV with no issue. The HDMI cable that was included is a great quality for the price. Defiantly worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Hoss
Reviews.Content: Assembly was easy and direct.  Hung a 47" LCD TV in a matter of minutes.  Good wall mount for the money!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor design
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: Although this is inexpensive and seems strong, it was not easy to place the tv on.  You need a 24 inch screw driver to reach the safety screws to hold the tv in place.  Its a very tight fit to get behind it. I probably would not buy again.  I have a 46 inch Sony on it now but plan to buy a 60 inch so hope it stays sturdy.  Once on wall it is very hard to get behind to hook things up to the tv as well.

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: Jim Bryant
Reviews.Content: It works. That's all I expect. The direction were pretty clear and it took maybe 10 minutes to mount it to the wall and the TV to the mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount!
Reviews.Author: LW Chandler
Reviews.Content: This thing is fantastic.  Hard to believe anyone would pay more for a mount - you can't beat this one.  Sturdy and easy to install.  You'd have to be crazy to pay any more for a mount - you won't get anything better.

Reviews.Title: Comes as advertised
Reviews.Author: Nyrluv
Reviews.Content: I've installed 4 of these so far with tv's ranging from 40, 46, 55 and 60 inches. It worked well for all of them.

Reviews.Title: mounts unit a little to close to the wall
Reviews.Author: Scott Schermerhorn
Reviews.Content: Very hard to work with cables with unit so close to the wall - I had to buy special right angle HDMI plugs to have room for cables to mount -If the TV had side mount HDMI outlets the mount would work fine - Some thing to think about

Reviews.Title: Works amazingly well
Reviews.Author: Daniel S York
Reviews.Content: I was very hesitant in buying some thing so inexpensive, but it works perfect and is as good as mounts costing 10 times more. I installed my 55 inch Samsung using this mount and it works perfect with no issues. Easy to figure out the assembly, despite what others have said. I would recommend this mount for others, you will save a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Everything you need for average tv set up
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I would recommend a stud support finder for most setups. i did not need to use the anchors. very happy with the level of tilt the mount provides. the level is adequate for installation, measure twice drill once.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Murray S.
Reviews.Content: Sold and delivered as expected, easy installation. Thanks! I will be buying another one for the TV in my living room.

Reviews.Title: A great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Thomas L.
Reviews.Content: Dont pay 100+ for a Tv stand!!! This one works great. I think it may have a few more steps/pieces to put together than the more expensive ones but to me thats worth saving 80$

Reviews.Title: Very Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Murphy "dan"
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I bought this exact some mount - once for a 40" TV now for a 60".  It is a very simple design and easy to install.  The hardest thing to do is finding studs that align somewhat in the middle of the wall over my fireplace. Note - you don't have to dead center the mount as you have slack of 4-5 inches to slide the TV left or right on the mounting bracket.Only negative I have for this is it is nearly impossible to tighten the bottom screw of each side of the brackets (that are attached to the tv) to the wall mount especially if you tilt it.  The TV is so flush to the wall you have to either have a very long screw driver and small hand or have someone help by holding the tv away from the wall just enough so you can get your hand under the tv and tighten the two screws that will totally secure the TV to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Almost works.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: If it was not for the included HDMI cable, this would not be worth it.  The mount is not a one piece design.  I was ok with that when I ordered.  After building it and mounting it on the wall, everything seemed ok.  Then I tried to mount my 50" flat screen to it with it fully tilted.  It does not fit.  The tv has to lean on the wall on the bottom just to tilt enough.  This mount is probably better for smaller tvs.

Reviews.Title: Bottom of the line in my opinion
Reviews.Author: BigD
Reviews.Content: Wanted to be cheap and you get what you pay for, HDMI cable worked for a months than stopped working completely. Wall mount is multiple pieces little flimsy. I bought one from Costco for about $80 its solid and well worth the money. I would never buy this again for any reason. Also sits too close to wall if you are not putting your cables through the wall in every spot they plug into the TV that i wont mount properly.

Reviews.Title: Great, cheap and and pretty easy!
Reviews.Author: Trinity
Reviews.Content: This is a great wall mount! I was a little hesitant at first because it was so cheap compared to other mounts (and usually when that happens, the product is really crappy) but it totally isn't! Very adjustable to fit different TVs, etc. The only issue I had (which was a small one) is that the instructions weren't as clear as they could be, which only made it slightly difficult since there are so many pieces. But it really didn't set me back that much and I figured it out pretty quickly! Honestly, this is a great buy for the price and suited all my needs! So happy to have my TV mounted on my wall finally :)

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mounts
Reviews.Author: gspice
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 4 Cheetah Mounts now. My husband is a contractor and has to put up and take down wall mounts all the time. He thinks its one of the easiest ones he's installed. You will need a extra long screwdriver to tighten the last screw so your tv is secure because we couldn't fit our hand between the wall and tv. I would recommend and have even bought one for a friend.

Reviews.Title: Strong, Sturdy, and Excellent Price!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Palioca
Reviews.Content: Don't bother spending $100+ on a TV mount when you can get this Cheetah mount for less than half the price.  I was somewhat skeptical at first, since I had never tried to mount my 46" samsung on a wall before.  As long as you locate the studs and attach the TV correctly, it not only looks awesome but could probably survive an earthquake.  It makes the TV easier to view from all angles, and is an excellent space-saver for smaller living rooms or bedrooms.  I bought this for my living room along with a wall-mount shelving unit for the cable box and dvd, and with proper wiring it looks like it was professionally installed.  Seriously, this is such a good deal I will be buying a wall mount for every tv in every room of my house that I put one!

Reviews.Title: Great Mount
Reviews.Author: surenr
Reviews.Content: I was initially hesistant to wall mount my TV...but this is so far the best I have done for my TV. It was not easy to wall mount...maybe because it was the first time..but it worked amazingly.They should have better installation instructions for first timers like me...over all it served the purpose and we are extremely happy we bought it as the price for the same kind is 3 times higher if I bought them from any other store.

Reviews.Title: TV Mounted
Reviews.Author: Patrick V Brunick
Reviews.Content: Man This was a great deal if I say so got good HDMI wire and a great stand for my tv so now it is up on the wall

Reviews.Title: Oh YEAH
Reviews.Author: Lickablepiercing73
Reviews.Content: Great design. It scared me that everyone wanted alot more money for this same mount. I found it here and have neverone anywhere else since.

Reviews.Title: great product.
Reviews.Author: margaret a dooley
Reviews.Content: price was right and it works great. It was easy to install and like the way the tv mounts on it.

Reviews.Title: easy to assemble and mount
Reviews.Author: soko
Reviews.Content: Price and delivery was great. Easy to mount, 30 minutes. Sturdy, solid powder coated steel construction. I suggest mounting to the studs, rather than wall mollies. I now have (2) of these systems on my walls. Both TV's 52" and larger Sony Bravia's.

Reviews.Title: Extremely impressed with this mount
Reviews.Author: Jeff Zwilling
Reviews.Content: I wasn't certain how exactly this mount worked before I bought it, but thousands of positive reviews can't be wrong. Assembly was not difficult. I really had no problem with the instructions, with a bit of common sense they are plenty sufficient. I was very impressed with the hardware included; it included every bolt you could need for every TV. This mount fit my 55" Samsung like it was made for it. The mount is SOLID. I feel like if I tried ripping it down that I'd take the entire wall with it.The only thing I can say is LEVEL CAREFULLY. If the mount looks slightly crooked on the wall, your huge TV is going to look even more crooked.. And with size of the lag bolts required for mounting, unscrewing the bolts and rescrewing  them up or down a quarter of an inch just isn't very possible.

Reviews.Title: TV Mounts
Reviews.Author: Beverly Carrow
Reviews.Content: WOW!!! My husband was very impressed with our TV Mounts. First the service is the greatest, and then the products could not be better. We are very, very happy and pleased with them.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money and more
Reviews.Author: New Mom
Reviews.Content: I do not understand why people say the directions are lacking.  If you can figure out putting furniture together you can probably figure this out.  There are only 6 parts plus screws. You do not need all the bolts they provide, just find the ones that fit your tv.The one thing I would suggest is if you are mounting in solid concrete or block do not use the plastic anchors provided.  They will probably be ok, but on an expensive tv why risk it.  This is especially so for the big tv's.  I chose 3/8 x 3" redhead sleeve anchors instead.  Probably overkill but the added cost was about 5 bucks.  I attempted to pull it off the wall after installing the brackets and found myself straining.  I'm about 250 lbs so this was pretty impressive to me.  I stopped short of hanging off it.This mount hugs the wall so unless you mount with a plywood board as a spacer you may have trouble with room for plugs or tightening the locking bolts.  I didn't use a board to give me more room so what I did was install the tv flat with no tilt, screw in the plugs a bit then tilt the tv forward.  This pushes those locking bolts behind the fram and the tv locks in.  Something about the angle when you tile it allows this.  if you want to disengage them just lift the tv back to flat mount position.To solve the clearance on my hdmi plug I just whittled some of that extra plastic molding down with my pocket knife.  It honestly wasn't doing much anyway.  If you want to buy a 90 degree adapter do it now through amazon.  The ones at local stores are likely larger than your plug to begin with.Do not listen to the people who say the directions are lacking.  Seriously how many ways could it go together.  There are pictures and the word UP on the brackets.

Reviews.Title: TV wall mount
Reviews.Author: Red Dzielak
Reviews.Content: Well, someone has made a dyi mount that doesn't take a master's degree to install! Product came promptly and in perfect condition and every thing was there, fitting perfectly. I mounted into the wall studs with long screws and am very pleased with the outcome.

Reviews.Title: read  and re-read instructions
Reviews.Author: anthony m
Reviews.Content: Went together ok after paying attention to the instructions. Holding a 47 inch to the wall no problems. Excellent find

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Tarra Grammenos
Reviews.Content: This works perfect! Exactly what we needed for the size and shape of the TV we bought! I'm so happy we didn't spend hundreds of dollars at another store! Love this!

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Shannon A. White
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive effective. Does the job on oh 55 inch Tv and tilts. Exactly as described and fast. No need to pay more.

Reviews.Title: Good wall unit for a fixed position
Reviews.Author: R. K. Moreland
Reviews.Content: This is a good, simple wall mount for viewing in the bedroom. Though I had someone else install it, the most difficult problem seemed to be tightening the bottom screws to secure it. Mounting very close to the wall leaves very little space to work in. Strong and sturdy for my 40" Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Quality product for such a low price!
Reviews.Author: James M.
Reviews.Content: This mount is just as good as the $100+ ones. Easy to install and very sturdy if attached to studs.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Ann Oliver
Reviews.Content: Am well pleased with this mount, It was easy to put together and get on the wall. The price was about half of what the stores wanted.

Reviews.Title: Awesome price and great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Mitza "dnmsmith"
Reviews.Content: Worked great for our 55" Insignia!! Took less than 30 minutes to get it up and is very secure!! Would definitely recommend this product to everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Phillip L. Ownbey "Lee414"
Reviews.Content: This holds my 55" LCD just fine.  The built in bubble level is pure genius.  Made it very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: My TV is still up!
Reviews.Author: jrivera67
Reviews.Content: I have seen many different styles of TV mounts on the market with varying prices. I decided to take a chance on this one. I have a 43" plasma TV so it is a little heavier than LED LCD TV's the same size. The kit came with everything one would need for a basic mount. It provided different screws and parts for varying TV sizes. The kit was easy to put together. My mistake came in thinking 1.3" was enough space for my hand to fit behind the TV to attach the cables and tighten the 2 bottom screws that anchor the TV at the bottom; however if you have a long screw driver (12") and have someone with small hands this is not an issue. This kit is pretty straight forward and I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good buy
Reviews.Author: Samantha Matchie
Reviews.Content: This ítem came onetime in perfect condition.  It didnt quite fit my tv but I made it work.  Overall, I would buy it again,

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: f lastname
Reviews.Content: Looks great in my living room. Mounts very close to the wall and seems really sturdy and well made i will definitely order another if the need arises. Great value.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Bryan Hauptman
Reviews.Content: fantastic value, showed up within a few days, easy to mount and set up.  I would recommend this kit to anyone.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Robert Brown
Reviews.Content: works well had to put on a mounting board as this is not wide enough to span 36 inches to be able to be centered above a fire place with the spacing of the studs

Reviews.Title: Does the Job!!
Reviews.Author: kawrider
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about this mount at first because it appeared to be too skimpy to mount a 55" when I opened up the box. To my surprise once I got it put together and started mounting it on the wall my perception of this mount quickly changed. It is a sturdy piece of equipment and really solid once you have mounted correctly against the wall. As long as you have it mounted correctly you will not have to worry about your television going anywhere. I have been using this mount for about 3 months now and I am truly satisfied with the results. I would definitely reccomend this product if you are considering a mount for your flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfect for our TVs
Reviews.Author: Eneida Padilla
Reviews.Content: Worked perfect for our big screens, very secure, can change sizes, we are very happy with this product. Will buy same again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: Wall mount strong easy to hang up directions are goodGood price and fast shippingWill buy another when I purchase next TVVery happy

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Reviews.Content: Other reviews have more details. All in all, it work as needed at a great price! In may cased, used with Panasonic Plasma 50"

Reviews.Title: great mount for the price, not Super thin, just thin
Reviews.Author: Dr. X "Dr. X"
Reviews.Content: Keep in mind you are not buying a super thin, it is just thin.  But if you are looking for a tilt mount, then this is pretty much as thin as you can get.  Do NOT use the level, its crap, but I have a better level since we do this as part of our business.  The level that comes with the package is probably better than No level, but use a proper level is key.  Love the deal as they give you a pretty nice HDMI cable with the mount.  Other stores will charge way too much for this simple cable (like Monster).

Reviews.Title: Great Cheap mount.......
Reviews.Author: Allie Fry
Reviews.Content: This works.....  Using it for a 60 inch plasma that weighs a ton....  easy to put together, maybe 15 leisurely minutes...  Didn't use the included level.... I already own a better one.  If you don't own one then you will need the level....  Didn't use the HDMI cable, though it looks cool and I may use it to make some Feng Sui bracelets....

Reviews.Title: Just okay.
Reviews.Author: Keith Grieshaber
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize that it wasn't one piece of metal and had to be bolted together before attaching it to the wall.  The bolts that attach it together doesn't let the TV slide all the way back and forth on the mount, so I had to measure and attach the wall mount to make sure the TV would be centered.  If i had to do it again, I would spend the extra money and but a mount that is a single piece of metal.

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted...
Reviews.Author: Charles J. Yuknus Jr.
Reviews.Content: Easy to install...easy to use.The quality and fit were good...the instructions could have been better than the hieroglyphics that came with it.

Reviews.Title: perfect product!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: kelly scherer
Reviews.Content: this mount was 25% of the price of mounts at the stores in my area...for a better product! i have a 42" vizio and was worried mounting it on my bedroom wall with the products i had seen at the local stores. they seemed so cheap and i didnt know how they would hold a tv up! i went with this mount and gave it a try because of the price and it ended up being more substantial of a mount for 25% of the price of the local stores. i got a better product, saved money and am not worried about my tv mounted on the wall. its sturdy and isnt made cheaply and im so happy i shopped around!

Reviews.Title: very nice mount
Reviews.Author: MByer "wantagoodproduct"
Reviews.Content: very nice mount for 55" TV's that you want close to wall. the HDMI cable that comes with is also very nice cable

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Ev_vO
Reviews.Content: i have not used the hdmi cable since i had some, but the mount is ok only, because it seemed that it was not level (you have to put together the metal to make the frame - not a solid piece). Also i needed more space from the wall and the bolts were not long enough to add the spacer with my TV a Sharp 60'' LED. I give it 4 stars for the reason that the bolts were not supplied to add spacers and its not a solid piece its in parts, but in general a good and very cheap wall mount. Would buy from again.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey C Grohs
Reviews.Content: Does the trick at a great price!  Was very easy to assemble and mount.  Most difficult part is finding the studs in the wall to correctly mount, however that certainly isnt the fault of this product!  Instructions were clear and easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Just like all the other reviews
Reviews.Author: Jamie Johnson "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: Poorly packaged, couple of screws loose, and the level was 1/8" off but it was all in tact and it works great. Fantastic buy in my opinion considering that the ones we saw in the stores were triple this price. only thing that could make this better is a stud finder (even if it jacked up the price $10-$15 or took out the 10' HDMI). I'm just being picky now though. Be confident in buying this product. :)

Reviews.Title: CHEAP PRICE FOR BIG BUCK BANG!
Reviews.Author: Arvee Sherwyn Eco "DJ CAM.ONE"
Reviews.Content: Don't get jipped by buying some expensive mount! If you install this correctly you will not be dissapointed. I mounted my 60" Samsung LED tv that i bought for $2,000 on this and i am not even a bit nervous of it breaking on me.I literally hung on the bracket once it was mounted on the wall to test if it can hold the weight (i'm about 170 lbs.) and it didnt budge one bit. Just make sure that you have the tv screwed on a stud as specified.

Reviews.Title: well pleased
Reviews.Author: Phil Perkins
Reviews.Content: good product, i am well pleased with this mount, it was exactly as adverstised. i would buy again if needed

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Justin T. Barton
Reviews.Content: This is very easy to put together. Isn't the greatest quality in the world but definitely does the job for my 42 in.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works
Reviews.Author: skoob
Reviews.Content: Not a bad mount, I have a 32" on it, it's small and does the job. Been up for a while now and it does its job well in the kids hang out room. I paid little for this mount and while I was not so impressed out of the box, it makes sense on the wall. I have spent up to $200 on a mount and this is doing its job just as well as any of the others I have bought for bigger tvs.

Reviews.Title: awesome design
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: perfect for what I needed. Great design and sturdy fits nice on the wall and bends in the right way.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah mount
Reviews.Author: Gwen J. Pearce
Reviews.Content: Had alot of parts to put it together compared to other mounts, but was an excellent product and great price

Reviews.Title: Great mount, but 60" and 65" TVs beware
Reviews.Author: R. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my new 65" plamsa.  It's a solid mount, and the second I've bought from Cheetah Mounts.  The problem is that the mounting bracket that you attach to the wall is only 1/2" wider than the mounts on the TV (24" vs. 23.5").  This means that I would need to have the studs perfectly centered in the space I'm looking to mount the TV.  But my studs are off, so even mounting the bracket on its edge wasn't enough, I was still short 2".  I could have drilled holes in the mount and made it work, but I had a bad feeling about doing this.Instead I had to return this mount and I bought one from Monoprice that is 45" wide.  Amazon doesn't sell a comparable product.If you are considering this mount, I recommend researching the width of the VESA holes on your TV and see how much slack you have on the 24" bracket.  If it's going to be close, and your studs aren't perfect, consider getting a wider mount.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price!
Reviews.Author: David Greggo
Reviews.Content: There's no ability to move it left or right and the up and down adjustment is not that great.  However, if you don't want to move your TV around much and don't have a lot of money to spend, this is a great buy!  It's very sturdy, and fairly easy to install.  The directions could be a bit better, but as long as you look at the pictures, read, and then think about it, it'll go up right.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: A very nice mount i have 2 of them great price and work very well on negative is on the tv in my living room there wasnt enough space to use the hdmi cable provided it was too thick and stiff had to purchase another one

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Thirty2dgrz
Reviews.Content: not bad i would prefer one that is more put together but it does what it is supposed to do after you put it together

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt Dual Hook (1.3" from wall) Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65 inch Plasma, LED, and
Reviews.Author: John Appleseed
Reviews.Content: This is the second Cheetah brand TV mount I have used.The product is great because it is easy to assemble, built for installation convenience and sturdy.I recommend this product to you.

Reviews.Title: Really close to the wall.
Reviews.Author: Peter A Thysell
Reviews.Content: This mount keeps the TV really close to the wall just like we wanted. Very Nice. Took some work to put together.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Lucas Kelley
Reviews.Content: The device is inexpensive, easy to install, and it comes with a super sexy HDMI cable. The cable is really nice and I'm very surprised by it's quality. One caveat: make sure you have all the tools handy. You'll need a drill, a ratchet, a phillipshead screwdriver, and a stud finder. It took me three days to install the damn thing cause I kept not having the proper tools! Actual installation was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: mbmom
Reviews.Content: This was super easy to put together and install on the wall and TV. Very secure, I don't have any worries about the TV being able to be knocked off the wall as this attaches well.

Reviews.Title: Strong
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I like it very much. It holds my 60" sharp LED. My only complaint is getting to the screws for adjustment. But it is very strong and is holding it just fine.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Dwor464819
Reviews.Content: works great easy to put up and love the tilt great price and shipping just a little time to put up but all and all a good mount

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Sruj
Reviews.Content: I first went to walmart to shop for a wall mount and they were like$100 . So this is price perfect and it worths it too. I put a 46 inch tv, seems to hold great. We had a little trouble while installing , first timers better keep all the tools ready , or else it will be pain.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Lukester
Reviews.Content: Although I owned a flat screen TV for several years, I never thought of hanging it on the wall given how expensive the mounts were at Best Buy and other stores.  After reading the reviews for this Cheetah Mount, I decided to give it a try.  Getting it on the way was easy and mounting the TV was even easier.  It's a simple mount but I've never once felt the desire to swivel my TV.  Do yourself a favor and save your money and just get this simple mount.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to connect the cables, Not easy to adjust
Reviews.Author: AHC-Max
Reviews.Content: The product is good, but after installed, it's very difficult to connect the cables and I've to bend the cables to fit and get out the way from the bottom of the frame. Also it's not easy to adjust the tilt. Try to return but they will charge the shipping $9.97.

Reviews.Title: Easy mount
Reviews.Author: The Pea Pod Kid
Reviews.Content: The Cheetah mount is sturdy enough to do the job.  The instructions are clear and the inclusion of a bubble level is a nice touch for those who have no ready access to such a device.  Installation only required a few minutes.  The only difficulty I encountered was that the tightening of the retaining screws after the TV was hung was somewhat problematic and required a very long Phillips screwdriver, which fortunately I had.  Perhaps it was just the model of my TV which presented the challenge.(TCL LE48FHDF3300ZTA)

Reviews.Title: Easy peasy japanesy
Reviews.Author: Cecil
Reviews.Content: Don't know where it was made but it was easy to install and mount the TV.  Especialy because my buddies did it for me.  I was bed-bond from a motorcycle crash.  The TV is heavy and it is still on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: It did what it was supposed to do! It holds my 65" Vizio Razor HDTV like nothing. Easy to mount, easy to unmount. I would recommend this product to anyone. The HDMI cable sucks though. I recommend getting your own.

Reviews.Title: cant believe this thing works that well
Reviews.Author: David Luke
Reviews.Content: I have a 50'' plasma, one person can not lift it...i tried. lol. anyway after getting this i was VERY skeptical because its small and made out of thin steel. but after you get it all put together it's REALLY strong. i couldnt believe it. The tilt did not work cause it was to tight of a fit to titan the 2 bottom set screws. maybe just my tv idk. other then that really cant complain for the cheap price i paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Can't ask for more... mounted a Samsung 52"
Reviews.Author: Rori D. Stumpf "rori121"
Reviews.Content: This mount is really good value for the money -- why buy all the bells and whistles when all you want is the TV stuck to the wall? This is a solid mount, so don't be fooled by the price.I mounted a 52" Samsung easily, but it took a good 2 hours to set up because of new wire routing through the wall and so on. I like that it can tilt down slightly, and that it's flush up against the wall - I feel it's safer that way. It also includes a nice long HDMI cable so you won't have that additional expense.You do need to be somewhat handy to install it. And if you have a long spirit level that makes it easier to level out.

Reviews.Title: Great and very affordable
Reviews.Author: R. E. View
Reviews.Content: This is the first wall mount I've ever purchased and it's been pretty great. The installation was simple and everything hooks on quick and painlessly. I have a 60" plasma that weighs a TON and it's holding up just fine. The only caveat I would say is that with a 60" screen, it doesn't tilt as much as I would like, but I haven't really tinkered with it too much.Also, get your own HDMI chord because this one fell apart within a month. But hey, you're not buying it for the chord, are you?

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Robert M. White
Reviews.Content: This is a great value. Some mounts can cost 4 or 5 times more. Some previous reviews had complained about the packaging, but this package was great with all the small parts in individual clear plastic bags.  Assembly and installation are straight forward and easy.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the money!
Reviews.Author: Phillip Woody
Reviews.Content: Used this mount for a 55" Panasonic Plasma Viera Television.The Pro's:1.  This is a very sturdy mount that also allows you the ability to adjust to make sure you hit the studs within a certain range.  My house had irregular studs so I used 100lb wall anchors.  Still very sturdy and fully trustworthy.2.  Price you can't beat especially coming with a high speed HDMI cable and a bubble level in case you don't have one.3.  The tilt adjustment allows for some angle correction to get your tv just right.Con's1.  Only con is that it takes a few minutes to assemble.  Not too bad though.  Not difficult just time consuming.2.  The set screws on the bottom are nearly impossible to get to in order to secure the bottom of the tv to the bottom of the mount. You need a very long Philips head to squeeze back there.  There is little room to maneuver since the tv has to stay flush with the wall to lock the screws in beneath the lower lip of the wall mount.Still I would buy this mount again.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: ledzepplin55
Reviews.Content: Arrived as advertized, great prise and easy to install. I have a 50" TV installed on it and the only problem I had was I needed a longer screwdriver to secure the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great mount for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jared B. Faurschou
Reviews.Content: Just ordered a second one to hang my 48" TV in the basement. I was skeptical about this considering the price compared to ones found in big box stores, but it has held up very well, hence the second purchase. As others have stated the instructions are not the best, and I definitely endorse mounting this directly to a stud, vs. using the drywall mount/Molly bolts that are included. Other than that it is a great mount for the price.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to assemble, too close to wall
Reviews.Author: Homebody315 "homebody315"
Reviews.Content: This does what it's supposed to do (hold the flat-screen TV on the wall), but the instructions were FAR from clear; some of the pictures actually seemed to be from a DIFFERENT product. I took pictures of the parts vs. the instructions, but Amazon doesn't give you any way to post pictures any more. Took a long time to get this up on the wall, though once it was up, it wasn't too hard to mount the TV. However, if you DO decide to buy this instead of an 'adjustable' mount, make sure you either hook up all the wires first, or have someone available with very small hands to do it afterwards - there's only about an inch or two of space between the TV and the wall when mounted. We leave our camera/TV connection hanging from it because it's really tough to reconnect it if we took it off (for instance, if we wanted to 'play' pictures from our digital camera for my invalid mom-in-law on HER tv, we used to take the cable & camera over there with us).

Reviews.Title: CHEAP BUT EFFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Boogie
Reviews.Content: My TV has been mounted for about 3 weeks now. While my boyfriend took about 3 hours to get it up. He refuses to look at instructions or ask questions, so it will probably take other people less time to get it mounted. My TV is up and it's sturdy. Went into Walmart and they had the same mount but under a different name at 3 times the cost of this product. Will buy another one for the other room.

Reviews.Title: what a good price
Reviews.Author: Joshua Grubb
Reviews.Content: the mounts work perfecly well and are a fraction of the price of other mounts. With larger tvs (ours was 60''), you do need a long 6-8 inch phillips head screwdriver to tighten your tv to the frame once on the wall. and the tv must be either fixed in the flat position or the angled position before you finish mounting..it cant freely go back and forth.

Reviews.Title: Great Mount, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Rob Golden
Reviews.Content: I run an audio / video and home automation design and installation company.  We use Cheetah mounts all the time because they are reliable, look great (slim mounting), and are always at a great price.  Easy to install, included HDMI is great, always gets the job done.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: tv mount
Reviews.Author: papa
Reviews.Content: i chose this rating only because of the really cheap price..i honestly had more trouble out of one of these mounts than any other mount i have ever installed , the second mount that came with it was no problem. back to the first mount i used, it took me a total of 5 to 6 hours and multiple wall holes to get the tv to look half level.[it still is not level by any means] but i am real particular when it comes to things being level.. anal about it according to every one else..but i like level and that is all there is to it.. i would recommend this mount to others though, as it is very affordable..like i said , the other mount that came with it was great and had no problem.. if i wanted perfection i should have spent the $150.00 to get the usual one i buy .. those days are over with now . i will buy more when needed but prob will go with different style  next time..

Reviews.Title: Did the job
Reviews.Author: F. Marchman
Reviews.Content: The mount was easy to install. I feel confident that my tv is secure. The cable that came with the tv was not so great. The end connection came apart when I pulled it in. Since I had already mounted the tv I was stuck with having to buy a cable because I could not return just that item. All in all it was still less expensive than buying a mount elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: BakingGuru
Reviews.Content: Very easy installation. And did you know you can cut a hole in your drywall through the mount and fish your cords through the wall to hide them?

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: omar
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of this mount. Why should this be so cheap compared to other mounting kits? I ordered one (due to the price), and prepared to return it if I did not think the mount could handle the weight of the 46" LCD TV (LG).Thank you,

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hang my new tv up and it was perfect! Looks good. Easy install. And a fraction of the cost if you go to any store to get it. Even at walmart they were over $100 and they weren't as good as this mount! I will probably get another for my next tv.

Reviews.Title: Flat Screen Mount
Reviews.Author: davidf223 "davidf223"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and does the trick.  Very simple and inespensive.Not fancy but it works and the included cable is much higher quality than the one supplied by my cable operator

Reviews.Title: Sufficient for its purpose.
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Rogucki
Reviews.Content: This mount was purchased to hang a 65" Vizio on the wall, and it is physically capable of doing so.  We have two other flat panels hung on walls in the house, and I find that only one of the mounts actually makes sense.  Let me explain a bit:Here are my cons with this mount:-Tilting capability is awkward at the least.  There are locking pins that I recommend putting in to keep the angle "set," however, this makes it a fixed mount then.-Because the mounting plate comes in multiple pieces and must be bolted together, there are certain places through which you cannot put lag bolts into studs.  Due to the spacing of studs in the center of my room, I had to mount the TV off-center a couple inches; it's not noticeable to most, but I'm a bit obsessive at times.-A few bolts and washers were packaged wrong, so I had to grab a lag bolt from the garage to complete installation.-The real big problem I have with this is securing the TV on the mount once it is hanging.  You have to reach up behind the TV with a very long screwdriver to tighten down 2 screws to "lock" the TV to the bottom of the mount.  With the large TV, I have to reach over 18" and blindly find those screws from under the TV while it is flat against the wall.  The one mount in our house that I DO like has 2 spring-loaded clips that secure the mount to the wall and has pull strings dangling just out of sight to release those.  Perfect design!  This one?  Well, let's just point out I don't have 18" screwdrivers, but must create one.I'd appreciate it if Cheetah Mounts would include a tool for this purpose instead of the two levels (that are inaccurate anyway) they sent with the mount.  Or make the security mechanism more convenient to access; Cheetah, think spring-loaded!My pros for this mount:-It is physically capable of holding a 65" TV that weights just under 95 lbs.-The price is great (about 1/2 what you would find in most stores) making the design flaws much more tolerable.-Pretty good HDMI cable included.As I said, this mount is sufficient for its purpose (holding a 65" flat panel on the wall).  At this point, I have NOT locked it to the mount.  I will do that once I am sure I don't need to access cords any further this weekend.  And the good thing is, I do NOT intend to take that 95 lb TV off the wall much, so I will only have to fight with the most negative thing about the mount a few times in the time I have it.

Reviews.Title: O
Reviews.Author: Carl Olen
Reviews.Content: This unit is everything the Amazon Reviews said it was.  Very easy to assemble and mount.  If you know how to use a screwdriver, don't pay $50 & up for a wall mount  --  buy this one!!

Reviews.Title: Mount
Reviews.Author: Clark Borland
Reviews.Content: got it to watch my TV in bed and it works great for that. Very easy to mount and works out just fine for us.

Reviews.Title: would recommend
Reviews.Author: Jim8
Reviews.Content: This worked out great. Easy to put together (which I didn't know I was going to have to do) and easy to install. Feels sturdy and the tv is up on the wall and everything working fine. Puts the tv VERY close to the wall which is good and bad to me but as far as looks, it's nice. I would recommend. great price too which helps.

Reviews.Title: Could be a bit wider for more flexibility.
Reviews.Author: Cyanpixl
Reviews.Content: I purchased the size recommended for my 52" tv, but I felt it was a bit smaller than it should have been and limits the flexibility to slide the tv back and forth to accommodate different furniture placement.  Because of the join in the middle, I could not connect to more than 2 studs.  Maybe that would be overkill, to have the mount attached to 3 studs, but if it's possible, why not?  I want to know my tv is safely attached to the wall.  I also used all the spacers they gave me and could have used a couple more because of the design of the tv.  I found the HDMI cord came in handy, but really didn't need the level.  I felt it was worth the price, though I was not as crazy about it as I might be if the mounting rails were made in one piece.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Richard Dawson "Bama Man"
Reviews.Content: easy with no problems to install on the wall and easy to remove the tv if necessary to do other things. can't go wrong with this mount.

Reviews.Title: Simple and efficient
Reviews.Author: Koen Witte
Reviews.Content: Very simple to install. Have my 60" hanging from this and have had no issues. No sure why others had problems with the instructions, they are pretty simple and easy to uuse.

Reviews.Title: Lots of little pieces for "them" to save on shipping.
Reviews.Author: Sheila sanders "Warden"
Reviews.Content: Hey, this thing is supposed to hold over 150 pounds. There are 20 pieces holding together 6 pieces of steel, instead of having a solid plate against your wall. A major connection bolt was broken, there were missing screws, unlabeled parts bags and "unseeable" diagrams. On returning to Wayfair, postage is charged both ways, resulting in the loss of over half my purchase price. Glad to take the hit though after receiving a Videosecu solid plate mounting bracket. I feel safer with Videosecu holding my Panny.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Letra
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install.  I did receive one defective screw but worked through that issue.  For the money, its very good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Luna Perez
Reviews.Content: For only 27 dollars! I have a 56 inch LED tv, and the screws were a little too thick, but cutting it up a little worked! It holds up pretty nice too.  For the price, this was a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Worst piece of garbage ever made.  NO way on earth I'd trust it to hold my 60" plasma
Reviews.Author: Romana Larsoneo "Framer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount last week and tried to install it this weekend.  You have to put 6 pieces together to make the frame and none of the holes would line up.  The holes to join the horizontal rails were drilled 1/8 off.  I spent 30 minutes trying to make it work and 5 minutes packing it back up for my credit.  Also if I could have gotten the rails to join I still wouldn't trust it to hold the weight of my tv.  I ended up buying a Sanus f58b and was amazed had how much better the build quality was.  Do yourself a favor and pass up this "best seller"

Reviews.Title: Well made/Easy installation/No issues
Reviews.Author: Carlee Johnson
Reviews.Content: No issues so far holding my ~90lb 60" plasma. The instructions can be a little hard to follow, most likely due to their country of origin. Just make sure you drill properly sized pilot holes and there shouldnt be any problems.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, does the job!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install...I have 3 of these and they are perfect for the price.  Don't hesitate whether to get this one.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!! I would highly recommend this product.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy T.
Reviews.Content: If you are searching for a wall mount you are in luck becuase if you are reading this review then go ahead and purchase this product. I looked at wall mounts for a week, Best Buy to Sam's Club all over the internet. and found this one. I was like price is awsome. I bet this is going to be junk. I was wrong and I am so glad that I purchased this. Only one thing could make this product even better a center hole.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: matt151617
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these now, one holding up a 55" LED and one holding a heavier 42" LCD.  Both are holding steady and not budging.  I didn't bother with the security screws for either; they would have been too difficult to install.  No reason to get anything fancier or more expensive.

Reviews.Title: best mount
Reviews.Author: David J. Morse "Darkgoth"
Reviews.Content: hard to put together but will hold anything!!!  I dont know why i have to write more to get this in, it is stupid and makes many now want to even write

Reviews.Title: It's a wall mount what an I say
Reviews.Author: SPUDS
Reviews.Content: It does what it is intended to do. Now I need to come up with twelve more words to post.

Reviews.Title: No need to pay crazy store prices
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This is a great example of shopping online.The product is very good and priced fairly.Good buy big box rip-offs.

Reviews.Title: sturdy
Reviews.Author: Mac55
Reviews.Content: Fairly easy to assemble and install. seams sturdy. Priced right. Very similar mount at the local stores (several) was 3-4 times the price.

Reviews.Title: Affordable and effective!
Reviews.Author: B. Boatright
Reviews.Content: The product was easy to assemble and install.  It does hold the TV very close to the wall, so expect to have someone help when attaching cables to the TV by holding the lower part of the TV away from the wall (while the top part is hanging from the wall mount and before securing the bottom part to the wall mount).

Reviews.Title: Great Bracket
Reviews.Author: BigBadBen
Reviews.Content: This is a great bracket to mount a small LCD TV to the wall and the price, compared to an electronic store was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: It does it's job
Reviews.Author: Pilar G. Vargas
Reviews.Content: I have an omni mount for my big screen. When I compare the two side by side, Omni mount is bigger, stronger and made of a thicker gauge steel. Omni is much better when it comes to being user friendly as well. It also costs 4 times as much as he cheetah. I bought the cheetah mount for my 45 inch TV. The instructions were not very good, but I'm mechanically inclined, so no big deal. I ended up buying better washers and a larger set of lag bolts as the ones supplied were on the smaller and weaker side. That being said, the mount works and can hold my 190lbs hanging on it for 20 seconds so I think it can handle my 65lb tv no problem. It's been a week and no issues. Oh one last thing, it's impossible to tighten the safety screws without a Phillips screwdriver that is at least 2 feet long. That was definitly a design flaw.

Reviews.Title: These work just right!
Reviews.Author: Michael L
Reviews.Content: They might be a little difficult to assemble but once you have it set it works great. I have purchased several of these and they have worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: watchyMan
Reviews.Content: Awesome price and great addition to my house. Do not spend the money out there. It did require a bit of imagination putting it together. Vague instructions. but excellent price and material.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Pj
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly and was extactly as advertised. I am very pleased with it and would recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Easy!
Reviews.Author: Hans C Aebischer
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely stumped. I read how difficult the instruction where to understand. It only took one quick reading, looking at all the parts and within 5 minutes the frame was put together and now I just have to hang the TV. I will have to order more of the same because it is that great and EASY. Thanks.Hans

Reviews.Title: Work great on our 40" TV
Reviews.Author: allangston2009
Reviews.Content: This mount was much easier to use than the one we purchased for our 55" tv, and could have handled the 55" as well. Wish I would have purchased two of these instead of the one that Wal-Mart suggested for the 55".

Reviews.Title: Well Made!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I was worried that this mount was too light duty for my 60" flat screen but it is just perfect. Easy to mount and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Slim and sturdy
Reviews.Author: tak
Reviews.Content: Overall, the product is sturdy enough to hang my 60" slim LED tv (50lb) but I will not trust it for any heavier TVs. It is slim and very close to the wall and may not have enough clearance for Plasma TV to dissipate the heat. They may want to redesign the lock. There is no way for me to reach to the locking screw after the TV is hanged. Lower one star before of this.

Reviews.Title: Solid Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: D. Birks "Tiger Rider"
Reviews.Content: I used this to mount a 46" Samsung LED to a wall in my den. It only took a few minutes to put together and was easily secured into wall studs with the supplied hardware. The only problem that I had was with the bolts supplied to secure the brackets to the TV. The holes on the TV were recessed and the bolts were not the right length. Inconvenient but not a huge problem, one quick trip to ACE and the screen was up.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Darrian
Reviews.Content: You literally can't beat the price, go into any Best Buy or Walmart for these items and you're looking at paying more for one item alone than you would from Cheetah Mounts LLC. Plus I love the tilt that the tv wall mount offers, it adds a little class to the tv and is easier to look at. 5 stars for me.

Reviews.Title: Doing it's job nicely
Reviews.Author: B. Pruett
Reviews.Content: Sturdy build reassures me about hanging my new TV on the wall. I haven't used a wall mount before but I'm glad I went with this one.

Reviews.Title: Looks great
Reviews.Author: Debra Anderson
Reviews.Content: Don't really know what to expect just don't want it to fall down so far so good. Came on time well packaged EASY TO INSTALL lets see what happenings only been up a day. But i love it so far

Reviews.Title: What an amazing bracket
Reviews.Author: Kay Bennett
Reviews.Content: It came complete with instructions that were easy to implement & was on the wall with the TV in no time.

Reviews.Title: It works...
Reviews.Author: Jose T. Weeks
Reviews.Content: The mount seems solid, plenty of hardware for many mounting options and TV's.  I snapped the plastic level that it comes with when trying to install.

Reviews.Title: Light weight
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle, easy to install, light weight. Packaging was great too.I used it for a 37" T V.

Reviews.Title: Good mount, Very sturdy
Reviews.Author: Burningman
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money, very sturdy mount.  Holds my 50" 2005 plasma TV very well.  Only problem is the holding screws to secure and make earthquake proof. Beacuse of the way it is designed it is virtually impossible to secure the screws after the TV has been mounted.  I think this will work for the newer thinner TV's, but surely doesn't for the older ones...

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Grant Colledge
Reviews.Content: The product was all that was represented. It worked great at a great price. I would recoomend it without reservation.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Stewart Morse
Reviews.Content: I don't know why anyone would pay the high prices at retail stores for HDTV mounts.  This one was easy to put together, and works great.  I would rate it a 5 but the level included with the kit was a off, so I used my own.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: J. McHale
Reviews.Content: Holds up my 37 inch samsung tv well and cant see it on the wall behind the tv so two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jitin Chatlani
Reviews.Content: Really great mount for the price. The only reason I gave it a 4 rather than a 5 is that the HDMI cable that came with it stopped working after 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: JacksGP
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping.  This requires some assembly, but the instructions are clear and the mounting is flexible enough to give plenty of options to mount your flat screen TV/monitor.  It comes with a level and an HDMI cable which are very useful.  Ours supports a 46" flatscreen with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ronald Lee Wilson "proud grandparent"
Reviews.Content: This is a good sturdy product. The only problem we had was the screws weren't uniform. We got too many of the shorter screws and not enough of the longer ones needed to hold the tv to the mount.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: luna
Reviews.Content: A little hard to read and understand but its small and lightweight and i love it. Cheap and amazing :D

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: FJM
