Reviews.Content: Very fast shipping and product was exactly as described.  Very well made and Level came in handy. Cable works great and was a great bonus since I would have had to purchase one. Lenght of cable was more then enough.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Omar Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I intalled my 46 inch TV this weekend and I have to say this is a great wall mount!  Very easy to install and it feels very safe! The TV looks amazing on the wall! My TV is a bit on the heavy side ao I was a bit concerned, but so far the mount is working perfectly! Highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome mount
Reviews.Author: P. Smith "psmith307"
Reviews.Content: Installed great, works great, half the price of the mounts I could find locally.  I will buy another if I ever need one.

Reviews.Title: I like this mount!
Reviews.Author: Ron S.
Reviews.Content: This bracket was easy to install. It supports the tv well. This is the third cheetah mount I have purchased and I have been happy with all of them.

Reviews.Title: Not heavy duty, but I did not expect it to be
Reviews.Author: Bobby L. Fincher
Reviews.Content: I gave it four stars for the cheap price and I knew what I was getting.  The quality is not that great.  I had to grind a piece of the steel to get it to assemble properly.  Don't use the level that comes with the kit.  I used the level and I could tell by eye that the level was off.  Used another level and straightened things out.

Reviews.Title: Unexpected low quality
Reviews.Author: Thomas Radley "TomR"
Reviews.Content: This Bracket is WAY BELOW the standard of previous purchase from Cheetah. Worse was after mounting the bracket and adjusting the angle the hooks will not fit with 15 degree angle; it interferes at the lower bracket. So it really does not do what it should. Disappointed and would return it but for all the work already expended.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lance Frederick "Fredo"
Reviews.Content: Got it set up yesterday..........superb.......Definitely recommended......and its really cheap........Got it thru a Netshop in Saint Lucia......in the Caribbean.......Yess.........yess...AMazon its great.......

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Raul Tobar
Reviews.Content: I have owned this item for about a year now. It does what it says it does, no more to say about it Jack!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install
Reviews.Author: Larry Young
Reviews.Content: This mount is very easy to assemble and to install.  Compared to other similiar mounts you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Cheetah Mount
Reviews.Author: Tony C. Munson
Reviews.Content: It was really easy to install this product. I would recommend it to any homeowner needing to do their own installation and save money.

Reviews.Title: Not for 60"+ TVs unless you want a nightmare of an install.
Reviews.Author: John Smith
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this unless your TV is under 50". It's not worth the hassle.I mounted a 60" Samsung TV with this mount. The stupid thing is too small to even span the beams in my wall properly (16" on center). I had to mount the TV 4" off center from where I wanted it, just so the screw holes would (barely!) line up.After all that fun, I realized that this piece of junk has Philips head screws at the bottom for securing the TV after its mounted. You need a screwdriver with a neck of roughly 24" in order to reach the screws when mounting a 60" TV.This thing is in fact so cheaply made that the supplied lag bolts are 2 different sizes. They actually provide smaller lag bolts for the bottom rail of the mount compared to the top (they reduce the strength of the mount). Must have saved them 10 cents. Because of this you have to drill different size holes and find 2 different bits to secure the bolts.Avoid this and buy a mount that uses 4 good large lag bolts. A mount that is long enough to span your beams without having to compromise the location you want to install the TV in. A mount that includes a long Allen wrench to tighten the locking screws. It is absolutely worth the few bucks extra that you pay.

Reviews.Title: For the price, you can't beat it!
Reviews.Author: Katherine Waldis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this mount for my 65" plasma television. I needed to get it off the bulky stand that took up much of the room, and up on the wall so that the viewing angle was more appropriate. But, I realized that purchasing a stand for a television this large would be expensive, and was somewhat skeptical when I first laid eyes on this mount. Needless to say, that skepticism was totally unnecessary!I drilled the holes for the mount in about five minutes, and put the actual mount together in about three. So, the time you need to set aside for this project is minimal. I attached the arms to the television and had two of my bulkier neighbors lift it onto the mount for me (my television weighs about ninety-five pounds). When they set it on the mount, I was counting down the seconds until it face planted and shattered my two thousand dollar television. It didn't happen!It has been about a month since I put it up on the wall, and still no problems! It's a fantastic mount, and though it feels flimsy, it sure can hold a lot of weight!TL;DR - Definitely the best cheap mount out there!

Reviews.Title: Good Mount
Reviews.Author: dr jones
Reviews.Content: Very easy to hang and put together.  Clip on level worked and was accurate (I still used a 4'-0" level to check).  Best value for a flat television mount that I can find!

Reviews.Title: great mount
Reviews.Author: Diana Kruse
Reviews.Content: this mount is very sturdy & went up on the wall with no problems. It is a good price for this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The wall mount was exactly what I wanted . It was easy to set up and holds my tv perfect. It also arrived early so that was a big plus:)

Reviews.Title: very affordable
Reviews.Author: jen
Reviews.Content: i was hesitant to buy it at first but i decided to give it a try base on the review and im glad i did it was not expensive and serves its purpose

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Brian Carmer
Reviews.Content: used it to hang my 52 inch lcd in my bedroom and it worked just as described. would advise others to purchase

Reviews.Title: For the money, GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: John R. Barnes
Reviews.Content: I searched high and low for a decent tv mount that wouldn't break the bank when I stumbled across these Cheetah mounts. They do just what a tv mount was designed to do and does it well. You will end up with a lot of left over parts. They just provide everything for many different types of setups. Don't get me wrong, there are better mounts out there that will probably be a bit easier to hang, but this does just fine for me. The tilting mechanism is a bit fidgety to get the angle you want. The only thing I was not able to do was tighten the screws on the bottom side of the hangers because I do not have a screwdriver long enough to reach from under the tv; and you can't get your hand behind the tv to tighten them because it is such a low profile design. But, as long as you don't have kids pulling and pushing on your tv (I hope you don't) then there shouldn't be any problem with just letting it hang without tightening those screws. Comes with a small level in case you don't have one and the hdmi cable provided works well. I am currently using it on my PS3. I used this mount to hang our 46" Samsung over the fireplace.

Reviews.Title: Easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: metroguy
Reviews.Content: This was easy to assemble and a really good value for the money.  This held our 42 inch Phillips Plasma screen with no problem and it weighs about 90+ pounds.  I recommend having someone to help with the installing of the TV, however.

Reviews.Title: Budget mount, does the job
Reviews.Author: Chris Meurer
Reviews.Content: I mounted a 50" plasma weighing 125 lbs and the product is handling it well. The instructions did leave a little to be desired, but after some trial and error I got everything to fit properly. The mount is true, and included bubble level was helpful (it breaks apart nicely when it drops on the floor, but snaps together easily enough)I would feel comfortable buying this product again.

Reviews.Title: Great mount but be careful of included level
Reviews.Author: RV "RV"
Reviews.Content: Installed this mount on my wall yesterday and used the included bubble level. I would double and triple check the accuracy of this leveler against one of your own (or just use your own) as mine was defective and resulted in a mount that was not plum with the wall.

Reviews.Title: good for smaller TVs that just need a small tilt.
Reviews.Author: Daniel H. Reynoso
Reviews.Content: This is good for my 32" TV that just has to tilt slightly.  I'm sure it'll hold up to the 55" TV that it says, but it doesn't feel too solid.  So check the weight on your set.  If you have to tilt more that 15 degrees this won't work for you.

Reviews.Title: Marginal for VESA 100x100
Reviews.Author: Daniel Mercer
Reviews.Content: You get a lot a value with this mount but it takes a bit to assemble and it is not well thought out for a TV with a 100x100 VESA pattern.  The included screws for mounting the bracket to the TV were far too short so a trip to the hardware store was required. The wall mount is in four pieces that must be assembled with a splice in the middle, exactly where the TV mount hooks on for a narrow 100x100 pattern.  It was impossible to level the TV because the hooks landed right on top of a bolt head. The solution was to remove one of the four bolts connecting the two halves on the top so both hooks had room to straddle the splice and bottom out in the channel.  With that problem solved everything else went together as advertised. If your TV has a 200x200 pattern or larger you shouldn't have any problems.  The level was handy and the included HDMI cable is a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: Douglas T
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and worked great. Much less expensive than other models and did the job just fine. Great value.

Reviews.Title: great  bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: erica
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this item.  It didnt take long to install and its easy to install and beats paying store prices

Reviews.Title: Good mount at a good price
Reviews.Author: Ray Crooks
Reviews.Content: I've bought two of these for HDTVs in different rooms in my house.  The first one I bought in 2011 and is still holding up great, and I got the second about a week ago and just set it up.  They seem to have made a couple changes that make the installation process smoother in that span of time - the easily breakable cylindrical spacers I got with the first one were replaced with smaller, better ones, for example.  However, I do have to ding them for their quality control; my second mount package contained three 6mm bolts and one 8mm bolt instead of two of each, which meant I had to run to the hardware store to get the correct bolt to finish putting the mount up.The only other issue I've had is that the safety screws, which keep your TV from lifting off the mount, are insanely hard to tighten once you've got the TV on the wall, because there's so little clearance between the TV and the wall to get a screwdriver in there.  But if you want a good mount for a good price, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: TV Mount
Reviews.Author: Carol Norris
Reviews.Content: We haven't hung the TV yet but this arrived very quickly and is exactly what we need to hang our set as the wall we are hanging it on has studs that would not be centered.  The pricing was great as we did comparitive shopping.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Matt Warnick
Reviews.Content: 4 stars only because the instructions included in the box stink.  Do some googling, there is an instructable for this model which made installation a snap.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Susie Day "smIsle"
Reviews.Content: Pros - it holds my TV up at an angle, wasn't too hard to put together, and the included HDMI cord is pretty sweet.Cons - a few of the included screws were the wrong size, I had to improvise.

Reviews.Title: Tilt wall mount
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I bought this wall mount for a third of the price you can get it at bestbuy or Walmart.it was made very good come with all the parts and easy to read instruction.

Reviews.Title: Just What We Needed
Reviews.Author: connie
Reviews.Content: This product was perfect for our TV. It was easy to install. It was not bulky or hard to handle. Would recomend highly. Thanks, for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Cheeta Mount
Reviews.Author: ChattyCathy
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  My TV is now on the wall, and no fear of a child being hurt by a falling TV

Reviews.Title: Nice and cheap product
Reviews.Author: B. Rush "LightiMan"
Reviews.Content: Easy installation. The material is a very good quality. The only problem I had was it was missing one screw in the box.

Reviews.Title: Works great!!
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Mcknelly "Mrs. McK"
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to install and we tilted it just slightly.  It fits perfectly.  it is easier if you have two people doing the installation.

Reviews.Title: Nice Wall Mount for Your LCD TV
Reviews.Author: E. Roth
Reviews.Content: Some of the reviews said the instructions are hard to follow. I thought the mount was pretty simple to assemble and install. You connect the two horizontal pieces using the screws provided, (which are already attached to one side). Locate the studs and attach the mount to the wall. I found that the pilot hole drill sizes were the correct size for the provided lag bolts. Two vertical bars attach to the TV. Many different size screws are provided to account for the different TV mounting holes. You can now hang the TV on the mount. The last step is to tighten the safety screws at the bottom of the vertical brackets. This keeps the TV from jumping off the mount if you should hit it.  A long phillips head screw driver makes this step easier. The mount and brackets are sturdy and made of heavy gauge steel. This mount is a good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: Best mount I've found
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Excellent mount for the price. I mounted an older 42" plasma which weighs half a ton (136 lbs). Works great.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Riddhish Shah
Reviews.Content: rock solid, Has good instructions, includes all the stuff you need. Simple to install and operate. Fits 24 inch stud placement.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Marlene Fleenor
Reviews.Content: Why pay a fortune when the Cheeta Mount more than does the job for a great price..  We mounted our 43" TV with no problems. Loved the price. Plan to order another one for our 50" TV.  Definitely recomment this product.

Reviews.Title: Worked out well
Reviews.Author: Person of Interest in Great Falls
Reviews.Content: I am not writing any more. This is very annoying and any further reviews will be ignored. Thank not goodbye

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Clay Bratton
Reviews.Content: Best $30 I have ever spent on Amazon!! Assembly was a little confusing, because I didn't read the directions first and took all contents out of the bags. Read directions first because the bags are numbered and lettered, this will help when assembling the wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Holds a samsung nice and flush
Reviews.Author: Cory Sobon
Reviews.Content: Holds my 47 samsung nice and flush to the wall just like i needed. Really takes away that ugly bulging look too..and all at a really good price..bravo!

Reviews.Title: Not really what I had hoped for
Reviews.Author: KARCH "kaa"
Reviews.Content: I did not realize, and maybe this is my fault, that the frame was made up of SIX separate pieces instead of one solid piece of metal.  So you are really at the mercy of a few small screws.  I mounted a 60 inch tv and it is mounted, but I am certainly feeling uneasy about it.  I give myself another month before I scrap it and get one that makes me feel safer.  Also, it is IMPOSSIBLE to get the mounting screws in if you TV is 60 inches.  If you are cheap and what a cheap mount...which I was at the time, this one will do you just fine.  It does not come with template so you will need to make one or measure over and over.

Reviews.Title: It worked for me, but the directions are not the best
Reviews.Author: Peter Gascho "Boiler Up!"
Reviews.Content: I have a samsung 42In. TV and it worked for it. I like the price of this mount and that is the main reason I bought it. The directions that come with it could be a lot better. It was very hard to tell which way the veIrtical bracket on each side went on and I ended up guessing. That is the main reason for a 3 Star over all. If I could break it up I would give the Bracket itself 4 Stars and the Hardware that came with it the same, but it really makes me mad to see the lack of effort put into writing directions for the consumer to follow.It also came with an HDMI cable that was 10ft long and looked to be good a level to help you with leveling the bracket. I didnt use it cause it would be smarter to use a level that went the length of the bracket instead of one that is 4 inches long and you have to move it along the bracket to make sure you have it level.The item shipped very fast so 4 stars for that.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gamer4Life
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. Had it for a few months now, and no issues. Solid unit, easy to assemble, and no real crazy tools that you need. Just a screwdriver.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Harlyn M. Strongoli
Reviews.Content: Looked too small o the handle the job but surprisingly it was uber easy to install and does the job perfectly.  No more dusty stand!

Reviews.Title: great mount ,easy to install
Reviews.Author: Tyrone Banks
Reviews.Content: great mount easy to install. i dont like the way u have to tighiten the tv to the mount after u hang it on the wall pain in the butt.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fits Essentially All 32-65" TVs up to VESA 684x400 and 165lbs
Flush-Tilt design is only 1.3" from wall yet still tilts for better viewing and reduced glare
Stronger with Less Metal GREEN design
Fits 16 And 24" Wooden Studs plus Masonry and allows for 3 degrees of Rotation Adjustment
Includes a Twisted Veins 10' Braided High Speed with Ethernet HDMI cable and a 6" 3-axis Magnetic Bubble Level
ProductInfo.Name: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt (1.3" Profile) TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65 inch LED, LCD and Plasma Flat Screen TVs Up To VESA 684x400 and 165lbs, Including a Twisted Veins 10' Braided High Speed with Ethernet HDMI Cable and a 6" 3-Axis Magnetic Bubble Level
